divo jāto divas putro yasmāj jātaṃ mahat sahaḥ | aśvattham agre jaitrāya- -acchā devaṃ vadāmasi || taṃ tvāśvā yathā ratham upa tiṣṭhantu rājānaḥ | samitibhyo vivaktave || tvayā vayaṃ devajāta sarvāḥ prāśo jayāmasi | uta satyā utānṛtāḥ || yo aśvatthena mitreṇa samitīr avagacchati | jayāt sa sarvāḥ pṛtanā yāś ca satyā utānṛtāḥ || adharāñco nir dravantu samityā ululākṛtāḥ | aśvatthamitraṃ puruṣaṃ ye vācā pṛtanyān ||
anuvāka 11 ||
ugrā nāma stha teṣāṃ vaḥ puro gṛhāḥ prācī dik teṣāṃ vo agnir iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata dvipade catuṣpade teṣāṃ vo yāny āyudhāni yā iṣavas tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā || kravyā nāma stha teṣāṃ vo dakṣiṇā gṛhā dakṣiṇā dik teṣāṃ va āpa iṣavaḥ | (…) || see 1def virājo nāma stha teṣāṃ vaḥ paścād gṛhāḥ pratīcī dik teṣāṃ vaḥ kāma iṣavaḥ | (…) || see 1def avasthā nāma stha teṣāṃ va uttarād gṛhā udīcī dik teṣāṃ vo vāta iṣavaḥ | (…) || see 1def uttare nāma stha teṣāṃ va upari gṛhā ūrdhvā dik teṣāṃ vo varṣam iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata dvipade catuṣpade teṣāṃ vo yāny āyudhāni yā iṣavas tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
yadīdaṃ devo diva ājagāma yady antarikṣād yadi pārthivo yaḥ | yadi yajño yajñapateḥ svargas tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo namasā vidhema || yam indram āhur varuṇaṃ yam āhur yaṃ mitram āhur yam u somam āhuḥ | yam agnim āhur yam u sūryam āhus tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo namasā vidhema || refrain written in K ye śmaśānāni manasā nayanti sūryasya raśmīn anusaṃcaranti | ye devānām ṛtvijo yajñiyānāṃ tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo namasā vidhema || refrain written in K ye tandriyā jalpyā prorṇuvanti svapnaṃ durbhūtam abhi ye kiranti | ye devānāṃ dharmadhṛto babhūvus tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo namasā vidhema || refrain written in K svabhyasair abhi ye bhāyante perhaps bhīr ayanti? ye bhāḥ kṛṇvanti ya u rodayanti | perhaps bhīḥ kṛṇvanti? ye vā strīṇāṃ pratirūpā babhūvus tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo namasā vidhema ||
vyāvṛttau patho gāvau vyasyau yugyā uta | vidveṣaṇaṃ kilāsitha yathainau vy adidviṣaḥ || vi kilaināv adidviṣaḥ śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ | atholmukam iva khādiram agnir vām astv antarā || siṃhas te astu cakṣuṣe vyāghraḥ pariṣvañjane | agnir vām astv antarā yathā vāṃ na sahāsati || vy adyaud vy atatanad Bhatt. vy adyaur vy adya tatanad vy āsthat kapaṭv iva | Bhatt. vy āstad yā oṣadhe prasarpasi vy agnir iva tau daha || vi vāṃ yantu hṛdayāni vi cittāni manāṃsi ca | atho yat tanvoḥ saṃgataṃ tad vām astu vidūrakam || asti vai vāṃ vidvikam ubhau śayane antarā | viṣvañcau pary ā vartethāṃ yathā vāṃ na sahāsati ||
trayaḥ poṣās trivṛtaḥ śrayantām anaktu pūṣā payasā ghṛtena | annasya bhūmā puruṣasya bhūmā bhūmā paśūnāṃ ta iha śrayantām || imam ādityā vasunā sam ukṣata- -imam agne vardhaya vāvṛdhānaḥ | asmin trivṛc chrayatāṃ poṣayiṣṇur imam indra saṃ sṛja vīryeṇa || bhūmiṣ ṭvā pātu haritena viśvabhṛd agniḥ pipartv ayasā sajoṣāḥ | vīrudbhis te arjunaṃ saṃvidānaṃ varco dadhātu sumanasyamānam || tredhā jātaṃ janmanedaṃ hiraṇyam agner ekaṃ priyatamaṃ babhūva | somasyaikaṃ hiṃsitasya parāpatad apām ekaṃ vedhaso reta āhus tat te hiraṇyaṃ trivṛd astv āyuṣe || tryāyuṣaṃ jamadagneḥ kaśyapasya tryāyuṣam | tredhāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ trīṇy āyūṃṣi nas kṛdhi || trayaḥ suparṇās trivṛtā yad āyann ekākṣaram abhisaṃbhūya śakrāḥ | praty auhan mṛtyum amṛtena sākam antardadhānā bhuvanāni viśvā || divas tvā pātu haritaṃ madhyāt tvā pātv arjunam | bhūmyā ayasmayaṃ pātu prāgād devapurā ayam || imās tisro devapurās tās tvā rakṣantu sarvataḥ | tās tvaṃ bibhrad āyuṣmān varcasvān uttaro dviṣato bhava || puraṃ devānām amṛtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ya ābedhe prathamo devo agre | tasmai namo daśa prācīḥ kṛṇomy anu manyatāṃ trivṛtā vadhena || nava prāṇān navabhiḥ saṃ mimīte dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya | harite trīṇi rajate trīṇy ayasi trīṇi tapasāviṣṭitāni || ā te cṛtatv aryamā- -ā pūṣā bṛhaspatiḥ | aharjātasya yan nāma tena te 'ti cṛtāmasi || ṛtubhiṣ ṭvārtavair ity ekā || PS 1.54.5 is repeated
yajñaṃ yantaṃ tapasā bṛhantam anv ā rohāmi manasā sayoniḥ | upahūtā agne jarasaḥ parastāt tṛtīye nāke sadhamādaṃ madema || taṃ prajānan prati gṛhṇātu vidvān prajāpatiḥ prathamajā ṛtasya | asmābhir dattaṃ jarasaḥ parastād acchinnaṃ tantum anu saṃ carema || śyenaḥ suparṇo divyo nṛcakṣāḥ sahasrapāc chatayonir vayodhāḥ | sa no ni yaṃsad vasu yat parābhṛtam asmākam astu pitṛṣu svadhāvat || etaṃ sadhasthāḥ pari vo dadāmi yam āvahāc chevadhiṃ jātavedāḥ | anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti taṃ sma jānīta parame vyoman || jānīta smainaṃ parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthā vida lokam etam | iṣṭāpūrtam anu saṃ krāma vidvān yatra te dattaṃ bahudhā vibandhuṣu ||
anuvāka 12 ||
yebhiḥ pāśair abhidadhāsi druhvaṇaḥ samāmino anṛtaṃ ye samāmire | tāṃs te vi ṣyāmy āyuṣe balāya- -anamīvaṃ pitum addhi prasūtaḥ || anāgā babhro ayam astu vīro druhaḥ pāśebhyaḥ pari pāhy enam | rājan pravidvān pra mumugdhi pāśān yasmai carāmi haviṣā ghṛtena || kaśyapa indrāya haviṣā cacāra haritvatīṣu maghavā maghone | paspāra viśvā bhuvanasya gopā antarikṣasya mahato vimāne || apūpaṃ nābhilaṃ te ghṛtaścutaṃ nadīnāṃ pade suśrutaṃ juhomi | pravidvān rājan pra mumugdhi pāśān anyasya patnī vidhavā yathāsat || anātureṇa varuṇaḥ pathemaṃ svastibhir ati durgāṇi neṣat | tam aśvinā pratigṛhyā svastaye doṣā enam uṣase saṃ pra yacchāt ||
ye piśācā imāṃ vittim ākūtiṃ mohayanti naḥ | teṣāṃ tvam agne nāśaya varcaś cittam atho prajām || nāśayāgne piśācānāṃ varcaś cittam atho prajām | athāśāṃ mahyaṃ rādhaya yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā || āśāṃ mahyaṃ rādhayitvā- -indriyeṇa yathāmṛtām | tvam agne kravyādaḥ sarvān piśācām̐ arciṣā daha || prati daha yātudhānān mūradevān vicarṣaṇe | ye no durasyā dveṣeṇa- -athāśāṃ mohayanti naḥ || ye naḥ paśuṣu dipsanty āśāyāṃ puruṣeṣu ca | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasrākṣeśānaḥ piśācām̐ arciṣā daha ||
sahasvedaṃ sahamāne atho devi sarasvati | athedam aśvinā lakṣma rohitaṃ kṛṇutaṃ yuvam || āsurasya mukhasyāgne lakṣmamukhaṃ nāmāsi | meto jyāyo bhūr ita it kanīyo 'so naśyetaḥ paro mā tvā hiṃsiṣam || yāsāṃ pitā parjanyo bhūmir mātā babhūva | hvayāmi sarvā oṣadhīr gojātāḥ somajinvatāḥ || idaṃ saptaprakhe tvaṃ kilāsaṃ nāśayā tvacaḥ | niṣkṛtir nāma vā asi sedaṃ niṣ kṛdhi bhadrayā || niṣkṛtir nāma te mātā niṣkṛtir nāma te pitā | uto tvam asi niṣkṛtiḥ sedaṃ niṣ kṛdhi bhadrayā ||
aurdhvanabhasaḥ prathamaḥ sūryacetā uśadbhyaḥ | cakāra kṛtyām āsuraḥ sā no bhavatu bhadrayā || ya imāṃ kṛtyām upajahrur ye vā cakamire ?kṣitam | devānāṃ sarveṣāṃ svasā tān devī nirṛtir hanat || kaśyapasya pratisaro dyauṣ pitā pṛthivī mātā | yathābhicakra devās tathāpi kṛṇutā punaḥ || yāḥ kṛtyā nīlavatīr yāḥ kṛtyāḥ pāśyāvatīḥ | kṛtyā yāś cakrur lohinīs tā ito nāśayāmasi || yadi vā idam ājahrur ime bhadrā asann iti | kṛtyāsi kalyāṇy asi sāmuṃ kartāram anv ihi ||
bṛhat te varcaḥ prathatām upa dyāṃ mitrebhya edhi surabhiḥ suvarcāḥ | adhi te rājā varuṇo bravītu tasmā u tvaṃ haviṣā bhāgadhā asaḥ | śataṃ hemantān damayā sapatnān viśas tvā sarvā anu guṅgavo bhavantu || yas tvotpipānaṃ pratyutpipāti yas tvā sajāto viriphāty antitaḥ | indras taṃ yoktre adhame yunaktu Bhatt. adhi me tasmai (…) || see 1def yas tvā yacchantaṃ pratiyaṃyamīti yas tvā jigīṣāt pṛtanāḥ samarye | bṛhaspatis tam ava jaṅghanītu tasmai (…) || see 1def ye te śulkam āharān ya u te baliṃ Bhatt. āharāṃ somaḥ sajātān upa saṃ namāti te | agniḥ sayugvān adhi te bravītu tasmai (…) || see 1def variṣṭhaidhi puruḥ prajayā suvīro abhi pra yuṅkṣva damayā sapatnān | indro marutvān adhi te bravītu tasmā u tvaṃ haviṣā bhāgadhā asaḥ | śataṃ hemantān damayā sapatnān viśas tvā sarvā anu guṅgavo bhavantu ||
anuvāka 13 ||
bhagāya rājñe prathamaṃ juhomi viśve devā uttare mādayantām | uśan patnībhya uśatībhya ābhyaḥ patim agna ā vaha rātahavyaḥ || patiṃ vṛṇīṣva haviṣā gṛṇānā tam ā vahāt savitā taṃ te agniḥ | tasmai namasva śataśāradāya bhagabhaktā bhagavatī suvīrā || yam aryaman patim asyai dideśitha jane cit santaṃ tam ihā vahāsi | sumaṅgaly apatighnī suśevā rāyaspoṣeṇa tam iṣā sacasva || yaṃ te patim aryamā jāyamānāyai dhātā cakalpa tam ihā vahāsi | abhivareṇa haviṣā juhomi prajānann aitu sumanasyamānaḥ || patiṃ te dyāvāpṛthivī adhātāṃ patiṃ mitrāvaruṇā vāto agniḥ | sapta rṣayo 'ditiḥ soma indras te tvā devāḥ pativatnīṃ kṛṇvantu ||
yas tvārāyaḥ praviveśa- -ajānir janivām̐ uta | atho yas tanvaṃ pasparśa tam ito nir ṇayāmasi || niṣ ṭvārāya nayāmasi ya imāṃ praviveśitha | ātmānam asyā mā hiṃsīr anyatra cara meha bhūḥ || yad arāyemām upāyasi dhehy asyai rayipoṣaṇam | prajāṃ cid asyā mā hiṃsīr anyatra cara meha bhūḥ || yad arāyehāyasi hanāma vīrudhā tvā | atho khanitrimais tvā- -ād vṛṣeṇa yathābhagam || yad arāyāsūyaṃ straiṣūyam āvatokyam | yat paitṛṣadyaṃ daurbhāgyaṃ tad ito nir ṇayāmasi ||
agner vo balavato balena manyuṃ vi nayāmasi || indrasya vo balavato balena manyuṃ vi nayāmasi || somasya vo balavato balena manyuṃ vi nayāmasi || bṛhaspater vo balavato balena manyuṃ vi nayāmasi || prajāpater vo balavato balena manyuṃ vi nayāmasi || yat te sūrya divi deveṣu varcas tasya no dhehi tvam asi pracetāḥ | ahaṃ tvad ugras tviṣitas tviṣīmān imāṃ vācaṃ vi sākṣīya ||
vātaḥ purastāt pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ || tapojā amūro dakṣiṇataḥ pavase nabhasvān | Bhatt. asuro; amūro see Griffiths 2009, 34 namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ || refrain written in K viśvāyur viśvajanīnaḥ pratīcyā diśaḥ pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ || refrain written in K śivo vaiśvadeva udīcyā diśaḥ pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ || refrain written in K atiṣṭhāvān bārhaspatya ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ pavase nabhasvān | namas te vidma te nāmadheyaṃ mā no hiṃsīḥ ||
apādyaud apātatanad apaskandya vadhed ahim | kalyāṇyā yathā smitaṃ śam u naḥ santu vidyutaḥ || yat parjanya stanayati sarvaṃ saṃvijate jagat | patiṃ tad ṛtviyāvatī pṛthivī prati modate || eṣa enā abhy akrandīd vṛṣāśvo dhenukā iva | ahīṃs tvaṃ vidyutā jahi māsmākaṃ puruṣān vadhīḥ || abhikrandāt stanayitnor avasphūrjād aśanyā uta | devā maruto mṛḍata naḥ pātu no duritād avadyāt || ṛjīte pari ṇo nama- -ādityāḥ śarma yacchata | yuyuta parṇinaṃ śaram utāparṇaṃ riśādasaḥ ||
anuvāka 14 ||
kṛtavyadhani vidhya taṃ yaś cakāra tam ij jahi | na tvām acakruṣe vayaṃ vadhāya saṃ śiśīmahe || yathā te devy oṣadhe pratīcīnaṃ phalaṃ kṛtam | evā tvaṃ kṛtvane kṛtyāṃ hastagṛhya parā ṇaya || punaḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛte read kṛtyā kṛtyākṛtaṃ (?) godhevāvaṭam anv ayat | saktur iva saktupreṣyaṃ pratīcī prati dadhvasat || yāṃ te cakrur vartaneṣu vārtākuṣu vṛtāsu ca | maṇḍūke kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrus tayā kṛtyākṛto jahi || agnir ivaitu pratikūlam anukūlam ivodakam | sukhe ratha iva vartatāṃ kṛtyā kṛtyākṛtaṃ kṛtā ||
agnir dyumnena sūryo jyotiṣā dyaur mahimnāntarikṣaṃ vyacasā | diśa āśābhiḥ pṛthivī payobhir idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vardhayantu prajāvat || tvaṣṭā rūpeṇa savitā savena- -ahar mitreṇa varuṇena rātrī | pūṣā puṣṭair bhago aṃśena bhaktyā- -idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vardhayantu prajāvat || yāṃ viśvakarmā nijaghāna methim antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | tasyā āhuḥ kṣatriyaṃ garbham etaṃ pari māva patthā mūrdhani dhārayasva || chandāṃsy asyā abhito mayūkhā stomā ātmā yajur asyāḥ purīṣam | tasyā āhuḥ kṣatriyaṃ nirmitaṃ pari māva patthā mūrdhani dhārayasva || parā ṇudasva vyathayābhimātim adhaspadaṃ kṛṇuṣva durdharāyataḥ | mā tvā dabhan sapatnā dipsantas tava rāṣṭram uttamaṃ dyumnam astu ||
idaṃ tan mitrāvaruṇā havir vāṃ yenāgre devā amṛtatvam āyan | tenāsmai kṣatram adhi dhārayaujo 'sapatnāḥ pradiśaḥ santv asmai || ghṛtasya dhārā mitrāvaruṇā duhāṃ vāṃ dhenur anapasphurantī | devaḥ savitota vāyur agnir bhūtasya patir iha śarma yacchāt || śaṃ nas tan mitrāvaruṇā gṛṇītaṃ tṛḍhā amitrā bahudhā vi śerām | jayatu senopa ghoṣa etu pṛthak satvāno bahudhā bharantām || hanāma mitrāvaruṇāv amitrān bhavāma bhadre sukṛtasya loke | pārayān naḥ savitā devo agnir jayāmedaṃ haviṣā kaśyapasya || vāto yaṃ mitrāvaruṇā tad āha viśvantaraṃ nirmitaṃ kaśyapasya | adhvaryavo maruto yasyāsan tena devebhyo varimāṇi cakruḥ ||
acikradat svapā iha bhavad agne yajasva rodasī urūcī | āmuṃ naya namasā rātahavyo yuñjantu suprajasaṃ pañca janāḥ || dūre cit santam aruṣāsa indram ā cyāvayantu sakhyāya vipram | yad gāyatrīṃ bṛhatīm arkam asmai sautrāmaṇyādadhṛṣan ?tu devāḥ || adbhyas tvā rājā varuṇo juhāva somas tvāyaṃ hvayatu parvatebhyaḥ | indras tvāyaṃ hvayatu viḍbhya ābhyaḥ śyeno bhūtvā viśa ā patemāḥ || śyenaṃ havir nayatv ā parasmād anyakṣetre aparuddhaṃ carantam | aśvinā panthāṃ kṛṇutāṃ sugaṃ te garbhaṃ sajātā abhi saṃ viśadhvam || śyenaṃ haviḥ kaśyapasyopa śikṣa- -indraṃ vātaḥ prahito dūta ā vaha | viṣahya śatrūn senāgrair viśo vṛṇāno 'va gaccha kāmī || yas te havaṃ paritiṣṭhāt sajāta uta niṣṭiyaḥ | apāca indra tān nītvā- Bhatt. tāṃ -athemam ava gamaya || hvayantu tvā pañca janāḥ patiṃ mitrā avṛṣata | mss. patimitrā; emend. Barret prati indrāgnī viśve devā viśi kṣemam adīdharan ||
prajāpatir anavartiḥ sa prajābhir anavartiḥ | sa mānavartir anavartiṃ kṛṇotu || indro 'navartiḥ sa vīryeṇānavartiḥ | (…) || see 1c somo 'navartiḥ sa oṣadhībhir anavartiḥ | sa mānavartir anavartiṃ kṛṇotu || āpo 'navartayas tāḥ parjanyenānavartayaḥ | tā mānavartayo 'navartiṃ kṛṇvantu || devā anavartayas te 'mṛtenānavartayaḥ | te mānavartayo 'navartiṃ kṛṇvantu ||
anuvāka 15 ||
payo mahyam oṣadhayaḥ payo me vīrudho dadhan | apāṃ payasvad yat payas tan me varṣantu vṛṣṭayaḥ || payo mahyaṃ payasvanto hastino me payo dadhan | payaḥ patatriṇo mahyam aiṇeyā me payo dadhan || payasvan me kṣetram astu payasvad uta dhānyam | ahaṃ payasvān bhūyāsaṃ gāvo ma uta payasvatīḥ || payo mahyam apsaraso gandharvā me payo dadhan | payo me viśvā bhūtāni vāto dadhātu me payaḥ || payo mahyaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ payo dadhat | payo ma indraś cāgniś ca dhātā dadhātu me payaḥ ||
ahaṃ bibharmi te mano ahaṃ cittam ahaṃ vratam | mamed api kratāv aso mama citte sacāvahai || āmanā asa ihamanā asa iha te ramatāṃ manaḥ | mayi te ramatāṃ manaḥ || āñjanasya madhughasya kuṣṭhasya naladasya ca | vīrodekasya mūlena mukhe nimandanaṃ kṛtam || madhu me antar āsye mukhe nimandanaṃ kṛtam | tatro tvaṃ vi vartasva narācīva vartasi || yathā nemī rathacakraṃ samantaṃ pariṣasvaje | evā pari ṣvajasva mā yathāsan mayi te manaḥ ||
yathedam aśvinā tṛṇaṃ vāto vahati bhūmyāḥ | evā vayaṃ vahāmasi yāṃ vayaṃ kāmayāmahe || ut tvā mātā sthāpayatu pra tvā nudatām aśvinā | adhā śiśur iva mātaraṃ mām evānv etu te manaḥ || yathā kṣīraṃ ca sarpiś ca manuṣyāṇāṃ hṛdaḥ priyam | evāham asyā nāryā hṛdo bhūyāsam uttaraḥ || agneṣ ṭvā tapas tapatu vātasya dhrājiḥ | mā spṛkṣathā niṣadanāya sādhava ut tiṣṭha prehy agnivat te kṛṇomi || sūryasya tvā tapas tapatu vātasya dhrājiḥ | mā spṛkṣathā niṣadanāya sādhava ut tiṣṭha prehi sūryavat te kṛṇomi ||
hiraṇyapuṣpī subhagā kūpaś cāyaṃ sumaṅgalaḥ | tāv enāṃ bhadrayā dhattām amṛtāv amṛte bhage || hiraṇyaṃ pṛḍvad dharitaṃ tat te aṅgeṣu rohatu | tenemām aśvinā nārīṃ bhagenābhi ṣiñcatam || yathā kūpam udahṛtas tṛṣyanto yanti kāminaḥ | evā tvā sarve devaraḥ patayo yantu kāminaḥ || hiraṇyākṣi madhuvarṇe hiraṇyaparicartane | aṅko hiraṇyayas tava tenāsyai patim ā vaha || yadi vāsi tiro janaṃ yadi vā nadyas tiraḥ | iyaṃ tvā mahyam oṣadhir aṅkeneva ny ā nayāt ||
punaḥ prāṇaṃ punar apānam asmai punar vyānam uta soma dhehi | ātmāyaṃ cakṣur ?udate samānas tam ū nu pāhi tam ū nu jinva jāgṛhi || tvaṣṭā rūpeṇa savitā savena- -ahar mitreṇa varuṇena rātrī | indro jyaiṣṭhyena brahmaṇāyaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ pūṣāsmai punar asuṃ dadhātu || ya ādityā vasavo ye ca rudrā viśve devā aditir yā ca rātrī | yajño bhagaḥ savitā ye ca devā yamo 'smai punar asuṃ dadhātu || punas te rājā varuṇo dadātu somo rājāsum it te punar dāt | indro marudbhir aśvinā te bhiṣajyatām agnī rudro 'sum it te punar dāt || punar dyaur devī punar antarikṣam agnir vātaḥ pavamāno bhiṣajyatu | grāhyāḥ pāśān nirṛtyāḥ pāśān mṛtyoḥ pāśād vāk tvā devī punar dadātu ||
anuvāka 16 ||
idaṃ cakṣur ṛtāvarī mā mā hāsīt purāyuṣaḥ | yad vāṃ tamo yad ripiśam apa vāṃ tan ni dadhmasi || yad andhiyaṃ yad algaṇaṃ yo 'rmo adhirohati | ayasmayas tad aṅkuśo akṣṇo 'rmam apa lumpatu || yam ahyājim ajayan nṛcakṣā Bhatt. ajayaṃ yaṃ vā śyenaḥ śakunir yaṃ suparṇaḥ | yad āhuś cakṣur aditer anantaṃ somo nṛcakṣā mayi tad dadhātu || yathā cakṣuḥ suparṇasya yathāśvasya yathā śunaḥ | evā me aśvinā cakṣuḥ kṛṇutaṃ puṣkarasrajā || yasyāḥ suparṇaḥ prapatañ Bhatt. prapatan cakṣuṣā cakṣur ādade | tasyāḥ samudraje tava cakṣuṣā cakṣur ā dade ||
agniṃ te haraḥ siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā || vātaṃ te prāṇaḥ siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā || sūryaṃ te cakṣuḥ siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā || antarikṣaṃ te śrotraṃ siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā || paramāṃ te parāvataṃ manaḥ siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā ||
apas te rasaḥ siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā || oṣadhīs te lomāni siṣacantu yātudhāna svāhā || pṛthivīṃ te śarīraṃ siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā || samudraṃ te vāk siṣaktu yātudhāna svāhā || nirṛtyās tvāsani juhomi yātudhāna svāhā ||
idaṃ te śiro bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te mastiṣkaṃ ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te hanū bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te jihvāṃ ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te grīvā bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te skandhān ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te aṃsau bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te bāhū ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te hṛdayaṃ bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te klomānaṃ ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te pṛṣṭīr bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te parśūr ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te śroṇī bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te vastraṃ ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ ta ūrū bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te jaṅghe ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te kulphau bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te pādau ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te tvacaṃ bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te prāṇān ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām || idaṃ te parūṃṣi bhinadmi yātudhāna svāhā- -idaṃ te majjño ni tṛṇadmi bhūmyām ||
nardamodalavuntaka jiṣṇo hāparājitaḥ | amuṃ bhrūṇāny arpaya svayaṃ pāśaṃ ny āyati || asur aitu sahakratur ātmā prāṇo atho balam | sa no dadhātu bhadrayā- -agnir viśvād vasumān svastaye || dakṣiṇā mā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇā pātu savyataḥ | paścād anuvyādhāt pātu purastāt pātu dakṣiṇā || śatam āpo divyā mitrasya ca dakṣiṇāḥ | dhātā savitād rudras te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || śataṃ pāśā varuṇasya brahmaṇaspater u śatam | martāt pāśān no vi ṣya śatāt pāśebhyo vayaṃ tvām ||
anuvāka 17 ||
prācīṃ diśam āsthām agnir māvatv ojase balāya diśāṃ priyo bhūyāsam | anamitrā me diśo bhavantu ghṛtapratīkāḥ || dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthām indro māvatv ojase balāya (…) || see 1bcd pratīcīṃ diśam āsthāṃ varuṇo māvatv ojase balāya (…) || see 1bcd udīcīṃ diśam āsthāṃ somo māvatv ojase balāya (…) || see 1bcd dhruvāṃ diśam āsthāṃ viṣṇur māvatv ojase balāya (…) || see 1bcd ūrdhvāṃ diśam āsthāṃ bṛhaspatir māvatv ojase balāya diśāṃ priyo bhūyāsam | anamitrā me diśo bhavantu ghṛtapratīkāḥ ||
manāyyai tantuṃ prathamaṃ paśced anyā atanvata | tan nārīḥ pra bravīmi vaḥ sādhvīr vaḥ santūrvarīḥ || sādhur vas tantur bhavatu sādhur otur atho vṛtā | atho horvarīr yūyaṃ prātar voḍheva dhāvata || khargalā iva patvarīr apām ugram ivāyanam | patantu patvarīr iva- -urvarīḥ sādhunā pathā || avācyau totudyete todenāśvatarāv iva | pra stomam urvarīṇāṃ śaśayānām astāviṣam || nārī pañcamayūkhaṃ sūtravat kṛṇutaṃ vasu | ariṣṭo asya vastā prendra vāsa utau tira ||
śāsa itthā mahām̐ asy amitraghāto adbhutaḥ | na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana || vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja | vi manyum indra vṛtrahann amitrasyābhidāsataḥ || vi na indra vi mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ | adhamaṃ gamayā tamo yo asmām̐ abhidāsati || svastidā viśāṃ patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī | vṛṣendraḥ pura etu naḥ somapā abhayaṃkaraḥ || apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham | vi mahac charma yaccha varīyo yāvayā vadham ||
ayaṃ yo 'titaro maṇis tenāti tara duśyasaḥ | sapatnān dviṣato maṇe pra ṇudasva pṛtanyataḥ || pra ṇudasva pra sahasva sapatnān dviṣato maṇe | tarābhimātiṃ duśyasāṃ varco bhaṅgdhi pṛtanyatām || varco jahi manyuṃ jahy ākūtiṃ dviṣatāṃ maṇe | devo yo 'titaro maṇis tenāti tara dhūrvataḥ || ye dhūrvanti ye druhyanti ye dviṣanti pṛtanyataḥ | sarvān sapatnāṃs te maṇir Bhatt. sarvāṃ ni manyuṃ dviṣatas karat || tava citte tava vrate tavaivādhaspadaṃ carān | devo yo 'titaro maṇis tenāti tara duśyasaḥ ||
ā te manaś cakṣuṣyam ā te hṛdayyaṃ dade | padoṣ ṭe padyam ā dade yathā tiṣṭhāsi me vaśe || vāñcha me pādau tanvaṃ vāñchākṣyau vāñcha sakthyau | akṣyau vṛṣaṇyantyāḥ keśā oṣṭhau māṃ te kāmena śuṣyatām || mayi tvā doṣaṇiśliṣaṃ kṛṇomi hṛdayaśliṣam | yathā mama kratāv aso mamāsaś ced asīd api || yāsāṃ nābhir ārehaṇaṃ hṛdi saṃvananaṃ kṛtam | gāvo ghṛtasya mātaro amūṃ saṃ vānayantu me || mahyaṃ tvā dyāvāpṛthivī mahyaṃ devī sarasvatī | mahyaṃ tvendraś cāgniś ca- -ahorātre ni yacchatām ||
tūli mūly arjuni punar vo yantu yātavaḥ punar jūtiḥ kimīdinīḥ | yasya stha tam atta yo vaḥ prāhait tam atta svā māṃsāny atta || atsyavo jighatsavaḥ (…) || see 1bcdef aviṣyavas pāsyavaḥ (…) || see 1bcdef sphātihārī rasahārīḥ (…) || see 1bcdef vātajūte manojavaḥ punar vo yantu yātavaḥ punar jūtiḥ kimīdinīḥ | yasya stha tam atta yo vaḥ prāhait tam atta svā māṃsāny atta ||
anuvāka 18 ||
Kāṇḍa 3
ā tvāgan rāṣṭraṃ saha varcasod ihi prāṅ viśāṃ patir ekarāṭ tvaṃ vi rāja | sarvās tvā rājan pradiśo hvayantu- -upasadyo namasyo bhaveha || tvāṃ viśo vṛṇataṃ rājyāya tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ | varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva- -ato vasūni vi bhajāsy ugraḥ || accha tvā yantu havinaḥ sajātā agnir dūto ajiraḥ santurātiḥ | jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanaso bhavantu bahuṃ baliṃ prati paśyāsā ugraḥ || aśvinā tvāgre mitrāvaruṇobhā viśve devā marutas tvā hvayantu | sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭhā iha syāḥ sve kṣetre saviteva vi rāja || ā pra drava paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ śive te dyāvāpṛthivī abhūtām | tad ayaṃ rājā varuṇas tathāha sa tvāyam ahvat sa ihedam ehi || indrendraṃ manuṣyaḥ parehi saṃ yajñiyās tvā varuṇena saṃvidānaḥ | sa tvāyam ahvat sve sadhasthe sa devān yakṣat sa u kalpayād viśaḥ || pathyā revatīr bahudhā virūpāḥ sarvāḥ saṅgatya varivas te akran | tās tvā sarvāḥ saṃvidānā hvayantu daśamīm ugraḥ sumanā vaśeha || yad ajireṇa haviṣā- -ava tvā gamayāmasi | atrāta indraḥ kevalīr viśo balihṛtas karat ||
hariṇasya raghuṣyado 'dhi śīrṣaṇi bheṣajam | sukṣetriyaṃ viṣāṇayād visūcīnam anīnaśat || anu tvā hariṇo vṛṣā padbhiś caturbhir akramīt | viṣāṇe vi ṣya guṣpitaṃ yat kiṃ ca kṣetriyaṃ hṛdi || ado yad avarocate catuṣpakṣam iva cchadiḥ | tena te sarvaṃ kṣetriyam aṅgebhyo nāśayāmasi || ud agātāṃ bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake | vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamaṃ pāśam uttamam || yad āsuteḥ kriyamāṇāyāḥ kṣetriyaṃ tvā vyānaśe | vedāhaṃ tasya bheṣajaṃ kṣetriyaṃ nāśayāmi te || apavāse nakṣatrāṇām apavāsa utoṣasām | apāsmat sarvam āmayad apa kṣetriyam akramīt || āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ | āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās tvā muñcantu kṣetriyāt ||
pumān puṃsaḥ parijāto 'śvatthaḥ khadirād adhi | sa hantu śatrūn māmakān yāṃś cāhaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām || tān aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi śatrūn vaibādha dodhataḥ | indreṇa vṛtraghnā mehy agninā varuṇena ca || yathāśvattha niḥśṛṇāsi pūrvān jātān utāparān | evā pṛtanyatas tvam abhi tiṣṭha sahasva ca || yathāśvattha vibhinatsy antar mahaty arṇave | evā me śatroś cittāni viṣvag bhindhi sahasva ca || yaḥ sahamānaś carasi sāsahāna iva rṣabhaḥ | tenāśvattha tvayā vayaṃ sapatnān sahiṣīmahi || sinātv enān nirṛtir mṛtyoḥ pāśair amokyaiḥ | aśvattha śatrūn māmakān yāṃś cāhaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām || adharāñcaḥ pra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt | Bhatt. vandhanāt na nir bādha praṇuttānāṃ punar asti nivartanam || praiṇān nudāmi manasā pra cittena pra brahmaṇā | praiṇān vṛkṣasya śākhaya- -aśvatthasya nudāmasi ||
yad adaḥ saṃprayatīr ahāvanadatā hate | tasmād ā nadyo nāma stha tā vo nāmāni sindhavaḥ || yat preṣitā varuṇena- -āc chībhaṃ samavalgata | tad āpnod indro vo yatīs tasmād āpo anu ṣṭhana || apakāmaṃ syandamānā avīvarata vo hikam | indro vaḥ śaktibhir devīs tasmād vār ṇāma vo hikam || eko vo deva upātiṣṭhat syandamānā upetya | udāniṣur mahīr iti tasmād udakam ucyadhve || āpo devīr ghṛtam id āpa āhur agnīṣomau bibhraty āpa it tāḥ | tīvro raso madhupṛcām araṅgama ā mā prāṇena saha varcasāgan || ād it paśyāmy uta vā śṛṇomy ā mā ghoṣo gacchati vāṅ māsām | mene bhejāno amṛtasya tarhi hiraṇyavarṇā atṛpaṃ yadāpaḥ ||
agnir no dūtaḥ praty etu śatrūn pratidahann abhiśastim arātim | sa cittāni mohayatu pareṣāṃ nihastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ || ayam agnir amūmuhad yāni cittāni vo hṛdi | vi vo dhamāty okasaḥ pra vo dhamāti sarvataḥ || indra cittāni mohaya- -arvāg ākūtyā adhi | agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya || vy eṣām ākūtaya ita- -atho cittāni muhyata | atho yad adyaiṣāṃ hṛdi tad eṣāṃ pari nir jahi || amīṣāṃ cittāni pratimohayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi | abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair grāhyāmitrāṃs tamasā vidhya śatrūn || asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām asmān abhy aity ojasā spardhamānā | tāṃ guhata tamasāpavratena yathaiṣām anyo anyaṃ na jānāt ||
anuvāka 1 ||
agnir no vidvān praty etu śatrūn pratidahann abhiśastim arātim | sa senāṃ mohayatu pareṣāṃ nihastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ || yūyam ugrā maruta īdṛśe stha- -abhi preta mṛḍata sahadhvam | amīmṛḍan vasavo nāthitebhyo +'gnir hy eṣāṃ vidvān praty etu śatrūn || amitrasenāṃ maghavann asmāñ chatrūyatām abhi | yuvaṃ tān indra vṛtrahann agniś ca dahataṃ prati || prasūta indraḥ pravatā haribhyāṃ pra te vajraḥ pra mṛṇann etu śatrūn | jahi pratīco anūcaḥ parāco viśvaṃ hi riṣṭaṃ kṛṇuhi satyam eṣām || senāmohanaṃ kṛṇv indrāmitrebhyas tvam | agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya || indraḥ senāṃ mohayatu maruto ghnantv ojasā | cakṣūṃṣy agnir ā dattāṃ punar etu parājitām ||
ekaśataṃ viṣkandhāni viṣṭhitā pṛthivīm anu | teṣāṃ tu sarveṣām idam astu viṣkandhadūṣaṇam || karṣaphasya viśaphasya dyauṣpitā pṛthivī mātā | yathābhicakra devās tathāpi kṛṇutā punaḥ || aśleṣmāṇo adhārayan tathā tan manunā kṛtam | kṛṇomi vadhri viṣkandhaṃ muṣkābarho gavām iva || sūtre piśaṅge khṛgalaṃ yad ābadhnanti vedhasaḥ | śravasyaṃ śuṣmaṃ kābavaṃ vadhriṃ kṛṇvantu bandhuraḥ || yenā śravasyo caratha devā ivāsuramāyayā | śunāṃ kapir iva dūṣaṇo bandhurā kābavasya ca || duṣṭyai hi tvā bhantsyāmi dūṣayitvā kābavam | ud āśavo rathā iva śapathebhiḥ sariṣyatha ||
yamasya lokād adhy ā babhūvitha pramadā martān pra yunakṣudhīraḥ | ekākinā sarathaṃ yāsi vidvān svapna mimāno asurasya yonau || bambas tvāgre viśvavayāpaśyat purā rātryā janitor eke ahni | tataḥ svapnedam adhy ā babhūvitha viṣvaṅvarūpam apagūhamānaḥ || bṛhan grāvāsurebhyo 'dhi devān upāvavarta mahimānam icchan | tasmai svapnāya dadhur ādhipatyaṃ trayastriṃśāsaḥ svar ānaśānāḥ || naitāṃ viduḥ pitaro nota devā yaiṣā jalpiś caraty antaredam | trite svapnam adadhur āptye nara ādityāso varuṇenānuśiṣṭāḥ || vy asya krūram abhi yantu duṣkṛto 'svapnena sukṛtaḥ puṇyam āyuḥ | svar madasi parameṇa bandhunā tapyamānasya manaso 'dhi jajñiṣe || vidma te sarvāḥ parijāḥ purastād vidma svapna yo adhipā iho te | yaśasvino no yaśaseha pāhy ārād dviṣebhir apa yāhi dūram ||
ambāḥ sumukhāḥ sṛjata padvat sṛjata satyajñeyam | sṛjāmy ahaṃ dūtān asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam || indram aham iha huve somapām ubhayāvinam asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam || varuṇam aham iha huva ugraṃ rājanyaiḥ saha- -asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam || aditim aham iha huve sūraputrāṃ kanīnikām asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam || bṛhaspatim aham iha huve yo devānāṃ purohito 'smai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam || āṇāścāṇāś caṇḍāmarkā asmai viṣāya hantave | vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam āheyam arasaṃ viṣaṃ nirviṣam || navānāṃ navatīnāṃ viṣasya ropuṣīṇām | sarvāsām agrabhaṃ nāma vītāpetārasaṃ viṣam ||
mṛtyur eko yama ekaḥ śarva ekaḥ śarur bhavaḥ | te naḥ kṛṇvantu bheṣajaṃ devasenābhyas pari || punar no yamaḥ pitṛbhir dadātu punar mitrāvaruṇā vāto agniḥ | aghamāro aghaśaṃsaḥ punar dāt punar no devī nirṛtir dadātu || yā devaiḥ prahiteṣuḥ patāt tapase vā mahase vāvasṛṣṭā | somas tvām asmad yāvayatu vidvān pitaro vā devahutā nṛcakṣasaḥ || sahasrākṣo amartyaḥ pururūpa ihāvatu | sakhye ta ugra mā riṣaṃ sahaguḥ sahapūruṣaḥ || yas te manyuḥ sahasrākṣa viṣeṇa pariṣicyate | tena tvam asmabhyaṃ mṛḍa śivo naḥ śambhur ā cara || mā te mayau sahasrākṣa bhāme bhūn māmakaṃ jagat | yo no dveṣṭi taṃ gaccha yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ jahi ||
anuvāka 2 ||
ye sthāsyāṃ prācyāṃ diśi hetayo nāma devās teṣāṃ vo agnir iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā || ye sthāsyāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy aviṣyavo nāma devās teṣaṃ va āpa iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā || ye sthāsyāṃ pratīcyāṃ diśi virājo nāma devās teṣaṃ vaḥ kāma iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā || ye sthāsyām udīcyāṃ diśi pravidhyanto nāma devās teṣaṃ vo vāta iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā || ye sthāsyāṃ dhruvāyāṃ diśi vilimpā nāma devās teṣaṃ vo 'nnam iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā || ye sthāsyām ūrdhvāyāṃ diśy aviṣyanto nāma devās teṣaṃ vo varṣam iṣavaḥ | te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ||
yo apsv antar yo vṛtre antar yaḥ puruṣe yo aśmani | ya āviveśauṣadhīr yo vanaspatīṃs tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat || yaḥ some antar ya u goṣv antar ya āviṣṭo vayasi yo mṛgeṣu | ya āviveśa dvipado yaś catuṣpadas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat || ya indreṇa sarathaṃ saṃbabhūva vaiśvānara uta viśvadāvyaḥ | yaṃ johavīmi pṛtanāsuṣāsahiṃ tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat || yo devo viśvād yam u kāmam āhur yaṃ dātāraṃ pratigṛhṇantam āhuḥ | yo dhīraḥ śakraḥ paribhūr adābhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat || yaṃ tvā hotāraṃ manasābhisaṃvidus trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ | varcodhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat || ukṣānnāya vaśānnāya somapṛṣṭhāya vedhase | vaiśvānarasya jyeṣṭhebhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat || divaṃ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ye vidyutam anusaṃcaranti | ye dikṣv antar ya u vāte antas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat || bṛhaspatiṃ varuṇaṃ mitram agniṃ hiraṇyapāṇiṃ savitāram indram | viśvān devān aṅgiraso havāmaha Bhatt. -mahe with underlining imaṃ kravyādaṃ śamayantv agnim || śānto agniḥ kravyād atho puruṣareṣaṇaḥ | atho yo viśvadāvyas taṃ kravyādam aśīśamam ||
āyam agan parṇamaṇir balī balena pramṛṇan sapatnān | ojo devānāṃ paya oṣadhīnāṃ mayi rāṣṭraṃ jinvatv aprayucchan || mayi rāṣṭraṃ parṇamaṇe mayi dhārayā śriyam | ahaṃ rāṣṭrasyābhīvarge yujā bhūyāsam uttaraḥ || yaṃ nidadhur vanaspatau vājaṃ devāḥ priyaṃ nidhim | taṃ ma indraḥ sahāyuṣā maṇiṃ dadhātu bhartave || somasya parṇaḥ saha ugram āgann indreṇa datto varuṇena sakhyā | tam ahaṃ bibharmi bahu rocamāno dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya || ā mā rukṣat parṇamaṇir mahyā ariṣṭatātaye | yathāham uttaro 'sāni mānuṣyā adhi sampadaḥ || punar maitv indriyaṃ punar ātmā draviṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ca | punar agnayo dhiṣṇyāso yathāsthāma kalpayantām ihaiva || ye takṣāṇo rathakārāḥ karmārā ye manīṣiṇaḥ | sarvāṃs tān parṇa randhaya- -upastiṃ kṛṇu me janam || upastir astu vaiśya uta śūdra utāryaḥ | sarvāṃs tān parṇa randhaya- -upastiṃ kṛṇu me janam ||
yena vehad babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tad vayam | idaṃ tad anyatra tvad apa dūre ni dadhmasi || ā te garbho yonim etu pumān vāṇa iveṣudhim | ā vīro 'tra jāyatāṃ putras te daśamāsyaḥ || pumāṃsaṃ putraṃ janaya taṃ pumān anu jāyatām | bhavāsi putrāṇāṃ mātā jātānāṃ janayāsi ca || yāni bhadrāṇi bījāny ṛṣabhā janayanti | tais tvaṃ putraṃ vindasva sā prasūr dhenukā bhava || kṛṇomi te prajāpatyam ā garbho yonim etu te | vindasva putraṃ nāri yas tubhyaṃ śam asac cham u tasmai tvaṃ bhava || Bhatt. bhavā yāsāṃ pitā parjanyo bhūmir mātā babhūva | tās tvā putravidyāya devīḥ prāvantv oṣadhīḥ || yas te yonim udiṅgayād ṛṣabho retasā saha | sa ta ā siñcatu prajāṃ dīrghāyuṃ śataśāradām ||
yāṃ tvā vātovarayad ārdranābhā maharṣabhaḥ | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare || yāṃ tvā varāho akhanad ekasminn adhi puṣkare | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare || yāṃ tvāditir avapad bījavāpam adhi puṣkare | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare || yasyāḥ kulāyaṃ salile antar mahaty arṇave | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare || ut te bhara uttamāyā adhamāyās ta ud bhare | un madhyamān madhyame tad viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare || agrabhaṃ sam agrabham ubhāvantau sam agrabham | divaś ca pṛthivyāś ca viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare ||
anuvāka 3 ||
paidvo 'si pṛtanāyuḥ svāhā || somam ahiṃsīḥ somahiṃsito 'si svāhā || brāhmaṇam ahiṃsīr brahmahiṃsito 'si svāhā || nābhūd ahir bhrūṇam ārad ahir adrim arasāvadhīt | viṣasya brahmaṇāmāsīt tato jīvan na mokṣase || mokṣyase uṣṭo 'hiḥ samuṣṭo *'hir Bhatt. samuṣṭo hi nirdhīto arasaḥ kṛtaḥ | viṣasya brahmaṇāmāsīt tato jīvan na mokṣase || punar dadāmi te viṣaṃ pūrvapadyam id āritha | māṃ dadaśvān manyase mayā daṣṭo na mokṣase ||
ekaśataṃ bheṣajāni teṣāṃ mātāsy oṣadhe | samudram ava gacchasi pṛthivyām adhi niṣṭhitā || tasyāṃ vedādhi bheṣajaṃ daśaśīrṣo daśajihvaḥ | yas te prathama ādade śaṃ śvāvanta oṣadhe yam adād vīrayug bhiṣak || punaś cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇaḥ punar āyur na āgamat | niṣ ṭvākaraṃ niṣkṛtyā niṣ ṭvā niṣkṛtyākaram || muñcāmi tvā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta | atho yamasya paḍvīśād viśvasmād devakilbiṣāt || saṃ te śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni hṛdayasya ca yo viduḥ | udyan sūrya ādityo aṅgadyotam anīnaśat || himavataḥ pra sravatha sindhau samaha saṅgamaḥ | tā āpaḥ sarvāḥ saṅgatya cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ ca dhatta naḥ ||
hastivarcasaṃ prathatāṃ bṛhad yaśo adityā yat tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva | tat sarve savitur mahyam etad viśve devāso aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ || mitraś ca varuṇaś ca- -indro rudraś ca vedhatu | devāso viśvadhāyasas tena māñjantu varcasā || yat te varco jātavedo bṛhad bhavaty āhute | tena mām adya varcasā agne varcasvinaṃ kṛdhi || yena hastī varcasā saṃbabhūva yena rājā manuṣyeṣv antaḥ | yena devā jyotiṣā dyām udāyan tena māgne varcasā saṃ sṛjeha || yāvad varcaḥ sūryasya- -asurasya ca hastinaḥ | tāvan me aśvinā varcaḥ kṛṇutaṃ puṣkarasrajā || yāvac catasraḥ pradiśaś cakṣur yāvat samaśnute | tāvat sam aitv indriyaṃ mayi tad dhastivarcasam ||
saṃśitaṃ ma idaṃ brahma saṃśitaṃ vīryaṃ mama | saṃśitaṃ kṣatraṃ me jiṣṇu yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ || sam aham eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ śyāmi sam ojo vīryaṃ balam | vṛścāmi śatrūṇāṃ bāhū saṃ śyāmi svān aham || tekṣṇīyāṃsaḥ parśor agnes tīkṣṇatarā uta | indrasya vajrāt tekṣṇiyāṃso yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ || adhas padyantām adhare bhavantu ye na indraṃ maghavānaṃ pṛtanyān | kṣaṇāmi brahmaṇāmitrān un nayāmi svān aham || eṣām aham āyudhā saṃ śyāmy eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ suvīraṃ vardhayāmi | eṣāṃ kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇu- -ugram eṣāṃ cittaṃ viśve vantu devāḥ || abhi preta jayata prasūtāḥ saṃ vaḥ śyāmi nara āyudhāni | tīkṣṇeṣavo baladhanvano hata- -ugrāyudhā abalān ugrabāhavaḥ ||
ihaiva dhruvāṃ ni minomi śālāṃ kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam ukṣamāṇā | tāṃ tvā śāle sarvavīrāḥ suvīrā ariṣṭavīrā abhi saṃ carema || ihaiva dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle aśvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī | ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī payasvaty uc chrayasva mahate saubhagāya || dharuṇy asi śāle bṛhacchandāḥ pūtidhānyā | ā tvā vatso mīmayad ā kumāra ā dhenavaḥ sāyam ā syandamānāḥ || imāṃ śālāṃ savitā vāyur agnis tvaṣṭā hotā ni minotu prajānan | ukṣantūdhnā maruto ghṛtena bhago no rājā ni kṛṣiṃ tanotu || mānasya patnī śaraṇā syonā devī devebhir nimitāsy agre | tṛṇaṃ vasānā sumanā asas tvaṃ rayiṃ no dhehi subhage suvīram || ā tvā kumāras taruṇa ā vatso jagatā saha | ā tvā pariśrutaḥ kumbha ā dadhnaḥ kalaśy ayat ||
anuvāka 4 ||
imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyaṃ ma imaṃ viśām ekavṛṣaṃ kṛṇu tvam | nir amitrān akṣṇuhy asya sarvāṃs tān randhayāsmā ahamuttareṣu || ayam astu dhanapatir dhanānām ayaṃ viśāṃ viśpatir astu rājā | asminn indra mahi varcāṃsi dhehy Bhatt. Inda (misprint) avarcasaṃ kṛṇuhi śatrum asya || emaṃ bhaja grāme aśveṣu goṣu niṣṭaṃ bhaja yo 'mitro asya | varṣmat kṣatrāṇām ayam astu rājā- -indra śatrūṃ randhaya sarvam asmai || asmai dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri vāmaṃ saṃ duhātāṃ gharmadughe iva dhenum | ayaṃ rājā priya indrasya bhūyāt priyo gavām oṣadhīnām utāpām || yunajmi ta uttarāvantam indraṃ yena jayanti na parājayante | yas tvā karad ekavṛṣaṃ janānām uta rājann uttamaṃ mānavānām || uttaras tvam adhare santv anye ye ke ca rājan pratiśatravas te | ekavṛṣa indrasakhā jigīvāṃ chatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi ||
viṣāṇāsyāṅgirasī devajāḥ praticakṣaṇī | divas pṛthivyāḥ saṃbhūtā sahasrākṣīhaidhi naḥ || sahasrākṣī yā tu gṛbhā- -ati paśyāsy oṣadhe | sadānvāghnī rakṣoghnī bhaveha praticakṣaṇī || ye haranty āsuteyaṃ payasphātiṃ cauṣadhe | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo gṛbhāya kṛtavīrye || ya āturaṃ randhayante 'rṣmantaṃ ca vihṛtam | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo gṛbhāya kṛtavīrye || yathāśvā caturakṣo rātriṃ naktātipaśyati | evā sahasracakṣo tvaṃ prati paśyāsy āyataḥ || gobhir aśvair vasubhir apakrītāsy oṣadhe | śyāvasyāśvasya cakṣuṣā prati paśya kimīdinaḥ ||
saṃ sacadhvaṃ saṃ pibadhvam annaṃ vo madhumat saha | vrataṃ vaḥ sarvaṃ sadhryak samānaṃ ceto astu vaḥ || saṃ jānīdhvam indraś cettā vo 'stv ayaṃ vo 'gnir ni haraḥ śamayāti | yad vairahatyam uta bhīmam āsīd viśve devā apa tat plāvayantu || śaṃ vaḥ syāstu bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | śam antarikṣam uta vo marutvān śaṃ vaḥ syāstv aditir devaputrā || kalpetāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī kalpantām āpa oṣadhīḥ | kalpantām agnayaḥ sarve 'smai śraiṣṭhāya savratāḥ || saṃ vaḥ sṛjāmi hṛdayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ mano astu vaḥ | saṃsṛṣṭā vas tanvaḥ santu saṃsṛṣṭaḥ prāṇo astu vaḥ || saṃ vaḥ paśūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ sṛjāmi saṃ putrāṇām uta yā duhitaro vaḥ | saṃ vo jāyānāṃ manasā manāṃsi saṃ patīnām uta cakṣuḥ sṛjāmi ||
prācī dig agnir adhipatir asito rakṣitādityā iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu || dakṣiṇā dig indro 'dhipatis tiraścirājī rakṣitā vasava iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu || pratīcī dig varuṇo 'dhipatiḥ pṛdākū rakṣitā mitra iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu || udīcī dik somo 'dhipatiḥ svajo rakṣitā vāta iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu || dhruvā dig viṣṇur adhipatiḥ kalmāṣagrīvo rakṣitā vīrudha iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu || ūrdhvā dig bṛhaspatir adhipatiś citro rakṣitāśanir iṣavaḥ | tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo namo vo 'stu | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmas tam u prāṇo jahātu ||
anaḍvān dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utāmūm anaḍvān dādhārorv antarikṣam | anaḍvān dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīr anaḍvān idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā viveśa || anaḍvān duhe sukṛtasya loka ainaṃ pyāyeta pavamānaḥ purastāt | parjanyo dhārā maruta ūdho asya yajñaḥ payo dakṣiṇā doho asya || anaḍvān indraḥ sa paśubhyo vi caṣṭe trayāṃ chakropa mimīte adhvanaḥ | sa bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad bhuvanaṃ duhānaḥ sarvā devānāṃ bibhrac carati vratāni || yasya neśe yajñapatir na yajño nāsya dāteśe na pratigrahītā | yo viśvabhṛd viśvakarmā gharmaṃ no brūta yatamaś catuṣpāt || indra eṣa manuṣyeṣv antar gharmas taptaś carati śośucānaḥ | suprajā asat sa udāre na sarṣad yo nāśnīyād anaḍuho vijānan || yena devāḥ svar āruruhur hitvā śarīram amṛtasya dhāma | tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ gharmasya vratena yaśasā tapasyayā || dvādaśaitā rātrīr vratyā āhuḥ prajāpateḥ | tatrāpi brahmaṇo vrataṃ tatrāpy anaḍuho balam || yās ta āhuḥ prajāpater vratyā rātrīr dvādaśa | tatrāpi brahma yo veda tad vā anaḍuho balam || duhe vā anaḍvān sāyaṃ duhe prātar duhe divā | dohā ye asya saṃyanti tān vidmānupadasvataḥ || yo vedānaḍuho dohān saptān upadasvataḥ | prajāṃ ca lokaṃ cāpnoti tathā sapta rṣayo viduḥ || madhyam etad anaḍuho yatraiṣa vaha āhitaḥ | etāvad asya prācīnaṃ yāvān pratyaṅ samāhitaḥ || padbhiḥ sedim avakrāmann irāṃ jaṅghābhir utkhidan | śrameṇānaḍvān kīlālaṃ kīnāśaś cābhi gacchataḥ || indra eṣa manuṣyeṣv anaḍvān ity ucyate | śaphāso asya mā riṣan sarvā yāś cāsya kuṣṭhikāḥ || indro balenāsi parameṣṭhī vratena yena gaus tena vaiśvadevaḥ | yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇān saṃ bṛhat tasya prāṇān vi vṛha ||
anuvāka 5 ||
gṛhān aimi manasā modamāna ūrjaṃ bibhrad vasumaniḥ sumedhāḥ | aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa gṛhāṇāṃ paśyan paya ut tarāmi || ime gṛhā mayobhuva ūrjasvantaḥ payasvantaḥ | pūrṇā vāmasya tiṣṭhantas te no jānantu jānataḥ || sūnṛtāvantaḥ subhagā irāvanto hasāmudāḥ | akṣudhyā atṛṣyāso gṛhā māsmad bibhītana || yeṣām adhyeti pravasan yeṣu saumanaso bahuḥ | gṛhān upa hvayāmahe te no jānantv āyataḥ || upahūtā iva gāva upahūtā ajāvayaḥ | atho annasya kīlāla upahūto gṛheṣu naḥ || upahūtā bhūridhanāḥ sakhāyaḥ svādusaṃmudaḥ | ariṣṭāḥ sarvapūruṣā gṛhā naḥ santu sarvadā ||
hantāyam astv apratighātyaḥ sāsahvām̐ indraḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭhiḥ | prajāpatir adadhād ojo asmai bṛhad dhavir haviṣā vardhanena || prajāpate haviṣā vardhanena hantāram indram akṛṇor aghātyam | tasmai viśo devakṛtā namanta sa hi hantā sa hi havyo babhūva || prajāpate abhi no neṣa vasya urvīṃ gavyūtim abhimātiṣāhaḥ | urvīṃ with ms. Vā; Bhatt. ūrvīṃ vardhayann indraṃ bṛhate raṇāya devaṃ devena haviṣā vardhanena || yathā viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ saṃjayāsi yathā śatrūn sahamānaḥ sahāsai | yathāsaḥ samrāṭ susamrāḍ evā tvendro 'prativadhaṃ kṛṇotu || ayaṃ vīro 'prati hantu śatrūn viśve devā apa sadas karātha | māsya prajāṃ rīriṣan mota vīrān imam indro 'prativadhaṃ kṛṇotu || jahi śatrūn prati randhayasva- read 'prati? -agniṣ ṭe gopā adhipā vasiṣṭhaḥ | śarma te rājā varuṇo ni yacchād evā tvendro 'prativadhaṃ kṛṇotu ||
saṃ spṛśethāṃ tanūbhyāṃ saṃ mukhābhyāṃ sam ātmanā | saṃ vāṃ brahmaṇaspatiḥ somaḥ saṃ sparśayāti vām || abhy asya nāma vācā dadhāmi nāha mokṣyate | mamed ahainaṃ kāme labhai kṛṣṇam ivākhare || yaḥ premā preṇyām āsīd dattaḥ somena babhruṇā | tasmād adhi śrutaṃ mama mayy asya mana āhitam || yaṃ pumāṃsaṃ kāmayase yasmin vā bhagam icchase | hṛcchokam asminn ā dadhmo yathā śuṣyāti tvām anu || yathāsya hṛdayaṃ śuṣyād apicchinneva śaṃguṇī | cakṣur ākāśyaṃ bhīmaṃ Bhatt. ākāsyaṃ māṃpaśyam abhirorudam || priyaṃkaraṇam uttamaṃ madhughena tad ābhṛtam | tvaṃ hāsi varcasyo 'tho hāsi sumaṅgalaḥ | atho sarvāsāṃ vīrudhāṃ priyaṅkaraṇam ucyase ||
pratīcī somam asy oṣadhe pratīcy uta sūryam | pratīcī viśvān devāṃs tathā tvācchā vadāmasi || imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ nitatnīm anutantamām | āyataḥ pratinandanīṃ parāyato nivartanīm || amuṣyāhaṃ parāyata āyato mano agrabham | agrabhaṃ hastyaṃ mano 'tho hṛdayyaṃ manaḥ || mayi te mana āhitaṃ mayi cittaṃ mayi vratam | mamed api kratāv aso mama citte sacāvahai || ahaṃ vadāni mā tvaṃ sabhāyāṃ gha tvaṃ vada | mamed asas tvaṃ kevalo nānyāsāṃ kīrtayāś cana || yadi vāsi tiro janaṃ yadi vā nadyas tiraḥ | iyaṃ tvā mahyam oṣadhir baddhveva ny ānayāt ||
yathā kalām ity ekā || saṃ rājāno 'guḥ sam ṛṇāny aguḥ saṃ kuṣṭhā aguḥ saṃ kulā aguḥ | sam asmāsu suṣvapnyaṃ nir dviṣate duṣvapnyaṃ suvāmaḥ || Bhatt. duḥṣvapnyaṃ devānāṃ patnīnāṃ garbha yamasya karaṇaḥ | yo bhadraḥ svapnaḥ sa mama yaḥ pāpas taṃ dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ || tṛṣṇāmā nāmāsi kṛṣṇaśakuner mukhaṃ nirṛter mukham | taṃ tvā svapna tathā vidma || sa tvaṃ svapnāśva ivākāyam aśva iva nīnāham | anāsmākaṃ devapīyuṃ piyāruṃ vapsaḥ || yad asmāsu duṣvapnyaṃ Bhatt. duḥṣvapnyaṃ yad goṣu yac ca no gṛhe | anāsmākas tad devapīyuḥ piyāruṃ niṣkam iva prati muñcatām || navāratnīn avamāya- -asmākaṃ tanvas pari | duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ Bhatt. duḥṣvapnyaṃ dviṣate nir diśāmasi ||
anuvāka 6 ||
devā marutaḥ pṛśnimātaro 'po dattodadhiṃ bhinta | divas pṛthivyā uror antarikṣād asmai kṣatrāyānena brahmaṇābhyaḥ prajābhya ābhya oṣadhībhyaḥ svāhā || devā agna indra sūrya- -apaḥ (…) || see 1bcde devāḥ sayujo mitra varuṇāryamann apaḥ (…) || see 1bcde devāḥ pitaro 'vamā āyavaḥ krāvya- read krāvyāpaḥ with K; Bhatt. krāvya apo -apaḥ (…) || see 1bcde devāpsuṣado 'pāṃ napāt tanūnapān narāśaṃsa- -apo dattodadhiṃ bhinta | (…) || see 1cde deva bṛhaspate 'po dhehy udadhiṃ bhindhi | (…) || see 1cde deva prajāpate 'po dhehy udadhiṃ bhindhi | (…) || see 1cde deva parameṣṭhinn apo dhehy udadhiṃ bhindhi | divas pṛthivyā uror antarikṣād asmai kṣatrāyānena brahmaṇābhyaḥ prajābhya ābhya oṣadhībhyaḥ svāhā ||
prajāpater jāyamānāḥ prajā jātāś ca yā imāḥ | tā asmai prati vedaya cikitvām̐ anu manyatām || yeṣām īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnāṃ catuṣpadām uta vā ye dvipādaḥ | niṣkrītās te yajñiyā yanti lokaṃ rāyaspoṣāya yajamānaṃ sacantām || pramuñcanto bhuvanasya gopā gātuṃ devā yajamānāya dhatta | upākṛtaṃ śaśamānaṃ yad asthāt priyaṃ devānām apy etu pāthaḥ || ye badhyamānam anu dīdhyānā Bhatt. dīdhyānāṃ anvaikṣanta manasā cakṣuṣā ca | agniṣ ṭān agre pra mumukta devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃvidānaḥ || yeṣāṃ prāṇā anvabadhnanta badvaṃ gavāṃ paśūnām uta pūruṣāṇām | indras tān agre pra mumukta devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃvidānaḥ || ya āraṇyāḥ paśavo viśvarūpā ye viśvarūpā utaikarūpāḥ | vāyuṣ ṭān agre pra mumukta devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃvidānaḥ || prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu devāḥ prāṇam aṅgebhyas paryācarantam | dyāṃ gaccha prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ svargaṃ yāhi pathibhiḥ śivebhiḥ ||
samās tvāgna ṛtavo vardhayantu saṃvatsara ṛṣayo yāni satyā | saṃ dyumnena dīdihi rocanena viśvā ā bhāhi pradiśaś catasraḥ || saṃ cedhyasvāgne pra ca bodhayainam uc ca tiṣṭha mahate saubhagāya | mā te riṣann upasattāro atra brāhmaṇās te yaśasaḥ santu mānye || tvām agne vṛṇate brāhmaṇā ime śivo agne prataraṇo na edhi | sapatnahāgne abhimātijid bhava sve kṣaye dīdihy aprayucchan || ihaivāgne adhi dhārayā rayiṃ mā tvā dabhan pūrvacittā nikāriṇaḥ | kṣatram agne suyamam astu tubhyam upasattā vardhatāṃ te aniṣṭṛtaḥ || kṣatreṇāgne svena saṃ rabhasva mitreṇāgne mitradheyaṃ yatasva | sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭheyam asyā rājñām agne vihavyo dīdihīha || ati niho 'ti nirṛtīr aty arātīr ati dviṣaḥ | viśvā hy agne duritā tara tvam athāsmabhyaṃ sahavīraṃ rayiṃ dāḥ || anādhṛṣyo jātavedā aniṣṭṛto virāḍ agne kṣatrabhir dīdihīha | vyamīvāḥ pramuñcan mānuṣebhyaḥ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no gayaiḥ ||
ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ | taṃ jānann agna ā roha- -athā no vardhayā rayim || pradātāraṃ havāmahe agnim ugram ūtaye | śucir yo vṛtrahantamaḥ || agne acchā vadeha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ sumanā bhava | pra ṇo yaccha viśāṃ pate dhanadā asi nas tvam || pra ṇo yacchatv aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ | pra pūṣā prota sūnṛtā rayiṃ devī dadhātu naḥ || aryamaṇaṃ bṛhaspatim indraṃ dānāya codaya | vātaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam || somaṃ rājānam avase 'gniṃ gīrbhir havāmahe | ādityaṃ viṣṇuṃ sūryaṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim || indravāyū bṛhaspatiḥ suhaveha havāmahe | yathā naḥ sarvam ij jagat saṅgatyāṃ sumanā asat || tvaṃ no agne agnibhir brahma yajñaṃ ca vardhaya | tvaṃ no deva dātave rayiṃ dānāya codaya || vājasyedaṃ prasave saṃbabhūva memā ca viśvā bhuvanāny antaḥ | utāditsantaṃ dāpayati prajānan rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchāt || duhrāṃ me pañca pradiśo duhrām urvīr yathābalam | prāpeyaṃ sarvām ākūtiṃ manasā hṛdayena ca || gosaniṃ vācam udeyaṃ varcasā mābhy ūrṇuhi | ā rundhāṃ sarvato vāyus tvaṣṭā poṣāya dhriyatām ||
yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi | maghavañ chagdhi tava tvaṃ na ūtibhir vi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi || indraṃ vayam anūrādhaṃ havāmahe 'nu rādhyāsma dvipadā catuṣpadā | mā naḥ senā araruṣīr upa gur viṣūcīr indra druho vi nāśaya || indras trātota vṛtrahā paraspā no vareṇyaḥ | sa rakṣitā caramataḥ sa madhyataḥ sa paścāt sa purastān no astu || uruṃ no lokam anu neṣi vidvān svaryaj jyotir abhayaṃ svasti | ugrā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa kṣiyema śaraṇā bṛhantā || abhayaṃ naḥ karaty antarikṣam abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | abhayaṃ paścād abhayaṃ purastād uttarād adharād abhayaṃ no astu || abhayaṃ mitrād abhayam amitrād abhayaṃ jñātād abhayaṃ puro naḥ | abhayaṃ naktam abhayaṃ divā naḥ sarvā āśā mama mitraṃ bhavantu ||
anuvāka 7 ||
jaya prehi māpa krāmaḥ śatrūṇāṃ veda ā khida | indraḥ sapatnahā bhīmaḥ sañjayas te sam ānṛdhat || tvaṃ jayāsi na parā jayāsā arbheṣv ājau maghavan mahatsu ca | ugraṃ cit tvām avase saṃ śiśīmahe sa tvaṃ na indra havaneṣu mṛḍa || gojitā bāhū asamakratū yudhi karmankarmañ chatamūtī svajaṅkarā | akalpa indro 'pratimānam ojaḥ sa tvaṃ na indra havaneṣu mṛḍa || vedāham aindraṃ priyam asya śevadhiṃ yad asya nāma guhyaṃ samīke | sa ij jayāti maghavā mamāsaty asmākaṃ yudhmo vihave havaṃ gamat || vayaṃ jayema tvāyujā bhṛto asmākam aṃśam ud avā bharebhare | asmabhyam indra varivaḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi pra śatrūṇāṃ maghavan vṛṣṇiyā ruja || tvāṃ deveṣu prathamaṃ havāmahe tvaṃ babhūvitha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ | semaṃ naḥ kārum upamanyum udbhidam indra karāsi prasave rathaṃ puraḥ ||
smara smaro 'si devair datto 'si smara | amuṣya mana ā smara yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā || śocayāsya hṛdayaṃ kāma gaccha- -aṅgajvaro dahatu śocatu tmanā | saṅkalpā asya samarantādhībhir iyam evāsya digamahanyanyāḥ || nirānandāḥ pramucchado manomuho nayuvo naṣṭakṛtvā araṇyavaḥ | āveśinīḥ pradrupo ropayiṣṇur eta āstādhyaḥ pra hiṇomi brahmaṇā || hṛtkartanī ṛtudā grāmānnāśanīḥ svapnacchida ughnanīghnā manomuhaḥ | āveśinīḥ pradrupo ropayiṣṇur eta āstādhyaḥ pra hiṇomi brahmaṇā || indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇā te adya- -ubhe ca dyāvāpṛthivī mātariśvā | aśvinā devaḥ savitā bhagaś ca manas ta u ghnantu na ramāsā atra || trayastriṃśat tvā uta ghnantu devā ādhyaś cittam upa te bharantām | bharadvājasya matayas ta īśatāṃ chinneva naur bandhanāt pra plavasva || etāḥ patanty ādhyo vārṣikīr iva vidyutaḥ | tāsāṃ pratigraho bhava sāyaṃ goṣṭhe gavām iva || ni śīrṣato ni pātita ādhyo veśayāmi te | tās tvā samuttudantīr bodhayantīr upāsatām || etās ta ādhyaḥ pra hiṇomi brahmaṇā tṛprā aśrīpurogavāḥ | tās tvā tṛṇam iva śoṣayān atho tvā rodayān bahu ||
ajo hy agner ajaniṣṭa śokāt so 'paśyaj janitāram agre | tena devā devatām agra āyan tena rohān arohann upa medhīyāṃsaḥ || kramadhvam agnibhir nākam ukhyāṃ hasteṣu bibhrataḥ | divas pṛṣṭhaṃ svar gatvā miśrā devebhir ādhvam || agne prehi prathamo devayatāṃ cakṣur devānām uta martyānām | iyakṣamāṇā bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣasaḥ svar yantu yajamānāḥ svasti || svar yanto nāpekṣanta ā dyāṃ rohantu rādhasaḥ | yajñaṃ ye viśvatodhāraṃ suvidvāṃso vi tenire || odanam anajmi śavasā ghṛtena divyaṃ samudraṃ payasaṃ bṛhantam | tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ saroruhāṇā adhi nākam uttamam || read svar ruhāṇā yau te pakṣāv ajarau patatriṇau yābhyāṃ rakṣāṃsy apahaṃsy odana | tābhyāṃ patyāsma sukṛtasya lokaṃ yatra rṣayaḥ prathamajāḥ purāṇāḥ || yatas tiṣṭho divas pṛṣṭhe vyomann adhy odana | anvāyan satyadharmāṇo brāhmaṇā rādhasā saha || pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyā aham antarikṣam āruham antarikṣād divam āruham | divo nākasya pṛṣṭhāt svar jyotir agām aham || ajo 'sy aja svargo 'si tvayā lokam aṅgirasaḥ pra jānan | taṃ lokam anu pra jñeṣma || yenā sahasraṃ vahasi yena vā sarvavedasam | tenemaṃ yajñaṃ no vaha svar deveṣu gantave || ajaṃ ca pacata pañca caudanān | ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ paktvā devā lokān sam ānaśuḥ ||
yā te prajāpihitā purābhūd dhruveṇāśvināpa taṃ bharāmi | agniṣ ṭe tāmādyamaḥ punar dād vaiśvānaraḥ paramasmād vyomnaḥ || tvaṃ patiḥ śivo 'gne dvitīyo *'syai prajāṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ sṛjasva | muñcaināṃ grāhyā nirṛtir yad bandha- -agne prajāṃ prajākāmāyai dhehi || tvām agne vṛṣabhaṃ vāśiteyam ācyā jānu putrakāmā saparyati | tām ā roha sumanasyamānaḥ prajāpateḥ prajayā saṃ sṛjainām || tubhyaṃ nārī putrakāmeyam agne śuddhaṃ pūtaṃ ghṛtam ā juhoti | tām adhi skanda vīrayasva retodhā ugraḥ prajayā saṃ sṛjainam || parvatād divo yoner gātrādgātrāt samāśṛtam | reto devasyadevasya tsarau parṇam ivādhām || tsaru Mehendale, Henning Mem. Vol. indrasya jātasya pra papāta nābhis tām eko devaḥ prati jagrāha kāmī | tvayā vayaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somapāḥ sūpayāma uta yā na sūte ||
tejanāt tyajanaṃ jātaṃ tejanaṃ jāyate śarāt | na yeṣati na śocati yas tvā bibharti tejana || parutnam asi tejana parutnaṃ te prabhañjanam | parutno astu sa kāmo yenāmūṃ kāmayāmahe || Bhatt. yenāmūn yāvad oṣaḥ śaro astvo janebhyaḥ kṛṇavad bhayam | tāvad oṣas tvaṃ tejana tyajanaṃ bhavatād iha || tyajanaṃ ma āpo dadhan tyajanaṃ maruto dadhan | tyajanaṃ me viśve devās tyajanaṃ pitaro dadhan || tenāham anyeṣāṃ striyo atyākṣaṃ vidviṣaḥ purā | purā dviṣo atyākṣaṃ purā madhyandinād uta | purā sāyatvād atyākṣaṃ tejane hi mahad balam || asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat | asthād avahṛdevāt tiṣṭhāt kāmo ayaṃ tava ||
anuvāka 8 ||
Kāṇḍa 4
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt | sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utāmuṃ tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema || ya ojodā baladā yaś ca viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ | yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyus tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema || yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato vidhartā patir viśvasya jagato babhūva | ya īśe 'sya dvipado yaś catuṣpadas tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema || yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ | Bhatt. svaḥ yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyas tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema || ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī tastabhāna- -adhārayad avasā rejamāne | yasminn adhi vitata eti sūryas tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema || yasya viśve himavanto mahitvā samudraṃ yasya rasayā sahāhuḥ | diśo yasya pradiśaḥ pañca devīs tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema || āpo ha yasya viśvam āyur dadhānā garbhaṃ janayanta mātaraḥ | tatra devānām adhi deva āsta ekasthūṇe vimite dṛḍha ugre || āpo garbhaṃ janayantīr vatsam agre sam airayan | tasyota jāyamānasya- -ulba āsīd dhiraṇyayaḥ || hiraṇya ulba āsīd yo 'gre vatso ajāyata | taṃ yonyor vidravantyoḥ pary apaśyad ditir mahī ||
bhūto bhūteṣu paya ā dadhāti sa bhūtānām adhipatir babhūva | sa te mṛtyuś carati rājasūyaṃ sa rājā rājyam anu manyatām idam || abhi prehi vīrayasva- -ugraś cettā sapatnahā | ā tiṣṭha mitravardhana tubhyaṃ devā adhi bruvan || ātiṣṭhantaṃ pari viśve abhūṣañ chriyaṃ vasānaś carati svarociḥ | mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāma- -ā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau || enā vyāghraṃ pariṣasvajānāḥ siṃhaṃ hinvanti mahate saubhagāya | mahiṣaṃ na subhuvas tasthivāṃsaṃ marmṛjyante dvīpinam apsv antaḥ || vyāghro adhi vaiyāghre vi kramasva diśo mahīḥ | viśas tvā sarvā ā yantv āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ || yā āpo divyāḥ payasā madanti yā antarikṣa uta pārthivā yāḥ | tāsāṃ tvā sarvāsām apām abhi ṣiñcāmi varcasā || abhi tvā varcasāsicaṃ divyena payasā saha | yathāso mitravardhanas tathā tvā savitā karat ||
yat te candraṃ kaśyapa rocanāvad yat saṃhitaṃ puṣkalaṃ citrabhānu | yasmin sūryā ārpitāḥ sapta sākaṃ tasmin rājānam adhi vi śrayemam || yebhiḥ śilpaiḥ paprathānām adṛṃho yebhir divam abhyapiṃśaḥ pravidvān | yebhir vācaṃ puṣkalair avyayas tena māgne varcasā saṃ sṛjeha || yebhiḥ sūrya ātapati pra ketubhir yebhir agnir dadṛśe citrabhānuḥ | yebhir āpaś candravarṇā ajinvan tena māgne varcasā saṃ sṛjeha || āyaṃ bhātu pradiśaḥ pañca devīr indra iva jyeṣṭho bhavatu prajānām | asmin dhehi puṣkalaṃ citrabhānv ayaṃ pṛṇātu rajasor upastham || anu tvendro 'vatv anu bṛhaspatir anu tvā somo anv agnir āvīt | anu tvā viśve avantu devāḥ sapta rājāno ya udābhiṣiktāḥ || anu tvā mitrāvaruṇehāvatām anu dyāvāpṛthivī oṣadhībhiḥ | sūryo 'hobhir anu tvāvatu candramā nakṣatrair anu tvedam āvīt || dyauś ca tvā pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukro bṛhan dakṣiṇā tvā pipartu | anu svadhā cikitāṃ somo agniḥ pūṣā tvāvatu savitā savena ||
stuvānam agna ā naya yātudhānaṃ kimīdinam | tvaṃ hi devāntito hantā dasyor babhūvitha || ājyasya parameṣṭhiñ jātavedas tanūvaśin | agne taulasya prāśāna Bhatt. prāśān yātudhānān vi lāpaya || vi lapantu yātudhānā atriṇo ye kimīdinaḥ | athedam agne no havir indraś ca prati haryatam || agniḥ purastād ā yacchatu prendro nudatu bāhumān | bravītu sarvo yātumān ayam asmīty etya || paśyāmi te vīryā jātavedaḥ pra ṇo brūhi yātudhānān nṛcakṣaḥ | tvayā sarve paritaptāḥ purastād ā yantu prabruvāṇā upedam || ā rabhasva jātavedo hṛdaḥ kāmāya randhaya | dūto no agna ut tiṣṭha Bhatt. agnir yātudhānān ihā naya || tvam agne yātudhānān upabaddhān ihā naya | athaiṣām indro vajreṇa- -api śīrṣāṇi vṛścatu || idaṃ havir yātudhānān nadī phenam ivā vahāt | yadīdaṃ strī pumān akar iha sa stuvatāṃ janaḥ || yātudhānasya somapa jahi prajāṃ nayasva ca | ni ṣṭuvānasya pātaya param akṣy utāvaram || ayaṃ stuvāna āgamat taṃ smota prati haryata | bṛhaspate vaśe kṛthā agnīṣomā vi vidhyatam ||
yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanad varuṇāya mṛtabhraje | Bhatt. mitabhraje tāṃ tvā vayaṃ khanāmasy oṣadhiṃ śepaharṣaṇīm || vṛṣaṇas te khanitāro vṛṣā tvam asy oṣadhe | vṛṣāsi vṛṣṇyāvatī vṛṣaṇe tvā khanāmasi || ud uṣā ud u sūrya uc chuṣmā oṣadhīnām | ud ejati prajāpatir vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa vājinā || ūrdhvaśrāṇam idaṃ kṛdhi yathā sma te virohato abhitaptam ivānati | tatas te śuṣmavattaram iyaṃ kṛṇotv oṣadhiḥ || apāṃ rasa oṣadhīnām atho vanaspatīnām | atho somasya bhrātāsy ārśyam asi vṛṣṇyam || aśvasya ṛśyasya bastasya puruṣasya ca | ya ṛṣabhasya vājas tam asmai dhehy oṣadhe || Bhatt. dehy saṃ vājā ṛṣabhāṇāṃ saṃ śuṣmā oṣadhīnām | saṃ puṃsām indra vṛṣṇyam Bhatt. pūṣām asmai dhehi tanūbalam || adyāgne adya savitar adya devi sarasvati | adyā me brahmaṇaspate dhanur ivā tānayā pasaḥ || ūrdhvās tiṣṭhanti giraya ūrdhvā vātā ud īrate | ūrdhvo 'yaṃ māmako mayūkha ivādhi bhūmyām || ut tiṣṭhogra vi dhūnuṣva vi te śvayantu nāḍyaḥ | Bhatt. ghnā yantu atandro aśvapā iva nāva glāyo 'dhi muṣkayoḥ ||
anuvāka 1 ||
hiraṇyaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho yaḥ samudrād udācarat | tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janānt svāpayāmasi || na bhūmiṃ vāto 'ti vāti nāti tapati sūryaḥ | janāṃś ca sarvān svāpaya śunaś cendrasakhā caran || vahyeśayāḥ proṣṭheśayā nārīr yās talpaśīvarīḥ | striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhās tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi || ejadejad ajagrabhaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇam ajagrabham | aṅgāny agrabhaṃ sarvā rātrīṇām atiśarvare || ya āste yaś ca carati yaś ca tiṣṭhan vipaśyati | teṣāṃ saṃ dadhmo akṣāṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā || svaptu mātā svaptu pitā svaptu śvā svaptu viśpatiḥ | svapantu sarve jñātayaḥ sarvaṃ ni ṣvāpayā janam || svapna svapnābhikaraṇena sarvaṃ ni ṣvāpayā janam | Bhatt. ṣpāpaya otsūryam anyān svāpaya- -āvyuṣaṃ caratād aham indra ivāriṣṭo akṣitaḥ ||
akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyām āsyād uta | yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ mastiṣkāl lalāṭād vi vṛhāmasi || grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt | yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām urasto vi vṛhāmasi || klomnas te hṛdayyābhyo halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām | yakṣmaṃ matasnābhyāṃ plīhno yaknas te vi vṛhāmasi || āntrebhyas te gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor udarād uta | yakṣmaṃ pāṇyor aṅgulibhyo nakhebhyo vi vṛhāmasi || asthibhyas te māṃsebhyaḥ snāvabhyo dhamanibhyaḥ | yakṣmaṃ pṛṣṭibhyo majjabhyo nābhyā vi vṛhāmasi || ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām | yakṣmaṃ bhasadyaṃ śroṇibhyāṃ bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmasi || aṅgādaṅgāl lomnolomno baddhaṃ parvaṇiparvaṇi | yakṣmaṃ tvacasyaṃ te vayaṃ viṣvañcaṃ vi vṛhāmasi || aṅgādāṅgād ahaṃ tava paruṣaḥparuṣas pari | kaśyapasya vivṛheṇa yakṣmaṃ te vi vṛhāmasi ||
agnī rakṣohā tigmas tigmaśṛṅga ṛṣir ārṣeyaḥ kaviḥ kavitamaḥ | apāghāśaṃsaṃ nudatāṃ sahatām arātiṃ pratyak pratiharaṇena- -aghāyate 'ghaṃ prati harāmaḥ || indro rakṣohā (…) || somo rakṣohā (…) || varuṇo rakṣohā (…) || vāyū rakṣohā (…) || tvaṣṭā rakṣohā (…) || dhātā rakṣohā (…) || savitā rakṣohā (…) || sūryo rakṣohā (…) || candramā rakṣohā (…) || bṛhaspatī rakṣohā (…) || prajāpatī rakṣohā (…) || parameṣṭhī rakṣohā tigmas tigmaśṛṅga ṛṣir ārṣeyaḥ kaviḥ kavitamaḥ | apāghāśaṃsaṃ nudatāṃ sahatām arātiṃ pratyak pratiharaṇena- -aghāyate 'ghaṃ prati harāmaḥ ||
saṃvasava iti vo nāmadheyam ugraṃpaśyā rāṣṭrabhṛto hy akṣāḥ | tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām || idam ugrāya babhrave yo 'kṣeṣu tanūvaśī | ghṛtena kaliṃ śikṣāṇi sa no mṛḍātīdṛśe || ghṛtam agne apsarābhyo vaha tvaṃ pāṃsūn akṣebhyaḥ sikatā apaś ca | pāṃsūn with K; Bhatt. pāṃśūn yathābhagaṃ havyadātiṃ juṣāṇā madantu devā ubhayāni havyā || yo no devo dhanam idaṃ dideśa yo akṣāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ śeṣaṇaṃ ca | sa no 'vatu havir idaṃ juṣāṇo gandharvaiḥ sadhamādaṃ madema || yā apsarasaḥ sadhamādaṃ madanty antarā havirdhānaṃ sūryaṃ ca | tā no hastau kṛtena saṃ sṛjantu sapatnaṃ naḥ kitavaṃ randhayantu || yad devān nāthito huve brahmacaryaṃ yad ūṣima | akṣān yad babhrūn ālabhe te no mṛḍantv īdṛśe || ādinavam ity ekā || PS 1.72.4 is repeated
bhagas tveto nayatu hastagṛhya bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu | devas tvā savitā satyadharmā- -upasadyāṃ namasyāṃ kṛṇotu || yām aśvinā madhukaśāṃ devā agre ajanayan | tayā tvā patyām otāṃ kṛṇmo madhumatīṃ vayam || uttarā śvaśruvā bhava nanāndur upaśikṣayā | yaśas tvā patyāṃ kṛṇmo bhavā devṛṣu priyā || adbhir ātmānaṃ tanvaṃ śumbhamānā gṛhān prehi mahiṣī bhavāsi | tatra tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ prajāvatī jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ || ud uttaram ārohantī vyasyantī pṛtanyataḥ | abhy aṣṭhāḥ śatror mūrdhānaṃ sahaputrā virāḍ bhava || śvaśrūṇāṃ śvaśurāṇāṃ gṛhāṇāṃ ca bhagasya ca | K and ĀpMP 1.6.7 have dhanasya ca | vi rāja patyāṃ devṛṣu sajātānāṃ virāḍ bhava || yad giriṣu parvateṣu goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu | yenākṣā abhyaṣicyanta tenāham asyā mūrdhānam abhi ṣiñcāmi nāryāḥ || yad varco gavi kalyāṇe yad vā sūyavase tṛṇe | abhyañjanasya yad varcas tena mānajmi varcasā ||
anuvāka 2 ||
yenācarad uśanā kāvyo 'gre vidvān kratūnām uta devatānām | sahṛdayena haviṣā juhomi sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram || mahat satyaṃ mahad dhavir uśanā kāvyo mahān | devānām ugrāṇāṃ satāṃ hṛdayāni sahākaram || ahaṃ satyena sayujā carāmy ahaṃ devīm anumatiṃ pra veda | indro devānāṃ hṛdayaṃ vo astu sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram || tvaṣṭā vāyuḥ kaśyapa indram agnir manasānv āyan haviṣas padena | avindañ chakraṃ rajasi praviṣṭaṃ sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram || yeneme dyāvāpṛthivī vicaṣkabhur yenābhavad antarikṣaṃ svar yat | manasā vidvān haviṣā juhomi sadhrīcīnaṃ vo mano 'stūgram || dyāvāpṛthivī hṛdayaṃ sasūvatur yenedaṃ tvaṣṭā vikṛṇoti dhīraḥ | tasyośanā kratubhiḥ saṃvidānaś cittaṃ viveda manasi praviṣṭam || cittaṃ caitad ākūtiś ca yena devā viṣehire | etat satyasya śraddhayā- -arṣayaḥ sapta juhvati || i.e. śraddhayarṣayaḥ, in sandhi for śraddhayā ṛṣayaḥ
tvayā manyo saratham ārujanto harṣamāṇāso hṛṣitā marutvan | tīkṣṇeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā upa pra yantu naro agnirūpāḥ || agnir iva manyo tarasā sahasva senānīr naḥ sahure hūta edhi | jitvāya śatrūn vi bhajāsi veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdho nudasva || sahasva manyo abhimātim asme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇann ehi śatrūn | ugraṃ te śardho nanv ā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃ nayāsā ekaja tvam || eko bahūnām asi manyav īḍitā paśūnpaśūn yuddhāya saṃ śiśādhi | akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣaṃ vijayāya kṛṇmahe || vijeṣakṛd indra ivānavabravo 'smākaṃ manyo adhipā bhaveha | priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ābabhūvitha || ābhūtyā sahasā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣy abhibhūta uttaram | kratvā no manyo saha medy edhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji || saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanam ubhayaṃ samākṛtam asmabhyaṃ dattaṃ varuṇaś ca manyo | bhiyo dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitā yantu paramāṃ parāvatam ||
śaṃ no devī pṛśniparṇy aśaṃ nirṛtaye karat | ugrā hi kaṇvajambhanī tāṃ tvāhārṣaṃ sahasvatīm || sadānvāghnī prathamā pṛśniparṇy ajāyata | tayā kaṇvasyāhaṃ śiraś chinadmi śakuner iva || ūrjabhṛtaṃ prāṇabhṛtaṃ prajānām uta tarpaṇīm | sarvās tāḥ pṛśniparṇī- -itaḥ kaṇvā mā nīnaśat || for nīnaśat see Bhatt., footnote samākṛtyainā nir aja tīkṣṇaśṛṅga iva ṛṣabhaḥ | arāyaṃ kaṇvaṃ pāpmānaṃ pṛśniparṇi sahasvati || tvam ugre pṛśniparṇy Bhatt. agre agnir iva pradahann ihi kaṇvā jīvitayopanīḥ | girim enā ā veśaya tamāṃsi yatra gacchāṃs tat pāpīr api pādaya || arāyam asṛkpāvānaṃ yaś ca sphātiṃ jihīrṣati | garbhādaṃ kaṇvaṃ nāśaya pṛśniparṇi sahasvati || yā no gā yā no gṛhān Bhatt. gṛhāṃ yā na sphātim upāharān | Bhatt. yā naḥ tā ugre pṛśniparṇi tvaṃ kaṇvā mā nīnaśa itaḥ ||
yasminn āśīḥ pratihita idaṃ tac chalyo veṇur veṣṭanaṃ tejanaṃ ca | sūnur janitrīṃ janayehi śṛṇvann ayaṃ ta ātmeta it prahitaḥ || Bhatt. ita asthi bhittvā yadi majjñaḥ papātha Bhatt. prapātha yadi vāsi rataḥ puruṣantikāme | urvīṃ gavyūtim abhy ehy arvāṅ paścā raśmīn udyataḥ sūryasya || mātariśvā pavamānas tvāyan sūrya ābhrājan tanvā dṛśe kaḥ | asno gandhāt puvasaḥ pra cyavasva vi mucyasva yonyā yā te atra || pra cyavasvāto abhy ehy arvāṅ Bhatt. adhy ehy arthāṃs te vidma bahudhā bahir ye | imāḥ svasāro ayam it pitā ta iyaṃ te mātemam ehi bandhum || amitrair astā yadi vāsi mitrair devair vā devi prahitāvasṛṣṭā- -āviddhā śṛṅgaṃ puruṣe jahātha | bāṇaḥ śṛṅgaṃ śikharaḥ saṃ satām itaḥ || Bhatt. vāṇaḥ śṛṅgaḥ śikhāsu sakto yadi vāsy agre Bhatt. sikhāsu yadi vāsi saktaḥ puruṣasya māṃse | dadhṛṅ na pāśām̐ apavṛjya muktvā- Bhatt. dadhir na; apavṛhya -akṣiśalyaḥ kṛṇutām āyanāya || hastād dhastaṃ sam ayo bhriyamāṇo bahiṣ ṭvā paśyān vīrudhāṃ balena | adbhiḥ praṇiktaḥ śayāsā abhyaktaḥ kośe jāmīnāṃ nihito ahiṃsaḥ || ṣaṣṭirātre ṣaṣṭikasya śalyasya paridhiṣ kṛtaḥ | itas tam adya te vayam āsthānāc cyāvayāmasi ||
saṃ majjā majjñā bhavatu sam u te paruṣā paruḥ | saṃ te rāṣṭrasya visrastaṃ saṃ snāva sam u parva te || majjā majjñā saṃ dhīyatām asthnāsthy api rohatu | snāva te saṃ dadhmaḥ snāvnā carmaṇā carma rohatu || loma lomnā saṃ dhīyatāṃ tvacā saṃ kalpayāt tvacam | asṛk te asnā rohatu māṃsaṃ māṃsena rohatu || rohiṇī saṃrohiṇy asthnaḥ śīrṇasya rohiṇī | rohiṇyām ahni jātāsi rohiṇy asy oṣadhe || yadi śīrṇaṃ yadi dyuttam asthi peṣṭraṃ ta ātmanaḥ | dhātā tat sarvaṃ kalpayāt saṃ dadhat paruṣā paruḥ || yadi vajro visṛṣṭas tvāra kāṭaṃ patitvā yadi vā viriṣṭam | Bhatt. kāṭāt vṛkṣād vā yad avasad daśaśīrṣa ṛbhū rathasyeva saṃ dadhāmi te paruḥ || ut tiṣṭha prehi sam adhāyi te paruḥ Bhatt. samidhāya saṃ te dhātā dadhātu tanvo viriṣṭam | rathaḥ sucakraḥ supavir yathaiti sukhaḥ sunābhiḥ prati tiṣṭha evam ||
anuvāka 3 ||
udyann ādityo ghuṇān hantu sūryo nimrocan raśmibhir hantu | tāvan no abhisaṃhitam || apsarā mūlam akhanad gandharvaḥ pary abravīt | tena vo vṛtrahā sūryo ni jambhyām̐ amṛtad ghuṇāḥ || Bhatt. jambhyāṃ amrucad* ghuṇān+ ghuṇān hantv āyatī ghuṇān hantu parāyatī | ghuṇān avaghnatī hantu ghuṇān pinaṣṭu piṃṣatī || ghuṇā na kiṃ caneha vaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana | pradoṣaṃ taskarā iva || ghuṇānāṃ madhyato jyeṣṭhaḥ kaniṣṭha uta madhyamaḥ | hatā vaḥ sarve jñātayo hatā mātā hataḥ pitā || yathā phena udakena dadṛśāno nijasyati | evā vayaṃ ghuṇān sarvān sākaṃ vācā ni jāsayāmasi || ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata | ni tvam āditya raśmibhir Bhatt. nityam ghuṇān sarvām̐ ajījasaḥ || udyan raśmīn ā tanuṣva bāṇavadbhiḥ sam arpaya | Bhatt. vāṇavad- ghuṇāṃs tvaṃ sarvān āditya ghorayā tanvā tapa ||
ya ānataḥ parāṇato dāror ivāpatakṣaṇam | śarkoṭo nāma vā asi kutas tvaṃ viṣavān asaḥ || ya ubhayena praharasi pucchena cāsyena ca | āsye cana te viṣaṃ kutas te pucchadhāv asat || vidutsurasya dānavasya tasya tvaṃ napād asi | tasyāgre 'rasaṃ viṣaṃ tatas tavārasaṃ viṣam || Bhatt. tuvārasaṃ arasārasaṃ tvākaraṃ vadhre vadhriṃ tvākaram | vadhriṃ tvā cakrur devā amṛtāsa āsuram || iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakas takaṃ bhinadmi śamyayā | tato viṣaṃ parāsicam apācīm anu saṃvatam || imāḥ paścā mayūryaḥ sapta svasāro agruvaḥ | tās te viṣaṃ vi jahrira udakaṃ kumbhinīr iva kūpāt kulijinīr iva || Bhatt. kulajanīr navānāṃ navatīnām ity eka || PS 3.9.7 is repeated
vrātam aham apakṣṇānāṃ vrātaṃ muṇḍīyasām uta | vrātaṃ muṇḍivlānām ahaṃ pra dhvāṅkṣām̐ iva cātaye || pravaktā pramādayitā emend. Bhatt., ed. pramādaitā nidrā tandrīs tṛtīyakaḥ | tāñ jaṅgiḍasyāgninā Bhatt. tān sarvān prati dahāmasi|| aśuddhān naḥ pari pāhi rakṣobhya uta jaṅgiḍa | yātudhānāt kimīdinas tasmān naḥ pāhi jaṅgiḍa || apsarābhyo gandharvebhyo devebhyo asurebhyaḥ | atho sarvasmāt pāpmanas tasmān naḥ pāhi jaṅgiḍa || ni te śatrūn dahati devo agnir nir arātim amatiṃ yātudhānān | ā yāhi śatrūn duritāpaghnañ chatān no yakṣmebhyaḥ pari pāhi jaṅgiḍa || akarmāgnim adhipām asya devam anvārapsva sahasā daivyena | thus with K; Bhatt. anvā rapsi sahasvān naḥ sahasā pātu jaṅgiḍo yathā jayema pṛtanājyeṣu || satyo agniḥ satyā āpaḥ satye me dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśaṃbhuvau | Bhatt. -saṃbhuvau | satyam idaṃ brahmāsmākaṃ kṛtam astu yam abadhnād uśanendrāya taṃ te badhnāmi jaṅgiḍam ||
iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam | māhaṃ mṛṣi mo asau puruṣo mṛta | sa ca na marati mā vayaṃ marāma | āre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā karat || sūrye viṣam ā sṛjāmi dṛtiṃ surāvato gṛhe | (…) || see 1cdef triṣaptā visphuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣpakam akṣan | (…) || see 1cdef ālvantaruṭaṃ viṣaṃ vidārī karambho arasaṃ viṣam | (…) || see 1cdef vār ugram arasaṃ viṣam agniś ca viśvacarṣaṇiḥ | Bhatt. viṣacarṣaṇim (…) || see 1cdef śakuntikā me abravīd viṣapuṣpaṃ dhayantikā | (…) || see 1cdef na ropayati na mādayati na viṣaṃ hanti pūruṣam | māhaṃ mṛṣi mo asau puruṣo mṛta | sa ca na marati mā vayaṃ marāma | āre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā karat || navānāṃ navatīnām ity ekā || PS 3.9.7 = 4.17.7 is repeated
madhumatī patye asmi jārāya madhumattarā | atho madhavyaṃ me bhaṃso madhu nipadane aham || madhunā mā saṃ sṛjāmi māsareṇa surām iva | Bhatt. surā vāṅ ma iyaṃ madhunā saṃsṛṣṭā- -akṣyau me madhusaṃdṛśī || Bhatt. akṣau madhu dyaur madhu pṛthivī madhv indro madhu sūryaḥ | striyo yā jajñire madhu tābhyo 'haṃ madhumattarā || madhumatīr oṣadhaya āpo madhumatīr uta | gāvo yā jajñire madhu tābhyo 'haṃ madhumattarā || madhor jāto madhugho vīrudhāṃ balavattamaḥ | tenāhaṃ sarvasmai puṃse kṛṇve nikaraṇaṃ hṛdi || yathāśvo bandhaneṣṭho Bhatt. yathāśva is misprint vaḍavām abhidhāvati | evā tvam ugra oṣadhe 'muṃ kanikradatam ā naya || aṅgo nu mod iva śvaso aṅgo nu mod iva stanaḥ | anyā vivitsamāno anyāḥ parājighāṃsan | mām anu pra te manaś chāyā yantam ivānv ayat || Bhatt. yantum
anuvāka 4 ||
khananti tvā taimātāṃ Bhatt. taimātā dāsā arasabāhavaḥ | dāsy asi prakrīr asy utkhātam arasaṃ viṣam || adanti tvā kakkaṭāsaḥ kuruṅgā adhi sānuṣu | pāpī jagdhaprasūr asy abhrikhāte na rūrupaḥ || ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ śuṣmaṃ tirāmi te viṣa | pra ropīr asya pātaya sūryaḥ pūrvā ivoṣasaḥ || sindhuḥ paścāt parihitaḥ sūryasyodayanaṃ puraḥ | tato yad antarā vanaṃ tat sarvaṃ viṣadūṣaṇam || madhu tvā madhukṛt kṛṇotu pituṃ tvā pitukṛt kṛṇotu | uto niṣadya pātave atho ūrdhvāya tiṣṭhate || jaghāsa tvā lomakarṇas tan ny āsa paruṣṇiyām | Bhatt. tanyāsaparuruṣṇiyām tad bhaimīś cakrire srajaḥ sarvaṃ mahiṣado viṣam || urvyā urukṣitas turāyā āturasya ca | bhūmyā hi jagrabha nāma Bhatt. jagrabhaṃ viṣaṃ vārayatām iti | viṣaṃ dūṣayatād iti ||
ahaṃ vā indramātaram indraujām indrabhrātaram | indrādhivaktrāṃ vīrudham āhārṣaṃ viṣadūṣaṇīm || yat kiṃ ca padvac chaphavad yat kāṇḍi yac ca puṣpavat | yad ejati prajāpatiḥ sarvaṃ tad viṣadūṣaṇam || sindhuḥ paścād dharuṇaḥ sūryasyodayanaṃ puraḥ | tato yad antarā viṣaṃ tad vācā dūṣayāmasi || yāvat sūryo vitapati yāvac cābhi vipaśyati | tāvad viṣasya dūṣaṇaṃ vaco nir mantrayāmahe || jihvā me madhusaṃsrāvā jihvā me madhuvādinī | jihve varcasvatī bhava māyaṃ me puruṣo riṣat || Bhatt. māpa te hā hai kalyāṇi subhage pṛśniparṇy anāture | imaṃ me adya pūruṣaṃ dīrghāyutvāyon naya || yābhyo varṣanti vṛṣṭayo yābhir jīvanty aghnyāḥ | tā me viṣasya dūṣaṇīḥ savitā vy akāśayat ||
prajāpatiṣ ṭvā badhnāt prathamam astṛtaṃ vīryāya kam | taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe varcasa ojase ca balāya ca- -astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu || ūrdhvas tiṣṭha rakṣann apramādam astṛtemaṃ mā tvā dabhan paṇayo yātudhānāḥ | indra iva dasyūn ava dhūnuṣva pṛtanyataḥ sarvāñ chatrūn vi ṣahasva- -astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu || śataṃ cana praharanto 'bhighnanto na tastrire | Bhatt. tastire tasminn indraḥ pary adatta Bhatt. adhatta cakṣuḥ prāṇam atho balam astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu || indrasya tvā varmaṇā pari dhāpayāmo yo devānām adhirājo babhūva | puras tvā devāḥ pra ṇayantu sarve 'stṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu || asmin maṇāv ekaśataṃ vīryāṇi sahasraṃ prāṇā asminn astṛte | vyāghraḥ śatrūn adhi tiṣṭha sarvān yas tvā pṛtanyād adharaḥ so 'stv astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu || ghṛtād ullupto madhumān payasvān Bhatt. ulapto sahasraprāṇaḥ śatayonir vayodhāḥ | Bhatt. sahasraṃ prāṇaḥ śambhūś ca mayobhūś ca- -ūrjasvāṃś ca payasvāṃś ca- -astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu || yathā tvam uttaro aso asapatnaḥ sapatnahā | sajātānām aso vaśī tathā tvā savitā karad astṛtas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
apaś ca rapaś ca- -ūṣmā ca bāṣpaś ca | śokaś cābhiśokaś ca Bhatt. -bhīśok- tṛtīyekaś ca pareparaś ca takmāna ito naśyata || veda vai te takman nāma- -agniṣ ṭvaṃ nāmāsi | Bhatt. ṭaṃ taṃ tveto vi nayāmaḥ śani takmā || Bhatt. tvetopa vṛtrasya haro 'si nabhaso napāt | dyauś cāsmat pṛthivī ca takmānaṃ nāśayatām itaḥ || pañcapsinir nāma te mātā sa u ekapsinir ucyase | tasyāhaṃ veda te nāma sa takman nir ato drava || audumbaraś ca nāmāsi Bhatt. audumbalaś priyātithiś ca | taṃ tveto nāśayāmasi brahmaṇā vīryāvatā || yo 'si jalpaṃś ca lapaṃś ca- -āvāṃ ca tapaṃś ca | tṛtīyekaś ca mauñjigalaś ca te takmāna ito naśyata || vikilīda vilohita Bhatt. vikilīta vikāśakraṃdarajjana | giriṃ gaccha dhūmaketo hṛṣe namāṃsi santu te || bṛhat tvam agne rakṣo adhamaṃ jahi madhyamaṃ ny uttamaṃ śṛṇīhi | śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā || māteva pitevābhi rakṣatainaṃ muñcatainaṃ pary aṃhasaḥ ||
vātāj jāto antarikṣād vidyuto jyotiṣas pari | sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkhaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ || hiraṇyānām eko 'si somād adhi jajñiṣe | rathe 'si dārśata iṣudhau rocanas tvam || yo agrato rocanāvān samudrād adhi jajñiṣe | śaṅkhena hatvā rakṣāṃsy atriṇo vi ṣahāmahe || ye atriṇo yātudhānā rakṣaso ye kimīdinaḥ | sarvāñ chaṅkha tvayā vayaṃ viṣūco vi ṣahāmahe || śaṅkhenāmīvām amatiṃ śaṅkhenota sadānvāḥ | śaṅkho no viśvabheṣajaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ || Bhatt. aṃhasaṃ divi jātaḥ samudrataḥ sindhutas pary ābhṛtaḥ | sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkha āyuṣprataraṇo maṇiḥ || devānām asthi kṛśanaṃ babhūva tad ātmanvac caraty apsv antaḥ | taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe varcasa ojase ca balāya ca kārśanas tvābhi rakṣatu ||
anuvāka 5 ||
kanyā vār avāyatī somam api srutāvidat | Bhatt. śrutāvidat astaṃ bharanty abravīd indrāya sunomi tvā śakrāya sunomi tvā || asau ya eṣi vīrako gṛhaṃgṛhaṃ vicākaśat | imaṃ jambhasutaṃ piba dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam || kuvic chakat kuvit karat kuvin no vasyasas karat | kuvit patidviṣo yatīr Bhatt. patidvito indreṇa saṃ gamāmahai || ā cana tvā cikitsāmo 'dhi cana tvā nemasi | śanair iva śanakair iva- -indrāyendo pari srava || imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tānīndra vi rohaya | śiras tatasyorvarām ād idaṃ ma upodare || asau ca yā na urvarā- -ād imāṃ tanvaṃ mama | atho tatasya yac chiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi || khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato | apālām indra triṣ pūtvy akṛṇoḥ sūryatvacam ||
divas pṛṣṭhe madhupṛcaḥ suparṇāḥ pañcāśat te bhuvanasya gopāḥ | ānujāvaram anu rakṣanta ugrā yeṣām indraṃ vīryāyairayanta || purohitaḥ parameṣṭhī svarājyāya- Bhatt. svarāḍ jyāyābhī- -abhīvardham asmā akṛṇod bṛhaspatiḥ | tena sapatnān adharān kṛṇuṣva kṣeme paśūn bahulān vardhayitvā jaitrāyod yātu rathavāhanaṃ te || gobhājam aṃśaṃ tava ye samānāḥ Bhatt. aṃsaṃ sarve samagrā dadhṛg ābharanta | abhi vardhasva bhrātṛvyān abhi ye tvā pṛtanyataḥ || ni piṇḍhi sarvān dhūrvato 'bhīvardho yathāsasi | abhīvardham abhībhavam Bhatt. abhīvargham abhīṣeṇaṃ mahāgaṇam | viśas tvā sarvā ā yantv āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ || abhi vardhasva prajayā vāvṛdhāno abhy anīkaiḥ paśubhir bhavāsi | Bhatt. bhavāti brahmarājanyair viśyair vāvṛdhānaḥ Bhatt. brahma rājanyair viśvair śūdrair atīhi sabhayā pṛtanyataḥ || vardhasva kṣetraiḥ prathasva prajayā vardhasva vīraiḥ paśubhir bahur bhava | śriyā śulkair yatamas tvā pṛtanyād Bhatt. śuklair āptas tubhyaṃ sa balihṛtyāya tiṣṭhatu ||
indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim ūtaye mārutaṃ śardho aditiṃ havāmahe | rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana || ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye bhūta devā vṛtratūryeṣu śaṃbhuvaḥ | Bhatt. saṃbhuvaḥ (…) || see 1cd avantu naḥ pitaraḥ supravācanā uta devī devaputre ṛtāvṛdhā | (…) || see 1cd narāśaṃsaṃ vājinaṃ vājayantaṃ kṣayadvīraṃ pūṣaṇaṃ sumnair īmahe | (…) || see 1cd bṛhaspate sadam in naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi śaṃ yor yat te manurhitaṃ tad īmahe | (…) || see 1cd indraṃ kutso vṛtrahaṇaṃ śacīpatiṃ kāṭe nibāḍha ṛṣir ahvad ūtaye | Bhatt. nivāḍha rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana || devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām aprayucchan | tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
apa naḥ śośucad agham | agne śuśugdhy ā rayim || apa naḥ śośucad agham | sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe || apa naḥ śośucad agham | pra yad bhandiṣṭha eṣāṃ prāsmākāsaś ca sūrayaḥ || apa naḥ śośucad agham | pra yat te agne sūrayo jāyemahi pra te vayam || apa naḥ śośucad agham | pra yad agneḥ sahasvato viśvato yanti bhānavaḥ || apa naḥ śośucad agham | tvaṃ hi viśvatomukha viśvataḥ paribhūr asi || apa naḥ śośucad agham | dviṣo no viśvatomukha- -ati nāveva pāraya ||
devāḥ śaraṇakṛtaḥ śaraṇā me bhavata prācyā diśo 'gninā rājñādhyakṣeṇa | yaśā bhūyāsaṃ yaśasaṃ mā kṛṇuta cārum annādaṃ parā dviṣantaṃ śṛṇīta || (…) bhavata see 1a dakṣiṇāyā diśa indreṇa rājñā- (…) || see 1bcd (…) bhavata see 1a pratīcyā diśo varuṇena rājñā- (…) || see 1bcd (…) bhavata- see 1a -udīcyā diśaḥ somena rājñā- (…) || see 1bcd (…) bhavata see 1a dhruvāyā diśo viṣṇuṇā rājñā- (…) || see 1bcd (…) bhavata- see 1a -ūrdhvāyā diśo bṛhaspatinā rājñā- (…) || see 1bcd (…) bhavata- see 1a -uttamāyā diśaḥ prajāpatinā rājñā- (…) || see 1bcd (…) bhavata see 1a paramāyā diśaḥ parameṣṭhinā rājñā- (…) || see 1bcd devāḥ śaraṇakṛtaḥ śaraṇā me bhavata sarvābhyo digbhya īśānena rājñādhyakṣeṇa | yaśā bhūyāsaṃ yaśasaṃ mā kṛṇuta cārum annādaṃ parā dviṣantaṃ śṛṇīta ||
anuvāka 6 ||
prātar agniṃ prātar indraṃ havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā | prātar bhagaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaspatiṃ prātaḥ somam uta rudraṃ huvema || prātarjitaṃ bhagam ugraṃ huvema vayaṃ putram aditer yo vidhartā | ādhraś cid yaṃ manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣīty āha || bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyam ud avā dadan naḥ | bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma || utedānīṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma- -uta prapitva uta madhye ahnām | utodite maghavan sūrye vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma || bhaga eva bhagavām̐ astu devās tena vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma | taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīti sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha || sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya | arvācīnaṃ vasuvidaṃ bhagaṃ no ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu || aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ | ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
yas te manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak | sāhyāma dāsam āryaṃ tvayā yujā vayaṃ sahaskṛtena sahasā sahīyasā || manyur indro manyur evāsa devo manyur hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ | manyur viśa īḍate mānuṣīr yāḥ pāhi no manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ || abhīhi manyo tavasas tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn | amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūny ā bharā tvaṃ naḥ || tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayambhūr bhāmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ | viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahīyām̐ asmāsv ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi || abhāgaḥ sann apa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ | taṃ tvā manyo akratur jihīḍāhaṃ svā tanūr baladāvā na ehi || ayaṃ te asmy upa na ehy arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadāvan | manyo vajrinn upa na ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhy āpe || abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā no adhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri | juhomi te dharuṇo madhvo agram ubhā upāṃśu prathamā pibeva ||
agner manve prathamasya pracetasaḥ pāñcajanyasya bahudhā yam indhate | viśoviśaḥ praviśivāṃsam īmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || sujātaṃ jātavedasam agniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vibhum | havyavāhaṃ havāmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yathā havyaṃ vahasi jātavedo yathā yajñaṃ kalpayasi prajānan | evā devebhyaḥ sumatim ihā vaha Bhatt. sumatiṃ hy ā vaha sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yāmanyāmann upayuktaṃ vahiṣṭhaṃ karmankarmann ābhagam | agnim īḍe rakṣohaṇaṃ yajñavṛdhaṃ ghṛtāhutaṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yena rṣayo valam adyotayan yujā yenāsurāṇām ayuvanta māyāḥ | yenāgninā paṇīn indro jigāya sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yena devā amṛtam anvavindan yenauṣadhīr madhumatīr akṛṇvan | yenedaṃ svar ābharan sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yasyedaṃ pradiśi yad virocate yaj jātaṃ janitavyaṃ ca kevalam | staumy agniṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
vāyoḥ savitur vidathāni manmahe yāv ātmanvad vidatho yau ca rakṣathaḥ | yau viśvasya paribhū babhūvathus tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yayoḥ saṃkhyātā varimāṇi pārthivā yābhyāṃ rajo gupitam antarikṣam | yayoḥ prayāṃ nānu kaś canānaśe tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || tava vrate ni viśante janāsas tvayy udite prerate citrabhāno | yuvaṃ vāyo savitā ca bhuvanāni rakṣathas Bhatt. vāyuḥ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || pra sumatiṃ savitar vāya ūtaye mahasvantaṃ matsaraṃ mādayethām | arvāg vāmasya pravatā ni yacchathas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || rayiṃ me poṣaṃ savitota vāyus tanū dakṣam ā suvatāṃ suśevam | ayakṣmatāṃ maho asmāsu dhattaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || apeto vāyo savitā ca duṣkṛtam Bhatt. vāyuḥ apa yakṣmaṃ śimidāṃ sedhataṃ paraḥ | saṃ hy ūrjā sṛjathaḥ saṃ balena Bhatt. ūrjāḥ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || upa śreṣṭhā na āśiṣo devayor dhāmann asthiran | staumi devaṃ savitāraṃ ca vāyuṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
