marutāṃ manve adhi me bruvantu premaṃ vājaṃ vājasātā avantu | āśūn iva suyamān ahva ūtaye Bhatt. suyamāṃ hva te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || utsam akṣitaṃ vyacanti ye sadā ye vā siñcanti rasam oṣadhīṣu | Bhatt. siñcantu puro dadhe marutaḥ pṛśnimātṝṃs te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || payo dhenūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ javam arvatāṃ kavayo ya invatha | śagmā bhavantu marutaḥ syonās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || apaḥ samudrād divam ud vahanti divas pṛthivīm abhi ye sṛjanti | ye +'dbhir īśānā marutaś caranti te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || ye kīlālais tarpayanti ye ghṛtena ye vā vayo medasā saṃsṛjanti | ya īśānā maruto varṣayanti te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || yadīd idaṃ maruto mārutena yadi devā daivyenedṛg āra | yūyam īśidhve vasavas tasya niṣkṛtes te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || tigmam anīkaṃ viditaṃ sahasvan mārutaṃ śardhaḥ pṛtanāsūgram | staumi maruto nāthito johavīmi te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
anuvāka 7 ||
manve vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī subhojasau ye aprathethām amitā yojanāni | pratiṣṭhe hy abhavataṃ vasūnāṃ te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || pratiṣṭhe hi babhūvathur vasūnāṃ pravṛddhe devī subhage urūcī | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || ye srotyā bibhṛtho ye manuṣyān Bhatt. manuṣyāṃ ye amṛtaṃ bibhṛtho ye havīṃṣi | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || ye usriyā bibhṛtho ye vanaspatīn yayor vāṃ viśvā bhuvanāny antaḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || ye kīlālais tarpayatho ye ghṛtena yābhyāṃ na rte kiṃ cana śaknuvanti | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || asantāpe sutapasā huve vām urvī gabhīre kavibhir namasye | dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yan medam abhiśocati yena vā yena vā kṛtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ na daivyam | staumi dyāvāpṛthivī nāthito johavīmi te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
bhavāśarvau manve vāṃ tasya vittaṃ yayor vāṃ viśvaṃ yad idaṃ vitiṣṭhate | yāv īśāte asya dvipado yau catuṣpadas Bhatt. yaś tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yayor abhyadhva uta yad dūre cid yau viditāv iṣubhṛtām asiṣṭhau | bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yayor vadhān nāpapadyate kiṃ cana- -antar deveṣūta mānuṣeṣu | bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yāv ārebhāte bahu sākam ugrau pra ced asrāṣṭram abhibhāṃ janeṣu | bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || sahasrākṣau vṛtrahaṇā huve vāṃ dūrehetī svannemī ugrau | Bhatt. svanemī bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yaḥ kṛtyākṛd yātudhāno mahālo ni tasmin hatam adhi vajram ugrau | bhavāśarvau bhavataṃ me syonau tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || adhi me brūtaṃ pṛtanāsūgrau saṃ vajreṇa sṛjataṃ yaḥ kimīdī | Bhatt. yat kimīdi staumi bhavāśarvau nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
manve vāṃ mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvṛdhau satyaujasau druhvāṇaṃ yau nudethe | yau satyāvānam avatho haveṣu tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || satyaujasau druhvāṇaṃ yau nudethe pra satyāvānam avatho haveṣu | yau gacchatho nṛcakṣasā babhruṇā sutaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yāv aṅgiraso 'vatho yāv agastiṃ mitrāvaruṇā jamadagnim atrim | yau kaśyapam avatho yau vasiṣṭhaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yau bharadvājam avatho vadhryaśvaṃ viśvāmitraṃ varuṇa mitra kutsam | yau kakṣīvantam avathaḥ prota kaṇvaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yau śyāvāśyam avatho yau gaviṣṭhiraṃ Bhatt. śyāvākṣam; misprint? mitrāvaruṇā purumīḍham atrim | yau vimadam avathaḥ saptavadhriṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yau medhātithim avatho yau triśokaṃ mitrāvaruṇā uśanāṃ kāvyaṃ yau | Bhatt. uśanaṃ yau mudgalam avatho gotamaṃ ca tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ || yayo rathaḥ satyavartma rjuraśmir mithuyā carantam abhiyāti dūṣayan | staumi mitrāvaruṇā nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ ||
indrasya manve śaśvad yasya manvire vṛtraghna stomā upa mema āguḥ | Bhatt. memam yo dāśuṣaḥ sukṛto havam etā sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yaś carṣaṇipro vṛṣabhaḥ svarvid yasya grāvāṇaḥ pravadanti nṛmṇe | yasyādhvaraḥ saptahotā madacyut sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || ya ugrāṇām ugrabāhur yajur yo dānavānāṃ balam āsasāda | yena jitāḥ sindhavo yena gāvaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yasya vaśāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇo yasmai mīyante svaravaḥ svarvide | yasmai śukraḥ pavate brahmaśumbhitaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yasya juṣṭiṃ sominaḥ kāmayante yaṃ havanta iṣuvantaṃ gaviṣṭau | yasminn arkaḥ śiśriye yasminn ojaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || ya uttamaḥ karmakṛtyāya jajñe yasya vīryaṃ prathamasyānubuddham | Bhatt. -nubaddham yenodyato vajro 'bhyāyatāhiṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ || yaḥ saṃgrāmān nayati saṃ yudhe vaśī Bhatt. yuge yaḥ puṣṭāni saṃsṛjati dvayāni | staumīndraṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ ||
śunaṃ vatsān apā karomi śunaṃ badhnāmi tantyām | āgrayaṇaṃ brahmaṇāṃ havis tasmiñ jāgāra kaśyapaḥ || bāhuṃ vatsam upanayan pātre gāṃ duhann abravīt | ariṣṭaṃ brahmabhyo haviḥ śivaṃ kṛṇotu kaśyapaḥ || trayas tiṣṭhanti sukṛtasya loke trayo 'tīkāśās trīṇi śīrṣāṇy eṣām | trayas tiṣṭhanti parigṛhya kumbhīṃ yathā haviḥ kaśyapa na vyathātai || satyāt sambhūto vadati taṇḍulān kṣīra āvapan | ṛṣir brahmabhya āgrayaṇaṃ ni vedayatu kaśyapaḥ || ṛtumukhe candrabhāgaḥ pātra odanam ud dharāt | prāśnantu brahmāṇo havir yathā vedena kaśyapaḥ || ye bhūtāny asṛjanta ye bhūtāny akalpayan | sarvasya vidvān adhvaryuḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ bhavatu kaśyapaḥ || śivā āpo vatsebhyaḥ śivā bhavantv oṣadhīḥ | vāto vatsebhyaḥ kaśyapaḥ śivaḥ śivaṃ tapatu sūryaḥ ||
anuvāka 8 ||
Kāṇḍa 5
namaḥ piśaṅgabāhvai sindhau jātāyā ugrāyai | yo asyai nama it karad aped asya gṛhād ayat || apehi no gṛhebhyo apehi vatsatantyāḥ | ātmānam atra rotsyasy ava roha mahānasāt || hā amba suhūtale atho hai sāmanantame | putro yas te pṛśnibāhus tam u tvaṃ sāmanaṃ kṛdhi | atho duhitaraṃ naptrīm atho tvaṃ sāmanā bhava || bhūtapatir nir ajatv indraś cetaḥ sadānvāḥ | gṛhasya budhna āsīnās tā vajreṇādhi tiṣṭhatu || apetetaḥ sadānvā ahiṃsantīr imaṃ gṛham | dhenur vātra ya sthāsyaty anaḍvān verayā saha || yā sahamānā carasi sāsahāna iva rṣabhaḥ | sadānvāghnīṃ tvā vayaṃ jaitrāyācchā vadāmasi || sahasva no abhimātiṃ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ | sahasva sarvā rakṣāṃsi sahamānāsy oṣadhe || tvaṃ vyāghrān sahase tvaṃ siṃhām̐ ubhayādataḥ | makṣāś cit kṛṇvānā madhu tvaṃ sahasa oṣadhe ||
iyaṃ pitre rāṣṭry ety agre prathamāya januṣe bhūmaniṣṭhāḥ | tasmā etaṃ surucaṃ hvāram ahyaṃ gharmaṃ śrīṇanti prathamasya dhāsyoḥ || brahma jajñānaṃ prathamaṃ purastād vi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvaḥ | sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhāḥ sataś ca yonim asataś ca vi vaḥ || pra yo jajñe vidvām̐ asya bandhuṃ viśvāni devo janimā vivakti | brahma brahmaṇa uj jabhāra madhyān nīcād uccā svadhā abhi pra tasthau || mahān mahī askabhāyad vi jāto dyāṃ dvitaḥ pārthivaṃ ca rajaḥ | sa budhnād āṣṭra januṣābhy agraṃ bṛhaspatir devatā tasya samrāṭ || nūnaṃ tad asya gavyaṃ hinoti maho devasya pūrvasya mahi | eṣa jajñe bahubhiḥ sākam itthā pūrvād ardhād avithuraś ca san nu || sa hi divaḥ sa pṛthivyā ṛteṣṭhā mahi kṣāman rajasī vi ṣkabhāyati | ahar yac chukraṃ jyotiṣo janiṣṭa- -adhā dyumanto vi vasantv ariprāḥ || evātharvā pitaraṃ viśvadevaṃ bṛhaspatir namasāvocad accha | tvaṃ viśvasya janitā dhāsy agre kavir devān na dabhāya svadhāvaḥ || mūrdhnā yo agram abhyarty ojasā bṛhaspatim ā vivāsanti devāḥ | bhinad valaṃ vi mṛdho dardarīti kanikradad gāḥ svar apo jigāya ||
ud apaptad asau sūryaḥ purudṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā | udāyan raśmibhir hantu- -udāyann arasām̐ akaḥ || ny amrucad asau sūryo viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā | nimrocan raśmibhir hantu nimrocann arasām̐ akaḥ || ye ca dṛṣṭā ye cādṛṣṭā ubhayehāviṣyavaḥ | teṣāṃ vo agrabhaṃ nāma sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata || adṛṣṭahananī vīrud amitaujā viṣāsahi | cukākaṇi tvaṃ jajñiṣe sādṛṣṭāñ jātaśo jahi || jahi jyeṣṭham adṛṣṭānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ moghacāriṇām | krimīṇāṃ sarvā jātāni ?pauñjaṣṭa iva yavaṃ mṛṇa || yaś ca todo yaś ca sarpa ekādaśaś ca yo vṛṣā | ekādaśaś (?); Bhatt. ekādṛṣṭaś cukākaṇi tvaṃ tān vṛśca vṛkṣaṃ paraśumān iva || saṃ vṛścaināṃś cukākaṇi vṛkṣaṃ paraśumān iva | krimīṇāṃ sarvā jātāni saṃ dahāgnir ivolapam || methiṣṭhā agnir aghalas tviṣīmān krimīṇāṃ jātāni pra dunotu sarvā | bṛhaspater medine jātavedā adṛṣṭān hantu dṛṣadeva māṣān ||
mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvaṃ puṣema | mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasras tvayādhyakṣeṇa pṛtanā jayema || agne manyuṃ pratinudan pareṣāṃ tvaṃ no gopāḥ pari pāhi viśvataḥ | apāñco yantu prabudhā durasyavo 'maiṣāṃ cittaṃ bahudhā vi naśyatu || mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇur agniḥ | mamāntarikṣam urulokam astu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ kāme asmin || mahyaṃ yajantāṃ mama yānīṣṭā- -ākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu | eno mā ni gāṃ katamac canāhaṃ viśve devā abhi rakṣantu mām iha || mahyaṃ devā draviṇam ā yajantāṃ mamāśīr astu mama devahūtiḥ | daivā hotāraḥ saniṣan na etad ariṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ || devīḥ ṣaḍ urvīr uru ṇas karātha viśve devāsa iha mādayadhvam | mā hāsmahi prajayā mā dhanena mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan || uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yacchād asmin vāje puruhūtaḥ purukṣuḥ | sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḍa- -indra mā no rīriṣo mā parā dāḥ || dhātā vidhartā bhuvanasya yas patiḥ savitā devo abhimātiṣāhaḥ | bṛhaspatir indrāgnī aśvinobhā devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nirṛthāt || ihārvāñcam ati hvaya indraṃ jaitrāya jetave | asmākam astu kevala itaḥ kṛṇotu vīryam || arvāñcam indram amuto havāmahe yo gojid dhanajid aśvajid yaḥ | imaṃ no yajñaṃ vihave juṣasva- -asmākaṃ kṛṇmo harivo medinaṃ tvā || trātāram indram avitāram indraṃ havehave suhavaṃ śūram indram | huvema śakraṃ puruhūtam indraṃ svasti no maghavān pātv indraḥ || tisro devīr mahi me śarma yacchan prajāyai me tanve yac ca puṣṭam | māṃ viśaḥ saṃmanaso juṣantāṃ pitryaṃ kṣetraṃ prati jānātv asmān || yo naḥ śakrābhimanyunā- -indrāmitro jighāṃsati | tvaṃ taṃ vṛtrahañ jahi vasv asmabhyam ā bhara || ye naḥ śapanty apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām apa bādhāmahe tān | ādityā rudrā uparispṛśo mām ugraṃ cettāram adhirājam akran ||
pṛthivī vaśā sāgniṃ garbhaṃ dadhe semaṃ pāhi tasyai te vidheyaṃ tasyai te namas tasmai te svāhā || antarikṣaṃ vaśā sā vāyuṃ garbhaṃ (…) || see 1abc dyaur vaśā sā sūryaṃ garbhaṃ (…) || see 1abc ṛg vaśā sā sāma garbhaṃ (…) || see 1abc dakṣiṇā vaśā sā yajñaṃ garbhaṃ (…) || see 1abc viḍ vaśā sā kṣatriyaṃ garbhaṃ (…) || see 1abc vāg vaśā sā parameṣṭhiṇaṃ garbhaṃ (…) || see 1abc vaśā vaśā sā rājanyaṃ garbhaṃ (…) || see 1abc samā vaśā sā saṃvatsaraṃ garbhaṃ dadhe semaṃ pāhi tasyai te vidheyaṃ tasyai te namas tasmai te svāhā ||
anuvāka 1 ||
sapta sūryā divam anupraviṣṭās tān pathā vā anv eti dakṣiṇāvān | te 'smai sarve ghṛtam ā tapanty ūrjaṃ duhānā anapasphurantaḥ || ātapan kṣayati nīcā dāsavyādhī niṣṭapan | adhāyatpatraḥ sūrya ud eti bṛhatīr anu || ātaptā pitṝn vidma dasyūn niṣṭaptā vayam | guhā ye 'nye sūryāḥ svadhām anu caranti te || dyauḥ sacate 'parāñ janāsaḥ pañcānye paro diva ā kṣiyanti | tāṃ brahma divaṃ bṛhad ā viveśa yas tān praveda prataram atīryata || yo dadāti yo dadate yo vā nidhīn śraddadhāno nidhatte | yamo vaivasvatān rājā sarvān rakṣatu śevadhīn || mā vidan paryāyiṇo ye dakṣiṇāḥ parimuṣṇanti dattam | sugena tān pathā sarvān yamo rājāti neṣati || yena pathā vaivasvato yamo rājeto yayau | agnir nas tena nayatu prajānan vaiśvānaraḥ pathikṛd viśvagṛṣṭiḥ || mahi jyotir nihitaṃ martyeṣu yena devāso atarann arātīn | tenemaṃ setum ati geṣma sarve vaiśvānaraṃ jyotir amīva devāḥ || ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram | devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam || āroko bhrājaḥ paṭaraḥ pataṅgaḥ svarṇaro jyotiṣīmān vibhāsaḥ | te 'smai sarve ghṛtam ā tapanty ūrjaṃ duhānā anapasphurantaḥ ||
samutpatantu pradiśo nabhasvatīḥ sam abhrāṇi vātajūtāni yantu | maharṣabhasya nadato nabhasvato vāśrā āpaḥ pṛthivīṃ tarpayantu || sam īkṣayati viṣvagvāto nabhāṃsy apāṃ vegāsaḥ pṛthag ut patantu | varṣasya sargā mahayantu bhūmiṃ pṛthag jāyantām oṣadhayo viśvarūpāḥ || abhi kranda stanayārdayodadhiṃ bhūmiṃ parjanya payasā sam aṅdhi | tvayā varṣaṃ bahulam etu sṛṣṭam āśāraiṣī kṛśagur etv astam || ud īrayata marutaḥ samudratas tveṣā arkā nabha ut pātayantu | pra varṣayanti taviṣāḥ sudānavo 'pāṃ rasair oṣadhayaḥ sacantām || gaṇās tvopa gāyantu mārutāḥ parjanya ghoṣiṇaḥ pṛthak | sargā varṣasya varṣataḥ sṛjantu pṛthivīm abhi || sam avantu sudānava utsā ajagarā uta | vātā varṣasya varṣataḥ pra vāntu pṛthivīm anu || vāto vidyud abhraṃ varṣaṃ sam avantu sudānavaḥ | pra pyāyasva pra pinvasva saṃ bhūmiṃ payasā sṛja || apām agnis tanūbhiḥ saṃvidāno ya oṣadhīnām adhipā babhūva | sa no varṣaṃ vanutāṃ jātavedāḥ prāṇaṃ prajābhyo amṛtaṃ divas pari || āśām-āśāṃ vi dyotatāṃ vātā vāntu diśo-diśaḥ | marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghā varṣantu pṛthivīm abhi || read anu with K instead of abhi?) prajāpatiḥ salilād ā samudrād āpa īrayann udadhim ardayāti | pra pyāyatāṃ vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto 'rvāṅ etena stanayitnunehy apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ || śvasantu gargarā apām ava nīcīr apaḥ sṛja | vadantu pṛśnibāhavo maṇḍūkā īriṇānu || saṃvatsaraṃ śaśayānā brāhmaṇā vratacāriṇaḥ | vācaṃ parjanyajinvatāṃ pra maṇḍūkā avādiṣuḥ || upapravada maṇḍūki varṣam ā vada tāduri | madhye hradasya plavasva vigṛhya caturaḥ padaḥ || mahāntaṃ kośam ud acābhi ṣiñca savidyutaṃ bhavatu vātu vātaḥ | tanvatāṃ yajñaṃ bahudhā visṛṣṭam ānandinīr oṣadhayo bhavantu ||
yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad vā sapta sindhavo vitaṣṭhuḥ | vācaṃ viṣasya dūṣaṇīṃ tām ito nir avādiṣam || suparṇas tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam āvayat | nāropayo nāmādaya utāsmā abhavat pituḥ || read abhavaḥ? yāṃ tvāsthat pañcāṅgulir vakrāc cid adhi dhanvanaḥ | apaskambhasya bāhvor nir avocam ahaṃ viṣam || śalyād viṣaṃ nir avocam añjanāt parṇadher uta | apāṣṭhāc chṛṅgāt kurmalān nir avocam ahaṃ viṣam || arasas ta iṣo śalyo 'tho te 'rasaṃ viṣam | utārasasya vṛkṣasya dhanuṣ ṭe arasārasam || ye +'pīṣan ye 'dihan ya āsyan ye 'vāsṛjan | sarve te vadhrayaḥ santu vadhrir viṣagiriṣ kṛtaḥ || vadhrayas te khanitāro vadhris tvam asy oṣadhe | vadhriḥ sa parvato girir yato jātam idaṃ viṣam || vār idaṃ vārayātai varuṇāvata ābhṛtam | tatrāmṛtasyāsiktaṃ tac cakārārasaṃ viṣam ||
khādireṇa śalilena- -atho kaṅkatadantyā | atho viṣasya yad viṣaṃ tena pāpīr anīnaśam || kityā śataparvaṇā sahasrākṣeṇa carmaṇā | tīkṣṇābhir abhribhir vayaṃ nir ajāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || sahaḥ sahasvaty asi- -itaḥ kaṇvāḥ paro 'nudaḥ | imā yā adhunāgatā yāś ceha grahaṇīḥ purā || na tā itthā na tā ihāva māsatā ukheva śṛṅgavac chiraḥ | sadānvā brahmaṇaspate tīkṣṇaśṛṅgodṛṣann ihi || vi te nu manthāḥ śaśrire bibhide te gadohanī | dadau te adya gauḥ kaṇve parehy avaraṃ mṛṇe || yās tarke tiṣṭhanti yā valīke yāḥ preṅkhe preṅkhayanta uta yā nu ghorāḥ | yā garbhān pramṛśanti sarvāḥ pāpīr anīnaśam || yāś celaṃ vasata uta yā nu dūrśaṃ nīlaṃ piśaṅgam uta lohitaṃ yāḥ | yā garbhān pramṛśanti sarvāḥ pāpīr anīnaśam || ākhidantīr vikhidantīḥ prāṇam asyāpi nahyata | durṇāmnīḥ sarvāḥ saṃgatya māmuṣyoc chiṣṭa kiṃ cana ||
iyaṃ yā musalāhatā dṛṣatpiṣṭā viṣāsutā | tapur agnis tapur dyaus tapus tvaṃ sure bhava || viṣaṃ te tokma rohayanto 'bruvan viṣaṃ kumbhe 'va srava | viṣaṃ ta āmanaṃ sure viṣaṃ tvaṃ hasta āhitā viṣaṃ pratihitā bhava || siṃhas te astu taṇḍulo vyāghraḥ paryodanam | pṛdākūr astu nagnahur vṛkasya hṛdi saṃ srava || iyaṃ yā pātra āsūtā śaṣpasrakvā vighasvarī | varāhamanyur ajany uttānapādam ardaya || udardanī pracyavanī pāṃsupiṅgā vighasvarī | utkhātamanyur ajani yat paścāt tat puras kṛdhi || viṣaṃ te pavane sure rudhiraṃ sthāle astu te | mathnantv anyo anyasmā iṣudhīṃs tvad dhanus tvat || viṣapāvāno rudhirāś caranti pātāro martās tavase sura ime | hatāso anye yodhayanty anyāṃs tam ic chaṃsa mahimānaṃ surāyāḥ || tān vīrudho visravo balena- -ut pātaya mādaya yodhanāyai | bhinnāratnīr bhinnaśīrṣṇā sam ṛcchatām ārtacelo visravan te surāpaḥ || viṣāsutāṃ pibata jarhṛṣāṇā asnā saṃsṛṣṭaṃ rudhireṇa miśrām | chinnahastaś carati grāme antar vairahatyāni bahudhā paṇāyan || asimatīm iṣumatīm un nayāmi satād adhi | mādayābhi mādaya- -ahir ivainān pra ropaya- -anyo 'nyasya moc chiṣan ||
anuvāka 2 ||
anu te manyatām agnir varuṇas te 'nu manyatām | tatas te putro jāyatāṃ sa varmī goṣu yudhyatām || idaṃ vāyo 'nu jānīhi- -idam indra bṛhaspate | āñjanaṃ putravedanaṃ kṛṇmaḥ puṃsavanaṃ vayam || yenaitat pariṣṭabhitaṃ yasmāt putraṃ na vindase | indrāgnī tasmāt tvainasaḥ pari pātām ahardivi || atharvāṇo aṅgiraso viśve devā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ | śṛṇvantv adya me havam asyai putrāya vettave || indrāṇī varuṇānī sinīvāly utāditiḥ | varutry ugrā patnīnāṃ putram adya dideṣṭu te || putraṃ te mitrāvaruṇā putraṃ devī sarasvatī | putraṃ te aśvinobhā- -ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā || yeṣāṃ ca nāma jagrabha yeṣāṃ ca nopasasmara | devās te sarve saṃgatya putraṃ jaivātṛkaṃ dadan || ātmana enaṃ nir mimīṣva sa tvat pari jāyatām | tvaṃ bījam urvareva tvaṃ bibhṛhi yonyām || pṛthivī saha yajñair nakṣatraiḥ saha sūryaḥ | vātaḥ patatribhiḥ saha putram adya dideṣṭu te ||
vṛṣā jajñe madhavāno 'yaṃ madhumatībhyaḥ | sa u te yonim ā śayāṃ baḍ dakṣaḥ puruṣo bhavan || yoniṃ gaccha madhavāna yonyāṃ puruṣo bhava | tataḥ punar nir āyasi śīrṣṇā śroṇī vinonudat || bāṇavām̐ iṣudher iva kṛṇvan pitror yathā priyam | śroṇī ahiṃsann antarā daśame māsy āyasi || sa pratyaṅ pratyāvarttā- -ite saṃvatsare punaḥ | yathā jīvāsi bhadrayā bibharat tvā mahābhave || saṃ te yonim acīkl̥paṃ suprajāstvāya bhadrayā | tatrā siñcasva vṛṣṇyaṃ daśamāsyam avihrutam || garbhas te yonim ā śayāṃ garbho jarāyv ā śayām | jarāyv ā?; Bhatt. and all mss. jarāyuvā kumāra ulbam ā śayāṃ tvaṣṭrā kl̥pto yathāparu || yathā rājan madhavāna tvaṃ bījaṃ virohasi | evā tvam asyā nir bhindhi kumāraṃ yonyā adhi || garbham adhān madhavāno garbhaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | garbhaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca garbhaṃ dhātā dadhātu te ||
śivaḥ śivābhir vayasvan saṃ gacchasva tanvā jātavedaḥ | ratnaṃ dadhānaḥ sumanāḥ purastād gṛhebhyas tvā varcase nir vapāmi || pṛthivyāṃ gharma stabhito 'ntarikṣe divi śritaḥ | dyaur enaṃ sarvataḥ pātu yas tvā pacaty odana || ye samudram airayan ye ca sindhuṃ ye 'ntarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyām | ye vātena sarathaṃ yānti devās tān āpnoty odanapāko atra || ṛcā kumbhy adhihitā sāmnā pacyata odanaḥ | aṃśuṃ somasyaitaṃ manye vaiśvadevam idaṃ haviḥ || ulūkhale musale ye ca śūrpe bhūmyām ukhāyāṃ yad ivāsasañja | yā vipruṣo yāni nirṇejanāni sarvaṃ tat te brahmaṇā pūrayāmi || ūrdhvaḥ prehi mā saṃ vikthā vy asya rajo antaram | rakṣāṃsi sarvā tīrtvā- -athā roha divaṃ tvam || turo no aturo bhava saṃ dhībhir dhīyatām ayam | saṃ pṛthivyā sam agninā saṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ saṃ devānām apasyayā || ājaddviṣaḥ sukṛtasya loke tṛtīye nāke adhi rocane divaḥ | mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanto nv eta paścā nikṛtya mṛtyuṃ padayopanena ||
bhūtyā mukham asi satyasya raśmir uccaiḥśloko divaṃ gaccha | uc chrayethāṃ haviṣkṛtau sādhu devān saparyatam ṛjīṣam apa lumpatam || āpo devīr yajñakṛtaś citrā devīr haviṣkṛtaḥ | ekapātra odano 'gniṣṭomena saṃmitaḥ || gāyatrī havyavāḍ asi devatāgniḥ sam idhyase | sahasradhāraṃ sukṛtasya loke ghṛtapṛṣṭham amartyau || tapaś ca satyaṃ caudanaṃ prāśnītāṃ parameṣṭhinau | tābhyāṃ vai svar ābhṛtaṃ tenādhipatir ucyase || urugāyo *'si vāyoḥ prāṇena saṃmitaḥ | apa mṛdhrāṇi maj jahi mukṣīya duritād aham || apa rakṣāṃsi tejasā devebhyo havyam arca tam | vyacasvān saprathā asi || uccaiḥ suparṇo divam ut patāmuṃ priyaṃ devebhyo mā kṛṇv ṛṣibhyaḥ pari dehi mām | śukraṃ śukreṇa bhakṣayā pibantu sukṛto madhu || dvayā devā upa no yajñam āgur yān odano juṣate yaiś ca pṛṣṭaḥ | ādityā aṅgirasaḥ svargam imaṃ prāśnantv ṛtubhir niṣadya ||
pīyūṣasya kṣīrasya sarpiṣo 'nnasyāgraṃ saṃ bharāma etat | etaṃ bhāgam ahutādbhyaḥ pra hiṇmas tan no haviḥ prati gṛhantu devā daivāḥ || hutādo 'nye 'hutādo 'nye vaiśvadevaṃ havir ubhaye saṃ caranti | te samyañca iha mādayantām iṣam ūrjaṃ yajamānāya matsva || memā bhavo mā śarvo vadhīd gā mā vatsān klomaśvayo vidan naḥ | ye jātā ye ca garbheṣv antar ariṣṭā agne stanam ā rabhantām || imā gāvo vijāvatīḥ prajāvatī strīṣu saṃmanaso bhavantu | āsu bhūmāny api pṛñcantu devā āsāṃ vatsān āyuṣā medasā saṃ sṛjāmi || pra vīyantāṃ striyo gāvo viṣṇur yonim anu kalpayāti | pratigṛhṇatīr ṛṣabhasya reta ukṣānaḍvāṃś carati vāsitām anu || prayatam agraṃ na hinasti kiṃ cana yathākāmaṃ kṛṇuta somyaṃ madhu | sādhu yajñam ahutādo nayantu rāyaspoṣā yajamānaṃ sacantām || ni te padāṃ pṛthivī yantu sindhava ud oṣadhayo jihatāṃ preratām irāḥ | parjanyasya maruta udadhiṃ sānv ā hata bhadraṃ sasyaṃ pacyatāṃ modatāṃ jagat || sapta ṛṣayaḥ sapta sadāṃsy eṣāṃ daśa kṣipo aśvinoḥ pañca vājāḥ | prāṇo vyāno mana ākūtir vāg devī devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānatī || ye ca dṛṣṭā ye cādṛṣṭāḥ krimayaḥ kikṛśāś ca ye | teṣāṃ śirāṃsy asinā chinadmy athāsāṃ vatsān āyuṣā medasā saṃ sṛjāmi ||
anuvāka 3 ||
dyauś cemaṃ yajñaṃ pṛthivī ca saṃ duhātāṃ mātariśvā pavamānaḥ purastāt | tvaṣṭā vāyuḥ saha somena vāta imaṃ saṃ duhrām anapasphurantaḥ || gharmaṃ tapāmy amṛtasya dhārayā devebhyo havyaṃ paride savitre | śukraṃ devāḥ śṛtam adantu havyam āsañ juhvānam amṛtasya yonau || ud vāsayāgneḥ śṛtam akarma havyam ā roha pṛṣṭham amṛtasya dhāma | vanaspataya upa barhi stṛṇīta madhvā samantaṃ ghṛtavat karātha || yo 'psu yakṣmaḥ śamayāmi taṃ va ūrjā gavyūtiṃ sam anajmy etām | stanyaṃ kṣīram aviṣaṃ vaḥ kṛṇomy asuṃ dhayanto 'pi yūtham eta || asuṃ?; Bhatt. aśundhayanto iḍānāṃ putrā uta mitriyāṇāṃ payo dhayantv ahṛṇīyamānāḥ | ṛtubhiḥ sasyam uta kl̥ptam astv iryo gopā rakṣatu vāyur enāḥ || pibata ghṛtaṃ yatidhā va etad guhā hitaṃ nihitaṃ mānaveṣu | viśve devā vaiśvadevaś cāgnau yathābhāgaṃ haviṣo mādayadhvam || yo devānām asi śreṣṭho rudras tanticaro vṛṣā | ariṣṭā asmākaṃ vīrā etad astu hutaṃ tava || pūrṇam ahaṃ karīṣiṇaṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam | viśvebhir agne devair imaṃ goṣṭhaṃ sahāruham ||
devainasād unmaditaṃ kṣetriyāc chapathād uta | muñcantu tasmāt tvā devā unmattaṃ rakṣasas pari || muniṃ bhavantaṃ pari yāni vāvṛtū rakṣāṃsy agna ululā karikratu | atas tvaṃ no adhi pāhi vājinn indreṇa medī bṛhate raṇāya || yathāgne devā ṛbhavo manīṣiṇo munim unmattam asṛjan nir enasaḥ | evā te śakro abhayaṃ kṛṇotu mucyasvainaso vi nayāmi rakṣaḥ || yathā gāvaś ca bhūmyāṃ puruṣāś ca nyokasaḥ | evonmattasya te mune gṛhṇātu pṛthivī manaḥ || muniṃ dādhāra pṛthivī muniṃ dyaur abhi rakṣati | muniṃ hi viśvā bhūtāni munim indro adīdharat parā rakṣaḥ suvāmi te || imaṃ me agne puruṣaṃ mumugdhi ya āvitto grāhyā lālapīti | ato *'dhi te kṛṇavad bhāgadheyam anunmadito agado yathāsat || agniṣ ṭe ni śamayatu yat ta etan mana uhyate | read udyutam? (see Lubostky 2002, 90) juhomi vidvāṃs te havir yathānunmadito bhuvaḥ || punas tvā dur apsarasaḥ punar vātaḥ punar diśaḥ | punar yamaḥ punar yamasya dūtās te tvā muñcantv aṃhasaḥ | jivātave na martave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye ||
uta devā avahitaṃ devā ud dharatā punaḥ | uto mariṣyantaṃ devā daivāḥ kṛṇutha jīvase || ā tvāgamaṃ śaṃtātibhir Bhatt. śantātibhir atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ | dakṣaṃ te bhadram āhārṣaṃ parā suvāmy āmayat || dvāv imau vātau vāta ā sindhor ā parāvataḥ | dakṣaṃ te anya ā vātu parānyo vātu yad rapaḥ || ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ | tvaṃ hi viśvabheṣajo devānāṃ dūta īyase || trāyantām imaṃ devās trāyantāṃ maruto gaṇaiḥ | trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyam agado 'sati || ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī ghṛtenāpaḥ sam ukṣata | ghṛtena mucyasvainaso yad ātmakṛtam āritha || ayaṃ me hasto bhagavān ayaṃ me bhagavattaraḥ | ayaṃ me viśvabheṣajo 'yaṃ śivābhimarśanaḥ || hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhābhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī | anāmayitnubhyāṃ śaṃbhubhyāṃ tābhyāṃ tvābhi mṛśāmasi || āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ | āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam ||
sahṛdayaṃ sāṃmanasyam avidveṣaṃ kṛṇomi vaḥ | anyo anyam abhi haryata vatsaṃ jātam ivāghnyā || anuvrataḥ pituḥ putro mātrā bhavatu savrataḥ | jāyā patye madhumatīṃ vācaṃ vadatu śantivām || mā bhrātā bhrātaraṃ dvikṣan mā svasāram uta svasā | samyañcaḥ savratā bhūtvā vācaṃ vadata bhadrayā || yena devā na viyanti no ca vidviṣate mithaḥ | tat kṛṇmo brahma vo gṛhe saṃjñānaṃ puruṣebhyaḥ || jyāyasvantaś cittino mā vi yauṣṭa saṃrādhayantaḥ sadhurāś carantaḥ | anyo anyasmai valgu vadanta eta samagrā stha sadhrīcīnāḥ || samānī prapā saha vo 'nnabhāgaḥ samāne yoktre saha vo yunajmi | samyañco 'gniṃ saparyata- -arā nābhim ivābhitaḥ || yena devā haviṣā yajatrā apa pāpmānam aghnata | krodhaṃ manyum anṛtaṃ bhāmaṃ duruktam abhiśocanam āre yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi || sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasaḥ kṛṇomy ekaśnuṣṭīn saṃvananena saṃhṛdaḥ | devā ived amṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇāḥ sāyaṃprātaḥ susamitir vo astu ||
paro 'pehi paraś cara paras tarda parastaram | agner vātasya dhrājyā apa bādhe ahaṃ tvām || udakasyedam ayanaṃ vātasyedaṃ nibhañjanam | agner dhūmasyāyaṃ panthā neha tardāyanaṃ tava || pari tvā kṛṣṇavartanir agnir dhūmenārciṣā | sa tvaṃ tarda paraś cara- -anyat tarddhi tṛṇaṃ yavāt || ye tardā asureṣitā devebhir iṣitāś ca ye | sarvāṃs tān brahmaṇā vayaṃ śalabhāñ jambhayāmasi || śalabhasya śalabhyās tardasyo patatriṇaḥ | read perhaps tardasyotpatatriṇaḥ following Bhatt. agner vātasya dhrājyā- -api nahyāma āsyam || idaṃ yad gavi bheṣajaṃ viśvād rūpāt samābhṛtam | ākhor ghuṇasya tardasya teṣāṃ snāvnāpi nahyata || dṛṣṭā tvam asi gandhena- -oṣadhir ghuṇajambhanī | ākhor ghuṇasya jātāni tāni jambhaya tejasā || tūlaṃ tardas tṛṇasyāttu mūlam ākhur dhiyeṣitaḥ | atho vṛkṣasya phalgu yad ghuṇā adantu mā yavam ||
anuvāka 4 ||
dyauś ca naḥ pitā pṛthivī ca mātā- -agniś ca nṛcakṣā jātavedāḥ | te takmānam adharāñcaṃ nyañcaṃ daśāhnam asyantv adhi dūram asmat || takman yaṃ te kṣetrabhāgam apābhajaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pūrve ardhe | atihāya tam atha no hinassi grāhiḥ kila tvā grahīṣyati kilāsaśīrṣaḥ || takman parvatā ime himavantaḥ somapṛṣṭhāḥ | vātaṃ dūtaṃ bhiṣajaṃ no akran naśyeto maraṭām̐ abhi || na tvā striyaḥ kāmayante na pumāṃsaḥ katame cana | neha takmakāmyā- -alpo roditi no mahān || mā no hiṃsīr mahato mā hiṃsīr mahyas tvam | kumārān babhro mā hiṃsīr mā no hiṃsīḥ kumāryaḥ || yaḥ sākam utpātayasi balāsaṃ kāsam udrajam | bhīmās te takman hetayas tābhi ṣma pari vṛṅdhi naḥ || anyakṣetre na ramate sahasrākṣo 'martyaḥ | abhūd u prārthas takmā sa u no mṛḍayiṣyati || takman na ta ihāśvā na gāvo neha te gṛhāḥ | śakambharasya muṣṭihā punar gaccha mahāvṛṣān ||
yau hemantaṃ svāpayatho balena- -arvāg devebhya uta yau paro divaḥ | bhavārudrayoḥ sumatiṃ vṛṇīmahe 'nyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || yo dyām ātanoti yo 'ntarikṣaṃ stabhnāty ojaso jāyamānaḥ | tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || the refrain (2d, 3d, …, 8e, 9e) is written in K yayor vadhān nāpapadyate kiṃ cana- -antar deveṣūta mānuṣeṣu | tābhyāṃ rudrābhyāṃ haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || yāv īśāte paśūnāṃ pārthivānāṃ catuṣpadām uta vā ye dvipādaḥ | tābhyāṃ rudrābhyāṃ haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || yasya pratihitāyāḥ saṃ viśanta āraṇyāḥ paśava uta grāmyāsaḥ | tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || yasmād oṣadhayo barbhriyamāṇā yanti yasmād vṛkṣāso na viyanti viśve | vayāṃsi yasmāt pracaranti bhīṣā tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || yaḥ parvatān vidadhe 'ti vidvān yo bhūtāni kalpayati prajānan | tasmai rudrāya haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || yāv īśānau carato dvipado 'sya catuṣpadaḥ | yā ugrau kṣipradhanvānau tābhyāṃ rudrābhyāṃ haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu || punaś cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇaṃ punar āyur dhehi no jātavedaḥ | rudra jalāṣabheṣaja vidvāṃsas ta enā haviṣā vidhema- -anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā vy etu ||
īśānaṃ tvā bheṣajānāṃ vijeṣāya vṛṇīmahe | cakre sahasravīryaṃ sarasvān oṣadhe tvā || satyajitaṃ śapathayāvanīṃ sahamānāṃ punaḥsarām | sarvāḥ sam ahvy oṣadhīr ito mā pārayān iti || yā śaśāpa śapanena yā vā gha mūram ādadhe | yā vā rasasya prāśāya- -ārebhe tokam attu sā || pratīcīnaphalo hi tvam apāmārga babhūvitha | sarvān mac chapathām̐ adhi varīyo yāvayā tvam || yac ca bhrātṛvyaḥ śapati yac ca jāmiḥ śapāti naḥ | brahmā yan manyutaḥ śapāt sarvaṃ tan no adhaspadam || yāṃ te cakrur āme pātre yāṃ sūtre nīlalohite | āme māṃse kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrus tayā kṛtyākṛto jahi || duṣvapnyaṃ durjīvitaṃ rakṣo abhvam arāyyaḥ | durvācaḥ sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ tad ito nāśayāmasi || kṣudhāmāraṃ tṛṣṇāmāram agotām anapatyatām | apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe ||
samā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇa- -ahnā rātrī samāvatī | kṛṇomi satyam ūtaye arasāḥ santu kṛtvarīḥ || yo devāḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtvā harād aviduṣo gṛham | vatso dhārur iva mātaraṃ taṃ pratyag upa padyatām || amā kṛtvā pāpmānaṃ yas tayānyaṃ jighāṃsati | aśmānas tasyāṃ dagdhāyāṃ bahulāḥ phaṭ karikratu || sahasradhāman viśikhān vigrīvāñ chāyayā tvam | prati sma cakruṣe kṛtyāṃ priyāṃ priyāvate hara || yā cakāra na śaśāka śaśre pādam aṅgulim | cakāra bhadram asmabhyam abhagā bhagavadbhyaḥ || anayāham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyā adūṣayam | yāṃ kṣetre cakrur yāṃ gobhyo yāṃ vā te puruṣebhyaḥ || apāmārgo 'pa mārṣṭu kṣetriyaṃ śapathāṃś ca mat | apāha yātudhānyo 'pa sarvā arāyyaḥ || apamṛjya yātudhānān apa sarvā arāyyaḥ | apāmārga prajayā tvaṃ rayyā sacasva naḥ ||
utevāsy abandhukṛd utāsy anujāmikaḥ | uto kṛtyākṛtaḥ prajāṃ naḍam ivā chindhi vārṣikam || brāhmaṇena paryukto 'si kaṇvena nārṣadena | senevaiṣi tviṣīmatī na tatra bhayam asti yatra prāpnoṣy oṣadhe || agre 'sy oṣadhīnāṃ jyotiṣevābhidīpayan | uta pākasya trātāsy uta hantāsi rakṣasaḥ || yad ado devā asurāṃs tvayāgre nirakṛṇvata | tasmād adhi tvam oṣadhe apāmārgo ajāyathāḥ || vibhindatī śataśākhā vibhindan nāma te pitā | pratyag vi bhindhi taṃ tvaṃ yo asmām̐ abhidāsati || asad bhūmyāḥ sam abhavat tad dyām eti bṛhad vacaḥ | tad it tato vidhūmayat pratyak kartāram ṛcchatu || pratyaṅ hi saṃbabhūvitha pratīcīnaphalas tvam | pratīcīḥ kṛtyā ākṛtya- -amuṃ kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi || śatena mā pari pāhi sahasreṇābhi rakṣa mā | indras te vīrudhāṃ pata ugra ojmānam ā dadhau ||
anuvāka 5 ||
arātyā dyāvāpṛthivī chintaṃ mūlam atho śiraḥ | vicchidya madhyataḥ pṛṣṭīs Lubotsky pṛṣṭhīs (misprint) tāṃ kṛṇvāthām adhaspadam || idaṃ śṛṇu jātavedo yad amuṣyā vaco mama | arātyāḥ sarvam ic chiraḥ praśnaṃ vṛhatam aśvinā || yā svapnayā carati gaur bhūtvā janām̐ anu | arātim indra tvaṃ jahi tām agnir ivasā dahāt || śreṣṭho me rājā varuṇo havaṃ satyena gacchatu | arātiṃ hatvā santokām ugro devo 'bhi dāsatu || deṣṭrī ca yā sinīvālī sapta ca śrotyā yāḥ | arātiṃ viśvā bhūtāni ghnantu dāsīm ivāgasi || somo rājauṣadhībhiḥ sūryācandramasā ubhā | arātiṃ sarve gandharvā ghnantv apsarasaś ca yāḥ || bhavo rājā bhavāśarvāv indro vāyur bṛhaspatiḥ | tvaṣṭā me adhyakṣaḥ pūṣā te 'rātiṃ ghnantu sarvadā || ye ca devā bhūmicarā ye cāmī divy āsate | ye antarikṣasyeśate te 'rātiṃ ghnantu savratāḥ || yā ceṣitāsurair devebhir iṣitā ca yā | atho yā manyor jāyate 'rātiṃ hanmi brahmaṇā ||
tad in nu me acacchadan mahad yakṣaṃ bṛhad vapuḥ | viśvair yad devair nirṛtis tanā yujā saṃ mṛtyor iha jāyate || amamriścitsāprathovadadahim ahirājantam ojasā | āyuṃ cit kutsam atithigvam ardaya vi nikilbindam ojasā || yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad vā sapta sindhavo mahitvā | tāvatī nirṛtir viśvavārā viśvasya yā jāyamānasya veda || viśvasya hi jāyamānasya devi puṣṭasya vā puṣṭapatir babhūvitha | namo 'stu te nirṛte mā tv asmān parā bhujo nāparaṃ hātayāsi || devīm ahaṃ nirṛtiṃ manyamānaḥ piteva putraṃ na sace vacobhiḥ | viśvasya yā jāyamānasya veda śiraḥśiraḥ prati sūro 'nu tasthe || asunvantam ayajamānam iccha stenasyetyāṃ taskarasyānu śikṣa | svapantam iccha sā ta ityā namas tu te nirṛte 'haṃ kṛṇomi || asunvakān nirṛtiḥ saṃjighatsur nāsyāḥ pitā vidyate nota mātā | madhyāt svasrām anu jaghāna sarvaṃ na devānām asuryaṃ sam āpa || yad asya pāre tamasaḥ śukraṃ jyotir ajāyata | tan naḥ parṣad ati dviṣo 'gne vaiśvānara dyumat ||
pramucyamānaṃ bhuvanasya gopaḥ paśuṃ no atra prati bhāgam etu | agnir yajñaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantuṃ devo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan || yau te daṃṣṭrau sudihau ropayiṣṇū nir hvayete dakṣiṇāḥ saṃ ca paśyataḥ | anāṣṭraṃ naḥ pitaras tat kṛṇotu yūpe baddhaṃ pramumucimā yad annam || ahrastas tvam aviduṣṭaḥ parehi- -indrasya goṣṭham api dhāva vidvān | dhīrāsas tvā kavayaḥ saṃ mṛjantv iṣam ūrjaṃ yajamānāya matsva || ṛṣibhiṣ ṭvā saptabhir atriṇāhaṃ prati gṛhṇāmi bhuvane syonam | jamadagniḥ kaśyapaḥ svādv etad bharadvājo madhv annaṃ kṛṇotu | pratigrahītre gotamo vasiṣṭho viśvāmitro daduṣe śarma yacchāt || yan no agraṃ haviṣa ājagāma- -annasya pātram uta sarpiṣo vā | read prattam? yad vā dhanaṃ vahator ājagāma- -agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu || yad ājyaṃ pratijagrabha yāṃś ca vrīhīn ajaṃ candreṇa saha yaj jaghāsa | bṛhaspatir haviṣo no vidhartā mā no hiṃsīc chāgo aśvo vaśā ca || agnir na etat prati gṛhṇātu vidvān bṛhaspatiḥ praty etu prajānan | indro marutvān suhutaṃ kṛṇotv ayakṣmam anamīvaṃ te astu || yan no dadur varāham akṣitaṃ vasu yad vā talpam upadhānena naḥ saha | yad vāviyūthaṃ saha vṛṣṇyā no agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu || yan naḥ śālāṃ viśvabhogām imāṃ dadur gṛhaṃ vā yoktraṃ saha kṛttyota | yad vā hara upanāhena devā read vāhara (sandhi for vā āhare)? agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu ||
sūrye varca iti yac chuśravāhaṃ yena prajā jyotiragrāś caranti | some varco yad goṣu varco mayi devā rāṣṭrabhṛtas tad akran || yajñe varco maruto yad adṛṃhan vāyuḥ paśūn asṛjat saṃ bhagena | gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ yad apsu mayi (…) || see 1d yajñe varco yajamāne ca varca udābhiṣikte rājani yac ca varcaḥ | dakṣiṇāyāṃ varco adhi yan (…) || see 1d rathe varco rathavāhane ca varca iṣudhau varcaḥ kavace ca varcaḥ | aśveṣu varco adhi yan (…) || see 1d sabhāyāṃ varcaḥ samityāṃ ca varco vadhvāṃ varca uta varco vareṣu | surāyāṃ varco adhi yan (…) || see 1d siṃhe varca uta varco vyāghre vṛke varco madhuhāre ca varcaḥ | śyene varcaḥ patvanāṃ yad babhūva (…) || see 1d hiraṇyavarcasam uta hastivarcasaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ yaj jajñuṣāṃ varca āhuḥ | read saṃgrāme? kṛṣyāṃ kṣetra ṛṣayo janyānajur mayi devā rāṣṭrabhṛtas tad akran || mayi varco mayi śravo mayi dyumnaṃ mayi tviṣiḥ | adhaspadaṃ pṛtanyavo 'haṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ||
payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ | atho payasvatāṃ paya ā harāmi sahasraśaḥ || ahaṃ veda yathā payaś cakāra dhānyaṃ bahu | saṃbhṛtvā nāmā yo devas taṃ vayaṃ yajāmahe sarvasyāyajvano gṛhe || yathā dyauś ca pṛthivī ca tasthatur dharuṇāya kam | evā sphātiṃ ni tanomi mayāreṣu khaleṣu ca || yathā kūpaḥ śatadhāraḥ sahasradhāro akṣitaḥ | evā me astu dhānyaṃ sahasradhāram akṣitam || śatahasta samāhara sahasrahasta saṃ kira | yatheha sphātir āyati kṛtasya kāryasya ca || imā yāḥ pañca pradiśo mānavīḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ | sarvāḥ śaṃbhūr mayobhuvo vṛṣṭe śāpaṃ nadīr iva- -iha sphātiṃ samāvahān || iha sphātir oṣadhīnāṃ devānām uta saṃgamaḥ | ihaivāśvinor astu dvāparāśvo ruhat || tisro mātrā gandharvāṇāṃ catasro gṛhapatnyāḥ | tāsāṃ yā sphātir uttamā tayā tvābhi mṛśāmasi || jyeṣṭhasya tvāṅgirasasya hastābhyām ā rabhāmahe | yathāsad bahudhānyam ayakṣmaṃ bahupūruṣam ||
anuvāka 6 ||
atyāsarat prathamā dhokṣyamāṇā sarvān yajñān bibhratī vaiśvadevī | upa vatsaṃ sṛjata vāśyate gaur vy asṛṣṭa sumanā hiṃ kṛṇoti || badhāna vatsam abhi dhehi bhuñjatīṃ ni dya godhug upa sīda dugdhi | iḍām asmā odanaṃ pinvamānā kīlālaṃ ghṛtaṃ madam annabhāgam || sā dhāvatu yamarājñaḥ savatsā sukṛtāṃ pathā prathameha dattā | atṛṣṭa dattā prathamedam āgan vatsena gāṃ saṃ sṛja viśvarūpām || prathamedam āgan prathamā dattetād yasmim̐l loke sadya u tvā dadāti | sainaṃ dheno prathamā pārayāsi śraddhayā dattā parame vyoman || jānīhi sma saṃskṛte dheno gopatiṃ yas tvā dadāti prathamāṃ svadhānām | pūrvā hi tatra sukṛtaḥ parehy athaiṣa aitā jarasaḥ parastāt || ati dhenur anaḍvāham aty anyad vayo akramīt | ati vatsānāṃ pitaraṃ ṛṣabhaṃ pratimāsarat || read ṛṣabham atimāsarat? (see PS 5.31.7d) jyotiṣmatī sukṛto yāhi sūre syonās te dheno patayo bhavantu | sapta tvā sūryā anvātapantu yamaṃ dhāva māti saraḥ parācīḥ || read parācaiḥ with K? (see PS 5.37.5c) dātre *'mutra mahyaṃ duhānā- -ubhau lokau bhuñjatī vi kramasva | iṣam ūrjaṃ dakṣiṇāḥ saṃvasānā bhagasya dhārām avase pratīmaḥ || sahasrāṅgā śataṃ jyotīṃṣy asyā yajñasya paprir amṛtā svargā | sā na aitu dakṣiṇā viśvarūpā- -ahiṃsantīṃ prati gṛhṇīma enām ||
ye te pāśā varuṇa sapta saptatīs tredhā tiṣṭhanti viṣitā ruśantaḥ | sinanti sarve anṛtaṃ vadantaṃ yaḥ satyavādy ati taṃ sṛjanti || iha spaśaḥ pra carantīme asya sahasrākṣā ati paśyanti bhūmim | yo 'sya vrataṃ pramināti kaś ca na sa mucyate varuṇasya pāśāt || uteyam asya pṛthivī samīcy utāsau dyaur bṛhatī dūreantā | uto samudro varuṇasya kukṣā utāsminn alpa udake namuktaḥ || yas tiṣṭhati manasā yaś ca vañcati yo nilāyaṃ carati yaḥ pralāyam | dvau yadyad vadataḥ sanniṣadya rājā tad veda varuṇas tṛtīyaḥ || sarvaṃ tad rajā varuṇo vi caṣṭe yad antarā rodasī yat parastāt | saṃkhyātā asya nimiṣo janānām akṣān na śvaghnī bhuvanā mimīte || tvam eva rājan varuṇa dhartā devānām asi viśvarūpaḥ | duścarmāstv adhamaḥ piśaṅgo yaḥ satyāṃ vācam anṛtena hanti || yaḥ samāmyo varuṇo yo vyāmyo yaḥ sandeśyo varuṇo yo videśyaḥ | yo daivyo varuṇo yaś ca mānuṣaḥ sarvāṃs tve tān prati muñcāmy atra || śatena pāśair varuṇābhi dhehi mā te mocy anṛtavāṅ nṛcakṣaḥ | āstāṃ jālma udaraṃ śraṃsayitvā kośa ivābandhraḥ parikṛtyamānaḥ || uto tvat pra pātayaty uto tvad api nahyati | uto tvad asvakaṃ kṛtvā rājā varuṇa īyate || ainaṃ chinatti varuṇo naḍaṃ kaśipune yathā | mūlaṃ tasya vṛścati ya enaṃ pramimīṣati ||
ya imāṃ devo mekhalām ābabandha yaḥ saṃnanāha ya u mā yuyoja | yasya devasya praśiṣā carāmi sa pāram icchāt sa u mā vi muñcāt || āhutāsy abhihuta ṛṣīṇām asy āyudham | pūrvā vratasya prāśnatī vīraghnī bhava mekhale || mṛtyor ahaṃ brahmacārī yad asmi bhūtān niryācan puruṣaṃ yamāya | tam ahaṃ brahmaṇā tapasā śrameṇa- -anayainaṃ mekhalayā sināmi || ayaṃ vajras tarpayatāṃ vratena- -avāsya rāṣṭram abhi hantu jīvam | bhinattu skandhān pra śṛṇātūṣṇihāḥ || adharottaram adharottareṇa gūḍhaḥ pṛthivyā mot sṛpat | vajreṇāvahataḥ śayām || yo jināti tam anv iccha yo jināti tam ij jahi | jinato vajra sāyaka sīmantam anvañcam anu pātaya || yad aśnāmi balaṃ kurve vajram ā dadā iti | skandhān amuṣya śātayan vṛtrasyeva śacīpatiḥ || yat pibāmi saṃ pibāmi samudra iva saṃpibaḥ | prāṇān amuṣya saṃpiban saṃ pibāmy ahaṃ pibam || yad girāmi saṃ girāmi samudra iva saṃgiraḥ | prāṇān amuṣya saṃgiran saṃ girāmy ahaṃ giram || śraddhāyā duhitā tapaso 'dhi jātā svasa rṣīṇāṃ bhūtakṛtāṃ babhūva | sā no mekhale matim ā dhehi medhām atho no dhehi tapa indriyaṃ ca || yāṃ tvā pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayaḥ paribedhire | sā tvaṃ pari ṣvajasva mā dīrghāyutvāya mekhale ||
aśaṃ te śvaśrūr vadatu śvaśuras te aśantaram | devā te abhiśocanaṃ brahma vidveṣaṇaṃ kṛtam || ā krandayolulā kuru vācam ā dhehy apriyām | śiro lipsasva hastābhyāṃ keśās te abhiśocanam || ye keśā yau pratidhī yat kurīraṃ ya opaśaḥ | atho ye te svāḥ santi sarve te te 'bhiśocanam || apa trasa paridhānād unmādanaṃ kṛṇomi te | atho yat te svaṃ vāsaḥ sarvaṃ tat te 'bhiśocanam || arkam addhi pra patāto municakṣuṃ kṛṇomi te | atho śvabhyo rāyadbhyaḥ prati sma gaṅgaṇaṃ kuru || ut tiṣṭhāre palāyasva marīcīnāṃ padaṃ bhava | atho yat kāryaṃ kurv āśāṃ sam ṛṣa muṣkayoḥ || see Lubotsky 2002, 155-156 upa kṣvedābhi cālaya vātas tūlam ivaijaya | dadbhiḥ saṃdaśya bāhvor udaddhi muravasthiye || abhi gāya śābaleyaṃ śauṇeyaṃ sādhuvāhinam | kālmāṣeyasya carkṛdhy āyataḥ prati cālaya || ṛśyapucchaṃ śunaḥpucchaṃ vātaraṃhaṃ manojavam | taṃ te rathaṃ saṃ bharantu devās tenā carāsi patim icchamānā ||
agnaye sam anaman tasmai pṛthivyā sam anaman | yathāgnaye pṛthivyā samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu | vittiṃ bhūtiṃ puṣṭiṃ paśūn brahma brāhmaṇavarcasam | saṃnataya stha saṃ me namata svāhā || vāyave sam anaman tasmā antarikṣeṇa sam anaman | yathā vāyave antarikṣeṇa samanaman (…) || see 1cdef sūryāya sam anaman tasmai divā sam anaman | yathā sūryāya divā samanaman (…) || see 1cdef candrāya sam anaman tasmai nakṣatraiḥ sam anaman | yathā candrāya nakṣatraiḥ samanaman (…) || see 1cdef somāya sam anaman tasmā oṣadhībhiḥ sam anaman | yathā somāyauṣadhībhiḥ samanaman (…) || see 1cdef yajñāya sam anaman tasmai dakṣiṇābhiḥ sam anaman | yathā yajñāya dakṣiṇābhiḥ samanaman (…) || see 1cdef samudrāya sam anaman tasmai nadībhiḥ sam anaman | yathā samudrāya nadībhiḥ samanaman (…) || see 1cdef brahmaṇe sam anaman tasmai brahmacāribhiḥ sam anaman | yathā brahmaṇe brahmacāribhiḥ samanaman (…) || see 1cdef indrāya sam anaman tasmai vīryeṇa sam anaman | yathendrāya vīryeṇa samanaman (…) || see 1cdef devebhyaḥ sam anaman tebhyo 'mṛtena sam anaman | yathā devebhyo 'mṛtena samanaman (…) || see 1cdef prajāpataye sam anaman tasmai prajābhiḥ sam anaman | yathā prajāpataye prajābhiḥ samanamann evā mahyaṃ saṃnamaḥ saṃ namantu | vittiṃ bhūtiṃ puṣṭiṃ paśūn brahma brāhmaṇavarcasam | saṃnataya stha saṃ me namata svāhā || sapta saṃnamo 'ṣṭamī dhītisādhanī | sakāmān adhvanaḥ kṛṇu saṃjñānam astu vo dhane ||
anuvāka 7 ||
ye vāruṇā uta nairṛtā vanaspatīnāṃ vīrudhāṃ ca pāśāḥ | ye bhaumā bhūmyā adhi saṃbabhūvus te tvā na hiṃsāñ chivatātir astu te || ye antarikṣe divi ye ca pāśā anne vicṛttā bahudhā sinanti | ye paśubhyo adhi saṃbabhūvus te tvā na hiṃsāñ chivatātir astu te || yaṃ mānuṣaṃ manuṣyāḥ śapante Bhatt. yan yāṃ vā hotrāṃ pitryām ārabhante | samāmyo varuṇo ya ājagāma sa tvā na hiṃsāc chivatātir astu te || apaḥ pragāhya yadi vā samāmiṣe agnim ārebhiṣe yadi vā samiddham | vidvān avidvān anṛtaṃ yad uvaktha tat tvā na hiṃsāc chivatātir astu te || the refrain (4d, 5d, 6e, 7e) is written in K yat pratīcyāṃ dṛṣatpiṣṭām̐ āmapeṣām̐ āmapātre papātha | hīnaḥ satyenānṛtaṃ yad uvaktha tat tvā na hiṃsāc chivatātir astu te || yaṃ bāṇavantaṃ sudihaṃ saṃbharanti yaṃ vā hastaṃ brāhmaṇasyārabhante | samāmyo varuṇo yaṃ jaghāna tasya śmaśānād adhi loṣṭa ābhṛtaḥ sa tvā na hiṃsāc chivatātir astu te || yaṃ grāvāṇam ārabhante yenāṃśūn abhiṣuṇvanti somam | yad vā dhanaṃ dhanakāmo niremiṣe kṣetraṃ gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ vobhayādat tat tvā na hiṃsāc chivatātir astu te || apaḥ pragāhya yadi vā vyāmiṣe agnim ārebhiṣe yadi vā samiddham | jāmyā hastaṃ kṛtam ārebhiṣe read gṛhyam instead of kṛtam?) dhanur vottatam iti cakramitha | manyau vā rājño varuṇasyāsi saktaḥ sa tvā na hiṃsāc chivatātir astu te ||
yā te prajāpihitā parābhūd yonir vā mugdhā nihitā piśācaiḥ | āsnānaṃ vā yad abhitaṣṭhātha ghoraṃ sarvaṃ tat te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi || yady asyāḥ prajā varuṇena guṣpitā durṇāmāno vā ṛtviyam asyā rihanti | dveṣāt sāpatnād yadi cakrur asyā ayaṃ tā nāṣṭrā apa hantv agniḥ || asyā striyā yadi lakṣmīr aputryā garbho vāsyā yātudhānaiḥ parābhṛtaḥ | duḥsvapnyaṃ vā yat svapatī dadarśa- -indrāgnī tat kṛṇutāṃ bhadrayā punaḥ || devainasād yadi putraṃ na vindase manuṣyāṇāṃ vā tvā śapatho rarādha | pitṛbhir vā te yadi sūtaḥ pariṣṭhita idaṃ taṃ niṣ kṛṇmo janayāsi putram || vaiśvānaro janmanā jātavedāḥ prajāpatiḥ siñcatu reto asyām | bādhatāṃ dveṣo nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ putriṇīm imāṃ prasvaṃ kṛṇotu || iha prajām agnir asyai dadhātv ādityebhir vasubhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ | viśve devā havam ā yantu ma imaṃ putro asyā jāyatāṃ vīryāvān || yena devy aditir garbham ādadhe yena prajā asṛjata prajāpatiḥ | tenāham asyai haviṣā juhomi yathā pumāṃsaṃ janayāti putram || vanve te putraṃ pari devatābhyo anu manyantāṃ marutaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ | garbhas tvā daśamāsyaḥ pra viśatu kumāraṃ jātaṃ pipṛtām upasthe ||
keśy agniṃ keśī viṣaṃ keśī bibharti rodasī | keśī viśvaṃ svar dṛśe keśīdaṃ jyotir ucyate || munayo vātaraśanāḥ piśaṅgā vasate malāḥ | vātasyānu dhrājiṃ yanti yad devāso ayukṣata || unmaditā mauneyena vātām̐ ā tasthimā vayam | śarīred asmākaṃ yūyaṃ martāso abhi paśyatha || antarikṣeṇa patati svar bhūtāvacākaśat | munir devasya-devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ || indrasyāśvo vāyoḥ sakhā- -atho deveṣito muniḥ | ubhā samudrāv ā kṣayati sadyaḥ pūrvam utāparam || gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ devānāṃ caraṇe caran | muniḥ ketasya saṃvidvān sakhā svādur madintamaḥ || vāyur asmā upāmanthat pinaṣṭi smā kunaṃnamā | munir viṣasya pātreṇa yad rudreṇāpibat saha || saṃyukte dyāvāpṛthivī tiṣṭhantī avicartye | keśenaikasya devasya vy aṣṭabhnāc chacīpatiḥ ||
na tam aṃho na duritaṃ devāso aṣṭa martyam | sajoṣaso yam aryamā mitro nayanti varuṇo ati dviṣaḥ || tad dhi vayaṃ vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitrāryaman | yan no nir aṃhaso yūyaṃ pātha nethā ca martyam ati dviṣaḥ || te nūnaṃ no yūyam ūtaye varuṇa (…) | nayiṣṭhā no neṣiṇa stha parṣiṣṭāḥ parṣiṇo ati dviṣaḥ || śunam asmabhyam ūtaye varuṇa mitrāryaman | śarma yacchātha sapratha ādityāso yad īmahe ati dviṣaḥ || ādityāso ati sridho varuṇo mitro aryamā | rudraṃ marudbhir ugraṃ huvema- -indram agniṃ svastaye ati dviṣaḥ || netāra ū ṣu ṇas tiro varuṇo mitro aryamā | ati viśvāni duritā rājānaś carṣaṇīnām ati dviṣaḥ || yūyaṃ viśvaṃ pari pātha varuṇa mitrāryaman | yuṣmākaṃ śarmaṇi priyā read priye with RV?; Lubotsky priyāḥ syāma supraṇītayo 'ti dviṣaḥ || yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ | evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ ||
devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūto brāhmaṇebhyo nir vapāmi | sa me mā kṣeṣṭa sadam aśyamānaḥ pitṝṇāṃ loke || anumataṃ pṛthivyemaṃ pacāmy anu me dyaur manyatām anv antarikṣam | anu manyatām aditir devaputrā ime svarge loke astu || brahmaṇokhām adhi dadhāmy agnau bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhārayāmi | agniḥ pacan rakṣatv odanam imaṃ rakṣaḥpiśācān nudatāṃ jātavedāḥ || acyutam akṣitaṃ viśvadānīm utsam iva sadam akṣīyamāṇam | pitā pitāmaha uta yas tṛtīyas ta enaṃ bhāgam upa jīvantv atra || prapīnam akṣitaṃ viśvadānīṃ somam iva punar āpyāyamānam | putraḥ pautra uta yaḥ prapautras teṣām astu nihito bhāga eṣaḥ || mā me jārīn nihito bhāga eṣa mānuṣanmānuṣad gupto astu | emend. Griffiths: mānuṣānmānuṣād ‘from each and every man’ vaivasvate ni dadhe śevadhim etaṃ tasmā ut sṛjatu mahyam eva || punaḥ pūryatāṃ yad adanty asya- -odano 'yaṃ tiṣṭhatv akṣitaḥ sadā | vaivasvatena gupto astu rājñā mamaitor upa jīvantu me svāḥ || śatadhāraṃ sahasradhāram utsam akṣitaṃ vyacyamānaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe | ūrjaṃ duhānam anapasphurantam upāsīya sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ ||
anuvāka 8 ||
Kāṇḍa 6
tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ | sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yaṃ viśve madanty ūmāḥ || vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrur dāsāya bhiyasaṃ dadhāti | avyanac ca vyanac ca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu || tve kratum api pṛñcanti viśve dvir yad ete trir bhavanty ūmāḥ | svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam adaḥ su madhu madhunābhi yodhīḥ || iti cid dhi tvā dhanā jayantaṃ raṇeraṇe anumadanti viprāḥ | ojīyo dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevā yātudhānāḥ || tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri | codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śyāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi || stuṣeyyaṃ puruvarpasam ṛbhvam inatamam āptyam āptyānām | ā darśate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate pratimānāni bhūri || ni tad dadhiṣe 'varaṃ paraṃ ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe | ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū ata inoṣi karvarā purūṇi || imā brahma bṛhaddivo vivakti- -indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ | maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājo duraś ca viśvā avṛṇod apa svāḥ || evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvā- -avocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva | svasāro mātaribhvarīr ariprā hinvanti ca śavasā vardhayanti ca ||
ṛdhaṅmandrayoninovibhāvā amṛtāsuḥ sujanmā vardhamānaḥ | adabdhāsur bhrājamāno 'heva trito dādhāra trīṇi || ni yo dharmaṇi prathamaḥ sasāda- -ato vapūṃṣi kṛṇute purūṇi | dhāsyur yoniṃ prathama ā viveśa- -ā yo vācam anuditāṃ cikāya || yas te śokas tanva ārireca kṣarad dhiraṇyaṃ śucayo 'nu svāḥ | atrā dadhiṣe amṛtāni nāma- -asme vastrāṇīṣa erayanta || pra yad ete prataraṃ pūrvyaṃ guḥ sadaḥsada ātiṣṭhanto ajuryam | kaviḥ śuṣasya mātarā rihāṇe jāmirvadhuryuḥpratimānimīta || tad ū ṣu te mahā pṛthuryaman namaḥ kaviḥ kāvyenākṛṇot | yat samyañco 'bhiyanto *'dhi kṣām adhā mahī rodhacakrā vavardha || sapta maryādāḥ kavayas tatakṣus tāsām id ekām abhy aṃhuro gāt | utāmṛtāsur vṛta eṣi kṛṇvann asura āptaḥ svadhayā samadguḥ || utāyur jyeṣṭho ratnā dadhāty ūrjā vā yaṃ sacate kavir dāḥ | putro vā yat pitarā kṣatram īrte jyeṣṭhaṃ maryādam ahvayan svasti || darśan nu tān varuṇa ye ta iṣṭāv āvarvṛtataḥ kṛṇavo vapūṃṣi | ardham ardhena śavasā pṛṇakṣy ardhena śuṣmaṃ vardhase *'mūra || avīvṛdhāma śagmyaṃ sakhāyaṃ varuṇaṃ putram aditer iṣiram | kaviśastāny asmai vacāṃsy avocāma rodasī satyavācau ||
ko vaḥ paścāt prāvicchāyat kaḥ puraḥ prākhanat pathaḥ | yadaita tvaramāṇā varuṇaprasūtā āpaḥ || prajāpatir asṛjata sa puraḥ prākhanat pathaḥ | sa u no anv avāsṛjat tena sṛṣṭāḥ kṣarāmasi || punānā āpo bahudhā sravanti- -imāṃś ca lokān pradiśaś ca sarvāḥ | punantv asmān duritād avadyān muñcantu mṛtyor nirṛter upasthāt || āpo asmān mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapuvaḥ punantu | viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi || āpo devīr mātaraḥ sūdayiṣṇavo ghṛtaścuto madhunā saṃ papṛcre | tā asmabhyaṃ sūrayo viśvam āyuḥ kṣapa usrā varivasyantu śubhrāḥ || udakasyodakatamā revattamā revatīnām | śundhantām āpaḥ śundhantv asmān || yūyam āpo vīraśriyo yūyaṃ sūdayathā śucīn | yuṣmākam id diśo mahīr īyante pradiśaḥ pṛthak || yūyaṃ mitrasya varuṇasya yonir yūyaṃ somasya dhenavo madhiṣṭhāḥ | yuṣmān devīr deva ā kṣiyatīndur yūyaṃ jinvata brahmakṣatram āpaḥ || śaśvad ābhiḥ śāśadānāḥ śamanānvayāmasi | āpo viśvasya sūdanīr yā devā manave dadhuḥ || yad dhāvanti punate tad āpo yat tiṣṭhanti śuddhā it tad bhavanti | nāsām avadyam avidaṃ na ripraṃ sanād eva madhunā saṃ papṛcre || hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ pra cakramur hitvāvadyam āpaḥ | śataṃ ca vaḥ prasravaṇeṣu devīḥ sahasraṃ ca pavitāraḥ punanti || tās tādṛśīr brahmāṇaṃ sūdayanty aṅgoṣṭhyā stotryā jīvadhanyāḥ | yā viśvasya śucikṛto ayātor gāva iva payasā sthā sujātāḥ || viśvād riprān muñcata sindhavo no yāny enāṃsi cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ | indrapraśiṣṭā varuṇaprasūtā ā siñcatāpo madhv ā samudre ||
rātrī mātā nabhaḥ pitā- -aryamā te pitāmahaḥ | śilācī nāma vā asi sā devānām asi svasā || yas tvā pibati jīvati trāyase puruṣaṃ tvam | dhartrī ca śaśvatām asi śaśvatāṃ ca nyañcanī || yad daṇḍena yad iṣvā yad arur harasā kṛtam | tasya tvam asi bheṣajī niṣkṛtir nāma vā asi || bhadrā plakṣe ni tiṣṭhasy aśvatthe khadire dhave | bhadrā nyagrodhe parṇe sā na ehy arundhati || vṛkṣaṃvṛkṣam ā rohasi vṛṣaṇyantīva kanyalā | jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī saṃjayā nāma vā asi || hiraṇyavarṇe yuvate śuṣme lomaśavakṣaṇe | apām asi svasā lākṣe vāto hātmā babhūva te || hiraṇyabāho subhage sūryavarṇe vapuṣṭame | rutaṃ gacchati niṣkṛtiḥ semaṃ niṣkṛdhi pūruṣam || ghṛtācī nāma kānīno 'jababhru pitā tava | aśvo yamasya yaḥ śyāvas tasya hāsnāsy ukṣitā || aśvasyāsnaḥ saṃpatitā sā parṇam abhi ṣiṣyadaḥ | sarā patatriṇy asi sā na ehy arundhati || ghṛtācike vātarathe vidyutparṇe arundhati | āturaṃ gamiṣṭhāsi tvam aṅga niṣkarīyasī || yat te jagdhaṃ piśācais tat ta ā pyāyatāṃ punaḥ | lākṣā tvā viśvabheṣajī devebhis trāyatāṃ saha ||
yathā dyauś ca pṛthivī ca na bibhīto na riṣyataḥ | evā me prāṇa mā bibher evā me 'pāna mā riṣaḥ || yathā vāyuś cāntarikṣaṃ ca (…) || yathā sūryaś ca candramāś ca (…) || yathāhaś ca rātrī ca (…) || yathā dhenuś cānaḍvāṃś ca (…) || yathā mitraś ca varuṇaś ca (…) || yathā brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca (…) || yathendraś cendriyaṃ ca (…) || yathā vīraś ca vīryaṃ ca (…) || yathā prāṇaś cāpānaś ca (…) || yathā mṛtyuś cāmṛtaṃ ca (…) || yathā satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca (…) || yathā bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca na bibhīto na riṣyataḥ | evā me prāṇa mā bibher evā me 'pāna mā riṣaḥ ||
anuvāka 1 ||
madhuman me nikramaṇaṃ madhuman me parāyaṇam | vācā madhumad udyāsam akṣyau me madhusaṃdṛśī || mām anu prasārayan mama patto nipedivān | atho me punar āyato akṣyau kāmena śuṣyatām || vaśā madhugha te mātā- -ukṣā bhrātarṣabhaḥ pitā | dhenvā adhi prajāto 'si rājā san madhumattamaḥ || vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣṇyāvantaṃ somapṛṣṭhaṃ divi śritam | indrāṇy agra ābharan madhughaṃ bhagāya kam || pitubhojano madhughaḥ śauṣkāsyo hṛdayāya kam | sa mā madhunānaktu yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā || sindhuprajāno madhugho aśva iva nīyate janām̐ anu | sa mā (…) || madhumatī sinīvālī madhunā mā sam ukṣatu | sā mā madhunānaktu yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā || yathā madhu madhukṛto nyañjanti madhāv adhi | evā ny anajmi te mano adhy asyāṃ māmakī tanū || yat te manaḥ parāgataṃ yad baddham iha veha vā | tat ta ā vartayāmasi mayi badhnāmi te manaḥ ||
kaśyapaś ca suparṇaś ca yan marīcyām atiṣṭhatām | suparṇaḥ pary avāpaśyat samudre bhūmim āvṛtām || yāṃ suparṇaḥ paryapaśyad antar mahaty arṇave | tāṃ sūkara tvaṃ māyayā triḥ samudrād ud ābharaḥ || yaṃ samudrād udabharo bhūmiṃ sūkara māyayā | saiṣā viṣasya dūṣaṇy asmai bhavatu bheṣajī || acyutā hiraṇyena yā satye adhitiṣṭhati | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare || yasyāḥ kulāyam ity ekā || yasyā bhūmyā upajīkā gṛhaṃ kṛṇvata ātmane | tasyās te viśvadhāyaso viṣadūṣaṇam ud bhare || yas tvā bhūme 'nvavindad yas tvā bhūma udābharat | tayoḥ sahasradhāmann ahaṃ nāmāni jagrabha || yāni ta indro akṛṇod bhūme nāmāni vṛtrahā | tāni te babhroḥ saṃ vidma sehaidhi viṣadūṣaṇī || yāni te marutaś cakrur yāni saptarṣayo viduḥ | viśva ādityā yāṃ viduḥ sā bhūmir viṣadūṣaṇī ||
sahasva yātudhānān sahasva yātudhānyaḥ | sahasva sarvā rakṣāṃsi sahamānāsy oṣadhe || sahamāne sahasvati sahanty ahamuttare | utāham asmi sāsahiḥ sāsahe vaḥ sadānvāḥ || yā sahamānā carasi sāsahāna ivarṣabhaḥ | sadānvāghnī rakṣoghnī sā tvam ugrāsy oṣadhe || khele hai lambanastani naśyetaḥ prāmutaḥ pata | na tvām avivyacad iha- -ukṣeva śṛṅgavac chiraḥ || asuvāne bahuputre anantarve mahodari | pathāsmat satvare tvaṃ śarkarā bapsatī cara || ye 'rāyāś caratha pākasyecchanta āsutim | tān agne kṛṣṇavartane tīkṣṇaśṛṅgodṛṣann ihi || ado yad dāru plavate sindhor madhye apūruṣam | tad ā rabhasva durhaṇo tena yāhi parastaram || yasyā janitram iṣṭargā adṛṣṭāḥ krimayaḥ pluṣayaḥ | tasyai balāsapatnyai namas kṛṇomi kuṣṭhyai || śarvaputre bhavapatni yātubhrātri sadānve | tasyāddhi putrān bhrātṝṃś ca yatra tvā vinayāmasi ||
vṛṣāyam aṃśur vṛṣabhāya gṛhyate vṛṣāyam ugro nṛcakṣase | divyo naryo 'cikradan mahan nāmarṣabhasya yat kakut || viṣuvān viṣṇo bhava tvaṃ yo nṛpatir mama | atho indra iva devebhyo vi bravītu janebhyaḥ || manuṣyebhyo vi bravītu sajūr indreṇa medinā | agniś ca tubhyaṃ sāhantyo rāṣṭraṃ vaiśvānaro dadhat || yasyāyaṃ bhāga ṛṣabha indrāya pariṇīyate | sa hantu śatrūn āyato atho hantu parāyataḥ || sa hantā śatror bhavatu hantā bhavatu dodhatām | viśām aha praṇīr ayad agram udbhindatām asat || āyuṣmantaṃ varcasvantam atho adhipatiṃ viśām | asyāḥ pṛthivyāś cettāram imam indrarṣabhaṃ kṛṇu || yaḥ suśṛṅgaḥ sukakudaḥ kalyāṇo barhir āsadat | kārṣīvaṇaprajānena ṛṣabheṇa yajāmahe || ṛṣabheṇa yajamānā akrūreṇeva sarpiṣā | mṛdhaś ca sarvā indreṇa pṛtanāś ca sahāmahe || yaṃ tubhyaṃ bhāgam ṛṣabhaṃ devāḥ kevalyaṃ daduḥ | tena vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanaḥ śatrūṃś ca jahy āhave || jahi śatrūn vi mṛdho nudasva kṛṣyāḥ saṃbhūto asi vīryāvān | indrāya bhāgaṃ pari tvā nayāma urur no loko apṛtanyo astu || ghṛtavṛddha ghṛtāhuta sahasraśṛṅga suṣṭuta | ghṛtāhavana dīdihi || yo ghṛtenābhighārita ugro jaitrāya tiṣṭhasi | sa naḥ saṅkāsu pāraya pṛtanāsāhyeṣu ca ||
karkī subhāga ṛṣabhasya patnī prajākāmā vaśinī vāśitā gauḥ | tāṃ sahasram ekamukhā dadāti garbhaṃ dadhānām ṛtunā carantīm || garbhaṃ dadhānā paya id duhānā agnihotraṃ vaiśvadevī duhānā | gaur ṇo mā hiṃsīd varuṇasya patnī || karkyā yoniṃ saṃmanaso 'bhi gāvaḥ prajāṃ dhitsanto vṛṣaṇaś caranti | sā na aitv aditir viśvarūpā- -abhi krandanti bhuvanāny enām || prajāpatineṣitām ṛtviyāvatīm aināṃ prajāyā ṛṣabhāḥ śrayante | vṛṣaṇyantīṃ vṛṣaṇaḥ saptanāmnīṃ hiṃkṛṇvanto abhi nudantu vāśitām || sā praty adarśy uṣasā suvarṇā śukrāṃ vasānā varuṇasya nirṇijam | vaiśvadevī svadhām ābharantī prajāṃ dātā puṣyatu gopatiṣ ṭe || svayaṃsthāvary ṛṣabhāya tiṣṭhasi pratīcī somaṃ prati sūryam agnim | ahiṃsantī vāśite mām upehi paśūn dātā puṣyatu gopatiṣ ṭe || vaśī dātā bhavatu vāśitāyā agner bhāgam usriyāṃ yo dadāti | priyaṃ dhāma hṛdayaṃ somyaṃ madhu vājinīṃ tvā vājino vājayantu || yo vāśitāyāṃ gavy antar agnir yad asyāṃ nṛmṇaṃ mahimā babhūva | namas tasmai pratigṛhṇan kṛṇomi syonā me astu tanve suśevā || eyam agan vāśitā tāṃ pratīmaḥ puṃsāṃ vrātena saha puṣṭyā gauḥ | ūrjaṃ dadhānā ghṛtam id duhānā sahasrapoṣāya me astu dātre ||
anuvāka 2 ||
brahma jajñānam ity ekā || anāptā ye vaḥ prathamā yāni karmāṇi cakrire | vīrān no atra mā dabhan tad va etat puro dadhe || pratnān mānāt pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ ślokavantaḥ saumanasasya vantavaḥ | apānakṣāso badhirā ahāsata- -ṛtasya panthāṃ na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ || sahasradhāram abhi te sam asvaran divo nāke madhujihvā asaścataḥ | tasya spaśo na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ padepade pāśinaḥ santu setave || pary ū ṣu pra dhanvā vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ | divas tad arṇavām̐ anv īyase sanisraso nāmāsi trayodaśo māsaḥ || indrasya gṛho 'sīndrasya śarmāsīndrasya varmāsīndrasya varūtham asi | vy etenāvaitenāpaitenārātsīr asau svāhā || tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevāv agnīṣomāv iha su mṛḍataṃ naḥ | mumuktam asmān gṛbhītān avadyāj juṣethāṃ yajñam amṛtam asmāsu dhattaṃ svāhā || cakṣuṣo hete manaso hete brahmaṇo hete menyāmenir asi | amenayas te santu ye 'smān abhyaghāyanti svāhā || yo 'smāñ cakṣuṣā manasā yaś ca vācākūtyā cittyā brahmaṇāghāyur abhidāsāt | tam agne tvaṃ menyāmeniṃ kṛṇu svāhā || ud āyur ut kṛtam ud balam un manīṣod indriyaṃ nṛmṇam asmāsu dhehi svāhā ||
āyuṣkṛtāyuṣmatī svadhāvantau gopā me stho gopāyataṃ mā | ātmasadau me staṃ tanve suśevau mā mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ svāhā || indrasya gṛho 'sīndrasya śarmāsīndrasya varmāsīndrasya varūtham asi | taṃ tvā pra viśāmi sarvāṅgaḥ sarvātmā sarvaguḥ sarvapūruṣaḥ saha yan me 'sti tena || astṛto nāmāham ayam asmi sa ātmānaṃ pari dadhe dyāvāpṛthivībhyām | gopīthāya pra hūyase || astṛto nāma prājāpatyo devo māsas trayodaśaḥ | sarvaguḥ sarvapūruṣaḥ prāgāṃ devapurā aham || antaḥ prāgāṃ devapurāḥ sahagrāmaḥ svastaye | saṃvatsarasya madhyataḥ sarvaiḥ sodaryaiḥ saha || prapāṭhaka || prāham agāṃ devapurā ya evāsmi sa eva san | yo mā kaś cābhidāsati sa prajāpatim ṛcchatu || aśmāsi pratispaśaḥ pāhi riṣaḥ pāhi dviṣaḥ | pāhi daivyābhiśastyāḥ sa ma iha tanvaṃ pāhi || yo 'smān prācyā diśo 'ghāyur abhidāsāt | etat sa ṛcchād aśmavarma no 'stu || (…) asmān dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ (…) || (…) asmān pratīcyā diśaḥ (…) ||
(…) asmān udīcyā diśaḥ (…) || (…) asmān dhruvāyā diśaḥ (…) || yo 'smān ūrdhvāyā diśo 'ghāyur abhidāsāt | etat sa ṛcchād aśmavarma no 'stu || prācyai diśe svāhā || dakṣiṇāyai diśe svāhā || pratīcyai diśe svāhā || udīcyai diśe svāhā || dhruvāyai diśe svāhā || ūrdhvāyai diśe svāhā || dive svāhā || antarikṣāya svāhā || pṛthivyai svāhā || pṛthivyai svāhā || antarikṣāya svāhā || dive svāhā ||
mahākaṇṭhaṃ karīṣajam ūbadhyādam anāhutim | oṣṭhaḥ kokamukhaś ca yas tān ito nāśayāmasi || rāmadantam avadalaṃ prahālam ahināsikam | upavartaṃ balāhakaṃ khelaṃ gardabhanādinaṃ gṛdhraṃ hastyāyanaṃ tān (…) || pramṛśyādinam abhyamaṃ bhīmahastaṃ marīmṛśam | trastākṣaṃ mṛdvaṅguliṃ nakhograṃ dantavīryaṃ tān (…) || paryanyam abhipāpadaṃ jigīṣamāṇaṃ rūpakam | atho śalalyaṃ śevalaṃ tān (…) || taṇḍam agretuṇḍikam aliṃśam uta vatsapam | dāmagranthiṃ sanisrasam araṇyeyaṃ cārmyeyaṃ tān (…) || idaṃ yaj jānukeśavaṃ rakṣaś caraty āsuraṃ bahiḥ prayutam icchati | aṃsūn pāṃsyūṃś ca keśyān arāyāñ chvakiṣkiṇas tān ito nāśayāmasi || yaḥ kumārāñ janasyātti taruṇān dāsa āsuraḥ | arāyaḥ keśy aghalo yo janān hanty atti ca tam ito nāśayāmasi || hirākṣo nāma gehyo 'rāyo nāma sūrtahā | tam ito nāśayāmasi || vitūlaṃ bhasvam ākhidaṃ vanakrośaṃ ca roruham | āmādaṃ prayutaiṣaṇaṃ paryundānaṃ paridravaṃ vṛkasya nyañcaṃ gaṅgaṇaṃ tān ito nāśayāmasi ||
yaś ca bhūmā yā ca sphātir yorjā yo rasaś ca te | harāmi śakra tām̐ ahaṃ tvayā prattāṃ śacīpate || kṣetrātkṣetrād ā harāmi sphātiṃ sarvāṃ śacīpate | tvayāhaṃ vṛtrahan prattam ā harāmi gṛhām̐ upa || yas te sītābhagaḥ kṣetre yā rāddhir yac ca śīyate | atho yā niṣṭhā te kṣetre tāṃ ta ādiṣi brahmaṇā || yat khale yan mayāre yad goṣṭhe yac ca śevadhau | atho yat kumbhyāṃ śaye tasya te rasam ā dade || ūrjā yā te niruptasya- -ūrjā yāvahatasya te | ūrjāṃ te piṣyamāṇasya- -ūrjāṃ piṣṭāt ta ā dade || (…) te niruptasya- -ūrjā yāvahatasya te | ūrjāṃ te pacyamānasya- -ūrjāṃ pakvāt te (…) || ūrjā yā te praṇaddhasya- -ūrjā yā mathitasya te | ūrjāṃ te duhyamānasya- -ūrjāṃ dugdhāt ta ā dade || ā te dade gavām ūrjām ūrjām avibhya ā dade | ajābhya ūrjām ādāya- -ā ta ekaśaphād dade || ūrjā yā te puruṣeṣu- -ūrjā vitte ca vedye | ūrjāṃ te sarveṣām ahaṃ gṛhāṇāṃ brahmaṇā dade ||
pituṃ nu stoṣaṃ maho dharmāṇaṃ taviṣīm | yasya trito vy ojasā vṛtraṃ viparvam ardayat || svādo pito madho pito vayaṃ tvā vavṛmahe | asmākam avitā bhava || upa naḥ pitav ā gahi śivaḥ śivābhir ūtibhiḥ | mayobhūr adviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ || tava tye pito rasā rajāṃsy anu viṣṭhitāḥ | divi vātā iva śritāḥ || tava tye pito dadatas tava svādiṣṭha te pito | pra svādmāno rasānāṃ tuvigrīvā iverate || tve pito mahānāṃ devānāṃ mano hitam | akāri cāru ketunā tavāhim avasāvadhīt || yad adaḥ pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām | atrā cin no madho pito 'raṃ bhakṣāya gamyāḥ || yat te soma gavāśiro yavāśiro bhajāmahe | vātāpe pīva id bhava || yad apām oṣadhīnāṃ pariṃśam āriśāmahe (…) || karambha oṣadhe bhava pīvo vṛkka udārathiḥ | vātāpe pīva id bhava || taṃ tvā vayaṃ pito vacobhir gāvo na havyā suṣūdima | asmabhyaṃ tvā sadhamādaṃ devebhyas tvā sadhamādam ||
prati tyaṃ cārum adhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase | marudbhir agna ā gahi || nahi devo na martyo mahas tava kratuṃ paraḥ (…) || ye maho rajaso vidur viśve devāso adruhaḥ (…) || ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ (…) || ya ugrā arkam ānṛcur anādhṛṣṭāsa ojasā (…) || ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate (…) || ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudram ojasā (…) || ā ye tanvanti raśmibhis tiraḥ samudram arṇavam (…) || abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyaṃ madhu (…) || ā yantu maruto gaṇai stutā dadhatu no rayim (…) || ā tvā kaṇvā ahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ | marudbhir agna ā gahi ||
anuvāka 3 ||
saṃ mā siñcantu marutaḥ saṃ pūṣā saṃ bṛhaspatiḥ | saṃ māyam agniḥ siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇotu me || (…) siñcantv ādityāḥ saṃ mā siñcantv agnayaḥ | indraḥ sam asmān siñcatu (…) || (…) siñcantv aruṣāḥ sam arkā ṛṣayaś ca ye | pūṣā sam (…) || (…) siñcantu gandharvāpsarasaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu devatāḥ | bhagaḥ sam (…) || (…) siñcantu pṛthivīḥ saṃ mā siñcantu yā divaḥ | antarikṣaṃ sam (…) || (…) siñcantu pradiśaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu yā diśaḥ | āśā sam (…) || (…) siñcantu nadyaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu sindhavaḥ | samudraḥ sam (…) || (…) siñcantu kṛṣayaḥ saṃ mā siñcantv oṣadhīḥ | somaḥ sam (…) || saṃ mā siñcantu yā āpaḥ saṃ mā siñcantu vṛṣṭayaḥ | sarasvatī sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇotu me ||
saṃ bhago varcasā māgne saṃ viṣṇuḥ puṣṭyā sicat | kṣatraṃ sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca- -āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu mā || saṃ virāḍ varcasā māgne saṃ deṣṭrī puṣṭyā sicat | iḍā sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca (…) || saṃ dhātā varcasā māgne saṃ siktiḥ puṣṭyā sicat | saṃ devo asmān aryamā prajayā ca (…) || sam aṃśo varcasā māgne saṃ vāyuḥ puṣṭyā sicat | vātaḥ sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca (…) || saṃ sabhā varcasā māgne saṃ surā puṣṭyā sicat | sūryā sam (…) || saṃ savitā varcasā māgne saṃ sūryaḥ puṣṭyā sicat | candraḥ sam (…) || saṃ paśavo varcasā māgne saṃ yajñaḥ puṣṭyā sicat | dakṣiṇā sam (…) || saṃ mā siñcatu draviṇaṃ saṃ mā siñcatv indriyam | tejaḥ sam (…) || saṃ mā siñcantu varcāṃsi saṃ mā siñcantu bhūtayaḥ | satyaṃ sam asmān siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca- -āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu mā ||
ā rātri pārthivaṃ rajaḥ pitur aprāyi dhāmabhiḥ | divaḥ sadāṃsi bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhasa ā tveṣaṃ vartate tamaḥ || na yasyāḥ pāraṃ dadṛśe na yoyuvad viśvam asyāṃ ni viśate yad ejati | ariṣṭāsas ta urvi tamasvati rātri pāram aśīmahi bhadre pāram aśīmahi || ye te rātri nṛcakṣaso draṣṭāro navatir nava | aśītiḥ santy aṣṭā uto te sapta saptatiḥ || ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ ca revati pañcāśat pañca sumnayi | catvāraś catvāriṃśac ca trayas triṃśac ca vājini || dvā ca viṃśatiś ca te rātry ekādaśāvamāḥ | tebhir no 'dya pāyubhir ni pāhi duhitar divaḥ || rakṣā mākir ṇo aghaśaṃsa īśata mā no duḥśaṃsa īśata || mā no adya gavāṃ steno māvīnāṃ vṛka īśata | māśvānāṃ bhadre taskaro mā nṛṇāṃ yātudhānyaḥ || paramebhiḥ pathibhi steno dhāvatu taskaraḥ | pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇāghāyur arṣatu || andhaṃ rātri tiṣṭhadhūmam aśīrṣāṇam ahiṃ kṛṇu | hanū vṛkasya jambhaya- -ā stenaṃ drupade jahi || tvayi rātri vasāmasi svapiṣyāmasi jāgṛhi | gobhyo naḥ śarma yaccha- -aśvebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ ||
atho yāni ca vasmahe yāni cāntaḥ parīṇahi | tāni te pari dadmasi || rātri mātar uṣase naḥ pari dehi | uṣā no ahne pari dadātv ahas tubhyaṃ vibhāvari || yat kiṃ cedaṃ patayati yat kiṃ cedaṃ sarīsṛpam | yat kiṃ ca padvad āsanvat tasmāt tvaṃ rātri pāhi naḥ || sā paścāt pāhi sā puraḥ sottarād adharād uta | gopāya no vibhāvari stotāras ta iha smasi || ye rātrim anutiṣṭhanti ye ca bhūteṣu jāgrati | paśūn ye sarvān rakṣanti te na ātmasu jāgratu te naḥ paśuṣu jāgratu || veda vai rātri te nāma ghṛtācī nāma vā asi | tāṃ tvā bharadvājo veda sā no vitte 'dhi jāgṛhi ||
brahmāsya śiro bṛhad asya pṛṣṭhaṃ vāmadevyam udaram odanasya | chandāṃsi pakṣau mukham asya satyaṃ viṣṭārī yajñas tapaso 'dhi jātaḥ || anasthāḥ śuddhāḥ pavanena pūtāḥ śucayaḥ śucīn api yanti lokān | viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanti naiṣāṃ śiśnaṃ pra dahati jātavedāḥ || naiṣāṃ śiśnaṃ pra dahati jātavedāḥ svarge loke bahu straiṇam eṣām | nainān yamaḥ pari muṣṇāti retaḥ || āste yama upa yāti devān saṃ gandharvair madati somyaiḥ | viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanti nainān avartiḥ sacate kutaś cana || rathī ha bhūtvā rathayāna īyate pakṣī ha bhūtvāpi divaṃ sam eti | eṣa yajño vitato vahiṣṭho viṣṭārī pakvo divam ā sasāda || caturaḥ kumbhāṃś caturdhā dadāti kṣīreṇa pūrṇān udakena dadhnā | etās tvā kulyā upa yantu viśvataḥ svarge loke svadhayā pinvamānāḥ || ghṛtahradā madhukūlāḥ surodakāḥ kṣīreṇa pūrṇā udakena dadhnā | etās tvā kulyā upa yantu viśvahā svarge loke svadhayā mādayantīḥ || puṇḍarīkaṃ kumudaṃ saṃ tanoti bisaṃ śālūkaṃ śaphako mulālī | svarge loke svadhayā pinvamānā upa mā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samaktāḥ || yam odanaṃ pacāmi śraddadhāno viṣṭāriṇaṃ lokajitaṃ svargam | sa me mā kṣeṣṭa sadam aśyamāno viśvarūpā kāmadughā dhenur astu me || vṛṣabhaṃ santaṃ saha sūnṛtayā svarge loke amṛtaṃ duhānam | ye me putrāḥ pitaraś ca santi te tvā viṣṭārinn upa sarve sadeyuḥ || ya imān yajñān abhi vitaṣṭāra yasyeme lokāḥ svadhayā samaktāḥ | ye me pautrā uta ye pitāmahās tebhyo viṣṭārinn amṛtāni dhukṣva || yadi pṛthivīṃ yady antarikṣaṃ yadi divaṃ devatā vā jagantha | ye me prapautrāḥ prapitāmahāś ca te tvā viṣṭārinn anu pra jñeṣur atra || svarge loke apsarasa enāñ jāyā bhūtvopa śerate | viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanty asmiṃl loke dakṣiṇayā pariṣkṛtam ||
nir ṇudaināṃ pra ṇudaināṃ svān nipadanād adhi | vibhraṃśam asyai kṛṇmo vi gṛhair bhraṃśatām asau || apāñcaṃ patim ā kurv adharācīṃ striyaṃ naya | atīmān daśa parvatān atīmā nāvyā daśa || adharācīm avācīm atho akuśalāṃ diśam | vibhraṃśam asyai kṛṇmas tenaināṃ pra dahāmasi || āja nir aja bilaṃ bilād araṇyam ā kurv araṇyād araṇaṃ janam | mṛgām̐ anu pra pātaya vātasyaināṃ śikhāṃ kuru || vātāgre asyā hṛdayaṃ mano reṣmaṇi dadhmasi | vibhraṃśam asyai kṛṇmo vidhvaṃśam āsaktaṃ dame || sarvam anu pari plavatām antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | yathānavadhṛtā carād vṛṣatūlam ivopari || aśam asyai vāto vātv aśaṃ tapatu sūryaḥ | atho yad annam aśnāti tad asyai viṣavattaram || siṃhas te astu cakṣuṣa ity ekā || eṣa vām agnir antarā sa viṣvañcau vy asyatu | yathā vāṃ na sahāsaty uttarasmiṃś canāyuṣi || ut pātaya śimidāvati pra pātaya śimidāvati | imau vy asya dampatī pakvaṃ māṃsam ivāsinā || meyam asmin patau raṃsta mo asmiñ chayane sve | jahātu vasanaṃ svam ahir jīrṇām iva tvacam || yathā mṛtāś ca jīvāś ca- -asmiṃl loke vyokasaḥ | evemau dampatī stām asmiṃl loke vyokasau ||
anuvāka 4 ||
Kāṇḍa 7
suparṇas tvānvavindat sūkaras tvākhanan nasā | dipsauṣadhe tvaṃ dipsantaṃ prati kṛtyākṛto daha || prati daha yātudhānān prati kṛtyākṛto daha | atho yo asmān dipsati tam u tvaṃ jahy oṣadhe || agne pṛtanāṣāṭ pṛtanāḥ sahasva | prati kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛte pratiharaṇena harāmasi || iṣvā ṛjīyaḥ patatu dyāvāpṛthivī tat sutāt | tat taṃ mṛga iva vidhyatu kṛtyā kṛtyākṛtaṃ kṛtā || agham astv aghakṛte śapathāḥ śapathīvne | pratyak prati pra hiṇmasi yaś cakāra tam ṛcchatu || yas tvā kṛtya ity ekā || punaḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛte hastagṛhya parā ṇaya | samakṣam asmā ā dadhmo yathā kṛtyākṛtaṃ hanat || putra iva pitaraṃ gaccha svaja ivābhiṣṭhito daśa | tantur ivāvavyayann ihi kṛtye kṛtyākṛtaṃ kṛtā || ud eṇīva vāriṇy abhiskandaṃ mṛgīva | kṛtyā kartāram ṛcchatu || ṛśyasyeva parīśāsaṃ parimāya pari tvacaḥ | durhārde cakruṣe kṛtyāṃ grīvāsu prati muñcata || yā kṛtye devakṛtā yā vā manuṣyajā asi | tāṃ tvā prati pra hiṇmasi pratīcīnena brahmaṇā || yadi strī yadi vā pumān kṛtyāṃ cakāra pāpmane | tām u tasmai nayāmasy aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā ||
okte me dyāvā pṛthivī oktā devī sarasvatī | oktau ma indraś cāgniś ca krimiṃ jambhayatām imam || asyendra kumārasya krimiṃ dhanapate jahi | hatā viśvā arātayo 'nena vacasā mama || yo +'kṣyau parisarpati yo nāse parisarpati | datāṃ yo madhyaṃ gacchati taṃ krimiṃ jambhayāmasi || virūpau dvau sarūpau dvau kṛṣṇau dvau rohitau dvau | babhruś ca babhrukarṇaś ca gṛdhrāḥ kokāś ca te hatāḥ || ye krimayaḥ śitikakṣā ye kṛṣṇāḥ śitibāhavaḥ | ye ke ca viśvarūpās tān krimīñ jambhayāmasi || yo dviśīrṣā caturakṣaḥ krimiḥ sāraṅgo arjunaḥ | śṛṇāmy asya pṛṣṭīr api vṛścāmi yac chiraḥ || ud asau sūryo agād viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā | dṛṣṭāṃś ca ghnann adṛṣṭāṃś ca sarvāṃś ca pramṛṇan krimīn || yevāṣāsaḥ kaṣkaṣāso dhrūkṣṇāsaḥ śipavitnavaḥ | dṛṣṭaś ca hanyatāṃ krimir adṛṣṭaś cota hanyatām || hato yevāṣo hataḥ śipavir hato gaṅgaṇivām̐ uta | hatā viśvā arātaya ugreṇa vacasā mama || sarveṣāṃ ca krimīṇāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca krimīṇām | bhinadmy aśmanā śiro dahāmy agninā mukham ||
tigmebhir agne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā | āmādo ni vaha tvam anyam āsani kṛṇvatām || śociṣāgne arciṣā ca nir daheto aghāyataḥ | sakhyam āvaṃ kṛṇvahe tvaṃ ca- -āmāda upa śaṃ bhuvan || nir āmādo nayāmasi niṣ kravyādo gṛhebhyaḥ | sasyādo nāma ye deva te agne mā dabhan tvām || āmādaś ca kravyādaś ca sasyādaś cobhayān saha | prajāṃ ye cakrire bhāgaṃ tān ito nir ṇayāmasi || ya āmeṣv aramanta na pakvam upadādhṛṣuḥ | te yantu sarve saṃbhūya- -anyatreto 'ghāyavaḥ || ya enasvī duṣkṛtakṛt kilbiṣakṛtasādhī yaḥ | punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ || ava reṇum ava rajo nenije hastyaṃ malam | dhātā no bhadrayā neṣat sa no gopāyatu prajām || kṛṇve 'haṃ rodasī varma syāma savituḥ save | mātā no bhadrayā bhūmir dyauś cāsmān pātv aṃhasaḥ || yad asurāṇām ahany asmān pāpā upethana | devānāṃ payaś ca daivyam āpaḥ śundhantu mām imāḥ || ā te pitar marutāṃ sumnam emi mā naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśo yuvathāḥ | abhi no vīro 'rvatīḥ kṣameta pra jāyāmahai rudra prajayā || yo 'vṛddhaṃ hanti yo garbhe antar yo jātaṃ janitavyaṃ ca pūruṣam | tasmā ṛdhyāsaṃ haviṣāham adya sa naḥ prajāṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇotu ||
indrasya bāhū sthavirau vṛṣāṇau citrā imā vṛṣabhau pārayiṣṇū | tau yokṣye prathamau yoga āgate yābhyāṃ jitam asurāṇāṃ svar yat || āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām | saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senā jayatu sākam indraḥ || saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā- -ayodhyena duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā | tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā || sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā yudha indro gaṇena | saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ūrdhvadhanvā pratihitābhir astāt || prapāṭhaka || balavijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ | abhivīro abhiṣatvā sahojij jaitrāyendra ratham ā tiṣṭha govidam || imaṃ vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indraṃ satvāno anu saṃ rabhadhvam | grāmajitaṃ gojitaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā || abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno adāya ugraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ | duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḍ ayodhyo asmākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu || bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrām̐ apabādhamānaḥ | prabhañjañ chatrūn pramṛṇann amitrān asmākam edhy avitā tanūnām || indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ | devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnāṃ maruto yantu madhye || indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānāṃ marutāṃ śardha ugram | mahāmanasāṃ bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud asthāt || asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu | asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmān devāso 'vatā haveṣu ||
vaiśvānarād arocata jāto hiraṇyayo maṇiḥ | tam ābharad bṛhaspatiḥ kaśyapo vīryāya kam || bṛhaspatis tam akṛṇon maṇiṃ vaiśvānaraṃ sahaḥ | saptarṣayo balāya kaṃ saṃ dadhuṣ ṭvā vayodhasaḥ || viśve devās ta indriyaṃ saptarṣayaś ca saṃ dadhuḥ | jāto hiraṇyayo maṇir agner vaiśvānarād adhi || aśvattho jātaḥ prathamo 'gneḥ priyatamā tanūḥ | vaiśvānarasya sṛṣṭyā kṛtyādūṣiḥ kṛto maṇiḥ || kṛtyādūṣiṃ tvāvidaṃ kṛtyādūṣiṃ bharāmi tvā | kṛtyādūṣiṃ kṛṇomi tvā kṛtyādūṣiṃ vayodhasam || patatrī pakṣī balavān kṛtyādūṣiḥ sapatnahā | nitatnir viśvabheṣaja ugra āpatiko maṇiḥ || patatrī te balāya kaṃ nitatnir bheṣajāya te | jāto hiraṇyayo maṇir apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu || devo maṇiḥ sapatnahā rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ | hiraṇyayonir aṃśumān kaśyapenābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ || vaiśvānaraṃ tejanam ekam āhur agner yoneḥ saha candreṇa jātam | gayasphānaḥ prataraṇo vayodhāḥ kṛtyādūṣir valagahāsy ugraḥ || yasyedaṃ bhūmyām adhi nikrāntaṃ pāṃsure padam | mṛjānas tanvo yad rapas tasya snāhi tanū adhi || dūṣyās tvā vadhaṃ vayaṃ devasya savituḥ save | jīvātave bharāmasi mahyā ariṣṭatātaye || ācchedanaḥ pracchedano dviṣatas tapano maṇiḥ | śatruñjayaḥ sapatnahā dviṣantam apa bādhatām ||
anuvāka 1 ||
satyasya sthūṇā pṛthivīṃ dādhāra ṛtena devā amṛtam anv avindan | dhruveṇa tvā haviṣā dhārayāmy abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītām || yebhir homair viśvakarmā dādhāremāṃ pṛthivīṃ mātaraṃ naḥ | tebhiṣ ṭvā homair iha dhārayāmy ṛtaṃ satyam anu carantu homāḥ || iha dhriyadhvaṃ dharuṇe pṛthivyā uśatyā mātuḥ subhagāyā upasthe | aparāṇuttā mahasā modamānā asmin vāstau suprajaso bhavātha || suprajaso mahasā modamānā varṣman pṛthivyā upari śrayadhvam | asyai śālāyai śarma yacchantu devā dhārābhir enāṃ pṛthivī pipartu || imāṃ śālāṃ śreṣṭhatamāṃ vasūnām ariṣṭavīrā abhi saṃ carema | dṛḍhā asyā upamito bhavantu sthirā vīrā upasado bhavantu || imāṃ śālāṃ savitā vāyur indro bṛhaspatir ni minotu prajānan | ukṣantūdnā maruto ghṛtena bhago no rājā ni kṛṣiṃ dadhātu || mānasya patni haviṣo juṣasva tīvrāntasya bahulamadhyamasya | ā tvā śiśur vāśyatām ā kumāra ā vāśyantāṃ dhenavo nityavatsāḥ || dṛḍhās te sthūṇā bhavantu bhūmyām adhi dṛḍhāḥ pakṣāsas tava devi śāle | sthiravīrānamitrā na edhi śarma no yaccha dvipade catuṣpade || śālā devī gārhapatyāya cākl̥pe tṛṇaṃ vasānā jagate suśevā | sthirāṅgāṃ tvā sthirapūruṣāṃ mānasya patni sthirāṃ tvā vīrā abhi saṃ carema || vāstoṣpate prati jānīhy asmān svāveśo anamīvo na edhi | yat tvemahe prati nas taj juṣasva catuṣpado dvipada ā veśayeha ||
darbho agra oṣadhīnāṃ śatakāṇḍo ajāyata | sa sahasravīryaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ || yathā darbho jāyamānas tvacaṃ bhinatti bhūmyāḥ | evā sa bhidyatāṃ jano yo naḥ pāpaṃ cikitsati || apa nāḍam apa kṛtyām apa rakṣaḥ sadānvāḥ | amīvāś cātayāmasi sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ || asti vai nivata udvanaṃ na vai sarvam anuplavam | asi tvaṃ tasya dūṣaṇo yo naḥ pāpaṃ cikitsati || pari sāyaṃ pari prātaḥ pari madhyaṃdinaṃ pari | darbho hiraṇyahastaghnaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ || girau jātaḥ svar ahāsi sākaṃ somena babhruṇā | mā pāpakṛtvanaḥ śiṣo mā pākaḥ puruṣo riṣat || divo mūlam avatataṃ pṛthivyām ota āhitaḥ | darbhaḥ sahasravīryaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ || sahasrakāṇḍas taviṣas tīkṣṇavalśo viṣāsahiḥ | darbheṇa sarvā rakṣāṃsy amīvāś cāpa dahāmasi || apadagdhaṃ duṣvapnyam apadagdhā arātayaḥ | sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ || mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā mā bradhnaḥ śakuniḥ patan | darbho rājā samudriyaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||
yo naḥ pāpena vacasā- -aghoṣato duruktaṃ bruvat | ārāc chaptam aprāpyāsmān apa tad yātu sarvataḥ || yan naḥ śapād araṇo yat sapatnaḥ śvaśrūr vā yac chvaśuro vā śapāti | jyāyasaḥ śapathān vayaṃ yavena yāvayāmasi || yān samasyante śapathān vākkṣamyānṛtviyāmadhi | yavaṃ tvaṃ bibhrad bāhvoḥ pūrvaḥ prati śṛṇīhi tān || ṛjukeśo yavo babhrur maghavā no 'numādyaḥ | hiraṇyadhanvā śapathān upejatu || tvāṃ pītvendro vṛtraṃ śakro jaghāna vāsavaḥ | sa viṣāhī yatharṣabhaḥ sahasva śapathān yava || ārāc carantu śapathā yutā ito jihvā u ditā arasāḥ santu sarve | nāmagrāhād vāco heḍād īkṣitād ghoracakṣasaḥ śarma te varma kṛṇmasi || apāñco yantu śapathā janenāstā aghāyunā | yo no durasyāj jīvate svenānāgase sate || pari mā pātu śapathād anṛtād duritād uta | pari mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsād yavo rakṣatu mā riṣam || anāstigyaṃ śapathair anativyādhyaṃ kṛtam | bṛhad varma prati muñcāmi te yavam || taṃ vayāṃsīva pakṣiṇa ā viśantu patatriṇaḥ | śaptāraṃ śapathāḥ punaḥ ||
ā no diśa mā pari ṣṭhā arāte mā no rakṣīr dakṣiṇāṃ yācamānām | pra ṇaḥ pradātā savitā ca yacchatāṃ namo vīrtsāyā asamṛddhyai ca kṛṇmaḥ || yam arāte purodhatse puruṣaṃ parirāpiṇam | namas te tasmai kṛṇmo mā vaniṃ mama vivyathaḥ || yam adyābhiprayuñjmahe manasā hṛdayena ca | arāte taṃ no mā vīrtsīr ditsantaṃ parirāpiṇi || pra ṇo vanir devakṛtā divā naktaṃ ca sidhyatu | arātim anupremo vayaṃ namo 'stv arātaye || uta nagnā bobhuvatī svapnayā sacase janam | arāte cittaṃ vīrtsanty ākūtiṃ puruṣasya ca || paro 'pehy asamṛddhe vi te hetiṃ nayāmasi | yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ sacasva kanyā bhūtvā sragviṇī rukmiṇī dṛśe || namas te 'stv asamṛddhe mā māṃ purodhiṃ kṛṇuthāḥ | veda tvāhaṃ nimīvantīṃ nitudantīm arāte martyān martyebhyo adhi nirvadantīm || mā no vaniṃ mā vācaṃ mā vīrtsīr ugrāv indrāgnī na ā bhajatāṃ vasūni | sarve no 'dya ditsanto arātiṃ prati haryata || savitāram anumatiṃ bhagaṃ yanto havāmahe | vācaṃ juṣṭāṃ madhumatīṃ vadāni devānāṃ devahūtiṣu || yaṃ yācāmi nakulyā jihvayoṣṭhāpidhānayā | śraddhā tam adya vindatu dattā somena babhruṇā ||
aitu devas trāyamāṇaḥ kuṣṭho himavatas pari | takmānaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ || trīṇi te kuṣṭha nāmāni naghamāro naghāriṣo naghāyuṣo na ghāyaṃ puruṣo riṣat | yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā || jīvalā nāma te mātā jīvanto nāma te pitā māriṣā nāma te svasā na (…) || uttamo 'sy oṣadhīnām anaḍvāñ jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva na ghāyaṃ puruṣo riṣat | yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā || triḥ śāmbubhyo gireyebhyas trir ādityebhyas pari | trir jāto viśvadevebhyaḥ sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati | takmānaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ || aśvattho devasadanas tṛtīyasyām ito divi | tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ kuṣṭho 'jāyata | saḥ (…) || hiraṇyayī naur acarad dhiraṇyabandhanā divi (…) || yatra nāvaḥ prabhraṃśanaṃ yatra himavataḥ śiraḥ | tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ kuṣṭho ajāyata | sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati | takmānaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ || yaṃ tvā veda pūrva aikṣvāko yaṃ vā tvā kuṣṭha kāśyaḥ | yaṃ śāvaso yaṃ mātsyas tenāsi viśvabheṣajaḥ || śīrṣālākaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ sadandir yaś ca hāyanaḥ | takmānaṃ viśvadhāvīrya- -adharāñcaṃ parā suva ||
anuvāka 2 ||
ye parvatāḥ somapṛṣṭhā āpa uttānaśīvarīḥ | vātaḥ parjanya ād agnis te kravyādam aśīśaman || yas te hanti carācaram utthāsyantaṃ sarīsṛpam | garbhaṃ yo daśamāsyaṃ tam ito nāśayāmasi || yadi ghnanty apsaraso gandharvā gehyā uta | kravyādo mūradevinas tān ito nāśayāmasi || yas ta ūrū ārohaty asṛk te rehaṇāya kam | āmādaḥ kravyādo ripūṃs tān ito nāśayāmasi || yas te śroṇī cyāvayaty antarā dampatī śaye | yoniṃ yo antar āreḍhi tam ito nāśayāmasi || yas tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate | prajāṃ yas te jighatsati tam (…) || yas tvā patyuḥ pratirūpo jāro bhūtvā nipadyate | arāyaṃ kaṇvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tam ito nāśayāmasi || hā hai kharva khalate naigūrakarṇa tuṇḍila | indrasya tigmam āyudhaṃ tena tvā nāśayāmasi || namas taṇḍāya namaḥ kusumāya namaḥ pratipāvne namaḥ kaḥsvadheye | namas tubhyaṃ nirṛte viśvavāre jaremaṃ dhāpayatāṃ viśvarūpā || yāvad dyaur yāvat pṛthivī yāvat paryeti sūryaḥ | tāvat tvam ugra gulgulo parīmāṃ pāhi viśvataḥ ||
ekarājñīm ekavratām ekasthām ekalāmikām | pāṭāṃ sapatnacātanīṃ jaitrāyācchā vadāmasi || ekarājñy ekavrata ekastha ekalāmike | na tvā sapatnī sāsāha gaireyī ca na bāhyā || uttarāham uttarābhya uttared adharābhyaḥ | adhaḥ sapatnī māmaky adhared adharābhyaḥ || na saindhavasya puṣpasya sūryo mlāpayati tvacam | pāṭe 'mlātayā tvayā sapatnyā varca ā dade || na vai pāṭe pāṭevāsi subhāgaṃkaraṇīd asi | pāṭe bhagasya no dhehy atho mā mahiṣīṃ kṛṇu || yat pāṭe adhi vṛkṣe vātaplavā mahīyase | jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī saṃjayā nāma vā asi || uttānaparṇāṃ subhagāṃ sahamānāṃ sahasvatīm | acchā bṛhadvadāṃ vada pāṭāṃ sapatnacātanīm || pāṭām indro vy āśnād dhantavā asurebhyaḥ | tayāhaṃ sapatnīṃ sākṣīya mahendro dānavān iva || pāṭā bibharty aṅkuśaṃ hiraṇyavantam aṅkinam | tena sapatnyā varca ā lumpāmi mamed asat || imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ vīrudhāṃ balavattamām | yayā sapatnīṃ bādhate kṛṇute kevalaṃ patim ||
yāsām ārād āghoṣāmo vātasyeva pṛthag yataḥ | tāsāṃ śvanvatīnām indro api kṛtac chiraḥ || yāḥ purastād ācaranti sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ (…) || yā vātam anusaṃyanty antarikṣe adho divaḥ (…) || yāsāṃ preṅkho divi baddho antarikṣe hiraṇyayaḥ (…) || yās talpān anunṛtyanty antarikṣe hiraṇyayān (…) || yāḥ patanti vātarathā uttānāḥ pādaghātinīḥ (…) || yā vṛkṣaṃ parisarpanti sācy akṣī karikratīḥ (…) || yāś catvare saṃgacchante vikumbāś celavāsinīḥ (…) || yāsāṃ sikatavāpiṣu gṛho mito hiraṇyayaḥ (…) || yā ārokaiḥ prapadyante puṣkarair iva jāmayaḥ (…) || yā nadīḥ pratigāhante saṃrabhya kanyā iva (…) || yās tīrthāni vigāhante 'ghnyāḥ śvasatīr iva (…) || yāḥ samudrād uccaranty uccair ghoṣān karikratīḥ (…) || yā gacchanti janaṃjanam icchantīḥ prayutaṃ bahu | tāsāṃ śvanvatīnām indro api kṛtac chiraḥ ||
