agnir āyuṣmān sa vanaspatibhir āyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu || vāyur āyuṣmān so 'ntarikṣeṇāyuṣmān (…) || sūrya āyuṣmān sa divāyuṣmān (…) || candra āyuṣmān sa nakṣatrair āyuṣmān (…) || soma āyuṣmān sa oṣadhībhir āyuṣmān (…) || yajña āyuṣmān sa dakṣiṇābhir āyuṣmān (…) || samudra āyuṣmān sa nadībhir āyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu || brahmāyuṣmat tad brahmacāribhir āyuṣmat | tan māyuṣmad āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu || indra āyuṣmān sa vīryeṇāyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu || devā āyuṣmantas te 'mṛtenāyuṣmantaḥ | te māyuṣmanta āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇvantu || prajāpatir āyuṣmān sa prajābhir āyuṣmān | sa māyuṣmān āyuṣmantaṃ kṛṇotu ||
dakṣiṇā mā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇā pātu savyataḥ | paścād anuvyādhāt pātu sarvasyā bhavahetyāḥ || paśunā tvaṃ paśupate dvipād dattvā catuṣpadā | ātmanvatīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ prāṇaṃ dattvā prāṇihi || yāṃ dadāsi śraddadhāno dakṣiṇāṃ brāhmaṇakṛte | sā tvā yakṣmāt pārayatv agneḥ saṃtāpād divyasya śokāt || dadāsīmāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ mā ta āmamac chalyān yakṣmān vi vṛhāmo vayaṃ te | karṇaśūlam upahatyā arātīḥ sarve yakṣmā apa tiṣṭhantu sākam || annena prāṇaṃ vanute tiro dhatte paridhānena yakṣmam | hiraṇyam aśvaṃ gāṃ dadat kṛṇute varma dakṣiṇām || uṣṇīṣaṃ tvā śīrṣaktyā vāsas tvā tanvāmayāt | candraṃ hiraṇyam andhyāt karṇād dattaṃ śukraṃ bhrājad bādhiryāt pātu dakṣiṇā || upabarhaṇaṃ tvā grīvāmayān maṇayo yakṣmād datkravyāt | aṅgarogād abhyañjanam annaṃ tvāntaṣṭyāmayāt || adhaspadād āmayataḥ pado rogād upānahau | daṇḍas tvā dattaḥ pari pātu sarpād dakṣiṇataḥ prayato dakṣiṇena || saumanasaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dakṣamāṇā iṣam ūrjaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ saṃvasānāḥ | bhagasya dhārām avase pratīmaḥ || sahasrāṅgā śataṃ jyotīṃṣy asyā yajñasya paprir amṛtā svargā | ā na etu dakṣiṇā viśvarūpā- -ahiṃsantīṃ prati gṛhṇīma enām ||
anuvāka 3 ||
agnir mā pātu vasubhiḥ purastāt tasmin krame tasmiṃ śraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā || vāyur māntarikṣeṇaitasyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin (…) || somo mā rudrair dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ (…) || varuṇo mādityair etasyā diśaḥ (…) || sūryo mā dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ pratīcyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ śraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā || apo mauṣadhīmatīr etasyā diśaḥ pāntu tāsu krame tāsu śraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | tā mā rakṣantu tā mā gopāyantu tābhya ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā || viśvakarmā mā saptarṣibhir udīcyā diśaḥ (…) || indro mā marutvān etasyā diśaḥ (…) || prajāpatir mā prajananavān saha pratiṣṭhayā dhruvāyā diśaḥ (…) || bṛhaspatir mā viśvair devair ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ pātu tasmin krame tasmiṃ śraye tāṃ puraṃ praimi | sa mā rakṣatu sa mā gopāyatu tasmā ātmānaṃ pari dade svāhā ||
agniṃ te vasumantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavaḥ prācyā diśo +'bhidāsān || vāyuṃ te 'ntarikṣavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān || somaṃ te rudravantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavo dakṣiṇāyā diśo +'bhidāsān || varuṇaṃ ta ādityavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān || sūryaṃ te dyāvāpṛthivīvantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavaḥ pratīcyā diśo +'bhidāsān || apas ta oṣadhīmatīr ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān || viśvakarmāṇaṃ te saptarṣivantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava udīcyā diśo +'bhidāsān || indraṃ te marutvantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava etasyā diśo +'bhidāsān || prajāpatiṃ te prajananavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyavo dhruvāyā diśo +'bhidāsān || bṛhaspatiṃ te viśvadevavantam ṛcchantu ye māghāyava ūrdhvāyā diśo +'bhidāsān ||
vaikaṅkatenedhmena devebhya ājyaṃ vaha | agne tān iha mādaya sarva ā yantu me havam || indra ā yāhi me havam idaṃ kariṣyāmi tac chṛṇu | ima aindrā atisarā ākūtīḥ saṃ namantu me | tebhiḥ śakema vīryaṃ jātavedas tanūvaśin || yad asāv amuto devā adevaḥ saṃścikīrṣati | mā tasyāgnir havyaṃ vākṣīd dhavaṃ devāś ca mopa gur mamaiva havam etana || ati dhāvatātisarā viśvasyeśānā ojasaḥ | vṛścatāmuṣya jīvitam indreṇa saha medinā || atisṛtyātisarā indrasyaujasā hata | aviṃ vṛka iva mathnīta tato vo jīvan mā moci prāṇam asyāpi nahyata || yān asau pratisarān akaś cakāra kṛṇavac ca yān | tvaṃ tān indra vṛtrahan pratīcaḥ punar ā kṛdhi yathāmuṃ tṛṇahañ janam || yam amī purodadhire brahmāṇam upabhūtaye | indrasya te adhaspadaṃ taṃ pra yacchāmi mṛtyave kravyād enaṃ śamayatu || yadi preyur devapurā brahma varmāṇi cakrire | tanūpānaṃ paripāṇāni cakrire sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ kṛdhi || atrainam indra vṛtrahann ugro marmaṇi vidhya | atraivainam abhi tiṣṭha śakra medy ahaṃ tava | anu tvendrā rabhāmahe syāma sumatau tava || yathendra udvācanaṃ labdhvā cakre adhaspadam | kṛṇve 'mum adharaṃ tathā śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ ||
āṅgiraso janmanāsi tam u tvāhur vanaspate | sa pīlo rakṣo bādhasva sākam indreṇa medinā || apa rakṣāṃsi bādhasva bādhasva parirāpiṇaḥ | piśācān pīlo kravyādo bādhasva mūradevinaḥ || yayāhus tṛṣṭaṃ kaṭukam apagūḍhaṃ phale kulam | tasyai hiraṇyakeśyai namaḥ kṛṇmo arātaye || yā mahatī mahonmānā sarvā āśā vyānaśe | tasyai hiraṇyakeśyai namaḥ kṛṇmo arātaye || yas te yoniṃ pratireḍhy āṇḍādo garbhadūṣaṇaḥ | arāyaṃ putraṃ prāpī yas taṃ pīluḥ sahatām itaḥ || yadā pīlav āṅgirasa pakvo 'tiṣṭho vanaspate | athāhur indraṃ jajñānaṃ śakraṃ barjahye prati || yathā sedim abādhathāḥ pacyamāno vanaspate | evā pīlo rakṣo bādhasva sākam indreṇa medinā || yat piśācaiḥ puruṣasya jagdhaṃ bhavaty ātmanaḥ | ā pīlo pyāyate punas tava cāśnāti pippalam || pīluṃ tvāhuḥ pīvaṃ tvāhur atho tvāhur vanaspatim | sarvā te bhadrā nāmāni tebhir naḥ pāhy aṃhasaḥ || rakṣohaṇaṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ pīluṃ piśācajambhanam | jajñānam agre vṛkṣāṇāṃ taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe ||
sagarāya śatruhaṇe svāhā || śarṇīlāya śatruhaṇe svāhā || samudrāya śatruhaṇe svāhā || sandhasāya śatruhaṇe svāhā || iṣirāya śatruhaṇe svāhā || avasyave śatruhaṇe svāhā || vāyave śatruhaṇe svāhā || vātāya śatruhaṇe svāhā || mātariśvane śatruhaṇe svāhā || pavamānāya śatruhaṇe svāhā ||
anuvāka 4 ||
Kāṇḍa 8
kathā dive asurāya bravāma kathā pitre haraye tveṣanṛmṇaḥ | pṛśniṃ varuṇa dakṣiṇāṃ dadāvān punarmagha tvaṃ manasācikitsīḥ || na kāmena punarmagho bhavāmi saṃpṛcya kaṃ pṛśnim etām upāje | kena mat tvam atharvan kāvyena kena jātenāsi jātavedāḥ || satyam ahaṃ gabhīraḥ kāvyena satyaṃ jātenāsmi jātavedāḥ | na me dāso nāryo mahitvaṃ vrataṃ mīmāya yad ahaṃ dhariṣye || na tvad anyaḥ kavitaro na vedhā na dhīrataro varuṇa svadhāvaḥ | tvam aṅga viśvā janimāni vettha sa cin nu tvaj jano māyī bibhāya || tvaṃ hy aṅga varuṇa svadhāvo viśvāni vettha janimā śardhanīte | kim enā rajasaḥ paro 'sti kim avareṇāvaram amura || ekam enā rajasaḥ paro 'sti para ekena durdāśaṃ cid anyat | tat te vidvān varuṇa pra bravīmy adhovacasaḥ paṇayo bhavantu nīcair dāsā upa sarpantu riprāḥ || tvaṃ hy aṅga varuṇa pra bravīṣi punarmagheṣv avadyāni bhūri | mo ṣu paṇy abhy etāvatā bhūr mā tvā vocann arādhasaṃ janāsaḥ || mā mā vocann arādhasaṃ janāsaḥ punas te pṛśniṃ jaritar dadāmi | stotraṃ me viśvam ā yāhi janeṣv antar deveṣu mānuṣeṣu vipra || ā te stotrāṇi vardhanāni yāmi dehi tan mahyaṃ yad adattam asti | yujyo naḥ saptapadaḥ sakhāsi samā nau bandhur varuṇaḥ samā jā || veda vai tad yan nau samā jā dadāmi tubhyaṃ yad adattam asti | devo devāya gṛṇate vayodhā vipro viprāya stuvate sumedhāḥ || ajījano hi varuṇa svadhāvann atharvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ viśvadevam | tasmā urv āyuṣ kṛṇuhi praśastaṃ Bhatt. āyuḥ sakhā no 'si paramaś ca bandhuḥ ||
vṛṣā me ravo nabhasā na tanyatur ugreṇa taṃ vacasā bādha id u te | ahaṃ tam asya grabhir agrabhaṃ rasaṃ jyotiṣeva tamasa ud eti sūryaḥ || yat te 'podakaṃ viṣaṃ tat ta āt tābhir agrabham | gṛhṇāmi madhyam uttamam utāvamaṃ bhiyasā neśad ād u te || balena te balaṃ hanmi tanvā hanmi te tanum | viṣeṇa hanmi te viṣam ahe mṛṣīṣṭhā mā jīvīḥ see Kim 2014, 17; Bhatt. muriṣṭā, jīvīt pratyag abhy etu tvā viṣam || asitasya taimātasya babhror apodakasya ca | sātrāsāhasya manyor jyām ugrasyeva dhanvano vi muñcāmi rathām̐ iva || kailāta pṛśna upatṛṇya babhrav ā me śṛṇutāsitā alīkāḥ | mā naḥ sakhyuḥ kāmam api ṣṭhād āśrāvayāddho vīrṣe ramadhvam || āliki ca vili pitā yas te mātā ca | vidma te viśvato bandhum arasa kiṃ kariṣyasi || urugūlāyā duhitā jātā dāsy asiknyāḥ | prataṅkaṃ dadruṣī nu sāhīn arasām̐ akaḥ || karṇā śvāvid abravīd girer avacarantikā | yāḥ kāś cemāḥ khanitrimās tāsām arasatamaṃ viṣam || tābuvaṃ na tābuvaṃ na ghed asi tvaṃ tābuvam | tābuvenārasaṃ viṣam || tastuvaṃ na tastuvaṃ na ghed asi tvaṃ tastuvam | tastuvenārasaṃ viṣam || arasaṃ te 'he viṣam iyaṃ kṛṇotv oṣadhiḥ | trāyamāṇā sahamānā sahasvatī sahātā id gor aśvāt puruṣād viṣam ||
yad āñjanaṃ traikakudaṃ jātaṃ himavatas pari | yātūṃś ca sarvān jambhayā sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ || utevāsi paripāṇaṃ yātujambhanam āñjana | utāmṛtatvasyeśiṣa utāsi pitubhojanam || paripāṇaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ paripāṇaṃ gavām asi | aśvānām arvatām it paripāṇāya tasthiṣe || pari māṃ pari ṇaḥ priyaṃ pari ṇaḥ pāhi yad dhanam | arātir in no mā tārīn mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat || na taṃ prāpnoti śapatho na kṛtyā nābhiśocanam | nainaṃ viṣkandham aśnute yas tvā bibharty āñjana || āsan mantryād duṣvapnyāt kṣetriyāc chapathād uta | durhārdaś cakṣuṣo ghorāt tasmān naḥ pāhy āñjana || trayo dāsā āñjanasya takmā balāsa ād ahiḥ | varṣiṣṭhaḥ parvatānāṃ trikakun nāma te pitā || vṛtrasyāsi kanīnikā parvatasyāsy akṣyau | devebhiḥ sarvaiḥ proktaṃ paridhir nāma vā asi || vaido ha veda te nāma gandharvaḥ parivācanam | yata āñjana prajāyase tata ehy ariṣṭatātaye || yadi vāsi traikakudaṃ yadi yāmunam ucyase | ubhe te bhadre nāmnī tābhyāṃ naḥ pāhy āñjana || yasyāñjana prasarpasy aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparuḥ | tasmād yakṣmaṃ vi bādhasva- -ugro madhyamaśīr iva || nainaṃ ghnanti paryāyiṇo na sannām̐ ava gacchati | jane sa na pra mīyate yas tvā bibharty āñjana || idaṃ vidvān āñjana satyaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam | saneyam aśvaṃ gāṃ vāsa ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa ||
ya ekavṛṣo 'si sṛjāraso 'si || yo dvivṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yas trivṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yaś caturvṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yaḥ pañcavṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yaḥ ṣaḍvṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yaḥ saptavṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yo 'ṣṭavṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yo navavṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yo daśavṛṣo 'si (…) || see 1b yo 'podako 'si sṛjāraso 'si ||
ekā ca me daśa ca- -apavaktāra oṣadhe | ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu tvā madhulā karat || dve ca me viṃśatiś ca (…) || see 1bcd tisraś ca me triṃśac ca (…) || see 1bcd catasraś ca me catvāriṃśac ca (…) || see 1bcd pañca ca me pañcāśac ca (…) || see 1bcd ṣaṭ ca me ṣaṣṭiś ca (…) || see 1bcd sapta ca me saptatiś ca (…) || see 1bcd aṣṭa ca me 'śītiś ca (…) || see 1bcd nava ca me navatiś ca (…) || see 1bcd daśa ca me śataṃ ca (…) || see 1bcd śataṃ ca me sahasraṃ ca- -apavaktāra oṣadhe | ṛtajāta ṛtāvari madhu tvā madhulā karat ||
anuvāka 1 ||
ā paśyasi prati paśyasi parā paśyasi paśyasi | dyām antarikṣam ād bhūmiṃ tat sarvaṃ devi paśyasi || tisro divas tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ ṣaṭ cemaḥ pradiśo mahīḥ | tayāhaṃ sarvān yātūn paśyāni devy oṣadhe || suparṇasya divyasya tasya hāsi kanīnikā | sā bhūmim ā rurohitha vahyaṃ śrāntā vadhūr iva || tāṃ me sahasrākṣo devo dakṣiṇe hasta ā dadhat | tayāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāmi yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam || yathā śvā caturakṣo yathāśvaḥ śyāvo 'rvatām | yathāgnir viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ Bhatt. pratyaṅ evā tvam asy oṣadhe || kaśyapasya cakṣur asi śunyāś caturakṣyāḥ | vīdhre sūryam iva sarpantaṃ mā piśācaṃ tiras karaḥ || darśaya mā yātudhānān darśaya yātudhānyaḥ | āpaspṛta iva tiṣṭhantaṃ darśaya mā kimīdinam || ud agrabhaṃ paripāṇaṃ yātudhānāt kimīdinaḥ | tenāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāny uta śūdram utāryam || yathā sūryaś candramāś ca viśvā bhūtā vipaśyataḥ | evā vi paśya tān tvam aghāyur mopa gād iha || yo antarikṣeṇa patati bhūmiṃ yaś copasarpati | divaṃ yo manyate nāthaṃ taṃ piśācaṃ dṛśe kuru || āviṣ kṛṇuṣva rūpāṇi mātmānam apa gūhathāḥ | adhā sahasracakṣo tvaṃ prati paśyāsy āyataḥ ||
mokṣejāṃs todāṃs tumalān pathiṣṭhām̐ uta pārṣatān | ahīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣam arasaṃ kṛṇv oṣadhe || aśvakrandasya vaṇḍasya pṛdākor gonaser uta | śvitrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣam arasaṃ kṛṇv oṣadhe || dyāṃpātasya gavakasya godhāpṛṣṭher aher uta | asitānām etaj jātam ariṣṭe 'rasaṃ kṛdhi || etaj jātaṃ svajānāṃ tad babhro arasaṃ kṛdhi | sarvasya babhror bheṣajy asīha viṣadūṣaṇī || asīha with Kim 2014, 64, Bhatt./Or. asī hi trāyamāṇā pra bravītu sarvāṅ rājño ahīnām | tiraścirājīn asitān atho upaśayāś ca ye || sahasāhaṃ yātudhānān sahasā yātudhānyaḥ | saho vaḥ sarvān sāsāha tasyāhaṃ nāma jagrabha || sahaḥ sākaṃ paidvena- -ugreṇa vacasā mama | andhāhīṃś ca sṛjayāś ca śaphakāṃś ca rathavrayaḥ | sahasā saha utpatya tān sarvām̐ arasām̐ akaḥ || asitasya vidradhasya harito yaś ca vidradhaḥ | nimaṅkṣī vidradhānāṃ yo mṛjantī tām̐ ajījabhat || yaḥ svajānāṃ nīlagrīvo yaḥ svajānāṃ harir uta | kalmāṣapuccham oṣadhe jambhayāsy arundhati || māyaṃ marad ahidaṣṭaḥ pitur asmā asad viṣam | imā hy asmā oṣadhim ā harāmy arundhatīm || etaj jātaṃ pṛdākūnām arasaṃ jīvale kṛdhi | indrasya bhadrikā vīrud asīha viṣadūṣaṇī || asīha see Kim 2014, 64; Bhatt. asī hi
śatam arvāk pra syandante pra syandante śataṃ paraḥ | śataṃ vṛtrasya kāṇḍāni tebhya āpo vi dhāvatha || antarikṣe patayiṣṇavo nabhasas pari jajñire | āpo hiraṇyavarṇās tās te bhavantu śaṃ hṛde || śaṃ te santu hṛdayāya śaṃ te hṛdayyābhyaḥ | Bhatt. hṛdayābhyaḥ śaṃ te yakaklomabhyaḥ śam u te antaṣṭebhyaḥ || Bhatt. te yantaṣṭebhyaḥ yad aṅgair apasismiṣe yac chīrṣṇā yac ca pṛṣṭibhiḥ | āpas tat sarvaṃ niṣ karan taṣṭā riṣṭam ivānasaḥ || saṃ hṛdayena hṛdayam opaśena sam opaśaḥ | adbhir muñcāpasmitaṃ pārṣṇidyotaḥ sam etu me || ācarantīḥ parvatebhyo devīr devebhyas pari | āpo yam adya prāpan na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ || śaṃ ta āpo haimavatīḥ śam u te santūtsyāḥ | śaṃ te saniṣyadā āpaḥ śam u te santu varṣyāḥ || śaṃ ta āpo dhanvanyāḥ śam u te santv anūpyāḥ | śaṃ te khanitrimā āpaḥ śaṃ yāḥ kumbhebhir ābhṛtāḥ || anabhrayaḥ khanamānā viprā gambhīre 'pasaḥ | bhiṣagbhyo bhiṣaktarā āpo acchā vadāmasi || apām aha divyānām apāṃ srotasyānām | apām aha praṇejane 'śvā bhavatha vājinaḥ || tā āpaḥ śivā āpo 'yakṣmaṃkaraṇīr apaḥ | yathaiva tṛṣyate mayas tās ta ādyuttabheṣajī ||
brahmajyeṣṭhā saṃbhṛtā vīryāṇi brahmāgre jyeṣṭhaṃ divam ā tatāna | bhūtānāṃ brahma prathamota jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā spardhituṃ kaḥ || brahmeme dyāvāpṛthivī brahmeme sapta sindhavaḥ | brahmeme sarva ādityā brahma devā upāsate || brahma brāhmaṇo vadati brahma rātrī ni viśate | sāvitraṃ brahmaṇo jātaṃ brahmaṇāgnir vi rocate || brahmauṣadhayo ni tiṣṭhanti brahma varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ | brahmedaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yāvat sūryo vipaśyati || brahma hotā brahma yajño brahmaṇā svaravo mitāḥ | adhvaryur brahmaṇo jāto brahmaṇot tirate haviḥ || brahma sruco ghṛtavatīr brahmaṇā vedir udyatā | brahma yajñasya tantava ṛtvijo ye haviṣkṛtaḥ || brahma ṛṣabho bhadraretā brahma gāvo haviṣkṛtaḥ | brahma rathasya devasya yaj jayāti svaraṅkṛtaḥ || brahmaṇā śīraṃ vahati brahmaṇā yujyate rathaḥ | brahmaṇā puruṣo dvipān na vyathate caran || brahmaṇo jātā ṛṣayo brahmaṇo rājanyā uta | brahmedaṃ brahmaṇo jātaṃ brahmaṇo +'viṣyā annam || brahma śūdrā rājanyānāṃ brahmaiṣām uta vikṣadaḥ | brahmaiṣāṃ bhadraṃ sādanaṃ brahmaṇaiṣāṃ sabhāsadaḥ || brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmeme kitavā uta | strīpuṃsau brahmaṇo jātau striyo brahma uta vāvana || brahmodvato nivato brahma saṃvato vānaspatyāḥ parvatā brahma vīrudhaḥ | brahmedaṃ sarvam anv ā tatāna- -antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe || brahmaivābhūd uttaraṃ jātavedo radvajro yātudhānaṃ mahālam | bhavāśarvau tapuṣīṃ hetim asmai mayeṣitau vi sṛjatāṃ vadhāya ||
yad aśvinā oṣadhīṣv āsiktaṃ puṣkarasrajā vīrudho madhu bibhrati | tenāham asyā mūrdhānam abhi ṣiñcāmi nāryāḥ || yad aśvinā puṣpād adhi mākṣikaṃ madhu saṃbhṛtam | anne lavaṇe yan madhu tenā(…) || see 1de yad aśvinā gulgunyā- -āñjane madhu saṃbhṛtaṃ yad asmin madhughe madhu | (…) || see 1de yad aśvinākṣa madhu goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu | surāyāṃ sicyamānāyāṃ kīlāle 'dhi yan madhu | tenā(…) || see 1de yad aśvinā govarcasaṃ hiraṇyavarcasaṃ hastivarcasam aśvinā | tenāham asyā mūrdhānam abhi ṣiñcāmi nāryāḥ || abhi nandam abhi modam abhi darpaṃ kṛṇomi te | ā te bhagaṃ vartayatām aśvinā puṣkarasrajā || datsu te varcaḥ subhage jihvāyāṃ te madhūlakam | akṣyau nikaraṇī tava pratīkaṃ madhumattaram || ā sacasva talāśeva vṛkṣa ivāpatikaḥ patim | tvaṃ sam agrabhīḥ puṃsaḥ śyena ivānyān patatriṇaḥ || ā hi te hārṣam udakam apo bhagābhiṣecanīḥ | yat te varco 'pakrāntaṃ mukhasya praticakṣaṇāt | punas tad aśvinā tvayy ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā || abhi tvā varcasāsicaṃ divyena payasā saha | yathā pativatny aso devṛgbhyo madhumattarā || bhagaṃ te mitrāvaruṇā bhagaṃ devī sarasvatī | bhagaṃ te aśvinobhā- -ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā || patiṃ te rājā varuṇaḥ patiṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | patiṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca patiṃ dhātā dadhātu te ||
anuvāka 2 ||
catasras te khala sraktīr atho madhyam ahaṃ khala | dhārāś catasra stoṣyāmi vediṃ manuṣyavardhanīm || ūrjasvantam ā rabhadhvaṃ sphātimantaṃ punītana | indro bījasyābhyāvoḍhā bhaga aitu purogavaḥ || bhagasya hy anaḍvāhau yuñjāthāṃ rāśivāhanau | adhā pṛthivyāḥ kīlālam ihā vahatam aśvinā || abhivṛtaḥ parihito dhānyena vibhuḥ prabhuḥ | bhartā manuṣyāṇāṃ jajñe devānām ājyaṃ khalaḥ || sruca āsan pavanīḥ sṛṇīkāḥ paridhiṣkṛtaḥ | kīnāśā āsan hotāro bījadā āsīd dhaviṣpatiḥ || ihendra muṣṭī vi sṛjasva pūrṇāv iha saumanasaḥ sam ṛdhyatām | hutādo ye ca gandharvās ta iha sphātiṃ sam ā vahān || atipaśyo nicāyaka iḍukaḥ pakvam ā bhara | īśānā gandharvā bhuvanasya sarva ā vahantu khale spātim iha sūnṛtāṃ ca || ā paścād ā purastād ottarād adharād uta | indreha vasor īśānaḥ khale sphātiṃ sam ā vaha || sphātim indraḥ khale bahvīm ihot prāṇa ut pṛṇat | sphātiṃ me viśve devāḥ sphātiṃ somo atho bhagaḥ || sphātir me astu hastayoḥ sphātir yatra parārabhe | śatahastedam ut pṛṇa samudrasyeva madhyataḥ || iha me bhūya ā bhara yathāhaṃ kāmaye tathā | yathedam ud iva sphāyātai traya iva hastinaḥ saha ||
svādvīṃ tvā mitrāvaruṇā svādvīṃ devī sarasvatī | svādvīṃ tvā aśvinā sure kṛṇutāṃ puṣkarasrajā || yām asiñcan saudhanvanā viśve devā marudgaṇāḥ | yām aśvināsiñcatāṃ sā surā bahu dhāvatu || svādoḥ svādīyasī bhava madhor madhutarā bhava | yatha rśyasyeyam āriśy evā tvaṃ subhage bhava || abhrāj jātaṃ varṣāj jātam atho jātaṃ divas pari | atho samudrāj jātaṃ tat surādaraṇaṃ bhava || nāḍī nāmāsi januṣā sā surādaraṇī bhava | sakhā hi bhadras ta āsīd vṛkṣaḥ svāduvikaṅkataḥ || asuras tv aurdhvanabhasaś cakāra prathamaḥ sure | sure dāsasya tvā gṛhe śiraś cāndhaś ca cakratuḥ || niṣ puṣpakaṃ kaśīkāyā nir dhārāyāḥ surām uta | ud ehi vājinīvati kim aṅkatiṣv icchasi || ime te janyā āsate gambhīrā abhidhṛṣṇavaḥ | sure devi pari prehi mādayantī janaṃjanam || yasyā gṛhṇanti sthālena gām aśvaṃ dhānyaṃ vasu | sā surā bahu dhāvatu || ācarantīḥ parvatebhyaḥ khanamānā anabhrayaḥ | yāsāṃ samudre saṃsthānaṃ yāsāṃ nāsti niveśanaṃ tās te dadatu budbudam || udaṅkodacemāṃ surāṃ yāṃ hṛdā kāmayāmahe | tāṃ me bhagas tām aśvinā tāṃ ma āvāṭ sarasvatī || ayaṃ devo mayūlaśaḥ sā surādaraṇaṃ dadat | saṃsravaṇāt prasravaṇād giribhyas pary ābhṛtaḥ | madhye śatasya maṣṭiṣko 'naḍvān iva mehatu ||
samudrād ūrmir madhumām̐ ud ārad upāṃśunā sam amṛtatvam ānaṭ | ghṛtasya nāma guhyaṃ yad asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ || vayaṃ nāma pra bravāmā ghṛtasya- -asmin yajñe dhārayāmā namobhiḥ | upa brahmā śṛṇavac chasyamānaṃ catuḥśṛṅgo 'vamīd gaura etat || catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya | tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyām̐ ā viveśa || tridhā hitaṃ paṇibhir guhyamānaṃ gavi devāso ghṛtam anv avindan | indra ekaṃ sūrya ekaṃ jajāna venād ekaṃ svadhayā niṣ ṭatakṣuḥ || etā arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāc chatavrajā ripuṇā nāvacakṣe | ghṛtasya dhārā abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayo vetaso madhya āsām || samyak sravanti sarito na dhenā antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ | ete arṣanty ūrmayo ghṛtasya mṛgā iva kṣipaṇor īṣamāṇāḥ || sindhor iva prādhvane śūghanāso vātaḥ pramīyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ | ghṛtasya dhārā aruṣo na vājī kāṣṭhā bhindann ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ || abhi pravanta samaneva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāso agnim | ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidho nasanta tā juṣāṇo haryati jātavedāḥ || kanyā iva vahatum etavā u añjy añjānā abhi cākaśīmi | yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajño ghṛtasya dhārā abhi tat pavante || abhy arṣata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājīm asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta | imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavante || dhāman te viśvaṃ bhuvanam adhi śritam antaḥ samudre hṛdy antar āyuṣi | apām anīkāt samithād ya ābhṛtas tam aśyāma madhumantaṃ ta ūrmim ||
dve virūpe carataḥ svarthe anyānyā vatsam upa dhāpayete | harir anyasyāṃ bhavati svadhāvāñ chukro anyasyāṃ dadṛśe suvarcāḥ || Bhatt. śukro daśemaṃ tvaṣṭur janayanta garbham atandrāso yuvatayo vibhṛtram | tigmānīkaṃ svayaśasaṃ janeṣu virocamānaṃ pari ṣīṃ nayanti || trīṇī jānāt prati bhūṣanty asya samudra ekaṃ divy ekam apsu | pūrvām anu pra diśaṃ pārthivānām ṛtūn praśāsad vi dadhāv anuṣṭhu || ka imaṃ vo niṇyam ā ciketa vatso mātṝr janayata svadhābhiḥ | bahvīnāṃ garbho apasām upasthān mahān kavir niś carati svadhāvān || āviṣṭyo vardhate cārur āsu jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ svayasām upasthe | ubhe tvaṣṭur bibhyatur jāyamānāt pratīcī siṃhaṃ prati joṣayete || ubhe bhadre joṣayete na mene gāvo na vāśrā upa tasthur evaiḥ | sa dakṣāṇāṃ dakṣapatir babhūva- -añjanti yaṃ dakṣiṇato havirbhiḥ || ud yaṃyamīti saviteva bāhū ubhe sicau yatate bhīma ṛñjan | uc chukram atkam ajate simasmān navā mātṛbhyo vasanā jahāti || tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇuta uttaraṃ yat saṃpṛñcānaḥ sadanaṃ gobhir adbhiḥ | kavir budhnaṃ pari marmṛjyate dhīḥ sā devatātā samitir babhūva || uru te jrayaḥ pary eti budhnaṃ virocamānaṃ mahiṣasya dhāma | viśvebhir agne svayaśobhir iddho 'dabdhebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhy asmān || dhanvaṃ srotaḥ kṛṇute gātum ūrmiṃ śukrair ūrmibhir abhi nakṣati kṣām | viśvā sanāni jaṭhareṣu dhatte 'ntar navāsu carati prasūṣu || evā no agne samidhā vṛdhāno revat pāvaka śravasā vi bhāhi | tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
yo jāmadagnya iha kauśiko ya ātreya uta kāśyapo yaḥ | bharadvājā gotamā ye vasiṣṭhās tebhyaḥ pra brūma iha kilbiṣāṇi || agastyayaḥ kaṇvāḥ kutsāḥ prasravaṇā virūpā gargā mudgalā yaskāḥ śūnakāḥ | saṃkṛtayo brāhmaṇā ye na drugdhās tebhyaḥ pra brūma iha kilbiṣāṇi || yo nottiṣṭhād brāhmaṇe nādhamāne māndyena dṛpta uta dhairyeṇa | viśve devā upadraṣṭāro 'sya tasmin viṣaṃ saṃ nayān kilbiṣyam || yā ropayaḥ kilbiṣe brāhmaṇasya yāni caināṃsi bahudhā duṣkṛtāni | anutiṣṭhan prokta ātmani taṃ ni dhatte tathā tad devā uta veśayanti || nāśnīyān na piben na śayīta na niṃsīta jāyāṃ nota putram | brahmakilbiṣe prokta ud eva tiṣṭhet sa ṛtasya panthāḥ || śatarcino mādhyamā ye maharṣayaḥ kṣudrasūktānām uta yā prajeha | ṛṣīṇāṃ yāni janimāni vidmas tebhyaḥ pra brūma iha kilbiṣāṇi || sodaryāṇāṃ pañcadaśānāṃ śatānāṃ trayastriṃśad ud aśiṣyanta devāḥ | ekasmin viddhe sarve 'rupyaṃ tad brāhmaṇe kilbiṣam anv avindan || tasmai sa druhyād ya idaṃ nāyad yo nottiṣṭhād yo na vadātā asmin | brāhmaṇasya kilbiṣe nāthitasya sodaryatām icchato brāhmaṇeṣu || uttiṣṭhad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃ vadadhvaṃ jītaṃ yācāma punar aitu sarvam | indrāgnī viśve devās te me jītaṃ punar ā vartayantu || sa dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇute sa prajāyai cikitsati | yo brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇo hūto anveti kilbiṣe || nāsya prajāṃ śarvo hanti na rudro hanti nāśaniḥ | yo brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇaḥ satye vadati kilbiṣe || taṃ somapītho juṣate nṛcakṣā grāvabhiḥ saha | yo brāhmaṇasyāstāṃ hṛdaḥ sūrya ivāpālupat tamaḥ || ya utthāya kilbiṣe brāhmaṇasyānnasīcchann avāyati | ubhe enaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃ tapatām athaitv agatasya panthām ||
anuvāka 3 ||
nava ca yā navatiś cārūḍhā vakṣaṇā anu | itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu nuttāḥ putthajño mayā || sapta ca yāḥ saptatiś cārūḍhā vakṣaṇā anu | itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu nuttāḥ putthajño mayā || pañca ca yāḥ pañcāśac cārūḍhā vakṣaṇā anu | itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu nuttāḥ putthajño mayā || ūrubhyāṃ te 'ṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ bhaṃsasaḥ | striyā jāra iva putthajñīṃ pra mṛṇīmasi || anusṛptāṃ gahaneṣu dhrūkṣṇāṃ pāpīṃ śimidvatīm | tām etāṃ dasyūnāṃ dāsīṃ pra dahātaś cukākaṇi || yā strīṇāṃ putrasadanaṃ kevaṭān upasarpati | tām etāṃ dasyūnāṃ dāsīṃ pra dahātaś cukākaṇi || pra patātaḥ sukaṭanāḍi suṣeḥ kuṣītako yathā | srakve te tipraṃ dhakṣyāmi sā naśiṣyasi putthagi || yadāsyāḥ srakve dahed yadā mūrdhānam agninā | athaiṣā dasyūnāṃ dāsī putthagi ni layiṣyate || saṃvatsaram acaro asurebhyaḥ prataṅkinī | yatra kṣetrasya durgandhi tat ta etan nyañcanam || naitat tava mātaraṃ sthā na ta etan nyañcanam | asmākam etad vīrebhyo devaiḥ prajananaṃ kṛtam || girau te 'śma putram udakaṃ himavatsu | tatropapraskadya nṛty ajāmi yūtheṣu putthagi || sa tvaṃ gobhir aśvaiḥ prajayā prataraṃ bhava | yo mā tatra prāhaiṣīr yatra jīvanti bhadrayā ||
mitraḥ pṛthivyod akrāmat tāṃ puraṃ pra ṇayāmi vaḥ | tām ā viśata tāṃ pra viśata sā vaḥ śarma ca varma ca yacchatu || vāyur antarikṣeṇod (…) || see 1abcd sūryo divod (…) || see 1abcd candramā nakṣatrair ud (…) || see 1abcd soma oṣadhībhir ud (…) || see 1abcd yajño dakṣiṇābhir ud (…) || see 1abcd samudro nadībhir ud (…) || see 1abcd brahma brahmacāribhir ud ((…) || see 1abcd indro vīryeṇod akrāmat tāṃ (…) || see 1bcd devā amṛtenod akrāman tāṃ (…) || see 1bcd prajāpatiḥ prajābhir ud akrāmat tāṃ puraṃ pra ṇayāmi vaḥ | tām ā viśata tāṃ pra viśata sā vaḥ śarma ca varma ca yacchatu ||
saṃyujyantaḥ prakṛṣanto yad vo devā upocire | tām ebhyaḥ satyām āśiṣam indra khalvāṃ sam ardhaya || anaḍvāhaḥ satyāvānaḥ sīraṃ kṛṇotu me vacaḥ | yatrāhaitad dhitāya te tat parjanyo 'bhi vo vṛṣat || divyā āpo vaḥ śakvarīr anu vi yantu gahvare | ūrjasvatīr ghṛtavatīḥ payasvatīr dṛśe bhavata mā guhā || ud ehi vājinīvatī pūrṇapātrā tviṣīmatī | duhānā pūṣarakṣitā kāmam eṣāṃ sam ā pṛṇa || iyaṃ sītā phalavatī śatavalśā vi rohatu | iyaṃ sahasrabhogā asyā indra upāvatu || aśvinā phālaṃ kalpayatām upāvatu bṛhaspatiḥ | yathāsad bahudhānyam ayakṣmaṃ bahupūruṣam || yad vo devā upocira iha bhūyaḥ syād iti | iha tām utpṛṇāṃ vayaṃ devīm upa hvayāmahe || idaṃ ma ut pṛṇād iti sphātiṃ ma ut pṛṇād iti | rāśiṃ me vardhayād iti || sphātikāro bahukāraḥ sphirasphoṣṭhāyam akṣitaḥ | khalo jyeṣṭho vibhuḥ prabhuḥ || tasmin dhānyaṃ ny upyate yavo vrīhir atho tilaḥ | tasya gṛhṇīta yat kṛtaṃ parikṣāya catuḥśatam || śarkārivan mayāravac Bhatt. mayārava cakrīvat kiṃ ca yad vṛṣe | tad vai sphātir upāyatī sarvam evāti ricyate || Bhatt. rucyate mahāñjane parā jahi sahasrāpoṣam ardaya | bahvī na oṣadhe bhava samudrasyeva saṃsravaḥ ||
ājyād ajaḥ sam abhavad deśebhya odanā ime | tān apaśyad bṛhaspatiḥ sa vai pañcaudano 'bhavat || caturdhaitāṃ sam abhara odanāṃs tvaṃ bṛhaspate | aja ājyāj jātaḥ sa eṣāṃ pañcamo 'bhavat || dhūmena divam āpnoty antarikṣam utoṣmaṇā | diśa āpnoti cakṣuṣā ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ || yā te mātā yas te pitā bhrātaro ye ca te svāḥ | ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ paktvā sarve tam upa jīvata || ye te pūrve parāgatā apare pitaraś ca ye | tebhyo ghṛtasya kulyaitu śatadhārā vyundatī || ye sarvadā dadati ye vā pacanty odanam | te vai yamasya rājyād uttare loka āsate || nātirātra āpnoti nainam āpnoty ukthyaḥ | nāgniṣṭoma āpnoty ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ savam || daśarātreṇa saṃmito dvādaśāhena kalpate | dīrghasattreṇa saṃmito 'jaḥ pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ || teṣāṃ barhiṣyaṃ sarvaṃ yan naṣṭaṃ yac ca mriyate | yac ca steno 'pājati yeṣāṃ pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ || yā pūrvapatiṃ vittvā- -athānyaṃ vindate 'param | pañcaudanaṃ ca tāv ajaṃ pacato na vi yoṣataḥ || samānaloko bhavati punarbhuvāparaḥ patiḥ | ajaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dakṣiṇājyotiṣaṃ dadat ||
sūryo mā varcasokṣatu- -ukṣatām aśvinobhā | āditya ūrdhva uccaran sa u mā varcasokṣatu || varcasā māṃ pitur agnir varcasā mā bṛhaspatiḥ | surāyāḥ sicyamānāyāḥ kīlālavarcasena mā | tena mām aśvinobhā ukṣatāṃ puṣkarasrajā || varcasvan me mukham astu rocamānaṃ viṣāsahi | tan mā hiraṇyavarcasaṃ kṛṇomi paśyatāṃ priyam || madhor ahaṃ madhutaro madhughān madhumattaraḥ | mām anu pra viśatu varca ṛṣabho vāśitām iva || idam āñjanam ānaje varcasyam ā kanikradam | yathā kanikradac carāṇi varcasā ca bhagena ca || varcasāgnim ā dadhati varcasod eti sūryaḥ | yāvad varco gohiraṇyasya tāvan me varco bhūyāt || yāvat tvaṃ deva sūrya udyann abhi vipaśyasi | tāvan mā varcasābhi vi paśya || pūrṇo bhagasyāhaṃ bhūtvā- -arukṣaṃ varcaso ratham | sa mā vahatu sarvadā- -āyuṣmantaṃ suvarcasam || bhagenāhaṃ parihito varcasā draviṇena ca | yathā carāṇi sarvadā rocamānaṃ vibhāvasu || evā mā bhaga āgamad evā mā varca āgamat | evā mā teja āgamad evā mā yaśa āgamat || hiraṇyayena cakreṇa bhagasyāpihito gṛhaḥ | taṃ vy ubjāmi brahmaṇā tasya me dattam aśvinā dattaṃ me puṣkarasrajā ||
anuvāka 4 ||
Kāṇḍa 9
ūrdhvā asya samidho bhavanty ūrdhvā śukrā śocīṃṣy agneḥ | dyumattamā supratīkasya sūnos tanūnapād asuro viśvavedāḥ || devo deveṣu devaḥ patho anakti madhvā ghṛtena | madhvā yajñaṃ nakṣati prīṇāno narāśaṃsaḥ sukṛd devaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ || acchāyam eti śavasā ghṛtena- -īḍe vahniṃ namasāgnim | sruco adhvareṣu prayatsu || sa yakṣad asya mahimānam agneḥ sa in mandrāsu prayatsu | vasoś cetiṣṭho vasudhātamaś ca || dvāro devīr annasya viśve vratā dadante agneḥ | uruvyacaso dhāmnā patyamānāḥ || te asya vṛṣaṇo divyā nu yonā | uṣāsānaktemaṃ yajñam avatām adhvaraṃ naḥ || daivā hotāra imam adhvaraṃ no agner jihvem abhi gṛṇīta | kṛṇutā naḥ sviṣṭim || tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantv iḍā sarasvatī mahī | bhāratī gṛṇānā || tan nas turīpam adbhutaṃ purukṣu | tvaṣṭā suvīryaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ vi syarta nābhim asme || vanaspate ava sṛjā rarāṇas tmanā devebhyaḥ | agnir havyaṃ śamitā sūdayāti || agne svāhā kṛṇu jātaveda indrāya bhāgam | viśve devā havir idaṃ juṣantām ||
yajūṃṣi yajñe samidhaḥ svāhā- -agniḥ pravidvān iha vo yunaktu | yunaktu devaḥ savitā prajānann asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā || indra ukthāmadāni yajñe asmin pravidvān yunaktu suyujaḥ svāhā | chandāṃsi yajñaṃ marutaḥ svāhā māteva putraṃ pipṛteha yuktāḥ || praiṣā nivida āpriyo yajūṃṣi śiṣṭāḥ patnībhir vahateha yuktāḥ | eyam agan barhiṣā prokṣaṇībhir yajñaṃ tanvānā aditiḥ svāhā || viṣṇur yunaktu bahudhā tapāṃsy asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā || tvaṣṭā yunaktu bahudhā nu rūpāṇy asmin yajñe (…) || see 4b indro yunaktu bahudhā vīryāny asmin (…) || see 4b somo yunaktu bahudhā payāṃsy asmin (…) || see 4b bhago yunaktv āśiṣo nv asmā thus ŚS; Bhatt. ny asmāṃ asmin yajñe suyujaḥ svāhā || aśvinā brahmaṇetam arvāg vaṣaṭkāreṇa yajñaṃ vardhayantau svāhā || bṛhaspate brahmaṇehy arvāṅ yajño 'yaṃ svar idaṃ yajamānāya dhehi svāhā || Bhatt. itaṃ
āpaḥ punantu varuṇaḥ punātv ayaṃ ca yaḥ pavate viśvadānīm | yajño bhago adhivaktā vidhartā- -agniś ca naḥ pāvayetāṃ sūryaś ca || daśaśīrṣo daśajihva ā rabhe vīrako bhiṣak | mā te riṣaṃ khanitā yasmai ca tvā khanāmasi || daśarātre kilāsasya vīrudhā veda bheṣajam | itas tad abhriyākhanaṃ kilāsaṃ nāśayāmi te || apsv anyā vi rohati dhanvany anyādhi tiṣṭhati | kilāsam anyānīnaśad varcasānyā sam ukṣatu || ājyena ghṛtena juhomi kilāsabheṣajam | vīrudhām agneḥ saṅkāśe kilāsaṃ nānu vidyate || piśaṅgarūpo bhavati kalmāṣam uta saṃdṛśi | kilāsa naśyetaḥ paraḥ pra tvā dhakṣyāmi vīrudhā || yāni pṛthag utpatanti nakṣatrāṇīva saṃdṛśi | kilāsaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayann ogha ivābhy emi vīrudhā || yadi vā puruṣeṣitāt kilāsa paryājagan | namo namasyāmo devān pratyak kartāram ṛcchatu || śīrṣṇas te skandhebhyo lalāṭāt pari karṇayoḥ | oṣadhyā varṣajūtayā kilāsaṃ nāśayāmi te | svas tvā varṇa āyaty anarātiḥ sahauṣadhiḥ || grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt | (…) || see 9cdef aṃsābhyāṃ te dorbhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ pari hastayoḥ | (…) || see 9cdef pṛṣṭibhyas te pārśvābhyāṃ śroṇibhyāṃ pari bhaṃsasaḥ | (…) || see 9cdef ūrubhyāṃ te 'ṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām | oṣadhyā varṣajūtayā kilāsaṃ nāśayāmi te | svas tvā varṇa āyaty anarātiḥ sahauṣadhiḥ ||
sahaiva vo hṛdayāni saha vijñānam astu vaḥ | sahendro vṛtrahā karat saha devo bṛhaspatiḥ || samānam astu vo hṛdayaṃ samānam uto vo manaḥ | samāno agnir vo devaḥ saha rāṣṭram upādhvam || saṃ jānīdhvaṃ sahṛdayāḥ sarve saṃmanasa stha | naṣṭo vo manyur jīrṇerṣyā saha jīvātha bhadrayā || yathā putraḥ pravāvadaḥ pitṛbhyāṃ vadati priyam | evā yūyam anyo 'nyasmai jihvayā vadata priyam || sahaiva vo dhānyāni samānāḥ paśavaś ca vaḥ | saha pṛthivyāṃ vīrudhaḥ saha vaḥ santv oṣadhīḥ || saha dīkṣā saha yajño vivāho vaḥ sahāsati | saha prapharvā nṛtyantu saha va striya āsatām || sahaiva vo vīryāṇi sahānyān randhayādhvai | saha patatriṇīm iṣum anyasmai hetim asyata || saṃ vasyāmi samitiṃ madhunā vācam āñjiṣam | yuṣmākam anye śṛṇvantu- -uditaṃ saṅgate jane || yuṣmān mitrā vṛṇatāṃ yuṣmān pratijanā uta | yuṣmāt jñātitvaṃ prepsanty Bhatt. yuṣmāt jñā- (sic), Kim 2014, 226 yuṣme amṛtaṃ martyā iva || saṃsam id yaḥ sam ākaraṃ saha yūthā gavām iva | samānam astu vo mano jyeṣṭhaṃ vijñānam anv ita || idaṃ yad eṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ tad eṣāṃ hṛdaye bhavat | atho yad eṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ tad veṣāṃ hṛdi śritam | samānam astu vo manaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ vijñānam anv ita || idaṃ yad eṣāṃ mana eṣāṃ yāni manāṃsi ca | sadhryag indra tat kṛṇu rathe pādāv ivāhitau ||
sahasrabāhuḥ puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt | sa bhūmiṃ viśvato vṛtvā- -aty atiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam || tribhiḥ padbhir dyām arohat pād asyehābhavat punaḥ | tathā vy akrāmad viṣvaṅṅ Bhatt. viṣvaṅ aśanānaśane anu || tāvanto asya mahimānas tato jyāyāṃś ca puruṣaḥ | pād asya viśvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divi || puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam | utāmṛtatvasyeśvaro yad annenābhavat saha || yat puruṣaṃ vyadadhuḥ katidhā vy akalpayan | mukhaṃ kim asya kiṃ bāhū kim ūrū pādā ucyete || brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīd bāhū rājanyo 'bhavat | madhyaṃ tad asya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata || virāḍ agre sam abhavad virājo adhi pūruṣaḥ | sa jāto aty aricyata paścād bhūmim atho puraḥ || yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata | vasanto asyāsīd ājyaṃ grīṣma idhmaḥ śarad dhaviḥ || taṃ yajñaṃ prāvṛṣā praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātam agraśaḥ | tena devā ayajanta sādhyā vasavaś ca ye || tasmād aśvā ajāyanta ye ca ke cobhayādataḥ | gāvo ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāj jātā ajāvayaḥ || tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire | chando ha jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata || tasmād yajñāt sarvahutaḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ pṛṣadājyam | paśūn tāṃś cakre vāyavyān āraṇyān grāmyāś ca ye || saptāsyāsan paridhayas triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ | devā yad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣaṃ paśum || mūrdhno devasya bṛhato 'ṃśavaḥ sapta saptatīḥ | rājñaḥ somasyājāyanta jātasya puruṣād adhi || candramā manaso jātaś cakṣuḥ sūryo 'jāyata | śrotrād vāyuś ca prāṇaś ca mukhād agnir ajāyata || nābhyā āsīd antarikṣaṃ Bhatt. nābhyāṃ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ sam avartata | padbhyāṃ bhūmir diśaḥ śrotrāṅ tathā lokām̐ akalpayan ||
anuvāka 1 ||
imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhim adṛṣṭahananīm aham | aśvasyāvo dadāti tvā vairūpo vājinīvati || nādṛṣṭā vo jihvāḥ santi na dantā hanvor adhi | nāpi madhyaṃ no śiras te yūyaṃ kiṃ kariṣyatha || indrāmitrā indrahatā na va ihāsti nyañcanam | indro vaḥ sarvāsāṃ sākaṃ śakras tṛṇeḍhu vṛtrahā || aśvatarām̐ ayaḥśaphān yān indro adhitiṣṭhati | tair vo 'pi nahyeya te mukhāny udarasarpiṇaḥ || apinahyam adṛṣṭānāṃ mukhaṃ pādā dṛter iva | utaiṣāṃ jihvā niṣkartā nirdantā hanvor adhi || avadhiṣam asṛgādāṃ ni kroḍādā alipsata | abhaitsaṃ sarveṣām āṇḍāni ye adṛṣṭāḥ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ || riśyāsaḥ pauruṣāso darbhāso vairiṇā uta | mauñjā adṛṣṭāḥ sairyāḥ sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata || adṛṣṭānāṃ sapta jātā pṛthivī na śiśe mahī | tān indro bāhubhyāṃ sarvāñ chakro apāvayat || ye vaḥ santi sapta jātā adṛṣṭāḥ puruṣādinaḥ | grāvṇāṃśūn iva somasya tān sarvān pra mṛṇīmasi || ya ātmajā ye vastijā ya ruṣā ya u todinaḥ | tebhyaḥ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ yebhyo bimbīvadhaḥ kṛtaḥ || adṛṣṭebhyas taruṇebhyo yuvadbhya sthavirebhyaḥ | āhārṣam ugrām oṣadhiṃ yebhyo bimbīvadhaḥ kṛtaḥ || ye ca dṛṣṭā ye cādṛṣṭās titīlāḥ śalunāś ca ye | tān agne sarvān saṃ daha krimīn anejato jahi ||
śītijalā iti śītā vātā upā vāntu | himenāgnir āvṛto himenāgniḥ parīvṛtaḥ || ya(t) tvā devā apārundhann ā samudram adhāvayaḥ | himo jaghāna goajaṃ himo akṣaṃ himaś chadiḥ || himād adhi pra yāmasi hime adya vimocanam | yam avaṭaṃ śatadaram avaindha saptavadhraye || avakā tatra rohatu khade pari bilaṃ tava | arciṣ ṭe agne prathamam aṅgārām̐ aparām̐ uta || gṛbhṇāmi brahmaṇā nāma dhāmadhāma paruṣparuḥ | śītikā nāma te mātā jalāṣo nāma te pitā || iha tvam antarā bhava bāhikam astu yad rapaḥ | hime jātodake vṛddhā sindhutas pary ābhṛtā | tayā te agrabhaṃ nāma- -aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā || āmā nāmāsy oṣadhe tasyās te nāma jagrabha | agastyasya putrāso mā vi dhāk puruṣān mama || mā no agne tanvaṃ mā vāsāṃsi rīriṣaḥ | yaṃ tvā samudraja vayam ārohāma svastaye || divas tārā avāpadran dhārāt samudriyā apaḥ | hiraṇyakumbho harito 'vakābhiḥ parivṛtas tenāgniṃ śamayāmasi || śamayāmy arcir agneḥ śivas tapatu mā vi dhāk | gṛbhīte dyāvāpṛthivī gṛbhītaṃ pārthivaṃ rajaḥ || ni muñjeṣu yad udakaṃ ni naḍeṣu yad antaram | yat samudre yat sindhau tenāgniṃ śamayāmasi || vetasasyāvakāyā naḍasya vīraṇasya ca | rohitakasya vṛkṣasya- -agniṃ śamanam ud bhare || āyatīr udahāryo vi te harantu yad rapaḥ | parāyatīḥ parāvataḥ parā harantu yad rapaḥ || himasya tvā jarāyuṇa- -agne pari vyayāmasi | śītike śītam it karo himike himam it karaḥ ||
akṣaṇvatā lāṅgalena padvatā patayiṣṇunā | lāṅgūlagṛhya carkṛṣur vṛkeṇa yavam aśvinā || devā etaṃ madhunā saṃyutaṃ yavaṃ sarasvatyām adhi vaṇāv acarkṛṣuḥ | indra āsīt sīrapatiḥ śatakratuḥ kināśā āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ || hiraṇyayaṃ kalaśaṃ sudānavo divyayā saraghayā kṛtam | ava bhṛtam aśvinā yavaṃ tad yuvaṃ madhu cakrathuḥ || kṛśāv etad ajayatam Bhatt. kriśāv aśvinā sāraghaṃ madhu | tato yavo vy arohat so 'bhavad viṣadūṣaṇaḥ || yuvārvān saraghāyāḥ prakhidya madhv ābharat | (…) || see 4cd yad vṛkaṃ madhupāvānam avāmayatam aśvinā | (…) || see 4cd kairaṇḍā nāma saraso vṛkasya vamyā adhi | tato yavo vy arohat so 'bhavad viṣadūṣaṇaḥ || yad asya bharatho madhu saraghā sathv acchinat | sadyas tad arvato yuvaṃ punar ā dattam aśvinā || yo yavaṃ digdhaviddho ahidaṣṭa upāsarat | tīrthe radhram iva majjantam ut taṃ bharatam aśvinā || yaṃ vahanty aṣṭāyogāḥ ṣaḍyogā yaṃ caturgavāḥ | sa te viṣaṃ vi bādhatām ugro madhyamaśīr iva ||
yasya yava prasarpasy aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparuḥ | tasmād yakṣaṃ vi bādhasva- -ugro madhyamaśīr iva || śakalaṃ ca na te yava- -anyā ruhanty oṣadhīḥ | yava id yāvayād gor aśvāt puruṣād viṣam || yavo rājā yavo bhiṣag yavasya mahimā mahān | yavasya manthaṃ papivān indraś cakāra vīryam || ā bharāmṛtaṃ ghṛtasya puṣpam ā bhara | anabhrikhāta oṣadha idaṃ dūṣaya yad viṣam || ya āyanti digdhaviddhāḥ śūdrā rājanyā uta | cakṣur me sarva ādṛśya te yanty agadāḥ punaḥ ||
jīvātave na martave śiras ta ā rabhāmahe | rasaṃ viṣasya nāvidam udnaḥ phenam adann iva || bhūmyā madhyād divo madhyād bhūmyā antād atho divaḥ | madhye pṛthivyā yad viṣaṃ tad vācā dūṣayāmasi || aśvatthe nihitaṃ viṣaṃ kapāle nihitaṃ viṣam | śilāyā jajñe taimātaḥ prathamo viṣadūṣaṇī || viṣasyāhaṃ vaindakasya viṣasya dārvyasya ca | atho viṣasya svaitnasya samānīṃ vācam agrabham || tad id vadanty arthina uta śūdrā utāryāḥ | viṣāṇāṃ viṣvagarthānāṃ sarvathaivārasaṃ viṣam || paruṣas tvāmṛtakarṇo viṣa prathamam āvayat | yathā ha taṃ nāropayas tathāsy arasaṃ viṣam || yad vo devā upajīkā uddehaṃ śuṣiraṃ daduḥ | tatrāmṛtasyāsiktaṃ tac cakārārasaṃ viṣam || śakuntikā me abravīd viṣapuṣpaṃ dhayantikā | na ropayati na mādayaty arasaṃ śārvīyaṃ viṣam || aty apaptāma durgāṇi śārīḥ śakunayo yathā | ihendrāṇīṃ varuṇānīṃ sinīvālīṃ krakoḍhyām | grāhāṃ śūraputrāṃ devīṃ yācāmo viṣadūṣaṇam || ālakaṃ vyālakaṃ vy āvaṃ jālma jīgīmahe | jaradviṣaṃ yuvābhiṣag vayam it sāsahāmahai || asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat | asthur viṣasyāropayo 'naḍvāhaḥ kriśā iva || yāvat sūryo vitapati yāvac cābhivipaśyati | tenāham indradattena kṛṇomy arasaṃ viṣam | tad viṣam arasaṃ viṣam adhobhāg arasaṃ viṣam ||
mātariśvā sam abharad dhātā sam adadhāt paruḥ | indrāgnī abhy arakṣatāṃ tvaṣṭā nābhim akalpayat || bhavas tvā abhy arukṣad rudras te aṃsum ābharat | rātrī tvābhy agopāyat sā tvaṃ bhūte ajāyathāḥ || dyauṣ ṭa āyur gopāyad antarikṣam asuṃ tava | mātā bhūtasya bhavyasya pṛthivī tvābhi rakṣatu || yāṃ tvā devāḥ samadadhuḥ sahasrapuruṣaṃ satīm | sā devī tvam asyedam apāja vy ajā viṣam || yāḥ purastāt prasyandante divā naktaṃ ca yoṣitaḥ | āpaḥ puru sravantīs tā u te viṣadūṣaṇīḥ || ātapas te varṣam āsīd agniś chāyābhavat tapaḥ | ulbaṃ te abhram āsīt sā tvaṃ bhūte ajāyathāḥ || gandharvas te mūlam āsīc chākhā apsarasas tava | marīcīr āsan parṇāni sinīvālī kulaṃ tava || ajarā devā adadhur amṛtaṃ martyeṣv ā | tasyai tad agram ā dade tad u te viṣadūṣaṇam || anabhrau khanamānaṃ vipraṃ gambhīre apasam | bhiṣak cakṣur bhiṣak khane tad u te viṣadūṣaṇam || yāḥ purastād vitiṣṭhante gāvaḥ pravrājinīr iva | amṛtasyeva vā asy atho hāsy arundhatī || yo mayaḥ saraghāyāḥ prakhāya madhv ābharat | tato yavaḥ prājāyata so 'bhavad viṣadūṣaṇaḥ || yavasyaitat palālino godhūmasya tilasya ca | vrīher yavasya daivyena kṛṇomy arasaṃ viṣam || mahīṃ yoniṃ samudrasya- -anv avindann ṛtāyavaḥ | Bhatt. and Kim 2014, 302 avindan tāṃ devā guhyām āsīnāṃ samudrāc cid ud ābharan || samudrāc cid udābhṛtya tām u puṣkara ā dadhuḥ | asyāḥ pṛthivyā devyāś cakṣur ākāśyam asi viṣadūṣaṇam ||
anuvāka 2 ||
samānam arthaṃ paryanti devā rūpaṃrūpaṃ tapasā vardhamānāḥ | yad ādityam abhisaṃviśanti tad ekaṃ rūpam amṛtatvam eṣām || devo devebhir ā gaman mahān no atithiṣ pitā | sa praiti jātavedasam ekarūpo guhā bhavan || ātithyam agniṃ nir apaptad eva ubhayebhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ | mahān nu marya upa bhakṣam āgan see Kim 2014, 305; Bhatt. martya, nāgan saṃgṛbhyādityā(n) ny aviṣṭa vahniḥ || ta ā viśanti puruṣaṃ śayānaṃ prāṇā niviṣṭā na śasanty enam | te no rātryā sumanasyamānā ahnā rakṣanty ahṛṇīyamānāḥ || paśubhyo naḥ paśupate mṛḍa sarva saṃ vṛha āyatām | mā naḥ prāṇeṣu rīriṣaḥ || vāyuḥ satye adhiśritaḥ prāṇāpānāv abhirakṣan | saṃ prajā airayad imāḥ || devā yattāḥ prajāpatāv ādityāś ca yemire | pūṣā raśmiṣv āyata ādityo viṣṇur ākrame sa rohaṃ divi rohati || prajāddevāḥ savituḥ save tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu | añjantau madhunā payo atandraṃ yātam aśvinā || viśve devāḥ pra yātana- -ādityāsaḥ sajoṣasaḥ | puraḥ paścāt svastaye || brahma varma bṛhaspatiḥ saṃgavo no 'bhi rakṣatu | devo devaiḥ purohitaḥ || maruto vṛṣṭyā na ā gata satyadharmāṇa ūtaye | aparāhneṣu jinvata || indro rājā divas patir ahar vimāya tiṣṭhati | sa na imāḥ kalpayād diśaḥ ||
āvatas te parāvataḥ parāvatas ta āvataḥ | ihaiva bhava mā nu gā mā pūrvān anu gā gatān asuṃ badhnāmi te dṛḍham || yat tvābhiceruḥ puruṣaḥ so yad aruṇo janaḥ | unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te || yad dudrohitha śepiṣe striyai puṃse acittyā | Bhatt. acittyā (…) || see 2cd yad enaso mātṛkṛtāc cheṣe pitṛkṛtād uta | unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te || yat te mātā yat te pitā jāmir bhrātā ca sarjataḥ | pratyak sevasya bheṣajaṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇomi tvā || ehy ehi punar ehi sarveṇa manasā saha | dūtau yamasya mānu gā adhi jīvapurā ihi || anuhūtaḥ punar ehi vidvān udayanaṃ pathaḥ | ārohaṇam ākramaṇaṃ jīvatojīvato 'yanam || mā bibher na mariṣyasi jaradaṣṭir bhaviṣyasi | nir avocam ahaṃ yakṣmam aṅgebhyo aṅgajvaraṃ tava || śīrṣarogo aṅgarogo yaś ca te hṛdayāmayaḥ | yakṣmaḥ śyena iva prāpaptad vācā nuttaḥ parastaram || ṛṣī bodhapratībodhāv asvapno yaś ca jāgṛviḥ | te te prāṇasya goptāro divā naktaṃ ca jāgratu ||
ayam agnir upasadya iha sūrya ud etu te | ud ehi mṛtyor gambhīrāt kṛcchrāc cit tamasas pari || namo yamāya namo 'stu mṛtyave namaḥ pitṛbhya uta ye nayante | utpāraṇasya yo veda tam agniṃ tat puro dadhe || aitu prāṇa aitu mana aitu cakṣur atho balam | śarīram asya saṃ vidāṃ tat padbhyāṃ prati tiṣṭhatu || prāṇenāgne cakṣuṣā saṃ sṛjemaṃ sam īraya tanvā saṃ balena | vetthāmṛtasya mā mṛta mo ṣu bhūmigṛho bhuvat || mā te prāṇa upa dasan māpāno api dhāyi te | sūryas tvādhipatir mṛtyor udāyacchāti raśmibhiḥ || iyam antar vadaty ugrā jihvā paniṣpadā | tayā rogān vi nayāmaḥ śataṃ ropīś ca takmanaḥ || ayaṃ lokaḥ priyatamo devānām aparājitaḥ | yasmai tvam iha jajñiṣe diṣṭaḥ puruṣa mṛtyave | tasmai tvānu hvayāmasi mā purā jaraso mṛthāḥ ||
te 'vadan prathamā brahmakilbiṣe 'kūpāraḥ salilo mātariśvā | vīḍuharas tapa ugraṃ mayobhuva āpo devīḥ prathamajā ṛtasya || somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyāṃ punaḥ prāyacchad ahṛṇīyamānaḥ | anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīd agnir hotā hastagṛhyā nināya || hasteneva grāhya ādhir asyā brahmajāyeti ced avocat | na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃ kṣatriyasya || yām āhus tārakāṃ vikeśīṃ ducchunāṃ grāmam avapadyamānām | sā brahmajāyā pra dunoti rāṣṭraṃ yatra prāpādi śaśaḥ kalkuṣīmān || brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānāṃ bhavaty ekam aṅgam | tena jāyām anv avindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃ juhvaṃ na devāḥ || devā etasyām avadanta pūrve saptarṣayas tapase ye niṣeduḥ | bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyāpanītā durdhāṃ dadhāti parame vyoman || ye garbhā avapadyante jagad yac cāpalupyate | vīrā ye hanyante mitho brahmajāyā hinasti tān || sarve garbhāḥ pra vyathante kumārā daśamāsyāḥ | yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyā acittyā || Bhatt. acittyā punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā uta | rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvanto brahmajāyāṃ punar daduḥ || punardāya brahmajāyāṃ Bhatt. yo punardāya; see Kim 2014, 334 kṛtvī devair nikilbiṣam | ūrjaṃ pṛthivyā bhaktvā- -urugāyam upāsate ||
na tatra dhenur duhe nānaḍvān sahate dhuram | vijānir yatra brāhmaṇo rātriṃ vasati pāpayā || na varṣaṃ maitrāvaruṇaṃ brahmajyam abhi varṣati | nāsmai samitiḥ kalpate na mitraṃ nayate vaśam || asṛṅmatī carati brahmajāyā āśā limpantī pradiśaś catasraḥ | yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ punar enāṃ dadāti sa divo dhārāṃ dhayati prapīnām || yo 'punardāya brahmajāyāṃ rājā talpe nipadyate | duryoṇā asmā oṣadhīr yāḥ kāś cābhi vipaśyati || viṣam aśnāty apāṃ viṣam aśnāti vīrudhām | yo brahmajāyāṃ na punar dadāti tasmai devāḥ sudihaṃ digdham asyām || read asyān udyat patayo daśa striyāḥ pūrve abrāhmaṇāḥ | brahmā ced dhastam agrahīt sa eva patir ekadhā || brāhmaṇa eva patir na rājā nota vaiśyaḥ | tat sūryaḥ prabruvann eti pañcabhyo mānavebhyaḥ ||
naitāṃ te devā adadus tubhyaṃ nṛpate attave | mā brāhmaṇasya rājanya gāṃ jighatso anādyām || akṣadrugdho rājanyaḥ pāpa ātmaparājitaḥ | sa brāhmaṇasya gām adyād adya jīvāni mā śvaḥ || nir vai kṣatraṃ nayati hanti varco 'gnir ivārabdhaḥ pra dunoti rāṣṭram | yo brāhmaṇaṃ devabandhuṃ hinasti na sa pitṝṇām apy eti lokam || devapīyuś carati martyeṣu garagīrṇo bhavaty asthibhūyān | yo brāhmaṇaṃ manyate annam eva sa viṣasya pibati taimātasya || viṣaṃ sa pibati taimātaṃ paśyann agniṃ pra sīdati | yo brāhmaṇasya sad dhanam abhi nārada manyate || śatāpāṣṭhāṃ ni girati tāṃ na śaknoti niṣkhidam | annaṃ yo brahmaṇāṃ malvaḥ emend. Kim 2014, 346; Bhatt. manyaḥ svādv admīti manyate || ya enāṃ hanti mṛdu manyamāno devapīyur dhanakāmo na cittāt | saṃ tasyendro hṛdaye agnim indha ubhe enaṃ dyuṣṭo nabhasī carantam || na brāhmaṇo hiṃsitavā agneḥ priyatamā tanūḥ | somo hy asya dāyāda indro asyābhiśastipāḥ || agnir vai naḥ padavāyaḥ somo dāyāda ucyate | jetā abhiśastendras tat satyaṃ devasaṃhitam || āviṣṭitāghaviṣā pṛdākūr iva carmaṇā | sā brāhmaṇasya rājanya tṛṣṭaiṣā gaur anādyā ||
iṣur iva digdhā nṛpate pṛdākūr iva gopate | sā brāhmaṇasyeṣur digdhā tayā vidhyati pīyakaḥ || tīkṣṇeṣavo brāhmaṇā hetimanto yām asyanti śaravyāṃ na sā mṛṣā | anuhāya tapasā manyunā cota dūrād ava bhindanti te tayā || jihvā jyā bhavati kulmalaṃ vāṅ nāḍīkā dantās tapasā sudigdhāḥ | tebhir brahmā vidhyati devapīyūn hṛdbalair dhanurbhir devajūtaiḥ || ye brāhmaṇaṃ hiṃsitāras tapasvinaṃ manīṣiṇaṃ brahmacaryeṇa śrāntam | avartimad bhavitā rāṣṭram eṣāṃ tamasīva nihitaṃ nānu vettāḥ || ye sahasram arājann āsan daśaśatā uta | te brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan || gaur eva tān hanyamānā vaitahavyām̐ avātirat | ye keśara prābandhāyāś caramājām apeciran || atimātrā ajāyanta nod iva divam aspṛśan | bhṛguṃ hiṃsitvā māhīnā asaṃbhavyaṃ parābhavan || ye bṛhatsāmānam āṅgirasam ārpayan brāhmaṇaṃ janāḥ | yetvas teṣām ubhayādann avis tokāny āvayat || ye brāhmaṇaṃ pratyaṣṭhīvan ye cāsmic chuklam īṣire | asnas te madhye kulyāyāḥ keśān khādanta āsate || aṣṭāpadī caturakṣī catuḥśrotrā caturhanuḥ | dvijihvā dviprāṇā bhūtvā sā rāṣṭram ava dhūnute ||
brahmagavī pacyamānā yāvat sābhi vijaṅgahe | tejo rāṣṭrasya nir hanti na vīro jāyate pumān || ākramaṇena vai devā dviṣanto ghnanti pūruṣam | steyādaṃ brahmajyaṃ kṣetre cānṛtavādinam || viṣam etad devakṛtaṃ rājā varuṇo abravīt | na brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā rāṣṭre jāgāra kaś cana || tad vai rāṣṭram ā sravati bhinnāṃ nāvam ivodakam | brāhmaṇo yatra jīyate tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti ducchunā || ekaśataṃ vai janatā bhūmir yā vyadhūnuta | prajāṃ hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyaṃ parābhavan || yām udājann ṛṣayo manīṣiṇaḥ Bhatt. and Kim 2014, 363 udājan śramasātāṃ bṛhatīṃ devajūtām | sā brahmajyaṃ pacati pacyamānā rāṣṭram asya bṛhatī yac ca varcaḥ || vācā brāhmaṇam ṛcchati jāmi hanty acittyā | Bhatt. acittyā mitrāya satye druhyati yaṃ devā ghnanti pūruṣam ||
ekapāc chanda ekakāmaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe prathamayā rātryā prathamayā samidhā || dvipāc chando dvipadaś ca paśūn | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe dvitīyayā rātryā dvitīyayā samidhā || trīṃl lokāṃs trīṃl lokapatīn | Bhatt. trīl lokāns trīṃ tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe tṛtiyayā rātryā tṛtīyayā samidhā || catuṣpāc chandaś catuṣpadaś ca paśūn | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe caturthyā rātryā caturthyā samidhā || pañca diśaḥ pañca pradiśaḥ | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe pañcamyā rātryā pañcamyā samidhā || traiṣṭubhaṃ chando virājaṃ svarājaṃ samrājam | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe saṣṭhyā rātryā ṣaṣṭhyā samidhā || sapta prāṇān saptāpānān sapta ṛṣīṃś ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe saptamyā rātryā saptamyā samidhā || ojaś ca tejaś ca sahaś ca balaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe aṣṭamyā rātryā aṣṭamyā samidhā || ambhaś ca mahaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe navamyā rātryā navamyā samidhā || brahma ca kṣatraṃ cendriyaṃ ca brāhmaṇavarcasaṃ ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe daśamyā rātryā daśamyā samidhā || viśvāvasū ca sarvavasū ca | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe note sandhi -e e- ekādaśyā rātryā ekādaśyā samidhā || pāṅktaṃ chandaḥ prajāpatiṃ saṃvatsaram | tad āpnoti cāva ca rundhe dvādaśyā rātryā dvādaśyā samidhā ||
anuvāka 3 ||
yo vā ekaśarāvaṃ nirvaped ekarṣim evānu nir vapet | eṣa vā ekarṣir yad agniḥ | ekarṣiṃ caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe note sandhi -e e- ekarṣir iva tapaty ekarṣir iva dīdāyaikarṣir ivānnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda | sa ya evaṃ vidvān prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed ekarṣes tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmy ekarṣes tvā hastābhyām ā rabha ekarṣes tvāsyena prāśnāmy ekarṣes tvā jaṭhare sādayāmīti | sa yathā hutam iṣṭaṃ prāśnīyād evainaṃ prāśnāti || yo vai dviśarāvaṃ nirvapet prāṇāpānāv evānu nir vapet | etau vai prāṇāpānau yan mātariśvā cāgniś ca | prāṇāpānau caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate yaḥ (…) | see 1d sa ya evaṃ vidvān) praśnīyād etām eva devate manasā dhyāyet prāṇāpānayos tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi prāṇāpānayos tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe prāṇāpānayos tvāsyena prāśnāmi prāṇāpānayos tvā jaṭhare (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai triśarāvaṃ nirvapet trīṇy eva trikadrukāṇy anu nir vapet | etāni vai trīṇi trikadrukāṇi yad ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi brāhmaṇam | brahma caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe brāhmaṇavarcasī bhavati yaḥ (…) see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed see 1e brahmaṇas tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi brahmaṇas tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe brahmaṇas tvāsyena prāśnāmi brahmaṇas tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai catuḥśarāvaṃ nirvapec catasra evorvīr anu nir vapet | etā vai catasra urvīr yad diśaḥ | diśaś caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe kalpante asmai diśo diśāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed see 1e diśāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi diśāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe diśāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmi diśāṃ tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai pañcaśarāvaṃ nirvaped vaiśvānaram eva pañcamūrdhānam anu nir vapet | eṣa vai vaiśvānaraḥ pañcamūrdhā yad dyauś ca pṛthivī ca mātariśvā cāgniś cājasrā cātapan | see Kim 2014, 377, 379 vaiśvānaraṃ caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe vaiśvānara iva tapati vaiśvānara iva dīdāya vaiśvānara ivānnādo bhavati yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśniyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed see 1e vaiśvānarasya tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi vaiśvānarasya tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe vaiśvānarasya tvāsyena prāśnāmi vaiśvānarasya tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai ṣaṭśarāvaṃ nirvapet ṣaḍ yāvna eva devān anu nir vapet | ete vai ṣaḍ yāvāno devā yad ṛtavaḥ | ṛtūṃś caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe kalpante asmā ṛtavo na ṛtuṣv āvṛścata ṛtūnāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyed see 1e ṛtūnāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmy ṛtūnāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabha ṛtūnāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmy ṛtūnāṃ tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai saptaśarāvaṃ nirvapet sapta ṛṣīn evānu nir vapet | ete vai sapta ṛṣayo yat prāṇāpānavyānāḥ | saptarṣīṃś caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyet see 1e saptarṣīṇāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi saptarṣīṇāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe saptarṣīṇāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmi saptarṣīṇāṃ tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vā aṣṭaśarāvaṃ nirvaped virājam evavāṣṭāpadīm anu nir vapet | eṣā vai virāḍ aṣṭāpadī yad dyauś ca pṛthivī cāpaś cauṣadhayaś ca vāyuś cāntarikṣaṃ ca sūryaś ca candramāś ca | virājaṃ caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe vi rājaty asmiṃś ca loke amuṣmiṃś ca vairāja rṣabha ity enam āhur yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed see 1e virājas tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi virājas tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe virājas tvāsyena prāśnāmi virājas tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai navaśarāvaṃ nirvapen nava yāvna eva devān anu nirvapet | ete vai navayāvāno devā yan māsāḥ | māsaś caiva lokaṃ cava rundhe kalpante asmai māsā māsāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyen see 1e māsāṃ tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi māsāṃ tvā hastābhyām ā rabhe māsāṃ tvāsyena prāśnāmi māsāṃ tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai daśaśarāvaṃ nirvaped iḍām eva dhenum anu nirvapet | esā vā iḍā dhenur yad yajñaḥ paśavaḥ | iḍāṃ caiva dhenuṃ yajñaṃ ca lokaṃ ca paśūṃś cāva rundhe kalpante asmā iḍa iḍāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnīyad etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed see 1e iḍāyās tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi- -iḍāyās tvā hastābhyām ā rabha iḍāyās tvāsyena prāśnāmi- -iḍāyās tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vā ekādaśaśarāvaṃ nirvaped rohitam evānu nir vapet | eṣa vai rohito yad indraḥ | indraṃ caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe note sandhi -e i- indriyāvī priya indrasya bhavati yaḥ (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnīyād etām eva devatāṃ manasā dhyāyed see 1e indrasya tvā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi- -indrasya tvā hastābhyām ā rabha indrasya tvāsyena prāśnāmi- -indrasya tvā (…) | see 1i (…) || see 1j yo vai dvādaśaśarāvaṃ nirvaped viśvām eva devān anu nir vapet | ete vai viśve devā yad idaṃ sarvam | viśvāṃś caiva devām̐l lokaṃ cāva rundhe kalpante asmai viśve devāḥ priyo viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda | sa ya evaṃ vidvān prāśnīyād etā eva devatā manasā dhyāyed viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ cakṣuṣā paśyāmi viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ hastābhyām ā rabhe viśveṣāṃ tvā devānām āsyena prāśnāmi viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ jaṭhare sādayāmīti | sa yathā hutam iṣṭaṃ prāśnīyād evainaṃ prāśnāti ||
imāṃ mātrāṃ nir vapa odanasya tasya paktā mucyatāṃ kilbiṣebhyaḥ | abhidrohād enaso duṣkṛtāc ca punātu mā pavanaiḥ pavitraḥ || bhadrau hastau bhadrā jihvā bhadraṃ bhavatu me vacaḥ | mahyaṃ pavitram odanaṃ brahmaṇā nir vapāmasi hastābhyāṃ nir vapāmasi || yan mayi garbhe sati mātā cakāra duṣkṛtam | ayaṃ mā tasmād odanaḥ pavitraḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ || yad arvācīnam ekahāyanād anṛtaṃ kiṃ codima | (…) || see 3cd yad duṣkṛtaṃ yac chamalaṃ yad enaś cakṛmā vayam | (…) || see 3cd yan mātaraṃ yat pitaraṃ yad vā jāmiṃ jihiṃsima | (…) || see 3cd yan mātṛghnā yat pitṛghnā bhrūṇaghnā yat sahāsima | (…) || see 3cd śyāvadatā kunakhinā stenena yat sahāsima | (…) || see 3cd śiśundhānāṃ pūṃścalānāṃ takṣṇāṃ yad annam āśima | (…) || see 3cd yad apām apajahrima nimajya papimodakam | (…) || see 3cd

yad annam āśimā vayam anannam annakāmyā- -udarasyābhiśācyā | (…) || see 9.22.3cd yad vidvāṃso yad avidvāṃso anṛtaṃ kiṃ codima | ayaṃ mā tasmād odanaḥ pavitraḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ || yad devasya savituḥ pavitraṃ sahasradhāraṃ vitataṃ hiraṇyam | yenendram apunanamārtamartyās tenāyaṃ māṃ sarvapaśuṃ punātu || yenāpunāt savitā revatīr apo yenāpunīta varuṇaḥ savāya | yenemā viśvā bhuvanāni pūtās tenāyaṃ māṃ sarvapaśuṃ punātu || ati krāmāmi duritaṃ yad eno jahāmi ripraṃ parame sadhasthe | yena yanti sukṛto nāpi duṣkṛtas tam ā ruhema sukṛtām ulokam || mā yakṣmam iha hāsiṣṭa mā riphanto vi gātana | amaiva puṇyam astu no attṝn anv eti kilbiṣam || thus Kim 2014, 412-413; Lubotsky 2007, 30 attrīn; Bhatt. atṛn imaṃ pacāmy odanaṃ pavitraṃ pavanāya kam | sa mā muñcatu duṣkṛtād viśvasmāc cainasas pari ||
