uccair ghoṣo dundubhiḥ satvanāyaṃ vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛta usriyābhiḥ | vācaṃ kṣaṇuvāno damayan sapatnān siṃha iva jyeṣyann abhi taṃstanībhiḥ || siṃha ivāstānīd druvayo vibaddho 'bhikrandann ṛṣabho vāśitām iva | vṛṣā tvaṃ vadhrayas te sapatnā aindras te śuṣmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ || saṃjayan pṛtanā ūrdhvamāyur gṛhyā gṛhṇāno bahudhā vi cakṣva | daivīṃ vācam ā hura gurasva vedhāḥ śatrūṇām upa bharasva vedaḥ || vṛṣeva yūthaṃ sahaso vidāno gavyann abhi ruva saṃdhanājit | śucā vidhya hṛdayaṃ pareṣāṃ hitvā grāmān pracyutā yantu śatravaḥ || dundubher vācaṃ prayatāṃ vadantīm āśṛṇvatī nāthitā ghoṣabuddhā | nārī putrān dhāvatu hastagṛhya- -amitrī bhītā samare vadhānā || dhībhiḥ kṛtaḥ pra bharasva vācam ud dharṣaya satvanām āyudhāni | amitrasenām abhijañjabhāno dyumad vada dundubhe sūnṛtāvat || pūrvo dundubhe vi ṣahasva śatrūn bhūmyāḥ pṛṣṭhe vada bahu rocamānaḥ | indramedī satvanaḥ saṃ hvayasva mitrair amitrān ava jaṅghanīhi || antareme nabhasī ghoṣo astu pṛthak te dhvanayo yantu śībham | abhi kranda stanayotpipānāṃ ślokakṛn mitratūryāya svardhi || saṃkrandanaḥ pravedo dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ pravedakṛd bahudhā grāmaghoṣī | śreyo vanvāno vayunāni vidvān kīrtiṃ bahubhyo vi bhaja dvirāje || śreyaḥketo vasujit sahīyān mitraṃ dadhānas tviṣito vipaścit | aṃśūn iva grāvādhiṣavaṇe adrir gavyaṃ dundubhe adhi nṛtya vedaḥ || śatrūṣāṇ nīṣāḍ abhimātiṣāho gaveṣaṇaḥ sahamāna udbhit | vāgvī mantraṃ pra janayasva vājin sāṅgrāmajityāyeṣam ud vadeha || acyutacyut samado gamiṣṭho mṛdho jetā pṛtanāṣāḍ ayodhyaḥ | indreṇa kl̥pto vidathā nicikyad dhṛddyotano dviṣatāṃ yāhi śībham ||
imās tapantu tvauṣadhīr oṣadhīnām ayaṃ rasaḥ | aśvatthas te 'yaṃ hṛdy agnir bhūto vy oṣatu pra patāto mamādhyā || yathā sūtraṃ lākṣāraktam ājyenānuṣicyate | evā te kāmaḥ sarpatv antar asthasu majjasu pra (…) || see 1e yathā kuṣṭhaḥ prayasyati yathā dahyate arciṣā | evā te dahyatāṃ manaḥ pra (…) || see 1e puṃsaḥ kuṣṭhāt pra kṣarati stoka ādhībhir ābhṛtaḥ | Bhatt. ādhibhir sa te hṛdaye vi vartatāṃ pra (…) || see 1e eṣa te stoko hṛdayaṃ digdheveṣuḥ pra padyatām | astrākhaṇaṃ yatheṣvā kāmo vidhyatu tvā mama pra (…) || see 1e harita edhi śuṣkākṣaḥ sarvadā hṛdayāmayi | striyas te anyā mā chāntsur Bhatt. mā chāñchur atho tvāśābhi śocatu pra (…) || see 1e śocīmad astu te śayanaṃ śocīmad upaveśanam | śocīmad astu te mano yathātra na ramāsā arvācī na manāsa pra (…) || see 1e na ramāsai saṅgateṣu śayānaṃ tvābhi śocatu | stokas tvottuda ut tudāt pra (…) || see 1e antar dahati carmaṇo asthimāṃsebhir ābhṛtam | sarvān yajñaḥ pra yāśayād aiḍa ādhībhis tava pra (…) || see 1e hṛdaye 'dhi sam idhyatāṃ svair māṃsebhir eṣa te | agniḥ kāmasya yo mahān sa mahyaṃ randhayāti tvā Bhatt. randhayanti pra (…) || see 1e
aśvattham agnim ājyaṃ dūtān kṛṇve manojavān | agniś carum ivārciṣā kāmo vidhyatu tvā mama pra (…) || see 9.28.1e śayānam agna āsīnam aśvatthaś ca savāsinau | carantam upatiṣṭhantaṃ mamādhibhir vi vidhyataṃ pra (…) || see 9.28.1e carantaṃ tvā tiṣṭhantam āsīnam api saṃsadi | reṣmā tṛṇam iva mathnātu dahan kāmaratho mama pra (…) || see 9.28.1e yathendrāyāsurān arandhayad bṛhaspatiḥ | evā tvam agne aśvatthān amūn mahyam ihānaya pra (…) || see 9.28.1e ahaṃ te mana ā dada aiḍena saha medinā | devā manuṣyā gandharvās te mahyaṃ randhayantu tvā pra (…) || see 9.28.1e yathā aśvatthasya parṇāni nelayanti kadā cana | evāsau mama kāmena māva svāpsīt kadā cana pra patāto mamādhyā || kuṣṭhaṃ tapanti marutaḥ svādhyaṃ dūra-ājānaṃ svarayanto arciṣā | Bhatt. svādhyandura ājānaṃ yathā na svapāt katamac canāhar aiva gacchān mamādhyā ||
anuvāka 4 ||
Kāṇḍa 10
hā amba tejane dheno lambanastani | na tad vido yad icchasi yad u vittaṃ na tad ghasaḥ || putro yas te pṛśnibāhus tam u tvaṃ sāmanaṃ kṛdhi | atho duhitaraṃ naptrīm atho tvaṃ sāmanā bhava || asāme kurame see Hoffmann, Aufsätze p. 7 naigūrasya svasaḥ | arāte nirṛte amate snuhite || pareta kastupakaṃ vaḥ punar dadāmi | yo vo na veda taṃ hata tasyātta pariśiśnyam || Bhatt. tasyātu tasyātta putrān bhrātṝṃś ca Bhatt. tasyāttu tasya goṣṭhaṃ vitāvata | yaś ca sato nāstivākī yaś cāsāv ahavirgṛhaḥ | durṇāmnīs tatra gacchata tatra sarvāḥ paretana || pari dhāmānīty ekā || antaścarāṃ kośecarām atho goṣṭhāvacāriṇīm | atho yāḥ svapne paśyāmas tā ito nāśayāmasi || kaṇvā yā gardabhīva nibhasat sūkarīva | tasyai pratipravartaya taptam aśmānam āsani || yo maryā abhigacchāt striyaṃ kastupastopinīm | kastupam asyā ācchidya- -athaināṃ cātayātai paramāṃ cit parāvatam || yā bhadrā yā śivā yorjā payasā saha | agniṣ ṭā asmākaṃ gṛhe gārhapatyo ni yacchatu || idaṃ vo devaḥ savitā- -idaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | idaṃ vo viśve devā avasānam ayukṣata || pari prāgād devo agnī rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ | sedhan viśvā apa dviṣo dahan rakṣāṃsi viśvahā || parīme gām aneṣata pary agnim ahṛṣata | deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imām̐ ā dadharṣati ||
tvayīndriyaṃ tvayi varcas tvaṃ dharmapatir bhava | tvam uttaro bhrātṛvyebhyas tava lakṣmīḥ payasvatī || tavaitām aśvinā havaṃ tava rāṣṭraṃ divi śritam | tvam āyuṣmān sapatnahā- -uttaro dviṣato bhava || tīkṣṇaśṛṅga ṛṣabhaḥ samudra ivākṣitodakaḥ | tvaṃ sahasravīryas tava bāhū gavāṃ patī || bhrātṛvyaś ca sapatnaś ca yas tvāmitro jighāṃsati | śriyaṃ tvaṃ sarveṣāṃ teṣām ādāyogro vi dhāraya || tvaṃ vaśī satyākūtaḥ satyadharmā gaveṣaṇaḥ | nāṣṭrās tvaṃ sarvās tīrtvā bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ śriyaṃ vṛha || tubhyaṃ saṃ yantu balayas tubhyaṃ śulkaḥ pra vīyatām | tubhyaṃ virāṭ payo duhāṃ tvāṃ vāñchantu viśo mahīḥ || vāñchatu tvā bṛhad rāṣṭraṃ tviṣis te mukha āhitā | tvaṃ devānāṃ bhava priyas tvayi gāvo adhiśritāḥ || tvayīndriyaṃ tvayi varcas tvayi yajño adhiśritaḥ | tavā yantu havaṃ devās tvaṃ priyo bṛhaspateḥ || agnīṣomā pavamānau virāḍ devī payasvatī | atandraṃ sarve rakṣantu rāṣṭraṃ te napavādyam || agnir iva tṛṇaṃ pra daha- -oghaḥ kūlam ivā ruja | śriyaṃ bhrātṛvyāṇām ā datsva- -āṇḍīkam ivādhi puṣkarāt ||
aśva iva ratham ā datsva siṃha iva puruṣaṃ hara | hastīva naḍvalān bhaṅdhi bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ śriyaṃ vṛha || ut te kṛṇotu kaśyapo brahma devair abhiṣṭutam | āprītam avirādhukam || etaṃ khadiram ā hara- -atho tejanam ā hara | utaitaṃ parṇam ā hara- -ā harānaḍuho balam || idhmān devaiḥ samābhṛtāṃs tāṃs te prādād bṛhaspatiḥ | tān ā dhehi samāhite 'gnau sūryābhicakṣaṇe || tebhiṣ ṭvam uttaro bhava bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ śriyaṃ vṛha | atho eṣāṃ payo hara || ādityā rudrā vasava ṛṣayo bhūtakṛtaś ca ye | śriyaṃ ca kṣatram ojaś ca tubhyaṃ devā asāviṣuḥ || vasur asīndranāmā- -āyuṣmāñ chataśāradaḥ | Bhatt. -āyuṣmān sa indra iva deveṣu tviṣīmān viśa ā vada ||
idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prathatāṃ gobhir aśvair idaṃ rāṣṭram annenerayā rasena | asmai ṣaḍ urvīr upa saṃ namantu saptahotrā hata śatrūn sacittāḥ || ime rājāna iṣubhir ghnantu śatrūn ime rājānaḥ samityānyān vadheyuḥ | ime rājānaḥ pṛtanāḥ sahantām ahaṃ brahmā vi mṛdho hanmi sarvāḥ || idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ kratumad vīravaj jiṣṇūgram idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ gardnumac citraghoṣam | asmai rāṣṭrāya balim anye harantv ahaṃ devebhyo haviṣā vidheyam || yadi yuddhaṃ yady ṛtitaṃ vo asti devainasād yadi vā pitryeṇa | yenarttīyā dhenavo astu tasmā ahaṃ devebhyo haviṣā juhomi || yad vaḥ krūraṃ manaso yac ca vāco devainasād yadi vā pitryeṇa | āpa iva duḥṣvapnyam apa tat svapadhvam athānandinaḥ sumanasaḥ sam eta || apām iva vegaḥ pra śṛṇīta śatrūn diśodiśo rabhamāṇaḥ sam eta | ekavratā vi dhanaṃ bhajadhvaṃ purohitena vo rāṣṭraṃ prathayantu devāḥ || samyag vo rāṣṭraṃ saha vo manāṃsi samīcīnāḥ paśavo viśvarūpāḥ | samīcīnānāṃ vo aham asmi brahmā samyañco devā havam ā yantu ma imam || yathāpaḥ samudrāya samīcīr vahatha śriyam | evā rāṣṭrāya me devāḥ samyañco vahata śriyam || saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vo rāṣṭraṃ paśubhir gobhir aśvaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭam annenerayā rasena | mayā brahmaṇā prathamānāśvo vasīyāṃsaḥ sadam ugrā bhavātha || bahur yuvā pramṛṇo dhṛṣṇur astu bahuḥ kumāraḥ pratirūpaḥ pitṝṇām | satyaṃ vadantaḥ samitiṃ caranto mitraṃ gṛhṇānā jaraso yantu sakhyam || iha kṣatraṃ dyumnam uta rāṣṭraṃ samaitv ihendriyaṃ paśubhiḥ saṃvidānam | avadhunvānā apriyān yāṃś ca dviṣma idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prathatāṃ sarvadaiva || idaṃ rāṣṭram iṣumad vīravaj jiṣṇūgram idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ paśumad brahmavṛddham | idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hataśatru jiṣṇu || sapatnasāhaṃ pramṛṇam idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dṛḍham ugram | sāḍhāmitram abhimātiṣāhaṃ sarvā jigāya pṛtanā abhiṣṭi ||
audumbareṇa maṇinā puṣṭikāmāya vedhasā | paśūnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sphātiṃ goṣṭhe me savitā karat || yo no agnir gārhapatyaḥ paśūnām adhipā asat | audumbaro vṛṣā maṇiḥ saṃ mā sṛjatu puṣṭyā || karīṣiṇīṃ phalavatīṃ svadhām irāṃ ca no gṛhe | audumbarasya tejasā dhātā puṣṭiṃ dadhātu me || yad dvipāc ca catuṣpāc ca yāny annāni ye rasāḥ | gṛhṇe 'haṃ teṣāṃ bhūmānaṃ bibhrad audumbaraṃ maṇim || puṣṭiṃ paśūnāṃ pari jagrabhāhaṃ catuṣpadāṃ dvipadāṃ yac ca dhānyam | payaḥ paśūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ savitā me ni yacchāt || ahaṃ paśūnām adhipā asāni mayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir dadhātu | mahyam audumbaro maṇir draviṇāni ni yacchatu || upa maudumbaro maṇiḥ prajayā ca dhanena ca | indreṇa jinvato maṇir ā māgan saha varcasā || devo maṇiḥ sapatnahā dhanasā dhanasātaye | paśor annasya bhūmānāṃ gavāṃ sphātiṃ ni yacchatu || yathāgre tvaṃ vanaspate puṣṭyā saha jajñiṣe | evā dhanasya me sphātim ā dadhātu sarasvatī || ā me dhanaṃ sarasvatī payasphātiṃ ca dhānyam | sinīvāly utā vahād ayaṃ caudumbaro maṇiḥ || tvaṃ maṇīnām adhipā vṛṣāsi tvayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir jajāna | tvayīme vājā draviṇāni sarvā- -udumbara sa tvam asmat sahasva- -ārād arātim amatiṃ kṣudhaṃ ca || grāmaṇīr asi grāmaṇīthyāyā abhiṣikto abhi mā siñca varcasā | tejo 'si tejo mayi dhārayādhi rayir asi rayiṃ mayi dhehi || puṣṭir asi puṣṭyā mā sam aṅdhi gṛhamedhī gṛhapatiṃ mā kṛṇu | audumbara sa tvam asmāsu rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yaccha rāyaspoṣāya prati muñce ahaṃ tvām || ayam audumbaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate | sa naḥ sanīṃ madhumatīṃ kṛṇotu rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchāt ||
anuvāka 1 ||
bhagasya rājñaḥ sumatiṃ gamema yaṃ havante bahudhā mānuṣāsaḥ | karma kṛṇvāno bhagam ā vṛṇīte sa no janeṣu subhagāṃ kṛṇotu || bhagaṃ purastāt pratibudhyamānāḥ paśyema devīm uṣasaṃ vibhātīm | pratīcī śubhrā draviṇena sākaṃ bhagaṃ vahanty aditir na aitu || bhago no adya svite dadhātu devānāṃ panthām abhi no nayeha | arvācī bhadrā sumatir na aitv adhā bhagena samidho no astu || bhagena vācam iṣitāṃ vadāni sarasvatīṃ madhumatīṃ suvarcāḥ | bhagena dattam upa medam āgan yathā varcasvān samitim āvadāni || bhago mā goṣv avatu bhago māvatu dhānye | akṣeṣu strīṣu mā bhago bhago māvatu varcasā || bhago mā sāyam avatu bhago māvatu rātryā | bhago nipadyamāneṣu prātar mā bhaga ā gamat || bhago mā prātar avatu bhago madhyandinaṃ pari | aparāhṇe vayaṃ bhagaṃ vāsa iva pari dadhmahe || bhagaṃ devebhyas pari bhagaṃ manuṣyebhyaḥ | divas pṛthivyā aham antarikṣād bhagaṃ vṛṇe | so agne ramatā mayi sa mā prāvatu varcasā || bhagaṃ vṛṇānā vadhvaṃ vahanti vaniṃ prayanto bhagam id dhavante | bhagena dattam upa medam āgan viśvaṃ subhūtaṃ draviṇāni bhadrā || bhagena devāḥ samaganmahi ya imā viśvā bhuvanābhivaste | prayacchann eti bahudhā vasūni sa no dadhātu yatamad vasiṣṭham || vāto bhago varuṇo vāyur agniḥ kṣetrasya patnī suhavā no astu | hiraṇyākṣo atipaśyo nṛcakṣāḥ sarvaiḥ sākaṃ sacamāno na ehi || ud ehi deva sūrya saha saubhāgyena | saharṣabhasya vājena sahāvataṃkaraṇena || hiraṇyayenety ekā ||
gobhiṣ ṭvā pātv ṛṣabho vṛṣā tvā pātu vājibhiḥ | vāyuṣ ṭvā brahmaṇā pātv indras tvā pātv indriyaiḥ || somas tvā pātv oṣadhībhir nakṣatraiḥ pātu sūryaḥ | mādbhiṣ ṭvā candro vṛtrahā vātaḥ prāṇena rakṣatu || tisro divas tisraḥ pṛthivīs trīṇy antarikṣāṇi caturaḥ samudrān | trivṛtaṃ stomaṃ trivṛta āpa āhus tās tvā rakṣantu trivṛtā trivṛdbhiḥ || trīn nākāṃs trīn samudrāṃs trīn bradhnāṃs trīn vaiṣṭapān | trīn mātariśvanas trīn sūryān goptṝn kalpayāmi te || ghṛtena tvā sam ukṣāmy agna ājyena vardhayan | agneś candrasya sūryasya mā prāṇaṃ māyino dabhan || mā vaḥ prāṇaṃ mā vo 'pānaṃ mā haro māyino dabhan | bhrājanto viśvavedaso devā daivyena māvata || prāṇenāgniṃ saṃ dadhati vātaḥ prāṇena saṃhitaḥ | prāṇena viśvatomukhaṃ sūryaṃ devā ajanayan || āyuṣāyuṣkṛtāṃ jīva- -āyuṣmāṃ jīva mā mṛthāḥ | prāṇenātmanvatāṃ jīva mā mṛtyor upa gā vaśam || devānāṃ nihitaṃ nidhiṃ yam indrānvavindan pathibhir devayānaiḥ | āpo hiraṇyaṃ jugupus trivṛdbhis tās tvā rakṣantu trivṛtā trivṛdbhiḥ || trayastriṃśad devatās trīṇi ca vīryāṇi priyāyamāṇā jugupur apsv antaḥ | asmiṃś candre adhi yad dhiraṇyaṃ tenāyaṃ kṛṇavad vīryāṇi ||
ye devā divy ekādaśa stha te devāso havir idaṃ juṣadhvam || ye devā antarikṣa ekādaśa stha (…) || see 1b ye devāḥ pṛthivyām ekādaśa stha te devāso havir idaṃ juṣadhvam || asapatnaṃ purastāt paścān no 'bhayaṃ kṛtam | savitā mā dakṣiṇata uttarān mā śacīpatiḥ || divo mādityā rakṣantu bhūmyā rakṣantv agnayaḥ | indrāgnī rakṣatāṃ mā purastād aśvināv abhitaḥ śarma yacchatām | tiraścīn aghnyā rakṣatu jātavedā bhūtakṛto me sarvataḥ santu varma ||
ye 'psv antar agnayaḥ praviṣṭā mroko manohā khano nirdāha ātmadūṣis tanadūṣiḥ | idaṃ tān ati sṛjāmi nir eno nir anṛtaṃ sṛjāmi || abhūtyā satvāya nir duṣvapnyaṃ sṛjāmi | vasiṣṭhārundhatī mā pātāṃ prajāpateḥ prastaro bṛhaspateḥ keśāḥ || adabdhaṃ cakṣuḥ suśrutau karṇāv akṣitau me prāṇāpānau | hṛdayā jarasaṃ mā mā hāsīr madhya mā riṣam || āpo mā śundhantu duṣkṛtād duritā yāni cakṛma | ayāma śuddhā uditas tanūbhiḥ || vaiśvānaro raśmibhir naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇeneṣiro namobhiḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye mā punītām || punantu māgnayo gārhapatyāḥ punantu mā dhṛṣṇyā devahūtāḥ | punantu mā śakvarīḥ somapṛṣṭhāḥ pavamānāso ajriṇaḥ || yaḥ potā sa punātu mā bṛhadbhir deva savitaḥ | varṣiṣṭhair dyām ivopari || brahmasavaiḥ punātu mā rājasavaiḥ punātu mā | śataṃ pavitrā vitatā tiraścā tebhir mā devaḥ savitā punātu || śataṃ ca mā pavitāraḥ punantu sahasraṃ ca prasravaṇeṣv āpaḥ | āpa iva pūto 'smy agnir iva suvarcāḥ sūrya iva sucakṣāḥ || urūṇasāv asutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janām̐ anu | tāv asmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyeha bhadram ||
aganma devāḥ svaḥ svar aganma- -aganma jyotir jyotir aganma | mahendro 'si parameṣṭhī sumitra viśvatomukha mā te yuyoma saṃdṛśaḥ || udyann adya citramahaḥ sapatnān me 'va jahi | Bhatt. meva divainān raśmibhir jahi rātryenāṃs tamasā vadhīs te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ || sūryasyāvṛtam anvāvarte dakṣiṇām anvāvṛtam | agnes tejasā tejasvī bhūyāsam indrasyendriyeṇendriyāvān bhūyāsam || idam aham agnes tejasā- -indrasyendriyeṇa somasya dyumnena viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ kratūnām | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasya- -amuṣyāḥ putrasya varcas teja indriyaṃ prāṇam āyur ni veṣṭayāmi || (…) āyur ni yacchet || idam aham agnes tejasā- -indrasyendriyeṇa somasya dyumnena viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ kratūnām | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasya- -amuṣyāḥ putrasya varcas teja indriyaṃ prāṇam āyur ā dāya || abhūtyā enaṃ pāśe sitvā duṣvapnyena saṃsṛjya mṛtyor vyātta āsann api dadhāmi ||
yo naḥ svo yo araṇo bhrātṛvyaś ca jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca marma skandheṣu vindatām || yo mā śayānaṃ jāgrataṃ yaś ca suptaṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca bāhū marmaṇi vṛścatām || yo mā carantaṃ tiṣṭhantam āsīnaṃ ca jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasminn agniś ca duritaṃ prati muñcatām || yo mā cakṣuṣā manasā yaś ca vācā jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca- -enāṃsi vahatām itaḥ || yaḥ piśāco yātudhānaḥ kravyād yo mā jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca mūrdhānaṃ prati vidhyatām || yo mā brahmaṇā tapasā yaś ca yajñair jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca hṛdaye 'dhi ni vidhyatām || yo me brahma yo me tapo balaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca kruddhau digdhābhir asyatām || yo me annaṃ yo me rasaṃ vācaṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca- -ācchambaṭkāram asyatām || yo me tantuṃ yo me prajāṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca hetiṃ deveṣu vindatām || yo me gobhya irasyaty aśvebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca jyāniṃ deveṣu vindatām ||
yo me bhūtim anāmayad vittam āyur jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasmā agniś ca divo aśmānam asyatām || yo me veśma yo me sabhāṃ śriyaṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca kṛtyāṃ vi tanutāṃ gṛhe || yo me mṛtyum asamṛddhim ahnā rātryā cecchati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca- -arciṣā dahatāṃ svam || yo me prāṇaṃ yo me 'pānaṃ vyānaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jighāṃsati | indraś ca tasyāgniś ca prāṇaṃ prāṇahanau hatām || yo mā devajanaiḥ sarpair vidyutā brahmaṇābhyamāt | agastyena medinā- -indraś cāgniś ca taṃ hatām || taṃ satyaujāḥ pra dahatv agnir vaiśvānaro vṛṣā | yo mā durasyann īkṣātai yaś ca dipsati vidvalaḥ || yo mā dipsād adipsantaṃ yaś ca dipsati dipsa tam | vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrayor agner api dadhāmi tam || abhi taṃ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃtapatāṃ tapte gharme nyucyatām | nirṛtyā vadhyatāṃ pāśe yo naḥ pāpaṃ cikitsati || pratyagvadhena pracyutān bhrātṛvyān ghoracakṣasaḥ | indrāgnī enān vṛścatāṃ maiṣām uc cheṣi kaś cana || pratyagvadha pratyag jahi bhrātṛvyān dviṣato mama | apānān prāṇāṃ saṃchidya dviṣatas pātayādharān || agne ye mā jighāṃsanty agne ye ca dviṣanti mā | agne ye mopatapyante teṣāṃ priyatamaṃ jahi || etaṃ dviṣantam avadhiṣam andhena tamasāvṛtam | etaṃ mṛtyo 'bhi padyasva mā te moci mahodaraḥ ||
dyāvāpṛthivī saṃ nahyethāṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantī amitrebhyo hetim asyantī || vātā pavamānau saṃ nahyethāṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantāv amitrebhyo hetim asyantau || indrāgnī saṃ nahyethāṃ (…) || see 2bc mitrāvaruṇā saṃ (…) see 1a (…) || see 2bc bhavāśarvā saṃ (…) see 1a (…) || see 2bc aśvinā saṃ nahyethāṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantāv amitrebhyo hetim asyantau || marutaḥ saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayanto 'mitrebhyo hetim asyantaḥ || pitaraḥ saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayanto 'mitrebhyo hetim asyantaḥ || sūryācandramasau saṃ nahyethāṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantāv amitrebhyo hetim asyantau || ahorātre san nahyethāṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantī amitrebhyo hetim asyantī ||
gandharvāpsarasaḥ saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayanto 'mitrebhyo hetim asyantaḥ || sarpapuṇyajanāḥ saṃ (…) || vanaspatayaḥ saṃ (…) || vānaspatyāḥ saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayanto 'mitrebhyo hetim asyantaḥ || oṣadhayaḥ saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantyo 'mitrebhyo hetim asyantyaḥ || vīrudhaḥ saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayantyo 'mitrebhyo hetim asyantyaḥ || bṛhaspate saṃ nahyasva mama rāṣṭrāya jayann amitrebhyo hetim asyan || prajāpate saṃ (…) || parameṣṭhin saṃ nahyasva mama rāṣṭrāya jayann amitrebhyo hetim asyan || udārā ud īrdhvaṃ viśvāni bhūtāni saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mama rāṣṭrāya jayanty amitrebhyo hetim asyanti ||
agnī rakṣitā sa imāṃ senāṃ rakṣatu | anuṣṭhātar anu tiṣṭha sarve vīrā bhavantu me || indro rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd somo rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd varuṇo rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd vāyū rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd tvaṣṭā rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd dhātā rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd savitā rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd sūryo rakṣitā (…) || see 1bcd candramā rakṣitā sa imaṃ senāṃ rakṣatu | anuṣṭhātar anu (…) || see 1cd
ahā rakṣitṛ tad imāṃ (…) | see 10.15.1b anuṣṭhātar anu (…) || see 10.15.1cd rātrī rakṣitrī semāṃ (…) | see 10.15.1b anuṣṭhātry anu (…) || see 10.15.1cd indrāṇī rakṣitrī (…) || see 2b varuṇānī rakṣitrī semāṃ (…) || see 2b sinīvālī rakṣitrī (…) || see 2b samudro rakṣitā sa imāṃ (…) | see 10.15.1b anuṣṭhātar anu (…) || see 10.15.1cd parjanyo rakṣitā (…) || see 6bcd bṛhaspatī rakṣitā (…) || see 6bcd prajāpatī rakṣitā (…) || see 6bcd parameṣṭhī rakṣitā sa imāṃ senāṃ rakṣatu | anuṣṭhātar anu tiṣṭha sarve vīrā bhavantu me || viśve devā rakṣitāras ta imāṃ senāṃ rakṣantu | anuṣṭhātāro anu tiṣṭhata sarve vīrā bhavantu me ||
anuvāka 2 ||
Kāṇḍa 11
vṛṣā te 'haṃ vṛṣaṇyantyai garbhaṃ dadhāmi yonyām | yadi devapariṣṭhitā prajāṃ tokaṃ na vindase || dhātā te taṃ sinīvālī varuṇānī pra yacchatu | pumāṃsaṃ putram indrāṇī śatadāyaṃ dadhātu te || saṃvṛtas te vakṣaṇāsu garbhaḥ puṃsā pumān kṛtaḥ | sarvāṅgas tanvor jāyatām agnir ivāraṇyor adhi || dhatsva vīraṃ karmaṇyaṃ prasvaṃ tvāvadhrim avaśāṃ kṛṇomi | ātmanas te lohitād garbhaḥ saṃvartatāṃ vṛṣā || tvaṣṭā piṃśatu te prajāṃ dhātā tokaṃ dadhātu te | rākā sīvyatu sūcyā bhūtasyeśānā bhuvanasya devī || sinīvālīm anumatiṃ rākāṃ guṅguṃ sarasvatīm | devānāṃ patnīr yā devīr indrāṇīm avase huve || abhinnāṇḍā vṛddhagarbhā- -ariṣṭā vīrasūr iyam | vi jāyatāṃ pra jāyatāṃ bahvī bhavatu putriṇī || pari sṛja garbhaṃ dhehi māśāḥ pra cyoṣṭa lohitam | anūnaḥ pūrṇo jāyatām aśrāmoranvo apiśācadhītaḥ || tvaṃ dadhāsi dvipade catuṣpade garbhaṃ prajām ejate viśvarūpām | kanikradad vṛṣabho vīḍuśepāḥ prajāpate tanvāṃ dhehi garbham || abhikrandaṃ stanayaṃ dhehi garbhaṃ vidyotamānaḥ pavamāno vīrudbhiḥ | parjanyemāṃ pṛthivī retasāvata- -apāṃ rasair oṣadhīnāṃ paśūnām || ā te nayāmi vṛṣaṇaṃ yaḥ prajānāṃ prajāpatiḥ | sa te dadhātv ṛtviyaṃ garbhaṃ yonyāṃ vijāṃ prajām || ye vṛṣāṇo garbhakṛta ṛtviyānāṃ samenasaḥ | tāṃs te hvayāmi tad u te sam ṛdhyatām || agneṣ ṭe tvaṣṭur varuṇād indrāt somād bṛhaspateḥ | putraṃ te putrakāmāyai devebhyo nir mame prajām || aṅgād aṅgāt saṃ sravatu tad yonau prati tiṣṭhatu | prajā te vakṣaṇāśayā tat te bījaṃ vi rohatu ||
atsaso yamanaṃ saso 'bhūtir yakṣmam ajījanat | imaṃ sahasrabhāg indro viśaraṃ nāśayāti te || yaḥ kāryo yaś ca kṛtaḥ svayaṃjā uta hāryaḥ | devā indrajyeṣṭhā viśaraṃ nāśayantu te || viśarasya vijṛmbhasya- -iṣur mātā dhanuṣ pitā | ādityāḥ putrā ādityā viśaraṃ naśayantu te || dhanvano jyāyā iṣvā apaskambhasya bāhvoḥ | apāṣṭhāc chṛṅgāt kurmalād viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te || alavatī ruruśīrṣṇy atho yasyāyo mukham | devyai parjanyaretasa iṣave kṛṇutā namaḥ || yām atrayo aṅgiraso gotamā vīrudhaṃ viduḥ | tayā bharadvājaḥ kaṇvo viśaraṃ nāśayāti te || yas tvā straiṇād apasaro yaḥ puṃso adhyāruhat | āklāntaṃ saṃklāntaṃ snāva tad u te kalpayāmasi || vāta ivābhraṃ cyāvayāmi yakṣmaṃ te tanvas pari | vācā yac cakrus te guru tad ṛcā laghu kṛṇmasi | tenāham ṛtodyena viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te || yathā na satyaṃ puruṣaḥ sadā vaditum arhati | viṣkandhaṃ tvad apaśaraṃ viśaraṃ puṣṭyāmayam | jambhaṃ hanugrābhaṃ śaṅkhaṃ tān ajenā ajāmasi || śunam id va oṣadhayo vi dadhe bheṣajāya kam | dhanāyuvaḥ sanāyuvaḥ puruṣaṃ pārayiṣṇavaḥ || ātmatrāṇi devajūtā vīrudhāyuṣyā kṛtā | tayāham indradattayā viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te || alasya vyañjanasya veṣṭanasyota parṇadheḥ | granther jyāyā iṣvā viśaraṃ nāśayāmi te || sākaṃ viṣkandha pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvyā | sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā saha naśya nihākayā ||
jaṅgiḍo 'si jaṅgiḍo rakṣitāsi jaṅgiḍaḥ | dvipāc catuṣpād asmākaṃ sarvaṃ rakṣatu jaṅgiḍaḥ || yā gṛtsyas tripañcāśīḥ śataṃ kṛtyākṛtaś ca ye | sarvān vinaktatejaso 'rasān jaṅgiḍas karat || arasaṃ kṛtrimaṃ nāḍam arasāḥ sapta visrasaḥ | apeto jaṅgiḍāmatim iṣum asteva sādhaya || kṛtyādūṣaṇa evāyam atho arātidūṣaṇaḥ | atho sahasvāṃ jaṅgiḍaḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat || sa jaṅgiḍasya mahimā pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ | viṣkandhaṃ yena sāsāha saṃskandham oja ojasā || tṛṣṭvā devā ajanayan niṣṭhitaṃ bhūmyām adhi | tam u tvāṅgirā iti brahmāṇaḥ pūrvyā viduḥ || na tvā pūrvā oṣadhayo na tvā tarantu yā navāḥ | vibādha ugro jaṅgiḍaḥ paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ || aśvopadān bhagavo jaṅgiḍāmitavīrya | purā ta ugrāya sata upendro vīryaṃ dadau || ugra it te vanaspata indra ojmānam ā dadhau | amīvāḥ sarvāś cātayañ jahi rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe || aśarīkaṃ viśarīkaṃ balāsaṃ puṣṭyāmayam | takmānaṃ viśvaśāradam arasaṃ jaṅgiḍas karat ||
indrasya nāma gṛhṇanta ṛṣayo jaṅgiḍaṃ daduḥ | devā yaṃ cakrur bheṣajam agre viṣkandhadūṣaṇam || sa no rakṣatu jaṅgiḍo dhanapālo dhaneva | devā yaṃ cakrur brāhmaṇāḥ paripāṇam arātiham || durhārdasaṃ ghoracakṣuṃ pāpakṛtvānam āgatam | tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo pratībodhena nāśaya paripāno 'si jaṅgidaḥ || pari mā divaḥ pari mā pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt pari mā vīrudbhyaḥ | pari mā bhūtāt pari mota bhavyād diśo diśo jaṅgiḍaḥ pātv asmān || ya ṛṣṇavo devakṛtā ya uco babhṛte nyāḥ | sarvāṃs tān viśvabheṣajo arasān jaṅgiḍas karat ||
prati gṛhāṇa pṛthivī nītam etad ājyasya mathitaṃ śarīram | imāṃ dhenum asya dātus tvaṃ rakṣa barhiṣy ā yathāsat || uta tvāhur varuṇasya patnīm atho tvāhur aditiṃ viśvarūpām | adhi jarāyum āghāre havyavāham agnāv asyā mahimānaṃ juhomi || sa sāhasraṃ tantum anv ā tatāna so agniṣṭomān daśataṃ sam āpa | Bhatt. -ṣṭomāṃ adhijarāyuṃ savatsāṃ yo dadāti taṃ vai devāḥ svar ā rohayanti || adhijarāyuḥ svar ā rohayanty anena dattā sudughā vayodhāḥ | sāsmai duhāṃ śatadhāram akṣitaṃ yam asya loke parame vyoman || pūrvavatsena saha vatsinī gaur yo 'syā vatso aparo jarāyu tat | tṛtīyaṃ māṃsaṃ parinirmitaṃ yat tasmād devā adhijarāyum āhuḥ || ā dhāvaya śavasā vāvṛdhāna- -uttarāva śrava ādhehy asmai | imam indra mahatāmena rakṣa saṃ prajayā tanvā saṃ balena || durvedāvastād bahudhā parastād viśve devāḥ prati paśyanty āyatīm | yā bhadrā yā sarvataḥ samīcī sed āhutir bhavatu me tarājyā || gṛṣṭiṃ dhenum adhijarāyuṃ svadhāṃ kṛṇvānaḥ pra dadāti brahmaṇe | sāsmai duhāṃ śatadhāram akṣitam amuṣmim̐l loke yuga uttarasmin || vatsaṃ jarāyu pratidhuk pīyūṣaṃ yo no dadāti sudughāmadhenum | tasya devāḥ pra tirantv āyuḥ sa ā rohatu sukṛtām ulokam || parivālām adhijarāyuṃ yudhā jīvo adadāgra etām | syonā naḥ śagmā śivā viśeha mā no hiṃsīr harasā daivyena || bhadrakṛtaṃ sukṛtamādu śaṃbhuvam araṃ bhuvaṃ prati gṛhṇāmy āyatīm | ghṛtaśriyaṃ nabhasī saṃvasānāṃ devān manuṣyām̐ asurān utarṣīn || pañca devāḥ pra pibanta etām indras tvaṣṭā varuṇo mitro agniḥ | te sarve sam adur mahyam etāṃ tayeha jīvan pra tirasvāyuḥ || kaśyapo 'yaṃ jamadagnir vasiṣṭha ṛṣayo naḥ sasanur agra etām | bharadvājo gotamo atrir naḥ syonāṃ viśvāmitro daduṣaḥ pra tirāty āyuḥ || ūrjaṃ devebhyaḥ subhaga ūrjaṃ manuṣyebhyaḥ | ūrjaṃ pitṛbhyo aghnya ūrjā dadata mā viśa ||
yā jātā oṣadhayo devebhyas triyugaṃ purā | manye nu babhrūṇām ahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca || śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vo ruhaḥ | adhā śatakṛtvo yūyam imaṃ me agadaṃ kṛta || puṣpavatīḥ prasūmatīḥ phalinīr aphalā uta | aśvā iva stha jitvarīr vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇavaḥ || oṣadhīr iti mātaro yad vo devīr upabruve | rapāṃsi vighnatīr ita rakṣaś cātayamānāḥ || niṣkṛtir nāma vo mātā niṣkṛtir nāma vaḥ pitā | sarāḥ patatriṇī stha yad āmayati niṣkṛtiḥ || aśvatthe vo niṣadanaṃ parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā | gobhāja it kilāsatha yat sanavatha puruṣam || yad ahaṃ vājayann imā oṣadhīr hasta ādadhe | ātma yakṣmasya naśyatu purā jīvagṛbho yathā || uc chuṣmā oṣadhīnāṃ gāvo goṣṭhād iverate | dhanaṃ saniṣyantīnām ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣaḥ || yad oṣadhayaḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitāv iva | vipraḥ sa ucyate bhiṣag rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ || aśvāvatīṃ somāvatīm ūrjayantīm udojasam | āvitsi sarvā oṣadhīr ito mā pārayān iti ||
ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhā stena iva vrajam akramīt | oṣadhayaḥ pracucyavur yat kiṃ ca tanvo rapaḥ || yasyauṣadhayaḥ prasarpatha- -aṅgam aṅgaṃ paruṣ paruḥ | tasmād yakṣmaṃ vi bādhadhvam ugro madhyamaśīr iva || anyā vo anyām avatv anyānyasyā upāvata | oṣadhayaḥ saṃvidānā idaṃ me prāvatā vacaḥ || avapatantīr apadaṃ diva oṣadhayas pari | yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ || yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr bahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ | bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || yāḥ phalinīr yā aphalā akośā yāś ca keśinīḥ | bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || jīvalāṃ naghāriṣām ā te badhnāmy oṣadhim | yā ta āyur upāharād apa rakṣāṃsi cātayāt ||
kālo aśvo vahati saptaraśmiḥ sahasrākṣo ajaro bhūriretāḥ | tām ā rohanti kavayo vipaścitas tasya cakrā bhuvanāni viśvā || sapta cakrān vahati kāla eṣa saptāsya nābhīr amṛtaṃ nv akṣaḥ | sa imā viśvā bhuvanāny añjan kālaḥ sa īyate prathamo nu devaḥ || pūrṇaḥ kumbho adhi kāla āhitas taṃ vai paśyāmo bahudhā nu santam | sa imā viśvā bhuvanāni pratyaṅ kālaṃ tam āhuḥ parame vyoman || sa eva san bhuvanāny ābharat sa eva san bhuvanāni pary ait | pitā sann abhavat putra eṣāṃ tasmād vai nānyat param asti tejaḥ || kālo 'mūṃ divam ajanayat kala imāṃ pṛthivīm uta | kālena bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca- -iṣitaṃ ha vi tiṣṭhate || kālo bhūtim asṛjat kale tapati sūryaḥ | kālo ha viśvā bhūtāni kāle cakṣur vi paśyati || kāle manaḥ kāle prāṇaḥ kāle nāma samāhitam | kālena sarvā nandanty āgatena prajā imāḥ || kāle tapaḥ kāle jyeṣṭhaṃ kāle brahma samāhitam | kālo ha sarvasyeśvaro yaḥ pitāsīt prajāpateḥ || teneṣitaṃ tena jātaṃ tad u tasmin pratiṣṭhitam | kālo ha brahma bhūtvā bibharti parameṣṭhinam || kālaḥ prajām asṛjata kālo agre prajāpatim | svayambhūḥ kaśyapaḥ kālāt tapaḥ kālād ajāyata ||
kālād āpaḥ sam abhavan kālād brahma tapo diśaḥ | kālenod eti sūryaḥ kāle ni viśate punaḥ || kālena vātaḥ pavate kālena pṛthivī mahī dyaur mahī kāla āhitā | kālo ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca putro ajanayat puraḥ || kālād ṛcaḥ sam abhavan yajuṣ kālād ajāyata | kālo yajñaṃ sam airayad devebhyo bhāgam akṣitam || kāle gandharvāpsarasaḥ kāle lokāḥ samāhitāḥ | kāle 'yam aṅgirā devo atharvā cādhi tiṣṭhataḥ || imaṃ ca lokaṃ paramaṃ ca lokaṃ puṇyāṃś ca lokān vidhṛtīś ca puṇyāḥ | sarvām̐l lokān abhijitya brahmaṇā kālaḥ sa īyate paramo nu devaḥ ||
saptaitaṃ sapta ṛṣayaḥ śalyakartā dvādaśa | āviddhaṃ śalyaṃ cākratur indrarāśiṃ mahodaram || indrarāśiṃ mitrāvaruṇāv āviddhaṃ nir akṛntatam | prasūtam indreṇogreṇa Bhatt. -greṇo (misprint) brāhmaṇānām asat pituḥ || nainam aśnīyād abrāhmaṇo na gṛhān pra haret svān | tṛṣṭaṃ viṣam iva taimātam indrarāśiḥ khale śaye || ayaṃ śaye tanvaṃ rakṣamāṇo yo aśnāty avicakṣāṇa etam | madhye khalasya nirmita indrarāśir mahodaraḥ || utaiṣa yakṣmaṃ bhavati- -indrarāśir mahodaraḥ | bhīmo annasya saṃkāśe aśva ivātti śinī naḍam || ya indrarāśiṃ nirvapād vardhayāt khalamānyāḥ | sphātiṃ ca khalyāṃ gṛhṇātu gavāṃ ca bahu puṣyatu || yam uvāha śunaḥśepo yam indro brahmaṇaspatiḥ | taṃ cakruḥ śivam asmabhyaṃ ṛṣayo jīvanāya kam || tṛḍhaṃ śākaṃ tam aśayad dattam āsīc chvāpadam | pandrā sma rupyantaḥ śere ya ādanvahutaṃ haviḥ || anaḍuhāṃ pṛśniśaphānāṃ vahatāṃ vaharāpiṇām | kīnāśasya śramāt svedād indrarāśir ajāyata || yat kināśasya sveda eti saṃtaptas tanvas pari | apāṃ gāva iva tṛṣyantīr indrarāśiṃ so aśnute ||
yat kīnāśaṃ sīrapatir daṇḍena hanti manyutaḥ | yat kiṃ ca khalyaṃ sādānvavam indrarāśau tad āhitam || ulūkhalamusalaṃ tāni codaya sūrpaṃ nāry apavice kṛṇuṣva | vāhāya putrāya gotama indrarāśiṃ madhumantaṃ kṛṇotu || etat sūrpaṃ jaritar ā hara- -ulūkhalamusalaṃ kumbhy ā gahi | putrā no adya sudinatve ahni pittam aśnanta madhumantam aṃśum || agnir no dūtaḥ prahito 'yam āgan sa naḥ sarvam annam aviṣaṃ kṛṇotu | nirāviddham akṛtaṃ brahmaṇeto 'domadhaṃ pittam atta prasūtāḥ || svādo pito madho pita Bhatt. pito upa naḥ pitav ā gahi | śivaḥ śivābhir ūtibhiḥ || siṃho bhūtvā gā mṛṇāty agnir bhūtvā dhānyam | indrarāśir anirmito mayāraṃ cāva gacchati ||
śatakāṇḍo duścyavanaḥ sahasraparṇa uttiraḥ | darbho ya ugra oṣadhis taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe || nāsya keśān pra vapanti norasi tāḍam ā ghnate | yasmā acchinnaparṇena darbheṇa śarma yacchati || divi te tūlam oṣadhe pṛthivyām asi niṣṭhitaḥ | tvayā sahasrakāṇḍena āyuṣ pra vardhayāmahe || tisro divo aty atṛṇas tisra imāḥ pṛthivīr uta | tayāhaṃ sarvān durhārdo jihvāṃ ni tṛṇadmi vacāṃsi ca || tvam asi sahamāno aham asmi sahasvān | ubhau sahasvantau bhūtvā sapatnān sahiṣīvahi || sahasva no abhimātiṃ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ | sahasva sarvān durhārdaḥ Bhatt. sarvāṃ durhārdo suhārdo me bahūn kṛdhi || darbheṇa devajātena diviṣṭambhena śaśvad it | tenāhaṃ sasvato janām̐ asanaṃ sanavāni ca || priyaṃ mā darbhaṃ kṛṇu brahmarājanyābhyāṃ śūdrāya cāryāya ca | yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate || yo jāyamānaḥ pṛthivīm adṛṃhad yo astabhnād antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca | yaṃ bibhrataṃ nanu pāpmā viveda sa no 'yaṃ darbho dharuṇo divā kaḥ || sapatnahā śatakāṇḍaḥ sahasvān oṣadhīnāṃ prathamaḥ saṃ babhūva | sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas tena sākṣīya pṛtanāḥ pṛtanyataḥ ||
sahasrārghaḥ śatakāṇḍaḥ payasvān apām agnir vīrudhāṃ rājasūyam | sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvato daivo maṇir āyuṣā saṃ sṛjāti naḥ || ghṛtād ullupto madhumān payasvān bhūmidṛṃho acyutaś cāvayiṣṇuḥ | nudan sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvan darbhāroha mahatā mahendriyeṇa || tvaṃ bhūmim aty eṣy ojasā tvaṃ vedyāṃ sīdasi cārur adhvare | tvāṃ pavitram ṛṣayo 'bharanta tvaṃ punīhi duritāny asmat || tīkṣṇo rājā viṣāsahī rakṣohā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ | tejo devānāṃ balam ugram etat taṃ te badhnāmi jarase svastaye || darbheṇa tvaṃ kṛṇu vīryāṇi darbhaṃ bibhrad ātmanā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ | atiṣṭhāyo varcasaidhvanyān sūrya ivā bhāhi pradiśaś catasraḥ ||
ud īratāṃ pṛthivī jīradānuḥ śīta enām antarvān anu vātu vātaḥ | ṛtviyāvatī pṛthivī prati gṛhṇātu bījaṃ sahasravalliśaṃ suruhārohayantī || indra enāṃ haryaśvo agnir vā rohitāśvaḥ | aśvinā rāsabhāśvā kṛṣiṃ devīm ayūyujan || śunaṃ varatrām ā yaccha śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya | śunaṃ totapyatāṃ phālaḥ śunaṃ vahatu lāṅgalam || yunaktu vāhān vi yugā tanota kṛte kṣetre vapateha bījam | tathā dhātā tathā bhagas tathā kṛṇutām aśvinā tathā devī sarasvatī || supippalā oṣadhayo nāhīnā apakṣata | tad indro varuṇo vāyur aśvinedaṃ me pra tiratā vacaḥ || dhātā pūṣā bṛhaspatir bhūtyāḥ sam ajīgaman | kṛṣiṃ devāḥ svarvidaḥ || kalyāṇī subhageva yā saṃsthāyāṃ vapuṣeṇyā | sā nas tirāti madhumantam aṃśum || annasya bhūmā puruṣasya bhūmā bhūmā paśūnāṃ ta iha śrayantām | tīvrā varṣantu vṛṣṭayo bhūtaye mahase vṛdhe || pinvānaḥ parjanyas tiṣṭhatu saha pṛṣṭhayod eti sūryaḥ | ānandaṃ janayan yavaḥ sarvā arātīr apabādhamānaḥ || vi jihīṣva pṛthivīm ahyur vi pakṣam ṛdvī bhava | bhadraṃ rohatu dhānyam ||
utsedha sedha gā ajan vindeherāṃ mahas kṛdhi | mā vo riṣat kūṭagrāho Bhatt. riṣāt mā va ā śāri lāṅgalam || mo asmākam ugrāḥ saṃrabdhās Bhatt. mo [']smākam tanvaḥ kiṃ canāmamat | rāyaspoṣaṃ śunāsīrā atho sītābhagaś ca yaḥ || deṣṭrī samudraḥ sinīvālī kṛṣiṃ no abhi hinvata | imā yāḥ pañca pradiśas tā vāto abhi hinvata | valīke satvatām iva tīvrā varṣantu vṛṣṭayaḥ || śunaṃ kīnāśo anv etu vāhāñ chunaṃ phālo vinudann etu bhūmim | śunāsīrā haviṣā vāvṛdhānā śunaṃ dhānyāni kṛṇutāṃ yuvaṃ naḥ || yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ | tām asme rāsetām iṣam ||
ūrdhvaśrito vai nāmaitā āpo yad oṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca tāsām agnir adhipatiḥ | yo vā etā ūrdhvaśrita āpo vedāgnim adhipatim | yathaitam etā ūrdhvā upatiṣṭhanty evainam ūrdhvā upa tiṣṭhanty adhipatir bhavati svānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca ya evaṃ veda || praskadvarīr vai nāmaitā āpo yat pṛṣvās tāsām ādityo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etāḥ praskadvarīr āpo vedādityam adhipatim | yathaitā etasminn udyati praskandanty evāsminn ā yati praskandanty adhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e takvarīr vai nāmaitā āpo yāḥ sūdaya tāsāṃ pṛthivy adhipatnī | yo vā etās takvarīr āpo veda pṛthivīm adhipatnīm | yathaitā etasyāṃ praṇutās takantīr yanty evainena dviṣantaḥ praṇutā yanty adhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e vaśinīr vai nāmaitā āpo yāḥ syandante tāsāṃ varuṇo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etā vaśinīr āpo veda varuṇam adhipatim | yathaitam etāsāṃ syandamānānāṃ vaśam ādatta evā dviṣatāṃ vaśam ā datte 'dhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e ūrjo vai nāmaitā āpo yad gāvas tāsāṃ tvaṣṭādhipatiḥ | yo vā etā ūrja āpo veda tvaṣṭāram adhipatim | ūrjasvī tejasvī rājasabhāyāṃ madhuparkam āpnoty adhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e ugrā vai nāmaitā āpo yad dhrādunayas tāsāṃ maruto adhipatayaḥ | yo vā etā ugrā āpo veda maruto 'dhipatīn | ugro balavāna bhavati mārutaṃ śardha ity enam āhur adhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e maho vai nāmaitā āpo yad varṣaṃ tāsāṃ parjanyo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etā maha āpo veda parjanyam adhipatim | mahasvī mitrabāho bhavaty utainena svā nandanty asmākam ayam iti tasmāt sarvo vṛṣṭe mahīyate 'dhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e atimanyā vai nāmaitā āpo yat surā tasām aśvinādhipatī | yo vā etā atimanyā āpo vedāśvinādhipatī | ati manyate bhrātṛvyān nainaṃ bhrātṛvyā ati manyante tasmān matto mattam ati manyate 'dhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e paricito vai nāmaitā āpo yāḥ karṣvāṃ tāsāṃ yamo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etāḥ paricita āpo veda yamam adhipatim | pary enaṃ svāś ca viśyāś cāvaśyanty adhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e rantayo vai nāmaitā āpo ya striyas tāsāṃ kāmo 'dhipatiḥ | yo vā etā rantīr āpo veda kāmam adhipatim | ramante asmin ramaṇīyo bhavati kāma iva strīṇām adhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e viśvabhṛto vai nāmaitā āpo yat puruṣas tāsāṃ mṛtyur adhipatiḥ | yo vā etā viśvabhṛta āpo veda mṛtyum adhipatim | viśvasya bhartā bhavati viśvam enaṃ bibharty āsya trayo 'gnayo gṛhe dhīyante dakṣiṇāgnir gārhapatya āhavanīyaḥ | ainaṃ catvāri vāmāni gacchanti niṣkaḥ kaṃso 'śvataro hasty adhipatiḥ (…) || see 1e tāsāṃ vā etāsām apāṃ himavān ūdhaḥ somo vatsaḥ parameṣṭhy adhipatiḥ | yo vā etāsām apāṃ himavantam ūdhaḥ somaṃ vatsaṃ parameṣṭhinam adhipatiṃ veda | parameṣṭhī bhavati gacchati parameṣṭhitām adhipatir bhavati svānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca ya evaṃ veda ||

Kāṇḍa 12
agnis takmānam apa bādhatām itaḥ somo grāvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣāḥ | vedir barhiḥ samidhaḥ śośucānā apa rakṣāṃsy amuyā dhamantu || ayaṃ yo ruro abhiśocayiṣṇur viśvā rūpāṇi haritā kṛṇoti | tasmai te 'ruṇāya babhrave tapur maghāya namo 'stu takmane || takman sārthinam icchasva vaśī san mṛḍayāsi naḥ | athehi yatra te gṛhā aninūrtteṣu dasyuṣu || yaḥ puruṣaḥ pāruṣeyo 'vadhvaṃsa ivāruṇaḥ | takmānaṃ viśvadhāvīrya- Bhatt. -vīryā adhar- -adharāñcaṃ parā suva || adharāñcaṃ pra hiṇomi manas kṛtvā takmane | śakambharasya muṣṭihā punar gaccha mahāvṛṣān || mahāvṛṣān mūjavata oka edhi paretya | vratāni takmane brūmo anyakṣetrāṇi vā imāḥ || oko asya mūjavanta oko asya mahāvṛṣāḥ | yāj jātas takmaṃ tād asi balihikeṣu nyocaraḥ || takman vyāla vigada vyaṅga bhūri yāvaya | dāsīṃ niṣṭakvarīm iccha tāṃ vajreṇa sam arpaya || giriṃ gaccha girijāsi girau te māhiṣo gṛhaḥ | dāsīm iccha prapharvyaṃ tāṃ takman vīva dhūnuhi || yas tvaṃ śīto atho rūraḥ saha kāsāvīviyaḥ | bhimās te takman hetayas tābhi sma pari vṛṅdhi naḥ ||
takman bhrātrā balāsena svasrā kāsikayā saha | pāmnā bhrātṛvyeṇa naśyeto maraṭāṅ abhi || gandhāribhyo mūjavadbhyaḥ kāśibhyo magadhebhyaḥ | jane priyam iva śevadhiṃ takmānaṃ pari dadhmasi || nārkavindān nārvidālān nānnadīṃ vartakāvatīm | vratāni takmane brūmo anyakṣetrāṇi vā imāḥ || anyakṣetre na ramate sahasrākṣo amartyaḥ | abhūd u prārthas takmā sa gamiṣyati balihikām || ado gaccha mūjavatas tato vā gha parastaram | mā smāto abhyair naḥ punas tat tvā takmann upa bruve || parasmaiva tvaṃ cara paramasyāṃ parāvati | yathā no nāntam āyasi yathā no nābhiśocayā ||
yatheyam urvī pṛthivī vṛddhaiva garbham ādadhe | evā dadhāmi te garbhaṃ tasmai tvām avase huve || parvatād divo yoner gātrād gātrāt samāśṛtam | reto devasya devasya tsarau parṇam ivā dhām || tsaru Mehendale, Henning Mem. Vol. viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rupāṇi piṃśatu | ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te || garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati | garbhaṃ yuvam aśvināsyāmā dhattaṃ puṣkarasrajā || garbhaṃ te rājā varuṇo garbhaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ | garbhaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca garbhaṃ dhātā dadhātu te || garbho asy oṣadhīnāṃ garbho vanaspatīnām | garbho viśvasya bhūtasya so agne garbham eha dhāḥ || yenauṣadhayo garbhinīḥ paśavo yena garbhinaḥ | teṣāṃ garbhasya yo garbhas tena tvaṃ garbhiṇī bhava || vi te granthiṃ cṛtāmasi dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te | ā yoniṃ putro rohatu jananaṃ prati jāyatām || janiṣṭa hi mahiyā ā yoniṃ sam ihāsarat | athā soma iva bhakṣaṇam ā garbhaḥ sīdatv ṛtviyam || dhātaḥ śreṣṭhena rūpeṇa- -asyā nāryā gavīnyoḥ | pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave ||
savitaḥ śreṣṭhena rūpeṇa (…) || see 12.3.10bcd viṣṇoḥ śreṣṭhena (…) || see 12.3.10 tvaṣṭaḥ śreṣṭhena (…) || see 12.3.10 bhagaḥ śreṣṭhena rūpeṇa- -asyā nāryā gavīnyoḥ | pumāṃsaṃ putram ā dhehi daśame māsi sūtave || adhi skanda vīrayasva garbham ā dhehi yonyām | vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣṇyāvantaṃ prajāyai tvā nayāmasi || yad veda rājā varuṇo veda devo bṛhaspatiḥ | indro yad vṛtrahā veda taṃ garbhakaraṇaṃ piba || vi jihīṣva bārhatsāme garbhas te yonim ā śayām | dadan te putraṃ devāḥ somapām ubhayāvinam || somasya tva rtviyena- -upaimi garbhakṛtvane | tatas te putro jāyatāṃ kartavai vīryebhyaḥ ||
jāyasvāgne 'śvatthād asmai kṣatrāyaujase | ugra āpatikād adhi yo vṛkṣām̐ adhirohati || Bhatt. vṛkṣāṃ vibādhaṃ cit sahamānaṃ tvām agne janayāmasi | jātāṃ janiṣyamāṇāṃ sapatnān pra ṇudasva me || aśvatthasyārohasya vṛkṣasyāraṇayaḥ kṛtāḥ | tato jātāya te 'jani vīḍujambhāgnir agnaye || taṃ jātaṃ jātavedasam ā dadhāmy amartyam | pāvakam agnim ūtaye śucimantaṃ viṣāsahim || ut tanuṣva dhanuḥ prati muñcasva varma jahi śatrūn vīryā te kṛṇomi | atra radhyantu ya u te sapatnās tvam ekavṛṣo bhava || vṛṣabhaṃ tvā sajātānāṃ sapatnānāṃ viṣāsahim | hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛṇmo virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām || samudro 'sy apāṃ jyeṣṭha indro deveṣu vṛtrahā | vyāghraṃ siṃhaṃ tvā kṛṇmo damitāraṃ pṛtanyatām || indra iva dasyūn adharān kṛṇuṣva- -ugra iva vāto viśṛṇan sapatnān | te śuṣyantv apa dāvād iva- -agneḥ paryavīvarathā enān || saṃ vṛścaināṃs te śuṣyantu vṛścainān mopajāṃ śiṣaḥ | sapatnān sarvāṃs tṛḍhvā tvam ekavṛṣo bhava || tvam ugras tvaṃ balī tvam edhi vivācanam | tvaṃ pṛtanyataḥ pūrvaḥ sapatnām̐ ava dūnuṣva || Bhatt. sapatnāṃ
asapatnaḥ sapatnahā- -indra ivāriṣṭo akṣitaḥ | adhaḥ sapatnās te padoḥ sarve santv abhiṣṭhitāḥ || mlāyantu te khātamūlāḥ sapatnā agnim eṣāṃ nir hvayāmi śarīrāt | haviṣaiṣām api dadhāmi prāṇāṃs tathaibhyo amuciḥ kṛtāḥ || abhivardham abhibhavaṃ sapatnakṣayaṇaṃ haviḥ | rāṣṭrāya tubhyaṃ kṛṇmaḥ sapatnebhyaḥ parābhavan || yo naḥ svo yo araṇo 'rātiyati pūruṣaḥ | idhmasyeva prakṣāyakas tasya moccheṣi kiṃ cana || asapatnam iti dve || PS 10.8.4-5 are repeated (…) || PS 10.8.5 is repeated
tvayā pūrvam ātharvāṇo jaghnū rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe | tvayā jaghāna kaśyapas tvayā kṛṇvo agastyaḥ || tvayā vayam apsaraso gandharvāṃś cātayāmasi | ajaśṛṅgy aja rakṣaḥ sarvān gandhena nāśaya || nadīṃ yantv apsaraso apāntāram iva śvasan | gulgulū pīlā nalady aukṣagandhiḥ pramandinī || yatrāmartyā apsv antaḥ samudre turūr nīlī turvaśī puṇḍarīkā | tat paretā apsarasaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana || yatra preṅkho gandharvāṇāṃ divi baddho hiraṇyayaḥ | (…) || see 4cd gandharvāṇām apsarasām ānartam iti saṅgamam | (…) || see 4cd yatrāśvatthā nyagrodhā mahārukmāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ | (…) || see 4cd yatra vo 'kṣā haritā arjunā āghāṭāḥ kakaryaḥ saṃvadanti | tat paretā apsarasaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana || iyaṃ vīrucchikhaṇḍino gandharvasyāpsarāpateḥ | bhinattu muṣkāv api yātu śephaḥ || eyam agann oṣadhir vīrudhāṃ vīryāvatī | ajaśṛṅgy arāṭakī tīkṣṇaśṛṅgī vy ṛṣatu ||
apeteto apsaraso gandharvā yatra vo gṛhāḥ | tīkṣṇaśṛṅgy arāṭaky ajaśṛṅgī vy ṛṣatu || jāyā veda vo apsaraso gandharvāḥ patayo yūyam | apa krāmat puruṣād amartyā martyaṃ mā sacadhvam || bhīmā indrasya hetayaḥ śatamṛṣṭīr ayasmai | tābhir gandharvān abhaidyān avakādān vy ṛṣatu || avakādām̐ abhiśoco bhitsu dyotayamāmakān | gandharvān sarvān oṣadhe pra ṇudasva parā ṇaya || unmādayantīr abhiśocayantīr muniṃ nagnaṃ kṛṇvatīr moghahāsinam | apsaraso raghaṭo yāś caranti gandharvapatnīr ajaśṛṅgy āśaye || śvetīkṛṇvānaḥ puruṣaṃ viśvā rūpāṇi bobhuvat | śvevaikaṃ kapir ivaikaṃ kumāraḥ sarvakeśakaḥ | priyo dṛśe bhūtvā gandharvaḥ sacate striyaṃ tam ito nāśayāmasi ||
yo vai vaśāṃ devayate pacate vāhutāmamā | mṛtyoḥ sa badhyate pāśe devānāṃ ca yamasya ca || dakṣiṇāṃ sūryām aditiṃ vadanti vaśāṃ vācaṃ kalpayantaḥ samānīm | sapta ṛṣayo ni dadhur vācam etāṃ sarasvatī mṛḍayā kalpayantaḥ || imāṃ vaśāṃ vācam āhur vaśeti tisro vaśā atihitāḥ sadhasthe | tāsām agnau manasaikāṃ juhomi tāṃ naḥ svādvīṃ bhūtapatiḥ kṛṇotu || svadvīṃ na etāṃ savitā kṛṇotu svadvīṃ na etāṃ janitā paśūnām | juhudhy agne vayunāni vidvāṃs tāṃ naḥ svādvīṃ bhūtapatiḥ kṛṇotu || idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vaśinī vaśāśi mahimne tvā garbho abhy ā viveśa | uśatī tvam uśato gaccha devān satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ || iyam ambhasā vājasutastabhe gaur yasyām indro varuṇas titviṣāte | nṛmṇam anṛmṇaṃ sacata iyam āgan dhīraḥ paśur vīryam ā viveśa || vaśā sasūva sthaviraṃ vipaścitaṃ vaśā sasūva vaṣkayaṃ divispṛśan | vaśā sasūva taruṇaṃ vibhājane vaśā sasūva saṃjitaṃ dhanānām || yat prokṣaṇam apatad barhiṣas pari dakṣiṇato vedyā indriyāvat | vaśā saṃbhūtyādhi gaur amīmet tasyāḥ pīvo abhavad varmavāsasam || namo mahimna uta cakṣuṣe vāṃ vaśarṣabho manasā tat kṛṇomi | devām̐ apītaṃ pathibhiḥ śivebhir mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ harasā daivyena || vaśām askandad ṛṣabhas tiṣṭhantīm adhi tantuṣu | garbhaṃ tam adya ko veda yatidhā so akalpayat ||
rūpam ekaḥ pary abhavad rājā nāmaika ucyate | patīrūpasyaiko rūpaṃ rūpam ekaḥ sukṛtvanām || prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī mṛtyur viśvānaraḥ svaḥ | sarasvānasyā yajñasya vaśāyā adhi jajñire || yasya gṛha ādāyeta vaśā devakṛtaṃ haviḥ | nidhānam asyā eṣyaṃ duhitre patyām iva || nāsyāḥ sakṛd abhi tiṣṭhen nāsya śloṇā gṛhe syāt | vaśā kanyeva durmaṅkā- -apacityā vijānatā || naināṃ rakṣed brāhmaṇebhyo nāmā vi glāpayāti ca | yatīṃ na pratyāvartayed yasya goṣu vaśā syāt || nāsyā vaśām ā rundhed devā manuṣyā uta | vaśaṃ yad anvaid brahmaṇā tasmād eṣābhavad vaśā || vaśaṃ kṛṇvānā vaśinīyam āgan padaṃ kalyāṇy avapaśyamānā | aniṣṭyeṣṭim abhijāyamānā yajñasya mātrām abhikalpamānā || indravantas te marutas turīyaṃ bhejire vaśe | turīyam ādityā rudrās turīyaṃ vasavo vaśe || turīya bhāja ādityān vaśāyāḥ kavayo viduḥ | athāsyāḥ pathyaikā tanuś catasraś cakl̥pe diśaḥ || vaśā panthām anv apaśyan nākapṛṣṭhaṃ svarvidām | ādityā enām anv āyann ṛṣayaś ca tapasvinaḥ ||
padepade kalpayanta ādityāṅgiraso yajuḥ | īḍānā anv āyan vaśān tadaiḍaṃ sāmocyate || vaśeḍā vaśānumatir vaśām āhuḥ sarasvatīm | virājaṃ manyante vaśāṃ vāg vaśā pṛthivī vaśā || vaśā deṣṭrī sinīvālī vaśoṣā nirṛtir vaśā | vaśāyāṃ mṛtyum aviśad ā mṛtyum aviśad vaśā || agnir vāg udakaṃ cakṣur mano vāto vaśī vaśā | tanvaṃ ko asyās taṃ veda yayodakrāmad ekayā || yāṃ cakṣuṣā manasā saṃvidānā hṛdā paśyanti kavayo manīṣinaḥ | tasyāḥ prajādhipatiḥ paśūnāṃ vaśā rājñā nāṃtaveṣā sṛṣṭiḥ || ko vaśāyā ūdho veda ka ulbaṃ ca jarāyu ca | stanān asyāḥ ko veda ka i tad veda yad duhe || aham asyā ūdho veda- -aham ulbaṃ ca jarāyu ca | stanān asyā ahaṃ veda- -atho tad veda yad duhe || nainām̐ ahaṃ rakṣeyaṃ Bhatt. naināṃ dadyām eva syāc ca me | stanā hy asyā ahaṃ veda kṣīram ulbaṃ ca jarāyu ca || kṛttir yonir adhivāso jarāyu pāṇḍam ulbaṃ nābhir uṣṇīṣam asyāḥ | ā jarasaṃ dhayatu mātaraṃ vaśī brahmabhiḥ kl̥ptaḥ sa hy asya bandhuḥ ||
anuvāka 1 ||
indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī | ahann ahim anv apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām || ahann ahiṃ parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa | vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ || vṛṣāyamāṇo 'vṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasya | ā sāyakaṃ maghavādatta vajram ahann enaṃ prathamajām ahīnam || yad indrāhan prathamajām ahīnām ān māyinām amināḥ prota māyāḥ | āt sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsaṃ tādītnā śatruṃ na kilā vivitse || ahan vṛtraṃ vṛtrataraṃ vyaṃsam indro vajreṇa mahatā vadhena | skadhāṃsīva kuliśenā vivṛkṇā- -ahiḥ śayad upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ || ayoddheva durmada ā hi juhve mahāvīraṃ tu vibādham ṛjīṣam | nātārīd asya samṛtiṃ vadhānāṃ saṃ rujānāḥ pipiṣa indraśatruḥ || apād ahasto apṛtanyad indram āsya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna | vṛṣṇo vadhriḥ pratimānaṃ babhūṣan purutrā vṛtro aśayad vyastaḥ || nadaṃ na bhinnam amuyā śayānaṃ mano ruhāṇā ati yanty āpaḥ | yāś cid vṛtro mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīr babhūva || nicāvayā abhavad vṛtraputra- -indro asyā ava vadhar jabhāra | uttarā sūr adharaḥ putra āsīd dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ || atiṣṭhantīnām aniveśanānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ madhye nihitaṃ śarīram | vṛkasya niṇyaṃ vi caranty āpo dīrghaṃ tama āśayad indraśatruḥ ||
dāsapatnīr ahigopā atiṣṭhan niruddhā āpaḥ paṇineva gāvaḥ | apāṃ bilam apihitaṃ yad āsīd vṛtraṃ jaghanvām̐ apa tad vavāra || aśvyo vāro abhavas tad indra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan deva ekaḥ | ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn || nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥ śiṣedha na yāmyaham akirad dhrāduniṃ ca indraś ca yad yuyudhāte ahiś ca- -utāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye || aher yātāraṃ kam apaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīr agacchat | nava ca yan navatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhīto ataro rajāṃsi || indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ | sed u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīṇām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva ||
yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān devo devān kratunā paryabhūṣat | yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ || yaḥ pṛthivīṃ vyadhamānām adṛṃhad yaḥ parvatān prakupitām̐ aramṇāt | yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyo yo dyām astabhnāt sa (janāsa indraḥ) || yo hatvāhim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yo gā udājad apadhā valasya | yo aśmanor antar agniṃ jajāna saṃvṛk samatsu sa (janāsa indraḥ) || yenemā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yo dāsaṃ varṇam adharaṃ guhākaḥ | śvaghnīva yo jigīvām̐l lakṣam ādad aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa (…) || yaṃ smā pṛcchanti kuha seti ghoram utem āhur naiṣo astīty enam | so aryaḥ puṣṭīr vija ivā mināti śrad asmai dhatta sa (…) || yo radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yo brahmaṇo nādhamānasya kīreḥ | yuktagrāvṇo yo 'vitā suśipraḥ sutasomasya sa (…) || yasyāśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvo yasya grāmā yasya viśve rathāsaḥ | yaḥ sūryaṃ ya uṣasaṃ jajāna yo apāṃ netā sa (…) || yaṃ krandasī saṃyatī vihvayate pare 'vara ubhayā amitrāḥ | samānaṃ cid ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa (…) || yasmān na rte vijayante janāso yaṃ yudhyamānā avase havante | yo viśvasya pratimānaṃ babhūva yo acyutacyut sa (…) || yaḥ śaśvato mahy eno dadhānān abudhyamānān sarvā jaghāna | yaḥ śardhate nānudadāti śṛdhyāṃ yo dasyor hantā sa (…) ||
yaḥ śambaraṃ parvateṣu kṣiyantaṃ catvāriṃśyāṃ śarady anvavindat | ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna dānuṃ śayānaṃ sa (…) || yaḥ śambaraṃ paryacarac chaśībir yo vā vṛkasya nāpibat sutam | antar girau yajamānaṃ bahuṃ janaṃ yas taṃ nāsūrukṣu sa (…) || yaḥ saptaraśmir vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn | yo rauhiṇam asphurad vajrabāhur dyām ārohantaṃ sa (…) || dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete śuṣmāc cid asya parvatā bhayante | yaḥ somapā nicito vajrabāhur yo vajrahastaḥ sa (…) || yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantaṃ yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī | yasya brahma vardhanaṃ yasya somo yasyedaṃ rādhaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ || yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhra ā cid vājaṃ dadarṣi sa kilāsi satyaḥ | vayaṃ ta indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema || jāto vyakhyat pitror upasthe bhuvo na veda janituḥ parasya | taviṣyamāṇo nv ojo akhyad vratā devānāṃ sa janāsa indraḥ || yaḥ somakāmo haryaśva āsu yasmād rejante bhuvanāni viśvā | yo jaghāna śambaraṃ yaś ca śuṣṇaṃ ya ekavīraḥ sa janāsa indraḥ ||
śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā | śam indrāsomā sa vitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau || śaṃ no bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ purundhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ | śaṃ naḥ satyasya sūyamasya śaṃsaḥ śaṃ no aryamā purujāto astu || śaṃ no dhātā śam u dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ | śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ no devānāṃ suhavāni santu || śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinā śam | śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiro abhi vātu vātaḥ || śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śam antarikṣaṃ dṛśaye no astu | śaṃ na oṣadhīr vanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasaḥ patir astu jiṣṇuḥ || śaṃ na indro vasubhir devo astu śam ādityebhir varuṇaḥ suśaṃsaḥ | śaṃ no rudro rudrebhir jalāṣaḥ śaṃ nas tvaṣṭā gnābhir iha śṛṇotu || śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥ śam u santu yajñāḥ | śaṃ naḥ svarūṇāṃ mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śam v astu vediḥ || śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā ud etu śaṃ no bhavantu pradiśaś catasraḥ | śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santv āpaḥ || śaṃ no aditir bhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ | śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śam v astu vāyuḥ || śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamānaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ | śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥ kṣetrasya patir astu śambhuḥ ||
śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ | śaṃ na ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavantu pitaro haveṣu || śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir astu | śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ || śaṃ no aja ekapād devo astu śam ahir budhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ | śaṃ no apāṃ nāpat perur astu śaṃ naḥ pṛśnir bhavatu devagopāḥ || ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantām idaṃ brahma kriyamāṇaṃ navīyaḥ | śṛṇvantu no divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ || ye devānām ṛtvijo yajñiyāso manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ | te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ || tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam | aśīmahi gātum uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya ||
agnāv agniś carati praviṣṭa ṛṣīṇāṃ putro adhirāja eṣaḥ | tasmai juhomi haviṣā ghṛtena mā devānāṃ yūyavad bhāgadheyam || yukto vaha jātavedaḥ purastād agne viddhi kriyamāṇaṃ yathedam | tvaṃ bhiṣag bheṣajasyāpi kartā tvayā gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ sanema || tathā tvam agne kṛṇu jātavedo 'nena vidvān haviṣā yaviṣṭha | piśāco asya yatamo jaghāsa yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti || yo 'sya dideva yatamo jaghāsa yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti | tathā tvam agne kṛṇu jātavedo viśvebhir devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ || akṣyau ni vidhya hṛdayaṃ ni vidhya jihvāṃ ni tṛndhi pra dataḥ śṛṇīhi | piśāco asya yatamo jaghāsa- -agne yaviṣṭha prati taṃ śṛṇīhi || yad asya hṛtaṃ vihṛtaṃ yat parābhṛtam ātmano jagdham uta yat piśācaiḥ | tad agne vidvān punar ā bhara tvaṃ śarīre prāṇam asum erayāsya || apāṃ tvā pāne yatamo dadambha- -odane manthe yadi vota lehe | tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu || kṣīre tvā māṃse yatamo dadambha- -akṛṣṭapacye aśane dhānye yaḥ | tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu || āme supakve śabale vipakve ya imaṃ piśāco aśane dadambha | tam indro vājī vajreṇa hantu bhinattu somaḥ śiro asya dhṛṣṇuḥ || divā tvā naktaṃ yatamo dadambha kravyād yātuḥ śayane piśācaḥ | tad agne vidvān pra daha kṣiṇīhy apy enaṃ dhehi nirṛter upasthe ||
somasyendrasya varuṇasya rājño viṣṇor balena savituḥ savena | agner hotreṇa pra ṇude piśācān yaviṣṭhasya brahmaṇā jātavedasaḥ || kravyādam agne rudhiraṃ piśācaṃ manohanaṃ jahi jātavedaḥ sahobhiḥ | śraddhemaṃ brahma juṣatāṃ dakṣiṇāyur yathā jīvāty agado bhavāti || punas tvā prāṇaḥ punar aitv āyuḥ punaś cakṣuḥ punar aitu śrotram | apaghnā no duritāni viśvā śataṃ himāḥ sarvavīrā madema || punar asmai mano dhehi punar āyuḥ punar balam | apānām asya prāṇaṃ ca- -agne vardhaya jīvase || cakṣuḥ sūrya punar dehi vāta prāṇaṃ sam īraya | śarīram asya māṃsāny agne saṃ bhārayā tvam || sam ā bhara jātavedo yaj jagdhaṃ yat parābhṛtam | gātrāṇy asya kalpaya punar ā pyāyatām ayam || somasyeva jātavedo aṃśur ā pyāyatām ayam | agne virapsinaṃ medhyam ayakṣmaṃ kṛṇu jīvase || saṃ mā siñcantu maruta ity ekā || vi muñcāmi brahmaṇā jātavedasam agniṃ hotāram ajaraṃ rathaspṛtam | sarvā devānāṃ janimāni vidvān yathābhāgaṃ vahatu havyam agniḥ || ye pumāṃso yātudhāna yā striyo yātudhānyaḥ | balavad indrasya vajreṇa- -avācīnān ava hanmi tān ||
yaṃ śapāmo ya u naḥ śapāti yaṃ dviṣmo ya u dveṣat piśācaḥ | kravyādam agne mahatā vadhena tam atrāpi pra daha jātavedaḥ || ya ārebhe yasya vā ghāsy apsarā yaḥ kṛṇvena saṃvido yātumāvān | ulūkayātuṃ bhṛmalo yasya yātus tam (…) || see 1d ya ādade yasya vā ghāsi pitryā stena śvayātur uta saṃbhidhehibhiḥ | yaḥ patād rodhanasyādhidevanaṃ kravyāt piśācaḥ kraviṣas titṛpsan ulūkayātuṃ bhṛmalo yasya yātus tam (…) || see 1d yaḥ puruṣeṇeyate rathena kravyād yātuḥ piśunaḥ piśācaḥ | vaiśvānareṇa sayujā sūryeṇa tam (…) || see 1d yo no valiṃ mṛgayāṃ yaś ca naḥ kṛṣiṃ paritiṣṭhād yātubhir yaś ca naḥ śapāt | astā rudraḥ śrathatv āyur asya tam (…) || see 1d mā yātumān vidata mṛḍitāram alokā asmai pradiśo bhavantu | sam enaṃ tapatāṃ rodasī ubhe tam atrāpi pra daha jatavedaḥ || jyotiṣmatīs tapanā yāś ca rocanā pratyoṣantīs tanvo yās te agne | tābhir me marmāṇy abhito dadasva mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ || āpo devīḥ piśācānām apa nahyantv āsyam | yathemaṃ mamātmānam anādhṛṣya punaḥ patān || sadaṃ puṣpe sadaṃ phale sadam indrābhirakṣite | sadā piśācā mriyantāṃ maiṣām uc cheṣi kaś cana ye patanto yātudhānā divānaktam upācarān | rātrī mā tebhyo rakṣatv ahna ātmānaṃ pari dade ||
imaṃ badhnāmi te maṇiṃ dīrghāyutvāya tejase | darbhaṃ sapatnajambhanaṃ dviṣatas tapanaṃ hṛdaḥ || dviṣatas tāpayan hṛdaḥ śatrūṇāṃ tāpayan manaḥ | durhārdaḥ sarvāṃs tvaṃ darbha gharma ivābhīt sutāpayan || gharma ivābhitapan darbha dviṣato nitapan maṇe | hṛdaḥ sapatnānāṃ bhindhi- -indra iva virujaṃ valam || bhindhi darbha sapatnānāṃ hṛdayaṃ dviṣatāṃ maṇe | udyaṃ tvacam iva bhūmyāḥ śira eṣāṃ vi pātaya || bhindhi darbha sapatnān me bhindhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | bhindhi me sarvān durhārdo bhindhi me dviṣato maṇe || chindhi darbha sapatnān me chindhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | chindhi me sarvān durhārdaś chindhi me dviṣato maṇe || vṛśca darbha sapatnān me vṛśca me pṛtanāyataḥ | vṛśca me sarvān durhārdo vṛśca me (dviṣato maṇe) || kṛnta darbha sapatnān me kṛnta me pṛtanāyataḥ | kṛnta me sarvān durhārdaḥ kṛnta me dviṣato maṇe || piṃśa darbha sapatnān me piṃśa me pṛtanāyataḥ | piṃśa me sarvān durhārdaḥ piṃśa me dviṣato maṇe || vidhya darbha sapatnān me vidhya me pṛtanāyataḥ | vidhya me sarvān durhārdo vidhya me dviṣato maṇe ||
nikṣa darbha sapatnān me nikṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ | nikṣa me sarvān durhārdo nikṣa me dviṣato maṇe || tṛndhi darbha sapatnān me tṛndhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | tṛndhi me sarvān durhārdas tṛndhi me dviṣato maṇe || bhaṅdhi darbha sapatnān me bhaṅdhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | bhaṅdhi me sarvān durhārdo bhaṅdhi me dviṣato maṇe || mṛṇa darbha sapatnān me mṛṇa me pṛtanāyataḥ | mṛṇa me sarvān durhārdo mṛṇa me dviṣato maṇe || mantha darbha sapatnān me mantha me pṛtanāyataḥ | mantha me sarvān durhārdo mantha me dviṣato maṇe || piṇḍhi darbha sapatnān me piṇḍhi me pṛtanāyataḥ | piṇḍhi me sarvān durhārdaḥ piṇḍhi me dviṣato maṇe || oṣa darbha sapatnān me note sandhi -e o-; read ma? oṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ | oṣa me sarvān durhārda oṣa me dviṣato maṇe || daha darbha sapatnān me daha me pṛtanāyataḥ | daha me sarvān durhārdo daha me dviṣato maṇe || jahi darbha sapatnān me jahi me pṛtanāyataḥ | jahi me sarvān durhārdo jahi me dviṣato maṇe || yat te darbha jarāmṛtyū sa te marmasu varma te | tenemaṃ varmiṇaṃ kṛtvā sapatnān jahi vīryaiḥ || śataṃ te darbha varmāṇi sahasraṃ vīryāṇi te | tam asmai viśve tvāṃ devā jarase bhartavā aduḥ || tvām āhur devavarma tvāṃ darbha brahmaṇaspatim | tvām indrasyāhur varma tvaṃ rāṣṭrāṇi rakṣasi || sapatnakṣayaṇaṃ darbhaṃ dviṣatas tapanaṃ hṛdaḥ | maṇiṃ kṣatrasya vardhanaṃ tanūpānaṃ kṛṇomi te || yat samudro abhyakrandat parjanyo vidyutā saha | tato hiraṇyayo bindus tato darbho ajāyata ||
anuvāka 2 ||
Kāṇḍa 13
antarhitaṃ me bṛhad antarikṣam antarhitāḥ parvatā agnayo me | maiṣāṃ rādhy abhicāra eṣa pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi || tapaḥśramāv antarau mat parītaṃ brahmayajñam antaraṃ mad dadhāmi | (…) || see 1cd agnīṣomāv antarau mad bhavātho divaṃ varma pṛthivīṃ ca kṛṇve | (…) || see 1cd antarhitaṃ me sāma prastutam antarhitaḥ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ | (…) || see 1cd antarhitā sarparājñī vīrāṇ me antarhitaḥ puruṣo medhyo me | (…) || see 1cd antarhitā me ṣaḍ urvīḥ sadhrīcīr antarhitāḥ sādhyā āptyā me | (…) || see 1cd (antarhitā) ma ṛṣayaḥ pracetaso read maharṣayaḥ with Or.? antarhitaḥ sūryo mātariśvā | (…) || see 1cd antarhitā me nadyaḥ syandamānā antarhitā oṣadhīḥ puṣpiṇīr me (…) || see 1cd antarhitāḥ paśavaḥ kakṣyā me antarhitaṃ vayo yat patatri | (…) || see 1cd antarhitā ma iṣavo brāhmaṇānām antarhitā vanaspatayaḥ samūlāḥ | (…) || see 1cd
antarhitā devatalpāḥ puro me antarhitā jagatī chandasāṃ me | (…) || see 13.1.1cd antarhitā me samudrā dvādaśā antarhitā uṣasi tārakā me | (…) || see 13.1.1cd antarhitā agnayo dhiṣṇyā me antarhitā ṛtava ārtavā me | (…) || see 13.1.1cd antarhitā me pradiśaś catasro antar bhūtam uta bhavyaṃ dadhe 'ham | maiṣāṃ rādhy abhicāra eṣa pratyag enān pratisareṇa hanmi || hanmi te 'haṃ kṛtaṃ havir yo me ghoram acīkṛtaḥ | Bhatt. acīkl̥paḥ apāñcau ta ubhau bāhū api nahyāmy āsyam || api nahyāmi te bāhū api nahyāmy āsyam | agner devasya manyunā tena te 'vadhiṣaṃ havir yo me ghoram acīkṛtaḥ || Bhatt. acīkl̥paḥ
uditaḥ śatayojanam indro vartayate ratham | sāyakaṃ kṣuravartmānam emend. Lubotsky ('having a sharp track', an epithet of Indra's vajra- = ratha-); Bhatt. kṣuravartamānam aher jātāni jambhayan || dṛḍhāsa āsann ahayo hatā udarasarpiṇaḥ | puccham udveṣṭayantaḥ śvā piṇḍam adann iva || pāpaka pāparūpaka kiṃ me sakhāyam ātudaḥ | na mām apaśya āgataṃ satīnaṃ viṣadūṣaṇam || ahijambhāś carāmasi muṣkābarho gavām iva | pīlā upa svajaṃ hanma upa stambhe pṛdākvam || ye ke cedam upāsauṣur vātasyeva pṛthag yataḥ | aṅgo nu sarve brūta- -āheyam arasaṃ viṣam || triddhisi te niṣadanaṃ read tṛṇḍmasi? tripuṣi pāpa te gṛhaḥ | acchinnaṃ tvā vāto hanty acchinnam abhi varṣati || nākulena bheṣajena tenāhīn jambhayāmasi | māṃścatur nāma vṛkṣakaḥ sa enān arasān akaḥ || asitāhe 'rasaṃ viṣam ubhayoḥ sitasya ca | Lopez svajasya abhikrandasya yā ropīs tā ito 'pa nayāmasi || idaṃ paidvo ajāyata- -idam asya vivartanam | idaṃ kanikrado mṛgo viṣam eti parābhavam || viṣūcīnā vātā vāntu viṣvag varṣantu vṛṣṭayaḥ | viṣvag viṣaṃ pra meha tvaṃ śatadhāra ivāvaṭaḥ ||
nir ito haritasrajam indro vartayate ratham | tenāpi lihna īyate nipiṃṣann ahināmnaḥ || yenendra dasyūn amṛṇor yena vṛtraṃ parābhinaḥ | tenā śatakrato tvam aher jātāni jambhaya || praty amodata pṛthivī prati dyauḥ prati sūryaḥ | paidvo yad aśvamātā krandenāhīn apāvapat || yadā paidvo 'śvamātā krandenāhīn apāvapat | rajjū ṣma datvatīḥ śere pūyantīḥ pṛthivīm anu || nāpo jīryanti nāmṛtaṃ nendrāṇī vidhavābhavat | Bhatt. avidhavābhavat na tvām āstegiṣad viṣam Bhatt. āstebhiṣad aśmānam iva sāyakam || indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇā tvaṣṭāram aditiṃ bhagam | huve 'ham arvantaṃ paidvaṃ mā me 'yaṃ puruṣo riṣat || emend. Franceschini; Bhatt. myāmeyaṃ sadyo jāto 'kanikradat solbo vy adhūnuta | krandenāśvasya vājino 'hanyantāhayaḥ pṛthak ||
anuvāka 1 ||
imaṃ stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva saṃ mahemā manīṣayā | bhadrā hi naḥ pramatir asya saṃ sady agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava || yasmai tvam āyajase sa sādhaty anarvā kṣeti dadhate suvīryam | sa tūtāva nainam aśnoty aṃhatir agne (…) || see 1d bharāmedhmaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi te citayantaḥ parvaṇā parvaṇā vayam | jīvātave prataraṃ sādhayā dhiyo 'gne (…) || see 1d śakema tvā samidhaṃ sādhayā dhiyas tve devā havir adanty āhutam | tvam ādityām̐ ā vaha tān hy ūṣmasy agne (…) || see 1d tvam adhvaryur uta hotāsi pūrvyaḥ praśāstā potā januṣā purohitaḥ | viśvā vidvām̐ ārtvijyā dhīra puṣyasy agne (…) || see 1d diśāṃ gopā asya caranti jantavo dvipāc ca yad uta catuṣpad aktubhiḥ | citraḥ praketa uṣaso mahām̐ asy agne (…) || see 1d yo viśvataḥ supratīkaḥ sadṛṅṅ asi dūre cit san taḍid ivāti rocase | rātryāś cid andho ati deva paśyasy agne (…) || see 1d pūrvo devā bhavatu sunvato ratho 'smākaṃ śaṃso abhy astu dūḍhyaḥ | tad ā jānītota puṣyatā vāco 'gne (…) || see 1d vadhair duḥśaṃsām̐ apa dūḍhyo jahi dūre vā ye anti vā ke cid atriṇaḥ | athā yajñāya gṛṇate sugaṃ kṛdhy agne (…) || see 1d yad ayukthā aruṣā rohitā rathe vātajūtā vṛṣabhasyeva te ravaḥ | ād invasi vanino dhūmaketunā- -agne (…) || see 1d
adha svanād uta bibhyuḥ patatriṇo drapsā yat te yavasādo vy asthiran | sugaṃ tat te tāvakebhyo rathebhyo 'gne (…) || see 13.5.1d tvaṃ mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsy avayātāṃ marutāṃ heḍo adbhutaḥ | mṛḍā su no bhūtv eṣāṃ manaḥ punar agne (…) || see 13.5.1d devo devānām asi mitro adbhuto vasur vasūnām asi cārur adhvare | śarmant syāma tava saprathastame 'gne (…) || see 13.5.1d tat te bhadraṃ yat samiddhaḥ sve dame somāhuto jarase mṛḍayattamaḥ | dadhāsi ratnaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dāśuṣe 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava || yasmai tvaṃ sudraviṇo dadāśo 'nāgās tvam adite sarvatātā | yaṃ bhadreṇa śavasā codayāsi prajāvanto rādhasā te syāma || sa tvam agne saubhagatvasya vidvān asmākam āyuḥ pra tireha deva | tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
kim indrasya parihitaṃ kim agneḥ kiṃ viṣṇos tvaṣṭur varuṇasya vāsaḥ | bṛhaspater uta somasya rājñaḥ kiṃ vasānā maruto varṣayantu || dhātū rudrasya kiṃ vāyor vājināṃ vasanaṃ mahat | kiṃ pūṣā brahmaṇaspatir viśve devāś ca bibhrati || kiṃ devānāṃ paridhānaṃ samānaṃ yasminn eṣāṃ sāṃmanasyaṃ babhūva | kva rātrī niviśate kvāhaḥ kvedam abhraṃ bhavati yat sameti vyeti ca || katamenāpo divam udvahanti kaḥ samenodayanena netā | vātasya tvā vidyutāṃ stanayitnur apāṃ pṛcchāmy ayanāny agneḥ || pṛcchāmi tvā pṛṣatīṃ rohiṇīṃ ca vatsaṃ pṛcchāmi saha mātaraṃ tvā | indraṃ tvānu pṛcchāmi sākṣāt sabhānāṃ ca sabhāpatim || ko vayasām adadhān nāmāni kaḥ paśūnāṃ kaḥ sarpāṇāṃ devajanā ya āsan | ko 'sya jantor adadhād brūhi nas tat || kati rohāḥ svar ā rohayanti yebhī rohito divam āruroha | rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ kṣatrabhṛto vasubhṛto vasudānavo vasuyavaḥ || kaś caturdhā vi kramate mahitvā kaṃ rakṣanti kavayo 'pramādam | puruṣaṃ tvānu pṛcchāmi sākṣān mṛtyor aṅgāni kati tāni vettha || yaṃ siṣeva vṛṣabhaś carṣaṇīṇām indro vajram ahīnā spardhamānaḥ | yena vṛtraṃ maghavā saṃpipeśa taṃ naḥ pra brūhi yadi taṃ pravettha || kaḥ parvatānām adadhān nāmāni ko vanaspatīnām adadhād oṣadhīnām | pṛcchāmi tvā bhuvanasya nābhiṃ gāṃ tvā pṛcchāmi katamāni sākṣāt ||
devatalpā devakośāḥ kveha tān naḥ pra brūhi yadi tān pravettha | pṛcchāmi tvā garagiraḥ kiyanto yebhyo 'gnir havyaṃ vahati prajānan hutaṃ martyair amṛto martyebhyaḥ || svapne ya ekas tamasā sahaity aṅgāni gṛhṇan puruṣasya cakṣuḥ | sa prātar eti tamasā punaḥ sa hā jyotir eti kva sadadeti || vratapatim adhipatiṃ madhukṛtā madhupatim | devāṃs tvā sarvān pṛcchāmy ahutādaś ca te kati || ko 'ntarikṣāt pari paśyatīdaṃ yasmād agra indriyaṃ saṃbabhūva | mahat sa kasmād abhayaṃ bibhāya kasya yuktasyāsyā srakvāl lohitaṃ parāpatat tat kveha || ittham eke pravrajantīttham eke dakṣiṇāḥ pratyañca udañcaḥ prāñco 'bhi vrajanty eke | teṣāṃ sarveṣām iha saṅgatiḥ sākaṃ sa eko bhūtaś carati prajānan ||
marīcir āsīt sā manasaḥ sam abhavat | sā pravīyata sā garbham adhatta | sa garbho 'vardhata sa vṛddho 'bravīj jāyā iti | tasyai prajāpatir ajuhot svadhiṣṭhānā ceti svadhicaraṇā ceti | prajāpatiḥ sasṛje kapāle vijihīthāṃ mā mā saṃ tāptaṃ mahāntaṃ lokam abhipaśyamāne see Lopez 2010; Bhatt. prajāpate svasurjyo so 'jāyata tasya jātasya dyāvāpṛthivī pārśve āstāṃ samudrau kukṣī sūryācandramāsāv akṣī virāṭ śiraḥ | tasmāj jātāt sarve pāpmāno vijante sarve asmāt pāpmāno vijante ya evaṃ veda ||
