endro bāhubhyām abharac cikitvān apo devīr varuṇāya prajānan | tam ādityā abhy aṣiñcanta sarve rājānam ugraṃ bṛhate raṇāya tā na āpo rājasūyā avantu || hiraṇyavarṇā iti catasraḥ || PS 1.25.1-4 are repeated with a different refrain (= 14.1.1e) (…) || PS 1.25.2 is repeated with a different refrain (= 14.1.1e) (…) || PS 1.25.3 is repeated with a different refrain (= 14.1.1e) (…) || PS 1.25.4 is repeated with a different refrain (= 14.1.1e) apo devīr madhumatīr agṛhṇata- -ūrjasvatī rājasūyā mayobhuvaḥ | yābhir mitrāvaruṇāv abhyasiñcan tāḥ (…) || see 1e varuṇena preṣitā yanti śubhrā utsaṃ devīr dadhate yā hiraṇyayam | yā brahmaṇā punate saṃvidānās tāḥ (…) || see 1e apaḥ samudrād divam ud vahanti divas pṛthivīm abhi yāḥ sṛjanti | yābhir īśānā marutaś caranti tāḥ (…) || see 1e yā amṛtaṃ bibhrati yā madhu priyaṃ yā agṛbhṇan ṛṣayo devasakhye | yābhir indram aty anayann arātīs tāḥ (…) || see 1e yā jīvadhanyā dhanam utpṛṇanti devāyate dāśuṣe martyāya | yāsāṃ payo akṣitam akṣitānāṃ tāḥ (…) || see 1e
hiraṇyaupaśā dhvajanīḥ punānā yāḥ samudram abhyarcanti dhenavaḥ | yāḥ parjanyo vahaty antarikṣe tāḥ (…) || see 14.1.1e rathantare bṛhati gīyamāne kṣatraṃ jinvanti pra tiranty āyuḥ | yābhis trayān vājino vājayanti tāḥ (…) || see 14.1.1e yābhiḥ saha vṛtrahā somam indro vasor īśāno apibat sutasya | yāḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ kavayaḥ punanti tāḥ (…) || see 14.1.1e sapta ṛṣayo bharatam abhy aṣiñcann āsmin rāṣṭram adadhur dakṣiṇāvat | prajāyai manum asumavanta devās tāḥ (…) || see 14.1.1e yābhir yajñaṃ prāñcam ukṣayanti dhīrā yābhiḥ somaṃ madhupṛcaṃ punanti | yābhir idaṃ jīvati viśvam ejat tāḥ (…) || see 14.1.1e yāsāṃ stokā madhumayā babhūvur ghṛtaṃ saṃjñānaṃ madhu pinvate yāḥ | yāḥ soma āpaḥ praṇayanti brahmaṇā tāḥ (…) || see 14.1.1e yāsāṃ pador ājyaṃ vājinaṃ tu somasya prasavam anu yāḥ pavante | antarvatīs taruṇavatsā ghṛtācīs tā na āpo rājasūyā avantu || ajījananta matayaḥ svarvida ā brahmaṇā sūktadheyāny aguḥ | asūṣuta rājasūyāḥ payāṃsi prāsāvīd devaḥ savitā bhuvanāni viśvā || somo rājā bhavo rājā paśupatiḥ paśūnāṃ varuṇo dhṛtavrataḥ | ye rājasūye asūyanta devās te te kṣatraṃ dadhatv āyur ojaḥ || āsthād ud asthād ajaniṣṭa vipro mṛdho vy āsthad aśasīta bāhū | āre avādhiṣṭa nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ samapṛkta raśmibhiḥ sūryaś ca ||
apaśyaṃ tvāvarohantaṃ divataḥ pṛthivīm iva | apaśyam asyantaṃ rudraṃ nīlagrīvaṃ śikhaṇḍinam || diva ugro 'vārukṣat praty aṣṭhād bhūmyām adhi | janāsaḥ paśyatemaṃ nīlagrīvaṃ vilohitam || eṣa aity avīrahā rudro jalāṣabheṣajī | vi te kṣepam anīnaśad vātīkāro vy etu te || namas te bhava bhāmāya namas te bhava manyave | namas te astu bāhūbhyām uto ta iṣave namaḥ || yām iṣaṃ giriśanta haste bibharṣy astave | śivāṃ giriśa tāṃ kṛṇu mā hiṃsīḥ puruṣān mama || śivena vacasā tvā giriśācchā vadāmasi | yathā naḥ sarvam ij jagad ayakṣmaṃ sumano asat || yā ta iṣuḥ śivatamā śivaṃ babhūva te dhanuḥ | śivā śaravyā yā tava tayā no mṛḍa jīvase || yā te rudra śivā tanūr aghorāpāpakāśinī | tayā nas tanvā śantamayā giriśantābhi cākaśa || asau yas tāmro aruṇa uta babhrur vilohitaḥ | ye ceme abhito rudrā dikṣu śritāḥ sahasraśo 'vaiṣāṃ heḍa īmahe || adṛśaṃ tvāvarohantaṃ nīlagrīvaṃ vilohitam | uta tvā gopā adṛśann uta tvodāhāryaḥ | uto tvā viśvā bhūtāni tasmai dṛṣṭāya te namaḥ ||
namo 'stu nīlaśikhaṇḍāya sahasrākṣāya vājine | atho ye asya satvānas tebhyo 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ || namāṃsi ta āyudhāya- -anātatāya dhṛṣṇave | ubhābhyām akaraṃ namo bāhubhyāṃ tava dhanvane || pra muñca dhanvanas pary ubhayor ātnyor jyām | yāś ca te hasta iṣavaḥ parā tā bhagavo vapa || avatatya dhanus tvaṃ sahasrākṣa śateṣudhe | niśīrya śalyānāṃ mukhā śivo naḥ śambhur ā cara || vijyaṃ dhanuḥ śikhaṇḍino viśalyo bāṇavām̐ uta | aneśann asyeṣavaḥ śivo asya niṣaṅgatiḥ || pari te dhanvano hetir asmān vṛṇaktu viśvataḥ | atho ya iṣudhis tava- -āre asmin ni dhehi tam || yā te hetir mīḍhuṣṭama haste babhūva te dhanuḥ | tayā tvaṃ viśvato asmān ayakṣmayā pari bhuja ||
supārśvā kāmadughā na āgañ chataudanā payasā pinvamānā | ūrjaṃ duhānā anapasphurantī yajamānasya pra tiranty āyuḥ || gṛbhṇāmi medhyām uśatīṃ svastaya ūrjasvatīm anamīvāṃ svādhyām | viśvo loko mama deveṣv astu śataudanāṃ śraddadhānaḥ pacāmi || badhāna devīm abhi dhehi muñjatīṃ śataudanāṃ kāmadughā hy eṣā | maināṃ hiṃsīr aśmanā jahṛṣāṇo 'py etu devām̐ ati gacchati dviṣaḥ || ā rabhasva brahmaṇā vaiśvadevīṃ śataudanāṃ śatapāpmāno asyāḥ | samarpayann aśmanā parvatena svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam || dhṛṣṇu hy enāṃ vikṛtā vikṛntann apaghnaṃś carmerayā saṃ sṛjainām | virājo duhiterayā samaktā kāmaṃ kāmaṃ yajamānāya duhām || yathāparu viśasannāti maṃsthāḥ kṛṇuṣvā me nāvadheyāni pṛthak | agan devān mānuṣī yā purābhūc chataudanā pururūpā suvarṇā || dvipād dvihastaḥ puruṣo mahādamo vanaspatiṃ bibharti sāyakāgram | tena parūṃṣi pravidvān aghnyāyāḥ śataudanāṃ devīṃ śatadhā vy asya || etaṃ bradhnaṃ carmaṇaḥ kṛnta sādhu tam u pramāya śatadhā vy asya | sam ut sṛjann avadhānāni sarvā rāyaspoṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi || ṛcā kumbhīm adhy agnau śrayāmi bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhārayāmi | apo māṃsaṃ bibhratī mā vyathiṣṭhā mā tvā vadhiṣur menibhiḥ piśācāḥ || ūrdhva prehi mā saṃ vikthā vy asya rajo antaram | rakṣāṃsi sarvā tīrtvā- -athā roha divaṃ tvam ||
divaṃ prehi śataudane sahasrasyāyanaṃ bhava | ayutaṃ prayutaṃ bhava- -akṣitir bhavatāt tvaṃ svargaṃ lokam āruhaḥ || śataudanāṃ śatadhā bhakṣayanti śataṃ rohān rohati yo dadāti | vāmadevyaṃ naudhasam asyāḥ pakṣau tṛtīye nāke adhi viṣṭapi śritā || śataudanāṃ śatadhā kalpamānā śataṃ rūpāṇi kṛṇute svaryatī | sā no devī suhavā śarma yacchatv atho mṛḍātīdṛśe || śataudanā dvādaśāhena saṃmitā śataṃ pṛṣṭhāni sasṛje svaryatī | sarvān yajñān pariyatī parastāt sā dātāraṃ rāyaspoṣe dadhātu || abhi prehi śataudana ījānān somasatvanaḥ | yajñāṃs tvaṃ sarvān āptvā kāmaprasyāyanaṃ bhava || abhi prehi śataudane yajñenāyajvanas tara | ā devayūn arūruho yatrādas tridivaṃ divaḥ || īrāpadī prathamā śataudanā satyaṃ ha madhyam amṛtaṃ śiras tava | ubhe devī rodasī ā pṛṇāsi || ṛtaṃ ha śroṇī uta sakthau tanvā- -ojo ha bāhū uta tad balāya kam | anuṣṭhu jaṭharam ād u pārśve sarvām̐l lokāṃ chataudanā samāpa || cakṣuṣmatī prathamā śataudanā sūryo ha cakṣur uta candramās tava | viśvair devair ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānā sā dātāraṃ tṛptyā tarpayāsi || śataṃ payāṃsi śatam asyā vatsāḥ śatadhā pakvāṃ vi bhajanty enām | sapta lokā divy ārpitā ye tāṃ jigetha prathamā śataudane ||
sahasreṇa śatamānā yad eṣi lokāṃ jigetha prathamā śataudane | sarvavedasam uta vājapeyaṃ sarvām̐l lokāṃ chataudanā samāpa || indraḥ papāta prathamaḥ śataudanāṃ sapta ṛṣibhyaḥ sumanasyamānaḥ | tayāsurāṇāṃ balam oja ā dade tayā ruroha viṣṭapo devalokān || viśvāmitro 'yaṃ jamadagnir atrir bharadvājo gotamo 'yaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ | idaṃ pakvaṃ kaśyapasaptamāḥ prāśnantu prathamāḥ śataudanām || jyotiṣmatī prathamā śataudanā trīṇi jyotīṃṣi kṛṇute svar yatī | tāṃ dātāra upa jīvanti yatra tatra devaiḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti || chandaḥpakṣā bṛhatī śataudanā trīṇi cchandāṃsi sasṛje svar yatī | ṛtūṇām adhirājaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ patim asyā vindan || atikramyāgniṣṭomam atirātraṃ śataudane | yajñāṃs tvaṃ sarvān āptvā cityam agniṃ vy aśnuhi || aśvamedhyam atikramya dvādaśāhaṃ śataudane | trirātraṃ sāhnam āptvā vājapeyena kalpate || ye sahasrair ījānā agnihotrahutaś ca ye | yajñair ye sarvair ījānās tān āpnoti śataudanā || Bhatt. tāna śaṃ te parūṃṣi subhage dadhāmi śaṃ te māṃsāny attathā bhavanti | asthi yat te śamitā śaśāra tat te tvaṣṭā vihṛtaṃ niṣ kṛṇotu || ye yajñena jitā lokā yā nu cchandāṃsi bhejire | sarvāṃs tām̐l lokān āpnoti yo dadāti śataudanām ||
iṣirā yoṣā yuvatīr damūnā rātrī devasya savitur bhagasya | aśvakṣatā suhavā saṃbhṛtaśrīr ā paprau dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā || ava viśvāny aruhad gabhīrā- -udvarṣiṣṭham aruhad aśramiṣṭhā | uśatī rātry anu sānu bhadrād vi tiṣṭhate mitra iva svadhābhiḥ || narye vandye subhage sujāta ā cāgan rātri sumanā iha syām | asmāṃs trāyasva naryāṇi jātā- -aśvyā yāni gavyāni puṣṭā || siṃhasya rātry uśatī piśasya vyāghrasya dvīpino varca ā dade | aśvasya bradhnaṃ puruṣasya māyaṃ puru rūpāṇi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī || śivāṃ rātrim ahni sūryaṃ ca himasya mātā suhavā no astu | asya stomasya subhage ni bodha yena tvā vande viśvāsu dikṣu || stomasya no vibhāvari rātri rājeva joṣasai | asāma sarvavīrā bhavāma sarvavedaso vyucchantīr anūṣasaḥ || śamyā ha nāma dadhiṣe mama dipsanti ye dhanā | rātrīha tān asad apa- Lopez rātri hitā naḥ sutalpā -atha steno na vidyate atha ripur na vidyate || bhadrāsi rātri camaso na piṣṭo viśvaṃ gorūpaṃ yuvatir bibharṣi | cakṣuṣmatī me mṛśatī vapūṃṣi mṛśatī with Lopez; Bhatt. mṛṣatī prādityān divyān rukmām̐ amukthāḥ || Lopez prādityaṃ divyaṃ rukmam; Bhatt. pradityāṃ divyāṃ rukmāṃ yo adya stena āyaty aghāyur martyo ripuḥ | rātrī tasya pratītya pra grīvā pra śiro hanat || pra pādau na yathāyati pra hastau na yathāśiṣat | yo malimlar upāyati sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati | apāyati sv apāyati śuṣke sthāṇāv apāyata ||
andhaṃ rātri tiṣṭhadhūmam aśīrṣāṇam ahiṃ kṛṇu | akṣau vṛkasya nir jahy ā stenaṃ drupade jahi || ye te rātry anaḍvāhas tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāḥ svāśavaḥ | tebhir no adya pāraya- -ati durgāṇi viśvahā || rātriṃ rātrim ariṣyantas tarema tanvā vayam | gambhīram aplavā iva na tareyur arātayaḥ || yathā śāmyākaḥ prapatan predivān nānu vidyate | evā rātri pra pātaya yo asmām̐ abhy aghāyati || apa stenaṃ vāsomathaṃ goajam uta taskaram | atho yo arvataḥ śiro +'bhidhāya ninīṣati || yad adya rātri subhage vibhajanty ayovasu | yad ehy asmān bhrājaya- -athed anyān upāyasi || uṣase naḥ pari dehi Bhatt. dhehi sarvān rātry anāgasaḥ | uṣā no ahna ā bhajād ahas tubhyaṃ vibhāvari ||
anuvāka 3 ||
Kāṇḍa 15
samyan digbhyaḥ pavate saṃ svarvin madhor ato mādhavaḥ pātv asmān | agnir devo duṣṭarītur adābhya idaṃ kṣatraṃ rakṣatu pātv asmān || rathantaraṃ sāmabhiḥ pātv asmān gāyatreṇa cchandasā viśvarūpam | dvādaśā iṣṭayā stomo ahnāṃ samudro vāca idam ojaḥ pipartu || ugrā diśām abhibhūtir vayodhāḥ śuciḥ śukre ahany ojasye | indrādhipatiḥ pipṛtād ato no mayi kṣatraṃ viśvato dhārayedam || bṛhad rāṣṭraṃ kṣatrabhṛd vṛddhavṛṣṇyaṃ triṣṭubhaujaḥ śubhitam ugravīram | indra stomaiḥ pañcadaśena varca idaṃ vātena sagareṇa rakṣatu || prācī diśāṃ sahayaśā yaśasvatī viśve devāḥ prāvṛṣāhnāṃ svarvatī | idaṃ kṣatraṃ duṣṭaram astv ojo anādhṛṣṭaṃ sahasvaṃ sahasvat || vairūpe sāmany aha tac chakeyaṃ jagatyainad vikṣv ā veśayāmi | viśve devāḥ saptadaśena vadyam idaṃ kṣatraṃ salilāvatam ugram || dhatrī diśāṃ kṣatram idaṃ dādhartu- -upasthāśānāṃ mitravad astv ojaḥ | mitrāvaruṇā śaradāhnā cikitnū asmai kṣatrāya mahi śarma yacchatam || vairāje sāmany adhi me manīṣā- -anuṣṭubhā saṃbhṛtaṃ vīryaṃ sahaḥ | idaṃ kṣatraṃ mitravad ārdradānv ojā mitrāvaruṇā rakṣatam ādhipatye || samrāḍ diśāṃ sahasāmnī sahasvaty ṛtur hemanto viṣṭhayā naḥ pipartu | oṣajātāṃ bṛhatī ca śakvarī- -imaṃ yajñam avatāṃ no ghṛtācī || svarvatī sudughā naḥ payasvatī diśāṃ devy avatu no ghṛtācī | tvaṃ gopāḥ puraetota paścād bṛhaspate yāmyāṃ yuṅdhi vācam ||
stomaikaviṃśe bhuvanasya patni vivasvagvāte abhi no gṛṇīhi | ghṛtavatī savitar ādhipatye payasvatī rantir āśā no astu || ūrdhvā diśāṃ rantir āśauṣadhīnāṃ saṃvatsareṇa savitā no ahnā | revat sāmnāṃ paṅktiś chandasām ajātaśatruḥ syonā no astu || viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyā asyeśānā jagato viṣṇupatnī | viśvavyacā iṣayantī suhutiḥ syonā no astv aditer upasthe || dhruvā diśāṃ viṣṇupatny aghorā- -asyeśānā sahaso yā manotā | bṛhaspatir mātariśvota vāyuḥ saṃdhānā vātā abhi no gṛṇantu || yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhartā yo naḥ sato abhy ā saj jajāna | sa āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchado vara ā viveśa || abhy ā vartasva pṛthivī yajñena payasā saha | apānto agnir iṣito 'va rohatu || yad agne candraṃ yat pūtaṃ yac chukraṃ yac ca yajñiyam | tad devebhyo bharāmasi || iṣam ūrjam aham ata ādi yajñasya yonau mahiṣasya dhāman | ā no goṣu viśastv ā prajāyāṃ jahāmi sedim anirām amīvām ||
āyuṣo 'si prataraṇaṃ vipraṃ bheṣajam ucyase | tad āñjana tvaṃ śantāte 'si māyobhavaṃ kṛtam || yo harimā jāyānyo aṅgabhedo visalpakaḥ | sarvaṃ te yakṣmam aṅgebhyo bahir nir hantv āñjanam || āñjanaṃ pṛthivyāṃ jātaṃ bhadraṃ puruṣajīvanam | kṛṇotv atpramāyakaṃ rathajūtim anāgasam || prāṇa prāṇaṃ trāyasvāso asave mṛḍa | nirṛte nirṛtyā naḥ pāśebhyo muñca || sindhor garbho 'si vidyutāṃ puṣpam | vātaḥ prāṇaḥ sūryaś cakṣur divas payaḥ || devāñjanaṃ traikakudaṃ pari mā pāhi viśvataḥ | na tvā taranty oṣadhayo bāhyāḥ parvatīyā uta || vīdaṃ madhyam avāsṛjad rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ | amīvāḥ sarvāś cātayan nāśayad abhibhā itaḥ || bahv idaṃ rājan varuṇa- -anṛtam āha puruṣaḥ | tasmāt sahasravīrya muñca naḥ pary aṃhasaḥ || yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti yad ūcima | tasmāt sahasravīrya muñca naḥ pary aṃhasaḥ || mitraś ca tvā varuṇaś ca- -anu preyatur āñjana | tau tvānugatya dūraṃ bhogāya puna rohatu ||
ṛṇād ṛṇam iva saṃ naya kṛtyāṃ kṛtyākṛto gṛham | cakṣurmantrasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīr api śṛṇāñjana || yad asmāsu duṣvapnyaṃ yad goṣu yac ca no gṛhe | amāmagatyasta durhārdaḥ priya prati muñcatām || apām ūrja ojaso vāvṛdhānam agner jātam adhi jātavedasaḥ | caturvīraṃ parvatīyaṃ yad āñjanaṃ diśaḥ pradiśaḥ karad ic chivās te || caturvīraṃ badhyata āñjanaṃ te sarvā diśo abhayās te bhavantu | dhruvas tiṣṭhādhi saviteva vārya imā viśo abhi harantu te balim || āṅkṣvaikaṃ maṇim ekaṃ kṛṇuṣva snāhy ekena pibaikam eṣām | caturvīraṃ nairṛtebhyaś caturbhyo grāhyā bandhebhyaḥ pari pātv asmān || agnir māghnyenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā || indro mendryeṇāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā || somo mā somyenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā || bhago mā bhagenāvatu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā || maruto mā gaṇair avantu prāṇāyāpānāyāyuṣe | varcasa ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā ||
anuvāka 1 ||
āyurdā deva jarasaṃ pṛṇāno ghṛtapratīko ghṛtapṛṣṭho agne | ghṛtaṃ pibann amṛtaṃ cāru gavyaṃ piteva putraṃ jarase nayemam || āyur asmai dhehi jātavedaḥ prajāṃ tvaṣṭar adhi ni dhehy onaḥ | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ā suvāsmai śataṃ jīvāti śaradas tavāyam || imam agna āyuṣe varcase dhāḥ priyaṃ reto varuṇa mitra rājan | mātevāsmā adite śarma yaccha viśve devā jaradaṣṭir jathāsat || agniṣ ṭa āyuḥ prataraṃ kṛṇotu somas te puṣṭiṃ prataraṃ dadhātu | indro marutvān adhi te bravītv ādityais te aditiḥ śarma yacchatu || revatīs tvā vyakṣaṇaṃ kṛttikāś cakṛtus tvā | Bhatt. cakṛtas apasas tvām atanvata dhiyo 'vayann avāgnāyīr apṛñcan || sahasram antām̐ abhito 'dadantā- Bhatt. antāṃ -aśītir madhyam abhayaṃ vi nārīḥ | devīr devāya paridhe savitre mahat tad āsāmaghavan mahitvam || imam aśmānam ā tiṣṭha- -aśmeva tvaṃ sthiro bhava | pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ sahasva pṛtaṇāyataḥ || yena devaṃ savitāraṃ pari devā adhārayan | tenemaṃ brahmaṇaspate pari rāṣṭrāya dhattana || parīmam indram āyuṣe mahe kṣatrāya dhattana | yathainaṃ jarase nayāñ Bhatt. nayāṃ jyok kṣatre adhi jāgarat || parīmaṃ somam āyuṣe mahe śrotrāya dhattana | yathainaṃ jarase nayāṃ jyok śrotre adhi jāgarat ||
pari dhatta dhatta varcasemaṃ jarāmṛtyuṃ kṛṇuta dīrgham āyuḥ | bṛhaspatiḥ prāyacchad vāsa etat somāya rājñe paridhātavā u || jarāṃ su gaccha pari dhatsva vāso bhavā gṛṣṭīnām abhiśastivā u | śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ suvarcā rāyaspoṣam upa saṃ vyayasva || parīdaṃ vāso api dhāḥ svastaye 'bhūr vāpīnām abhiśastipā u | śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcīr vasūni cārur vibhajāsi jīvan || yoge yoge tapastaraṃ vāje vāje havāmahe | sakhāya indram ūtaye || hiraṇyavarṇo ajaraḥ suvīro jarāmṛtyuḥ prajayā saṃ viśasva | tad agnir āha tad u soma āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tad indraḥ || yadottamat tantu badhāya nāvadvāsaḥ pūrvayāvat pururūpapeśaḥ | bhadrātīkā samajaraṃ suvīraṃ tena devāḥ pra tirantv āyuḥ || yasya brāhmaṇaḥ sicam ārabhante śrathnanto nīvaṃ pratiranta āyuḥ | tasya devā devahūtiṃ juṣantāṃ sa viśvahā sacatāṃ svasti || anyad ā dhatsva pari dhatsva vāsa imam ulbam apa lumpāmi yas te | jarase tvām ṛṣayaḥ saṃ vyayantu sūryo bhagas te pra tirantv āyuḥ || yasya devāsaḥ prathamavāsyaṃ harāmi taṃ tvā viśve avantu devāḥ | taṃ tvā bhrātaraḥ suvṛdhā vardhamānam anu jāyantāṃ bahavaḥ sujātam || ahatenāhato bhava sthira sthireṇa saṃ bhava | pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ ||

anuvāka 2 ||
jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkaṃ yad varmī yāti samadām upasthe | anāviddhayā tanvā jaya tvaṃ sa tvā varmaṇo mahimā pipartu || dhanvanā gā dhanvanājiṃ jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samado jayema | dhanuḥ śatror apakāmaṃ kṛṇotu dhanvanā sarvāḥ pṛtanā jayema || vakṣyantīved ā ganīganti karṇaṃ priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ pariṣasvajānā | yoṣeva śiṅkte vitatādhi dhanvañ jyā iyaṃ samiti pārayantī || te ācarantī samaneva yoṣā māteva putraṃ pipṛtām upasthe | apa śatrūn vidhyatāṃ saṃvidāne ārtnī ime visphurantī amitrān || bahvīnāṃ pitā bahur asya putro vyacaḥ kṛṇoti samado 'vagatya | iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāś ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddho jayati prasūtaḥ || rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puro yatrayatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ | abhīśūnāṃ mahimānaṃ panāyata manaḥ paścād anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ || tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvatāṃ vṛṣapāṇayo 'śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ | apakrāmantaḥ prapadair amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūṃr anapavyayantaḥ || rathavāhanaṃ havir asya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitam asya varma | tatrā ratham upa śagmaṃ sadema viśvāhā vayaṃ sumanasyamānāḥ || svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto gabhīrāḥ | citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ || brahmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā | pūṣā naḥ pātu dūritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣā mākir ṇo aghaśaṃsa īśata ||
bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ | indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu || suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā | yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tad asmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yacchān || suparṇo vāso yad u sarpir āsā mano hiraṇyam iṣavaḥ patatrī | māsmāṅ arann amuta āpatantīr itaḥ prahitāḥ savitar jayantu || ahir iva bhogaiḥ pary eti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetim apabādhamānaḥ | hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsaṃ pari pātu mṛtyoḥ || ā jaṅghanti sānv eṣāṃ jaghanām̐ upa jighnate | aśvājani tra pracodaya- -aśvān samatsu pādaya || divas pṛthivyāḥ pary oja ābhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pari saṃbhṛtaṃ sahaḥ | apām ojmānaṃ pari gobhir ābhṛtam indrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja || indrasya vajro marutām anīkaṃ mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ | semāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya || vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ | gobhiḥ saṃnaddho ratha vīḍayasva- -āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni || upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat | sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha śatrūn || ā krandaya balam ojo na ā dhā abhi ṣṭana duritā bādhamānaḥ | apa sedha dundubhe ducchunām ita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḍayasva ||
prāmūñ jayābhīme jayantu ketumad dundubhir vāvadītu | sam aśvaparṇāḥ patayantu no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu || indro rathāya prapadaṃ kṛṇotu yam adhyaṣṭhān maghavā jayantām | irya iva paśubhir yuyotu gopā ariṣṭo jātaḥ prathamaḥ siṣāsan || parjanyasyeva stanayitnur āsor indrāgnyor iva cekhidyate ghoṣo asya | sāhasro vīraḥ śataṃ sasanvān ayutaṃ sasanvān ratha mṛḍeha || śyenasya pakṣau hariṇasya bāhū indrasya muṣṭir marutām anīkam | gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḍayasva || ud yaṃyamīti sahiteva bāhū ubhe sicau yajate bhīma ṛñjan | uc chukram atkam ajate śacībhir navā mātṛbhyo vasanā jahāti || ugrau te nemī pavī ta ugrā ugrāḥ śaṅkavo bṛhato rathasya | īṣātra veṇavo namatis ta ugrā- -agniś cakṣuḥ pravayaṇaṃ rathasya | tenāmitrān pramṛṇan yāhi śatrūn || arā nābhayo balam it te akṣa ugrau te koṣau saha nisyadābhyām | āṇyor vadhrān uta koṣaghorā sthānaṃ bandha uta vandhuraṃ te || goṣṭhe balaṃ mṛga ekam aṅgaṃ Bhatt. gauṣṭhe parā kramadhvaṃ maha ā suvanta | abhīśavo hatānena vṛtram ayaṃ kṣatreṇa prajayāstūgraḥ || ā tiṣṭha jiṣṇus tarasā sapatnān sāhasro vīraḥ pramṛṇan yāhi śatrūn | pṛṣṭiyuge kṛṇutaṃ vīryāṇi tad etām etaṃ ratham asya śagme || aṣṭau cakṣūṃṣi kavayaḥ saṃ namantv aśvā prākāśā ṛju dhāvayantaḥ | anu tvā skambho dadatāṃ piteva cakramāṇam ainaṃ dhatsvopasthe pra tirāty āyuḥ || kavibhiḥ syūtaḥ sa rathe vibaddhaḥ sa dhanvadhir dhanucitte jajāna | anuprāsyemāni pṛthumadhyamāny aśvebhyaḥ śaṃtvāya kavibhiḥ kṛtāni tebhiṣ ṭe śarma yacchantu devāḥ ||
agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ | indraṃ bṛhaspatiṃ sūryaṃ te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || brūmo devaṃ savitāraṃ dhātāram uta pūṣaṇam | tvaṣṭāram agryaṃ brūmas te (…) || see 1d brūmo rājānaṃ varuṇaṃ mitraṃ viṣṇum atho bhagam | aṃśaṃ vivasvantaṃ brūmas te (…) || see 1d gandharvāpsaraso brūmo aśvinā brahmaṇaspatim | aryamā nāma yo devas te (…) || see 1d vātaṃ brūmaḥ parjanyam antarikṣam atho diśaḥ | āśāś ca sarvā brūmas te (…) || see 1d ahorātre idaṃ brūma sūryācandramasā ubhā | ādityān sarvān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || muñcantu mā śapathyād ahorātre atho uṣāḥ | somo mā divyo muñcatu yam āhuś candramā iti || pañca rājyāni vīrudhāṃ somaśreṣṭhāni brūmasi | bhaṅgo darbho yavaḥ sahas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || ye grāmyāḥ sapta paśava āraṇyā uta ye mṛgāḥ | śakuntān pakṣiṇo brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || bhavāśarvāv idaṃ brūma ugraḥ paśupatiś ca yaḥ | iṣūr yā eṣāṃ vidmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
yajñaṃ brūmo yajamānam ṛcaḥ sāmāni bheṣajā | yajūṃṣi hotrān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || ṛtūn brūma ṛtupatīn ārtavām̐ uta hāyanān | samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsas te no (…) || see 1d divaṃ brūmo nakṣatrāṇi bhūmiṃ yakṣāṇi parvatān | samudrā nadyo veśantās te (…) || see 1d sapta ṛṣīn vā idaṃ brūmo 'po devīḥ prajāpatim | pitṝn yamaśreṣṭhān brūmas te (…) || see 1d viśvān devān idaṃ brūmaḥ satyasandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ | viśvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ sākaṃ te (…) || see 1d ādityā rudrā vasavo devā daivā atharvaṇaḥ | aṅgiraso manīṣiṇas te (…) || see 1d ye devā diviṣado 'ntarikṣasadaś ca ye | pṛthivyāṃ śakrā ye śritās te (…) || see 1d eta devā dakṣiṇataḥ paśvāt prāñca ud etana purastāc chakrā uttarād viśve devāḥ sametya te (…) || see 1d arāyān brūmo rakṣāṃsi sarpān puṇyajanān uta | mṛtyūn ekaśataṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || yā devīḥ pañca pradiśo ye devā dvādaśartavaḥ | Bhatt. -daśarttavaḥ saṃvatsarasya ye daṃṣṭrās te naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ || bhūtaṃ brūmo bhūtapatiṃ bhūtānām uta yas patiḥ | bhūtāni sarvā brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ ||
anuvāka 3 ||
yāvad dyaur yāvat pṛthivī yāvat paryeti sūryaḥ | tāvat tvam ugra oṣadhe pari pāhy arundhati || ariṣṭas tvā khanaty ariṣṭāya khanāmi tvā | dvipāc catuṣpād asmākaṃ sarvam astv anāturam || devānām asi svasā marutām asi sañcarī | yaṃ jīvam aśnuṣe tvaṃ na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ || arundhatī nāmāsi tṛtīyasyām ito divi | tatrāmṛtasya rohaṇaṃ tena tvācchāvadāmasi || śaṃ ta āpo hṛdyāḥ śaṃ te kulijyā uta | śaṃ vātaḥ śaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ te tapatu sūryaḥ || śaṃ ta indrāgnī bhavatāṃ śaṃ rātrī prati dhīyatām | śaṃ te pṛthivyāṃ vīrudhaḥ śam u te santv oṣadhīḥ || bahvīṣu hi tvām avidam oṣadhīṃ vīryavatīm | arundhati tvām āhārṣam ito mā pārayān iti || abhiprepseva jīvantam abhi dasyed arundhatī | eṣā daviddya bheṣajī devī vātīkṛtasya ca || anu ṣiñca nas tat kurv agado vai bhaviṣyati | vātīkṛtasya bheṣajy āgan devy arundhatī || mā bibher na mariṣyasy agado vai bhaviṣyasi | vātīkṛtasya bheṣajy āgan devy arundhatī ||
arundhatyaḥ saṃ vadante gāvaḥ pravrājinīr iva | yam āturam abhigaccha- -amāvataṃ kṛṇu māvatam || imaṃ me tvaṃ jarāmṛtyuṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṇv oṣadhe | rājñī hi sarvāsām asy oṣadhīnām arundhatī || trāyamāṇā hy asi jīvalā vīryāvatī | arundhati tvām āhārṣam ito mā pārayān iti || digdhena ca viddhasya- -aghasyāghaviṣā ca yā | arundhati tvaṃ tasyāsi viṣasya viṣadūṣaṇī || āheyena ca daṣṭasya- -aghasya (…) || see 4bcd vātīkāreṇa ca kṣiptasya- -aghasya (…) || see 4bcd bhavena ca (…) | see 6a (…) || see 4bcd śarveṇa ca (…) | see 6a (…) || see 4bcd rudreṇa ca (…) | see 6a (…) || see 4bcd paśupatinā ca kṣiptasya (…) || see 4bcd
ugreṇa ca devena ca kṣiptasya (…) || see 15.16.4bcd mahādevena ca kṣiptasya (…) || see 15.16.4bcd īśānena ca kṣiptasya- -aghasyāghaviṣā ca yā | arundhati (…) || see 15.16.4cd yat pṛthivyāṃ viṣaṃ vīrutsv adhi yad viṣam | (…) || see 15.16.4cd yad oṣadhībhyaḥ saṃbharanti brahmāṇo menaye viṣam | (…) || see 15.16.4cd yad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃbharanti tṛṣṭamāśīviṣaṃ viṣam | (…) || see 15.16.4cd yaḥ kṣipto mṛtyunā yasmair yo daṣṭas tṛṣṭadaṃśmabhiḥ | arundhati tvaṃ tasyāsi viṣasya viṣadūṣaṇī || saṃ jihīṣvāmukthā yakṣmād ārukṣo lokam uttamam | apā jīvasi pātreṇa- -adhi jīvapurā ihi ||
apsaraso vi vo yakṛd vi vo bhinadmi mehanam | vi caṇḍālaṃ vy arjunaṃ vi vavṛtraṃ bhinadmi vaḥ || viśvajanyāḥ pāñcajanyā mahārukmāḥ śikhaṇḍinīḥ | sarvā indrasya vajreṇa hatā budbudayātavaḥ || andhācīm asitācīm ulūkhalasya budhnena | avaitaṃ vatsapaṃ jahi || dūrād enāḥ praty ā paśyam āpatantīr atho divaḥ | devānāṃ havyamohanīr indro apsaraso hanat || ā hatā apa tā itaḥ khalād iva yātudhānyaḥ | amuṃ gacchata pūruṣaṃ samudram apa gacchati || divaṃ gacchantu divyāḥ saro gacchantu sārasīḥ | uluṅgulasya yo guhas tad u gacchantv āsurīḥ || āskandike viskandike parācīr apa nṛtyantu | Bhatt. nṛtyatu sāraṅgeṇa śunā saha || yaḥ sāraṅgo hiraṇyadan śvā divyaḥ pariplavaḥ | tasyāhaṃ nāma jagrabha- -asmā ariṣṭatātaye || adyāṃ te viraṇī parācīr apa nṛtyata | śṛṇāmi ghorā vaḥ pṛṣṭī brahmaṇā kīkasā uta || ekatriṃśad aśvavatīś catasra uta guṅguvaḥ | śivā daśa śṛtā daśa keśinīḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ | idam uluṅgulukābhyo apsarābhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ ||

anuvāka 4 ||
tvaj jātā rudra śantamā tvaṃ hi no babhuryā irāya bheṣajebhiḥ | Bhatt. om. irāya vi yakṣmān yāvayāsmad vy aṃho Bhatt. vyakṣmāṃ vy amīvāś cātayāsmad viṣūcīḥ || tvaṃ devānām asi rudra śreṣṭhas tavas tavasām ugrabāho | hṛṇīyasā manasā modamāna ā babhūvitha rudrasya sūnoḥ || tvaṃ hi no vīrām̐ īraya bheṣajebhir uruṃ no bhavanta maghavo marutvan | Bhatt. marutvaṃ | karā naḥ pāram aṃhasaḥ svasti viśvā abhītīr apa sedhāsmat || tvaṃ hi no vṛṣabha cakṣimeṣṭhā asmai rudrāyogrāya mīḍhuṣe | kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matiṃ yathā naḥ śam aso dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade || kva teṣu rudra hasto mṛḍayāko jalāṣaḥ | apabhartā rapaso daivyasya || pra yakṣmaḥ pra nirṛtir etv asmat seneva sṛṣṭā pracatām amīvā | ārādhvaṃ sanā vṛjanā jahīta || Bhatt. ārāddhat, jahītii; see Lelli arhan dhanur hitaṃ bibharṣy arhan niṣkaṃ rajantaṃ viśvarūpam | arhann idaṃ dayase viśvam ejan na te dūraṃ na pariṣṭhāsti te bhava sadyaḥ sarvān pari paśyasi bhūmim || namas te astu vidyute namas te stanayitnave | namas te astv aśmane yena pradiśam asyasi || mā devānām ugra rājann asmākaṃ puruṣā riṣan | rakṣāṃsy asmad yakṣmāṃś ca nāśayāmasi brahmaṇā || brahmaṇeto nāśayāmo yat kiṃ cāṅgeṣv āmayat | śalyān yakṣmasyātho ropīs Bhatt. śalyāṃ tā ito vi nayāmasi ||
nayāmi vāṃ paśupatī ghṛtenājyena vardhayan | yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭi tasya veśaḥ kariṣyathaḥ || adhi brūtaṃ paśupatī dvipade me catuṣpade | prasūtau yatra jaghnatus tato me mātaraṃ riṣat || yā vāṃ rudraḥ śivā tanū yā vāṃ santi rogaṇāḥ | yā vām āyuṣmatīs tanūs tābhir no mṛḍataṃ yuvam || na pra minanti vratino vratāni satyaṃ jinvanto vidathā vadantaḥ | yasyeme rodasī ubhe saṃyukte manasā hṛdā || sa prajānāṃ prajāpatiḥ sādhu rakṣati varṣati | sa veda ratnabheṣajaṃ devebhyas pary ābhṛtaṃ tena no mṛḍataṃ yuvam | jīvātave na martave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye || saguṇāsa āsate saṃyuktā balāya kam | teṣāṃ yad indriyaṃ vṛha cati rocati rocanā || ye te rocane bṛhatī antarikṣe atho divaḥ | tābhyām upa pra yāhi naḥ sarvavīrām̐ ariṣyataḥ || sarvavīrā ariṣyanto rocane adhi tasthima | yathā nas tṛṣṇamad vasu divi kṣipadbhyo apsu yā ||
indrāgnī huve prathamau hvayāmi marutaḥ śivān | Bhatt. śivāṃ hvayāmi viśvān devān Bhatt. viśvāṃ imaṃ homam avantu me || tvaṃ prathamo amṛtatvam agne devo devatvaṃ prathamo jigetha | tava divi hṛdayaṃ saṃ babhūva sa naḥ śivā āpo jātavedo ni yaccha || agnāv agniś (carati praviṣṭa ṛṣīṇāṃ putro adhirāja eṣaḥ | tasmai juhomi haviṣā ghṛtena mā devānāṃ yūyavad bhāgadheyam) || ye devā divi ṣṭha ye pṛthivyāṃ jātavedo ya urāv antarikṣe | ye giriṣu parvateṣv apsv antas te devā aśaniṃ yāvayātha || mitraṃ digbhiḥ kṛṇuṣva jātaveda āśābhir mitram adhipā vipaścit | mā no hiṃsīr divyenāgninā sasyāṃ yena yanti maruta spardhamānāḥ || vidyotamāna stanayan vṛṣevaiṣi kanikradat | bhīmaḥ parjanya te rathaḥ sa u naḥ śarma yacchatu || ye vidyutam aśanim ā tanvanti marutaḥ salilād adhi | kṛṣyai no viśvavārāyā avadhanvā ni tanvatām || yo vidyutam aśanim ātaṃty antarikṣād uta vātād divaś ca | tebhyo marudbhyo namo 'stv ojase || tā yantu svaraṃkṛtāḥ syonāḥ śivatamāḥ pathā | mā na indra yavaṃ vadhīr mitramenena kṛṇmahe || darbho agra oṣadhīnāṃ śatakāṇḍo ajāyata | sa devaiḥ prahito 'yam āgan svastaye vṛṣā marudbhiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ ||
vṛṣākṣasyāsurasya menir asi tāṃ tvayā tathā veda karṇasya kauvidasyevamāśā | tāṃ mābhy ava gā dvādaśāhnāni vi rakṣe || asir me tigmasyāyasa indrāgnibhyāṃ susaṃśitaḥ | tena sedhām id āduniṃ kṛṣiṃ me māva gād iti sasyaṃ me mā vadhīd iti || marutaḥ pari vṛṅdhi no divaḥ kṣudrebhir aśmabhiḥ | Bhatt. aśmibhiḥ udumbarasya śākhayā vicakṣuṣā- -aśaniṃ yāvayāmasi || maruto mṛḍayāta no divaḥ śukrebhir aśmabhiḥ | Bhatt. aśmibhiḥ udumbarasya śākhayā vicakṣuṣā- -aśaṇiṃ yāvayāmasi || vartād vartam ā krāma parvatād adhi parvatam | girau pratiśṛtā satī vṛkṣān bhaṅdhi mā yavam || adāmnā tvā sandhyāmi yāvaṇyā paribhūrṇyā | sānau pratiśṛtā satī tṛṇaṃ bhaṅdhi mā yavam || uśatī nāmāsi salindā nāma | anyām āsāṃ gaccha yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ gaccha || parācīm anu saṃvataṃ parācīm anu saṃvidaṃ parācy anu ni drava | itas tvā nāśayāmasi brahmaṇā vīryāvatā || vār bhavodakaṃ bhava- -udakasyodakaṃ bhava | kṣudrāt kṣodīyasī bhūtvā- -athehy adhamaṃ tamaḥ || syonā bhava śivā bhava śivāc chivatarā bhava | phenān mṛdīyasī bhūtvā- -idaṃ śasyam upā cara || namas te astu vidyute stanayitnave | namas te agne dūre hete kṛṇmo mā no hiṃsīr dvipado mā catuṣpadaḥ || prati tvā sahasāsahaḥ sahasā prati rudhmasi | aindram idaṃ saho mahad bhūmyās tavaṃ divi śritam | aphālakṛṣṭam ā krama mā na indra yavaṃ vadhīḥ || yāḥ samudrād uccaranty utsebhyo yā nadībhyaḥ | atyantaḥ sarpo vaidyuto 'śaniṃ yāvayād itaḥ || anuvāka 5 |
Kāṇḍa 16
antakāya mṛtyave nama iha- -ayam astu puruṣaḥ sahāsunā | sūryasya bhāge amṛtasya loke prāṇā apānā iha te ramantām || ud enaṃ bhago agrabhīd ud enaṃ somo aṃśumān | ud enaṃ maruto devā ud indrāgnī svastaye || iha te 'sur iha prāṇa Bhatt. tesur ihāyur iha te manaḥ | ut tvā nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyo daivyā vācā bharāmasi || ut krāmāto māva patthā mṛtyoḥ paḍvīśam avamuñcamānaḥ | mā cchitthā asmāl lokād agneḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśaḥ || tubhyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśvā tubhyaṃ varṣantv amṛtāny āpaḥ | sūryas te tanve śaṃ tapāt tvāṃ mṛtyur dayatāṃ mā pra meṣṭhāḥ || udyānaṃ te puruṣa nāvayānaṃ jīvātaṃ te dakṣatātiṃ kṛṇotu | ā hi rohemam amṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ratham atha jirvir vidatham ā vadāsi || mā te manas tatra gān mā tiro bhūn mā jīvebhyaḥ pra mado mānu gāḥ pitṝn | viśve devā abhi rakṣantu tveha || mā gatānām ā dīdhīthā ye nayanti parāvatam | ud ā roha tamaso jyotir ehy Bhatt. ehm ā te hastaṃ rabhāmahe śyāmaś ca tvā śabalaś ca preṣitau yamasya yau pathirakṣī śvānau | arvāṅ ehi mā vi dīdhyo māti tiṣṭhaḥ parāṅmanāḥ || maitaṃ panthām anu gā bhīma eṣa yena pūrvaṃ nayatha taṃ bravīmi | tama etat puruṣa mā pra patthā bhayaṃ parastād abhayaṃ te arvāk ||
rakṣantu tvāgnayo ye apsv antā rakṣatu tvā manuṣyā yam indhate | vaiśvānaro rakṣatu jātavedā divyas tvā mā pra dhāg vidyutā saha || rakṣatu tvā pṛthivī rakṣatu dyaus sūryaś ca tvā rakṣatāṃ candramāś ca | mā tvā kravyād abhi maṃsta- -ārāt saṃkasukāc cara || antarikṣaṃ rakṣatu devahetyā bodhaś ca tvā pratībodhaś ca rakṣatām | asvapnaś ca tvānavadrāṇaś ca rakṣatāṃ gopāyaṃś ca tvā rakṣatāṃ jāgṛviś ca || te tvā rakṣantu te tvā gopāyantu te tvāṃhasas pāntu | tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā || jīvebhyas tvā samude vāyur indro dhātā dadhātu savitā trāyamāṇaḥ | mā tvā prāṇo balaṃ hāsīd asuṃ te 'nu hvayāmasi || Bhatt. tenu mā tvā jambhaḥ saṃhanur mā tamo vidan Bhatt. vidaṃ mā jihvā barhiḥ pramayuḥ kathā syāḥ | Bhatt. varhiḥ ut tvādityā vasavo bharantu- -ud indrāgnī svastaye || ayaṃ devā ihaivāstv ayaṃ māmutra gād itaḥ | imaṃ sahasravīryeṇa mṛtyor ut pārayāmasi || ut tvā mṛtyor apīparaṃ saṃ dhamantu vayodhasaḥ | Bhatt. dhamanta mā tvā vyastakeśyo mā tvāgharudo rudan || āhārṣaṃ tvāvidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ | sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam || Bhatt. tevidan ut tvā dyaur ut pṛthivy ut prajāpatir agrabhīt | ut tvā mṛtyor oṣadhayaḥ | somarājñīr apīparan || yāvat te jyotir abhūd apa tvat tamo akramīt | apa tvan mṛtyuṃ nirṛtim Bhatt. tvaṃ apa yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi ||
ā rabhasvemām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim acchidyamānā jaradaṣṭir astu te | asuṃ ta āyuḥ punar ā bharāmi rajas tamo mopa gā mā pra meṣṭhāḥ || jīvatāṃ jyotir abhy ehi lokam ā tvā harāmi śataśāradāya | drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ te kṛṇomy ava muñcantu mṛtyupāśā aśastīḥ || Bhatt. mṛtyapāśā vātāt te prāṇam avidaṃ sūryāc cakṣur ahaṃ pari | yat te manas tvayi tad dhārayāmi saṃ vitsvāṅgair vada jihvayālapan || prāṇena tvāṃ dvipadāṃ catuṣpadām agnim iva jātam abhi saṃ dhamāmi | namas te mṛtyo cakṣuṣe namaḥ prāṇāya te 'karam || Bhatt. tekaram ayaṃ jīvatu mā mṛta- -imaṃ sam īrayāmasi | kṛṇomy asmai bheṣajaṃ mṛtyo mā puruṣaṃ vadhīḥ || jīvalāṃ naghāriṣāṃ jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham | trāyamāṇāṃ sahamānāṃ sahasvatīm arundhatīm iha huve 'smā ariṣṭatātaye || Bhatt. huvesmā adhi brūhi mā rabhathāḥ sṛjemaṃ tavaiva sant sarvahāyā ihāstu | bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ śarma yacchatam apasidhya duritaṃ dhattam āyuḥ || devānāṃ hetiḥ pari tvā vṛṇaktu pārayāmi rajasa ut tvā mṛtyor apīparam | Bhatt. u(t) tvā ārād agniṃ kravyādaṃ nirūhan Bhatt. niruhaṃ jivātave te paridhiṃ dadhāmi || asmai mṛtyo adhi brūhi- -imaṃ dayasvod ito 'yam etu | Bhatt. itoyam ariṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ suśruj jarasā śatahāyanātmanā bhujam aśnavat || corr. śatahāyana ātmanā? yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadhariṣyam | patha imaṃ tasmād rakṣanto brahmāsmai varma kṛṇmasi ||
kṛṇomi te prāṇāpānau jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ kṛṇutāṃ dīrgham āyuḥ svasti | vaivasvatena prahitān yamadūtāṃś carata ārād apa sedhāmi sarvān || ārād arātiṃ nirṛtiṃ paro grāhiṃ kravyādaḥ piśacān | rakṣo yat sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ tat tama ivāpa hanmasi || agneṣ ṭe prāṇam amṛtād āyuṣmato manave jātavedasaḥ | corr. vanve yathā na riṣyā amṛtaḥ sajūr asas tat te kṛṇomi tad u te sam ṛdhyatām || śive te stāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī asantāpe adhiśriyau | śaṃ te sūrya ā tapati Bhatt. sūryā śaṃ vāto vātu te hṛde | śivā abhi kṣarantu tvā- -āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ śivās te santv oṣadhīḥ || ut tvāhārṣam adharasyād uttarāṃ pṛthivīm abhi | tatra tvādityau rakṣatāṃ sūryāś candramasā ubhā || yat te vāsaḥ paridhānaṃ yāṃ nīviṃ kṛṇuṣe tvam | śivaṃ te tanve tat kṛṇmaḥ saṃsparśe 'dhrūkṣṇam astu te || Bhatt. dhrūkṣṇam yat kṣureṇa marcayatā sutejasā vaptā vapasi keśaśmasru | śumbhaṃ mukhaṃ mainam āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ || śivau te stāṃ vrīhiyavāv abalāsāv adomadhau | etau yakṣmaṃ vi bādhete etau muñcato aṃhasaḥ || yad aśnāsi yat pibasi dhānyaṃ kṛṣyāḥ payaḥ | ādyaṃ yad anādyaṃ sarvaṃ te annam aviṣaṃ kṛṇomi || ahne ca tvā rātraye ca- -ubhābhyāṃ pari dadhmasi | arāyebhyo jighatsubhya imaṃ naḥ pari rakṣata ||
śataṃ te 'yutaṃ hāyanā Bhatt. teyutam dve yuge trīṇi catvāri santu | indrāgnī viśve devā anu manyantām ahṛṇīyamānāḥ || śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya griṣmāya pari dadhmasi | varṣāṇi tubhyaṃ syonāni yeṣu vardhanta oṣadhīḥ || mṛtyur īśe dvipadāṃ mṛtyur īśe catuṣpadām | tasmāt tvā mṛtyor gopater ud dharāmi sa mā mṛthāḥ || so 'riṣṭa na mariṣyasi Bhatt. soriṣṭa na mariṣyasi mā bibheḥ | na vai tatra pra mīyante no yanty adharaṃ rajaḥ || sarvo vai tatra jīvati gaur aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ | yatredaṃ brahma kriyate Bhatt. krīyate paridhir jīvanāya kam || pari tvā pātu samānebhyo 'bhicārāt sabandhubhyaḥ | amamrir bhavāmṛto 'tijīvo thus with ŚS; Bhatt. yamaṃmir, tajīvo mā te hāsiṣur asavaḥ śarīram || viśve tvā devā amṛtena bibhratv adhivaktā paśupatiṣ ṭe astu | anāmayat savitā te kṛṇotv ā tvā prāṇo viśatu jīvanāya || ye mṛtyava ekaśataṃ yā nāṣṭrātijīvyā | muñcantu tasmāt tvā devā agner vaiśvānarād adhi ||
anuvāka 1 ||
rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinam ā jigharmi mitraṃ prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma | śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam || ayodaṃṣṭrān arciṣā vāvṛdhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ | ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛṣṭvāpi dhatsvāsan || ubhobhayāvinn upa dehi daṃṣṭrā hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varaṃ paraṃ ca | Bhatt. śiśānovaraṃ utāntarikṣe pari yāhy agne jambhaiḥ saṃ dhehy abhi yātudhānān || agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanir harasā hantv enam | pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyāt kraviṣṇur vi cinoty enam || yajñair iṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne vācā śalyām̐ aśanibhir dihānaḥ | tābhir vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūn prati bhaṅdhy eṣām || yatredānīṃ paśyasi jātavedas tiṣṭhantam agna uta vā carantam | utāntarikṣe patantaṃ yātudhānaṃ tamasā vidhya sarvā śiśānaḥ || utārabdhāc chṛṇīhi jātaveda utārebhāṇād ṛṣṭibhir yātudhānāt | agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥ kṣviṅkās tam adantv enīḥ || iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yo yātudhāno ya idaṃ śṛṇoti | tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaś cakṣuṣe randhayaitam || tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñaṃ prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥ pra ṇaya pracetaḥ | hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsy abhi śośucānaṃ mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ || nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ prati paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhy agrā | tasyāgne pṛṣṭīr harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca ||
trir yātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti | tam arciṣā sphūrjayañ jātavedaḥ samakṣam enaṃ gṛṇate ni vṛṅdhi || yad agne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācas tṛṣṭaṃ janayanta rebhāḥ | manyor manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān || parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasā śṛṇīhi | parārciṣā mūradevāñ chṛṇīhi parāsutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi || parādya devā vṛjinaṃ śṛṇantu pratyag enaṃ śapathā yantu sṛṣṭāḥ | vācāstenaṃ śarava ṛcchantu marman viśvayaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ || sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ | anu daha sahamūrān kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ || yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ | yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīram agne teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca || saṃvatsarīṇaṃ paya usriyāyās tasya māsīd yātudhāno nṛcakṣaḥ | corr. māśīd pīyūṣam agne yatamas titṛpsāt taṃ pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marman || viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānāḥ pibantv ā vṛścantām aditaye durevāḥ | paraiṇān devaḥ savitā dadātu Bhatt. paraiṇāṃ parā bhāgam oṣadhīnāṃ jayantām || tvaṃ no agne adharād udaktas tvaṃ paścād uta rakṣā purastāt | prati tye te ajarāsas tapiṣṭhā Bhatt. te te aghaśaṃsaṃ śośucato dahantu || paścāt purastād adharād udaktaḥ kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhy agne | sakhā sakhāyam ajaro jarimṇe agne martyām̐ amartyas tvaṃ naḥ || Bhatt. gne
tad agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaṃ yena paśyasi yātudhānam | atharvavaj jyotiṣā daivyena [Bhatt. atharvava(j) satyaṃ dhūrvantam acitaṃ ny oṣa || Bhatt. oṣaḥ pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi | dhṛṣadvarṇaṃ divedive hantāraṃ bhaṅgurāvatām || vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā | prādevīr māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe || agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ | śuciḥ pāvaka īḍyaḥ || agne rakṣā ṇo aṃhasaḥ prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ | tapiṣṭhair ajaro daha || ye te śṛṅge ajare jātavedas tigmaśocī brahmasaṃśite | tābhyāṃ durhārdam abhidāsantaṃ kimīdinaṃ pratyañcaṃ yātudhānaṃ jātavedo vi nikṣva || viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ sam indra rakṣaso daha | agne śukreṇa śociṣā tapuragrebhir arcibhiḥ || praty agne mithunā daha yātudhānā kimīdinā | saṃ tvā śiśāmi jāgṛhy adabdhaṃ vipra manmabhiḥ || praty agne harasā haraḥ śṛṇīhi viśvataḥ prati | yātudhānasya rakṣaso balaṃ vi ruja vīryam || sādānveyaṃ pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra Bhatt. sādānveyāḥ yātudhānakṣayaṇair mūraiḥ | etāv agne mithunā yātudhānā viṣvañcau mruktau harasā śayātām || Bhatt. uktau bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ | indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varīyaḥ kṛṇotu ||
indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ ny arpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ | parā śṛṇīhi tam acito ny oṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītam atriṇaḥ || Bhatt. atriṇaḥ+ indrāsomā sam aghaśaṃsam abhy aghaṃ tapur yayastu carur agnivām̐ iva | brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattam anavāyaṃ kimīdine || indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam | yathaiṣāṃ nātaḥ punar ekaś canodayat tad vām astu sahase manyumac chavaḥ || indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas pary agnitaptebhir yuvam aśmahanmabhiḥ | tapurvadhebhir ajarebhir atriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram || indrāsomā pra harataṃ divo vadhaṃ saṃ pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam | ut takṣataṃ svaryaṃ parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vavṛdhānaṃ nijūrvathaḥ || indrāsomā pari vāṃ bhūtu viśvata iyaṃ matiḥ kakṣyāśveva vājinā | yāṃ vāṃ hotrāṃ pari hiṇomi medhayā- -imā brahmāṇi nṛpatīva jinvatam || prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhir evair hataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ | indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugaṃ bhūd yo mā kadā cid abhidāsati druhuḥ || yo mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhir vacobhiḥ | āpa iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītā asann astv asata indra vaktā || Bhatt. astāsata ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evair ye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ | ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nirṛter upasthe || yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ yas tanūnām | ripu stena steyakṛd dabhram etu Bhatt. abhram ni ṣa hīyatāṃ tanvā tanā ca ||
paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīr adho astu viśvāḥ | prati śuṣyati yaśo asya devā yo mā divā dipsati yaś ca naktam || suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya sac cāsac ca vacasī paspṛśāte | tayor yat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyas tad it somo 'vati hanty āsat || na vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyaṃ mithuyā dhārayantam | hanti rakṣo hanty āsad vadantam ubhāv indrasya prasitau śayāte || yadi vāham anṛtadevo asmi moghaṃ vā devām̐ apyūhe agne | kim asmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācas te nirṛthaṃ sacantām || adyā murīya yadi yātudhāno asmi yadi vāyus tatapa pūruṣasya | Bhatt. tadapa adhā sa vīrair daśabhir vi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānety aha || yo māyātuṃ yātudhānety āha yo mā rakṣāḥ śucir asmīty āha | indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantor adhamas padīṣṭa || pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktam apa druhus tanvaṃ gūhamānā | vavrām̐ anantām̐ ava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ || vi tiṣṭhadhvaṃ maruto vikṣv icchata Bhatt. vikṣvītsata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ saṃ pinaṣṭana | vayo ye bhūtvā patayanti naktabhir ye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare || eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam | Bhatt. dipsavodābhyam śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nūnaṃ sṛjad aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ || pra vartaya divo aśmānam indra somaśitaṃ maghavan saṃ śiśādhi | prākto apākto adharād udakto abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena || Bhatt. 'bhi
indro yātūnām abhavat parāśaro havirmathīnām abhy āvivāsatām | abhīd u śakraḥ paraśur yathā vanaṃ pātreva bhindant sata eti rakṣasaḥ || ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahi śvayātum uta kokayātum | suparṇayātum uta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra || mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvatām apocchataṃ mithunā yā kimīdinā | pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso antarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān || indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānam uta striyaṃ māyayā śāśadānām | Bhatt. śāsadānām vigrīvāso mūradevā rudantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam || prati cakṣva vi cakṣva- -indraś ca soma jāgṛtam | rakṣobhyo vadham asyatam aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ ||
anuvāka 2 ||
yā babhravo yāś ca śukrā rohiṇīr uta pṛśnayaḥ | asiknīḥ kṛṣṇā oṣadhīḥ sarvā acchā vadāmasi || trāyantām imaṃ puruṣaṃ yakṣmād deveṣitād adhi | yāsāṃ dyauṣ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudro mūlaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva || āpo 'graṃ divyā oṣadhayas | tās te yakṣmam enasyam aṅgādaṅgād anīnaśan || Bhatt. anīnaśaṃ prastṛṇatī stambinīr ekaśṛṅgāḥ pratanvatīr oṣadhīr ā vadāmi | aṃśumatīḥ kāṇḍinīr yā viśākhā hvayāmi te vīrudho vaiśvadevīr ugrāḥ puruṣajīvanīḥ || yad vaḥ sahaḥ sahamānā vīryaṃ yac ca vo balam | tenemam asmād yakṣmāt puruṣaṃ muñcantauṣadhīḥ || jīvalāṃ naghāriṣāṃ jīvantīm oṣadhīm uta | arundhatīm unnayantīṃ puṣpāṃ madhumatīṃ huve || ihā yantu pracetaso medinīr vacaso mama | yathemaṃ pārayāmasi puruṣaṃ duritād adhi || agner ghāso apāṃ garbho yā rohanti punarṇavāḥ | Bhatt. punarnavāḥ dhruvāḥ sahasranāmnīr bheṣajīḥ santv ābhṛtāḥ || avakolvā udakātmāna oṣadhayaḥ | vyajṛṣantī duritaṃ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgyaḥ || unmuñcantīr vivaruṇā ugrā yā viṣadūṣanīr atho balāsanāśanīḥ | rakṣonāśanīḥ kṛtyādūṣaṇīś ca yās tā ihā yantv oṣadhīḥ ||
śivās te santv oṣadhīr apakrītāḥ sahīyasīr vīrudho yā abhiṣṭutāḥ | apāṃ sarasvatīṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ trāyantām asmākaṃ gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ paśum || madhuman mūlaṃ madhumad agram āsāṃ madhuman madhyaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva | madhumat parṇaṃ madhumat puṣpam āsāṃ madhoḥ saṃbhūtā amṛtasya bhakṣo ghṛtam annaṃ duhrate gopurogavam || yāvatīḥ kīyatīś cemāḥ pṛthivyām adhy oṣadhīḥ | tā naḥ sahasraparṇyo mṛtyor muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || vaiyāghro maṇir vīrudhāṃ trāyamāṇo 'bhiśastipāḥ | Bhatt. trāyamāṇobhiśastipāḥ+ amīvāḥ sarvā rakṣāṃsy apa hantv adhi dūram asmat || siṃhasyeva stanathor oṣadhīnām agner iva vijanta ābhṛtābhyaḥ | gavāṃ yakṣmaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ vīrudbhir atinutto nāvyā etu srotyāḥ || Bhatt. atinukto … eta mumucānā oṣadhayo agner vaiśvānarād adhi | bhūmiṃ saṃtanvatīr ita yāsāṃ rājā vanaspatiḥ || yāś cāhaṃ veda vīrudho yāś ca paśyāmi cakṣuṣā | ajñātā jānīmaś ca yā yāsu vidmasi saṃbhṛtam | sarvāḥ samagrā oṣadhīr bodhantu vacaso mama || yā rohanty āṅgirasīḥ parvateṣu sameṣu ca vīrudho viśvabheṣajīḥ | tā no mayasvatīḥ śivā oṣadhīḥ santu śaṃ hṛde || aśvattho darbho vīrudhāṃ somo rājāmṛtaṃ haviḥ | vrīhir yavaś ca bheṣajau divas putrāv amartyau || uj jīhīdhve stanayaty abhikrandanty oṣadhīḥ | yadā vaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ parjanyo retasāvati ||
tasyāmṛtasyemaṃ balaṃ puruṣaṃ pārayāmasi | atho kṛṇomi bheṣajaṃ yathāsac chatahāyanaḥ || varāho veda vīrudhaṃ nakulo veda bheṣajīḥ | gandharvāḥ sarpā yā vidus tā ihā yantv oṣadhīḥ || yāḥ suparṇā āṅgirasīr divyā yā raghaṭo viduḥ | vayāṃsi haṃsā yā vidur yāś ca sarve patatriṇaḥ | mṛgā yā vidur oṣadhīs tā asmā avase huve || yāvatīnām oṣadhīnāṃ gāvaḥ prāśnanty aghnyā yāvatīnām ajāvayaḥ | tāvatīr viśvabheṣajīr ā bharāmi tvām abhi || yāvatīṣu manuṣyā bheṣajaṃ bhiṣajo viduḥ | tāvatīs tubhyam ābhṛtāḥ śarma yacchantv oṣadhīḥ || puṣpavatīḥ prasūmatīḥ phalinīr aphalā uta | saṃmātara iva duhrām asmā ariṣṭatātaye || ut tvāhārṣaṃ pañcaśalād ut tvā daśaśalād uta | ut tvā yamasya paḍvīśād oṣadhībhir apīparam ||
indrasya prathamo ratho devānām aparo ratho varuṇasya tṛtīya it | ahīnām apamā ratha sthāṇum ārad athā riṣat || darbhaḥ śocis tarūṇakam aśvasya vāraḥ puruṣasya vāraḥ | rathasya bandhuram Bhatt. bandhur mahīnām ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār id ugram || ava śveta padā jahi pūrveṇa cāpareṇa ca | udaplutam iva dārv ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār id ugram || araṃghaso nimajya- -unmajya punar abravīt | udaplutam iva dārv ahīnām arasaṃ viṣaṃ vār id ugram || paidvo hanti kaṣarṇīlaṃ paidvaḥ śvitram utāsitam | Bhatt. paidvaścitramupāsitam paidvo ratharvyāḥ śiraḥ Bhatt. rathavrayāḥ saṃ bibheda pṛdākvāḥ || Bhatt. pradākvāḥ paidva prehi prathamo anu tvā vayam emasi | Bhatt. prathamonu ahīn vy asyatāt patho Bhatt. ahīnaviśvadāt yena smā vayam emasi || idaṃ paidvo ajāyata- -idam asya parāyaṇam | imāny arvataḥ padā- -ahighnyo vājinīvataḥ || saṃyataṃ na vi ṣparad vyāttaṃ na saṃ yamat | asmin kṣetre dvāv ahī strī ca pumāṃś ca tā ubhā arasā || arasāsa ihāhayo ye anti ye ca dūrake | ghanena hanmi vṛścikam ahiṃ daṇḍenāgatam || aghāśvasyedaṃ bheṣajam ubhayoḥ svajasya ca | Bhatt. sajasya indro mahyam aghāyantam ahiṃ paidvo arundhayat ||
paidvasya manmahe vayaṃ sthirasya sthiradhāmnaḥ | ime paścāt pṛdākavaḥ Bhatt. pradākavaḥ pradīdhyata āsate || Bhatt. pratīdhyata naṣṭāsavo naṣṭaviṣā hatā indreṇa vajriṇā | jaghānendro jaghnimā vayam || hatās tiraścirājayo nipiṣṭāsaḥ pṛdākavaḥ | darviṃ karikrataṃ śvitraṃ Bhatt. ścitraṃ darbheṣv asitaṃ jahi || kairātikā kumārikā sakhā khanati bheṣajam | hiraṇyayībhir abhribhir girīṇām upa sānuṣu || āyam agan yuvā bhiṣak pṛśnihāparājitaḥ | sa vai svajasya jambhana ubhayor vṛścikasya ca || indro me 'hīn ajambhayan Bhatt. mehīn mitraś ca varuṇaś ca | vātāparjanyobhā || paidvo me 'hīn ajambhayat Bhatt. mehīn pṛdākūṃś ca pṛdākvaḥ | Bhatt. pradākūṃś ca pradākvaḥ svajān tiraścirājīn kasarṇīlān daśonaśīn || Bhatt. kaśarṇīlān daśodaśīn indro jaghāna prathamo janitāram ahe tava | teṣāṃ vas tṛhyamāṇānāṃ kaḥ svit teṣām asad rasaḥ || Bhatt. kasyuteṣām saṃ hi śīrṣāṇy agrabhaṃ pauñjiṣṭa iva karvaram | Bhatt. pauñjaṣṭa sindhor madhyaṃ paretya vy anijam aher viṣam || ahīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ parā vahantu sindhavaḥ | hatās tiraścirājayo nipiṣṭāsaḥ pṛdākavaḥ || Bhatt. pradākavaḥ
oṣadhīnām ahaṃ vṛṇa urvarīr iva sādhuyā | nayāmy arvatīr iva- -ahe nir aitu te viṣam || yad agnau sūrye viṣaṃ pṛthivyām oṣadhīṣu yat | kāndāviṣaṃ kaniklakaṃ Bhatt. kaniklaka nir aitv aitu te vahiḥ || aṅgādaṅgāt pra cyāvaya hṛdayaṃ pari varjaya | adhā viṣasya yat tejo avācīnaṃ tad etu te || agne trāyasva vimadaṃ nayemaṃ punar dhehi jīvase jātavedaḥ | mā te heḍāṃsi duritāva ganma māhir vadhīd viṣataḥ puruṣaṃ naḥ || Bhatt. viṣitaḥ ye agnijā oṣadhijā ahīnāṃ ye abhrajā vidyuta ā babhūvuḥ | teṣāṃ jātāni bahudhā bahūni Bhatt. vahudhā tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo namasā vidhema || Bhatt. sarvebhyo taudī nāmāsi kanyā ghṛtācī nāma vā asi | adhaspadena te pador ā dade viṣadūṣaṇam || āre abhūd viṣam araud viṣe viṣam aprāg api | agnir aher nir adhāg viṣaṃ somo nir aṇayīt | Bhatt. aṇait daṃṣṭāram anv agād viṣam ahir amṛta || Bhatt. daṃṣṭrāramanagād
anuvāka 3 ||
kutas tau jātau katamaḥ so ardhaḥ kasmāl lokāt katarasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ | vatsau virājaḥ salilād udaitāṃ tau tvā pṛcchāmi katareṇa dugdhā || Bhatt. taṃ tvā, drugdhā yo 'krandayat salilaṃ mahitvā Bhatt. yokrandayat yoniṃ kṛtvā tribhujaṃ śayānam | Bhatt. śayānā vatsaḥ kāmadugho virājo guhā cakre tanvaḥ parācīḥ || yāni catvāri bṛhanti yeṣāṃ caturthaṃ viyunakti vācam | brahmainad vidyāt tapasā vipaścid yasminn ekaṃ yujyate yasminn ekam || bṛhataḥ pari sāmāni ṣaṣṭhāt pañcādhi nirmitā | bṛhad bṛhatyā nirmitaṃ kuto 'dhi bṛhatī mitā || Bhatt. kutodhi bṛhatī pari mātrāyā mātur mātrādhi nirmitā | māyā hi jajñe māyāyā māyāyā mātalī pari || vaiśvānarasya pratimopari dyaur yāvad rodasī vibabādhe agniḥ | tataḥ ṣaṣṭhād āmuto yanti stomā ud ito yanty abhi ṣaṣṭham ahnaḥ || ṣaṭ ṭvā pṛcchāma ṛṣayaḥ kaśyapedaṃ tvaṃ hi yuktaṃ yuyukṣe yogyaṃ ca | virājam āhur brahmaṇaḥ pitaraṃ tāṃ no vi dhehy ṛtuthā sakhibhyaḥ || Bhatt. ṛtathā yāṃ pracyutām anu yajñāḥ pracyuvanta upatiṣṭhanta upatiṣṭhamānām | tasyā vraje prasave yakṣam ejati sā virāḍ ṛṣayaḥ parame vyoman || aprāṇaiti prāṇena prāṇatīnāṃ virāṭ svarājam abhy eti paścāt | viśvaṃ mṛśantīm abhirūpāṃ virājaṃ Bhatt. mṛṣantīm paśyanti tve na tve paśyanty enām || ko virājo mithunatvaṃ pra veda ka ṛtūn ka u kalpam asyāḥ | kramān ko asyā bahudhā vidugdhān ko asyā dhāma katidhā vyuṣṭīḥ ||
iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyaucchat sāpsv antaś carati praviṣṭā | vadhūr jigāya navagaj janitrī mahānto asyāṃ mahimāno antaḥ || chandaḥpakṣe uṣasā pepiśāne samānīṃ yonim anu saṃ carete | sūryapatnī saṃ carataḥ prajānatī ketumatī ajare bhūriretasā || ṛtasya panthām anu tisra āgus trayo gharmā anu reta āguḥ | prajām ekā jinvaty ūrjam ekā rāṣṭram ekā rakṣati devayūnām || agnīṣṭomam adadhur yā turīyāsīd yajñasya pakṣām ṛṣayaḥ kalpayantaḥ | gāyatrīṃ triṣṭubhaṃ jagatīm anuṣṭubhaṃ bṛhadarkīṃ yajamānāya svar ābharantaḥ || pañca vyuṣṭīr anu pañca dohā gāṃ pañcanāmnīm ṛtavo 'nu pañca | Bhatt. ṛtavonu pañca diśaḥ pañcadaśena kl̥ptās tā ekamūrdhnīr abhi lokam ekam || ṣaḍ jātā bhūtā prathamaja rtasya ṣaḍ u sāmāni ṣaḍahaṃ vahanti | ṣaḍyogaṃ sīram anu sāmasāma ṣaḍ āhur dyāvāpṛthivī ṣaḍ urvīḥ || urvīḥ with ŚS; Bhatt. ūrvī ṣaḍ āhuḥ śītān ṣaḍ u māsa uṣṇān Bhatt. śītāṃ … uṣṇāṃ ṛtūn no brūta yatamo 'tiriktaḥ | Bhatt. ṛtuṃ … yatamotiriktaḥ sapta suparṇāḥ kavayo ni ṣeduḥ sapta chandāṃsy anu sapta dīkṣāḥ || sapta homāḥ samidho ha sapta madhūni saptartavo nu sapta | saptājyāni pari bhūtam āyan sapta hotāra ṛtuthā yajanti tāḥ saptagṛdhrā iti śuśravāham || aṣṭau dhāmāni prathamaja rtasya- -aṣṭendrartvijo daivyā ye | aṣṭayonir aditir aṣṭaputrā aṣṭamīṃ rātrim abhi havyam eti || itthaṃ śreyo manyamānedam āgāṃ yuṣmākaṃ sakhye aham asmi śevā | Bhatt. sevā samānajanmā kratur astu vaḥ śivaḥ sa naḥ sarvāḥ saṃ carati prajānan ||
kevalīndrāya duduhe hi gṛṣṭir vaśaṃ pīyūṣaṃ prathamaṃ duhānā | athātarpayac caturaś caturdhā devān manuṣyām̐ asurān utarṣīn || aṣṭendrasya ṣaḍ yamasya ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta saptadhā | apo manuṣyān oṣadhīs tān u pañcānu secire || ko nu gauḥ ka ekarṣiḥ kim u sāma kā āśiṣaḥ | yakṣmaṃ pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekartuḥ katamo nu saḥ || eko gaur eka ekarṣir ekaṃ sāmaikadhāśiṣaḥ | yakṣmaṃ pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekartur nāti ricyate ||
prāṇāya namo yasya sarvam idaṃ vaśe | yo bhūtaḥ sarvasyeśvaro yasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam || namas te prāṇa krandāya namas te stanayitnave | namas te astu vidyute namas te prāṇa varṣate || yat prāṇa ṛtāv āgate abhikrandaty oṣadhīḥ | pra vīyante garbhaṃ dadhate atho bahvīr vi jāyante || yat prāṇa stanayitnunā- -abhikrandaty oṣadhīḥ | sarvaṃ tadā pra modate yad u kiṃ ca bhūmyām adhi || yadā prāṇo abhyakrandīd varṣeṇa stanayitnunā | paśavas tat pra modante maho vai no bhaviṣyati || abhivṛṣṭā oṣadhayaḥ prāṇena sam avādiran | āyur vai naḥ prātītarat sarvā naḥ surabhīr akaḥ || namas te prāṇa prāṇate namo astv apānate | pratīcīnāya te namaḥ parācīnāya te namaḥ sarvasmai ta idaṃ namaḥ || namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate | namas te prāṇa tiṣṭhata āsīnāyota te namaḥ || yā te prāṇa priyā tanū yā vā te prāṇa preyasī | atho yad bheṣajaṃ tava tasya no dhehi jīvase || prāṇaḥ prajā anu vaste Bhatt. anu paste, Barret anūpāste pitā putram iva priyam | prāṇo ha sarvasyeśvaro Bhatt. prāṇe yac ca prāṇati yac ca na ||
prāṇo mṛtyuḥ prāṇo amṛtaṃ Bhatt. prāṇomṛtaṃ prāṇaṃ devā upāsate | prāṇo ha satyavādinam uttame loka ā dadhat || prāṇo virāṭ prāṇo deṣṭrī prāṇaṃ sarvā upāsate | prāṇo 'gniś candramāḥ sūryaḥ Bhatt. agniś prāṇam āhuḥ prajāpatim || prāṇāpānau vrīhayavāv anaḍvān prāṇa ucyate | yave ha prāṇa āhito apāno vrīhir ucyate || Bhatt. āhitopāno apānati prāṇati puruṣo garbhe antaḥ | yadā tvaṃ prāṇa jinvasy atha sa jāyate tvat || prāṇam āhur mātariśvānaṃ vāto ha prāṇa ucyate | prāṇe ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca prāṇe sarvaṃ samāhitam || ātharvaṇīr āṅgirasīr daivīr manuṣyajāś ca yāḥ | Bhatt. devīr sarvāḥ pra modanta oṣadhīr yadā tvaṃ prāṇa jinvasi || yadā prāṇo abhyavarṣīd varṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ mahīm | oṣadhayaḥ pra modante atho yāḥ kāś ca vīrudhaḥ || Bhatt. modantetho yas te prāṇedaṃ veda yasmiṃś cāsi pratiṣṭhitaḥ | sarve asmai baliṃ harān Bhatt. valiṃ amuṣmiṃl loka uttame || yathā prāṇa balihṛtas Bhatt. valihṛtas tubhyaṃ sarvāḥ prajā imāḥ | evā tasmai baliṃ harān Bhatt. valiṃ yas tvā śuśrāva śuśruvuḥ || antargarbhaś carati devatāsv ābhūto bhūtaḥ sa u jāyate punaḥ | sa bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhaviṣyat pitā putraṃ pra viveśā śacībhiḥ ||
ekaṃ padaṃ not khidati salilād dhaṃsa utpatan | Bhatt. utpataṃ yad aṅga sa tam utkhiden naivādya na śvo na rātrī nāhaḥ syān Bhatt. utkhidenvaivādya na śce rātrī nāha na prajñāyaiti kiṃ cana || aṣṭācakraṃ vartata ekanemi sahasrākṣaraṃ pra puro ni paścāt | ardhenedaṃ pari babhūva viśvaṃ yad asyārdhaṃ katamaḥ sa ketuḥ || yo asya viśvajanmana īśe sarvasya ceṣṭataḥ | anyeṣu kṣipradhanvane tasmai prāṇa namo 'stu te || Bhatt. namostu yo asya sarvajanmana īśe viśvasya ceṣṭataḥ | atandro brahmaṇā dhīraḥ prāṇo mām abhi rakṣatu || ūrdhvaḥ supteṣu jāgāra nanu tīryaṅ ni padyate | na suptam asya supteṣv anu śuśrāva kaś cana || Bhatt. suśrāva prāṇa mā mat paryāvṛto Bhatt. māvat na mad anyo bhaviṣyasi | Bhatt. vadanyo apāṃ garbham iva jīvase prāṇa badhnāmi tvā mayi ||
anuvāka 4 ||
sāhasras tveṣa ṛṣabhaḥ payasvān viśvā rūpāṇi vakṣaṇāsu bibhrat | bhadraṃ dātre yajamānāya śikṣan bārhaspatya usriyas tantum ātān || Bhatt. ātāṃ apāṃ yo agre pratimā babhūva prabhūḥ sarvasmai pṛthivīva devī | Bhatt. pṛthivī ca pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghnyānāṃ sāhasre poṣe api naḥ kṛṇotu || pumān antarvān sthaviraḥ payasvān Bhatt. antarvāṃ vasoḥ kabandham ṛṣabho bibharti | tam indrāya pathibhir devayānair hutam agnir vahatu jātavedāḥ || devānāṃ bhāga upanāha eṣo apāṃ rasa oṣadhīnāṃ ghṛtasya | Bhatt. eṣopāṃ somasya drapsam avṛṇīta śakro bṛhann adrir abhavad yac charīram || Bhatt. abhir pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghnyānām atho pitā mahatāṃ gargarāṇām | vatso jarāyuḥ pratidhuk pīyūṣa āmikṣā ghṛtaṃ tad v asya retaḥ || somasya pūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ bibharṣi tvaṣṭā rūpāṇāṃ janitā paśūnām | śivās te santu prajanva imā ny asmabhyaṃ svadhite yaccha yā amūḥ || indrasyaujo varuṇasya bāhū aśvinor aṃsau marutām iyaṃ kakut | bṛhaspatisaṃbhṛtam etam āhur ye dhīrāsaḥ kavayo ye manīṣiṇaḥ || ājyaṃ bibharti ghṛtam asya retaḥ sāhasraḥ poṣas tam u yajñam āhuḥ | indrasya rūpam ṛṣabho vasānaḥ so asmāṃ devāḥ śiva aitu dattaḥ || daivīr viśaḥ payasvān ā tanoṣi tvām indraṃ tvāṃ sarasvantam āhuḥ | sahasraṃ sa ekamukhā dadāti yo brāhmaṇa ṛṣabham ā juhoti || bṛhaspatiḥ savitā te mano dadhau tvaṣṭur vāyoḥ pary ātmā ta ābhṛtaḥ | antarikṣe manasā tvā juhomi barhiṣ ṭe dyāvāpṛthivī abhūtām ||
ya indra iva deveṣv eti goṣu vivāvadat | tasya ṛṣabhasyāṅgāni brahmā saṃ stautu bhadrayā || pārśve āstām anumatyā bhagasyāstām anūvṛjau | Bhatt. anuvṛjau aṣṭhīvantāv abravīn mitro mamaitau kevalāv iti || Bhatt. mamaito bhasad āsīd ādityānāṃ śroṇī āstāṃ bṛhaspateḥ | pucchaṃ vātasya devasya tena dhūnoty oṣadhīḥ || kroḍa āsīj jāmiśaṃsasya Bhatt. āsīrjāmisaṃsasya somasya kalaśo dhṛtaḥ | Bhatt. dṛtaḥ utthātur abruvan pado yad ṛṣabhaṃ vyakalpayan || gudā āsan sinīvālyāḥ sūryāyās tvacam abruvan | devāḥ saṃgatya yat sarva ṛṣabhaṃ vyakalpayan || te kuṣṭhikāḥ saramāyai Bhatt. svaramāyai kūrmebhyo adadhuḥ śaphān | Bhatt. śaphāṃ ūbadhyam asya kīṭebhyaś śvavartebhyo adhārayan || Bhatt. śaparttebhyo śṛṅgābhyāṃ rakṣa ṛṣaty arātiṃ hanti cakṣuṣā | śṛṇoti bhadraṃ karṇābhyāṃ gavāṃ yaḥ patir aghnyaḥ || śatayājaṃ sa yajate Bhatt. śatayātaṃ sejate nainaṃ dunvanty agnayaḥ | Bhatt. nṛṇvanty jinvanti sarve taṃ devā yo brāhmaṇa ṛṣabham ā juhoti || brāhmaṇāya vṛṣabhaṃ dattvā Bhatt. brāhmaṇa ṛṣabhaṃ varīyaḥ kṛṇute manaḥ | puṣṭiṃ so aghnyānāṃ sve goṣṭhe vi paśyatu || Bhatt. aghnyānāsme gāvaḥ santu prajāḥ santv atho astu tanūbalam | sarvaṃ tad anu manyantāṃ devā ṛṣabhadāyine ||
ayaṃ pipāna indriyaṃ rayiṃ bibharti cetanīm | Bhatt. retanīm ayaṃ dhenuṃ sudughāṃ nityavatsāṃ vaśaṃ duhe vipaścitaṃ puro divaḥ || piśaṅgarūpo nabhaso vayodhā aindraḥ śuṣmo viśvarūpo na āgan | prajām asmabhyaṃ dadhad rayiṃ ca rāyaspoṣam upasatvā sadema || etaṃ vo yuvānaṃ pari dadhmo atra tena krīḍantīś carata vaśām̐ anu | mā no hiṃsiṣṭa januṣā subhāgā rāyaś ca poṣair abhi naḥ sacadhvam || upehopaparcano 'smin goṣṭha upa pṛñcatu | upa ṛṣabhasya yad reta upendra tava vīryam ||
ayaṃ pratisaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate | vīryāvānt sapatnahā śūravīraḥ paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ || ayaṃ maṇiḥ sapatnahā suvīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ | pratyak kṛtyā dūṣayann etu vīraḥ || anenendro maṇinā vṛtram ahann anenāsurān parābhāvayan manīṣī | anena dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ajayad anenājayat pradiśaś catasraḥ || ayaṃ srāktyo maṇiḥ pratīvartaḥ pratisaraḥ | ojasvān vimṛdho maṇiḥ so asmān pātu viśvataḥ || tad agnir āha tad u soma āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tad indraḥ | te te devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisarair ajantu || Bhatt. pratisarau rujantu antar dadhe dyāvāpṛthivī utāhar uta sūryam | utemaṃ brahmaṇaspatiṃ te te devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisarair ajantu || Bhatt. pratisarau rujantu ye srāktyaṃ maṇiṃ janā varmāṇi kṛṇvate | sūryo divam ivāruhya vi kṛtyā bādhate vaśī || srāktyena maṇina ṛṣiṇeva manīṣiṇā | ajaiṣaṃ sarvāḥ pṛtanā vi mṛdho hanmi rakṣasaḥ || yāḥ kṛtyā āṅgirasīr yāḥ kṛtyā āsurīr uta | kṛtyā yāḥ svayaṃkṛtā yā u cānyebhir ābhṛtāḥ | ubhayīs tāḥ parā yantu parāvataṃ navatiṃ nāvyā ati || Bhatt. nāvyāyati asmai maṇiṃ varma badhnantu devā indro viṣṇuḥ savitā rudro agniḥ | prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāḍ vaiśvānara ṛṣayaś ca sarve ||
uttamo asy oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva | yam aicchāmāvadāma taṃ pratispāśanam abruvan || sa id vyāghro bhavaty atho siṃho atho vṛṣā sarvā diśo vi rājati Bhatt. omits this pāda yo bibhartīmaṃ maṇim || nainaṃ ghnanty apsaraso na gandharvā na martyāḥ | sarvā diśo vi rājāti yo bibhartīmaṃ maṇim || kaśyapas tvām asṛjata kaśyapas tvāṃ samairayat | abibhas tvendro mānuṣe Bhatt. abhivas bibhrat saṃśreṣiṇe 'jayat || Bhatt. sāśreśraṇejayat maṇiṃ sapatnajambhanaṃ varma devā abadhnata | yas tvā kṛtyābhir yas tvā dīkṣābhir yas tvā yajñair jighāṃsati | pratyak tvam indra taṃ jahi Bhatt. tamindra vajreṇa śataparvaṇā || ayam id vai pratīvartaḥ Bhatt. vaiḥ sahasvān sañjayo maṇiḥ | prajāṃ dhanaṃ ca rakṣatu paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ || asapatnaṃ no adharād asapatnaṃ na uttarāt | indrāsapatnaṃ naḥ paścāj jyotiḥ śūra puras kṛdhi || Bhatt. jyotiṣpuraḥ puras aindrāgnaṃ varma bahulaṃ yad ugraṃ viśve devā nāti vidhyanti sarve | tat te tanvaṃ trāyatāṃ sarvato bṛhad āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭir yathāsat || ā tvārukṣad devamaṇir mahyā ariṣṭatātaye | imaṃ methim abhisaṃviśadhvaṃ tanūpānaṃ trivarūtham ojase || asminn indro ni dadhātu nṛmṇam imaṃ devāso abhisaṃviśadhvam | dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya- -āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭir yathāsat || indro badhnātu te maṇiṃ jigīvām̐ aparājitaḥ somapā abhayaṅkaro vṛṣā | sa tvā rakṣatu sarvadā divā naktaṃ ca viśvataḥ ||
anuvāka 5 ||
indro manthatu manthitā śakraḥ śūraḥ purandaraḥ | yathā hanāma senām amitrāṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ || pūtirajjur upadhmānī Bhatt. ubadhnānī pūtiṃ senāṃ kṛṇotv amūm | Bhatt. amuṃ agniṃ dhūmaṃ parādṛśya hṛtsv ā dadhatāṃ bhayam || paruṣān amūn paruṣāhvaḥ kṛṇotu hanty enān vadhako vadhaiḥ | kṣipraṃ śara iva bhajyantāṃ bṛhajjālena saṃjitāḥ || amūn aśvattha ni śṛṇīhi khādāmūn khadirājiram | tājadbhaṅga iva bhajyantāṃ bṛhajjālena saṃjitāḥ || antarikṣaṃ jālam āsīj jāladaṇḍā diśo mahīḥ | tenābhidāya senām indro dasyūn apāvapat || Bhatt. upāvapat bṛhat te jālaṃ bṛhata indra śūra Bhatt. bṛha te … śūraḥ sahasrārghasya śatavīryasya | tenā ny ubja maghavann amitrān Bhatt. amitrā śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ || bṛhat te jālaṃ bṛhataś Bhatt. bṛhadda śakrasya vājinīvataḥ | tenā śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ jaghāna- -indro dasyūnām abhidhāya senām || ayaṃ loko jālam āsīc chakrasya mahato mahān | tenāham indrajālena tamasāmūn abhi dadhāmi sarvān || sedir ugrāvartir ārtiś cānapavācanā | śramas tandrīś ca mohaś ca tair amūn abhi dadhāmi sarvān || Bhatt. tainamūn mṛtyave amūn pra yacchāmi Bhatt. mṛtyavemūṃ mṛtyupāśair amī sitāḥ | Bhatt. śitāḥ mṛtyor ye aghalā dūtās Bhatt. aghalā tebhya enān prati nayāmi baddhvā || Bhatt. baddhān
mṛtyudūtā amūn nayata yamadūtā apombhata | paraḥ sahasrā hanyantāṃ tṛṇeḍhv enān matyaṃ bhavasya || Bhatt. martyaṃ bhavaśca sādhyā ekaṃ jāladaṇḍam udyatya yanty ojasā | rudrā dvitīyaṃ vasavas tṛtīyam ādityair eka udyataḥ || viśve devā upariṣṭād ubjanto yantv ojasā | madhyena ghnanto yantu senām aṅgiraso vadhaiḥ || vanaspatīn vānaspatyān oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ | dvipāc catuṣpād iṣṇāmi yathā senām amūṃ hanat || gandharvāpsaraso devān sarpān puṇyajanān pitṝn | dṛṣṭān adṛṣṭān iṣṇāmi Bhatt. dṛṣṭāṃ yathā senām amūṃ hanat || mṛtyupāśā ime yuktā yān ākramya na mucyase | amuṣyā hantu senāyā idaṃ kūṭaṃ sahasraśaḥ || Bhatt. sahasrahaṃ gharmaḥ samiddho agninā- -ayaṃ homaḥ sahasrahā | bhavaś ca pṛśnibāhuḥ śarva senām amūṃ hatam || Bhatt. sarva mṛtyor oṣam ā padyantāṃ Bhatt. mṛtyorāsam kṣudhaṃ sediṃ vadhaṃ bhayam | Bhatt. sedhiṃ indraś cākṣujālābhyāṃ śarva senām amūṃ hatam || Bhatt. sarva parājitāḥ pra trasatāmitrā jitā dhāvata brahmaṇā | bṛhaspatipraṇuttānāṃ māmīṣāṃ moci kaś cana || ava padyantām eṣām āyudhāni mā śakan pratidhām iṣum | Bhatt. śakaṃ athaiṣāṃ bahu bibhyatām iṣavo ghnantu marmaṇi || sam enān krośatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe sam antarikṣaṃ saha devatābhiḥ | mā jñātāraṃ mā pratiṣṭhāṃ vidanta Bhatt. pratiṣṭhāmidanta mitho 'pighnānā upa yantu mṛtyum || read vighnānā or 'bhighnānā?
diśaś catasro 'śvataryo devarathasya puroḍāśāḥ Bhatt. catasrośvataryo śaphā antarikṣam uddhiḥ || Bhatt. udbhiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pakṣasī ṛtavo 'bhīśavo Bhatt. ṛtavobhīśavo vāk parirathyam || Bhatt. parirukthiyam ahorātre cakre māsā arāḥ Bhatt. māsārā, but note crit. app. saṃvatsaro adhiṣṭhānam || virāḍ īṣāgnī rathamukham indraḥ savyaṣṭhāś candramāḥ sārathiḥ || ito jayeto vi jayasva jaya saṃ jaya svāhā ||
divas pṛthivyā antarikṣāt samudrād agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe | tāṃ cāyitvāmṛtaṃ vasānāṃ hṛdbhiḥ prajāḥ prati nandanti sarvāḥ || Bhatt. ṛgbhiḥ paśyanty asyāś caritaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthaṅ naro bahudhā mīmāṃsamānāḥ | agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ || mahad viśvarūpaṃ payo asyāḥ samudrasyota tvā reta āhuḥ | yata aiti madhukaśā rarāṇā tat prāṇas tad amṛtaṃ niviṣṭam || mātādityānāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ prāṇaḥ prajānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ | hiraṇyavarṇā madhukaśā ghṛtācī mahad bhargaś carati martyeṣu || madhoḥ kaśām ajanayanta devās tasyā garbho abhavad viśvarūpam | taṃ jātaṃ taruṇaṃ piparti mātā sa jāto viśvā bhuvanābhi vaste || kas tau pra veda ka u tau na āha yāv asyā stanau sahasradhārāv akṣitau | ūrjaṃ duhāte anapasphurantau || kas taṃ pra veda ka u taṃ ciketa yo asyā hṛdaḥ kalaśaḥ somadhāno akṣitaḥ | brahmā sumedhāḥ so asmin madeta || hiṅkarikratī bṛhatī vayodhā uccairghoṣābhi yāti yā vratā | trīn gharmān abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ || yām āpīnām upa sīdanty āpo yāṃ śakvarā vṛṣabhā yāṃ svarājaḥ | te varṣanti te varṣayanti Bhatt. te varṣanti te varṣanti tad vide kāmam ūrjam āpaḥ || stanayitnus te vāk prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyām adhi | agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ ||
yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane aśvinor bhavati priyaḥ | evā me aśvinā varca ātmani dhriyatām || yathā somo dvitīyasavana indrāgnyor bhavati priyaḥ | evā ma indrāgnī varcaḥ (…) || yathā somas tṛtīyasavana ṛbhūṇāṃ bhavati priyaḥ | evā ma ṛbhavo varca ātmani dhriyatām || madhu janiṣīya madhu maṃsiṣīya | payasvān agna āgamaṃ taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā || saṃ māgne varcasā sṛja saṃ prajayā sam āyuṣā | vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ || yad giriṣv iti pāñcarcikī || yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhāv adhi | evā me aśvinā balam ojaś ca dhriyatām || yathā makṣā idaṃ madhu nyañjanti kṣaṇāv adhi | evā me aśvinā varcas tejaś ca dhriyatām || aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunāṅktaṃ śubhaspatī | Bhatt. madhumāṅgaṃ, emend. madhu māṅtaṃ yathā varcasvatīṃ vācam ā vadāni janām̐ anu || vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyāṃ divo madhoḥ kaśayā pṛthivīm anakṣi | Bhatt. kaśāyā tāṃ jātāṃ paśava upa jīvanti sarve teno seṣam ūrjaṃ piparti || Bhatt. śeṣam
pṛthivī daṇḍo antarikṣaṃ garbho dyauḥ kaśā vidyut prakaśaḥ | madhoḥ kaśāsi ghṛtācī hiraṇyayo binduḥ || urvy asi prabhvy asy ambho 'si nabho 'si maho 'si | ambho mā kṛṇu nabho māṃ kṛṇu maho mā kṛṇu || samudro 'sy akṣito aparimitaḥ Bhatt. aparimitā sahasrasaniḥ sahasraṃ mā gacchatu | yo vai madhukaśāyāḥ sapta madhūni veda sapta madhumatīn || madhumantaṃ lokaṃ jayati madhv asyāhāryaṃ bhavati | yad vīdhre stanayati prajāpatir eva tat prajābhyaḥ prādur bhavati || tasmāt prācīnopavītas tiṣṭhet prajāpate 'nu mā budhyasveti | anv enaṃ prajāpatir anu prajā budhyante ya evaṃ veda ||
anuvāka 6 ||
yāṃ kalpayanti vahatau vadhūm iva viśvarūpāṃ hastakṛtāṃ cikitsavaḥ | sārād etv apa nudāma enān || śīrṣaṇvatīṃ payasvatīṃ karṇinīṃ kṛtāṃ kṛtyākṛtā saṃbhṛtāṃ viśvarūpām | pratyak prati pra hiṇmasi yaś cakāra tam ṛcchatu || śūdrakṛtā rājakṛtā strīkṛtā brahmabhiḥ kṛtā | jāyā patyā nutteva kartāraṃ bandhum ṛcchatu || anayāham oṣadhyety ekā || kṛtyāḥ santu kṛtyākṛte śapathāḥ śapathīvne | pratyak prati pra hiṇmasi yaś cakāra tam ṛcchatu || pratīcīna āṅgiraso 'dhyakṣo naḥ purohitaḥ | pratīcīḥ kṛtyā ākṛtya- -amuṃ kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi || yas tvovāca parehīti pratikūlam udāyyam | taṃ kṛtye 'bhi ni vartasva māsmān iccho anāgasaḥ || yas te parūṃṣi saṃdadhau rathasyeva vibhur dhiyā | read rathasyeva rbhur dhiyā? taṃ gaccha tatra te +'yanam ajñātas te 'yaṃ janaḥ || Bhatt. teyaṃ ye tvā kṛtyā ālebhire Bhatt. yas tvā kṛtyālebhire vidvalā abhicāriṇaḥ | vidmedaṃ kṛtyādūṣaṇaṃ prativartma punaḥsaraṃ tena tvā snapayāmasi || yad durbhagāṃ prasnapitāṃ Bhatt. praśnapitā mṛtavatsām upeyima | apaitu sarvaṃ mat pāpaṃ draviṇaṃ mopa tiṣṭhatu ||
yat te pitṛbhyo dadato yajñe vā nāma jagṛhuḥ | saṃdeśyāt sarvasmāt pāpād imā muñcantu tvauṣadhīḥ || devainasāt pitryān nāmagrāhāt saṃdeśyād abhiniṣkṛtāt | muñcantu tvā vīrudho vīryeṇa brahmaṇa ṛgbhiḥ payasa ṛṣīṇām || yathā vātaś cyāvayati bhūmyā reṇum antarikṣāc cābhram | evāsmat sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ brahmanuttam apāyati || Bhatt. brahmanuktamupāyati apa krāma nānadatī vinaddhā gardabhīva | kartṝn nakṣasveto nuttā Bhatt. ṛcchasveto brahmaṇā vīryāvatā || ayaṃ panthāpi nayāmi tvā kṛtye prahitāṃ prati tvā pra hiṇmaḥ | tenābhi yāhi bhuñjaty anasvatīva vāhinī viśvarūpā kurūṭinī || parāk te jyotir apathaṃ te arvāg anyatrāsmad ayanā kṛṇuṣva | pareṇehi navatiṃ nāvyā ati durgā srotyā mā kṣaniṣṭhāḥ parehi || vāta iva vṛkṣaṃ ni mṛṇīhi pādaya mā gām aśvaṃ puruṣam uc chiṣa eṣām | kartṝn nivṛtyetaḥ kṛtye aprajāstvāya bodhaya || Bhatt. kṛtyeprajāstvāya yāṃ te cakrur barhiṣi yāṃ śmaśāne kṛtyāṃ kṣetre valagaṃ vā nicakhnuḥ | agnau vā tvā gārhapatye 'bhiceruḥ Bhatt. vāktvā gārhapatyebhiceruḥ pākaṃ santaṃ dhīratarā anāgasaṃ tad ito nāśayāmasi || upāhṛtam anubuddhaṃ nikhātaṃ vairaṃ tsāry anv avidāma kartṝn | Bhatt. tsāryaṃnavidāma tad etu yata āgataṃ tatrāśva iva vartatāṃ hantu kṛtyākṛtaḥ prajām || svāyasā asayaḥ santi no gṛhe Bhatt. svāyasāsayaḥ vidma te kṛtye yatidhā parūṃṣi ||
ut tiṣṭhaiva parehīto ajñāte kim ihecchasi | Bhatt. parehītojñāte grīvās te kṛtye pādau ca- -api kartsyāmi nir drava || indrāgnī asmān rakṣatāṃ yau prajānāṃ prajāpatī | somo rājādhipā mṛḍitā ca- -ṛtasya naḥ patayo mṛḍayantu || bhavāśarvāv asyatāṃ pāpakṛtvane kṛtyākṛte duṣkṛte vidyutaṃ devahetim || yady eyatha dvipadī catuṣpadī kṛtyākṛtā saṃbhṛtā viśvarūpā | seto 'ṣṭāpadī bhūtvā Bhatt. svedoṣṭāpadī punaḥ parehi ducchune || abhyaktāktā svaraṃkṛtā sarvaṃ bharantī duritaṃ parehi | jānīhi kṛtye kartāraṃ duhiteva pitaraṃ svam || parehi kṛtye mā tiṣṭho viddhasyeva padaṃ naya | mṛgaḥ sa mṛgayus tvaṃ Bhatt. mṛgasya … taṃ na tvā nikartum arhati || martyo mṛtyuḥ svayaṃkṛtaṃ yaṃ cakārācittyā | Bhatt. cityā hastābhyām ātmane vadham || uta hanti pūrvāsinaṃ pratyādāyāpara iṣvā | Bhatt. pratyādāyāvarhiṣvā uto pūrvasya nighnato vi hanty aparaḥ prati || Bhatt. avaraḥ etad dhi śṛṇu me vaco athehi yata eyatha | Bhatt. vacothehi yateyatha yas tvā cakāra taṃ punaḥ || anāgohatyaṃ vai bhīmaṃ kṛtye mā no gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ vadhīḥ ||
yatrayatrāsi nihitā tatas tvotthāpayāmasi | parṇāl laghīyasī bhava || yadi stha tamasāvṛtā Bhatt. tamasābhṛtā jālenābhihitā yūyam | Bhatt. jālenābhihatā sarvāḥ saṃlupyetaḥ kṛtyāḥ Bhatt. kṛtyā punaḥ kartre pra hiṇmasi || Bhatt. kṛtye kṛtyākṛtaṃ mūlakṛtam abhiniṣkāriṇaḥ prajām | mṛṇīhi kṛtye moc chiṣo amuṃ kṛtyākṛtaṃ jahi || Bhatt. chiṣomuṃ yathā sūryas tamaso mucyate pari rātriṃ jahāty uṣasaś ca ketūn | evāhaṃ sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ hastīva rajo duritaṃ jahāmi ||
upamitaḥ pratimito 'tho parimitaś ca yāḥ | śālāyā viśvavārāyā naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi || yat te naddhaṃ viśvavāre pāśo granthiś ca yaḥ kṛtaḥ | bṛhaspatir ivāhaṃ balaṃ vācā vi sraṃsayāmi tat || ā yayāma saṃ babarha Bhatt. yāma saṃ vavṛha granthiṃ cakāra te dṛḍham | parūṃṣi vidvāṃ śasteva- -indreṇa vi cṛtāmasi || saṃdaṃśānāṃ paladānāṃ pariṣvañjalyasya ca | Bhatt. paruṣyaṃjalyasya sarvā mānasya patnyā te naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi || vaṃśānāṃ te nahanāni prāṇāhasya tṛṇasya ca | pakṣāṇāṃ viśvavāre te naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi || yāni te antaḥ śikyāny ābedhū raṇyāya kam | pra te tāni vi cṛtāmasi Bhatt. cetāni śivā mānasya patni na uddhitā tanve bhava || havirdhānam agniśālaṃ patnīnāṃ sadanaṃ sadaḥ | sado devānām asi devi śāle || akṣum opaśaṃ vitataṃ sahasrākṣaṃ viṣūvati | apinaddham abhihitaṃ brahmaṇā vi cṛtāmasi || yaś ca tvā prati gṛhṇāti yena cāsi mitā tvam | ubhau mānasya patni tau jīvatāṃ jaradaṣṭī || amutrainam ā gacchatād Bhatt. gacchatāṃ dṛḍhā naddhā pariṣkṛtā | tasyās te vi cṛtāmasy aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparuḥ ||
agnim antaś chādayasi puruṣān paśubhiḥ saha | vijāvati prajāvati vi te pāśāṃś cṛtāmasi || ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī pṛthivyāṃ nimitā mitā | viśvānnaṃ bibhratī śālā mā hiṃsīḥ pratigṛhṇataḥ || yas tvā pūrvo nimimāya saṃjabhāra vanaspatīn | prajāyai cakre tvā śāle parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ || namas tasmai namo dātre śālāpataye ca kṛṇmasi | namo 'gnaye pracarate Bhatt. namognaye puruṣāya ca te namaḥ || gobhyo aśvebhyo namo yac chālāyāṃ vijāyate | antarā dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca yad vyacas tena śālāṃ prati gṛhṇāmi ta imām || yad antarikṣaṃ rajaso vimānaṃ tat kṛṇva udaraṃ śevadhibhyaḥ | yac chālāṃ prati gṛṇāmi tasmai || tṛṇair āvṛtā paladān vasānā rātrīva śālā jagato niveśanī | mitā pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhati hastinīva padvatī || yā dvipakṣā catuṣpakṣā ṣaṭpakṣā yā nimīyate | aṣṭāpakṣāṃ daśapakṣāṃ śālāṃ mānasya patnīm agnir garbha ivā śaye || iṭasya te vi cṛtāmy apinaddham aporṇuvan | Bhatt. aporṇuvaṃ varuṇena samubjitāṃ mitraḥ prātar vy ubjatu || kulāye 'dhi kulāyāṃ Bhatt. kulāyedhi kośe kośaḥ samubjitaḥ | tatra marto vi jāyate yasmād viśvaṃ prajāyate ||
catuḥsraktiṃ paricakrāṃ kavibhir nimitāṃ mitām | indrāgnī rakṣataḥ śālām amṛtau somyaṃ sadaḥ || Bhatt. saumyau ṣadaḥ mā naḥ pāśān prati muco gurur bhāro laghur bhava | vadhūm iva tvā śāle yatrakāmaṃ bharāmasi || imā āpaḥ pra harāmy ayakṣmā yakṣmanāśanīḥ | gṛhān abhi pra sīdāmy amṛtena sahāgninā || pratīcīṃ tvā pratīcīnaḥ śāle praimy ahiṃsatīm | agnir hy antar āpaś ca- -ṛtasya prathamobhā || svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ prācyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne || svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyo dakṣiṇasyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne || svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyaḥ pratīcyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne || svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhya udīcyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne || svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyo dhruvāyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne || svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhya ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne || svāhā devebhyaḥ svāhyebhyo diśodiśaḥ śālāyā namo mahimne ||
anuvāka 7 ||
arātīyor bhrātṛvyasya durhārdo dviṣataḥ śiraḥ | pra vṛścāmīdam ojasā || varma mahyam ayaṃ maṇiḥ phālāj jātaḥ kariṣyati | tṛpto manthena māgamad rasena saha varcasā || yat tvā śikvaḥ parāvadhīt takṣā hastena vāsyā | Bhatt. vāsyāḥ āpas tvā tasmāj jīvalāḥ punantu śucayaḥ śucim || hiraṇyasrag ayaṃ maṇir duhāno vasv akṣitam | śraddhāṃ yajñaṃ maho dadhad gṛhe vasatu no 'tithiḥ || [Bhatt. notithiḥ tasmai ghṛtaṃ surāṃ madhv annam annaṃ kṣadāmahe | Bhatt. kṣudhāmahe sa naḥ piteva putrebhyaḥ śreyaḥśreyaś cikitsatu devebhyo maṇir etya || yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugraṃ khadiram ojase | tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi || tam agniḥ praty amuñcata- -ājyāya rasāya kaṃ so asmā ājyaṃ duhe | bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi || yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir maṇiṃ phālaṃ ghṛtaścutam ugraṃ khadiram ojase | tena tvaṃ dviṣato (…) || see 7e tam indraḥ praty amuñcata- -ojase vīryāya kaṃ so asmai balam id duhe | (…) || taṃ sūryaḥ praty amuñcata tenemā ajayad diśaḥ so asmai varca id duhe | (…) ||
taṃ somaḥ praty amuñcata draviṇāya rasāya kam | so asmai maha id duhe (…) || taṃ bibhrac candramā maṇim asurāṇāṃ puro 'jayad Bhatt. purojayad dānavānāṃ hiraṇyayīḥ so asmai teja id duhe (…) || taṃ rājā varuṇo maṇiṃ praty amuñcata śaṃbhuvaṃ so asmai rājyaṃ duhe (…) || taṃ tvaṣṭā praty amuñcata prajābhyo vīryāya kaṃ so asmai rūpam id duhe (…) || taṃ bibhrat savitā maṇiṃ tenedam ajayat svaḥ so asmai sūnṛtāṃ duhe (…) || tam āpo bibhratīr maṇiṃ sadā dhāvanty akṣitāḥ sa ābhyo amṛtaṃ duhe (…) || tenemāṃ maṇinā kṛṣim aśvināv abhi rakṣataḥ sa bhiṣagbhyāṃ payo duhe (…) || yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir vātāya maṇim āśave Bhatt. maṇināśave so asmai vācam id duhe (…) || taṃ devā bibhrato maṇiṃ sarvām̐l lokān yudhājayan Bhatt. sarvāṃ sa ebhyo jitam id duhe (…) || tam imaṃ devatā maṇiṃ tubhyaṃ dadhatu bhartave sa u te bhūtim id duhām | bhūyobhūyaḥ śvaḥśvas tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi ||
antardeśā abadhnata pradiśas tam abadhnata | prajāpatisṛṣṭo maṇir dviṣato me adharām̐ akaḥ || ṛtavas tam abadhnata- -ārtavās tam abadhnata | saṃvatsaras taṃ baddhvā sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ vi rājati || atharvāṇo abadhnata- -ātharvāṇā abadhnata | aṅgirasas taṃ baddhvā Bhatt. vaddhvā dasyūnāṃ bibidhuḥ puraḥ || Bhatt. vividhuḥ taṃ dhātā praty amuñcata sa bhūtāny akalpayat | tena tvaṃ dviṣato jahi || yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir devebhyo asurakṣitim | sa tvāyaṃ maṇir āgamat saha gobhir ajāvibhir annena prajayā saha || (…) | see 5ab (…) āgaman see 5c; Bhatt. agaman madhor ghṛtasya dhārayā kilālena śriyā saha || yam abadhnād bṛhaspatir devebhyo asurakṣitim | sa tvāyaṃ maṇir āgamad ojasā tejasā sahasā bhūtyā draviṇena śriyā saha || yasya lokā ime trayaḥ payo dugdham upāsate | sa tvāyam abhi rakṣatu maṇiḥ śraiṣṭhyāya mūrdhataḥ || sa tvāyaṃ śatadakṣiṇo maṇiḥ śraiṣṭhyāya jinvatu | Bhatt. maṇi(ḥ) yaṃ devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā upajīvanti sarvadā || yasmai tvā yajñavardhana maṇe pratyamucaṃ śivam | taṃ tvaṃ śatadakṣiṇa maṇe śraiṣṭhyāya jinvatāt ||
asapatnaḥ sapatnahā sapatnān me adharām̐ akaḥ | uttaraṃ dviṣatas tvā maṇiḥ kṛṇotu devajāḥ || maṇiṃ sahasravīryaṃ brahmaṇā tejasā saha prati muñcāmi te śivam | sa tvāyam abhi rohatu devaiḥ phālamaṇiḥ saha || yathā bījam urvarāyāṃ kṛṣṭe phālena rohati | evāsmin prajā paśavo annamannaṃ vi rohatu || etam idhmaṃ samābhṛtaṃ juṣāṇo agne prati harya homam | tasmin videma sumatiṃ svasti cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ paśūn jātavedasi brahmaṇā ||
kṣā cāsi kṣamā cāsi tasyās te bhūtaṃ ca subhūtaṃ ceti mukhe | tābhyāṃ te vidheyaṃ tābhyāṃ te namas tābhyāṃ no mṛḍa tābhyāṃ no 'dhi brūhi tābhyāṃ no 'bhi jighra | māteva putraṃ piteva sūnum ayaṃ te asmi taṃ mā mumugdhi grāhyā Bhatt. tanmā bandhebhyo vimadaṃ nayemam || bhūmiś cāsi bhūtiś cāsi tasyās te bhuvanaṃ ca subhūtiś ca (…) || pṛthvī cāsi pṛthivī cāsi tasyās te bhaviṣyac cābhaviṣyac ca (…) || kṣemyā cāsi kṣitiś cāsi tasyās te kaṃ ca nākaṃ ca (…) || dṛḍhā cāsi śithirā cāsi tasyās te svaś ca svargaś ca (…) || amitiś cāsi nirṛtiś cāsi tasyās te mitraṃ ca maitraṃ ca (…) || śitipṛṣṭhā cāsi vidhūnvānā cāsi tasyās te vindac ca vindamānaṃ ca (…) || Bhatt. vindaṃ suhitā cāsi suhitiś cāsi tasyās te vittiś ca suvittiś ca (…) || vapsā cāsi vapsatī cāsi tasyās te suvac ca prasuvac ca (…) || apsarāś cāsi sadānvā cāsi Bhatt. psāruś … sadānvānā tasyās te svaṃ ca svāvaṃ ca (…) ||
pṛśniś cāsi pṛṣatī cāsi tasyās te yacchac ca prayacchac ca (…) || viśvabhṛc cāsi viśvarūpā cāsi tasyās te dadac ca pradadac ca (…) || girantī cāsi garargṛc cāsi tasyās te vṛndaṃ ca saṃvṛndānaṃ ca (…) || gurvī cāsi gurubhṛc cāsi tasyās te dohaś ca duhānaṃ ca (…) || ditiś cāsy aditiś cāsi tasyās te payaś ca payasvac ca (…) || jūrṇā cāsi jarantī cāsi tasyās te dakṣaś ca dakṣamāṇaṃ ca (…) || pratiṣṭhā cāsi pratiṣṭhatī cāsi tasyās ta ojaś ca tejaś ca (…) || lokinī cāsi lokakṛc cāsi tasyās te śravaś ca sravasyuś ca (…) || urvī cāsi prabhavī cāsi Bhatt. suggests to emend prabharvī tasyās te kurvac ca saṃskurvāṇaṃ ca (…) || nīcī cāsy uttānā cāsi tasyās te rohac ca virohac ca (…) ||
rohiṇī cāsi surohiṇī cāsi tasyās te 'nnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca (…) || sarā cāsi sarasvatī cāsi tasyās te brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca (…) || vasubhṛc cāsi vasumatī cāsi tasyās te sūnṛtā cerā ca (…) || mahaś cāsi mahasvatī cāsi tasyās te kāmaś ca tṛptiś ca (…) || sarvā cāsi sarvaṃ ca ta idaṃ tasyās te viśvaṃ ca viśve ca devā iti mukhe | tābhyāṃ te vidheyaṃ tābhyāṃ te namas tābhyāṃ no mṛḍa tābhyāṃ no 'dhi brūhi tābhyāṃ no 'bhi jighra | māteva putraṃ piteva sūnum ayaṃ te asmi taṃ mā mumugdhi grāhyā bandhebhyo vimadan nayemam ||
anuvāka 8 ||
yad devā devaheḍanaṃ devāsaś cakṛmā vayam | ādityās tasmān no yūyam ṛtasyartena muñcata || ṛtasyārtenādityā yajatrā muñcateha naḥ | yajñaṃ yad yajñavāhasaḥ śikṣanta upārima || medasvatā yajamānāḥ srucājyena juhvataḥ | akāmā viśve vo devāḥ śikṣanto nopa śekima || yad vidvāṃso yad avidvāṃsa enāṃsi cakṛmā vayam | [Bhatt. enāya tasmān na iha muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ || yadi jāgrad yadi svapann ena enasyo 'karam | Bhatt. svapannayanenasyokaram bhūtaṃ mā tasmād bhavyaṃ ca drupadād iva muñcatām || drupadād iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātvā malād iva | pūtaṃ pavitreṇājyaṃ viśvān muñcantu mainasaḥ || yad yāmaṃ cakrur nikhananto agre kārṣīvaṇā na vido na vidyayā | vaivasvate rājani taj juhomy Bhatt. taṃ adhā yajñiyaṃ madhuman no astu || Bhatt. yajñaṃ vaivasvataḥ kṛṇavad bheṣajāni madhubhāgo madhunā saṃ sṛjāti | mātur yad ena iṣitaṃ na āgan yad vā pitāparāddho jihīḍe || yadīdaṃ mātur yadi vā pitur no bhrātuḥ putrād reṣata ena āgan | Bhatt. retasa yāvanto asyāḥ pitaraḥ sacante teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śivo astu manyuḥ || apamityam apratītaṃ yad asmi yamasya yena balinā carāmi | idaṃ tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi jīvann enaḥ prati dadāmi sarvam || Bhatt. ena(ḥ)
