ihaiva santaḥ prati dadhma etaj jīvā jīvebhyo ni harāma enat | apamitya dhānyaṃ yaj jaghāsa- -agnir mā tasmād anṛṇaṃ kṛṇotu || anṛṇā asminn anṛṇāḥ parasmin tṛtīye nāke anṛṇāḥ syāma | ye devayānā uta pitṛyāṇāḥ sarvān patho anṛṇāḥ kṣayema || yad dhastābhyāṃ cakṛmā kilbiṣam akṣam aktum upalipsamānāḥ | ugraṃpaśye ugrajitau tad adya- -apsarasām anu dattām ṛṇaṃ naḥ || ugraṃpaśye rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ kilbiṣaṃ yad akṣavṛttam anu dattaṃ nas tat | ṛṇān no na ṛṇam ertsamāno Bhatt. ṛṇān no narṇāyurecchamāno yamasya loke adhirajjur āyat || Bhatt. adhijarāyat yasmā ṛṇaṃ yasya jāyām upaimi yaṃ yācamāno abhyaimi devāḥ | te vācaṃ vādiṣur mottarāṃ Bhatt. pābhiṣur; proposes pāviṣur mad devapatnī apsarasāv adhītam || Bhatt. madhyevapatnī yad adīvyann aham ṛṇaṃ kṛṇomy adāsyann agna uta saṃgṛṇāmi | vaiśvānaro adhipā no vasiṣṭha ud in nayāti sukṛtasya lokam || vaiśvānaraḥ pāvayā naḥ pavitrair yat saṃgaram abhidhāvāmy āśām | anājānan manasā yācamāno yat tatraino apa tat suvāmi || vaiśvānarāya prati vedayāma etad yad gṛṇaṃ saṃgaro devatāsu | sa etān pāśān vicṛtaṃ pra veda- -atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema || yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yan mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jihiṃsima | Bhatt. proposes jihiṃsa agnir mā tasmād enaso gārhapatyaḥ pra muñcatu || bhūmir mātāditir no janitraṃ bhrātāntarikṣam abhiśastyā naḥ | dyaur naḥ pitā pitryāc chaṃ bhavāti Bhatt. pitryāt saṃ jāmim ṛtvā māva patsi lokāt ||
yatrā suhārdaḥ sukṛto madanti vihāya rogaṃ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ | aśloṇā aṅgair ahrutāḥ svarge Bhatt. aśloṇāṅgairahṛtāḥ+ atrā paśyema pitarau ca putrān || Bhatt. 'trā viṣāṇā pāśām̐ adhi vi ṣyatu tvad Bhatt. tvata ya uttamā adhamā vāruṇā ye | yad dāruṇā badhyase yac ca rajjvā yad bhūmyāṃ badhyase yac ca vācā || udagātāṃ bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake | prehāmṛtasya yacchatāṃ pra yad baddhakamocanam || Bhatt. vaddhakamocanam vi jihīṣva lokaṃ kṛṇu baddhān muñcāsi baddhakam | Bhatt. pathā yonyā iva pracyuto garbhaḥ pathaḥ sarvām̐ anu kṣayā || taṃ prajānan prati gṛhṇātu vidvān prajāpatiḥ prathamajā ṛtasya | asmābhir dattaṃ jarasaḥ parastād acchinnaṃ tantum anu saṃ carema || tataṃ tantum anv eke caranti yeṣāṃ dattam ayanaṃ pitryeṇa | abandhv eke dadataḥ pra yacchān dātuṃ cec chikṣān sa svarga eṣām || anvārabhethām anusaṃrabhethām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante | yad vāṃ pūrtaṃ praviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye dampatī saṃ śrayethām || devāḥ pitaraḥ pitaro devā | yo 'smi so 'smi so 'yam asmi || sa pacāmi sa yajāmi sa yajate 'sya | śaṃ ma iṣṭam astu śunaṃ śāntaṃ Bhatt. śvamaya iṣṭam; the emend. is also Bhatt.'s śivaṃ kṛtaṃ tasmān mā yavam || nāke rājan prati tiṣṭha tatraitat prati tiṣṭhatu | viddhi pūrtasya no rājan sa deva sumanā bhava ||
apāsmād brāhmaṇīsandhām apadhārān ni dadhmasi | indrāgnī naḥ savedasāv arṇavād adhi muñcatām || namas te brāhmaṇīsandhe parehi yata eyatha yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ te pra suvāmi tam adhi pra sūtāḥ || Bhatt. prasūtā apāraṃ tvāhur arṇavam anināyāṃ na ye viduḥ | Bhatt. anināyāṃ; read aniryājyaṃ? yas te vedodaram āsyaṃ mahat sākṣād veda mukhaṃ tava niyājaṃ tava te viduḥ || indreṇa kl̥ptā yonir narako asyāḥ kulāyam | mahān samudro rajaso vimānaḥ svarge loke api naḥ kṛṇotu ||
tasyaudanasya bṛhaspatiḥ śiro brahma mukhaṃ sūryācandramasāv akṣyau bṛhadrathantare śrotre | agnir āsyaṃ vidyuj jihvā maruto dantāḥ pavamānaḥ prāṇaḥ || oṣadhayo lomāni vanaspatayaḥ keśāḥ samudro mūtram aśvinā prapade | caruṃ pañcabilam ukhaṃ gharmam abhīndhe || cakṣur musalaṃ kāma ulūkhalaṃ ditiḥ śūrpam aditiḥ śūrpagrāhī vāto apāvinak | Bhatt. apāvinat gāvas taṇḍulā aśvāḥ kaṇā maśakās tuṣāḥ kabru phalīkaraṇāḥ śyāmam ayo lohitam ayo 'sya māṃsam || trapu bhasmārjunam asthīni Bhatt. tripu haritaṃ varṇaḥ puṣkalaṃ gandhaḥ | khalaḥ pātram uṣṭārau bāhū sphyāv aṃsau gudā varatrā īṣānūkyaṃ yugāni jatravaḥ || ṛtaṃ hastābhiṣecanaṃ kulyopasecanam ārtavāḥ paktāro agniḥ prāśītā brāhmaṇaḥ pratigrahītā ||
tasyaudanasya bhūmiḥ kumbhī dyaur apidhānaṃ śiro 'bhram ūṣmā nīhāro bṛhad āyavanaṃ rathantaraṃ darviḥ | diśaḥ pārśve sītāḥ parśavaḥ sikatā ūbadhyaṃ Bhatt. siktā ubhadyaṃ palalam upastaraṇam ahorātre vikramaṇe odanasya || varṣaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ marutaḥ paryaindhata kiṣkaravaḥ paridhayaḥ | ṛcā kumbhy adhidhīyata ārtvijyena preṣyate brahmaṇā prati gṛhyate || Bhatt. adhidhīhitārtvijyena; the emendation is based on Bhatt.'s proposal ya etasyaudanasyaivaṃ mahimānaṃ vidyāt | nālpa iti brūyān nānupasecana iti nedaṃ ca kiṃ ceti || yāvad dātābhimanasyet taṃ nātivadet | odanena yajñavacaḥ sarve lokāḥ samāpyāḥ || yasmin samudro dyaur bhūmis trayo 'varaparaṃ śritāḥ ||
brahmavādino vadanti pratyañcam odanaṃ prāśīḥ parāñcāṃ Bhatt. parāñcā tvam odanaṃ prāśīs tvām odanā iti | kasyainaṃ śīrṣṇā prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ mukhena prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainam akṣībhyāṃ prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ śrotrābhyāṃ prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainam āsyena prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ jihvayā prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ dantaiḥ prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ prāṇaiḥ prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainam urasā prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ vyacasā prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ pṛṣṭhena prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainam udareṇa prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ vastinā prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainam ūrubhyāṃ prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainam aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyainaṃ padbhyāṃ prāśīḥ || (…) | see 1abc kasyām enaṃ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ prāśīḥ || brahmavādino vadanti pratyañcam odanaṃ prāśīḥ parāñcāṃ Bhatt. parāñcā tvam odanaṃ prāśīs tvām odanā iti | kasyainaṃ hastābhyāṃ prāśīḥ ||
tataś cainam anyena śīrṣṇā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | śiras te vi patiṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyena mukhena prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | śiras te vi hvariṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyābhyām akṣībhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | andho bhaviṣyasīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | badhiro bhaviṣyasīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyenāsyena prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | vāk te 'pa kramiṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyayā jihvayā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | jihvā te pūrvā mariṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyair dantaiḥ prāśīr yair etam agre prāśnan | dantās te śatsyantīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyaiḥ prāṇaiḥ prāśīr yair etam agre prāśnan | prāṇas tvā hāsyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyenorasā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | kṛṣyā na rātsyasīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyena vyacasā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | rājayakṣmas tvā haniṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyena pṛṣṭhena prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | vidyut tvā haniṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyenodareṇa prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan varuṇas tvā haniṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyena vastinā prāśīr yenaitam agre prāśnan | apsu mariṣyasīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyābhyām ūrubhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | ūrū te 'va patsyete ity enam āha || Bhatt. patvete tataś cainam anyābhyām aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | Bhatt. (error?) yenaitam srāmo bhaviṣyasīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyābhyāṃ padbhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | sarpas tvā haniṣyatīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyasyāṃ pratiṣṭhayāṃ prāśīr yasyām etam agre prāśnan | apratiṣṭhāno bhaviṣyasīty enam āha || tataś cainam anyābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyām etam agre prāśnan | brāhmaṇaṃ haniṣyasīty enam āha ||
tam ahaṃ na pratyañcaṃ na parāñcaṃ nāham odanaṃ na mām odanaḥ | odana evaudanaṃ prāśīd bṛhaspatinā śīrṣṇā || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd brahmaṇā mukhena || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīt sūryācandramasābhyām akṣībhyām || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd bṛhadrathantarābhyāṃ śrotrābhyām || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd agner āsyena || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd vidyutā jihvayā || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīn marudbhir dantaiḥ || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīt saptaṛṣibhiḥ prāṇaiḥ || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīt pṛthivyorasā || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd antarikṣeṇa vyacasā || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd divā pṛṣṭhena || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd varuṇasyodareṇa || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīt samudreṇa vastinā || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīn mitrāvaruṇayor ūrubhyām || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd ṛtasyāṣṭhīvadbhyām || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīt savituḥ padbhyām || (…) see 1abc (…) prāśīd asyāṃ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ prāśīt || tam ahaṃ na pratyañcaṃ na parāñcaṃ nāham odanaṃ na mām odanaḥ | odana evaudanaṃ prāśīt satyasya hastābhyām || ta enaṃ prāśiṣus ta enam ārūruhan ta enam ajīgaman | ārūruhan emend. Bhatt. etasmād vai lokā lokāṃs trayastriṃśataṃ prajāpatir nirmimīta || Bhatt. nimimīta; the emendation is his tasya guptaye yajñān asṛjanta devāḥ | ye trayastriṃśat prajāpatisṛṣṭāḥ puṇyalokāḥ | te 'sya sarve 'bhijitā avaruddhā bhavanti ya evaṃ veda ||
eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvātmā sarvaparuḥ sarvapāt sarvapṛṣṭhaḥ | sarvāṅgaḥ sarvātmā sarvaparuḥ sarvapāt sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati ya evaṃ veda || ya evaṃ viduṣa upadraṣṭā bhavaty upadraṣṭā prāṇaṃ ruṇaddhi | na ca prāṇaṃ ruṇaddhy atha sarvasvaṃ jīyate || Bhatt. aca na ca sarvasvaṃ jīyate 'thainam āhāpratiṣṭhāno 'nāyatano mariṣyasīti | apratiṣṭhāna evānāyatano mriyate ya evaṃ viduṣa upadraṣṭā bhavati ||
anuvāka 9 ||
kena pārṣṇī ābhṛte pūruṣasya kena māṃsaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ kena gulphau | kenāṅgulīḥ peśinīḥ kena khāni kenocchṛṅkhau madhyataḥ kaḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ || kasmān nu gulphāv adharāv akṛṇvann aṣṭhīvantā uttarau pūruṣasya | nirṛtya jaṅghe ni dadhuḥ kva svij Bhatt. nirhṛtya jānunoḥ sandhī ka imau jajāna || catuṣṭayaṃ yujyate saṃhitāntaṃ jānubhyām ūrdhvaṃ śithiraṃ kabandham | śroṇī yad ūru ka u taj jajāna Bhatt. uru yābhyāṃ kusindhaṃ sudhṛtaṃ babhūva || kati devāḥ katame ta āsan ya uraś cikyur agriyaṃ pūruṣasya | kati stanau ni dadhuḥ kaḥ kaphoḍau kati skandhān kati pṛṣṭīr acinvan || ko asya bāhū sam abharad vīryaṃ kṛṇavād iti | aṃsau ko asya tad devaḥ kusindha ā dadhād adhi || Bhatt. kasindha mastiṣkam asya yatamo lalāṭaṃ kṛkāṭikāṃ prathamo yaḥ kapālam | citvā cityaṃ puruṣasya hanvor Bhatt. hanor divaṃ ruroha katamaḥ sa devaḥ || kaḥ sapta khāni vi tatarda śīrṣṇi Bhatt. śīrṣāṇi karṇāv imāv akṣaṇī nāsike mukham | yeṣāṃ purutrā vijayasya mahmani Bhatt. madmani catuṣpādo dvipādo yanti yāmam || hanvor hi jihvām adadhāt purūcīm adhā mahīm adhi śiśrāya vācam | sa ā varīvarti mahinā vyomann apo vasānaḥ ka u cit pra veda || mūrdhānam asya saṃsīvya- -atharvā hṛdayaṃ ca yat | mastiṣkād ūrdhvaṃ prairayat pavamāno 'dhi śīrṣṇaḥ || tad vā atharvaṇaḥ śiro devakośaḥ samubjitaḥ | tat prāṇo abhi rakṣatu śriyam annam atho manaḥ ||
priyāpriyāṇi bahulā svapnaṃ saṃbādhatandryaḥ | ānandam ugro nandāṃś ca tān ud vahati pūruṣaḥ || ārtir avartir nirṛtiḥ Bhatt. avarti kuto nu puruṣe 'matiḥ | rāddhiḥ samṛddhir avyṛddhir Bhatt. advṛddhir matir uditayaḥ kutaḥ || ko asminn āpo adadhād viṣūvṛtaḥ purūcyutaḥ sindhusṛtyāya jātāḥ | tīvrāruṇā lohinīs tāmradhūmrā ūrdhvā avācīḥ puruṣe tiraścīḥ || ko asmin prāṇam adadhāt ko apānaṃ vyānam u | samānam asmin ko devo 'dhi śiśrāya pūruṣe || ko asmin rūpam adadhāt ko mahmānaṃ ca nāma ca | gātuṃ ko asmin kaḥ ketuṃ kaś caritrāṇi pūruṣe || ko asmin reto adadhāt tantur ā tāyatām iti | medhāṃ ko asminn adhy auhat ko bāṇaṃ ko nṛto dadhau || ko vāsasā pary adadhāt ko asyāyur akalpayat | balaṃ ko asmai prāyacchat ko asyākalpayaj javam || ko asmin yajñam adadhād eko agre adhi pūruṣe | ko asmin satyaṃ ko 'nṛtaṃ ko mṛtyuṃ ko 'mṛtaṃ dadhau kenāpo anv atanuta kenāhar akṛṇod ruce | uṣasaṃ kenānvaindha kena sāyaṃbhavaṃ dade || kenemāṃ bhūmim aurṇot kena pary abhavad divam | kenābhi mahnā parvatān kena karmāṇi pūruṣaḥ ||
kena devām̐ anu kṣiyati Bhatt. kṣati kena daivīr ajanayad diśaḥ | kenedam anyan nakṣatraṃ Bhatt. anyaṃ kena sat kṣatram ucyate || kena parjanyam āpnoti kena somaṃ vicakṣaṇam | kenemam agniṃ puruṣaḥ kena saṃvatsaraṃ mame || keneyaṃ bhūmir nihitā kena dyaur uttarā hitā | kenedam ūrdhvaṃ tiryak ca- -antarikṣaṃ vyaco hitam || brahmaṇā bhūmir nihitā brahma dyām uttarāṃ dadhau | brahmedam ūrdhvaṃ tiryak ca- -antarikṣaṃ vyaco hitam || kena śrotriyam āpnoti kenemaṃ parameṣṭhinam | kena yajñaś ca śraddhā ca kenāsmin nihitaṃ manaḥ || brahma śrotriyam āpnoti brahmemaṃ parameṣṭhinam | brahma yajñaś ca śraddhā ca brahmāsmin nihitaṃ manaḥ || ka idam asthy asṛjata ka idaṃ māṃsaṃ sam abharat | ka imāṃ tvacaṃ ca loma ca ka idaṃ rūpaṃ sam airayat || brahmāsthy asṛjata brahma māṃsaṃ sam abharat | brahma tvacaṃ ca loma ca brahma rūpaṃ sam airayat || ka idaṃ cakṣur asṛjata kaḥ prāṇaṃ kheṣv āvayat | Bhatt. āmayat ka idaṃ manaś ca vācaṃ ca ka imāṃ sam abharat puram || brahma cakṣur asṛjata brahma khe prāṇam āvayat | brahma manaś ca vācaṃ ca brahma sam abharat puram ||
nainaṃ cakṣur jahāti na prāṇo jarasaḥ puraḥ | puraṃ yo brahmaṇo veda yasmāt puruṣa ucyate || yo vai tāṃ brahmaṇo veda- -amṛtenāvṛtāṃ puram | Bhatt. āmṛtāṃ tasmai brahma ca brāhmyāś ca- -āyuṣ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ daduḥ || aṣṭācakrā navadvārā devāṇāṃ pūr ayodhyā | tasyāṃ hiraṇyayaḥ kośaḥ svargo jyotiṣāvṛtaḥ || tasmin hiraṇyaye kośe tryare tripratiṣṭhite | Bhatt. triyare tasmin yad antar ātmanvat tad vai brahmavido viduḥ || prabhrājamānāṃ hariṇīṃ yaśasā saṃparīvṛtām | puraṃ hiraṇmayīṃ brahmā viveśāparājitām ||
ayaṃ te varaṇo maṇiḥ Bhatt. varuṇo sapatnakṣayaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ | tenā rabhasva tvaṃ śatrūn pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ || aināñ chṛṇīhi pra mṛṇā rabhasva maṇis te astu puraetā purastāt | avārayanta varaṇena devā Bhatt. varuṇena abhyācāram asurāṇāṃ śvaḥśvaḥ || Bhatt. svaryat ā tvārakṣad varaṇo viśvabheṣajaḥ Bhatt. varuṇo sahasrākṣo harito hiraṇyayaḥ | yas te śatrūn adharān pātayāsi pūrvas tān dabhnuhi ya u tvā dviṣanti || ayaṃ te kṛtyāṃ vitatāṃ pauruṣeyam ayaṃ vadham | ayaṃ te sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ varaṇo vārayiṣyate || Bhatt. varuṇo varaṇo vārayātā Bhatt. varuṇo idaṃ devo vanaspatiḥ | yakṣmaḥ praviṣṭo yo 'smin tam u devā avīvaran || svapnaṃ suptvā yadi paśyāsi pāpaṃ mṛgaḥ sṛtiṃ yati dhāvād ajuṣṭām | Bhatt. śṛti … dhāyāyaduṣṭam parikṣavāc chakuneḥ pāpavādād ayaṃ maṇir varaṇo vārayātai || Bhatt. varuṇo arātyā mā nirṛtyā abhicārād atho bhayāt | mṛtyor ojīyaso vadhāt tvaṃ varaṇa vāraya || Bhatt. varuṇa varaṇena pravyathitā Bhatt. varuṇena bhrātṛvyā me sabandhavaḥ | asūrtaṃ rajo 'py agus Bhatt. asūrtāṃ te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ || yan me mātā yan me pitā bhrātaro yac ca me svā yad enaś cakṛmā vayam | tasmān no vārayiṣyate 'yaṃ devo vanaspatiḥ || ariṣṭo 'ham ariṣṭagur āyuṣmān sarvapūruṣaḥ | taṃ māyaṃ varaṇo maṇiḥ Bhatt. varuṇo pari pātu diśodiśaḥ ||
ayaṃ me varaṇa urasi Bhatt. varuṇa rājā devo vanaspatiḥ | sa me kṣatraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca paśūn ojaś ca me dadhat || imaṃ bibharmi varaṇam Bhatt. varuṇaṃ āyuṣmāñ chataśāradaḥ | āyuṣmāṃ sa me śatrūn vi bādhatām indro dasyūn ivāsurān || yathā vāto vanaspatīn jīrṇān bhanakty ojasā | evā sapatnāṃs tvaṃ bhaṅdhi pūrvāñ jātān utāparān Bhatt. pūrvāṃ varaṇas tvābhi rakṣatu || Bhatt. varuṇas yathā vātena prakṣīṇā vṛkṣāḥ śere nyarpitāḥ | (evā sapatnāṃs) tvaṃ sarvān pra kṣiṇīhi nyarpaya pūrvāñ jātān utāparān varaṇas (tvābhi rakṣatu) || Bhatt. varuṇas yathā vātaś cāgniś ca sarvān psāto vanaspatīn | evā sapatnāṃs tvaṃ psāhi pūrvāñ jātān utāparān varaṇas tvābhi rakṣatu || Bhatt. varuṇas tāṃs tvaṃ pra chindhi varaṇa Bhatt. varuṇa purā diṣṭāt purāyuṣaḥ | ya imaṃ paśuṣu dipsanti ye cāsya rāṣṭradipsavaḥ || yathā sūryo atibhāti yathāsmin teja āhitam | evā sapatnāṃs tvaṃ sarvān ati bhāhi śvaḥśvo varaṇas tvābhi rakṣatu || Bhatt. varuṇas yathā yaśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yathāsmiñ jātavedasi | evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ Bhatt. varuṇo kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yacchatu tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mām || yathā yaśo agnihotre vaṣaṭkāre yathā yaśaḥ | (…) || see 8cdef yathā yaśaḥ somapīthe madhuparke yathā yaśaḥ | (…) || see 8cdef
yathā yaśaḥ kanyāyāṃ yathāsmin saṃbhṛte rathe | (…) || see 16.64.8cdef yathā yaśaś candramasy āditye ca nṛcakṣasi | (…) || see 16.64.8cdef yathā yaśaḥ prajāpatau yathāsmin parameṣṭhini | (…) || see 16.64.8cdef yathā deveṣv amṛtaṃ yathaiṣu satyam āhitam | evā me varaṇo maṇiḥ Bhatt. varuṇo kīrtiṃ bhūtiṃ ni yacchatu tejasā mā sam ukṣatu yaśasā sam anaktu mām ||
anuvāka 10 ||
asya vāmasya palitasya hotus tasya bhrātā madhyamo asty aśnaḥ | tṛtīyo bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣṭho asya- -atrāpaśyaṃ viśpatiṃ saptaputram || sapta yuñjanti ratham ekacakram eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā | trinābhi cakram ajaram anarvaṃ yasminn imā viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ || imā ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ saptacakraṃ sapta vahanty aśvāḥ | sapta svāsaro abhi saṃ navanta yatra gavāṃ nihitā sapta nāmā || ko dadarśa prathamaṃ jāyamānam asthanvantaṃ yad anasthā bibharti | bhūmyā asur asṛg ātmā kva svit ko vidvāṃsam upa gāt praṣṭum etat || pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasāvijānan devānām enā nihitā padāni | vatse baṣkaye 'dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavaya otavā u || acikitvāṃś cikituṣaś cid atra kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān | vi yas tastambha ṣaḍ imā rajāṃsy ajasya rūpe kim api svid ekam || iha bravītu ya īm aṅga veda- -asya vāmasya nihitaṃ padaṃ veḥ | śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīraṃ duhrate gāvo asya vavriṃ vasānā udakaṃ padāpuḥ || mātā pitaram ṛta ā babhāja dhīty agre manasā saṃ hi jagme | sā bībhatsur garbharasā nividdhā namasvanta id upavākam īyuḥ || yuktā mātāsīd dhuri dakṣiṇāyā atiṣṭhad garbho vṛjanīṣv antaḥ | amīmed vatso anu gām apaśyad viśvarūpyaṃ triṣu yojaneṣu || tisro mātṝs trīn pitṝn bibhrad eka ūrdhvas tasthau nem ava glāpayanti | mantrayante divo amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśvavidaṃ vācam aviśvaminvām ||
dvādaśāraṃ nahi taj jarāya varvarti cakraṃ pari dyām ṛtasya | ā putrā agne mithunāso atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiś ca tasthuḥ || pañcapādaṃ pitaraṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam | atheme anya upari vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḍara āhur arpitam || pañcāre cakre parivartamāne tasminn ā tasthur bhuvanāni viśvā | tasya nākṣas tapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanād eva na chidyate sanābhiḥ || sanemi cakram ajaraṃ vi vāvṛta uttānāyāṃ daśa yuktā vahanti | sūryasya cakṣū rajasaity āvṛtaṃ yasminn ā viśvā bhuvanāny ārpitā || sākaṃjānāṃ saptatham āhur ekajaṃ ṣaḍ id yamā ṛṣayo devajā iti | teṣām iṣṭāni vihitāni dhāmaśaḥ sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ || striyaḥ satīs tām̐ u me puṃsa āhuḥ paśyad akṣaṇvān na vi cetad andhaḥ | Bhatt. akṣanvāṃ kavir yaḥ putraḥ sa īm ā ciketa yas tā vijānāt sa pituṣ pitāsat || avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsaṃ bibhratī gaur ud asthāt | sā kadrīcī kaṃ svid ardhaṃ parāgāt sā kva svit sūte nahi yūthe asmin || avaḥ pareṇa pitaraṃ yo asya- -anuveda para enāvareṇa | kavīyamānaḥ ka iha pra vocad devaṃ manaḥ kuto adhi prajātam || ye arvāñcas tām̐ u parāca āhur ye parāñcas tām̐ u arvāca āhuḥ | indraś ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā ni yuktā rajaso vahanti || dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pari ṣasvajāte | tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo abhi cākaśīti || yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇā niviśante suvate cādhi viśve | tasyed āhuḥ pippalaṃ svādv agre tan non naśad yaḥ pitaraṃ na veda || yatrā suparṇā amṛtasya bhakṣam animeṣaṃ vidathābhisvaranti | ino viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa ||
yad gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitaṃ traiṣṭubhād vā traiṣṭubhaṃ niratakṣata | yad vā jagaj jagaty āhitaṃ padaṃ ya it tad vidus te amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ || gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam | vākena vākaṃ dvipadā catuṣpadā- -akṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ || jagatā sindhuṃ divy askabhāyad rathantare sūryaṃ pary apaśyat | gāyatrasya samidhas tisra āhus tato mahnā pra ririce mahitvā || upa hvaye sudughāṃ dhenum etāṃ suhasto godhug uta dohad enām | śreṣṭhaṃ savaṃ savitā sāviṣan no 'bhīddho gharmas tad u ṣu pra vocam || hiṃkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnāṃ vatsam icchantī manasābhy āgāt | duhām aśvibhyāṃ payo aghnyeyaṃ sā vardhatāṃ mahate saubhagāya || gaur amīmed abhi vatsaṃ miṣantaṃ mūrdhānaṃ hiṅṅ akṛṇon mātavā u | sṛkvāṇaṃ gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ || ayaṃ sa śiṅkte yena gaur abhīvṛtā mimāti māyuṃ dhvasanāv adhi śritā | sā cittibhir ni cakāra martyaṃ vidyud bhavantī prati vavrim auhata || vidyud dadrāṇāṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe yuvānaṃ santaṃ palito jagāra | devasya paśya kāvyaṃ mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna || anac chaye turagātu jīvam Bhatt. anacchraye ejad dhruvaṃ madhya ā pastyānām | jīvo mṛtasya carati svadhābhir amartyo martyenā sayoniḥ || apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam | sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ ||
ya īṃ cakāra na so asya veda ya īṃ dadarśa hirug in na tasmāt | sa mātur yonā parivīto antar bahuprajā nirṛtim ā viveśa || dyaur naḥ pitā janitā nābhir atra bandhur no mātā pṛthivī mahīyam | uttānayoś camvor yonir antar atrā pitā duhitur garbham ādhāt || pṛcchāmi tvā param antaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi tvā bhuvanasya nābhim | pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto vācaḥ pṛcchāmi paramaṃ vyoma || iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ yajño bhuvanasya nābhiḥ | ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmāyāṃ vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma || saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇos tiṣṭhanti pradiśo vidharmaṇi | te dhītibhir manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ || na vi jānāmi yad ivedam asmi niṇyaḥ sannaddho manasā carāmi | yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasya- -ād id vāco aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ || apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ | tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ny anyaṃ cikyur na ci cikyur anyam || ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ | yas tan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidus ta ime sam āsate || ṛcaḥ padaṃ mātrayā kalpayanto 'rdharcena cākl̥pur viśvam ejat | tripād brahma pururūpaṃ vi caṣṭe tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ || sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā atho vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma | addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīṃ piba śuddham udakam ācarantī || gaurīr mimāya salilāni takṣaty ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī | aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktis tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti || athāpād eti prathamā padvatīnāṃ kas tad vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā ciketa | garbho bhāraṃ bharaty ā cid asya ṛtaṃ piparty anṛtaṃ ni pāti || kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti | tā āvavṛtrant sadanād ṛtasya- -ād id ghṛtena pṛthivīṃ vy ūduḥ ||Bhatt. aduḥ
anuvāka 11 ||
dyaur javenā pṛthivī varimṇāntarikṣaṃ mahitvāpo bhūmnā | devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūto brāhmaṇebhyo nir vapāmi || ṛṣibhyas tvā rṣeyebhyas tvā (nir vapāmi) || juṣṭatamaṃ vahnitamaṃ papritamaṃ sasnitamam ūrjo bhāgam akṣitam akṣitaye nir vapāmi || vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā nir vapantu || rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena chandasā nir vapantu || ādityās tvā jāgatena chandasā nir vapantu || idam abhirāvṇām idam abhigatvarāṇām idam abhimanyūnām || yathā kūpaḥ śatakhāḥ sahasrakhā nopadasyati | evedaṃ mopa dasat tīrtham aśvinor iva || yo no dveṣan manasā yaś ca vācā daivye loka uta mānuṣe yaḥ | grāvṇā hantu mahatā tasya sarvam indro devo maghavāñ chacīpatiḥ || Bhatt. śacīpatiḥ vīrutsu vastraṃ parijāyaitad ūrjā soma punar ā viśeha naḥ | dṛṃhasva bāhvo amba dhṛṣva mā riṣo agniś caitat saniṣyatha || devīr āpa ūrjo bhāgāya vo 'kṣitā akṣitaya ā siñcāmi ||
akravyādā tanvā jātavedo yā te svargā tapasā sayoniḥ | tayaudanam abhiśrāmyaitaṃ tayā no agne mahi śarma yaccha || somasyāṃśubhir yatam addhvam Bhatt. yata madhyam adityāḥ pṛṣṭhe sīdata | ye ta odana devayāne loke viduḥ pātraṃ dārumayaṃ manuṣyāḥ | teṣām edhi pātramātraḥ svargaḥ pṛthivīṃ vidma tava pātram || etās tvaudanopa yantv āpo ghṛtaścutaḥ payasā vardhayantīḥ | stabhnāsi svaḥ pṛthivīm uta dyām utāntarikṣaṃ svadhayā pūrayāsi || yāvantās taṇḍulās ta rtasya viṣṭhās Bhatt. proposes to emend stha ṛtasya tāvanto yajñās ta rtasya dohāḥ | Bhatt. proposes to emend stha ṛtasya tāvatī svadhā ghṛtapṛṣṭho me astu- -ūrjaṃ duhāṃ madhupṛcaṃ vyoman || yam odanaṃ pacāmi śraddadhānaḥ pātrīpūraṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ juṣāṇaḥ | sa me mā kṣeṣṭa sadam aśyamāno Bhatt. me māṃ kṣeṣṭha sadamiṣyamāṇo yamasya loke parame vyoman || odanaḥ pātreṇa saha dakṣiṇayā brāhmaṇebhyo datto amṛtatve dadhāti | sūryasya dhrājīr anu raśmīn āgan Bhatt. raśmīna āgan divas pṛṣṭhān śakuna iva rohan || saṃ prāṇena prāṇabhṛtaṃ sṛjāmi saṃ vīryeṇa payasāśiṣā ca | āstāvaṃ gaccha sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaṃ te tvā prāśnantu dakṣiṇato niṣadya || agniṣṭomena sarathaṃ hi yāhy athoktam atirātraṃ ca gaccha | read athoktham? dvirātramātras tryahaṃ vy aśnuhy athā roha catūrātraṃ ratham iva || catūrātreṇa kalpamāno hi yāhy atha saptarātraṃ daśarātraṃ ca gaccha | dvādaśāhaṃ paribhūya viśvata ekaviṃśatyā vi mṛdho nudasva || ekaviṃśatyā vi mṛdho hi yāhy athaikacatvāriṃśatopa yāhy ekam | trayastriṃśatāmṛto bhūtvā trimāsyam odanānv ārabhasva ||
idāvatsaraṃ ca parivatsaraṃ ca bradhnasya viṣṭapi parame vyoman | nākena nākam abhi saṃ bhavaudana || sādhyā nayantu mukhato mamaitam ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sacetasaḥ | viśve devā ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānā imaṃ rakṣantu sadam apramādam || idāvatsaraṃ ca parivatsaraṃ ca saṃvatsaram ahorātrāṇi māsaḥ | sūryasyāgneś candramaso 'nubhūtiṃ Bhatt. 'nubhūtaṃ vātasyābhūtim anv ābhavaudana || yam īḍate pitaro yaṃ ca devāḥ purohitaṃ tapasā brahmaṇā ca | svadhām ūrjam akṣitim ā juhomi vāte deve pavamāne bṛhaspatau || caturdhety odanaḥ kalpamāna ūrjā devān svadhā pitṝn | śarīraṃ manuṣyān āśitaṃbhavo brāhmaṇān so 'smākam astu parame vyoman || ayaṃ panthā odana devayāno anāruddho mṛtyunā tena yāhi | adabdhaḥ svato nihitaḥ sukṛdbhir Bhatt. sukṛtibhir brahmaṇā śiṣṭaḥ praśiṣā yamasya so ('smākam astu parame vyoman) || yatra te gṛhā odana tat parehi yatrāpāṃ tad u gacchantv āpaḥ | yatra yonim odanaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ so asmākam astu parame vyoman || hutaṃ te vāci hutam astu cakṣuṣi hutaṃ vijñāne hutam astu te bale | śrotre prāṇe te hutaṃ prajāmṛtatve te hutaṃ kāme ca hutam astu te || yad vāgneyo yadi vāsyaindro yadi māruto yadi vaiśvadevaḥ | yas te agnir nṛmaṇā nāma hṛdyas tasminn eṣa suhuto astv odanaḥ so asmākam astu parame vyoman || ya āviveśa nṛmaṇā manuṣyām̐ agnīnām agniḥ prathamo vayodhāḥ | tasminn eṣaḥ (…) ||
yā te tanūr apacakrāma mṛtyor devānāṃ sakhyam abhi jīvalokam | apsucarā gahvareṣṭhā mahitvā tasyām eṣaḥ suhuto astv odanaḥ so asmākam astu parame vyoman || aheḍamānābhy ehi no gṛhaṃ saṃkāśaṃ bhadre sumanā aghorāḥ | prati tvā varṣavṛddham etu || eṣā naḥ svadhā navagaj janitry amṛteṣv amṛtāhutābhūt | tān no gopāya sadam apramādam āsmākam aitor anu rakṣa jāgṛhi || ye no nidhim abhidāsanty etaṃ pravāhaṃ proḍhaṃ yamarājye | rājā teṣāṃ varuṇa indriyāṇy abhi tiṣṭḥatu harasā daivyena | etaṃ sadhasthāḥ pari vo dadāmy anukhyātā yajñapatir yad āyat || ya ākhidanti vikhidanti dattaṃ vi gṛhṇate dakṣiṇā nīyamānāḥ | tān indro devo maghavāñ chacīpatir Bhatt. śacīpatir agnimedī pradahann etu śakraḥ | bṛhaspatir varuṇaḥ soma indro mamaiva dattaṃ kevalaṃ kṛṇvantu ||
śīrṣaktiṃ śīrṣāmayaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ tṛtīyakam | sarvaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ te rogaṃ bahir nirmantrayāmahe || karṇābhyāṃ te kaṅkūṣebhyaḥ Bhatt. kaṅkuśebhyaḥ śuktivalgaṃ vilohitam | (…) || see 1cd yaḥ kṛṇoti pramotam Bhatt. pramodam andhaṃ kṛṇoti pūruṣam | (…) || see 1cd yasya hetoḥ pracyavate yakṣmo nāsata āsyataḥ | (…) || see 1cd śīrṣarogam aṅgarogaṃ viśvāṅgīnaṃ visalpakam | sarvaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ te rogaṃ bahir nirmantrayamahe || yasya bhīmaḥ pratīkāśa udvepayati pūruṣam | takmānaṃ śītaṃ rūraṃ ca taṃ te nir mantrayāmahe || ya ūrū anusarpaty atho ye 'nu gavīnike | Bhatt. eti gavīnike balāsam antar aṅgebhyo bahir nirmantrayāmahe || yadi kāmād apakāmād Bhatt. yadīkāmātavakāmād dhṛdayāj jāyate pari | hṛdo balāsam aṅgebhyo bahir nirmantrayāmahe || harimāṇaṃ te aṅgebhyo yakṣmodhām antarātmanaḥ | yakṣmaṃ te sarvam aṅgebhyo bahir nirmantrayāmahe || āso balāso bhavatu mūtraṃ bhavatv āmayat | yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat ||
bahir bilaṃ nir dravatu kahāvāhaṃ tavodarāt | yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat || udarāt te pari klomno nābhyā hṛdayād adhi | yakṣmodhām antarātmano bahir nir mantrayāmahe || yāḥ sīmānaṃ virujanti mūrdhānaṃ pratyarṣaṇīḥ | ahiṃsantīr anāmayā nir dravanti bahir bilam || yā hṛdayam upasarpanty anutanvanti kīkasāḥ | (…) || see 3cd yāḥ pārśve uparṣanty anunikṣanti pṛṣṭīḥ | (…) || see 3cd yās tiraścīr uparṣanty arṣaṇīr vakṣaṇābhyaḥ | (…) || see 3cd yā gudā anusarpanty āntrāṇi yopayanti ca | (…) || see 3cd yā majjño anusarpanti parūṃṣi virujanti ca | ahiṃsantīr anāmayā nir dravanti bahir bilam || ye aṅgāni madayanti yakṣmāso ropaṇāsaḥ | yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat || visalpakasya vidradhasya vātīkārasya vālajeḥ | yakṣmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣaṃ nir avocam ahaṃ tvat || pādābhyāṃ te kulphābhyāṃ jaṅgābhyāṃ jānubhyām ūrubhyāṃ śroṇibhyāṃ pari bhaṃsasaḥ | anūkyād arṣaṇīr uṣṇihābhyo grīvābhyaḥ skandhebhyaś śīrṣṇo rogam anīnaśam || saṃ te śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni hṛdayasya ca yo viduḥ | udyan sūrya ādityo 'ṅgarogam anīnaśat ||
anuvāka 12 ||
sapatnahanam ṛṣabhaṃ ghṛtena kāmaṃ śikṣāmi haviṣājyena | nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama pādaya tvam abhiṣṭuto mahatā vīryeṇa || yan me manaso na priyaṃ na cakṣuṣo yan me hṛdaye nābhinandati | tad duṣvapnyaṃ prati muñcāmi sapatne kāmaṃ tuṣṭuvān ud ahaṃ bhideyam || duṣvapnyaṃ kāma duritaṃ ca kāma- -aprajastām asvakṛtām avartim | Bhatt. kāmāprayastām ugra īśānaḥ prati muñca tasmin yo asmabhyam aṃhūraṇā cikitsāt || Bhatt. aṃhuraṇā sā te kāma duhitā dhenur ucyate yām āhur vācaṃ kavayo virājam | tayā sapatnān pari vṛṅdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ prajāḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu || kāmasyendrasya varuṇasya rājño viṣṇor balena savituḥ savena | agner hotreṇa pra ṇuda sapatnān śambīva nāvam udakeṣu dhīraḥ || Bhatt. chambīva adhyakṣo vājī mama kāma ugraḥ kṛṇotu mahyam asapatnam eva | viśve devā mama nāthaṃ bhavantu sarve devā havam ā yantu ma imam || idam ājyaṃ ghṛtavaj juṣāṇāḥ kāmajyeṣṭhā iha mādayantām | kṛṇvantu mahyam asapatnam eva || indrāgnī kāma sarathaṃ hi bhūtvā nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama pādayātha | teṣāṃ pannānām adhamā tamāṃsy agne vāstūny anunirdahā tvam || Bhatt. vastūni nirdahā jahi tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnā andhā tamāṃsy ava pādayainān | Bhatt. sapatnāndhā tamāsyava pādayaināṃ anindriyā arasāḥ santu sarve yathā na jivāt katamac canaiṣām || avadhīt kāmo mama ye sapatnā uruṃ lokam akaran mahyam edhatum | mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasro mahyaṃ ṣaḍ urvīr ghṛtam ā vahantu || Bhatt. urvī
yat te kāma śarma trivarūtham udbhid Bhatt. udbhir brahma varma vitatam anativyādhyaṃ kṛtam | tena sapatnān pari vṛṅdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ prajāḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu || adharāñcaḥ pra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt | na sāyakapraṇuttānāṃ punar asti nivartanam || agnir yava indro yavaḥ somo yavaḥ | yavayāvāno deva yāvayantv amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ jīvalokān mṛtalokaṃ gatāsum || asarvavīraś carati praṇutto mitrāṇāṃ dveṣyaḥ parivargyaḥ svānām | Bhatt. pariviṣyaḥ uta pṛthivyām ava syanti vidyuta ugro devaḥ pra mṛṇat sapatnān || Bhatt. pramṛṇan cyutā ceyaṃ bṛhaty acyutā ca vidyud bibharti stanayitnūṃś ca sarvān | Bhatt. bhavanti stanayitnuṃś teṣām ādityo draviṇena tejasā- -udyan sapatnān nudatāṃ me sahasvān || yathā devā asurān prāṇudanta yena- Bhatt. prāṇadanta -indro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamo babādhe | Bhatt. tamopavādhe tathā tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnās Bhatt. sapatnāṃs tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva sarvān || yena devā asurān prāṇudanta viśvahā yenendro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamo babādhe | Bhatt. tamopavādhe tena tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnās tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva dūram || kāmo jajñe prathamo nānyat purā nainaṃ devā āpuḥ pitaro nota martyāḥ | tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs Bhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nāma it kṛṇomi || na vai vātaś cana kāmam āpa nāgniḥ sūryo nota candramāḥ | (…) || see 8cd na vā āpaś cana kāmam āpur nāhorātrāṇi vihitāni yanti | (…) || || see 8cd
na vai puṇyajanāś cana kāmam āpur na gandharvāpsaraso na sarpāḥ | tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs Bhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi || yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad āpaḥ siṣyadur yāvad agniḥ | Bhatt. śiṣyadur tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs Bhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi || yāvatīr diśaḥ pradiśo viṣūcīr yāvatīr āśā abhicakṣaṇā divaḥ | tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs Bhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi || yāvatīr bhṛṅgā jatvaḥ kurūravo yāvatīr vaghā vṛkṣasarpyaḥ | tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs Bhatt. jyāyāṃ tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi || yās te śivās taṇvas kāma bhadrā yābhiḥ satyaṃ bhavati yad vṛṇīte | tābhiṣ ṭvam asmān upa saṃ viśasva- Bhatt. ṭam -anyatra pāpīr apa veśayā dhiyaḥ ||
yau te mātonmamārja jātāyāḥ pativedanau | durṇāmā tatra mā gṛdhad aliṃśa uta vatsapaḥ || palālānupalālau śarkuṃ kokaṃ malimrucaṃ palījakam | Bhatt. malimṛcaṃ āśleṣaṃ vavrivāsasam ṛkṣagrīvaṃ pramīlinaṃ muṣkayor apa hanmasi || mā saṃ vṛto mopa sṛpa ūrū māva sṛpo 'ntarā | kṛṇomy asyai bheṣajaṃ bajaṃ durṇāmacātanam || durṇāmā ca sunāmā ca- -ubhau saṃvṛtam icchataḥ | Bhatt. icchata(ḥ) arāyam apa hanmasi sunāmā straiṇam icchatām || yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ keśy asura stambajā uta taṇḍikaḥ | arāyān asyā bhaṃsaso muṣkayor apa hanmasi || anujighraṃ pramṛśantaṃ kravyādam uta reriham | arāyaṃ śvakiṣkiṇaṃ Bhatt. chvakiṣkiṇaṃ bajaḥ piṅgo anīnaśat || yas tvā suptāṃ tsarati Bhatt. carati yaś ca dipsati jāgratīm | Bhatt. jāgratīḥ chāyām iva pra tān sūryaḥ Bhatt. tāṃ parikrāmam anīnaśat || yas tvā suptāṃ nipadyate bhrātā bhūtvā piteva ca | bajas tvaṃ sahatām itaḥ klībarūpaṃ tirīṭinam || yaḥ kṛṇoty avatokāṃ mṛtavatsām imāṃ striyam | tam oṣadhe tvaṃ nāśaya- -asyāḥ kamalam añjivam || ye śālāḥ parinṛtyanti sāyaṃ gardabhanādinaḥ kusūlā ye ca kukṣilāḥ kakubhāḥ saramāḥ sumāḥ | tān oṣadhe tvaṃ gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya ||
ye kukundhāḥ kukūrabhāḥ kṛttīr dūrśāni bibhrati | Bhatt. kṛtyair duruśāni klībā iva pranṛtyanto ghoṣāṃ ye kurvate vane tān ito nāśayāmasi || yeṣāṃ paścāt prapade puraḥ pārṣṇī puro mukham | khalajāḥ śakadhūmajā uruṇḍā ye ca maṭmaṭāḥ kumbhamuṣkā ayāśavaḥ | tān asyā brahmaṇaspate pratībodhena nāśaya || ye sūryaṃ na titikṣanta thus ŚS; Bhatt. nititikṣanti (not -kṣanty) ātapantam amuṃ divaḥ | arāyān bastavāsino durgandhīṃl lohitāsyān Bhatt. durgandhīlohitāsyāṃ makakān nāśayāmasi || Bhatt. vakakāṃ ye sūryāt parisarpanti snuṣeva śvaśurād adhi | bajaś ca teṣāṃ piṅgaś ca hṛdaye 'dhi ni vidhyatām || ya ātmānam atimātram aṃśa ādhāya bibhrati | Bhatt. aṃsādāya strīṇāṃ śroṇipratodina indra rakṣāṃsi nāśaya || ye pūrve vadhvo yanti haste śṛṅgāṇi bibhrataḥ | āpākesthān prahāsina Bhatt. āpākestāṃ prahāsima stambe ye kurvate jyotis tān ito nāśayāmasi || paryastākṣāḥ pracaṅkaśā straiṇāḥ santu paṇḍagāḥ | ava bheṣaja pātaya ya imāṃ saṃvivṛtsaty apatiḥ svapatīṃ striyam || Bhatt. apati uddharṣiṇaṃ munikeśaṃ jambhayantaṃ marīmṛśam | upeṣantam udumbalaṃ Bhatt. upeśantam tuṇḍenam uta śāluḍam | padā pra vidhya pārṣṇyā Bhatt. pravudhya sthālīṃ gaur iva syandanā || yas te garbhaṃ pratimṛśāj jātaṃ vā mārayāti te | piṅgas tam ugradhanvā kṛṇotu hṛdayāvidham || ye amno jātān mārayanti Bhatt. amlo sūtikā anuśerate | strībhāgān piṅgo gandharvān abhraṃ vāta ivājatu ||
pariśiṣṭaṃ dhārayataṃ yad dhitaṃ māva pādi tat | garbhaṃ ta ugrau rakṣatāṃ bheṣajau nīvibhāryau || paripāṇaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ rakṣasām asi cātanam | arāyān sarvān durṇāmno yātudhānān viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya || pavīnasāt taṅgalvāc chāyakād uta nagnakāt | prajāyai patye tvā piṅgaḥ pari pātu kimīdinaḥ || dvyāsyāś caturakṣāḥ pañcapādād anaṅguleḥ | vṛndād abhi prasarpataḥ pari pāhi varīvṛtāt || ya āmaṃ māṃsam adanti pauruṣeyaṃ ca ye kravir Bhatt. krimir garbhān khādanti keśavāḥ | arāyān asyā bhaṃsaso muṣkayor apa hanmasi || piṅga rakṣa jāyamānaṃ pumāṃsaṃ mā striyaṃ kran | āṇḍādo garbhaṃ mā dabhan bādhasvetaḥ kimīdinaḥ || aprajāstvaṃ mārtavatsam ād rodam agham āvayam | Bhatt. aghav vṛkṣād iva srajaṃ kṛtvā- -apriye prati muñca tat || piṅga jahi yātudhānān durgandhīṃl lohitāsyān | tvayā praṇuttāḥ kravyādo viṣvañco yantu nirhatāḥ ||
anuvāka 13 ||
ucchiṣṭe nāmarūpāṇy ucchiṣṭe loka āhitaḥ | ucchiṣṭa indraś cāgniś ca viśvam antaḥ samāhitam || ucchiṣṭe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ samāhitam | āpaḥ samudra ucchiṣṭe candramā vāta āhitaḥ || sann ucchiṣṭe 'saṃś cobhau mṛtyur vājaḥ prajāpatiḥ | laukyā ucchiṣṭa āyattā Bhatt. ucchiṣṭā vraś ca draś cāpi śrīr mayi || Bhatt. vṛś dṛḍho dṛṃha sthiro nyo brahma viśvasṛjo daśa | nābhim iva sarvataś cakram ucchiṣṭe devatā hitā || ṛk sāma yajur ucchiṣṭa udgīthaḥ prastutaṃ sthitam | hiṅkāra ucchiṣṭe svaraḥ Bhatt. śvaraḥ sāmno meḍiś ca tan mayi || Bhatt. meḍhiś aindrāgnaṃ pāvamānaṃ mahānāmnīr mahāvratam | ucchiṣṭe yajñasyāṅgāny antar garbha iva mātari || rājasūyaṃ vājapeyam agniṣṭomas tadadhvaraḥ | arkāśvamedhā ucchiṣṭe jīvabarhir madintamaḥ || agnyādheyam atho dīkṣā kāmapraś chandasā saha | utsannā yajñāḥ sattrāṇy ucchiṣṭe 'dhi samāhitāḥ || agnihotraṃ ca śraddhā ca vaṣaṭkāro vrataṃ tapaḥ | dakṣiṇeṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ ca- -ucchiṣṭe 'dhi samāhitāḥ || ekarātras trirātraś ca sadyaḥkrīḥ prakrīr ukthyaḥ | otaṃ nihitam ucchiṣṭe yajñasyāṇūni vidyayā ||
catūrātraḥ pañcarātraḥ ṣaḍrātraś cobhayaḥ saha | ṣoḍaśī saptarātraś ca- -ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve ye yajñā amṛte hitāḥ || pratihāro nidhanaṃ viśvajic cābhijic ca yaḥ | sāhnātirātrā ucchiṣṭe dvādaśāho 'pi tan mayi || sūnṛtā saṃnatiḥ kṣemaḥ Bhatt. saṃnati(ḥ) svadhorjāmṛtaṃ sahaḥ | Bhatt. saha ucchiṣṭe sarve pratyañcaḥ kāmāḥ kāmena tṛpyantu || nava bhūmīḥ samudrāś ca- -ucchiṣṭe 'dhi śritā divaḥ | ā sūryo bhāty ucchiṣṭe ahorātre ca tan mayi || upahavyaṃ viṣūvantaṃ ye ca yajñā guhā hitāḥ | bibharti bhartā viśvasya- -ucchiṣṭo janituḥ pitā || pitā janitur ucchiṣṭo asoḥ pautraḥ pitāmahaḥ | sa khyeti viśvasyeśāno vṛṣā bhūmyām atighnyaḥ || ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tapo dīkṣā Bhatt. dīkṣāḥ śramo dharmaś ca karma ca | bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ucchiṣṭe vīryaṃ lakṣmīr balaṃ bale || samṛddhir oja ākutiḥ kṣatraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ṣaḍ urvyaḥ | saṃvatsaro 'dhy ucchiṣṭa iḍā praiṣā grahā haviḥ || caturhotāra āpriyaś caturmāsyāni nividaḥ | ucchiṣṭe yajñā hotrāś ca paśubandhās tad iṣṭayaḥ || ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca- -ārtava ṛtubhiḥ saha | ucchiṣṭe ghoṣiṇīr āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutir mahī || Bhatt. ścyutir
śarkarāḥ sikatā aśmāna Bhatt. sikatāśmāna oṣadhayo vīrudhas tṛṇā | abhrāṇi vidyuto varṣam ucchiṣṭe saṃśritā śritā || rāddhiḥ prāptir vyāptiḥ samāptir maha edhatuḥ | atyāptir ucchiṣṭe bhūtir āhitā nihitā hitā || yac ca prāṇati prāṇena yac ca paśyati cakṣuṣā | ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ || prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā | (…) || see 3cd devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā gandharvāpasaraś ca ye | (…) || see 3cd ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṃsi purāṇaṃ yajuṣā saha | (…) || see 3cd atharvāṅgiraso brahma sarpapuṇyajanāś ca ye | (…) || see 3cd ānandāś ca pramodāś ca- -abhīmodamudaś ca ye | ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ ||
yan manyur jāyām āvahat saṃkalpasya gṛhād adhi | ka āsañ janyāḥ ke varāḥ Bhatt. āsaṃ ka u jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat || tapaś caivāstāṃ karma ca- -antar mahaty arṇave | ta āsan janyās te varāḥ Bhatt. āsaṃ sa u jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat || daśa sākam ajāyanta devā devebhyaḥ paraḥ | yo vai tāṃ vidyān nāmathā sa vā adya mahad vadet || prāṇāpāṇau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā | vyānodāno vāṅ manas te vā ākūtim ā vahan || ajātā āsann ṛtavo 'tho dhātā bṛhaspatiḥ | indrāgnī aśvinā tarhi kaṃ te jyeṣṭham upāsata || Bhatt. tante, but with two proposals for emend. tapaś caivāstāṃ karma ca- -antar mahaty arṇave | tapo ha jajñe karmaṇas taṃ te jyeṣṭham upāsata || kuta indraḥ kutaḥ somaḥ kuto agnir ajāyata | kutas tvaṣṭā sam abhavad dhātā sam abhavat kutaḥ || indrād indraḥ somāt somo agner agnir ajāyata | tvaṣṭā ha jajñe tvaṣṭur dhātā dhātur ajāyata || ye ta āsan daśa jātā Bhatt. āsaṃ devā devebhyaḥ paraḥ | putrebhyo lokaṃ dattvā kasmin te loka āsate || yeto bhūmiḥ purvāsīd yām addhātaya id viduḥ | ke tasyāṃ devā āsate kasminn u sādhiśritā || Bhatt. kasmin sādhiśritā+
kutaḥ keśān kutaḥ snāva kuto asthīny ābharat | aṅgā parvāṇi majjānaṃ ko māṃsaṃ kuta ābharat || yadā keśān asthi snāva māṃsaṃ majjānam ābharat | Bhatt. māsaṃ, misprint śarīraṃ kṛtvā pādavat kaṃ lokam anu prāviśat || Bhatt. taṃ saṃsico nāma te devā ye saṃbhāraiḥ samabharan | sarvaṃ saṃsicya martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan || śiro hastāv atho bāhū Bhatt. hastād jihvāṃ grīvāś ca kīkasāḥ | pṛṣṭīr barjahye pārśve kas tat sam adadhād ṛṣiḥ || ūrū pādāv aṣṭhīvantau śroṇī hastāv atho mukham | tvacā prāvṛtya tat sarvaṃ saṃdhā sam adadhān mahī || yat tac charīram apayat saṃdhayā saṃhitaṃ mahat | yenedam adya rocate ko asmin varṇam ābharat || sarve devā upāśikṣan tad u jānād vadhūḥ satī | īśā vaśasya yā jāyā sāsmin varṇam ābharat || yadā tvaṣṭā vyatṛṇat pitā tvaṣṭur ya uttaraḥ | gṛhaṃ kṛtvā martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan || svapno vai tandrīr nirṛtiḥ pāpmāno nāma devatāḥ | jarā khālityaṃ pālityaṃ śarīram anu prāviśan || steyaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vṛjinaṃ satyaṃ yajño yaśo mahaḥ | balaṃ ca kṣatram ojaś ca śarīram anu prāviśan ||
bhūtiś ca vā abhūtiś ca Bhatt. vābhūtiś rātayo 'rātayaś ca yāḥ | kṣudhaś ca sarvās tṛṣṇāś ca śarīram anu prāviśan || nindyāś ca vā anindyāś ca Bhatt. vānindyāś yaś ca hanteti neti ca | śarīraṃ śraddhā dakṣiṇā- -aśraddhā cānu prāviśan || vidyāś ca vā avidyāś ca Bhatt. vāvidyāś yac cānyad upadeśyam | śarīraṃ brahma prāviśad ṛcaḥ sāmātho yajuḥ || ānandā nandāḥ pramudo 'bhīmodamudaś ca ye | haso nariṣṭā nṛttāni śarīram anu prāviśan || ālāpāś ca pralāpāś ca- -abhīlāpalapaś ca ye | śarīraṃ sarve prāviśann āyujaḥ prayujo yujaḥ || prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā | vyānodānau vāṅ manaḥ śarīrena ta īyante || āśiṣaś ca praśiṣaś ca saṃśiṣo viśiṣaś ca yāḥ | cittāni sarve saṃkalpāḥ śarīram anu prāviśan || tvarāś ca vai dhṛtayaś ca- -īḍāśīḥ sūnṛterā | Bhatt. cerāḥ śrīḥ śarīraṃ sarve prāviśann ṛtarīrṣyāyudho mṛdhaḥ || āsneyīś ca vāsteyīś ca tvaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇāś ca yāḥ | guhyāḥ śukriyā yā sthūlā bībhatsur asādhayan || Bhatt. bibhatsur asthi kṛtvā samidhaṃ tad aṣṭāpo asādayan | retaḥ kṛtvājyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan ||
yā āpo yāś ca devatā yā virāḍ brahmaṇā saha | śarīraṃ brahma prāviśac charīre 'dhi prajāpatiḥ || sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇaṃ puruṣasya vi bhejire | athāsyetaram ātmānaṃ devāḥ prāyacchann agnaye || tasmād vai vidvān puruṣam idaṃ brahmeti manyate | sarvā hy asmin devatāḥ śarīre 'dhi samāhitāḥ || yadaibhya sthānam aṅgeṣu pitā lokām̐ akalpayat | śarīraṃ sarvā devatā yathāṅgam anu prāviśan || aṅgamaṅgaṃ śarīrasya sarve devā anu prāviśan | pitā hy ebhyaḥ prāyacchat taṃ lokam aparājitam || taṃ lokam aparājitaṃ sarve devā anu prāviśan | prajāpatir yam ābharac charīraṃ bahudhā hitam ||
anuvāka 14 ||
agne jāyasvāditir nāthiteyaṃ brahmaudanaṃ pacati putrakāmā | saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvā manthantu prajayā saheha || Bhatt. saha || kṛṇuta dhūmaṃ vṛṣaṇaḥ sakhāyo 'droghāvitā vācam accha | ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāṭ suvīro yena devā asahanta śatrūn || agne 'janiṣṭhā mahate vīryāya brahmaudanāya paktave jātavedaḥ | saptarṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvājījanann asmai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yaccha || samiddho agne samidhā samidhyase viśvān devān yajñiyām̐ eha vakṣaḥ | tebhyo havyaṃ śrapayañ jātavedaḥ Bhatt. śrapayaṃ svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam || tredhā bhāgo nihito jātavedo yaḥ puro vo devānāṃ pitṝṇām uta martyānām | aṃśāṃ jānīdhvaṃ vi bhajāmi taṃ vo yo devānāṃ sā imaṃ pārayāti || agne sahasvān abhibhūr abhīd asi nīco nyubja dviṣataḥ sapatnān | iyaṃ mātrā mīyamānā mitā ca sajātāṃs te balihṛtaḥ kṛṇotu || Bhatt. balihutaḥ sākaṃ sajātaiḥ payasā sahaidhy Bhatt. sahedy ud ubjainaṃ mahate vīryāya | ūrdhvo nākasyādhi roha viṣṭapaḥ svargo loka iti yaṃ vadanti || iyaṃ mahī prati gṛhṇātu carma pṛthivī devī sumanasyamānā | adhi gacchema sukṛtām ulokam || etau grāvāṇau sayujā yuṅdhi carmaṇi nir bhindhy aṃśūn yajamānāya sādhu | avaghnatī ni jahi ye pṛtanyava ūrdhvāṃ prajām uddharanty ud ūha || Bhatt. uha gṛhāṇa grāvāṇau sukṛtā vīra hasta ā te devā yajñiyā yajñam aguḥ | trayo varā yatamāṃs tvaṃ vṛṇīṣe Bhatt. yatamāstyaṃ tās te samṛddhīr iha rādhāyāmi ||
upaśvase druvaye sīdatā yūyaṃ Bhatt. druvaye vi vicyadhvaṃ yajñiyāsas tuṣaiḥ | śriyā samānān ati sarvānt syāma- Bhatt. sarvāṃ -adhaspadaṃ dviṣatas pādayema || iyaṃ te dhītir idam u te janitraṃ gṛhṇātu tvām aditiḥ śūraputrā | parā punīhi ya imāṃ pṛtanyavo asmai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yaccha || parehi nāri punar ehi kṣipram apāṃ tvā goṣṭho adhy arukṣad bharāya | tāsāṃ gṛhṇītād yatamā yajñiyā asan vibhājya dhīrītarā jihītāt || emā agur yoṣitaḥ śumbhamānā ut tiṣṭha nāri tavasaṃ rabhasva | Bhatt. tapataṃ supatnī patyā prajāvatyā tvā- Bhatt. prajāvatyā -agan yajñaḥ prati kumbhaṃ gṛbhāya || Bhatt. tvākaṃ ūrjo bhāgo nihito yaḥ purā va Bhatt. vo ṛṣipraśiṣṭāpa ā haraitāḥ | ayaṃ yajño nāthavid gātuvit prajāvid ugraḥ paśumad vīravid vo astu || Bhatt. paśuvad agne carur yajñiyas tvādhy arukṣac chucis tapiṣṭhas tapasā tapainam | ārṣeyā daivā abhisaṃgatya bhāgam imaṃ tapiṣṭhā ṛtubhis tapantu || śuddhā āpo yoṣito yajñiyā imā Bhatt. yakṣiyā, misprint? āpaś carum iva sarpantu śubhrāḥ | dadat prajā bahulān paśūn me paktaudanasya sukṛtām etu lokam || brahmaṇā śuddhā uta pūtā ghṛtena somasyāṃśavas taṇḍulā yajñiyā ime | apaḥ pra viśatu prati gṛhṇātu vaś carur imaṃ paktvā sukṛtām etu lokam || Bhatt. paktā abhyāvartasva prajayā sahaināṃ pratyaṅ enaṃ devatābhiḥ sahaidhi | svargaṃ lokam abhi saṃ vahainam ādityo devaḥ paramaṃ vyoma || uruḥ prathasva mahatā mahimnā sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ sukṛtasya loke | pitāmahāḥ pitaraḥ prajopaja- -ahaṃ paktvā pañcadaśas te asmi ||
sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ śatadhāro akṣito brahmaudano devayānaḥ svargaḥ | amūṃs ta ā dadhāmi prajayā reṣaya- -enaṃ balihārāya mṛḍatāṃ mahyam eva || Bhatt. resahainaṃ … kṛṇutāṃ ud ehi vediṃ prajayā vardhayainaṃ nudasva rakṣaḥ prataraṃ dhehy enam | śriyā samānān ati sarvānt syāma- Bhatt. sarvāṃ -adhaspadaṃ dviṣataḥ pādayema || ṛtena taṣṭā manasā hiteyaṃ Bhatt. tiṣṭhā brahmaudanasya nihitā vedir agre | aṃśadhrīṃ śuddhām upa dhehi nāri Bhatt. aśadhrīṃ, misprint? tatraudanaṃ sādaya daivānām || aditer hastāṃ srucam etāṃ dvitīyāṃ saptarṣayo bhūtakṛto yām akṛṇvan | sā gātrāṇi viduṣy odanasya darvir vedyām adhy enaṃ cinotu || Bhatt. enañ śṛtaṃ tvā havir upa sīdantu daivā nisṛpyāgne punar enaṃ pra sīda Bhatt. sarpya somena pūto jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām ārṣeyās te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ || soma rājan saṃjñānam ā vapaibhyaḥ subrāhmaṇā yatame tvopasīdān | ṛṣīn ārṣeyāṃs tapaso 'dhi jātān Bhatt. jātāṃ brahmaudane suhavā johavīmi || imā āpo madhumatīr ghṛtaścyuto brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu pra pṛthak sādayāmi | yatkāma idam abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'ham indro marutvāṃs tad adād idaṃ me || idaṃ me jyotir amṛtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ pakvaṃ kṣetrāt kāmadughā ma eṣā | idaṃ dhanaṃ ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ || agnau tuṣām̐ ā vapa jātavedasi paraḥ kambūkān upa mṛḍhy etān | Bhatt. apa … etāṃ etaṃ śuśruma gṛharājasya bhāgam atho vidma nirṛter bhāgadheyam || śrāmyataḥ pacata edhi sunvataḥ svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam | yena rohāt param āpadya yad vayaḥ ||
babhrer adhvaryo mukham etad vi mṛḍḍhy Bhatt. mṛḍhy ājyāya lokaṃ kṛṇuhi prajānan | ghṛtena gātrānu sarvā vi mṛḍḍhi Bhatt. mṛḍhi kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ || babhre rakṣaḥ samadam ā vapaibhyo Bhatt. rakṣasva brāhmaṇā yatame tvopasīdān | purīṣiṇaḥ prathamānāḥ purastād ārṣeyās te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ || ārṣeyeṣu ni dadha odana tvā nānārṣeyāṇām apy asty atra | Bhatt. nānāṛṣeyāṇām agnir me goptā marutaś ca sarve viśve devā abhi rakṣantu pakvam || yajñaṃ duhānaṃ sadam it prapīnaṃ pumāṃsaṃ dhenuṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇām | prajāmṛtatvam uta dīrgham āyū Bhatt. āyu rāyaś ca poṣam upa tvā sadema || vṛṣabho 'si svarga ṛṣīn ārṣeyān gaccha | sukṛtāṃ loke sīda tan nau saṃkṛtam || sam ā cinuṣvānusaṃprehy agne pathaḥ kalpaya devayānān | ebhiḥ sukṛtair anu pra jñeṣma yajñe nāke tiṣṭhantam adhi saptaraśmau || yena devā jyotiṣā dyām udāyan brahmaudanaṃ paktvā sukṛtasya lokam | taṃ tvā pacāmi jyotiṣāṃ jyotir uttamaṃ sa nas taṃ dhehi sukṛtām uloke ||
prācyai tvā diśe nir vapāmi śatadhāram apakṣudham | sa paktāraṃ vaha sukṛtāṃ yatra loko yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāḥ purāṇāḥ || dakṣiṇāyai tvā (…) || pratīcyai tvā (…) || udīcyai tvā (…) || dhruvāyai tvā (…) || ūrdhvāyai tvā (…) || dive tvā (…) || antarikṣāya tvā (…) || pṛthivyai tvā (…) || paśubhyas tvā (…) ||
manuṣyebhyas tvā (…) || pitṛbhyas tvā (…) || ṛṣibhyas tvā (…) || ārṣeyebhyas tvā (…) || aṅgirobhyas tvā (…) || āṅgirasebhyas tvā (…) || atharvabhyas tvā (…) || ātharvaṇebhyas tvā (…) || vanaspatibhyas tvā (…) || vānaspatyebhyas tvā (…) ||
vīrudbhyas tvā (…) || oṣadhībhyas tvā (…) || ṛtubhyas tvā (…) || ārtavebhyas tvā (…) || lokebhyas tvā (…) || laukyebhyas tvā (…) || lokānāṃ tvādhyakṣebhyaḥ (…) || devebhyas tvā (…) || daivyebhyas tvā (…) || sarvābhyas tvā devatābhyo nir vapāmi śatadhāram apakṣudham | sa paktāraṃ vaha sukṛtāṃ yatra loko yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāḥ purāṇāḥ ||
pumān puṃso adhi tiṣṭha carma na te śiṣṇaṃ pra dahāj jātavedāḥ | bhavāt te straiṇam apy apsarāsu || mahatī dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam idaṃ mahat | mahān mahimnā sarvāṅga yas tvā pacaty odana || saptainaṃ sūryā abhitaḥ Bhatt. sūryāvitaḥ sapta puṣkariṇīr uta | sapto sahasraṃ gandharvā yas tvā pacaty odana || dhātaiṣām udgātāsīd devā hotāra ṛtvijaḥ | sarvāṅgaṃ yatraudanaṃ satyenāgre samairayan || sapta ṛṣayo bhūtakṛta ṛṣayaḥ sādhyāś ca ye | te vai sarvāṅgam odanaṃ śraddhayāgre sam airayan || yaḥ sarvāṅgaṃ pacati brāhmaṇaṃ ca na hiṃsati | tasmai jyotiṣmantaṃ lokaṃ yamo rājābhi rakṣati || taṃ sarvāṅgaṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ dyumātraṃ devasaṃhitam | Bhatt. dyaumātraṃ ni dhatsvāmutra śevadhiṃ taṃ te brahmābhi rakṣatu || tasyaudanasyodaram antarikṣaṃ dyauḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ diśaḥ pārśve | sūryācandramasāv akṣyāv Bhatt. akṣāv ṛtavo dantāḥ pavamānaḥ prāṇo aṅgiraso rūpam ||
anuvāka 15 ||
ā nayaitam ā rabhasva sukṛtāṃ Bhatt. nayaitum lokam api gacchatu prajānan | tīrtvā tamāṃsi bahudhā vipaśyann ajo nākam ā kramatāṃ tṛtīyam || pra pado nenigdhi duścaritaṃ yac cacāra śuddhaiḥ śaphair ā kramatāṃ prajānan | jyotiṣmantaṃ sukṛtāṃ lokam īpsan tṛtīye nāke adhi vi kramasva || anu chya śyāmena tvacam etāṃ viśastar Bhatt. anu psāmena … viśastad yathāparv asinā māti maṃsthāḥ | mābhi druhaḥ paruśaḥ kalpayainaṃ Bhatt. paruṣyaḥ sukṛtāṃ madhye adhi vi śrayemam || bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhehy etām ā siñcodakam ava dhehy enam | pary ādhattāgninā śamitāraḥ śṛto gacchatu sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ || Bhatt. śṛco ut krāmātaḥ pari ced ataptas taptāc caror adhi nākaṃ tṛtīyam | Bhatt. cetutaptātaptā caror agner agnir adhi saṃ babhūvitha jyotiṣmān gaccha sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ || pañcaudanaḥ pañcadhā vi kramasva- -ākraṃsyamānaḥ pañca jyotīm̐ṣi | ījānānāṃ sukṛtāṃ prehi madhyaṃ jyotiṣmantam abhi lokaṃ jayāsmai || ajam evāgnim ajam ij jyotir āhur ajaṃ brahmaṇe jīyatā deyam āhuḥ | ajas tamāṃsy apa hanti dūram asmiṃl loke śraddadhānena dattaḥ || Bhatt. asmilloke etad vo jyotiḥ pitaras tṛtīyaṃ pañcaudanaṃ brahmaṇe 'jaṃ dadāti | ajas tamāṃsy apa hanti dūraṃ pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamānaḥ || pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamāno 'jo nākam ā kramatāṃ tṛtīyam | vicakramāṇaḥ sukṛtasya loke sa jyotiṣā tamo apa hanti dūram || ajā kramasva sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ śarabho nu catto ati durgāṇi neṣataḥ | Bhatt. proposes to emend neṣaḥ pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamāno viśvarūpā kāmadughāsy ekā ||
jyotiṣmantaṃ sukṛtāṃ lokam īpsan pañcaudanaṃ brahmaṇe 'jaṃ dadāti | sa vyāpnuhy abhi lokaṃ jayāsmai śivo 'smabhyaṃ pratigṛhīta edhi || ajas trināke tridive tripṛṣṭhe sukṛtāṃ loke dadivāṃsaṃ dadhāti | Bhatt. yadivāsaṃ pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamānaḥ sa dātāraṃ tṛptyā tarpayāsi || ajo hy agner ajaniṣṭa śokād vipro viprasya sahaso vayodhāḥ | hutam iṣṭam abhipūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ tad devā ṛtuśaḥ kalpayantu || amotaṃ vāso dadhyād dhiraṇyam api dakṣiṇām | tathā lokān samāpnuyād ye divyā ye ca pārthivāḥ || etās tvāja dhārā upa yantu viśvataḥ Bhatt. tvāda, but with proposal of emend. somyā devīr ghṛtapṛṣṭhā madhuścutaḥ | stabhāna pṛthivīṃ divaṃ sacasva nāke tiṣṭhāsy adhi saptaraśmau || pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyā iti catasraḥ || PS 3.38.8-11 are repeated (…) || PS 3.38.9 is repeated (…) || PS 3.38.10 is repeated (…) || PS 3.38.11 is repeated pañcaudanaṃ pañcabhir aṅgulībhir darvyod dhara pañcadhaudanam etam | prācīṃ diśaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pratīcīm udīcīṃ dhruvām ūrdhvāṃ diśam ā kramasva ||
prācyāṃ diśi śiro ajasya dhehi dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇaṃ dhehi pārśvam | pratīcyāṃ diśi bhasadam asya udīcyāṃ diśy uttaraṃ dhehi pārśvam || ajasyānūkam ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi dhehi Bhatt. ajasyānukam diśi dhehi pājasyaṃ dhruvāyām | antarikṣe madhyato madhyam asya padbhiś caturbhiḥ prati tiṣṭha dikṣu || śṛtam ajaṃ śṛtayā prorṇuhi tvacā sarvair aṅgaiḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ viśvarūpam | sa ut tiṣṭha prehi nākam uttamaṃ padbhiś caturbhiḥ prati tiṣṭha dikṣu || sarvā diśaḥ saṃvidānāḥ sadhrīcīḥ sāntardeśāḥ prati gṛhṇantu tejasam | te rakṣantu tava tubhyam etaṃ tābhyo juhomi haviṣā ghṛtena || yaṃ brāhmaṇe nidadhe yaṃ ca vikṣu Bhatt. nidade … dikṣu yā vipruṣa odanānām ajasya | sarvaṃ tad agne sukṛtasya loke jānītān naḥ saṃgamane pathīnām || ajaḥ pañcaudano vy akramata | tasyora iyam abhavad udaram antarikṣaṃ dyauḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ diśaḥ pārśve || ditiś cāditiś ca śṛṅge satyaṃ ca rtaṃ ca cakṣuṣī | viśvaṃ rūpaṃ śraddhā prāṇo virāṭ śiraḥ || eṣa vā aparimito yajño yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ | Bhatt. adaḥ, with proposal of emend. ad 16.100.3b aparimitaṃ lokaṃ jayaty aparimitaṃ lokam ava rundhe ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti || nāsyāsthīni bhindyān Bhatt. bhindyāṃ na majjño nir dhayet | Bhatt. majño nirdaye sarvāṇi samādāya- -idaṃidaṃ pra veśayet || Bhatt. samādāyevim idaṃ pra veśaye idam idam asya rūpaṃ tenainaṃ saṃ gamayati | svadhām ūrjam akṣitiṃ maho asmai duhe ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti ||
indrāya bhāgaṃ savitā kṛṇotv imaṃ yajñaṃ yajñapatiś ca sūriḥ | ye no dveṣanty anu tān rabhasva- Bhatt. tā -ariṣṭā vīrā yajamānasya sarve || emend. Kim 2019; Bhatt. yajamānaś ca pañca lokāḥ pañca rtavaḥ | pañcasv ṛtuṣv ṛdhnoti Bhatt. pañcasututuṣṭudhnoti, with this proposal of emend. ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti || eṣa vai nidāgho yajño yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ | Bhatt. adaḥ, with this proposal of emend. nir apriyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ dahati nir with ŚS; Bhatt. narapriyaṃ bhavaty ātmanā parāsyāpriyo bhrātṛvyo bhavati (…) || see 2c yo vā āyantam ity ṛtuṃ veda | Bhatt. ṛtaṃ, with proposal of this emend. āyatīm evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ādatte bhavaty ātmanā (…) see 3d (…) || see 2c (…) vai saṃyantam iti (…) | see 4a saṃyatīm eva (…) || see 4bcd (…) vai bhavantam iti (…) | see 4a bhavantīm eva (…) || see 4bcd (…) vā abhibhavantam iti (…) | see 4a abhibhavantīm eva (…) || see 4bcd (…) vā udyantam iti (…) | see 4a udyatīm eva (…) || see 4bcd (…) vai mūrdhānam iti (…) | see 4a mūrdhnīm eva (…) || see 4bcd yo vai sarvam ity ṛtuṃ veda | sarvām evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ādatte bhavaty ātmanā parāsyāpriyo bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ viduṣe 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dadāti || yāvanty asya lomāni brahmāstṛṇoti vedyām | tāvatīr asya dhārāḥ samudrasyevākṣitāḥ || duhāṃ kṣīraṃ bhavatu sarpir ebhyaḥ surā bhūtvopa tiṣṭhāt surāpām | madhor dhārā madhupebhyo duhāno 'jo nāke tiṣṭhatu modamānaḥ ||
skambheneme viṣkabhite dyauś ca bhūmiś ca tiṣṭhataḥ | skambha idaṃ sarvam ārpitam ejad yat prāṇan nimiṣac ca yat || Bhatt. ejat prāṇaṃ ekacakraṃ vartata ekanemi sahasrākṣaraṃ pra puro ni paścāt | ardhenedaṃ pari babhūva viśvaṃ yad asyārdhaṃ katamaḥ sa ketuḥ || pañcavāhi vahaty agram asya pṛṣṭayo yuktā anusaṃvahanti | ayātam asya dadṛśe na yātaṃ paraṃ nedīyo 'varaṃ davīyaḥ || idaṃ savitar vi jānīhi Bhatt. savitur ṣaḍ yamā eka ekajaḥ | tasmin hāpitvam icchante ya eṣām eka ekajaḥ || tiryagbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhno yasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam | atrāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta sākaṃ ye asya gopā mahato babhūvuḥ || tisro ha prajā atyāyam āyan ny anyā arkam abhito +'viśanta | Bhatt. viśantu bṛhan ha tasthau rajaso vimāno harito hariṇīr ā viveśa || dvādaśa pradhayaś cakram ekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tac ciketa | Bhatt. naddhāni tatrāhatās trīṇi śatāni śaṅkavaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca khīlā avicācalā ye || anantaṃ vitataṃ purutrā anantam antavac cā samakte | te nākapālaś carati prajānan vidvān bhūtaṃ yad u bhavyam asya || āviḥ san nihitaṃ guhā jaran nāma mahat padam | Bhatt. caran tatraidaṃ sarvam ārpitam ejat prāṇan nimiṣac ca yat || Bhatt. prāṇaṃ ūrdhvaṃ bharantam udakaṃ kumbhenevodahāryam | paśyanti sarve cakṣuṣā na sarve manasā viduḥ ||
ūnāt pūrṇam ud acati pūrṇād ūnam ud acyate | kaviṣ ṭad brahmā veda yatas tat pariṣicyate || prajāpatiś carati garbhe antar adṛśyamāno bahudhā pra jāyate | ardhena viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna yad asyārdhaṃ kim u taj jajāna || yad ejati carati yac ca tiṣṭhaty aprāṇat prāṇan nimiṣac ca tiṣṭhat | Bhatt. aprāṇaprāṇaṃ … ceṣṭata, with proposal for emend. tad dādhāra pṛthivīṃ viśvarūpaṃ tat saṃbhūya bhavaty ekam eva || yā purastād yujyate yota paścād Bhatt. yāḥ yā viśvato yujyate yota sarvataḥ | yayā yajñas tāyate prāṅ tāṃ tvā pṛcchāmi katamā nu sarcām || yataḥ sūrya udety astaṃ yatra ca gacchati | tad eva manye 'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tato nāpy eti kiṃ cana || satyenordhvas tapati brahmaṇā- -arvāṅ vi paśyati | prāṇena tiryaṅ prāṇati yasmin jyeṣṭham adhi śritam || Bhatt. yasmiṃ yo vai te vidyād araṇī yābhyāṃ nirmathyate vasu | sa vidvān jyeṣṭhaṃ manyeta Bhatt. vidyāṃ sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat || apād agre sam abhavat so agre svar ābharat | catuṣpād bhūtvā bhogyaḥ sarvam ādatta bhojanam || bhogyo bhavad atho annam adad bahu | yo devam uttarāvantam upāsātai sanātanam || sanātanam enam āhur utādyāsat punar navaḥ | ahorātre pra jāyete anyo anyasya rūpayoḥ ||
śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ nyarbudam asaṃkhyeyaṃ svam asmin niviṣṭam | tad asya ghnanty abhipaśyata eva tasmād devo rocate sa etat || ārāgramātraṃ dadṛśa utaikaṃ naiva dṛśyate | tataḥ pariṣvajīyasī devatā sā mama priyā || iyaṃ kalyāṇy ajarā martyasyāmṛtā gṛhe | yasmai kṛtā śaye sa yaś cakāra tadāra saḥ || tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumān asi tvaṃ kumāry uta vā kumāraḥ | tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi Bhatt. bhajjāsi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ || utaiṣa jyeṣṭha uta vā kaniṣṭha utaiṣa bhrātota vā pitaiṣaḥ | eko devo manasi praviṣṭaḥ prathamo jātaḥ sa u garbhe antaḥ || anejaty ejati sarvam asmin viśvā bhūtāni paryābhṛtasya | sa pumān puṃso janayann ṛtena sarvān antān gacchatu tiṣṭhann eva || madhye divo nihitaḥ pṛśniraśmā vi cakramāṇau rajasasphātyantau | sa viśvābhir abhi caṣṭe śacībhir antarā pūrvam aparaṃ ca ketum || ye arvāg uta vā purāṇe vedaṃ vidvāṃsam abhito vadanti | ādityam eva te pari vadanti sarve agniṃ dvitīyaṃ trivṛtaṃ ca haṃsam || ekām ṛcaṃ sam indhate dvādaśabhir agnibhiḥ | tasyām āpas tasyāṃ gāvas tasyām oṣadhayaḥ śritāḥ || sapta suparṇā upa dhamanta bāṇam anuṣṭubhā saṃbhṛtaṃ vāyum etam | tam ātataṃ vitataṃ tantum ātataṃ manaḥ punātu salilasya pṛṣṭhe || sapta ṛṣayaḥ pratihitāḥ śarīre sapta rakṣanti sadam apramādam | saptāpaḥ svapato lokam īyus tatra jāgṛto asvapnajau satrasadau ca devau ||
anuvāka 16 ||
bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ mābhi yātaṃ bhūtapatī paśupatī namo vām | pratihitam āyatāṃ mā vi srāṣṭaṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ dvipado mā catuṣpadaḥ || śune kroṣṭre mā śarīrāṇi kartam Bhatt. karttum aliklavebhyo gṛdhrebhyo ye ca kṛṣṇā aviṣyavaḥ | makṣikāḥ paśupate vayāṃsi te vighase mā vidanta || ŚS vidanta; Bhatt. viyanta krandāya te prāṇāya te yāś ca te bhava ropayaḥ | namas te rudra kṛṇmaḥ sahasrākṣāmartya || purastāt te namaḥ kṛṇma uttarād adharād uta | abhīvargād divas pary Bhatt. abhīvargā antarikṣāya te namaḥ || mukhāya te paśupate yāni cakṣūṃṣi te bhava | tvace rūpāya saṃdṛśe pratīcīnāya te namaḥ || aṅgebhya udarāya jihvāyā āsyāya ca | dadbhyo gandhāya te namaḥ || astrā nīlaśikhaṇḍena sahasrākṣeṇa vājinā | rudreṇādhvagaghātinā Bhatt. -kaghātinā tena mā sam arāmahi || sa no bhavaḥ pari vṛṇaktu viśvata āpa ivāgniḥ pari vṛṇaktu no bhavaḥ | mā no abhi maṃsta namo astv asmai || catur namo aṣṭakṛtvo bhavāya daśa kṛtvaḥ paśupate namas te | taveme pañca paśavo vibhaktā gāvo aśvāḥ puruṣā ād ajāvayaḥ || tava catasraḥ pradiśas tava dyaus tavedam ugrorv antarikṣam | tavedaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yad ejad adhi bhūmyām ||
uruḥ kośo vasudhānas tavāyaṃ yasminn imā viśvā bhūtāny antaḥ | sa no mṛḍa paśupate namas te paraḥ kroṣṭāro abhibhāḥ śvānaḥ | paro yantv agharudo vikeśyaḥ || dhanur bibharṣi haritaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasraghni śatavadhaṃ śikhaṇḍin | thus ŚS; Bhatt. śikhaṇḍinam+ rudrasyeṣuś carati devahetis tasmai namo yatamasyāṃ diśītaḥ || Bhatt. yatamasyān yo 'bhiyāto nilayate tvām ugra nicikīrṣati | paścād anuprayuṅkṣe taṃ viddhasya padanīr iva || Bhatt. patanīr bhavārudrau sayujā saṃvidānāv ubhā ugrau carato vīryāya | tayor bhūmir antarikṣaṃ svar dyaus tābhyāṃ namo bhavamatyāya kṛṇmaḥ || namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate | namas te rudra tiṣṭhata āsīnāyota te namaḥ || namaḥ sāyaṃ namaḥ prātar namo rātryā namo divā | bhavāya ca śarvāya ca- -ubhābhyām akaraṃ namaḥ || sahasrākṣam atipaśyaṃ purastād rudram asyantaṃ bahudhā vipaścitam | mopārāma jihvayeyamānam || śyāvāsvāṃ kṛṣṇam asitaṃ mṛṇantaṃ Bhatt. gṛṇantaṃ bhīmaṃ rathaṃ keśinaḥ pādayantam | pūrve pratīmo namo astv asmai || Bhatt. pratīvo mā no 'bhi srā matyaṃ devahetiṃ Bhatt. devahatiṃ mā naḥ krudhaḥ paśupate namas te | anyatrāsmad divyāṃ śākhāṃ vi dhūnu || mā no hiṃsīr adhi brūhi pari ṇo vṛṅdhi mā krudha | Bhatt. kṣudhaḥ mā tvayā sam arāmahi ||
mā no aśveṣu goṣu puruṣeṣu mā gṛdho no ajāviṣu | anyatrogra vi vartaya piyārūṇāṃ prajāṃ jahi || Bhatt. priyārūṇāṃ yasya takmā kāsikā hetir ekā- -aśvasyeva vṛṣaṇaḥ kranda eti | Bhatt. krandaheti abhipūrvaṃ nirṇayate namo astv asmai || yas tiṣṭhati viṣṭabhito antarikṣe 'yajvanaḥ pramṛṇan devapīyūn | Bhatt. pramṛṇaṃ tasmai namo daśabhiḥ śakvarībhiḥ || tubhyam āraṇyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitās tubhyaṃ vayāṃsi śakunāḥ patatriṇaḥ | tava yakṣmaṃ paśupate apsv antas tubhyaṃ kṣaranti divyā āpo vṛdhe || śiṃśumārā ajagarāḥ pulīkayā jaṣā matsyā Bhatt. jagā rajasā yebhyo asyasi | na te dūraṃ na pariṣṭha- -asti te bhava sadyaḥ sarvāṃ pari paśyasi bhūmim || Bhatt. sarvān pūrvasmād dhaṃsy uttarasmin samudre mā no rudra takmanā na viṣeṇa | mā naḥ saṃ srā divyenāgninā- -anyatrāsmad vidyutāṃ pātayaitām || bhavo divo bhava īśe pṛthivyā bhava ā papra urv antarikṣam | tasya na prāpad ducchunā kā caneha || Bhatt. prāpata bhava rājan yajamānāya mṛḍa paśūnāṃ hi paśupatir babhūtha | Bhatt. babhūvitha yaḥ śraddadhāti santi devā iti catuṣpade dvipade asya mṛḍa || mā no mahāntam uta mā no arbhakaṃ mā naḥ kṣiyantam uta mā no akṣitaḥ | mā no hiṃsīḥ pitaraṃ mota mātaraṃ svāṃ tanvaṃ rudra mā rīriṣo naḥ || Bhatt. tanuṃ rudrasyailabakārebhyo 'saṃsūktagirebhyaḥ | idaṃ mahāsyebhyaḥ śvabhyo akaraṃ namaḥ || namas te ghoṣiṇībhyo namas te keśinībhyaḥ | namaḥ saṃyatībhyo namo namasvatībhyaḥ ||
namas te jāyamānāyai jātāyā uta te namaḥ | bālebhyaḥ śaphebhyo rūpāyāghnye te namaḥ || yo vidyāt sapta pravataḥ sapta vidyāt parāvataḥ | śiro yajñasya yo vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt || vedāhaṃ sapta pravataḥ sapta veda parāvataḥ | śiro yajñasyāhaṃ veda somaṃ cāsyāṃ vicakṣaṇam || yayā dyaur yayā pṛthivī yayāpo gupitā imāḥ | vaśāṃ sahasradhārāṃ brahmaṇācchā vadāmasi || śataṃ vatsāḥ śataṃ dogdhāraḥ śataṃ goptāro adhi pṛṣṭhe asyāḥ | ye devās tasyāṃ prāṇanti te vaśāṃ vidur ekadhā || yajñapadīrākṣīrā svadhāprāṇā mahīlukā | vaśā parjanyapatnī devām̐ apyeti brahmaṇā || anu tvāgniḥ prāviśad anu somo vaśe tvā | ūdhas te bhadre parjanyo vidyutas te stanā vaśe || apas tvaṃ dhukṣe prathamā urvarā aparā vaśe | tṛtīyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dhukṣe annaṃ kṣīraṃ vaśe tvam || yad ādityair hūyamānā- -upatiṣṭha ṛtāvari | indraḥ sahasraṃ pātraiḥ somaṃ tvāpāyayad vaśe || Bhatt. tvāpāyad yad anūcīndram air Bhatt. ayirāṭ āt tva ṛṣabho 'hvayat | tasmāt te vṛtrahā payaḥ kṣīraṃ kruddho 'bharad vaśe ||
yat te kruddho dhanapatiḥ kṣīraṃ te abharad vaśe | idaṃ tad adya nākas triṣu pātreṣu rakṣati || triṣu pātreṣu taṃ somam ā devy abharad vaśā | atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye || saṃ hi somenāgata sam u sarveṇa padvatā | vaśā samudre prānartīd ṛcaḥ sāmāni bibhratī || saṃ hi sūryeṇāgata sam u sarveṇa cakṣuṣā | vaśā samudram aty aṣṭhād gandharvaiḥ kalibhiḥ saha || saṃ hi vātenāgata sam u sarvaiḥ patatribhiḥ | vaśā samudram aty akhyad bhadrā jyotīṃṣi bibhratī || tad bhadrāḥ sam agacchanta vaśā deṣṭry atho svadhā | atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye || abhīvṛtā hiraṇyena yad atiṣṭha ṛtāvari | aśvaḥ samudro bhūtvā- -adhy askandad vaśe tvā || vaśā mātā rājanyasya vaśā mātā svadhe tava | vaśāyā jajña āyudhaṃ Bhatt. yajña tataś cittam ajāyata || ūrdhvo bindur ud acarad brahmaṇaḥ kakudād adhi | tatas tvaṃ jajñiṣe vaśe tato hotā ajāyata || āsnas te gāthā bhavantu- -uṣṇihābhyo balaṃ tava | pājasyāj jajñe te yajña stanebhyo raśmayo vaśe ||
īrmābhyām ayanaṃ jātaṃ sakthibhyāṃ ca vaśe tava | Bhatt. śaktibhyāṃ āntrebhyo atrā jajñira udarād adhi vīrudhaḥ || yad udaraṃ varuṇasya- -anu prāviśathā vaśe | Bhatt. prāviśatā tatas tvā brahmodahvayat sa hi netram avet tava || sarve garbhād avepanta jāyamānād asūsvaḥ | Bhatt. asusvaḥ sasūva hi tām āhur vaśeti Bhatt. sasuva brahmaṇā kl̥pta uta bandhur asyāḥ || yudha ekaḥ saṃ sṛjati yo asyā eka id vaśī | tarāṃsi yajñā abhavan tarasāṃ cakṣur abhavad vaśā || vaśā sūryaṃ praty agṛhṇād vaśā yajñam adhārayat | vaśāyām antar āviśad odano brahmaṇā saha || vaśām evāhur amṛtaṃ vaśāṃ mṛtyum upāsate | vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad devā Bhatt. vasedaṃ manuṣyā asurāḥ pitara ṛṣayaḥ || ya evaṃ vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt | tathā hi yajñaḥ sarvapād duhe dātre anapasphuran || Bhatt. anvasphuraṃ tisro jihvā varuṇasya- -antar didyaty āsani | tāsāṃ yā madhye rājati sa vaśā duṣpratigrahā || caturdhā reto abhavad vaśāyā apas turīyam amṛtaṃ turīyaṃ yajñas turīyaṃ paśavas turīyam | ya evaṃ vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt || vaśā dyaur vaśā pṛthivī vaśā viṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ | vaśāyā dugdham apiban sādhyā vasavaś ca ye ||
vaśāyā dugdhaṃ pītvā sādhyā vasavaś ca ye | amī bradhnasya viṣṭapi payo asyā upāsate || somam enām eke duhre ghṛtam eka upāsate | ya evaṃ viduṣe vaśāṃ dadus te gatās tridivaṃ divaḥ || vaśāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ Bhatt. da(t)tvā sarvāṃl lokān sam aśnute | Bhatt. sarvāllokān ṛtaṃ hy asyām āhitam api brahmātho tapaḥ || vaśāṃ devā upa jīvanti vaśāṃ manuṣyā uta | vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad yāvat sūryo vipaśyati ||
anuvāka 17 ||
yo vā ekaṃ brahmānuṣṭhyā vidyāt sa vā adya mahad vadet || parūṃṣi yasya saṃbhārā ṛco yasyānūkyam || chandāṃsi yasya lomāni paristaraṇam id dhavir yajur hṛdayam ucyate || yad atithipatir atithīn pratipaśyati devayajanaṃ prekṣate || yad abhivadati dīkṣām upaiti yad udakaṃ yācaty apaḥ pra ṇayati | yā yajñā apaḥ praṇīyante tā eva tāḥ || yat tarpaṇam āharanti yo 'gnīṣomīyaḥ paśur badhyate sa eva saḥ || yat khātam āharanti puroḍāśā eva tau yad āvasathān kalpayanti sadohavirdhānāny eva tat kalpayanti || yad upastṛṇanti barhir eva tat || yat kaśipūpabarhaṇāny āharanti paridhaya eva te | yad upariśayanam āharanti svargam eva tena lokam ava rundhe || yad abhyañjanam āharanty ājyam eva tat | yad aśanakṛtaṃ hvayanti haviṣkṛtam eva tad u hvayanti | yad vrīhayo yad yavā nirupyante aṃśava eva te ny upyante ||
ulūkhalaṃ musalaṃ grāvāṇau Bhatt. ulūkhalamusalaṃ śūrpaṃ pavitraṃ tūṣā ṛjīṣaḥ | srug darvir mekṣaṇam āyavanam āpo 'bhiṣavaṇī yad droṇakalaśaḥ kumbhī || Bhatt. āpobhiṣavaṇī droṇakalaśaḥ idam eva kṛṣṇājinaṃ vāyavyāni pātrāṇi | yajamānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vā etad atithipatiḥ kṛṇute Bhatt. yajamānabrāhmaṇaṃ yad āhāryāṇy avekṣata idaṃ bhūyā idām iti || yad āha bhūya uddhareti prajāṃ caiva tena paśūṃś ca vardhayate prāṇam eva tena varṣīyāṃsaṃ kṛṇute | yat saṃpṛcchati kāmam eva tenāva rundhe kāmaṃ hi pṛṣṭo yācati || yad udakam abhiṣiñcaty apa eva tenāva rundhe | yad upaharati havīṃṣy ā sādayati || teṣām āsannānām atithir ātmani juhoti | srukkāreṇa vaṣatkāreṇa srucā hastena prāṇe yūpe ||
tasmān na dviṣann adyān na dviṣato 'nnam adyān na mīmāṃsitasya na mīmāṃsyamānasya || sarvo vā eṣo jagdhapāpmā yasyānnam aśnanti || sarva u eṣo 'jagdhapāpmā yasyānnaṃ nāśnanti || prajāpater vā eṣa vikrāntam anuvikrame ya upaharanti || prajāpatyo vā etasyaiva yajño vitato ya upaharati || sarvadā vā eṣa sutasomo yuktagrāvārdrapavitra āhṛtayajñakratur vitatādhavaro ya upaharati || yo 'tithīnāṃ sa āhavanīyo yo 'nnakaraṇaḥ sa dakṣiṇāgnir yo veśmani sa gārhapatyaḥ || iṣṭaṃ ca vā eṣa pūrtaṃ cāśnāti yaḥ pūrvo 'tither aśnāti || prajāṃ ca vā eṣa paśūṃś cāśnāti (…) || see 8b ūrjaṃ ca vā eṣa payaś ca gṛhāṇām aśnāti yaḥ pūrvo 'tither aśnāti || eṣa vā atithir yac chrotriyaḥ || tasmāt pūrvo nāśnīyād aśitāvaty aśnīyāt tad vratam || yajñasyāvicchedāya yajñasya guptaye yajñasya sātmatvāya ||
yat kṣīram upasicyopaharati yāvad agniṣṭomea samṛddheneṣṭvāvarundhe tāvad enenāva rundhe || yat sarpir upasicyopaharati yāvat sāhnena samṛddhena (…) || yan madhūpasicyopaharati yāvad atirātreṇa samṛddhena (…) || yan māṃsam upasicyopaharati yāvad dvādaśāhnena samṛddheneṣṭvāvarundhe tāvad enenāva rundhe || yad udakam upasicyopaharati prajānāṃ prajananāya jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na punar ā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda ||
tasmai vāta uṣā hiṅ kṛṇoti savitā bhūtyā pra stauti bṛhaspatir ūrjayodgāyati tvaṣṭā puṣṭyā prati harati viśve devā nidhanam | nidhanaṃ bhūtyāḥ prajāyāḥ paśūnāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || tasmā udyant sūryo hiṅkṛṇoti saṃgavaḥ pra stauti madhyandina udgāyaty aparāhṇaḥ prati haraty astaṃyan nidhanam | (…) || see 1d tasmā abhro bhavan hiṅ kṛṇoti vidyotamānaḥ pra stauti stanayann udgāyati varṣan prati haraty udgṛhṇan nidhanam | Bhatt. varṣaṃ … udgṛhṇaṃ (…) || see 1d atithīn prati paśyati hiṅ kṛṇoty abhi vadati pra stauty udakaṃ yācaty udgāyaty upa harati prati haraty ucchiṣṭaṃ nidhanam | nidhanaṃ bhūtyāḥ prajāyāḥ paśūnāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
ete vai priyāś cāpriyāś ca rtvijaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti yad atithayaḥ || yat kṣattāraṃ hvayaty ā śrāvayati yat pratiśṛṇoti praty ā śrāvayati || yat pariveṣṭāra āvasathān prapadyante Bhatt. āvasathāṃ camasādhvaryava eva te teṣāṃ naikaś canāhotā || yat prātar upaharati prātaḥsavanam eva tat || yad dīvopaharati mādhyaṃdinam eva tat savanam || yat sāyam upaharati tṛtīyasavanam eva tat || yad atithipatir atithīn pariviṣyāsanaṃ yācate Bhatt. pariviśyāsanaṃ avabhṛtham eva tad upāvaiti || Bhatt. upāvayati yat sabhāgayati dakṣiṇām eva tat sabhāgayati yad anutiṣṭhaty udavasyaty eva tat ||
sa upahūtaḥ pṛthivyāṃ bhakṣayaty Bhatt. makṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yat pṛthivyāṃ viśvarūpam | pṛthivyāṃ tapati pṛthivyām ā bhāti svargaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda || sa upahūto antarikṣe bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yad antarikṣe viśvarūpam | antarikṣe tapaty antarikṣa ā bhāti (…) || see 1d sa upahūto divi bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yad divi viśvarūpam | divi tapati divy ā bhāti (…) || see 1d sa upahūto deveṣu bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yad deveṣu viśvarūpam | deveṣu tapati deveṣv ā bhāti (…) || see 1d sa upahūto lokeṣu bhakṣayaty upahūtas tasmin yal lokeṣu viśvarūpam | lokeṣu tapati lokeṣv ā bhāti svargaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
yat prāṅ āsīno virvapati yajñāya ca devebhyaś cā vṛścate || yad dakṣiṇāsīno nirvapati yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate || yat pratyaṅ āsīno nirvapati varuṇāyāpsuṣada ā vṛścate || Bhatt. varuṇāyāpsuṣade cā vṛścate yad udaṅ āsīno nirvapati somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cāvṛścate || Bhatt. sapaṛṣibhyaś yad upasthaṃ kṛtvāsīno nirvapati vāyave cāntarikṣāya cā vṛścate || yad ūrdhvas tiṣṭhan nirvapati dive cādityāya cāvṛścate ||
yaṃ kāmayeta pāpīyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena syād iti | tasyaivaṃ nir vapet tasyaivaṃ nirupyaivam evānu nirvapet | tadaiva sa pāpīyān ātmanā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena bhavati- idamidaṃ kuryāt sā prāyaścītiḥ || yaṃ kāmayeta na vasīyān na śreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena syād iti | tasyaivaṃ nir vapet tasyaivaṃ nirupayaivam evānu nirvapet | tadaiva sa na vasīyān na śreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena bhavati- idamidaṃ kuryāt sa prāyaścittiḥ || yaṃ kāmayeta vasīyāñ chreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena syād iti | tasyaivaṃ nir vapet tasyaivaṃ nirupyaivam evānu nirvapet | tadaiva sa vasīyāñ chreyān ātmanā prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena bhavati- idamidaṃ kuryāt sā prāyaścittiḥ ||
yad avahanyamānasya taṇḍula skandati samāṃsamāmasya varaḥ pramāyuko bhavati || yad ayastā bhavati pitṛdevatyaṃ karoti || yad viṣyandate gṛhāṇāṃ ca paśūnāṃ ca payo vi ṣyandate || yad apasiñcati gṛhāṇāṃ ca paśūnāṃ ca payo 'pa siñcati || yad āyavanī śīryate gṛhapatir mriyate || yad darviḥ śīryate gṛhapatnī mriyate || yat kumbhī vikasati sarvajyānir dātā ca pratigṛhītā ca jīyete ||
yat prāñcam udvartayati yajñāya ca devebhyaś cā vṛścate || yad dakṣiṇāñcam udvartayati yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate || yat pratyañcam udvartayati varuṇāyāpsuṣada ā vṛścate || Bhatt. varuṇāyāpsuṣade cā yad udañcam udvartayati somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cā vṛścate || yad anuvṛttam uddharati diśodiśa evainaṃ bhayam ā gacchati ||
yat prācīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāti yajñāya ca devebhyaś cā vṛścate || yad dakṣiṇācīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāti yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate || yat pratīcīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāty akṛtapūrvaṃ karoti || yad udīcīnaṃ barhi stṛṇāti somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yat purastāt pātrasya tsaruṃ karoty arśaḥ pratigrahītur mukhe jāyate || yad dakṣiṇataḥ pātrasya tsaruṃ karoti yamāya ca pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate || yat paścāt pātrasya tsaruṃ karoti pratīcī pratigrahītāraṃ śaravya rcchati || yad uttarataḥ pātrasya tsaruṃ karoti somāya ca rājñe saptaṛṣibhyaś cā vṛścate ||
yac chukro bhavaty ādityānām eva priyaṃ dhāmopaiti | sa yaḥ śukraṃ prāśnīyād ādityānāṃ tvā priyeṇa dhāmnā prāśnāmīty enaṃ prāśnīyāt | tataś cainam anyena dhāmnā prāśnāty ādityebhyaś cā vṛścate || yat phalīkṛto bhavati viśveṣām eva devānāṃ priyaṃ (…) | see 1b sa yaḥ phalīkṛtaṃ prāśnīyād viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ priyeṇa dhāmnā (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnāti see 1e viśvebhyo devebhyaś cā vṛścate || Bhatt. devebhya ā yad aphalīkṛto bhavati marutām eva priyaṃ (…) | see 1b sa yo 'phalīkṛtaṃ prāśnīyān marutāṃ tvā priyeṇa (…) | (…) prāśnāti see 1e marudbhyaś cā vṛścate || Bhatt. marudbhya ā yad avakṣāmo bhavaty agner eva (…) | see 1b sa yo 'vakṣāmaṃ prāśnīyād agnes tvā priyeṇa (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnāty see 1e agnaye cā vṛścate || Bhatt. agnaya ā yad anavakṣāmo bhavati mitrāvaruṇayor eva (…) | see 1b sa yo 'navakṣāmaṃ prāśnīyān mitrāvaruṇayos tvā priyeṇa (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnāti see 1e mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ cā vṛścate || Bhatt. mitrāvaruṇābhyām ā yad aklinno bhavati- -indrasyaiva (…) | see 1b sa yo 'klinnaṃ prāśnīyād indrasya tvā (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnāti- see 1e -indrāya cā vṛścate || Bhatt. -indrāyā yat klinno bhavati pitṝṇām eva (…) | see 1b sa yaḥ klinnaṃ prāśnīyāt pitṝṇāṃ tvā (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnāti see 1e pitṛbhyaś cā vṛścate || Bhatt. pitṛbhya ā yat kṣudro bhavaty apām eva (…) | see 1b sa yaḥ kṣudraṃ prāśnīyād apāṃ tvā priyeṇa (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnāty see 1e adbhyaś cā vṛścate || Bhatt. adbhya cā yac chithiro bhavati diśām eva (…) | see 1b sa yaḥ śithiraṃ prāśnīyād diśāṃ tvā (…) | [see 1d (…) prāśnāti see 1e digbhyaś cā vṛścate || Bhatt. digbhya ā yad gulantī bhavati prajāpater eva (…) | see 1b sa yo gulantinaṃ prāśnīyāt prajāpateṣ ṭvā (…) | see 1d (…) prāśnāti see 1e prajāpataye cā vṛścate || Bhatt. prajāpataya ā yac chuṣko bhavaty ūrdhvanabhasa eva priyaṃ dhāmopaiti | sa yaḥ śuṣkaṃ prāśnīyād ūrdhvanabhasas tvā priyeṇa dhāmnā prāśnāmīty enaṃ prāśnīyāt | tataś cainam anyena dhāmnā prāśnāty ūrdhvanabhase cā vṛścate || Bhatt. ūrdhvanabhasa ā
yat kṣīram upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti kilāsaḥ pratigrahītā bhavati || yat sarpir upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti sarpaḥ pratigrahītāraṃ hanti || yan madhūpasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti mahādevaḥ pratigrahītāraṃ hanti || yan māṃsam upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnātīśānaḥ pratigrahītāraṃ hanti || yad udakam upasicya prathamaṃ prāśnāti tat samṛddham | jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda ||
yat prāśiṣyan purastād atimṛśati | prāṅ pratigrahītuḥ prāṇaḥ pra krāmati tata evotthāya pra vrajati śiras tasya rujatīti dvādaśīn nāti jīvaty evaṃ cainaṃ prāśnantam upadraṣṭā gṛhṇāti || yat prāśiṣyan dakṣiṇataḥ pramṛśati | dakṣiṇā pratigrahītuḥ (…) || see stanza 1 yat prāśiṣyann uttarataḥ parimṛśaty udaṅ pratigrahītuḥ prāṇaḥ pra krāmati tata evotthāya pra vrajati śiras tasya rujatīti dvādaśīn nāti jīvaty evaṃ cainaṃ prāśnantam upadraṣṭā gṛhṇāti || yat prāśiṣyan paścāt prāñcam abhimṛśati | śarmaṇā caivainaṃ tad varmaṇā cābhi mṛśati śarma caivāsmai varma ca bhavati jayaty odanam odanaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

indrasyauja sthendrasya saha sthendrasya balaṃ stha- -indrasya nṛmṇaṃ sthendrasya śukraṃ sthendrasya vīryaṃ stha | jiṣṇave yogāyendrayogair vo yunajmi jiṣṇave yogāya viśvāni mā rūpāṇy upa tiṣṭhantu yuktā ma āpa stha || Bhatt. māpa (…) see 1ab (…) yogāya kṣatrayogair vaḥ (…) || see 1cde (…) see 1ab (…) yogāya brahmayogair vaḥ (…) || see 1cde (…) see 1ab (…) yogāyānnayogair vaḥ (…) || see 1cde indrasyauja sthendrasya saha sthendrasya balaṃ stha- -indrasya nṛmṇaṃ sthendrasya śukraṃ sthendrasya vīryaṃ stha | jiṣṇave yogāyāpāṃ yogair vo yunajmi jiṣṇave yogāya viśvāni mā rūpāṇy upa tiṣṭhantu yuktā ma āpa stha || Bhatt. yo va āpo apāṃ bhāgo 'psv antar yajuṣyo devayajanaḥ | Bhatt. om. 'psv antar idaṃ tam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhy ava nikṣi | tena tam abhy ati sṛjāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | taṃ vadheyaṃ taṃ stṛṣīyānena brahmaṇānena karmaṇānayā menyā || Bhatt. stviṣīyānena (…) apām ūrmir apsv antar yajuṣyaḥ (…) || see stanza 1; Bhatt. mūrmuryajuṣyo (…) apāṃ vegaḥ (…) || see stanza 1 (…) apāṃ binduḥ (…) || see stanza 1 (…) apāṃ garbhaḥ (…) || see stanza 1 (…) apāṃ vatsaḥ (…) || see stanza 1 (…) apāṃ vṛṣabhaḥ (…) || see stanza 1 (…) apām aśmā pṛśnir divyo 'psv antar yajuṣyaḥ (…) || see stanza 1 yo va āpo apāṃ hiraṇyagarbho 'psv antar yajuṣyo devayajanaḥ | Bhatt. om. apāṃ idaṃ tam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhy ava nikṣi | tena tam (…) || see 1cde ye va āpo apām agnayo 'psv antar yajuṣyā devayajanāḥ | Bhatt. yo idaṃ tān ati sṛjāmi tān mābhy ava nikṣi | tais tam abhy ati sṛjāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | taṃ vadheyaṃ taṃ stviṣīyānena brahmaṇānena karmaṇānayā menyā ||
yad arvācīnam aikahāyanād anṛtaṃ kiṃ codima | āpo mā tasmād enaso duritāt pāntu viśvataḥ || ariprā āpo apa ripram asmat | prāsmad eno duritaṃ supratīkāḥ pra duṣvapnyaṃ pra malaṃ vahantu || samudraṃ vo 'pa sṛjāmi svāṃ yonim apītana | Bhatt. apīhi ariṣṭāḥ sarvahāyaso mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat ||
viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā pṛthivīsaṃśito 'gnitejāḥ | pṛthivīm anu vi krame 'haṃ pṛthivyās taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | pūrvajān sapatnān avainān bādhe aty enān kramāmy apāṅ apanuttaḥ sapatnaḥ || viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā- -antarikṣasaṃśito vāyutejāḥ | antarikṣam anu vi krame 'ham antarikṣāt taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | sahajān sapatnān (…) || see 1fg viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā dyusaṃśitaḥ sūryatejāḥ | divam anu vi krame 'haṃ divas taṃ nir bhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ | aparajān sapatnān (…) || see 1fg (…) sapatnahā see 1a diksaṃśito vātatejāḥ | diśo anu vi krame 'haṃ digbhyas tam (…) || see 1defg (…) sapatnahā- see 1a -āśāsaṃsito manastejāḥ | āśā anu vi krame 'ham āśābhyas tam (…) || see 1defg (…) sapatnahā- see 1a -apsaṃsito varuṇatejāḥ | apo anu vi krame 'ham adbhyas tam (…) || see 1defg (…) sapatnahā see 1a ṛksaṃśitaḥ sāmatejāḥ | ṛco anu vi krame 'haṃ ṛgbhyas tam (…) || see 1defg (…) sapatnahā see 1a yajñasaṃśito brahmatejāḥ | yajñam anu vi krame 'haṃ yajñāt tam (…) || see 1defg (…) sapatnahā- see 1a -oṣadhīsaṃśitaḥ somatejāḥ | oṣadhīr anu vi krame 'ham oṣadhībhyas tam (…) || see 1defg (…) sapatnahā see 1a kṛṣisaṃśitaḥ puruṣatejāḥ | kṛṣim anu vi krame 'haṃ kṛṣyās tam (…) || see 1defg viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā prāṇasaṃśito 'nnatejāḥ | prāṇam anu vi krame 'haṃ prāṇāt taṃ nirbhajāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ ||
agamaṃ svar agamaṃ jyotir abhy aṣṭhāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā arātīḥ | yo +'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasyedaṃ prāṇam āyur ni veṣṭayāmi- -idam enam adhamaṃ tamo gamayāmi || sūryasyāvṛtam anv āvarte dakṣiṇām anv āvṛtam | diśo jyotiṣmatīr abhi paryāvarte sapta ṛṣīn abhi paryāvarte brahmābhi paryāvarte brāhmaṇān abhi paryāvarte | te me draviṇaṃ yacchantu te me brāhmaṇavarcasam || yat te 'nnaṃ bhuvaspata ākṣiyati pṛthivīm anu | Bhatt. ākṣayatu tasya nas tvaṃ bhuvaspate saṃprayaccha prajāpate | yaṃ vayaṃ mṛgayāmahe taṃ vadhai stṛṇavāmahi || vyātte parameṣṭhino brahmaṇāpīpadāma tam | Bhatt. brahmaṇāpīpadāmṛ vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ mṛtyus taṃ samadhād abhi || Bhatt. ibhiḥ iyaṃ taṃ psātv āhutiḥ samid devī sahīyasī | rājño varuṇasya bandho 'si so *'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram anne prāṇe badhāna || Bhatt. somam apām asmai vajraṃ pra harāmi caturbhṛṣṭiṃ śīrṣabhidyāya vidvān | so asya parvā pra śṛṇātu sarvā tan me devā hy anu jānantu viśve || Bhatt. anu mā jānantu yad agne tapasā tapa upa prekṣāmahe vayam | priyāḥ śrutasya bhūyāsma- Bhatt. priyā -āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ ||

anuvāka 19 ||
aghāyatām api nahyā mukhāni sapatneṣu vajram arpayaitam | indreṇa dattā prathamā śataudanā bhrātṛvyaghnī yajamānāya gātuḥ || vediṣ ṭe carma bhavatu barhir lomāni yāni te | eṣā tvā raśanāgrahīd grāvā tvaiṣo 'dhi nṛtyatu || Bhatt. tveṣodhi bālās te prokṣaṇīḥ santu jihvā saṃ mārṣṭv aghnye | śuddhā tvaṃ yajñiyā bhūtvā divaṃ prehi śataudane || yaḥ śataudanāṃ pacati kāmapreṇa sa kalpate | Bhatt. si prītā hy asya ṛtvijaḥ sarve yanti yathāyatham || ye te devi śamitāraḥ paktāro ye ca te janāḥ | ete tvā sarve gopsyanti Bhatt. gopsanti maibhyo bhaiṣīḥ śataudane || sa svargam ā rohati yatrādas tridivaṃ divaḥ | hiraṇyajyotiṣaṃ kṛtvā yo dadāti śataudanām || sa tāṃl lokān sam āpnoti Bhatt. tāṃ yeṣu devāḥ samāsate | apūpaṃ nābhiṃ kṛtvā yo dadāti śataudanām || vasavas tvā dakṣiṇata uttarān marutas tvā | ādityāḥ paścād gopsyanti Bhatt. gopsanti sātirātram agniṣṭomam ati drava || Bhatt. bhruva (drava+?) gandharvā apsaraso devi rudrā aṅgirasas tvā | ete tvā sarve gopsyanti Bhatt. gopsanti sātirātram agniṣṭomam ati drava || Bhatt. dravaḥ antarikṣaṃ divaṃ bhūmim ādityān maruto diśaḥ | lokān sarvān āpnoti yo dadāti śataudanām ||
