ghṛtaṃ prokṣantī subhagā devān devī gamiṣyati | paktāram aghnye mā hiṃsīr divaṃ prehi śataudane || ye pitaro diviṣado 'ntarikṣasadaś ca ye ceme bhūmyām adhi | tebhyas tvaṃ dhukṣva sarvadā Bhatt. dhukṣa(kṣva?) kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu || yat te śiro ye ca śṛṅge yau karṇau yau ca te akṣyau | āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu || yat te mukhaṃ yā jihvā ye dantā ye ca te hanū | (…) || see 3cd yat te klomā yad dhṛdayaṃ purītat sahakaṇṭhikā | (…) || see 3cd yat te yakṛd ye matasne āntrāṇi yāś ca te gudāḥ | Bhatt. gudā (…) || see 3cd yas te plāśir yo vaniṣṭur yau kukṣī yac ca ta udaram | (…) || see 3cd yas te majjā yāny asthīni yan māṃsaṃ yac ca lohitam | (…) || see 3cd yau te bāhū yau te aṃsau doṣaṇī yā ca te kakut | (…) || see 3cd ye te skandhā yā grīvā Bhatt. yatte yāḥ pṛṣṭīr yāś ca parśavaḥ | (…) || see 3cd
yau ta ūrū aṣṭhīvantau Bhatt. ūru ye śroṇī yā ca te bhasat | (…) || see 16.137.3cd yat te pucchaṃ ye te bālā Bhatt. ye bālā yad ūdho ye ca te stanāḥ | (…) || see 16.137.3cd yās te jaṅghā yāḥ kuṣṭhikā ṛtsarā ye ca te śaphāḥ | Bhatt. hritsarā (…) || see 16.137.3cd yat te carma śataudane yāni lomāny aghnye | āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu || ayaṃ te stana āmikṣām ayaṃ sarpir ayaṃ madhu | ayaṃ te sarvān kāmān duhāṃ devi śataudane || kroḍau te stāṃ puroḍāśāv ājyenābhighāritau | tau pakṣau devi kṛtvā sā dātāraṃ divaṃ vaha || ulūkhale musale ye ca carmaṇi ye vā śūrpe taṇḍulāḥ kaṇāḥ | yad vā vāto mātariśvā mamātha- -agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu || apo devīr madhumatīr ghṛtaścuto brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi | yatkāma idam abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'haṃ tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca śṛṅge indraḥ śiro agnir lalāṭaṃ yamaḥ kṛkāṭaṃ somo rājā mastiṣkaḥ | satyaṃ cakṣur ṛtaṃ śrotre prāṇāpānau nāsike Bhatt. cakṣu dyaur uttarā hanuḥ pṛthivy adharā || agnir āsyaṃ vidyuj jihvā maruto dantāḥ pavamānaḥ prāṇaḥ | viśvaṃ vāyuḥ kaṇṭhaḥ svargo lokaḥ kṛṣṇadraṃ vidharaṇī vikeśyaḥ || revatī grīvāḥ kṛttikā skandhā gharmo vahaḥ śyenaḥ kroḍo antarikṣaṃ pājasyam | mitraś ca varuṇaś cāṃsau tvaṣṭā cāryamā ca doṣaṇī || mahādevo bāhū bṛhaspatiḥ kakud bṛhatīḥ kīkasāḥ | devānāṃ patnīḥ pṛṣṭaya upasadaḥ parśavaḥ || indrāṇī bhasad vātaḥ pucchaṃ pavamāno bālāḥ | brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca śroṇī balam ūrū dhātā ca savitā cāṣṭhīvantau || jaṅghā gandharvā apsarasaḥ Bhatt. (a)psarasaḥ kuṣṭhikā aditiḥ śaphāḥ | ceto hṛdayaṃ yakṛn medhā harimā pittaṃ vrataṃ purītat || kṣut kukṣir irā vaniṣṭhuḥ Bhatt. kṣuta parvatāḥ plāśir devajanā gudā manuṣyā āntrāṇy atrā udaram itarajanā ūbadhyaṃ rakṣāṃsi lohitam | krodho vṛkkau manyur āṇḍau prajā śepaḥ || samudro vastir nadī sūtrī stanayitnur ūdho varṣasya pataya stanāḥ | viśvavyacāś carmauṣadhayo lomāni nakṣatrāṇi rūpam || abhraṃ pīvo majjā nidhanam | nidhanaṃ bhūtyāḥ prajāyāḥ paśūnāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || indraḥ prāṅ tiṣṭhan dakṣiṇā tiṣṭhan yamaḥ pratyaṅ tiṣṭhan dhātodaṅ tiṣṭhan savitā | tṛṇāni prāptaḥ somo rājāvṛtta ānandaḥ | Bhatt. rājāvṛtrahānandaḥ īkṣamāno mitre yujyamāno vaiśvadevo yuktaḥ prajāpatir vimuktaḥ sarvam | etad vai gorūpam | upainaṃ rūpavantaḥ paśavas tiṣṭhanti ya evaṃ veda || Bhatt. rūpaṃvantaḥ
śrameṇa tapasā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā vittarte śritā | satyenāvṛtā śriyā prāvṛtā yaśasā parivṛtā svadhayā parihitā śraddhayā paryūḍhā dīkṣayā guptā yajñe pratiṣṭhitā loko nidhanam || chandāṃsi rūpam aṅgirasaḥ santāpā brahma padavā- -ayaṃ brāhmaṇo 'dhipatiḥ | tām ādadānasya brahmagavīṃ jinato brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyasya | apa krāmati sūnṛtā vīryaṃ puṇyā lakṣmīḥ ||
ojaś ca tejaś ca sahaś ca balaṃ ca || vāk cendriyaṃ ca śrīś ca dharmaś ca || brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca viśaś ca || tviṣiś ca yaśaś ca varcaś ca draviṇaṃ ca || āyuś ca rūpaṃ ca nāma ca kīrtiś ca || payaś ca rasaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca || prāṇaś cāpānaś ca cakṣuś ca śrotraṃ ca || ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ceṣṭaṃ ca pūrtaṃ ca prajā paśavaś ca || tāni sarvāṇy apa krāmanti kṣatriyasya brahmagavīm ādadānasya ||
saiṣā bhīmā brahmagavy aghaviṣā kṛtyā kūlbajam āvṛtā Bhatt. kulvajam ābhṛtā sarvāṇy asyāṃ krūrāṇi sarve ca mṛtyavaḥ sarvāṇy asyāṃ ghorāṇi sarve ca puruṣavadhāḥ || sā brahmajyaṃ brahmagavy ādīyamānā mṛtyoḥ paḍvīśa ā dyati | meniḥ śatavadhā hi sā brahmajyasya kṣitir hi sā || tasmād vai brāhmaṇānāṃ gaur durādharṣā vijānatā | vaiśvānara udvītā Bhatt. udgīthā mahādevo 'pekṣamāṇā vajro dhāvantī Bhatt. dhāvanti hetiḥ śaphān utkhidantī || kṣurapavir īkṣamāṇā mṛtyur hiṅkṛṇvatī | vāśyamānābhi sphūrjati Bhatt. vāśyamānāvi brahmagavī brahmajyam ||
ugro devaḥ pucchaṃ paryasyantī sarvajyāniḥ karṇau varīvarjayantī rājayakṣmo mehantī menir duhyamānā śīrṣaktir dugdhā | sedir upatiṣṭhantī Bhatt. setadir mithoyodhaḥ parāmṛṣṭā śaravyā mukhe 'pinahyamāne || ṛtir hanyamānā vyṛddhir hṛtā- Bhatt. ṛtur … hitā- -aghaviṣā nipatantī tamo nipatitā | anugacchantī prāṇān upa dāsayati brahmagavī brahmajyasya ||
vairaṃ vikṛtyamānā pautrādyaṃ vibhājyamānā devahetir hriyamāṇāmatir hitā nirṛtir nihitā | Bhatt. hrīyamāṇāmatir pāpmādhidhīyamānā Bhatt. pāpmānidhīyamānā pāruṣyam avadhīyamānāprajastāvihitā || gharmaḥ paryādhīyamānā vaiśvānaraḥ parihitā viṣaṃ prayasyantī takmā prayastā | mūlabarhaṇī paryākriyamāṇā kṣitiḥ paryākṛtā || aghaṃ pacyamānā parābhūtiḥ pakvā | sugudhriyamāṇāśīviṣa uddhṛtāsaṃjñā gandhena || abhūtir upahriyamāṇā parābhūtir upahṛtā | śarvaḥ kruddhaḥ piśyamānā Bhatt. sarvaḥ … piṣyamāṇā śimidā piśitā || ārtir aśyamānā vīkarto aśitā | Bhatt. asyamānā vīkartositā aśitā lokāc chinatti brahmacārī brahmajyam asmāc cāmuṣmāc ca || Bhatt. asitā
tasyā āhananaṃ kṛtyā menir āśasanaṃ valaga ūbadhyam asvagatā parihvṛtā | Bhatt. pariddnutā agniḥ kravyād bhūtvā brahmagavī brahmajyaṃ praviśyātti || sarvāsyāṅgāni mūlāni vṛścati Bhatt. vṛścyati chinatty asya pitṛbandhūn parā bhāvayati mātṛbandhūn | vivāhāṃ jñātīn sarvān api kṣāpayati brahmagavī kṣatriyasyāpunardīyamānā || Bhatt. jñātīṃ sarvam avāstum enam asvagam aprajasaṃ karoty Bhatt. apratisaṃ aparāparaṇo bhavati kṣīyate | Bhatt. aparāpariṇo ya evaṃ viduṣo brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyo gām ādatte || kṣipraṃ vai tasyāhanane gṛdhrāḥ kurvata ailavam | (…) tasyādahanaṃ pari nṛtyanti keśinīr āghnānāḥ pāṇinorasi kurvāṇāḥ pāpam ailavam || (…) tasya vāstuṣu gaṅgaṇaṃ kurvate vṛkāḥ | kṣipraṃ vai tasya pṛcchanti yat tad āsīd idaṃ nu tāt ||
chindhy ā chindhi pra chindhy api kṣāpaya kṣāpaya | ādadānam āṅgirasi brahmajyam upa dāsaya || vaiśvadevī hy ucyase kṛtyā kūlbajām āvṛtā oṣantī samoṣantī brahmaṇo vajraḥ || kṣurapavir mṛtyur bhūtvāpidhāvitaḥ | ā datse jinatāṃ varca iṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ cāśiṣaḥ || ādāya jītaṃ jītāya loke 'muṣmin pra yacchasi | Bhatt. yacchati aghnye padavīr bhava brāhmaṇasyābhiśastyā || Bhatt. padavī meniḥ śaravyā bhavāghād aghaviṣā bhava | agnhye pra śiro jahi brahmajyasya kṛtāgasaḥ || tvayā pravṛktaṃ rajatam agnir dahatu duṣkṛtaṃ devapīyum arādhasam | Bhatt. devapīyūm vṛśca pra vṛśca chindhi pra chindhi Bhatt. 2x vṛścya kṛnta pra kṛnta piṃśa pra piṃśauṣa sam oṣa daha pra daha | brahmajyaṃ devy aghnya ā mūlād anu saṃdaha ||
yat te śīrṣaṇi daurbhāgyaṃ saktaṃ keśeṣu nihitaṃ lalāṭe | ayaṃ tad viśvabheṣajo apāmārgo 'pa lumpatu || yat te bhruvor daurbhāgyaṃ karṇayor akṣṇor hitam | (…) || see 1cd (yat) te mukhe nāsikāyāṃ daurbhāgyaṃ vācy oṣṭhayoḥ | (…) || see 1cd yat te datsu daurbhāgyaṃ jihvāyāṃ chubuke hitam | (…) || see 1cd (yat) te manasi saṃkalpe daurbhāgyaṃ prāṇa āhitam | (…) || see 1cd yat te hanvor daurbhāgyaṃ kaṇṭhe klomasu viṣṭhitam | (…) || see 1cd yat te skandheṣu grīvāsu daurbhāgyaṃ kīkasāsv anūkye | (…) || see 1cd yat te doṣṇor daurbhāgyam aṃsayor upapakṣayoḥ | (…) || see 1cd yat te bāhvor daurbhāgyam aratnyoḥ kalkuṣīr anu | Bhatt. kalpuṣīr (…) || see 1cd yat te hastayor daurbhāgyaṃ pāṇyor aṅgulīr anu | (…) || see 1cd
yat te pṛṣṭiṣu daurbhāgyaṃ jaghane sphijor hitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat ta urasi daurbhāgyaṃ Bhatt. yat te pārśvayo stanayor hitam | Bhatt. pārśvayoḥ (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te hṛdaye daurbhāgyaṃ nābhyāṃ vakṣaṇā anu | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te plīhni daurbhāgyaṃ Bhatt. pihni (⟨ plīhni?) yad vā yakani vṛkkayoḥ | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te gudāsv āntreṣu daurbhāgyam udare hitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te vastau daurbhāgyaṃ vaniṣṭhau plāśāv āhitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te bhaṃsasi daurbhāgyaṃ yad vā yāśuṣu muṣkayoḥ | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te śroṇyor daurbhāgyam avacālūśayor hitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te bhasadi daurbhāgyam Bhatt. bhasati ūrvor jānunor hitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te jaṅghayor daurbhāgyaṃ sthūrayoḥ pārṣṇyor hitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd
yat te gulphayor daurbhāgyaṃ pādayor aṅgulīr anu | (…) || see 16.147.1cd (yat) te paruṣu daurbhāgyaṃ māṃse asthiṣu majjasu | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te kiṃ ca daurbhāgyam aṅgeaṅge pratiṣṭhitaṃ yad vā lomasu viṣṭhitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te akṣeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ prahāyām adhidevane | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te paśuṣu daurbhāgyaṃ kṛṣyām aśaner hitam | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yā te lakṣmīr brūṇahatyā- -atho yā te aputratā | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yat te diṣṭaṃ pitṛṣadyam atho yā te apacitā | (…) || see 16.147.1cd yā te kā ca pāpī lakṣmīr atho yā te apaśutā | ayaṃ tad viśvabheṣajo apāmārgo 'pa lumpatu || kaṇṭhadaghnām ahimārttinṛṇāṃ Bhatt. ⟨ mārtimṛṇāṃ? devebhyaḥ kilbiṣaṃ yad babhūva | imās tad āpaḥ pra vahantu ripraṃ punātu mā śatadhāraṃ pavitram || snāhi ripraṃ śamalaṃ ca sarvaṃ kṛṣṇe cele sādayitvā pāpam | hitvāvartiṃ nirṛtiṃ mṛtyupāśān sūryaṃ jyotir abhy ehy agnim || udyanto asmān mahataḥ samudrān mucyamāno aṃhasaḥ pāpmanaś ca | punar manaḥ punar āyur na āgan mā mā dabhan paṇayo yātudhānāḥ || ava ripram anikṣmahy aśastim adhy ātmanaḥ | varca ā dhīyatāṃ mayi teja ā dhīyatāṃ mayi | prāṇāpānau mā mā hāsiṣṭaṃ sarvam āyur aśīya ||
anuvāka 21 ||
brahma jajñānam ity ekā || brahma bhrājad ud agād antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca brahmāvādhūṣṭāmṛtena mṛtyum | brahmopadraṣṭā sukṛtasya sākṣād brahmāsmad apa hantu śamalaṃ tamaś ca || Bhatt. tapaś pratīcīr āyatā stara vitatāḥ paśyāmahai | Bhatt. ⟨ paśyāmahai? samudre apsu yā hitā- -asurāṇām ayasmayī || hariḥ suparṇo divam āruho 'rciṣā ye tvā dipsanti divam utpatantam | ava tāṃ jahi harasā jātavedo 'bibhyad ugro hy arciṣā divam ā roha sūrya || ayojālā asurā māyino 'yasmayaiḥ pāśair aṅkino ye caranti | tāṃs te randhayāmi harase jātavedaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭiḥ sapatnān pramṛṇan yāhi vajraḥ || Bhatt. sahasrapṛṣṭhiḥ devānām adhipā eti gharma ṛtena bhrājann amṛtaṃ vicaṣṭe | hiraṇyavarṇo nabhaso deva sūrya gharmo bhrājan divo antān pary eṣi vidyutā || vidyotante vidyuto agnijihvā hiraṇyavarṇā amṛtā apsv antaḥ samudre | rudrasya kṣipno stanayitnor vidyut tasya Bhatt. vidyu vaiśvānārasya hetiḥ pari ṇo vṛṇaktu || vidyutā bhrājan hṛdayaṃ yāty agnir vyāghrā apsuṣado yatra bhīmāḥ | viṣṇoḥ kramai stanayann eti rudro nudaṃ chatrūn vi mṛdho bādhamāno 'sapatnāḥ pradiśo me kṛṇotu || apo vasānaḥ samaity antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca samiddho agnir divyas tapodhāḥ | vaiśvānaraḥ śamayā śītarūre apāṃ suparṇo diva eti pṛṣṭhe || vaiśvānaraḥ samudraṃ pary eti śukro gharmo bhrājan tejasā rocamāṇaḥ | nudaṃ chatrūn pradahan me sapatnān ādityo dyām adhyarukṣad vipaścit ||
vaiśvānaraḥ saṃ tapaty antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca samiddho agnir divyas tapojāḥ | śikṣantv asmā abhi sunvanti soma ṛtena bhrājann amṛtaṃ vaste atkī || rārahyete nelayataḥ śītarūre tanvāv asya bhīme | rūpāṇy eti bahudhā vasāno guhā kṛṇvānas tanvaḥ parācīḥ || pañcāre cakre parivartamāne samārohanti bhuvanāni viśvā | tasya nākṣas tapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanād eva na chidyate sanābhiḥ || pañcabhis taptas tapaty eṣa etat sahasradhāmānam anu tiṣṭhanty enam | sapta tvā sūrya harito vahanti brahmaṇādityas trivṛtā mukhena || vi dyotate dyotata ā ca dyotate apsv antar amṛto gharma udyan | hantā vṛtrasya haritām anīkam anādhṛṣṭās tanvaḥ sūryasya || gharmaḥ paścād uta gharmaḥ purastād ayodaṃṣṭrāya dviṣato 'pi dadhmaḥ | vaiśvānaraḥ śītarūre vasānaḥ sapatnān me dviṣato hantu sarvān || ṛtūn ṛtubhiḥ śrapayati brahmaṇaikavīro gharmaḥ śucānaḥ samidhā samiddhaḥ | brahmā tvā tapati brahmaṇā tejasā ca || brahma jajñānaṃ prathamaṃ samā dade taj jāyamānaṃ na bibhide na bhidyate | tad aṅgamānaṃ pitaraṃ vyāhati Bhatt. ⟨ aṃhamānaṃ? tasya nāḍya ātatā vitatās tatā u tāḥ || asayajjāna sata ā jabhāra Bhatt. ⟨ asajjajāna? ya īṃ jajāna sa id asya bhartā | prajāpatiḥ prajābhiḥ saṃvidānas trīṇi jyotīṃṣi dadhate na pākaḥ || prajāpatiś carati garbhe antaḥ sa jāyamāno bahudhā pra jāyate | tasya padam abhi paśyanti vedhasas tasminn ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā ||
yasmin devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā arā nābhāv iva śritāḥ | apāṃ tvā puṣpaṃ pṛcchāmi yatra tan māyayāhitam || Bhatt. māyāhitam yatrāpāṃ puṣpaṃ nihitaṃ māyayātihitaṃ guhā | yo vai tad vidyāt pratyakṣaṃ sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat || maṇis triṣūtro nihitaḥ svarvid ūrdhvas tiryaṅ viśa etu prajānan | sa pumān puṃso janayann ṛtena sarvān antān gacchatu sadya eva || sarvāṃ rātrīṃ sam oṣatv ādityo jātavedasā | agner adhi divam ā rohann āyuṣā sam anaktu mā varcasā saṃ sṛjāti mā || gharmaḥ sāhasraḥ samidhā samiddho 'sapatnāḥ pradiśo me kṛṇotu | sapatnān sarvān me sūryo hantu vaiśvānaro hariḥ || gharmas taptaḥ pra dahatu Bhatt. tapta(ḥ) bhrātṛvyān dviṣato mama | ā dattāṃ chatrūn āditya udyan sūryaḥ pṛtanyataḥ || vaiśvānaraḥ pra dahatu bhrātṛvyān dviṣato vṛṣā | udyan me śukra ādityo vi mṛdho hantu sūryaḥ || śukraṃ suparṇaṃ hari brahma bhrājad ajasraṃ jyotir divam ā tatāna | hariḥ suparṇaḥ pramathiṣṇur āśuḥ sapatnān hantu mahātā vadhena || hariḥ suparṇaḥ sudino 'bhayaṃkaro hiraṇyavarṇo durudāpa āśuḥ | sapatnān sarvān me sūrya ādityo hantu raśmibhiḥ || mahāntam arthaṃ pari sadya etv ahorātre vidadhac chukra udyan | sapatnān sarvān me sūrya etu vaiśvānaro dahan || udyann adya mitramaha ity ekā || tejas tapāṃsi mukhato bibharṣy ānandaṃ bhūtiṃ mahasaḥ pratiṣṭhām | paryūhamāṇaḥ śriyam eṣi sarvato amoghaṃ satyaṃ yaśa udyataṃ te ||
brahmacārīṣṇaṃś carati rodasī ubhe yasmin devāḥ saṃmanaso bhavanti | sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utāmūṃ sa ācāryaṃ tapasā pipartu || ācārya upanayamāno brahmacāriṇaṃ kṛṇute garbham antaḥ | taṃ rātrīs tisra udare bibharti taṃ jātaṃ draṣṭum abhisaṃyanti devāḥ | brahmacāriṇaṃ pitaro manuṣyā devajanā gandharvā enam anu yanti sarve || trayastriṃśataṃ triśatān ṣaṭ sahasrān sarvān sa devāṃs tapasā piparti | iyaṃ samit pṛthivī dyaur dvitīyā- -utāntarikṣaṃ samidhā pṛṇāti | brahmacārī samidhā mekhalāvī śrameṇa lokāṃs tapasā piparti || pūrvo jāto brahmaṇo brahmacārī gharmaṃ vasānas tapaso 'dhi tiṣṭhat | tasmāj jātaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ devāś ca sarve amṛtena sākam || brahmacārī samidhā samiddhaḥ kārṣṇaṃ vasāno dīkṣito dīrghaśmaśruḥ | sa sadya eti pūrvād aparaṃ samudraṃ lokān saṃrabhya muhur ācarikrat || brahmacārī janayan brahma- -apo lokaṃ prajāpatiṃ parameṣṭhiṇaṃ virājam | garbho bhūtvāmṛtasya yonāv indro bhūtvāsurāṃs tatarha || imāṃ bhūmīṃ pṛthivīṃ brahmacārī bhikṣāṃ jabhāra prathamo divaṃ ca | te brahma kṛtvā samidhā upāsate tayor ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā || ācāryas tatakṣa nabhasī ubhe Bhatt. tadakṣa urvī gambhīre pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca | te brahmacārī tapasābhi rakṣati tayor devāḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti || arvāg anyaḥ paro anyo guhā nidhī nihitau brāhmaṇasya | tau brahmacārī tapasābhi rakṣati tat kevalaṃ kṛṇute brahma vidvān ||
arvāg anyo divas pṛṣṭhād ito 'nyaḥ pṛthivyā agnī Bhatt. pṛthivyāgni sameto nabhasī antareme | tayoḥ śrayante raśmayo 'dhi dṛḍhās Bhatt. tayo(ḥ) tān ā tiṣṭhati tapasā brahmacārī || abhikrandann aruṇaḥ śitiṅgo Bhatt. abhikrandanvaruṇaḥ bṛhacchepo 'nu bhūmau jabhāra | brahmacārī siñcati sānau retaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ || parjanyo mṛtyur varuṇaḥ soma oṣadhayaḥ payaḥ | jīmūtā āsan satvānas tair idaṃ svar ābharan || agnau sūrye candramasi mātariśvani brahmacāry apsu samidham ā dadhāti | teṣām arcīṃṣi pṛthag abhre caranti teṣām ājyaṃ puruṣo varṣam aśvaḥ || amā ghṛtaṃ kṛṇute kevalam ācāryo bhūtvā varuṇo yadyad aicchat prajāpatau | tad brahmacārī prāyacchat svān mitro adhy ātmanaḥ || ācāryo brahmacārī brahmacārī prajāpatiḥ | prajāpatir vi rājati virāḍ indro 'bhavad vaśī || brahmacaryeṇa tapasā rājā rāṣṭraṃ vi rakṣate | ācāryo brahmacaryeṇa brahmacāriṇam icchate || brahmacaryeṇa kanyā yuvānaṃ vindate patim | anaḍvān brahmacaryeṇa- -aśvo ghāsaṃ jigīrṣati || brahmacaryeṇa tapasā devā mṛtyum apājayan | indro ha brahmacaryeṇa- -amṛtaṃ svar ābharat || oṣadhayo bhūtā bhavyam ahorātre vanaspatayaḥ | saṃvatsaraḥ sahartubhis te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ ||
pārthivā divyāḥ paśava āraṇyā grāmyā ca ye | apakṣāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca ye te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ || pṛthak sarve prajāpatyāḥ prāṇām̐ ātmasu bibhrati | sarvāṃs tān brahma rakṣati brahmacāriṇy ābhṛtam || Bhatt. ābhṛtāṃ brahmacārī brahma bhrājad bibharti tasmin devā adhi viśve sametāḥ | Bhatt. sametā(ḥ) sa snāto babhruḥ piṅgalaḥ Bhatt. misprint brabhruḥ pṛthivyāṃ bahu rocate || devānām etat pariṣūtam Bhatt. pariṣutam anabhyārūḍhaṃ carati rocamānam | tasmin sarve paśavas tatra yajñās tasminn annaṃ saha devatābhiḥ || Bhatt. misprint tasinnaṃ prāṇāpānau janayann ād vyānaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ janayan brahma medhām | vācaṃ śreṣṭhāṃ yaśo asmāsu dhehy || annaṃ reto lohitam udaraṃ tāni kalpan | Bhatt. kalpam brahmacārī salilasya pṛṣṭhe tapo 'tiṣṭhat tapyamānaḥ samudre ||
anuvāka 22 ||
Kāṇḍa 17
satyaṃ bṛhad ṛtam ugraṃ dīkṣā tapo brahma yajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ dhārayanti | sā no bhūtasya bhavyasya patny uruṃ lokaṃ pṛthivī naḥ kṛṇotv asaṃbādhaṃ madhyato mānaveṣu || yasyā udyataḥ pravataḥ samaṃ bahu nānāvīryā oṣadhīr yā bibharti | pṛthivī naḥ prathatāṃ rādhyatāṃ naḥ || yasyāṃ samudra uta sindhur āpo yasyāṃ devā anṛtam anvavindan | yā bibharti bahudhā prāṇam ejat read prāṇad with K? sā no bhūmir goṣv aśveṣv apy anne kṛṇotu || yasyāṃ pūrve pūrvajanā vicakrire yasyāṃ devā asurān abhyavartayan | yasyām idaṃ jīvati viśvam ejat sā no bhūmiḥ pūrvapeye dadhātu || yasyāṃ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yasyām annaṃ kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ | gavām aśvānāṃ vayasaś ca viṣṭhā bhagaṃ varcaḥ pṛthivī no dadhātu || viśvaṃbharā vasudhānī pratiṣṭhā hiraṇyavakṣā jagato niveśanīḥ | vaiśvānaraṃ bibhratī bhūmir agnim indrarṣabhā draviṇe no dadhātu || yasyām āpaḥ paricarāḥ samānīr ahorātre apramādaṃ kṣaranti | sā no bhūmir bhūridhārā payo duhām atho ukṣatu varcasā || yāṃ rakṣanty asvapnā viśvadānīṃ devā bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm apramādam | sā no madhu priyaṃ duhām atho ukṣatu varcasā || yārṇave 'dhi salilam agra āsīd yāṃ māyābhir anvacaran manīṣiṇaḥ | yasyāṃ hṛdayaṃ parame vyomant satyenāvṛtam amṛtaṃ pṛthivyāḥ | sā no bhūmis tviṣiṃ balaṃ rāṣṭre dadhātu me || yām aśvināv amimātāṃ viṣṇur yasyāṃ vicakrame | indro yāṃ cakra ātmane anamitrāṃ chacīpatiḥ | sā no bhūmir vi sṛjatāṃ mātā putrāya naḥ payaḥ ||
girayas te parvatā himavanto 'raṇyan te pṛthivi syonam astu naḥ | babhruṃ kṛṣṇāṃ rohiṇīṃ viśvarūpāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm indraguptām ajīto 'hato akṣato adhyaṣṭhāṃ pṛthivīm aham || Bhatt. ajītohato yat te madhyaṃ pṛthivi yac ca nabhyaṃ yās ta ūrjas tanvaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ | tāsu no dhehy abhi naḥ pavasva || mātā bhūmiḥ putro ahaṃ pṛthivyāḥ parjanyaḥ pitā sa u naḥ pipartu || yasyāṃ vediṃ parigṛhnanti bhūmyāṃ yasyāṃ yajñaṃ tanvate viśvakarmāṇaḥ | yasyāṃ mīyante svaravaḥ pṛthivyām ūrdhvāḥ śukrā āhutyāḥ purastāt | sā no bhūmir vardhayād vardhamānā || yo no dveṣat pṛthivi yat pṛtanyād yo 'bhimanyātai manasā vadhena | tan no bhūme randhaya pūrvakṛtvane || tvajjātās tvayi caranti martyās tvaṃ bibharṣi dvipadaś catuṣpadaḥ | tvayīme pṛthivi pañca mānavā yebhyo jyotir amṛtaṃ martyebhya udyan sūryo raśmibhir ā tanoti || tā naḥ prajāḥ saṃ duhratāṃ samagrā vāco madhu pṛthivī dhehi mahyam || viśvasvaṃ mātaram oṣadhīnāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīṃ dharmaṇā dhṛtām | śivāṃ syonām anu carema viśvahā || mahat sadhasthaṃ mahatī babhūvitha mahān vega ejathur vepathuṣ ṭe | mahāṃs tvendro rakṣati vīryeṇa sā no bhūme prarocaya hiraṇyasyeva saṃdṛśi || agnir bhūmyām agnir oṣadhīṣv agnim āpo bibhraty agnir aśmasu | agnir antaḥ puruṣeṣu goṣv aśveṣv agnayaḥ ||
agnir diva ā tapaty agner devasyorv antarikṣam | agniṃ martāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ ghṛtapriyam || agnivāsāḥ pṛthivy asitajñus tviṣīmantaṃ saṃśitaṃ mā kṛṇotu | bhūmyāṃ devebhyo juhvati yajñaṃ havyam araṃkṛtam | Bhatt. || bhūmyāṃ manuṣyā jīvanti svadhayānnena martyāḥ | sā no bhūmiḥ prāṇam āyur dadhātu jaradaṣṭiṃ mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu || yas te gandhaḥ pṛthivi saṃbabhūva yaṃ bibhraty oṣadhayo yam āpaḥ | Bhatt. vibhraty yaṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca bhejire yas te gām aśvam arhati | tenāsmān surabhīn kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana || yas te gandhaḥ puṣkaram āviveśa yaṃ saṃjabhruḥ sūryāyā vivāhe | amartyāḥ pṛthivi gandham agre | tenāsmān surabhīn kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana || yas te bhūme puruṣeṣu strīṣu puṃsu bhago rucir yo vadhūṣu vadhūyuṣu | yo goṣv aśveṣu yo mṛgeṣūta hastiṣu | kanyāyāṃ varco yad bhūme tenāsmām̐ adhi saṃ sṛja mā no dvikṣata kaś cana || śilā bhūmir aśmā pāṃsur yā bhūmiḥ saṃbhṛtā dhṛtā | yasyāṃ vṛkṣā vānaspatyā dhruvās tiṣṭhanti viśvahā | bhūmiṃ hiraṇyavakṣasaṃ dhṛtām acchā vadāmasi || udīrāṇā utāsīnās tiṣṭhantaḥ prakrāmantaḥ | padbhyāṃ dakṣiṇasavyābhyāṃ mā vyathiṣmahi bhūmyām || vimṛgvarīṃ pṛthivīm ā vadāmi kṣamāṃ bhūmiṃ brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānām | ūrjaṃ puṣṭiṃ bibhratīm annabhāgaṃ ghṛtaṃ tvābhi ni ṣīdāmi bhūme || śuddhā ma āpas tanvaḥ kṣaranti yo me sehur apriye taṃ ni dadhmaḥ | pavitreṇa pṛthivīm ut punāmi || nidhīn bibhratī bahudhā guhā vasu maṇiṃ hiraṇyaṃ pṛthivī dadhātu naḥ | vasūni no vasudā rāsamānā devī dadhātu sumanasyamānā ||
yās te prācīḥ pradiśo yā udīcīr yās te bhūme adharād yāś ca paścāt | syonās tā mahyaṃ carate bhavantu mā ni paptaṃ bhuvane śiśriyāṇe || mā mā paścān mā purastān nudiṣṭhāḥ svasti bhūme me kṛṇu varīyo yāvayā vadhan mā vidan paripanthinaḥ || yāvat te 'bhi vipaśyāmi bhūme sūryeṇa medinā | tāvan me cakṣur mā meṣṭa- -uttarām uttarāṃ samām || yat te bhūme vikhanāmy oṣaṃ tad api rohatu | mā te marma vimṛgvari mā te hṛdayam arpipam || yac chayānaḥ paryāvarte dakṣiṇaṃ savyam abhi bhūme pārśvam | uttānās tvā pratīcīṃ pṛṣṭyā yad abhiśemahe mā hiṃsīs tatra no bhūme sarvasya pratiśīvari || grīṣmas te bhūme varṣāṇi śarad dhemantaḥ śiśiro vasantaḥ | ṛtavas te vihitā hāyanā ahorātre pṛthivī no duhātām || yāpa sarpaṃ nudamānā vimṛgvarī yasyām āsann agnayo apsv antaḥ | parā dasyūn dadatī devapīyūn indraṃ vṛṇānā pṛthivī na vṛtraṃ śakrāya dadhre vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe | sa no bhūmer ā diśatu yad dhanaṃ kāmayāmahe || bhago anu prayuṅktām Bhatt. °yuṃktām indro yātu purogavaḥ | yasyāṃ sadohavirdhāne yūpo yasyāṃ nimīyate | brahmāṇo yasyām arcanti ṛgbhiḥ sāmnā yajurvidaḥ | yujyante yasyām ṛtvijaḥ somam indrāya pātave | sā no bhūmir dakṣiṇāyāṃ suśevā yajñe dadhātu sumanasyamānā || yasyāṃ pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayo gā udānṛcuḥ | sapta satreṇa vedhaso yajñena tapasā saha | sā naḥ paśūn viśvarūpān dadhātu dīrghaṃ ma āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu || yasyām annaṃ vrīhiyavau yatremāḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ | bhūmyai parjanyapatnyai namo 'stu varṣam edhate ||
yasyāṃ gāyanti nṛtyanti janā martyā vailavāḥ | yujyante yasyām ākrando yasyāṃ vadati dundubhiḥ | sā no bhūmiḥ pra ṇudatāṃ sapatnān Bhatt. sapatnāṃ yo no dveṣṭy adharaṃ taṃ kṛṇotu || yasyāṃ puro devakṛtāḥ kṣetre yasyāṃ vikurvate | prajāpatiḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvagarbhām āśāmāśāṃ raṇyāṃ naḥ kṛṇotu || janaṃ bibhratī bahudhā vivācasaṃ nānādharmāṇaṃ pṛthivī yathaukasam | sahasraṃ dhārā draviṇasya no duhāṃ dhruveva dhenur anapasphurantī || yas te sarpo vṛścikas tṛṣṭadaṃśmā hemantajabdho bhṛmalo guhā śaye | krimir ilmaṃ pṛthivi prāvṛṣi yad ejati tan naḥ sarpan mopa sṛpad Bhatt. sṛpa(d) yac chivaṃ tena no mṛḍa || ye te panthāno bahudhā janāyanā rathasya vartman manasaś ca yātave | yebhiś caranty ubhaye bhadrapāpās taṃ panthāṃ jayemānamitram ataskaram || mandaṃ (⟨ malvaṃ?) bibhratī gurubhṛd bhadrapāpasya nidhanaṃ titikṣuḥ | sūkareṇa pṛthivī saṃvidānā varāhāya vi jihīte mṛgāya || ye ta āranyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitāḥ siṃhā vyāghrāḥ puruṣādaś caranti | ulaṃ vṛkaṃ pṛthivi ducchunām ita ṛkṣīkāṃ rakṣo apa badhāsmat || ye gandharvāpsaraso ye carāyāḥ kimīdinaḥ | piśācān sarvā rakṣāṃsi tān asmad bhūme yāvaya || yāṃ dvipādaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunā vayāṃsi | yasyāṃ vāta īyate mātariśvā rajāṃsi kṛṇvaṃś cyāvayaṃś ca vṛkṣān | vātasya pravām upavām anu vāty arcir yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam aruṇaṃ ca saṃbhṛte ahorātre vihite bhūmyām adhi || varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtāvṛtā | sā no dadhātu bhadrayā priye dhāmanidhāmani ||
dyauś ca ma idaṃ pṛthivī ca- -antarikṣaṃ ca me vyacaḥ | agniḥ sūrya āpo medhāṃ viśve devāś ca saṃ dadhuḥ || aham asmi sahamāna uttaro nāma bhūmyām | abhisāḍ asmi viśvāṣāḍ āśāmāśāṃ viṣāsahiḥ || yad ado devi prathamānā purastād devaiḥ sṛṣṭā vyasarpo mahitvam | ā tvā subhūtam aviśat tadānīm akalpayathāḥ pradiśaś catasraḥ || ye grāmā yāny araṇyāni yāḥ sabhā adhi bhūmyām | teṣv ahaṃ devi pṛthivy udyāsaṃ madhumad vacaḥ || yad vadāni madhumat tad vadāni yad īkṣe ṣutadyaḥ punantu mā | tviṣīmān asmi jūtimān yān hanmi dodhataḥ || aśva iva rajo duduhe vi taṃ janaṃ ya ākṣiyan pṛthivīm ād ajāyata | madrā pari bhuvanasya gopā vanaspatīnāṃ gṛbhir oṣadhīnām || śantivā surabhiḥ syonā kīlālodhnī payasvatī | bhūmir no adhi bravītu pṛthivī payasā saha || bhūmi mātar ni dhehi mā bhadrayā supratiṣṭhitam | saṃvidānā divā tvaṃ śriyāṃ mā dhehi bhūtyām || yām anvaicchad dhaviṣā viśvakarmā yasyām āsann agnayo 'psv antaḥ | bhujiṣyaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ guhā- -āsīd āvir bhogair abhavan mātṛmadbhiḥ || tvam asy āvapanī janānām aditiḥ kāmadughā viśvarūpā | yat ta ūnaṃ tat ta ā pūrayāti prajāpatiḥ prajābhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ ||
anuvāka 1 ||
kasminn aṅge tapo asyādhi tiṣṭhati kasminn aṅga ṛtam asyādhyāhitam | kva vrataṃ kva śraddhāsya tiṣṭhati kasminn aṅge satyam asya pratiṣṭhitam || kva brahma kva tiṣṭhanty āpaḥ kasminn aṅge diśo asya pratiṣṭhitāḥ | katamad aṅgam anu saṃ carete ahorātre saṃvidāne samānam || kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhati bhūmir asya kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty antarikṣam | kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty āhitā dyauḥ kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty uttaraṃ divaḥ || kasmād aṅgād dīpyate agnir asya kasmād aṅgāt pavate mātariśvā | kasmād aṅgād vi mimīte 'dhi candramāḥ skambhasya mahad vimimāno aṅgam || kva prepsan dīpyata ūrdhvo agniḥ kva prepsan pavate mātariśvā | yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āvṛtaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ || kva prepsantī yuvatī virūpe ahorātre dravataḥ saṃvidāne | yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āpaḥ skambhaṃ (…) || kvārdhamāsāḥ kva yanti māsāḥ saṃvatsareṇa saha saṃvidānāḥ | yatra yanty ṛtavo yatrārtavāḥ skambhaṃ (…) || yasmin skandhā prajāpatir Bhatt. emend. skabdhvā? lokān sarvām̐ adhārayat | skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ || yat paramam avamaṃ yac ca madhyamaṃ prajāpatiḥ sasṛje viśvarūpam | kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra yan na pārviśat kva tad babhūva || kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa bhūtaṃ kiyad bhaviṣyad anvāśaye 'sya | ekaṃ yad aṅgam akṛṇot sahasradhā kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra ||
yatra lokāś ca kośāś ca brahma yatra janā viduḥ | asac ca yatra sac cāntaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ || yatra tapaḥ parākramya ṛtaṃ dhārayaty uttaram | vrataṃ ca yatra śraddhā ca brahmāpaḥ samāhitāḥ skambhaṃ (…) || yasmin bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur asminn adhyāhitā | yatrāgniś candramā sūryo vātas tiṣṭhanty ārpitāḥ skambhaṃ (…) || yasya trayastriṃśad devā aṅge sarve samāhitāḥ | skambhaṃ (…) || yatra ṛṣayo bhūtakṛta ṛcaḥ sāma yajur mahī | ekarṣir yasminn ārpitāḥ skambhaṃ (…) || yasya catasraḥ pradiśo nāḍyas tiṣṭhanti prapyasāḥ | yajño yasmin parākrāntaḥ skambhaṃ (…) || yatrāmṛtaṃ ca mṛtyuś ca puruṣaś ca samāhitāḥ | samudro yasya nāḍyaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ || ye puruṣe brahma vidus te skambham anu saṃ viduḥ | yo veda parameṣṭhinaṃ yaś ca veda prajāpatim | jyeṣṭhaṃ ye brāhmaṇaṃ vidus te skambham anu saṃ viduḥ || yasya śiro vaiśvānaraś cakṣur aṅgiraso 'bhavan | Bhatt. cacakṣur, misprint?; aṅgirasobhavaṃ aṅgāni yasya yātavaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ || Bhatt. katama(ḥ) yasya brahma mukham āhur jihvāṃ madhukaśām uta | virājaṃ yasyodha āhuḥ skambhaṃ (…) ||
yasmād ṛco apātakṣaṃ yajur yasmād apākaṣan | Bhatt. apākaṣaṃ chandāṃsi yasya lomāni skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ || asacchākhāṃ pratiṣṭhantīṃ paramam iva janā viduḥ | uto san manyante 'vare ye 'sya śākhām upāsate yatrādityāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaś ca samāhitāḥ | skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ || yasya trayastriṃśad devā Bhatt. trayaṃstriṃśad nidhiṃ rakṣanti sarvadā | nidhiṃ tam adya ko veda yaṃ devā abhirakṣata || yatra devā brahmavido brahma jyeṣṭham upāsate | yo vai ta brāhmaṇo veda taṃ vai brahmavido viduḥ || bṛhanto nāma te devā asatas pari jajñire | ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasya- -asad āhuḥ paro janāḥ || yatra skambhaḥ prajanayan purāṇaṃ vyavartayat | ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasya purāṇam anu saṃ viduḥ || yatra trayastriṃśad devā aṅgā gātrāṇi bhejire | tān vai trayastriṃśad devān eke brahmavido viduḥ || hiraṇyagarbhaṃ paramam anatyudyaṃ janā viduḥ | skambhas tad agre prāsiñcad dhiraṇyaṃ loke antarā || skambhe lokāḥ skambhe tapaḥ skambhe 'dhy ṛtam āhitam | skambhaṃ tvā vidma pratyakṣam indre sarvaṃ samāhitam ||
indre lokā indre tapa indre 'dhy ṛtam āhitam | indraṃ tvā vidma pratyakṣaṃ skambhe sarvaṃ samāhitam || nāma nāmnā johavīmi purā sūryāt puroṣasaḥ | yad adaḥ prathamaṃ saṃbabhūva saha tat svarājyaṃ jagāma yasmān na param asti bhūtam || yasya bhūmiḥ pramāntarikṣam utodaram | divaṃ yaś cakre mūrdhānaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ || yasya sūryaś cakṣuś candramāś ca punar navaḥ | agniṃ yaś cakra āsyaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ || yasya vātaḥ prāṇāpānau cakṣur aṅgiraso 'bhuvan | Bhatt. bhuvaṃ diśo yaś cakre prajñānīs tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ || yaḥ śramāt tapaso jāto lokān sarvān samānaśe | somaṃ yaś cakre kevalaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ || skambho dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utāmūṃ skambho dādhārorv antarikṣam | skambho dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ skambha idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā viveśa || kathaṃ vāto nelayati kathaṃ na ramate manaḥ | kim āpaḥ satyaṃ prepsantīḥ pra caṅkramīti sarvadā || Bhatt. caṃkramiti, emend. caṃkramati mahad yakṣaṃ bhuvanasya madhye tapasi krāntaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe | tasmiṃ chrayante ya u ke ca devā vṛkṣasya skambhaṃ parita iva śākhāḥ || yasmai hastābhyāṃ pādābhyāṃ vācā śrotreṇa cakṣuṣā | yasmai devā sadā baliṃ prayacchanti vimite 'mitaṃ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ ||
apa tasya tamo hataṃ vyāvṛttaḥ sa pāpmanā | sarvāṇi tasmin jyotīṃṣi yāni trīṇi prajāpatau || yo vetasaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ salile veda | sa vai guhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ || na prajāpatim aty eti nāty eti parameṣṭhinam | utota tatra no vṛta yaj jyeṣṭhaṃ paro atyayat || asti vai tat paro bhūmer asti vai tat paro divaḥ | lokā vai tasmin saṃprotā yasminn otāḥ prajā imāḥ ||
anuvāka 2 ||
antaḥpātre rerihati dūrśe durnihitaiṣiṇi | Selva 2019, 56; Bhatt. duḥśe durni° uruṇḍe abhicaṅkrame vakmake bastavāsini sarvāsāṃ bhaṇvā vaḥ sākaṃ nāmadheyāni vidmasi | yati jātāni vas tati emend. Bhatt. naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ || karṇā dṛṣadrathāmaham urukīṃ keśinīṃ krakum | khaḍurīm ambarīṣyaṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || prapāṭhaka || paṇḍugirāṃ phāladatīm asaṃsūktanigāriṇīm | asātāḥ sarvā vo brūmo naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ || yāḥ śayānaṃ jambhayanti naktam icchanty āturam | atho janasya suptasya mukhā hastāt pra rihanti Bhatt. ruhanti datsu datkavanocitās tā ito nāśayāmasi || āpatantīr vikṣiṇānā vastagandhāḥ sadānvāḥ | bhaṇvā (a)sinā totsyāmi tīkṣṇaśṛṅga ivarṣabhaḥ || sadānvāḥ sādānveyāṃ strīpuṃsām̐ ubhayān saha | sahe sahasvān sahasā vi mṛdho hanmi rakṣasaḥ || Bhatt. vimṛdho caturdaṃṣṭrān kumbhamuṣkān dīrghakeśām̐ asṛnmukhān | alābugandhīn undurān durṇāmno nāśayāmasi || stambe jātā adhi bāle rodākām̐ rudatīṃ tvat | durṇāmnīḥ sarvāḥ santokā nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || yāsāṃ jātāni krośanti bhitsv antar vane jvala upa vṛkṣeṣu śerate | (…) || see 8cd yā vātābhra utpatite carttā varṣeṇa vidyutā śālā icchanti satvaram | durṇāmnīḥ sarvāḥ santokā nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
yā dhānyāt saṃbhavanti kṣetrād uptād varpitāta | kṛtād abhiprahāyyā naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ || yāḥ puruṣāḥ pāpagandhāḥ sadā rukṣā visṛkpadī | tā vajreṇa samarpayan nirajetaḥ śacīpate || ut tiṣṭhata nir dravata na va ihāsti nyañcanam | indro vaḥ sarvāsāṃ sākaṃ garbhān āṇḍāni bhetsyati || indra jahi sthūlaśaṃkhāṃ mṛṇīhi durṇaśīṃ kuham | arāyīṃ śakadhūmyaṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || kim āsutāṃ nagnahvam ajamāyuṃ ca nighnatīm | viṭiṭiṅgāḥ pratodinīr nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || yasyāsutaṃ randhayadhve yūyaṃ bhaṇvāḥ sadānvāḥ | tṛṣṭaṃ kṛṇutāṇḍaraṃ yadā rasena tṛpyata- -āt surām ava mehatha || Bhatt. me hatha tasyāḥ pītvāvamakty atho śīrṣakty ā śaye | tā ekānnadūṣaṇīr nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || apārogāñ chakadhūmān vṛkṣāṇāṃ yantu satvaram | atho durhārdaso gṛhaṃ pra mṛśantv arāyyaḥ || tāsām ekācchavakā śaṅkāvaṅkā vanekṛkur hasanaikā kanikradā | sarvāsāṃ bhaṇvā vaḥ sākaṃ nāmadheyāni vidmasi | yati jātāni vas tati naśyatetaḥ sadānvāḥ || sahasvatīṃ pra harāmi- imāṃ śālāṃ viṣāsahim | sadānvāghnīm oṣadhiṃ jaitrāyācchā vadāmasi ||
duḥsaṃkāśe bhīmacakṣo Bhatt. duḥśaṅkāśe nagne bhaṇve sadānve dhrājiṃ tviṣiṃ śucim agnim arāyi kim ihecchase | dhūmaṃ mābhi pra gāyi ni stauṣāmi sadānve || kaṅkyekā prakhidaikā kim ic chāntyabhiśrayā | caranti naktaṃ durṇāmno arāyīḥ sūtikaiṣyas Bhatt. rāyī(ḥ) tā ito nāśayāmasi || apakrathām abhiśrayām ānṛtyantīṃ kutūhalām | kusūlīṃ rathabhañjanīṃ khalāj jātās trikūkvas tā ito nāśayāmasi || yā vikeśīr unmadityā- -urarā ghoracakṣavaḥ | śīrśāṇy anyā anyāsāṃ vitāvantīr ivāsate sadānvā brahmaṇaspate paro bhrūṇāny arpaya || yāsāṃ gandho nānārūpaḥ paryaiti puruṣaṃ pathi | tā agniḥ sahatām ito jātavedāḥ sadānvāḥ || yāḥ puruṣaṃ dahyamānaṃ śūnyam agnau jighatsanti | bhaṇvā niṣkuṣṭā nāmāsi muṣṭāgreṇa sadānvās tā ito nāśayāmasi || yā ucitā āvapane śuṣkaṃ khādanti maṣmasaṃ vaḍavā gardabhīr iva | nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || garbhān ekaḥ prati morśaṃ Bhatt. emend. mṛśaṃ? yā adanti sadānvāḥ | ucitās tanvaṃ striyā gāva ā rohiṇīr iva tā ito nāśayāmasi || yāḥ pitṛyāt saṃbhavanti- -indrajā naḥ sadānvāḥ | apa mityam ivābhṛtaṃ punas tā prati dadmasi || āmādinīḥ krūrādinīr anagnigandhyādinīḥ | amuṃ paretyoddhitaṃ śavam atta sadānvāḥ | śavaḥ kevala ācāraḥ kim u śālāsv icchatha ||
yāḥ kumārīr yāḥ sthavirā yuvatīr yāḥ sadānvāḥ | sarvā yantu kurūṭinīḥ kulīnādhenu sarpatv arāyīr abhibhā itaḥ || tābhyo rudro visṛjat Bhatt. visṛja(t) tviṣim adhvagaghātinīm | tā astā hantu vidyutā vajreṇānaparādhinā | tāsāṃ tvaṃ śakra moc chiṣa indra bhaṇvāḥ phalīkuru || kumārān ekā sthavīrān yā adanti prakhādinīḥ | tā indro hantu vṛtrahā yā devo viśvād rakṣāṃsi sedhati || yāś ca dāsīr asurāṇāṃ manuṣyebhyaś ca yāḥ kṛtāḥ | ubhayīs tāḥ parā yantu parāvataṃ navatiṃ nāvyā ati || yāsāṃ ghoṣaḥ saṃgatānāṃ vṛkāṇām iva gaṅgaṇaḥ | pracaṅkaśāmaivaharāṃ prayacchantīṃ pratigrahāṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || yāni sāyaṃ yathāsthāmād rātrīṃ yakṣāṇi prerate | agniṣ ṭā sarvā sāhantyo viśvād rakṣāṃsi sedhatu || yā ṛkṣīkāḥ kalīlāndā- -apsu jātāḥ pulīkayāḥ | gopā āsām eko veda yato jātāḥ sadānvās tā ito nāśayāmasi || gurucchāyām ūrdhāryaṃ śiśumākāṃ pratiśrukām | atiduhnāṃ vicalantīṃ vitūlumām | sarvāś caṇḍasya naptyo nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || āvadantīṃ nāmahūkāṃ taṃstanīkāṃ vṛṅktapadīm | udradantīm anāsikāṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ || vāvadākām albhaṣāsāṃ vijavrāṃ labruvaṃ lavum | arāyīṃ vācamejayāṃ nāśayāmaḥ sadānvāḥ ||
anuvāka 3 ||
dadāmīty eva brūyād anu cainām abhutsata | vaśāṃ brahmabhyo yācadbhyas tat prajāvad apatyavat || prajayā sa vi krīṇīte Bhatt. su paśubhiś copa dasyati | ya ārṣeyebhyo yācadbhyo devānāṃ gāṃ na ditsati || kūṭayāsya saṃ śīryante śroṇayā kāṭam ardati | baṇḍayā dahyante gṛhāḥ kāṇayā jīyate svam || vilohito adhiṣṭhānāc chakno vindati gopatim | tathā vaśāyāḥ sāṃvidyaṃ duradabhnā hy ucyase || yo asyāḥ karṇāv āskunoty ā sa deveṣu vṛścate | lakṣma kurva iti manyate kanīyaḥ kṛṇute svam || pador asyā adhiṣṭhānād viklindur nāma vindati | anāmanāt saṃ śīryante yā mukhenopajighrati || yad asyā gopatau satyā loma dhvāṅkṣo ajīhiḍat | tataḥ kiśorā mriyante vatsāṃś ca ghātuko vṛkaḥ || yad asyāḥ kasmai cid bhogāya bālān kaś cit pra kṛntati | tataḥ kumārā mriyante yakṣmaś chantsaty anāmanāt || yad asyāḥ palpulanāya śakṛd dāsī samasyati | Bhatt. sa(⟨ śa)kṛd tato 'pirūpaṃ jāyate tasmād avyeṣyad enasaḥ || jāyamānābhi jāyate devān sabrāhmaṇān vaśā | tasmād brahmabhyo deyaiṣā tad āhuḥ svasya gopanam ||
ya enāṃ vanim āyanti teṣāṃ devakṛtā vaśā | brahmajyeyaṃ tad abruvan ya enāṃ nipriyāyate || ya enāṃ yācadbhya ārṣeyebhyo na ditsati | ā sa deveṣu vṛścate brāhmanānāṃ ca manyave || yasyānyaḥ syād vaśābhogo Bhatt. yasyānya(ḥ) anyām iccheta tarhi saḥ | hiṃsyād adattā gopatiṃ yācitāṃ ca na ditsati || yathā śevadhir nihito brāhmaṇānāṃ tathā vaśā | tām etad ā yanti yasmin kasmiṃś ca jāyate || svam etad ā yanti yad vaśāṃ brāhmaṇā abhi | yathaitān anyaj jinīyād evāsyānirodhanam || cared evā traihāyaṇād avijñātagadā satī | vaśāṃ ca vidyān nārada brāhmaṇas tarhy eṣyaḥ || ya enām avaśām āha devānāṃ nihitaṃ nidhim | ubhau tasmai bhavāśarvau parikramyeṣum asyataḥ || duradabhnainam ā śaye yācitāṃ ca na ditsati | nāsmai kāmaḥ sam ṛdhyate yam adattvā cikīrṣati || yo asyā ūdho na veda- -atho asyā stanān uta | ubhayenaivaināṃ duhe dātuṃ ced aśakad vaśām || devā vaśāṃ yācanti mukhaṃ kṛtvā brahmaṇam | teṣāṃ sarveṣām adadad Bhatt. aga(⟨ da)dad dheḍaṃ ny eti mānuṣaḥ ||
heḍaṃ paśūnāṃ ny eti brāhmaṇebhyo 'dadad vaśām | devānāṃ nihitaṃ bhāgaṃ martyaś cen nipriyāyate || yad anye śataṃ yāceyur brāhmaṇā gopatiṃ vaśām | athaitā devā abruvann evaṃ ha viduṣo vaśā || ya evaṃ viduṣe 'dattvā- -anyasmai dadad vaśām | durgā tasmā adhiṣṭhāne pṛthivī sahadevatā || devā vaśām ayācan Bhatt. ayācaṃ yasminn agre ajāyata | tām etāṃ vidyān nāradaḥ saha devair ud ājata || anapatyam alpapaśuṃ vaśā kṛṇotu pūruṣam | brāhmaṇaiś ca yācitām athaināṃ ni priyāyate || agnīṣomābhyāṃ kāmāya mitrāya varuṇāya ca | tebhyo yācanti brāhmaṇās tebhya ā vṛścate 'dadhat || read 'dadat yāvad asyā gopatir na- -upaśṛṇuyād ṛcaḥ svayam | Bhatt. ṛca(ḥ) cared asya tāvad goṣu nāsya śrutā gṛhe syāt || yo asyā ṛca upaśrutya- -atha goṣv acīcarat | āyuś ca tasya bhūtiṃ ca devā vṛścanti hīḍitāḥ || vaśā carantī bahudhā devānāṃ nihito nidhiḥ | āviṣkṛṇute rūpāṇi yathā sthāma jigāṃsati || āvir ātmānaṃ kṛṇute yathā sthāma jigāṃsati | atho ha brahmabhyo vaśā yākyāya kṛṇute manaḥ ||
manasā saṃkalpayati tad devām̐ api gacchati | atho ha brahmāṇo vaśām upaprayanti yācitum || svadhākāreṇa pitṛbhyo yajñena devatābhyaḥ | dānena rājanyo vaśāyā mātur heḍaṃ na gacchati || vaśā rājanya te mātā tathā saṃbhūtam agraśaḥ | tasyā āhur anarpaṇaṃ ya brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate || yathājyaṃ pratigṛhītam ālumpet sruco agnaye | evā ha brahmāṇo vaśām āgnaye vṛścate 'dadhat || read 'dadat puroḍāśavatsā sudughā loke asyopa tiṣṭhati | sāsmai sarvān kāmān duhe vaśā pradaduṣe bahūn || sarvān kāmān yamarājye vaśā pradaduṣe duhe | athāhur nārakaṃ lokaṃ nirundhānasya yācitām || pravīyamānā carati kruddhā gopataye vaśā | vehataṃ mā manyamāno mṛtyoḥ pāśeṣu badhyatām || yo vehataṃ manyamāno gṛheṣu pacate vaśām | apy asya putrān pautrāṃś ca yācayate bṛhaspatiḥ || mahad eṣā vi tapati carantī goṣu gaur api | tato ha gopataye vaśā daduṣe viṣaṃ duhe || priyaṃ paśūnāṃ bhavati yad brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate | ato vaśāyās tat priyaṃ yad devatrā haviḥ syāt ||
yā vaśā udakalpayan devā yajñād udetya | tāsāṃ viliptyaṃ bhīmām udākuruta nāradaḥ || Bhatt. nārada(ḥ) tāṃ devā amīmāṃsanta vaśeyāṃ na vaśeti | tām abravīn nārada eṣā vaśānāṃ vaśatamā || kati nu vaśā nārada yās tvaṃ vettha manuṣyajāḥ | katamāsāṃ bhīmatamā kasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇaḥ || viliptyā bṛhaspate yā ca sūtavaśā vaśā | tāsāṃ nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇo ya āśaṃseti bhūtyām || namas te astu nārada- -anuṣṭha viduṣe vaśā | read anuṣṭhu? katamāsāṃ bhīmatamā yām adattvā parābhavet || viliptyā bṛhaspate yā ca sūtavaśā vaśā | yāḥ prayacched brahmabhyo Bhatt. prayacched ya āśaṃśeti bhūtyām || trīṇi vai vaśājātāni viliptī sūtavaśā vaśā | tāḥ pra yacched brahmabhyaḥ Bhatt. yacched syonāvaskaḥ prajāpatau || etad vo brāhmaṇā havir iti manvīta yācitaḥ | vaśāṃ ced enaṃ yāceyur yā bhīmādaduṣo gṛhe || devā vaśām upāvadan na no dād iti hīḍitāḥ | etābhir ṛgbhir bhedasya tasmād vai sa parābhavat || utaitāṃ bhedo nāradād vaśām indreṇa yācitaḥ | tasmāt taṃ devā enaso Bhatt. tasmā(t) taṃ vṛścann ahamuttare || ye vaśāyā adānāya vadanti parirāpinaḥ | indrasya manyave jālmā ā vṛścante acityā || Bhatt. acittyā yo gopatiṃ pārāṇīya- -athāhur mā dadā iti | rudrasyās tāṃ hetiṃ te pari yanty acetasaḥ || yadi hutāṃ yady ahutām amā ca pacate vaśām | devān sabrāhmaṇān ṛtvā jihmo lokān nir ṛcchati ||
anuvāka 4 ||
asṛṅ māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ peṣṭraṃ mastṛhaṇaṃ majjñaḥ śarīram | Bhatt. peṣṭramastṛhaṇaṃ agniḥ kravyād attv amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasya || prātaryāvadbhyo devebhyaḥ sāyaṃyāvadbhyo devebhyo viśvadānīṃyāvadbhyo devebhyaḥ | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi || vaiśvānarāya kṣipradhanvane 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi || kṣipradhanvan kṣiprahasta | amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasya hṛdayaṃ yakṛn matasne pra vidhya || indrāgnibhyāṃ prajāpataye parameṣṭhine somāya rājñe varuṇāya rājñe | pūṣṇe dhātre savitre tvaṣṭre 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi || uṣase 'hne rātraye sūryāyāmum (…) || see 5b vīrudbhya oṣadhībhyo vanaspatibhyo vānaspatebhyo 'mum (…) || see 5b adbhyo mātariśvane 'dyāvāpṛthivībhyām amum (…) || see 5b idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya bṛhate viśvarūpāyāmum (…) || see 5b mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarāyāmum (…) || see 5b
digbhyo antardeśebhya āśābhya āśāpālebhyo 'mum (…) || see 17.21.5b ṛtubhya ārtavebhyo adhipatibhya ādhipatyebhyo 'mum (…) || see 17.21.5b ṛṣibhya ārṣeyebhyo aṅgirobhya āṅgirasebhyo 'tharvabhya ātharvaṇebhyo 'mum (…) || see 17.21.5b vasubhyo rudrebhya ādityebhyaḥ sādhyebhya āptyebhyo 'mum (…) || see 17.21.5b marudbhyo 'śvibhyāṃ brahmaṇe brahmaṇaspataye 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi || ye svaś cakrur ye svar jajñuḥ | tebhyaḥ svaḥkṛdbhyaḥ svaḥkārebhyo 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi | te svaḥkṛtaḥ svaḥkārā amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ parā bhāvayantu || ye tapaś cakrur ye tapo jajñuḥ | tebhyas tapaskṛdbhyas tapaskārebhyo 'mum (…) | see 6b te tapaskṛtas tapaskārā amum (…) || see 6c ye brahma cakrur ye brahma jajñuḥ | tebhyo brahmakṛdbhyo brahmakārebhyo 'mum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram ā vṛścāmi | te brahmakṛto brahmakārā amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ parā bhāvayantu || aghāriṇīm amūm aghaviddhāṃ vikeśīm apapratidhimāsoktīṃ devamanuṣyāḥ paśyantu | amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putraṃ rurudhuṣīm || aliklavā gṛdhrāḥ kaṅkāḥ suparṇāḥ śvapadāḥ patatriṇaḥ | Bhatt. aliklavāḥ gṛ- (sic) vayāṃsi śakunayo 'muṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasyādahane carantu ||
tad āpaḥ pra vahata- -avadyaṃ ca malaṃ ca yat | yad duṣvapnyam ārima yad ṛcānṛtam ūdima || āpaḥ sapta sravantīs tā no muñcaṃtv aṃhasaḥ || muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta | atho yamasya paḍbīśād viśvasmād devaduṣkṛtāt || jāmiśaṃsād duṣvapnyād druho mā muñcantu varuṇasya pāśāt || mahyam indro varuṇo bṛhaspatiḥ savitā varca ādadhan || bhrātṛvyahaṃ sapatnaham asau me bhrātṛbhyo 'sau sapatnaḥ || taṃ hanmi taṃ duḥsvapnyena vidhyāmi tam anāyuṣṭayā vidhyāmi taṃ kṣapitāyavyena vidhyāmi tam adharāñcaṃ mṛtyupatham abhyapa nudāmi ||
vidma te svapna janitraṃ pāpmanaḥ putro 'sy abhūtyā adhi jāto yamasya karaṇaḥ | taṃ tvā svapna tathā vidma | yo bhadraḥ svapnaḥ sa mama yaḥ pāpas taṃ dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ | tam asmai gamayāmas tenainaṃ vidhyāmo 'bhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmo nirbhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmaḥ parābhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmo grāhyaiṇaṃ vidhyāmas tamasainaṃ vidhyāmo agna enaṃ kravyāda ā vṛśāmo devānām enaṃ ghoraiḥ krūraiḥ praiṣair abhi preṣyamo praiṣair Selva 2019, 185; Bhatt. preṣyair vaiśvāṇarasyainaṃ daṃṣṭrayor api dadhmaḥ || (…) janitraṃ see 1a grāhyāḥ putro 'si nirṛtyā adhi (…) || see 1b-o (…) janitraṃ see 1a varuṇasya putro 'si varuṇānyā adhi (…) || see 1b-o (…) janitram see 1a ahnaḥ putro 'si rātryā adhi (…) || see 1b-o (…) janitraṃ see 1a divas putro 'si bhūmyā adhi (…) || see 1b-o (…) janitraṃ see 1a vanaspatīnāṃ putro 'sy oṣadībhyo 'dhi (…) || see 1b-o (…) janitraṃ see 1a vānaspatyānāṃ putro 'si vīrudbhyo 'dhi (…) || see 1b-o (…) janitraṃ see 1a tandriyāḥ putro 'si koṭīyā adhi (…) || see 1b-o (…) janitraṃ see 1a rakṣasāṃ putro 'sy abhvebhyo 'dhi (…) || see 1b-o] [abhvebhyo Selva 2019, 190; Bhatt. abbhavebhyo vidma te svapna janitraṃ gandharvāṇāṃ putro 'sy apsarobhyo adhi jāto yamasya karaṇaḥ | taṃ tvā svapna iti trīṇi || 1c-o are repeated, see Selva 2019, 195
dyāvāpṛthivī ahorātre nakṣatrapeśaḥ | idam aham amuṣminn āmuṣyāyaṇe 'muṣyāḥ putre duṣvapnyaṃ vrajet || yad asmāsv ity āṣṭādaśakī || mā pra gāma patho vayaṃ mā yajñād indra sominaḥ | mānta sthur no arātayaḥ || yo yajñasya prasādhanas tantur deveṣv ātataḥ | tam āhutam aśīmahi || namo mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase maho devāya tad ṛtaṃ saparyata | dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave divas putrāya sūryāya śaṃsata || dyāvā ca tatra tatatanann ahāni ca na te adevaḥ pradivo vi vāsati | yad etaśebhiḥ pratarai ratharyasi prācīnam anyad anu vartate raja ud anyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya || yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamo Bhatt. vādhase jagac ca viśvam abhīyarṣi bhānunā | tenāsmad viśvām anirām anāhutim apāmīvām apa duṣvapnyaṃ suva || viśvām anirām amīvām anāhutim amuṣmā āmuṣyāyaṇāyāmuṣyāḥ putrāya pra hiṇmaḥ ||
dyāvāpṛthivī vahataṃ duṣvapnyaṃ parā vahataṃ duṣvapnyam | amuṣmā āmuṣyāyaṇāyāmuṣyāḥ putrāya || vātāpavamānau vahatam (…) || see 1ab indrāgnī vahatam (…) || see 1ab mitrāvaruṇā vahatam (…) || see 1ab bhavāśarvau vahatam (…) || see 1ab devāśvinā vahataṃ duṣvapnyaṃ parā vahataṃ duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b devā maruto vahata duṣvapnyaṃ parā vahata duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b devāḥ pitaro vahata duṣvapnyaṃ parā vahata duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b deva sūrya vaha duṣvapnyaṃ parā vaha duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b deva candramo vaha duṣvapnyaṃ parā vaha duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b devā nakṣatrāṇi vahata duṣvapnyaṃ parā vahata duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b devīr āpo vahata duṣvapnyaṃ parā vahata duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b deva viṣṇo vaha duṣvapnyam (…) || see 9ab deva tvaṣṭar vaha (…) || deva dhātar vaha (…) || see 9ab deva savitar vaha (…) || see 9ab deva pūṣan vaha (…) || see 9ab deva bṛhaspate vaha (…) || see 9ab deva prajāpate vaha (…) || see 9ab deva parameṣṭhin vaha duṣvapnyaṃ parā vaha duṣvapnyam | (…) || see 1b ahorātre vahataṃ duṣvapnyaṃ parā vahataṃ duṣvapnyam | amuṣmā āmuṣyāyaṇāyāmuṣyāḥ putrāya ||
anuvāka 5 ||
indro vajram asiñcad vṛtrāya hantave | tvaṣṭā vajram asiñcad vṛtrāya hantave || yo vajraḥ sa viśvānaro yat tegmavīryaṃ sa viśvāṣāḍ yad dhārambhaṇaṃ sa vaiśvānaraḥ || etad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad etāni trīṇi | viśvānaro vaiśvānaro viśvāṣāṭ || sarvān eva puṇyāṃl lokān ava rundhe sarvāś ca devatā ya evaṃ vidvān anaḍuho vrataṃ bibharti ||
tam ādatta tam ud aiṅgayat tam upāmimīta pra harāṇīti || so 'sya hastād amucyata daivo vajraḥ kṣuraḥ paviḥ sahasrapṛṣṭir divispṛśaḥ || sa saṃśiñjāno 'tiṣṭhad dhariharā bhavann etad ṛcchan || see Selva 2019, 242 sa samudraṃ prāviśat sa samudram adahat || tasmāt samudro durgir apapid vaiśvānareṇa hi dagdhaḥ || Bhatt. jagdhaḥ sa śakra ud akrāmat so 'dhyāyad asau vajro asuraiḥ sampadyadevās taṃ rakṣati Bhatt. emend. rakṣanti? vrataṃ carāṇīti sa vratam acarat || so 'ṇuḥ kṛśo 'bhavat tasmād aṇuḥ kṛśo vratacārī bhavaty aṇur hi kṛśo bhūtvendro asurān apāvṛṅkta || sa parameṣṭhinam upādhāvat || sa prajāpatim upādhāvat || sa viṣṇum upādhāvat || sa gṛhapatim upādhāvat || sa virājam upādhāvat || sa svarājam upādhāvat || sa samrājam upādhāvat || so 'horātre upadhāvat || so 'rdhamāsān upādhāvat || sa māsān upādhāvat || sa ṛtūn upādhāvat || sa ārtavān upādhāvat || sa ṛṣīn upādhāvat || sa ārṣeyān upādhāvat || so 'ṅgirasa upapādhāvat || sa āṅgirasān upādhāvat || so atharvaṇa upādhāvat || sa ātharvaṇān upādhāvat || viśvān devān marudgaṇās tam anv avādravan Bhatt. °dravaṃ somaḥ prathamo 'thendrāgnī || tam upāmantrayantāpuṇyayā vācā krūrayā ca haniṣyāmas tvā vittvā cetsyāmonacatamiṣyasīti so 'śāmyat || tasmād yo brahma vedotāpaskṛtaṃ śamayati dohayata evainān || tam ṛksāmābhyām ādatta yajuṣā yajñena gāyatreṇa vāmadevyena ca || etad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad ṛksāme etāv indrasya bāhū || tam ādatta taṃ paruṣy ādhatta || prajā vai samṛddhir akṣitiḥ paśavaḥ parūṃṣi || prajām eva samṛddhim akṣitim ava rundhe yaḥ (…) || [see 17.27.4b
sa dikṣu praty atiṣṭhat || diśa evānu prati tiṣṭhati yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
sa viśvāṣāhy akramat || eṣā vai viṣvāṣāḍ ḍyaur evāsau || Bhatt. viṣvāṣā(ḍ)+ ete vai sarve puṇyā lokāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ sa nādhārayat || sarvān eva puṇyām̐l lokān ava rundhe sarvāś ca devatā yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
sa viśvānare 'kramata || eṣa vai viśvānaro yad antarikṣaṃ samudraḥ || ete vai pathayo devayānā yat sūryasya raśmayaḥ saḥ (…) || pathiṣu devayāneṣu dhriyate pra patho devayānān jānāti Bhatt. devayānāṃ yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
sa vaiśvānare 'kramata || eṣa vai vaiśvānaro yad ayaṃ pavamānaḥ || eṣa vai sarvā anuprajāto dhriyate sa nādhārayat || dhriyante asmin prāṇā yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
sa vṛtre 'kramata || tasya vṛtrasyāṅgā parvāṇi śarīrāṇy abhajyanta | etāni vai vṛtrasyāṅgā parvāṇi śarīrāṇi yad ime parvatāḥ || sa yatra hṛdā manasā kāmayata iha me rādhyate tad asmai rādhyate || asyām eva pratiṣṭhām āyatanaṃ vindate yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
sa devān āgacchat taṃ devā abruvann āśaṃsāmahe gurv etad vratam āraṇyeṣu paśuṣu grāmyeṣv aty eti || so 'naḍvāham upādhāvat tam anaḍvān abravīt kiṃ me pratīvāho bhaviṣyatīti varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sa varam avṛṇīta || bradhnaloko 'sāni bradhnasya viṣṭapi śrayā iti || ṣoḍaśo vā ita ūrdhvo loko yad bradhno yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaḥ || bradhnaloko bhavati bradhnasya viṣṭapi śrayate yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
athāhīnā āśvatthir abravīn na tād brāhmaṇaṃ nindāni yād enam aśṛṇon ned iṣṭāpūrtena vi bhavānīti || kṛtyā vā eṣā manuṣyeṣu carati yad anaḍvān yad anaḍudvratī || ya evaṃ viduṣo 'sādhu kīrtayati- -iṣṭam evāsya pūrtaṃ māyāṃ saṃ vṛkte || indro vā agre asureṣv anaḍudvratam acarat Bhatt. vāgre teṣām iṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ māyāṃ saṃvṛktānindraṃ hy enam || so 'naḍuho vahe 'kramata sarvām̐l lokān prājānāt || yāv asya pūrvapādau tau pūrvapakṣau yāv aparapādau tāv aparapakṣau || yāv asyauṣṭhau tau puroḍāśau Bhatt. asyoṣṭḥau ye nāsike tau sruvau || ye asyākṣau tau sūryācandramasau ye nimeṣās tāny ahorātrāṇi yāni vakṣaṇāni te sūryasya raśmayaḥ saḥ (…) || droṇakalaśaḥ śiraḥ somo rājā mastiṣkaḥ || ye asya śṛṅge tad ṛtaṃ satyam || dhruvaṃ vā ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tasmād ete dhruve || dhruvam eva rtaṃ satyam anu prati tiṣṭhati yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
yāv asya karṇau sā śraddhā || carācarā vai śraddhā tasmāt karṇau muhur varīvarjayati || śraddadhate 'smai śraddhānīyo bhavati yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
yāsya dakṣiṇā hanuḥ sā juhur yā savyā sopabhṛd yaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ sā dhruvā || agnir āsyaṃ vidyuj jihvā maruto dantāḥ pavamānaḥ prāṇaḥ || eṣā vai sā yām āhur vasor dhāreti yad āntragudam || vasor eva dhārāṃ samṛddhim akṣitim ava rundhe yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
yad asya carmaṃ tad abhraṃ yāni lomāni tāni nakṣatrāṇi || svedo varṣam ūṣmā nīhāra oṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś cobadhyam || yo 'sya dakṣiṇo 'rdhas tau śāradau māsau yaḥ savyas tau haimanau || yo 'sya jaghanārdhas tau śaiśirau māsau yaḥ pūrvādhas tau vāsantau || yad asya pṛṣṭhaṃ tau graiṣmau māsau yan madhyau tau vārṣikau || saṃvatsaro vā eṣa saṃbhṛto yad anaḍvān yad anaḍudvratī || kalpante asmā ṛtavo na rtuṣv ā vṛścata ṛtūnāṃ priyo bhavati yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
tapaś ca varaś ca mahaś ca yaśaś ca yad asminn antar ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi brāhmaṇam || brahma caiva lokaṃ cāva rundhe brāhmaṇavarcasī bhavati yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
atha yad asminn antaḥ || śataṃ śraddhā śataṃ dīkṣāḥ śataṃ yajñāḥ śataṃ dakṣiṇāḥ || śataṃ bhūtayaḥ śataṃ puṣṭayaḥ śataṃ prabhūtayaḥ śataṃ samṛddhayaḥ || śatam abhūtayaḥ śataṃ nirbhūtayaḥ śataṃ parābhūtayaḥ śatam asamṛddhayaḥ || śatamadhyāni śatam algaṇāni śataṃ tamāṃsi śataṃ rudhirāṇi || ya evaṃ viduṣo 'sādhu kīrtayaty etair evainaṃ tamobhiḥ prorṇoti || yad asya prācīnaṃ nābhyās tena dviṣantam ā viśati || atha yad asya pratīcīnaṃ nābhyās tena mṛtuṃ nāṣṭrām avartiṃ tarati || pra patho devayānāṃ jānāti yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
śatam ardhamāsāḥ śataṃ māsāḥ śatam ṛtavaḥ śatam ārtavāḥ || śatam idāvatsarāḥ śataṃ parivatsarāḥ śataṃ saṃvatsarāḥ || śataṃ brahmāṇi śataṃ karmāṇi śataṃ jyotīṃṣi śatam amṛtāni || śataṃ prāṇāḥ śatam apānāḥ śataṃ vyānāḥ śataṃ samānāḥ || Bhatt. prāṇāṃ jyog jīvati sarvam āyur eti na purā jarasaḥ pra mīyate Bhatt. eti ta yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
atha yad asminn antaḥ || śataṃ gāyatrāḥ śataṃ sāhnāḥ śataṃ trirātrāḥ śatam atirātrāḥ || śatam agniṣṭomāḥ śataṃ dvādaśāhāḥ śataṃ ṣoḍaśinaḥ śataṃ sarvapṛṣṭhyāḥ || śataṃ rājāsūyāḥ śataṃ vājapeyāḥ śataṃ kāmaprāḥ sahasraṃ satrāyaṇāni || eṣa vānaḍvān sarvāṅgaḥ sarvātmā sarvaparuḥ sarvapān madhyataḥ praty aṣṭhāt || ṛksāmābhyām uttabhito yajuṣā yajñena gāyatreṇa brahmaṇā prathita upariṣṭāt || prathate prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena yaḥ (…) || see 17.27.4b
indro balenāsi parameṣṭhī vratena gaus tena vaiśvadevaḥ || yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇān saṃ vṛha tasya prāṇān vi vṛha || indro 'sīndrasya rūpam asi prajāpatir asi parameṣṭhy asi || svar asi svargo 'si svargaloko 'si svargaṃ mā lokaṃ gamaya || yenāsya vahas tena yajño yena vahati tena lokaḥ || yenainaṃ paśyati tena viśvo yenainaṃ gamayati tena sarvaḥ || ye 'sya pādāḥ sā pratiṣṭhā | prati tiṣṭhati prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena ya evaṃ vidvān anaḍuho vrataṃ bibharti ||
anuvāka 6 ||
naḍam ā roha na te atra loka idaṃ sīsaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ ta ehi | yo goṣu yakṣmaḥ puruṣeṣu yakṣmas tena tvaṃ sākam adharāṅ parehi || aghaśaṃsaduḥśaṃsau kareṇānukareṇa ca | mṛtyūṃś ca sarvāṃs teneto yakṣmāṃś ca nir ajāmasi || nir ito mṛtyuṃ nirṛtiṃ nir yakṣmam ajāmasi | yo no dveṣṭi tam addhy agne kravyād yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ te pra suvāmaḥ || yady agniḥ kravyād yadi vā vyāghra imaṃ goṣṭham anyokā ā viveśa | taṃ māṣājyaṃ kṛtvā pra hiṇomi dūraṃ sa gacchatv apsuṣado 'ty agnīn || yat tvā kuddhāḥ pracakrur manyunā puruṣe mṛte | sukalpam agne tat tvayā punas tvod dīpayāmasi || punas tvādityā rudrā vasavaḥ punar brahmā vasunītir agre | punas tvā brahmaṇaspatir ādhād dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya || yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vo gṛham imaṃ paśyann itaraṃ jātavedasam | taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya dūraṃ sa gharmam indhat parame sadhasthe || kravyādam agniṃ pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājño gacchatu ripravāhaḥ | ihaivāyam itaro jātavedā devo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan || kravyādam agnim iṣito harāmi janān druhantaṃ vajreṇa mṛtyum | vi taṃ śāsmi gārhapatyena vidvān pitṝṇāṃ loke api bhāgo asya || kravyādam agniṃ śasamānam ukthyaṃ pra hiṇomi pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ | mā devayānaiḥ pathibhir ā gā atraivaidhi pitṛṣu jāgṛhi tvam ||
sam indhate saṃkasukaṃ svastaye śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ | jahāti ripram aty ena eti samiddho agniḥ supunā punāti || devo agniḥ saṃkasuko divas pṛṣṭhāny āruhat | mucyamāno nir aṃhaso mohyāsmām̐ aśastyāḥ || Bhatt. aśastyā(ḥ) asmin vayaṃ saṃkasuke agne riprāṇi mṛjmahe | abhūma yajñiyāḥ śuddhāḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat || saṃkasuko vikasuko nirṛtho yaś ca nisvaraḥ | te te yakṣmaṃ savedaso dūrād dūram acucyavuḥ || annāt tvā puruṣebhyo Bhatt. annā(t) tvā gobhyo aśvebhyas tvā | kravyādaṃ nir ṇudāmasy agniṃ jīvitayopanam || yo no aśveṣu vīreṣu yo goṣu yo ajādiṣu | kravyādaṃ nir ṇudāmasy agnir yo janayopanaḥ || samiddho agna āhuta sa no mābhyapakramīḥ | atraiva dīdihi dyavi jyok ca sūryāya dṛśe || yasmin devā amṛjata yasmin manuṣyā uta | tasmin ghṛtastāvo mṛṣṭvā tvam agne divaṃ ruha || sīse mṛḍhvaṃ naḍe mṛḍhvam agniḥ saṃkasukaś ca yaḥ | atho avyāṃ rāmāyāṃ śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe || sīse balaṃ sādayitvā read 'balaṃ or malaṃ? śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe | avyām asiknyāṃ mṛṣṭvā śuddhā bhavanti yajñiyāḥ ||
paraṃ mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas ta eṣa itaro devayānāt | cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi- -iha me vīrā bahavo bhavantu || ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahūtir no adya | prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema || imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam | jyog jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīs tiro mṛtyuṃ dadhatāṃ parvatena || yathāhāny anupūrvaṃ bhavanti yathartava ṛtubhir yanti sākam | yathā na pūrvo aparaṃ jahāty evā tvaṣṭar āyuṃṣi kalpayaiṣām || ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati ṣṭha | tān vas tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣāḥ sarvam āyur nayatu jīvanāya || aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvaṃ vīrayadhvaṃ pra taratā sakhāyaḥ | atrā jahīta ye asan durevā anamīvān ut taremābhi vājān || ut tiṣṭhatā pra taratā sakhāyo +'śmanvatī syandate nadīyam | atrā jahīta ye asann aśivāḥ śivān syonān ut taremābhi vājān || Bhatt. śivāṃ vaiśvadevīṃ sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvaṃ śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ | atikrāmanto duritāni viśvā śataṃ himāḥ sarvavīrā madema || udīcīnaiḥ pathibhir vāyum adbhir atikrāmanto 'varān parebhiḥ | triḥ sapta kṛtva ṛṣayaḥ paretā mṛtyuṃ pratyauhan padayopanena || mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanta eta drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ | āsīnā mṛtyuṃ nudatā sadhasthe 'tha jīvā vidatham ā vadema ||
imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ viśantu | anaśravo anamīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre || ime vīrā avidhavāḥ sujānaya āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ spṛśantām | anaśravo anamīvāḥ suratnāḥ syonād yoner adhi talpaṃ ruheyuḥ || vyākaromi haviṣāham etau tau brahmaṇā vy ahaṃ kalpayāmi | svadhāṃ pitṛbhyo ajarāṃ kṛṇomi dīrghenāyuṣā sam imāṃ sṛjāmi || yo no agniḥ pitaro hṛtsv antar āviveśāmṛto martyeṣu | mayy ahaṃ taṃ pari gṛhṇāmi devaṃ mā so asmān dvikṣata mā vayaṃ tam || apāvartyāgniṃ gārhapatyaṃ kravyādā preta dakṣiṇā | priyaṃ pitṛbhya ātmane brahmaṇe kṛṇuta priyam || dvibhāgadhanam ādāya pra kṣināty avartyā | agniḥ putrasya jyeṣṭhasya yaḥ kravyād anirāhitaḥ || yat kṛṣate yad vanute yac ca vastena vindate | sarvaṃ martyasya tan nāsti kravyāc ced anirāhitaḥ || ayajñiyo hatavarcā bhavati nainena havir attave | chinatti kṛṣiṃ gāṃ dhanaṃ yaḥ kravyād anuvartate || bahu gṛdhyaiḥ pra vadaty ārtiṃ martyo ny eti ca | kravyād yam agnir antikād anuvidvān vitāvati || grāhyā gṛhāḥ saṃ sṛjyante yat striyā mriyate patiḥ | Bhatt. ya(t) brahmaiva vidvān eṣyo yaḥ kravyādaṃ nir ādadhat ||
yad ripraṃ duritaṃ cakṛmā yac ca duṣkṛtam | āpo mā tasmāc chundhantv agniḥ saṃkasukaś ca yaḥ || Bhatt. saṅkasukaś tā adharād udīcīr āvavṛtran Bhatt. āvavṛtraṃ prajānatīḥ pathibhir devayānaiḥ | parvatasya ṛṣabhasyādhi pṛṣṭhe navāś caranti saritaḥ purāṇīḥ || agne akravyān niṣkravyādaṃ nudā devajanaṃ vaha || imaṃ kravyāt pra viveśa- -ayaṃ kravyādam anv agāt | vyāghrau kṛtvā nānānaṃ taṃ harāmi śivāparam || antardhir devānāṃ paridhir manuṣyāṇām agnir gārhapatya ubhayān antarā śritaḥ | jīvānām agne pra tira dīrgham āyuḥ pitṝṇāṃ lokam upa yantu ye mṛtāḥ || sugārhapatyo vitapann arātīr uṣāmuṣāṃ śreyasīṃśreyasīṃ dadhat | sarvān agne sahamānaḥ sapatnān aiṣām ūrjaṃ rayim asmāsu dhehi || imam indraṃ vahniṃ paprim anv ārabhadhvaṃ sa vo nividvān vijahātu mṛtyum | tenāpa hata śarum āpatantaṃ tena rudrasya pari pātāstām || ahorātre anv eṣi bibhrat kṣemyas tiṣṭhan prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ | anāturāṃ sumanasas talpa bibhraj jyog eva naḥ puruṣagandhir edhi || te deveṣv ā vṛścante pāpaṃ jīvanti sarvadā | kravyād yān agnir antikād anuvidvān vitāvati || preva manasā patiti muhur ā vartate punaḥ | kravyād yam agnir antikād aśva ivānuvapate naḍam ||
ye 'śraddhayā dhanakāmyāt kravyādā samāsate | te vā anyeṣāṃ kumbhīṃ pary ādadhati sarvadā || iṣīkāṃ caratīṃ vittvā tilpiyaṃ daṇḍanaṃ naḍam | tān indra idhmaṃ kṛtvā yamasyāgniṃ nirādadhau || aviḥ kṛṣṇā bhāgadheyaṃ paśūnāṃ sīsaṃ kravyād uta candraṃ ta āhuḥ | māṣāḥ piṣṭā bhāgadheyaṃ havyaṃ te 'raṇyānyā gahvaraṃ sacasva || pratyañcam arkaṃ pratyarpayitvā pravidvān panthāṃ vi hy ācakāra | parāmīṣām asūn dideśa dīrgheṇāyuṣā sam adhād ihemān || anaḍvāhaṃ plavam anv ārabhadhvaṃ sa vo nirvakṣad duritād avadyāt | Bhatt. nirvakṣa(d) ā rohata savitur nāvaṃ hiraṇyayīṃ ṣaḍbhir ūrmibhir amatiṃ carema || gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudhaṃ puruhūta viśvām | vayaṃ rājānaḥ prathamā dhanānām ariṣṭāsa ṛjanībhis tarema || pūrṇaṃ nāri pra harābhi kumbham apāṃ rasair oṣadhīnāṃ ghṛtasya | imān pātṝṃr amṛtenā sam aṅdhi sthirā vīrāḥ saṃmanaso bhavantu ||
anuvāka 7 ||
pumān puṃso adhi tiṣṭha carma tatra hvayasva yatamā priyā te | yāvantāv agre prathamaṃ sameyathus tad vāṃ vayo yamarājye samānam || tāvad vāṃ tejas tati vīryāṇi tāvac cakṣus tatidhā vājināni | agniḥ śarīraṃ sacate yadaidho adhā pakvān mithunā saṃ bhavāthaḥ || Bhatt. bhavātha(ḥ) sam asmiṃl loke sam u devayāne saṃ smā sametaṃ yamarājye | pūtau pavitrair upa tad u hvayethāṃ yadyad reto adhi vāṃ saṃbabhūva || āpaḥ putrāso abhi saṃ viśadhvam imaṃ jīvaṃ jīvadhanyāḥ sam eta | tāsāṃ bhajadhvam amṛtaṃ yad āhur yam odanaṃ pacati vo janitrī || yaṃ vaḥ pitā pacati yaṃ ca mātā riprān nirmukthyai śamalāc ca vācaḥ | sa odanaḥ śatadhāraḥ svarga ubhe vyāpa nabhasī mahitvā || ubhe nabhasī ubhayāṃś ca lokān ye yajvanām abhijitāḥ svargāḥ | teṣāṃ jyotiṣmān madhumān yo agre tasmin putrair jarasi saṃ śrayethām || prācīṃprācīṃ pradiśam ā rabhetām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante | mimāthāṃ pātraṃ tad vāṃ pūrṇam astu sa vāṃ pakvaḥ pitryāṇe nyāyat || dakṣiṇāṃ diśam abhi nakṣamāṇau pary āvartethām abhi pātram etat | tasmai vāṃ yamaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ pakvāya śarma bahulaṃ ni yacchāt || pratīcī diśām iyam id varaṃ vāṃ yasyāṃ somo adhipā mṛḍitā ca | tasyāṃ mimāthāṃ sukṛtaḥ sacethām adhā pakvena saha saṃ bhavema || uttaraṃ rāṣṭraṃ prajayottarāvad diśām udīcī kṛṇavan no agram | pāṅktaṃ chandaḥ puruṣo babhūva viśvair viśvāṅgaiḥ saha saṃ bhavema ||
dhruveyaṃ virāṇ namo astv asyai śivā putrebhya uta mahyam astu | Bhatt. putrebhyaṃ, misprint sā no devy adite viśvavāra irya iva gopā abhi rakṣa pakvam || piteva putrām̐ abhi saṃ sacasva naḥ śivā no vātā iha vāntu śagmāḥ | Bhatt. śagmā(ḥ) yam odanaṃ pacato devate iha taṃ nas tapa uta satyaṃ ma vittām || yadyat kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna eha gatvā tsaraṃ viṣaktaṃ bila āsasāda | dāsī vā yad ārdrahastā samaṅkta ulūkhalaṃ musalaṃ śundhatāpaḥ || ayaṃ grāvā pṛthubudhno vayodhāḥ pūtaḥ pavitrair apa hantu rakṣaḥ | ā roha carma mahi śarma yaccha mā dampatī pautram aghaṃ ni gātām || vanaspatiḥ saha devair na āgan rakṣaḥ piśācām̐ apabādhamānaḥ | Bhatt. piśācāṃ sa ucchrayātai pra vadāti vācaṃ tena lokām̐ abhi sarvāñ jayema || sapta medhāṃ paśavaḥ pary agṛhṇan ya eṣāṃ medasvān uta yaś cakarśa | trayastriṃśad devatās tvāṃ sacante sa naḥ svargam abhi neṣi lokam || svargaṃ lokam abhi no nayāsi saṃ jāyā saha putraiḥ syāma | gṛhṇāmi hastam anv aitv atra mā nas tārīn nirṛtir mo arātiḥ || grāhiṃ pāpmānam ati tām̐ ayāma Bhatt. tāṃ tamo vyasya pra vadāsi valgu | vānaspatya udyato mā jihiṃsīr mā taṇḍulaṃ vi śarīr devayantam || viśvavyacā ghṛtapṛṣṭho bhaviṣyaṃ sayonir lokam upa yāhi vidvān | varṣavṛddham upa yaccha śūrpe tviṣiṃ palāvān apa tad vinaktu || trayo lokāḥ saṃmitā brāhmaṇena dyaur evāsau pṛthivy antarikṣam | aṃśūn gṛbhitān anu saṃrabhethām read gṛbhītām̐? ā pyāyantāṃ punar ā yantu śūrpāt ||
pṛthag rūpāṇi bahudhā paśūnām ekarūpo bhavati saṃ samṛddhyām | etāṃ tvacaṃ lohinīṃ tāṃ nudethāṃ grāvā śundhāti malaga iva vastrā || janitrīva prati hṛṇyāsi sūnuṃ saṃ tvā dadhāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthivyā | Bhatt. pṛthivyām ukhāḥ kumbhīr vedyāṃ saṃcarantāṃ yajñāyudhair ājyenābhiṣiktāḥ || Bhatt. ājyenātiṣaktā+ bhūmyāṃ tvā bhūmim adhi dhārayāmi tanūḥ samānī vikṛtā ta eṣā | yadyad yuktaṃ likhitam arpaṇaṃ ca tena mā susror api tad vapāmi || agniḥ pacan rakṣatu tvā purastād indro rakṣād dakṣiṇato mahitvā | somas tvā dṛṃhād dharuṇe pratīcyā uttarāt tvā varuṇaḥ saṃ dadātai || Bhatt. uttarā(t) ā yantu divaḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante bhūmyāḥ sacante urv antarikṣam | sacante urv: sandhi? śuddhāḥ satīs tā u śundhanta eva tā naḥ svargam abhi lokaṃ nayantu || pūtāḥ pavitraiḥ pavante abhrād divaṃ ca yanti pṛthivīṃ ca lokān | Bhatt. lokāṃ tā jīvalā jīvadhanyāḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ pātra āsiktāḥ pary agnir endhām || uteva prabhvīr uta saṃmitāsa uta śukrāḥ śucayaś cāmṛtāsaḥ | tā odanaṃ dampatibhyāṃ pratiṣṭhā āpaḥ śikṣantīḥ pravatā sunāthāḥ || ud yodhayanty abhi valgantī taptāḥ phenam asyanti bahulaṃ ca bindum | Bhatt. bindūn yoṣeva dṛṣṭvā patim ṛtviyā yā- -etais taṇḍulair bhavatā sam āpaḥ || saṃkhyātā stokāḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante prāṇāpānaiḥ saṃmitā oṣadhībhiḥ | asaṃkhyātā opyamānāḥ suvarṇāḥ sarvaṃ samāpaṃ śucayaḥ śucitvam || utthāpaya sīdato budhna enān adbhir ātmānam api saṃ sṛjantām | amāsi pātra udakaṃ yad etan mitās taṇḍulāḥ pradiśo yatīmāḥ ||
pra yaccha parśuṃ tvarayā harantv ahiṃsanta oṣadhīr dāntu parvam | somo yāsāṃ pari rājyaṃ babhūva- -amanyutā vīrudho me bhavantu || navaṃ barhir odanāya stṛṇīta priyaṃ hṛdaś cakṣuṣo valgv astu | tatra devāḥ saha devair viśantv imaṃ prāśnantu dakṣiṇato niṣadya || vanaspate stīrṇam ā sīda barhir agniṣṭomaiḥ saṃmito devatābhiḥ | tvaṣṭeva rūpaṃ sukṛtaṃ svadhītyenā ehāḥ pari pātre dadṛśrām || dhartā dhriyasva dharuṇe pṛthivyā acyutaṃ tvā devatāś cyāvayantu | taṃ dampatī jīvantau jīvaputrā udvāsayātaḥ pary agnidhānāt || ṣaṣṭyai śaradbhyaḥ pari dadhma etaṃ svaḥ pakvenābhy aśnavātai | upainaṃ putrāḥ pitaraś ca sīdān imaṃ svargaṃ gamayāntam agne || sarvān samāgān abhijitya lokān yāvantaḥ kāmāḥ samapūpuras tān | vi gāhethām āyavanaṃ ca darvir ekasmin pātre adhyuddharainam || upa stṛṇīhi prathayā purastād ghṛtena pātram abhi ghārayedam | vāśrevosrā taruṇaṃ starasmim imaṃ devāso abhihiṃkarātha || upāstarīr akaro lokam etam uruḥ pṛthuś cāsamaḥ svargaḥ | tasmin suparṇo mahiṣaḥ śrayātai devā enaṃ devatābhyaḥ pra yacchān || yadyaj jāyā pacati tvat paraḥparaḥ patir vā jāya uta tvat tiraḥ | saṃ tat sṛjethāṃ saha vāṃ tad astu Bhatt. santat … vāntad saṃ rādhayantau saha lokam etam || yāvanto asyāḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante asmāt putrāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ | sarvāṃs tān upa pātre hvayethāṃ nābhiṃ janānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyan ||
vasor yā dhārā madhunā samaktā ghṛtena miśrā amṛtasya nābhayaḥ | sarvās tā ava rundhe svargaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ śaratsu nidhipā abhīcchāt || nidhiṃ nidhipā abhy enam icchād anīśvarā abhitaḥ santv anye | asmābhir datto nihitaḥ svargas tribhiḥ kāṇḍais trīn svargān arukṣat || agnī rakṣas tapatu yad videvaṃ kravyāt piśāca iha mā pra pāsta | nudāma enam ava rudhmo asmad ādityā no aṅgirasaḥ sacantām || ādityebhyo aṅgirobhyo madhv idaṃ ghṛtena miśraṃ prati vedayāmaḥ | śuddhahastau brāhmaṇasyānihatya- -enaṃ svargaṃ sukṛtāv apītam || idaṃ kāṇḍam uttamaṃ prāpam asya yasmāl lokāt parameṣṭhī samāpa | ā siñca sarpir ghṛtavat samaṅdhy eṣa bhāgo aṅgiraso no atra || satyāya ca tapase devatābhyo nidhiṃ śevadhiṃ pari dadhma etam | mā no dyūte 'va gān mā samityāṃ Bhatt. dyūteva mā smānyasmā ut sṛjatā purā mat || na kilbiṣam atra nādhāro asti na yan mitraiḥ samamamāna eti | paktāraṃ pakvaḥ punar ā viśāsy anūnaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ no astu || ahaṃ pacāmy aham id vadāmi mamed u karman karuṇe 'pi jāyāḥ | kaumāro loko ajaniṣṭa putro 'nv ārabhethāṃ vaya uttarāvat || priyaṃ priyāṇāṃ kṛṇavāma yātan tamas te hantu yatame dviṣanti | dhenur anaḍvān vayo yad anyat pauruṣeyam apa mṛtyuṃ nudantu || sam agnayo vidur anyo anyaṃ ya oṣadhīḥ sacate yaś ca sindhūn | yāvanto devā divy ātapanti hiraṇyaṃ jyotir dadhato babhūva ||
eṣā tvacāṃ puruṣe saṃ babhūva- -anagnāḥ sarve paśavo ye anye | Bhatt. -anagrāḥ, printing error kṣatrenātmānaṃ pari dhāpayetām amotaṃ vāso mukham odanasya || yad akṣeṣu vadasi yat samityāṃ yad vā dhane anṛtaṃ vittakāmyā | samānaṃ tantuṃ saha saṃvasānau tasmin sarvaṃ śamalaṃ sādayāthaḥ || varṣaṃ vanuṣvāpi gaccha devāṃs tvaco dhūmaṃ pary ut pātayāsi | viśvavyacā viśvakarmā svargaḥ sayonir lokam upa yāhy etam || tanvaḥ svargo bahudhā vi cakre yathā vida ātmany anyavarṇāḥ | apājait kṛṣṇāṃ ruśatīṃ punāno yā lohinī tāṃ te agnau juhomi || prācyai diśe agnaye 'dhipataye 'sitāya rakṣitra ādityāyeṣumata etaṃ pari dadhmaḥ | taṃ no gopāyantv āsmākam aitor Bhatt. tanno diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣat | jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadhātv adhā pakvena saha saṃ bhavema || dakṣiṇāyai diśa indrāyādhipataye tiraścirāje rakṣitre vasubhya iṣumadbhya etam (…) || pratīcyai diśe varuṇāyādhipataye pṛdākave rakṣitre Bhatt. pra(⟨ pṛ)dākave mitrāyeṣumata etam (…) || udīcyai diśe somāyādhipataye svajāya rakṣitre vātāyeṣumata etam (…) || dhruvāyai diśe viṣṇave 'dhipataye kalmāṣagrīvāya rakṣitre vīrudbhya iṣumatībhya etam (…) || ūrdhvāyai diśe bṛhaspataye 'dhipataye śvitrāya rakṣitre aśanībhya iṣumatībhya etaṃ pari dadhmaḥ | taṃ no gopāyantv āsmākam aitor Bhatt. tanno diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣat | jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadhātv athā pakvena saha saṃ bhavema ||
Kāṇḍa 18
satyenottabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇottabhitā dyauḥ | ṛtenādityās tiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ || somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī | ato nakṣatraṇām eṣām upasthe soma āhitaḥ || somaṃ manyate papivān yat saṃpiṃṣanty oṣadhim | somaṃ yaṃ braḥmāno vidur na tasyāśnāti pārthivaḥ || ācchadvidhānair gupito bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ | grāvṇām ic chṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ || cittir vāvopabarhaṇaṃ cakṣur āvad abhyañjanam | dyaur bhūmiḥ kośa āsīd yad ayāt sūryā patim || raibhy āsīd anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanam | sūryāyā bhadram id vāso gāthayaiti pariṣkṛtā || stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīraṃ chanda opaśaḥ | opaśaḥ with ŚS; Bhatt. upaśaḥ sūryāyā aśvinā varā- -agnir āsīt purogavaḥ || somo vadhūyur abhavad aśvināstām ubhā varā | sūryāṃ yat patye śaṃsantīṃ manasā savitādadāt || mano asyā ana āsīd dyaur āsīd uta chadiḥ | śukrāv anaḍvāhāv āstāṃ yad ayāt sūryā patim || ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanāv aitām | śrotre te cakre āstāṃ divi panthāś carācaraḥ ||
śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ | ano manasmayaṃ sūryā- -ārohat prayatī patim || sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat | aghāsu hanyante gāvaḥ phalgunīṣu vy uhyate || yad aśvinā pṛcchamānāv ayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ | kvaikaṃ cakraṃ vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ || yad ayātaṃ śubhaspatī vareyaṃ sūryām upa | viśve devā anu tad vām ajānan putraḥ pitarāv avṛnīta pūṣā || dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtuthā viduḥ | athaikaṃ cakraṃ yad guhā tad addhātaya id viduḥ || pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ | ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke syonaṃ te astu sahapatnyai vadhu || aryamaṇaṃ yajāmahe subandhuṃ pativedanam | urvārukam iva bandhanād ito muñcantu māmutaḥ || preto muñcantu māmutaḥ subaddhām amutas karat | yatheyam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrā subhagāsati || bhagas tveto nayatu hastagṛhya- -aśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃ rathena | gṛhān gaccha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃ vidatham ā vadāsi || iha priyaṃ prajāyai te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi | enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasva- -atha jirvir vidatham ā vadāsi ||
ihaiva staṃ mā vi yauṣṭaṃ dīrgham āyur vy aśnutam | krīḍantau putrair naptṛbhir modamānau sve gṛhe || pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto adhvaram | viśvāny anyo bhuvanā vicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyate navaḥ || navonavo bhavati jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām ety agram | bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāty āyan pra candramās tirate dīrgham āyuḥ || parā dehi śāmūlyaṃ brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu | kṛtyaiṣā padvatī bhūtvā- -ā jāyā viśate patim || nīlalohitaṃ bhavati kṛtyāsaktir vy ajyate | edhante asyā jñātayaḥ patir bandheṣu badhyate || aślīlā tanūr bhavati ruśatī pāpayāmuyā | patir yad vadhvo vāsasaḥ svam aṅgam abhyūrṇute || āśasanaṃ viśasanam atho adhivikartanam | sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati || tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam apāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitad attave | Bhatt. viṣavaṃ sūryāṃ yo brahmā veda sa id vādhūyam arhati || sa vai tat syonaṃ harati brahmā vāsaḥ sumaṅgalam | prāyaścittiṃ yo adhyeti yena jāyā na riṣyati || yuvaṃ bhagaṃ saṃ bharathaḥ samṛddham ṛtaṃ vadantām ṛtodyena | brahmaṇaspate patim asyai rocayāmuṃ cāru sambhalo vadatu vācam etām ||
ihed asātha na paro gamātha- -imaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā vardhayātha | śubhaṃ yatīr usriyāḥ somavarcaso viśve devāḥ krann iha vo manāṃsi || imaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā saṃ viśadhvam ayaṃ devānāṃ na mināti bhāgam | asmai vaḥ pūṣā marutaś ca sarve asmai vo dhātā savitā suvāti || anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthāno yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti no vareyam | saṃ bhagena sam aryamṇā saṃ dhātā sṛjatu varcasā naḥ || yena mahānagnyā jaghanam aśvinā yena vā sūrā | yenākṣā abhyaṣicyanta tenemāṃ varcasāvatam || yad varco akṣeṣu sūrāyāṃ ca yad āhitam | yad goṣv aśvinā varcas tenemāṃ varcasāvatam || yo anidhmo dīdāyāpsv antar yaṃ viprāsa īḍate adhvareṣu | apān napān madhumatīr apo dā yābhir indro vāvṛdhe vīryāvān || idam ahaṃ ruśantaṃ grābhaṃ tānūdūṣim apa nudāmi | yaḥ śico bhadro rocānas tam ud acāmi || asyai harantu stapanaṃ brāhmaṇā avīraghnīr ud acantv āpaḥ | aryamṇo agniṃ pary etu kṣipraṃ pratīkṣante śvaśuro devaraś ca || śaṃ te hiraṇyaṃ śam u santv āpaḥ śaṃ methir bhavatu śaṃ yugasya tardma | śaṃ ta āpaḥ śatapavitrā bhavantu śaṃ patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasva || yathā sindhur nadīnāṃ sāmrājyaṃ suṣuve vṛṣā | evā tvaṃ samrājñy edhi patyur astaṃ paretya ||
samrājñy edhi śvaśureṣu samrājñy uta śvaśruvām | nanānduḥ samrājñy edhi samrājñy uta devṛṣu || yā akṛntann avayan yāś ca tatnire Bhatt. avayaṃ yā devīr antām̐ abhito 'dadanta | Bhatt. antāṃ tās tvā jarase saṃ vyayantv āyuṣmatīdaṃ pari dhatsva vāsaḥ || jīvaṃ rudanti vi nayanty adhvaraṃ dīrghām anu prasitiṃ dīdhiyur naraḥ | vāmaṃ pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samīrire mayaḥ patibhyo janaye pariṣvaje || dhruvaṃ syonaṃ prajāyai te dhārayāmy aśmānaṃ devyāḥ pṛthivyā upasthe | tam ā rohānumādyā suvīrā dīrghaṃ ta āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu || devas te savitā hastaṃ gṛhṇātu somo rājā suprajasaṃ kṛṇotu | agniḥ subhagāṃ jātavedāḥ patyā patnīṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇotu || gṛhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ | bhago aryamā savitā purandhir mahyaṃ tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ || yenāgnir asyā bhūmyā hastaṃ jagrāha dakṣiṇam | tena gṛhṇāmi te hastaṃ mā vyathiṣṭhā mayā saha || dhātā te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt | bhagas te hastam agrahīd aryamā hastam agrahīt | patnī tvam asi dharmaṇā- -ahaṃ gṛhapatis tava || mameyam astu poṣyā mahyaṃ tvādād bṛhaspatiḥ | mayā patyā prajāvatī saṃ jīva śaradaḥ śatam || tvaṣṭā vāso vy adadhāc chubhe kaṃ bṛhaspateḥ praśiṣā kavīnām | tenemāṃ nārīṃ savitā bhagaś ca sūryām iva pari dhattāṃ prajāyai ||
gṛhās tvā prorṇuvantu varcasā bhagena jyotiṣmad idaṃ prati muñcasva vapuḥ | uṣā iva sūryasya saṃdṛśi || indrāgnī dyāvāpṛthivī ha pūṣā mitrāvaruṇā bhago aśvinobhā | bṛhaspatir maruto brahma soma imāṃ nārīṃ prajayā vardhayantu || bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ śīrṣe keṣām̐ akalpayat | tenemām aśvinā nārīṃ patyā saṃ śobhayāmasi || idaṃ tad rūpaṃ yad avasta yoṣā jāyāṃ jijñāse manasā carantīm | tām anv artiṣye sakhibhir navagvaiḥ Bhatt. arttiṣye ka imaṃ vidvān vi cacarta pāśam || ahaṃ vi ṣyāmi mayi rūpam asyā vedad it paśyan manasaḥ kulāyam | na steyam admi manasod amucye svayaṃ śrathnāno varuṇasya pāśam || imaṃ vi ṣyāmi varuṇasya pāśaṃ yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevaḥ | uruṃ lokaṃ sugam atra panthāṃ kṛṇomi tubhyaṃ sahapatnyai vadhu || ud yacchadhvam apa rakṣo hanātha- -imāṃ nārīṃ sukṛte dadhāta | dhātā vipaścit patim asyai viveda bhago rājā pura etu prajānan || bhagas tatakṣa caturaḥ pado bhagas tatakṣa catvāry uṣpalāni | tvaṣṭā pipeśa madhyato vardhrān sā no astu sumaṅgalī || enājyena haviṣā prajāyai ca vareṇyam | paśubhyaś cakṣuṣe ca kaṃ sam agniṃ sam idhīmahi || sukiṃśukaṃ vahatuṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃ sucakram | ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonaṃ patibhyo vahatuṃ kṛṇu tvam || mā hiṃsiṣṭāṃ kumāryaṃ sthūne devakṛte pathi | śālāyā devyā dvāraṃ syonaṃ kṛṇmo vadhūpatham || brahmāparaṃ yujyatāṃ brahma pūrvaṃ brahmāntato madhyato brahma sarvataḥ | anāvyādhāṃ devapurāṃ prapadya śivā syonā patiloke vi rāja ||
anuvāka 1 ||
tubhyam agre pary avahan sūryāṃ vahatunā saha | punaḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha || punaḥ patnīm agnir adād āyuṣā saha varcasā | dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam || somasya jāyā prathamaṃ gandharvas te 'paraḥ patiḥ | tṛtīyo agniṣ ṭe patis turīyas te manuṣyajāḥ || somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadad agnaye | rayiṃ ca putrāṃś cādād agnir mahyam atho imām || ā vām agan sumatir vājinīvasū ny aśvinā hṛtsu kāmā araṃsata | abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhaspatī priyā aryamṇo duryām̐ aśīmahi || sā mandasānā manasā śivena rayiṃ dhehi sarvavīraṃ vacasyam | sugaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhaspatī sthāṇuṃ pathiṣṭhām apa durmatiṃ hatam || apa rakṣāṃsy apa durmatiṃ hataṃ śubhaspatī vahator yāto asmāt | purogavo jayan rakṣāṃsy agne kṣetravit pūrvo vi mṛdho nudasva || yā oṣadhayo yā nadyo yāni kṣetrāṇi yā vanā | te tvā vadhu prajāvatīṃ patye rakṣantu rakṣasaḥ || emaṃ panthām aganma sugaṃ svastivāhanam | yatra vīro na riṣyaty anyeṣāṃ vindate vasu || idaṃ su me naraḥ śṛṇuta yayāśiṣā dampatī vāmam aśnutaḥ | ye gandharvā apsarasaś ca devīr Bhatt. aspara-, misprint eṣu vānaspatyeṣv adyādhi tasthuḥ | syonās te asyai vadhvai bhavantu mā hiṃsiṣur vahatum uhyamānam ||
ye vadhvaś candraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janām̐ anu | punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ || mā vidan paryāyiṇo ya āsīdanti dampatī | sugena durgam atītām apa drāntv arātayaḥ || saṃ kāśayāmi vahatuṃ brahmaṇā gṛhair aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitryeṇa | Bhatt. mitrye(⟨ triye*)ṇa paryāṇaddhaṃ viśvarūpaṃ yad asmin syonaṃ patibhyaḥ savitā kṛṇotu tat || śivā nārīyam astam āgann imaṃ dhātā lokam asyai viveda | tām aryamā bhago aśvinobhā prajāpatiḥ prajayā vardhayantu || ātmanvaty urvarā narīyam āgan tasyāṃ naro vapata bījam asyām | sā vaḥ prajāṃ janayād vakṣaṇābhyo bibhratī dudhram ṛṣabhasya retaḥ || prati tiṣṭha virāḍ iva viṣṇur iveha sarasvati | dūrvevendra pra jāyatāṃ bhagasya sumatāv asat || ud vām ūrmiḥ śamye hantv āpo yoktrāṇi muñcantu | māduṣkṛtau vyenasā- -aghnyau śūnam āratām || aghoracakṣur apatighnī syonā śagmā suśevā suyamā gṛheṣu | prajāvatī vīrasūr devṛkāmā- -imam agniṃ gārhapatyaṃ sarpaya || Bhatt. saparya adevṛghny apatighnīhaidhi syonā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥ suvīrā | vīrasūr devṛkāmā syonā saṃ tvaidhiṣīmahi sumanasyamānā || ut tiṣṭhātaḥ kim icchantīdam āgā ahaṃ tveḍe abhibhūḥ svād gṛhāt | śūnyaiśī nirṛte yājagantha- -uttiṣṭhārāte pra pata māti raṃsthāḥ ||
yadā gārhapatyam asaparyait pūrvam agniṃ vadhūr iyam | adhā sarasvatyai nāri pitṛbhyaś ca namas kuru || carma varmaitad ā hara- -asyai nāryā upastire | sinīvāli pra jāyatāṃ bhagasya sumatāv asat || upa stṛṇīhi balbajam adhi carmaṇi rohite | tatropaviśya suprajā imam agniṃ saparyatu || yaṃ balbajaṃ nyasyatha carma copastṛṇīthana | tad ā rohatu suprajā yā kanyā vindate patim || ā roha carmopa sīdāgnim eṣa devo hanti rakṣāṃsi sarvā | sumaṅgaly upa sīdemam agniṃ saṃpatnī prati bhūṣeha devān || pra jāyantāṃ mātur asyā upasthān nānārūpāḥ paśavo jāyamānāḥ | iha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai sujyaiṣṭhyo bhavatu te putra eṣaḥ || sumaṅgalī prataraṇī gṛhāṇāṃ suśeva patye śvaśurāya śambhūḥ | syonā śvaśruvai pra gṛhān viśemān Bhatt. viśemāṃ prajāvatī jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ || sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhūr imāṃ sameta paśyata | saubhāgyam asyai dattvā Bhatt. datvā daurbhāgyena paretana || yā durhārdo yuvatayo yāś ceha jaratīr api | varco hy asyai saṃ dattā- -athāstaṃ vi paretana || rukmaprastaraṇaṃ vahyaṃ viśvā rūpāṇi bibhratam | ārohat sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam ||
ā roha talpaṃ sumanasyamānā- -iha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai | indrāṇīva subudhā budhyamānā jyotirugrā uṣasaḥ prati jāgaraḥ || devā agre ny apadyanta patnīṃ sam aspṛśanta tanvas tanūbhiḥ | sūryeva nāri viśvarūpā mahitvā prajāvatī patye śaṃ bhavāsi || ud īrṣvātaḥ pativatnī hy eṣā viśvāvasuṃ namasā gīrbhir īḍe | jāmim iccha pitṛṣadaṃ nyaktāṃ sa te bhāgo januṣā tasya viddhi || yā apsarasaḥ sadhamādaṃ madanty antarā havirdhānaṃ sūryaṃ ca | tās te janitram abhi tāḥ parehi namas te gandharva rtunā kṛṇomi || namo ghandharvasya manase namo bhāmāya cakṣuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ | viśvāvaso namo brahmaṇā te kṛṇomy abhi jāyā apsarasaḥ parehi || rāyā vayaṃ sumanasaḥ syāma- -ud ito gandharvam āvīvṛtāma | agan sa devaḥ paramaṃ sadhastham Bhatt. agaṃ sa aganma vayaṃ pratiranta āyuḥ || saṃ pitarāv ṛtviye sṛjethāṃ pitā mātā ca retaso bhavāthaḥ | maryo yoṣām adhi rohayaitāṃ prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha modamānau || ā vāṃ prajāṃ janayatu prajāpatir ahorātrābhyāṃ sam anaktv aryamā | adurmaṅgalī patilokam ā viśemaṃ śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade || tāṃ pūṣañ chivatamām erayasva yasyāṃ bījaṃ manuṣyā vapanti | yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāti yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepaḥ || ā rohorum upa dhatsva hastaṃ pari ṣvajasva jāyāṃ sumanasyamānaḥ | prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha puṣyataṃ rayiṃ dīrghaṃ vām āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu ||
yaṃ no dadur brahmabhāgaṃ vadhūyor vāso vadhvaś ca vastram | yuvaṃ brahmaṇe 'numanyamānau bṛhaspate sākam indraś ca dattam || devair dattaṃ vanunā sākam etad vādhūyaṃ vadhvo vāso asyāḥ | yo brahmaṇe cikituṣe dadāti sa id rakṣāṃsi talpyāni hanti || syonād yoner adhi budhyamānau hasāmudau mahasā modamānau | sugū suputrau sugṛhau tarātho jīvā uṣaso vibhātīḥ || Bhatt. vibhātī(ḥ) navaṃ vasānaḥ surabhiḥ suvāsā udāgāṃ jīva uṣaso vibhātīḥ | Bhatt. vibhātī(ḥ) āṇḍāt patatrīvāmukṣi viśvasmād enasas pari || śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumne mahivrate | āpaḥ sapta sravantīs tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ || Bhatt. ahasaḥ sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca | ye bhūtasya pracetasas tebhyo 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ || ya ṛte cid abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ | saṃdhātā saṃdhiṃ maghavā purūvasur niṣkartā vihṛtaṃ punaḥ || Bhatt. purūvasuni(⟨ rni)ṣkartā apāsmat tama ucchatu Bhatt. apāsma(t) nīlaṃ piśaṅgam uta lohitaṃ yat | nirdahanīṃ pṛṣātakīm asmin tāṃ sthāṇāv adhy ā sṛjāmi || yāvatīḥ kṛtyā upavāsane yāvanto rājño varuṇasya pāśāḥ | Bhatt. pāśāt vyṛddhayo yā asamṛddhayaś ca- -asmin tā sthāṇau prati muñcāmi sarvāḥ || ye antā yāvatīḥ sica otavo ye ca tantavaḥ | vāso yat patnībhir utaṃ tan mā syonam upa spṛṣāt ||
