saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣann agne viśvāny arya ā | iḍas pade sam idhyase sa no vasūny ā bhara || saṃ jānīdhvaṃ saṃ pṛcyadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām | devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve saṃjānānā upāsate || samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānaṃ cittaṃ saha vo manāṃsi | samānena vo haviṣā juhomi yathā saṃmanaso 'satha || ut sūryo diva eti puro viśvāni yo 'ruhat | Bhatt. joruvat ādityaḥ parvatāṅ ati Bhatt. parvatāṃ viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā || āyurvidaṃ vipaścitaṃ śrutāṃ kaṇvasya vīrudham | āhārṣaṃ viśvabheṣajīm asyādṛṣṭān ni śamaya || ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata | ni ketavo janānāṃ ny adṛṣṭā alipsata || himavataḥ pra sravatha tāḥ sindhum upa gacchatha | āpo gha mahyaṃ tad devīr dadan hṛddyotabheṣajam || Bhatt. dadaṃ yad akṣībhyām ādidyota pārṣṇibhyāṃ hṛdayena ca | āpas tat sarvaṃ niṣ karan Bhatt. karaṃ tvaṣṭā riṣṭam ivānasaḥ || sindhurājñīḥ sindhupatnīḥ sarvā yā nadya sthana | dattā nas tasya bheṣajaṃ tena vo bhunajāmahai || punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manavo dhiyā | punantu viśvā bhūtāni pavamānaḥ punātu mā || punātu mā pavamānaḥ kratve dakṣāya jīvase | jyok ca sūryāya dṛśe || ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca | asmān punīhi cakṣase || īrṣyāyā dhrājiṃ prathamām adhamām uttamām uta | manyuṃ hṛdayyaṃ śokaṃ taṃ te nir mantrayāmahe || etad yat te hṛdi śritaṃ manaskaṃ patayiṣṇukam | tatas ta īrṣyāṃ muñcāmi nir ūṣmāṇaṃ dṛter iva || yathā bhūmir mṛtamanā mṛtān mṛtamanastarā | yathota mamruṣo mana Bhatt. yathottamaṃmṛto everṣyor mṛtaṃ manaḥ ||
dyauś ca mā pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukro bṛhan dakṣiṇā mā pipartu | anu svadhā cikitāṃ somo agnir vāyur mā yātu savitā bhagaś ca || punar manaḥ punar āyur na āgan punaś cakṣuḥ punar ākūtir āgan | vaiśvānaro no adabdhas tanūpā antas tiṣṭhāti duritād avadyāt || saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena | tvaṣṭā sudatro varivaḥ kṛṇotv anūnas tāṣṭu tanvo viriṣṭam || Bhatt. anu nas idaṃ tad yuja uttaraṃ yenendraṃ śumbhāmy aṣṭaye | asya kṣatraṃ śriyaṃ mahīṃ vṛṣṭir iva vardhayā tṛṇam || asya kṣatram agnīṣomāv asya vardhayataṃ rayim | atho rāṣṭrasyābhīvarge kṛṇutaṃ yuja uttaram || sabandhuś cāsabandhuś ca yo jāto yaś ca niṣṭiyaḥ | Bhatt. niṣṭyaḥ yajamānāya sunvate sarvaṃ taṃ rīradhāsi naḥ || yaśo bṛhad vardhatām indrajūtaṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭi sukṛtaṃ sahasvat | prasarsrāṇam anu dīrghāya jīvase haviṣmantaṃ vardhaya sarvatātaye || yaśā indro yaśā agnir yaśāḥ somo ajāyata | yaśā viśvasya bhūtasya- -aham asmi yaśastamaḥ || vayaṃ te agne yaśaso yaśobhir yaśasvino haviṣainā vidhema | sa no dhehi rāṣṭram indrajūtaṃ tava trātre adhivāke syāma || ava jyām iva dhanvano manyuṃ tanomi te hṛdaḥ | adhā saṃmanasau bhūtvā sakhikeva sacāvahai || vi te manyuṃ nayāmasi sakhikeva sacāvahai | adhas te aśmanā manyuṃ guruṇābhi ni dadhmasi || abhi tiṣṭhāmi te manyuṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām | parā te daṇḍyaṃ vadhaṃ parā manyuṃ suvāmi te || hiraṇyayaḥ panthā āsīd aritrāṇi hiraṇyayā | nāvo hiraṇyayīr āsan Bhatt. hiraṇyyīr* yābhiḥ kuṣṭhaṃ nirāvaham || Bhatt. nirāvahan* suparṇasuvane girau jātaṃ himavatas pari | dhanair abhi śrutaṃ yanti kuṣṭhehi takmanāśanaḥ || Bhatt. kuṣṭho hi yo giriṣu jāyase vīrudhāṃ balavattamaḥ | kuṣṭhehi takmanāśana takmānaṃ nāśayann itaḥ ||
anuvāka 2 ||
idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya kṛṇutā bṛhan namaḥ | teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma || ye vaḥ panthā bahavo devayānā anu dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcarantī | Bhatt. saṃcaranti teṣām ajyāniṃ yatamo na āvahāt tasmai no devāḥ pari dhatta sarve || Bhatt. dhatteha+ sarve śarad dhemantaḥ śiśiro vasanto grīṣmo varṣāḥ suvite no dadhāta | Bhatt. varṣāḥ svite+ ā no goṣu bhajatauṣadhīṣu nivāta id vaḥ śaraṇe syāma || vaiśvānaro na ūtaya ā pra yātu parāvataḥ | agnir ukthair no aṃhasaḥ || vaiśvānaro na ā gamad imaṃ yajñaṃ sajūr upa- | Bhatt. sajūḥ+ | -imāṃ suṣṭutiṃ mama || vaiśvānaro no aṅgirobhi stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca cākl̥pat | aiṣu dyumnaṃ svar yamat || ajaiṣaṃ tvā saṃlikhitam ajaiṣam uta saṃrudham | aviṃ vṛko yathā mathad evā mathnāmi te kṛtam || yathā vṛkṣam aśanir viśvahā hanty aprati | evāham amuṃ kitavam akṣair vadhyāsam aprati || turāṇām aturāṇāṃ viśāṃ devayatīnām | sam aitu viśvato bhago antarhastaṃ kṛtaṃ mama || yāvad dyaur yāvat pṛthivī yāvad ābhāti sūryaḥ | tāvat sṛjāmi te viṣaṃ yāvad arṣanti sindhavaḥ || ucchvasanta ud īrate gāva āvasathād iva | ahīnāṃ paśyatā viṣam apavaktā na vidyate || ā jaghāna pṛṣaddhanuḥ saṅgathe dhamanīnām | mūrdhānaṃ viṣam āskadya- -aṅgāni vy asisrasat || mā no devā ahir vadhīt santokān sahapūruṣān | saṃyataṃ na vi ṣparad Bhatt. sparad vyāttaṃ na saṃ yamat || saṃ te dadhāmi dadbhir dataḥ saṃ te hanvā hanū | saṃ te jihvayā jihvāṃ saṃ ta āsnāha āsyam || namo 'haye asitāya namas tiraścirājaye | svajāya babhrave namo namo devajanebhyaḥ ||
manase cetase dhiya ākūtaya uta cittaye | matyai śrutāya cakṣase vidhema haviṣā vayam || prāṇāyāpānāya vyānāya bhūriretase | sarasvatyā uruvyace vidhema haviṣā vayam || mā no hāsiṣur ṛṣayo daivyāsas tanūpāvānaḥ śucayas tapojāḥ | amartyā martyām̐ abhi naḥ sacadhvam āyur naḥ prataraṃ jīvase dhuḥ || idam id vā u bheṣajam idaṃ rudrasya bheṣajam | yeneṣum ekatejanāṃ śataśalyām apabruvan || jālāṣenābhi ṣiñcata jālāṣenopa siñcata | jālāṣaṃ bhadraṃ bheṣajaṃ tasya no dhatta jīvase || śaṃ ca no mayaś ca no mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat | kṣamā rapo viśvaṃ no astu bheṣajam || yaśasaṃ mendro maghavān kṛṇotu yaśasaṃ somo varuṇo vāyur agniḥ | yaśasaṃ mā devaḥ savitā kṛṇotu priyo dātur dakṣiṇāyāḥ syām aham || yathendro dyāvāpṛthivyor yaśasvān yathāpa oṣadhīṣu | yathā viśveṣu deveṣv evā deveṣu yaśasaḥ syāma || accha vayam indraṃ yaśasaṃ yaśobhir yaśasvino haviṣainā vidhema | sa no dadhad rāṣṭram indrajūtaṃ tasya trātre adhivāke syāma || eha yātu varuṇaḥ somo agnir bṛhaspatir vasubhir eha yātu | asya śriyam abhisaṃyāta sarva ugrasya cettuḥ saṃmanasaḥ sajātāḥ || Bhatt. cetasaḥ eha yāta māpa yātādhy asmat pūṣā vaḥ parastād apathaṃ kṛṇotu | vāstoṣpatir anu vo 'yam ahvan Bhatt. voyam mayi sajātā ramatir vo astu || yo vaḥ śuṣmo hṛdayeṣv antar yā ākūtir manasi praviṣṭā | Bhatt. yākūtir tāñ chrevayāmi haviṣā ghṛtena Bhatt. tāṃ mayi sajātā ramatir vo astu || mama cittaṃ prayavasanyutetve- Bhatt. prayavamanvitehe -indrāgnyor iva havam eta sarve | bṛhaspatir vo ni yunaktu mahyaṃ mama vācam ekacittāḥ sacadhvam || ahaṃ gṛhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam upa cittebhir eta | mama vaśe hṛdayaṃ vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmāna eta || māṃ vaś cakṣur gacchatu māṃ prāṇo dhātā padam anu vartma vaḥ kṛṇotu | ye vo mahānta uta ye kumārā mama yātam anu yātebhir eta || Bhatt. anuyātebhir
aśvattho devasadana ity ajāyatānte || PS 7.10.6 is repeated devebhyo adhi jāto 'si somasya sakhā hitaḥ | sa prāṇāyāpānāya cakṣuse 'sya mṛḍa || ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣa id Bhatt. bedhiṣe yad abhihito mṛtyubhir ye sahasram | yamo mahyaṃ punar it tvāṃ dadātu Bhatt. dadāti tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema || yat te devī nirṛtir ābabandha dāma grīvāsv avicṛtyam | tat te vi ṣyāmy āyuṣe balāya- -anamīvaṃ pitum addhi prasūtaḥ || namo 'stu te nirṛte viśvavāre Bhatt. namastu ayasmayaṃ vi cṛtā bandham etam | K ayasmayān pra mumugdhi pāśān yamena tvaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāna- -uttame nāke adhi rohayemam || antardāvāya juhutā sv etad yātudhānakṣayaṇaṃ ghṛtena | ārād rakṣāṃsi prati dahāgne māsmākaṃ tanvam upa tītapanta || śarvo vo grīvā aśarīt piśācāḥ pṛṣṭīr vo 'pi śṛṇātv agniḥ | vīrud vo viśvadhāvīryā mṛtyunā sam ajīgamat || apiśācaṃ no adharād apiśācaṃ na uttarāt | indrāpiśācaṃ naḥ paścād apiśācaṃ puras kṛdhi || indraś cakāra prathamo nairhastam asurebhyaḥ | vṛścāmaḥ śatrūṇāṃ bāhū anena haviṣā vayam || nirhastaḥ śatrur abhidāsan no astu ye senābhir yudham āyanty asmān | sam arpayendra mahatā vadhena drātv eṣām aghahāro vividdhaḥ || ava manyur avāyatā- Bhatt. avāyatā ava -ava bāhū manoyujā | parāśara tvaṃ teṣāṃ parāñcaṃ śuṣmam ardayārvācīṃ rayim ā kṛdhi || ātanvānā āyacchanto 'syanto ye ca dhāvatha | nirhastāḥ śatrava sthana- Bhatt. stendro -indro vo 'dya parāśarīt || nirhastāḥ santu śatravo 'ṅgaiṣāṃ mlāpayāmasi | yathaiṣām indra vedāṃsi yūtheṣu vi bhajāmahai || nirhastebhyo nairhastaṃ yaṃ devāḥ śarum asyatha | jayantu satvāno mama sthireṇendreṇa medinā ||
śamīm aśvattha ārūḍhas tatra puṃsavanaṃ kṛtam | tad eva tasya bheṣajaṃ yat strīṣv ā haranti tat || Bhatt. ya(ḥ) … tam puṃsi vai reto bhavati tat striyām anu ṣicyate | tad vai putrasya vedanaṃ tat prajāpatir abravīt || prajāpatir anv amaṃsta sinīvāly acīkl̥pat | straiṣūyam anyatra dadhat pumāṃsam u dadhad iha || Bhatt. uta dadhad yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr ity ekā PS 11.7.5 is repeated muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta | atho yamasya paḍbīśād viśvasmād devaduṣkṛtāt || yac cakṣuṣā yan manasā yac ca vācopārima yaj jāgrato yat svapantaḥ | somo mā tasmād enasaḥ svadhayā punātu vidvān || abhibhūr yajño abhibhūr agnir astv abhibhūḥ somo abhibhūr indro astu | abhy ayaṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā yathāsad evā vidhemāgnihotrā idaṃ haviḥ || svadhāstu mitrāvaruṇā prajāvat kṣatraṃ madhveha pinvatam | bādhethāṃ dveṣo nirṛtiṃ parācair asmai kṣatraṃ varca ā dhattam ojaḥ || imaṃ vīram ity ekā || PS 7.4.6 is repeated agner iva prasitir asya śuṣmiṇa uteva matto vilapann apāyati | tasmai te aruṇāya babhrave tapurmaghāya namo 'stu takmane || namo yamāya namo 'stu mṛtyave namo rājñe varuṇāya tviṣīmate | namaḥ kṣetrasya pataye namo dive namaḥ pṛthivyai nama oṣadhībhyaḥ || ayaṃ yo janān haritān kṛṇoty ucchocayann agninevābhidunvan | adhā hi takmann araso hi bhūyā athā nyaṅ adharaṅ vā parehi || Bhatt. athānvaṅ indro jayāti na parā jayātā adhirājo rājasu rājayātai | carkṛtya īḍyaḥ śaṃsyaś ca- Bhatt. saṃsya(⟨ śaṃsya)ś -upasadyo namasyo bhaveha || tvam indrādhirājaḥ śravasyus tvaṃ bhavābhibhūtir janānām | tvaṃ daivīr viśa imā vi rāja- -āyuṣmat kṣatram ajaraṃ te astu || prācyāṃ diśi tvam indrādhirājā- Bhatt. indrādhi rājodīcyāṃ -odīcyāṃ diśi vṛtrahan dasyuhāsi | yatra yanti śrotyās taj jitaṃ te dakṣiṇato vṛṣabho 'si havyaḥ ||
anuvāka 3 ||
abhi tvendro varimataḥ purā tvāṃhūraṇebhyaḥ | hvayāmy ugraṃ cettaraṃ puruṇāmānam ekajam || yo adya senyo vadho jighāṃsan na udīrate | indrasya tatra bāhū samantaṃ pari dadhmahe || pari dadhma indrasya bāhū samantaṃ trātus trāyatāṃ naḥ | deva savitaḥ soma rājan sumanasaṃ mā kṛṇutaṃ svastaye || devā aduḥ sūryo adād dyaur adāt pṛthivy adāt | sarvāḥ sarasvatīr aduḥ sacittā viṣadūṣaṇam || yad vo devā upajīkā āsiñcan dhanvany udakam | tena devaprasūtā idaṃ dūṣayatā viṣam || asurāṇām asi duhitā devānām asi svasā | divas pṛthivyā jajñiṣe sā cakarthārasaṃ viṣam || asthisraṃsaṃ parusraṃsam āsthitaṃ hṛdayāmayam | balāsaṃ sarvaṃ niṣ kṛdhy aṅgeṣṭhā yaś ca parvasu || nir balāsaṃ balāsinaḥ kṣiṇomi puṣkaraṃ yathā | chinadmy asya bandhanaṃ mūlam urvārvo yathā || nir balāsetaḥ pra pata suparṇo vasater iva | adheṭa iva hāyano 'pa drāhy avīrahā || ā vṛṣāyasva śvasihi vardhasva prathayasva ca | yathāṅgaṃ vardhatāṃ te śepas tena yoṣitam uj jahi || yenā kṛśaṃ medayanti yena hinvanty āturam | tenāsya brahmaṇaspate dhanur ivā tānayā pasaḥ || āhaṃ tanomi te paso adhi jyām iva dhanvani | kramasva riśya iva rohitam anavaglāyatā tvam || devāḥ kapota iṣito yad icchan dūto nirṛtyā idam ājagāma | Bhatt. stuto tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipade catuṣpade || śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astv anāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛhe naḥ | agnir hi vipro juṣatāṃ havir naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī no vṛṇaktu || hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāty asmān āṣṭrī padaṃ kṛṇute agnidhāne | śaṃ no gobhya uta puruṣebhyo mā no devā iha hiṃsīt kapotaḥ || iṣaṃ madantaḥ pari gāṃ nayāmaḥ saṃyopayanto duritā padāni | ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodaṃ hitvā na ūrjaṃ pra patāt patiṣṭhaḥ || nude tvā pra ṇude tvā kapota rakṣasā saha | yato na punar āyasi tatra tvā gamayāmasi || Bhatt. gamamayāmasi (misprint)
yathāyaṃ vāho aśvinā samaiti saṃ ca vartate | evā mām abhi te manaḥ samaitu saṃ ca vartatām || ahaṃ khidāmi te mano rājāśvaḥ pṛṣṭyām iva | reṣmacchinnaṃ yathā tṛṇaṃ mayi te veṣṭatāṃ manaḥ || āñjanasya madhughasya kuṣṭhasya naladasya ca | turo bhagasya hastābhyām anurodhanam ā bhare || ayam ā yāty aryamā purastād viṣitastukaḥ | Bhatt. viṣatastukaḥ sa icchād agruvai patim atho jāyām ajānaye || aśramad iyam aryamann anyāsāṃ samanaṃ yatī | aṅgo nv asyā aryamann anyā samanam āyati || Bhatt. anyāḥ dhātā dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dhātā dyām uta sūryam | dhātāsyā agruvai patiṃ dadhātu pratikāmyam || mahyam āpo madhumad erayanta mahyaṃ sūryo abharaj jyotiṣā kam | mahyaṃ devā uta viśve tapojā mahyaṃ devaḥ savitā vyaco dhāt || ahaṃ dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām ahaṃ sindhūn ajanaṃ sapta sākam | ahaṃ satyam anṛtaṃ yad vadāmy ahaṃ vācaṃ pari sarvām iṣiṃ ca || ahaṃ vivyajmi pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūn asṛje sapta sākam | ahaṃ vācaṃ pari sarvāṃ babhūva yo agnīṣomāv ajuṣe sakhāyau || anaḍudbhyo naḥ prathamaṃ dhenubhyas tvam arundhati | adhenave vayase śarma yaccha catuṣpade || śarma yacchāty oṣadhiḥ saha devair arundhatī | karat payasvantaṃ goṣṭham ayakṣmām̐ uta pūruṣān || Bhatt. pūruṣāṃ (⟨ ṣān) viśvarūpāṃ subhagām acchā vadāmi jīvalām | sā no rudrasyāstāṃ hetiṃ dūraṃ nayatu gobhyaḥ || yamo mṛtyur aghamāro nirṛtho bhavaḥ śarvo astā nīlaśikhaṇḍī | Bhatt. 'stā śikhaṇḍī devajanāḥ senām uttasthivāṃsas te asmākaṃ pari vṛñjantu vīrān || manasā homair harasā ghṛtena śarvāyāstra uta rājñe bhavāya | namasyebhyo nama ebhyaḥ kṛṇomy anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā nayantu || trāyadhvaṃ no aghaviṣābhyo vadhād agnīṣomā marutaḥ pūtadakṣāḥ | viśve devā maruto vaiśvadevā vātāparjanyayoḥ sumatau syāma ||
saṃ jānatāṃ manasā saṃ cikitvā Bhatt. cikittā (⟨ tvā) mā yutsata manyunā daivyena | mā ghoṣa utthād bahule vinirhate meṣuḥ paptad indrasyāhany āgate || saṃ vo manāṃsi saṃ vratā sam ākūtīr nayāmasi | ime ye vivratā stha tān vaḥ saṃ jñapayāmasi || saṃjñapanaṃ vo manaso atho saṃ jñapanaṃ hṛdaḥ | atho bhagasya yac chrāntaṃ tena saṃ jñapayāti vaḥ || saṃ vaḥ pṛcyantāṃ tanvaḥ saṃ manāṃsi sam u tvacaḥ | saṃ vo brahmaṇaspatiḥ somaḥ saṃ jñapayāti vaḥ || saṃjñānaṃ naḥ svebhyaḥ saṃjñānam araṇebhyaḥ | saṃjñānam aśvinā yuvam ihāsmāsu ni yacchatam || yathādityā vasavaḥ saṃbabhūvur marudbhir ugrā ahṛṇīyamānāḥ | evā triṇāmann ahṛṇīyamāna imaṃ janaṃ saṃmanasaṃ kṛṇu tvam || nir amun nuda okasaḥ sapatno yaḥ pṛtanyati | nirbādhyena haviṣā- -indra enaṃ parāśarīt || ihi tisraḥ parāvata ihi pañca janām̐ ati | ihi saptāti rocanā yāvat sūryo asad divi || paramāṃ tvā parāvatam indro devo ajīgamat | yathā na punar āyasi śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ || pratīcīnaphalo hi tvam apāmārga babhūvitha | sarvān mac chapathām̐ adhi varīyo yāvayā tvam || Bhatt. varoyo (misprint?) yac ca bhrātṛvyaḥ śapati yac ca jāmiḥ śapāti naḥ | brahmā yan manyutaḥ śapāt sarvaṃ tan no adhaspadam || aghadviṣṭā devajūtā vīruc chapathayāvanī | udnā malam ivāvānaik sarvān mac chapathām̐ adhi || yad enaṃ pariṣīdanti samādadhati cakṣase | saṃpreddho agnir jihvābhir ud eti hṛdayād adhi || agneḥ sāntapanasyāham āyuṣe padam ā rabhe | addhātir yasya paśyati dhūmam udyantam āsyataḥ || yo asya samidhaṃ veda kṣatriyeṇa samāhitām | nābhihvāre padaṃ ni dadhāti sa mṛtyave || nainaṃ ghnanti paryāyiṇo na sannām̐ ava gacchati | agner yaḥ kṣatriyo vidvān nāma gṛhṇāty āyuṣe ||
asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat | tiṣṭhanti parvatā ime sthāmann aśvā araṃsata || ya udānaḍ vyāyane ya udānaṭ parāyaṇe | āvartanaṃ nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve || āvṛto nyāvṛto 'bhyavartanam āyanam | agneś catasra āvṛtas tābhiṣ ṭvā tarpayāmasi || jātavedo ni vartaya śataṃ te santv āvṛtaḥ sahasraṃ ta upāvṛtaḥ | tābhir enaṃ ni vartaya || adārasṛd bhavatu deva soma- -asmin yajñe maruto mṛḍatā naḥ | mā no vidad abhibhā mo aśastir mā naḥ prāpad ducchunā dveṣyā yā || Bhatt. prāpat ducch- yo adya daivyo vadho jighāṃsan na upāyati | yuvaṃ taṃ mitrāvaruṇav asmad yāvayataṃ pari || itaś cāmutaś cāghaṃ varuṇa yāvaya | vi mahac charma yaccha varīyo yāvayā vadham || apendra prāco maghavann amitrān apāpāco abhibhūte nudasva | apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarman madema || tena bhūtasya haviṣā punar ā pyāyatām ayam | jāyāṃ yām asmā avidaṃ sā rasenābhi vardhatām || abhi vardhatāṃ prajayā- -abhi rāṣṭreṇa vardhatām | īṣā sahasravīryāv imau stām anupakṣitau || tvaṣṭā jāyām ajanayat tvaṣṭāsyai tvāṃ patiṃ dadhau | tvaṣṭā sahasram āyūṃṣi dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu vām || Bhatt. mā || antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā bhūtāvacākaśat | śuno divyasyaitan mahas tasmā etena haviṣā juhomi || apsu te janma divi te sadhasthaṃ samudra ātmā mahimā te pṛthivyām | śuno divyasyaitan mahas tasmā etena haviṣā juhomi || ye trayaḥ kālakāñjā divi devā iva śritāḥ | tān sarvān ahva ūtaye 'smā ariṣṭatātaye || yaḥ puruṣaṃ hūrcchayasi śvā divyo avīrahā | taṃ tvāhaṃ brahmaṇā nude puruṣaṃ mā parā vadhīḥ || yaḥ piśaṅgo ayodaṃṣṭraḥ śvā divyaḥ pariplavaḥ | tasyāhaṃ nāma jagrabha- -asmā ariṣṭatātaye ayaṃ no jīvatād iti || ayaṃ no nabhasas patiḥ saṃsphāno abhi rakṣatu | asamātiṃ gṛheṣu naḥ || tvaṃ no nabhasas patir ūrjaṃ gṛheṣu dhāraya | ā puṣṭam etv ā vasu || deva saṃsphāna sahasrāpoṣasyeśiṣe | tasya no dhehi tasya te bhakṣīmahi tasya te bhaktivāṃso bhūyāsma svāhā ||
anuvāka 4 ||
yantāsi yacchase hastam apa rakṣāṃsi sedhasi | prajāṃ dhanaṃ ca gṛhṇānaḥ parihasto abhūd ayam || parihasta vi dhāraya yoniṃ garbhāya kartave | maryāde putram ā dhehi taṃ tvam ā gamayāgama || yaṃ parihastam abibhar aditiḥ putrakāmyā | tvaṣṭā tam asyā ā badhnād yathā putraṃ suvād iti || āgacchata āgatasya nāma gṛhṇāmy āyataḥ | indrasya vṛtraghno rājño vāsavasya śatakratoḥ || yena sūryāṃ sāvitrīm aśvinohatuḥ pathā | tena sam abravīd bhago jāyām ā vahatād iti || yas te aṅkuśo vasudāno bṛhann indra hiraṇyayaḥ | tenā janīyate jāyāṃ tvaṃ dhehi śatakrato || tvaṃ no medhe prathamā gobhir aśvebhir ā gahi | tvaṃ sūryasya raśmiṣu tvaṃ no asi yajñiyā || medhām ahaṃ prathamāṃ brahmaṇvatīm ṛṣiṣṭutām | prapītāṃ brahmacāribhir | devānām avasā vṛṇe || medhāṃ sāyaṃ medhāṃ prātar medhāṃ madhyandinaṃ pari | medhāṃ sūryeṇodyatā- -udīrāṇā u tuṣṭuma || ?; Bhatt. tastamaḥ (⟨ bhuḥ?) pārthivasya rase devā bhagasya tanvo bale | āyur asmai somo varca ā dhād bṛhaspatiḥ || āyur asmai dhehi jātavedaḥ prajāṃ tvaṣṭar adhinidhehy ojaḥ | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ā suvāsmai śataṃ jīvāti śaradas tavāyam || āśīr ṇa ūrjam uta suprajāstvaṃ dakṣaṃ dadhātu draviṇaṃ suvarcasam | saṃjayan kṣetrāṇi sahasāham indra kṛṇvāno anyān adharān sapatnān || āyam agan savitā kṣureṇa- -uṣṇena vāya udakenehi | ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sacetasaḥ somasya rājño 'vapan pracetasaḥ || Bhatt. (a)vapan yenāvapat savitā kṣureṇa somasya rājño varuṇasya vidvān | tena brahmāṇo vapatedam asya- -asrāmo dīrghāyur ayam astu vīraḥ || Bhatt. -āśrā(⟨ srā)mo aditiḥ śmaśru vapatv āpa undantu varcasā | dhārayatu prajāpatiḥ punaḥpunaḥ suvaptave ||
yās te hirā dhamanayo 'ṅgāny anu viṣṭhitāḥ | tāsāṃ te sarvāsāṃ sākaṃ nir viṣāṇi hvayāmasi || yāṃ te rudra iṣum āsthad Bhatt. āsta(⟨ stha)d aṅgebhyo hṛdayāya ca | imāṃ tām adya te vayaṃ viṣūcīṃ vi vṛhāmasi || namas te rudrāsyate namaḥ pratihitābhyaḥ | namo visṛjyamānābhyo namas ta āyatābhyaḥ || avācīḥ pari mūrdhno yās te dhamanayaḥ śatam | tās te pra bhidyantāṃ pṛthag anu tyaṃ lohitāvaṭam || syandantāṃ rodanāvatīr anu tyaṃ lohitāvaṭam | yathāsyām antar na raṃsantām Bhatt. raṃsantā anukūlam ivodakam || Bhatt. anukūla(m) pratīcīnaḥ sūrya etu pratīcīḥ sravataḥ kṛtāḥ | avācīs te asnaḥ kulyā iyaṃ tṛṇattv oṣadhīḥ || imaṃ yavam aṣṭāyogaiḥ ṣaḍyogebhir acarkṛṣuḥ | sa ghā te tanvo rapaḥ pratīcīnam apa vyayat || nyag vāto vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ | nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyag bhavatu te rapaḥ || āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ | āpaḥ samudrārthā yatīḥ parā vahantu te rapaḥ || amī ye yudham āyanti ketūn kṛtvānīkaśaḥ | indras tān pary ahār dāmnā tān agne sandyā tvam || yāvatīḥ sica āyanty anīkāni yati ṣṭan | indras tān pary ahār dāmnā tān agne sandyā tvam || saṃ paramān sam avamān Bhatt. paramāṃ atho sandyāni madhyamān | indras tān pary ahār dāmnā tān agne sandyā tvam || sandānaṃ vo bṛhaspatiḥ sandānaṃ savitā karat | sandānam indraś cāgniś ca sandānaṃ bhago aśvinā || yās te ruco deva sūrya- -udyato divy ātatāḥ | tābhir mām adya sarvābhir manuṣyebhyo ruce kṛṇu || ruce mā dhehi brahmasu ruce rājasu dhehi mā | ruce viśyeṣu śūdreṣu mayi dhehi ruce rucim || yā ruco hiraṇye yā agnau yāś ca sūrye | indrāgnī mayi tā ruco ruco dhehi bṛhaspate ||
ava mā pāpman sṛja vaśī san mṛḍayāsi naḥ | ā mā bhadreṣu dhāmasu tvaṃ dhehy avihrutam || yo mā pāpman na jahāsi tam u tvā jahimo vayam | anyatrāsman ny ucya sahasrākṣāmartya || pathor vayaṃ vyāvartane niṣpāpmānaṃ suvāmasi | yo no dveṣṭi taṃ gaccha yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ jahi || śava ivāsi saṃnaddho na bhogam avidaṃ tvayi | śiro bhinadmi te pāpman yathā na punar āyasi || indro asmān divā pātu mṛtyoḥ pāśāt svastaye | dyaur no madhyataḥ pātu bhūmī rājñī svastaye || sūryo asmān divā pātu mṛtyoḥ pāśāt svastaye | vāto no madhyataḥ pātv ahorātrī svastaye || Bhatt. ahārātrī somo asmān divā pātu mṛtyoḥ pāśāt svastaye | āpo no madhyataḥ pāntu mā no nirṛtir īśata || saṃ vāṃ cakṣuḥ saṃ hṛdayaṃ Bhatt. cakṣuṃ manasāvīvanaṃ manaḥ | asyāḥ sarūpavatsāyā ghṛte homena sarpiṣā || yat kakṣīvān saṃvananaṃ Bhatt. kakṣīvāṃ putro aṅgirasām avet | tena vām adya devāḥ saṃ priyā sam avīvanan || saṃvananaṃ vāṃ manaso atho saṃvananaṃ hṛdaḥ | atho bhagasya yac chrāntaṃ tena saṃ vānayāmi vām || ahaṃ te manasā manaś cakṣur gṛhṇāmi cakṣuṣā | evā pari ṣvajasva mā yathāsan mayi te manaḥ || ā rathasyeva cakre abhi mā vartatām asau | reṣmacchinnaṃ yathā tṛṇaṃ veṣṭāsau manasā mayi || pari tvā yātur asaraṃ pari mātuḥ pari svasuḥ | pari tvānyābhya strībhyo 'nayauṣadhyāsaram || ya indrasya sabhādhāno yasmin samitim āsate | Bhatt. samatam hiraṇyaṃ yasya parṇāni tasmā aśvattha te namaḥ || yaḥ śākhābhir antarikṣam ā pūrayati niṣṭhayā | chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni tasmā aśvattha te namaḥ || yaṃ mṛgo na samāpnoti pakṣābhyāṃ śakuniṣ patan | divaṃ yaḥ sarvāṃ stabhnāti tasmā aśvattha te namaḥ ||
jyeṣṭhaghnyāṃ jāto vicṛtor yamasya māyaṃ hiṃsīḥ pitarau vardhamānaḥ | syonau vyāghrā uta te śivau stām ati neṣaṃ duritāni viśvā || vyāghre ahny ajaniṣṭa vīro nakṣatrajāḥ sarvavīraḥ suvīraḥ | sa mā hiṃsīḥ pitarau vardhamānas tasya te devāḥ prati gṛhṇantu homam || yā rohiṇīr devapatyā pra dhenur iva pinvate | tatra tisro vyaṣṭakāḥ sarvām̐ adhi bruvantu prajāyai jagate ca vām || yad ārdrābhyām araṇibhyāṃ devāḥ śakrā amanthaṃ puruṣeṇa puruṣam | atrāpuṣyataṃ mithunā sayonī jīvāṃ prajāṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ sutejasā || hataṃ pataṅgam uta tardam ākhum aśvinā bhintaṃ śiro mṛṇataṃ hanū dataḥ | yathā naḥ sasyaṃ na ghasaṃ vyadvarā evābhayaṃ kṛṇutaṃ dhānyāya naḥ || tarda hai pataṅga hai jabhya hā upakvasa | anadanta idaṃ dhānyam ahiṃsanto apodita || tardapate vaghāpate tṛṣṭadaṃśmā śṛṇota naḥ | hotrevāprāśitaṃ havir vṛkṇajihvā upādhvam || tarda jabhyāpijihvayā ya imaṃ divyaṃ pīyūṣaṃ prathamas titṛpsāt | taṃ pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marman || ye abhrajā ye vātajā ye divas pari jajñire | marīcyāḥ putrāṇāṃ vayam api nahyāma āsyam || ye arjunā ye haritā ye kṛṣṇā ye ca rohitāḥ | kabandhasya praśāsane śalabhyāñ jambhayāmasi || antarikṣeṇa patata mā sasyam abhi paddhvam | girīṇāṃ sānuṣu sīdata tṛṇaṃ kapālam attana śalabhās tad viśām iva || yathāśvāso yathā dhuraṃ yuktā vahanti sādhuyā | evā mūtra pra bhidyasva vi vaster āsyaṃ sṛja || viṣitaṃ te vastibilaṃ samudrasyodadher iva | pra te bhinadmi mehanaṃ vartraṃ veśantyā iva || yāḥ samudrād uccaranti jaratīr upajihvikāḥ | pramehaṇasya tā vidur ubhayor mehanasya ca || śīrṣṇo valīr āsno valīr aṅgādaṅgān mukhād valīḥ | sarvās tā indrāṇī valīr apa mārṣṭv adhi tvacaḥ || Bhatt. mārṣṭra(ṣṭrya)dhi yās tvaci valayo jātā yā jātās tanvas pari | sarvās tā indrāṇī valīḥ śamīśākhāsv ā sajāt || ā śamīṃ māmakī valī rurohāti jahāti mām | etām indrasya jāyā validhānīm akṛṇvata ||
anuvāka 5 ||
yathā sūryo nakṣatrāṇāṃ varcāṃsi yuvate divaḥ | evā sapatnānām ahaṃ varca indriyam ā dade || yac ca varcaḥ sapatnānāṃ bhrātṛvyeṣu ca yad yaśaḥ | tad indro vṛtrahā dhātā savitā dīdharan mayi || yāś ca gāvaḥ sapatnānāṃ bhrātṛvyeṣu ca yad vasu | tan nir jyeyam iva jītvā Bhatt. ye(⟨ jye?) savitā dīdharan mayi || satyam eva jayatu nānṛtaṃ satyasya panthā ṛjur astu sādhuḥ | satyaṃ vadantaḥ samidhe vidhema satyena dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām || vāgbhāgasya ca satyena rudrasya sumanasyayā | indreṇādhibruvatā vayaṃ viśaṃ prāśi videmahi || yā te rudreṣur āyatā vāci vā te araṃkṛtā | yenedaṃ vivadāmahe tasya prāśaṃ tvaṃ jahi || jahi tvaṃ tasya prāśam uta satyām utānṛtām | yo asmān indra vṛtrahan vācā prāśaṃ jigīṣati || ut pramut prāṇa bahvīha sīdedaṃ pṛṇa | utodiva sma siñcatāt samudrasyeva madhyataḥ || samudraś ca śatadhāraḥ sahasradhāro akṣitaḥ | purastād indra ācarat pūrṇagoṣṭha idaṃ pṛṇa || ihopa pṛṇa saṃ pṛṇa vṛṣa prajananāḥ kṛdhi | iha gāvaḥ pra jāyadhvam ihāśvā iha pūruṣāḥ | iho sahasradakṣiṇo abhi prāśā ni ṣīdatu || jyeṣṭhaghnyai nakṣatrāṇām ahne rātryā idaṃ namaḥ | juhomi viśvakarmaṇe sa śivo mṛḍayāti naḥ || mā jyeṣṭhaṃ vadhīd ayam agna eṣāṃ mūlabarhaṇaṃ pari vṛṇakty enam | grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan pitāputrau mātaraṃ muñca sarvān || un muñca pāśāṃs tvam agna eṣāṃ trayas tribhir utthitā yebhir āsan | māyaṃ hiṃsīḥ pitaraṃ vardhamāno Bhatt. hiṃsīḥ (⟨ sīt) mā mātaraṃ pra minīr yā janitrī || Bhatt. yā (⟨ dyā) grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta ye sinanti yāṃ brahmaṇā parivṛñjanti vedhasaḥ | Bhatt. yāṃ (⟨ yān) un muñca pāśāṃs tvam agna eṣāṃ tvajjātasyānv ahar-ahar astu bhadram || ni vartadhvaṃ mānu gāta- -asmān siṣakta revatīḥ | agnīṣomā punarvasū asya vardhayataṃ rayim || punar enā ni vartaya punar enā upā kuru | indra enā ni yacchatv agnir enā upājatu || pari vo viśvato dadha ūrjā ghṛtena payasā | ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyās te rayyā saṃ sṛjantu mā ||
namo astu sarpebhyo ye ke ca pṛthivīm anu | ye antarikṣe ye divi tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo namaḥ || ye cāmī rocane divo Bhatt. divi ye ca sūryasya raśmiṣu | yeṣām apsu sadas kṛtaṃ tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo namaḥ || yā iṣavo yātudhānānāṃ yā vā vanaspatīnām | Bhatt. om. vā ye 'vaṭeṣu śerate tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo namaḥ || yavocchiṣṭaṃ haviṣā vardhayemaṃ yathā dyumnī kṛṇavad vīryāṇī | sajūr devebhir abhi bhūḥ sapatnān āyuṣmat kṣatram ajaraṃ te astu || puṃsā yavena haviṣā payasvatā- -ucchiṣṭasyāyū rakṣantu devāḥ | devā hy asmin ni dadhur nṛmṇaṃ bṛhad asmā indro vayo dadhātu || sam ucchiṣṭasya haviṣā sam ukthaiḥ sam āyuṣā varcasā payo dadhātu | devā hy asmin ni dadhur nṛmṇaṃ bṛhad asmā indro vayo dadhātu || vāyur enāḥ samākarat tvaṣṭā poṣāya dhriyatām | indra ābhyo adhi bruvad rudro bhūmne cikitsatu || yathā cakrur devāsurā yathā manuṣyā uta | evā sahasrapoṣāya kṛṇutaṃ lakṣmāśvinā || lohitena svadhitinā mithunaṃ karṇayoḥ kṛdhi | akartām aśvinā lakṣma tad astu prajayā bahu || kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti | ā ca vartante sadanād ṛtasya- -ād id ghṛtena pṛthivī vy udyate || payasvatīḥ kṛṇutāpa oṣadhīr imā yad ejathā maruto rukmavakṣasaḥ | ūrjaṃ ca tatra sumatiṃ ca pinvatha yatrā naro marutaḥ siñcathā madhu || udapluto marutas tām̐ iyarta vṛṣṭyā yad viśvā nivatas pṛṇātha | ejāti galhā kanyeva tunnairun tundānā patyeva jāyā || tvaṣṭeva pūṣeryo damūnā mahī svastir vṛṣaṇā na āgan | viśvā āśāḥ sūyavasā saṃrarāṇo 'syā rayyāḥ puraetā na edhi || eha yantu madhumad duhānā anamīvā uśatīr viśvarūpāḥ | bahvīr bhavantīr upajāyamānā ihendro vo ramayatu gāvaḥ || prajāpatir janayatu prajā imās tvaṣṭā dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ | saṃvatsara ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidāno mayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir dadhātu ||
sāhasī nāma vā asi sahasas pari jajñiṣe | sahasvān indro deveṣu sahase tvā khanāmasi || sahasyena bheṣajena divyena śataparvaṇā | tena sahasrakāṇḍena kṛṇomi punarābhṛtim || K punarābhṛtam sahaso 'haṃ bheṣajasya divyasya nāma jagrabha | vy āśiṣaiva tasthire yakṣmāsaḥ puruṣād adhi || apeta etu nirṛtir nehāsyā api kiṃ cana | apāsyāḥ satvanaḥ pāśān mṛtyūn ekaśataṃ nude || ye te pāśā ekaśataṃ mṛtyo martyāya hantave | tāṃs te yajñasya māyayā sarvām̐ apa yajāmasi || nir ito yantu nairṛtā mṛtyava ekaśataṃ paraḥ | sedhāma eṣāṃ yat tamaḥ prāṇaṃ jyotiś ca dadhmahe || triṣaptā vāraṇā imās tābhir mām indro abravīt | viṣaṃ vārayatām iti viṣaṃ dūṣayatād iti || apa brūtedaṃ maruto mahīndrasyāpavācanī | eṣā sahasram arhaty eṣā vārayate viṣam || asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat | asthur viṣasyābhītayaḥ pratikūla ivābalaḥ || yathā bāṇaḥ susaṃśitaḥ parāpataty āśumat | evā kāśe parā pata Bhatt. kāśe(⟨ se) sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā || yathā cakṣuś cakṣuṣmataḥ parāpatati ketumat | (…) see 10c sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ || yathā mano manyuketuṃ parāpatati yojanā | evā kāśe parā patat Bhatt. kāśe(⟨ se) samudrasyānu vikṣaram || ita evāva gacchata- -ugrā bhavata mābalāḥ | Bhatt. bhavatu (⟨ ta) hvayantu sarve vo devāḥ sarvā vo vṛṇatāṃ viśaḥ || yad avagamena haviṣā- -ava vo gamayāmasi | atrāta indraḥ kevalīr viśo balihṛtaḥ karat || indraḥ kaśyapa ād agnir iḍā turīyā vaḥ sakhā | yad bhūtaṃ bhavyam āsanvat tenāva gamayāmi vaḥ ||
na taṃ yakṣmā arundhate nainaṃ śapatho aśnute | yaṃ bheṣajasya gulguloḥ surabhir gandho aśnute || yaṃ gulgulor bheṣajasya surabhir gandho aśnute | viṣvañcas tasmād yakṣmā Bhatt. viśva(⟨ ṣva*)ñcas mṛgā iṣvā iverate || yad gulgulu saindhavaṃ yad vā ghāsi samudriyam | ubhayor agrabhaṃ nāma- -asmā ariṣṭatātaye || devā etaṃ madhunā saṃyutaṃ yavaṃ sarasvatyām adhi maṇāv acarkṛṣuḥ | indra āsīt sīrapatiḥ śatakratuḥ kīnāśā āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ || bṛhatpalāśe subhaga ūrdhvasvapna ṛtāvari | māteva putrebhyo mṛḍa keśebhyo naḥ śami || yas te mado +'vakeśo yo vikeśo Bhatt. vi(⟨ va?) yenābhihasyaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṇoṣi | bhrūṇaghnovirivārā(c) cara tvaṃ tasya te prajāyāḥ suvāmi keśān || ākūtiṃ devīṃ subhagāṃ puro dadhe cittasya mātā suhavā no astu | yām āśām emi kevalī sā me astu videyam enāṃ manasi praviṣṭām || ākūtyā no bṛhaspata ākūtyā na upā gahi | atho bhagasya no dhehy atho naḥ suhavo bhava || bṛhaspatir ma ākūtim āṅgirasaḥ prati jānātu vācam etām | yasya devā devatāḥ sambabhūvuḥ suṣupraṇīḥ kāmo anv etv asmān || mano nv āhvāmahi nārāśaṃsena stomena | pitṝṇāṃ ca manmabhiḥ || ā na etu manaḥ punaḥ kratve dakṣāya jīvase | jyok ca sūryāya dṛśe || punar naḥ pitaro mano dadātu daivyo janaḥ | jīvaṃ vrātaṃ sacemahi || vayaṃ soma vrate tava manas tanūṣu bibhrataḥ | prajāvantaḥ sacemahi || varco me mitrāvaruṇā varco devī sarasvatī | varco me aśvinobhā dhattaṃ puṣkarasrajā || yac ca varco yajamāne yac ca yajñe 'dhy āhitam | surāyāṃ babhru yad varcas tasya bhakṣīya varcasaḥ || yā utsebhyaḥ prasravanti divo dhārā nadībhyaḥ | tāsāṃ tvā sarvāsām apām abhi ṣiñcāmi varcasā || yad rājānaṃ śakadhūmaṃ nakṣatrāṇy akṛṇvata | bhadrāham asmai prāyacchan tato rāṣṭram ajāyata || bhadrāham astu naḥ sāyaṃ bhadrāhaṃ prātar astu naḥ | bhadrāham asmabhyaṃ tvaṃ śakadhūma sadā kṛṇu || yo no bhadrāham akaraḥ sāyaṃ prātar atho divā | tasmai te nakṣatrarāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ || yad āhuḥ śakadhūmāhaṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ prathamajaṃ jyotir agre | tan naḥ saniṃ madhumatīṃ kṛṇotu rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchāt ||
anuvāka 6 ||
yūpe garte vidveṣaṇaṃ devānāṃ varcasā kṛtam | agnir vām astv antarā yathā vāṃ na sahāsati || yathāhiṃ dveṣṭi puruṣo ahir vā dveṣṭi puruṣam | girir vām astv antarā yathā vāṃ na sahāsati || nānāni vām ākūtāni Bhatt. nānānaṃ nānā cittāni santu vām | viṣvañcau pary ā vartethāṃ yathā vāṃ na sahāsati || atra dve kamale dve tuṇḍe Bhatt. aḍadve kamaḍadve na maśīkataṃ taṃ galāpate | Bhatt. namaśītakam | bhaṅgalāpato (⟨ bhaṅgurāvato) daha || etad yat te yad vā yad vā na cāsan no ca te bhavat | svapne vittaṃ yathā dhanaṃ naśyād id etad etataḥ || āgilo gilāpāpacito gila | naśyād bradhnakam arbhakam || dīrghāyutvāya sahase mahyā ariṣṭatātaye | suparṇo mahyam abravīd etad āśliṣṭabheṣajam || saktūn iva titaünā punanto vidvāṃso vācam akrata | aṅgebhyo viśvāṅgebhyaḥ pra te chinadmy āśliṣṭam || avacchindhy āśliṣṭam ūrvā hy asi bheṣajī | Bhatt. urvā divyaḥ suparṇo abravid etad āśliṣṭabheṣajam || abhibhūr aham āgamaṃ viśvakarmā svāyudhaḥ | ahaṃ mitrasya kalpayann Bhatt. kalpayan āsv āsv āśāsu duṣṭaraḥ || ahaṃ samityayano ahaṃ viśāṃ purohitaḥ | ahaṃ mitrāṇi kalpayan mayi vāg astu dharṇasī || ā vaś cakṣur ā vo vācam ā vaḥ samitiṃ dade | yogakṣemaṃ va ādāya- -ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ || brahmaṇāgniḥ saṃvidāno rakṣohā nudatām itaḥ | arāyo yas te tanvaṃ durṇāmā yonim āśaye || yas te 'rāyas tanvaṃ durṇāmā yonim āśaye | agniṣ ṭaṃ brahmaṇā yujā rakṣohā nudatām itaḥ || yāny abhvāni rakṣāṃsi ye 'rāyā yātudhānyaḥ | agniṣ ṭvā śagmayā tanvā rakṣohā pātu tebhyaḥ ||
agniś ca deva savitar iṣam ūrjaṃ dadhānau | pātaṃ mā duścaritād ā mā sucarite bhajataṃ yuvayor avasā sumnam aśīya || idaṃ tad upa yuva idaṃ tad upa hvaye yac chuśrumā tvat pari | vācaspatir ni yacchatu mayy evāstu mama śrutam || māpatyāya steyaṃ karaṃ mā śrutena vi rādhiṣi | amogham asmākaṃ śrāntam agne draviṇavat kṛdhi || madhyameṣṭhā varcasvatyā- -āyuṣe varcase kṛtam | vanuṣva viśvadeveṣu vanuṣva tvaṃ bṛhaspatau || ghṛtena prajāṃ vanute ghṛtena rayim aśnute | ghṛtenāyuṣyaṃ varcasyaṃ devebhyo vanute pari || parjanya pippalās tubhyaṃ nadyo garbhaṃ svastaye | maryādā brahmadevīr āyuṣyaṃ varca āsican || yathā hastī hastinyāḥ padena padam anv agāt | evā tvam aghnye vatsasya padena padam anv ihi || yathā rathasya cakre vi pathaḥ pāṃsum asyathaḥ | evā mano vy asyāmi hṛdayaṃ vananāya kam || indrasya prathamaṃ vaco devānām aparaṃ vacaḥ | tṛtīyam aśvinor vacas tena gāṃ vānayāmasi || ud itaḥ śyāvau vithurau divaṃ gṛdhrāv iveyathuḥ | śocanāv atiśocanāv asyocchocanau hṛdaḥ || śocayābhi śocayā dīpayopa dīpaya | aher agne viṣaṃ tvaṃ tṛṇam iva kalvalaṃ daha || sīdataṃ niṣattārāv avetaṃ mod gatam | Bhatt. moṅgatam (⟨ mod gatam) kṛṣṇā vāṃ gauḥ sārasvatī || yathā rātrī kṛṣṇatamā gauḥ kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇavartaniḥ | śācīḥpyavo yathā rūpam evedaṃ māmakaṃ śiraḥ || yathāṅgaro 'bhiṣikto darvidāko yathāsitaḥ | anuṣyaṅgasya kalmaṣam evedaṃ māmakaṃ śiraḥ || yathā dāvād dahyamānāt kṛṣṇo jvālo 'padhvaṃsate | naiṣād asya yathā mukham evedaṃ māmakaṃ śiraḥ ||
yat kiṃ cāsau manasā yac ca vācā yajñair juhoti haviṣā yajurbhiḥ | tan mṛtyunā nirṛtiḥ saṃvidānā purā dṛṣṭād ājyaṃ hantv asya || yātudhānā nirṛtir ād u rakṣas te asya ghnantv anṛtena satyam | indreṣitā ājyam asya mathnantu mā tat saṃ pādi yad asau juhoti || pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi | dhṛṣadvarṇa divedive hantāraṃ bhaṅgurāvatām || svarjid adhirājau śyenau saṃpātināv iva | ājyaṃ pṛtanyato hataṃ yo asmān pṛtanāyati || pṛthivyai vanaspatibhya oṣadhībhyo 'gnaye 'dhipataye svāhā || antarikṣāya prāṇāya vayobhyo vāyave 'dhipataye svāhā || dive cakṣuṣe nakṣatrebhyaḥ sūryāyādhipataye svāhā || pippalyaḥ sam avadanta- -āyatīr jananād adhi | yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ || pippalī kṣiptabheṣajy utāvaviddhabheṣajī | Bhatt. utātavidyabheṣajī (⟨ uta cāvidhyabheṣajī?) tāṃ devāḥ sam akalpayann alaṃ jīvātavā iti || asurās tvā ny akhanan devās tvod avapan punaḥ | Bhatt. devās te (⟨ stve?) vātīkṛtasya bheṣajī pippalī kṣiptabheṣajī || yad ulūko vadati mogham etad yat kapotaḥ padam agnau kṛṇoti | yasya dūtau prahitāv idam eyathus tasmai yamāya namo 'stu mṛtyave || yas te dūto nirṛta ājagāma- -aprahitaḥ prahito vā gṛhaṃ naḥ | kapotolūkāv apadaṃ tad astv avairahatyam idam ā jagantha suvīratāyā idam ā sasattha || yaḥ prathamaḥ pravata āsasāda bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānaḥ | ya īśe asya dvipado yaś catuṣpadas tasmai yamāya namo 'stu mṛtyave || yathāsitaḥ prathayate vaśām̐ anu vapūṃṣi kṛṇvann asurasya māyayā | evā me śepaḥ sahasāyam arka enāṅgena saṃsamakaṃ kṛṇotu || yāvad aṅgīnaṃ pārasvataṃ Bhatt. pārśvataṃ (⟨ pārasvataṃ = ŚS) hāstinaṃ gārdabhaṃ ca yat | yāvad aśvasya vājinas tāvan me vardhatāṃ pasaḥ || yathā pasas tāyādaraṃ vātena sthūlabhaṃ kṛtam | yāvat parasvataḥ pasas tāvan me vardhatāṃ pasaḥ ||
yasyedam ā rajo yujas tuje janaṃ vanaṃ svaḥ | indrasya nādhṛṣe śavaḥ || dhṛṣāṇaṃ dhṛṣataḥ śavaḥ purā yathāyatiṣṭhan | indrasya rantyaṃ mahat || sa no dadhātu taṃ rayiṃ puruṃ piśaṅgapeśasam | indraḥ patis tuviṣṭamo janeṣv ā || āyur agna ihā vaha jātavedas tanūvaśin | yathāhaṃ jyog ihāsāni prajānām adhipā vaśī || āyur indro dadhātu ma āyur devo bṛhaspatiḥ | āyur me viśve devā ahorātre ca cakratuḥ || āyur āyuṣyā pavatāṃ prāṇaṃ prāṇo dadhātu me | devā yac cakrur devebhyaḥ svar yanto yathāyatham || utpatantu nabhasvatīḥ samudrād adhi ghoṣiṇīḥ | utsyāḥ samudriyā apas tābhiṣ ṭvā tarpayāmasi || yā āpo divyā yā vātāt parijajñire | indro marutvāṃs tṛptātmā tābhiṣ ṭvā tarpayāmasi || yāḥ śuṣkā yā hariṇīr yā bhūmim anuvāvṛdhuḥ | sarvāḥ samagrā oṣadhīs tābhiṣ ṭvā tarpayāmasi || ā no medhā sumatir viśvarūpā giro bṛhatīr āveśayantī | ṛco me bahvīr ny anaktu gā iva yathāsāma bhuvaneṣu karṇinaḥ || dīkṣā tapo manaso mātariśvā bṛhaspatir vāco asyāḥ sa yoniḥ | vedāṃsi vidyā mayi santu bahvīr agnīṣomā yaśo asmāsu dhattam || yad agne tapasā tapa upaprekṣāmahe vayam | priyāḥ śrutasya bhūyāsma- Bhatt. priyā(ḥ) -āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ || yas tvā mātur uta vā pituḥ parijāyamānam abhisaṃbabhūva | taṃ tvad yakṣmam adhi nāśayāmaḥ so 'nyasmiṃ chrayātai praviṣṭaḥ || yas te yakṣmo hṛdayeṣṭho nābhiṣṭhā udaraṃgamaḥ | atho yaḥ śiśriye parau taṃ tvad yakṣmam adhi nāśayāmaḥ so 'nyasmiṃ chrayātai praviṣṭaḥ || śīrṣarogam aṅgarogaṃ snāvabṛham abhiśāciṃ visalpakam | yas te yakṣmo majjasu paruḥsu yo gudāsu taṃ tvad yakṣmam adhi nāśayāmaḥ so 'nyasmiṃ chrayātai praviṣṭaḥ ||
anuvāka 7 ||
agnī rakṣohā tigmas tigmaśṛṅgo hantu rakṣo nudatām arātim | apāghaśaṃsam asyatu || ā ta etu parāvato balam ojo divas pari | ā giribhyaḥ parvatebhya āyuṣ ṭe viśvato dadhat || punas te 'suṃ pṛthivī dadātu punar dyaur devo punar antarikṣam | devo punar: sandhi?, RV 10.59.7b dyáur devī́ púnar punas te somas tanvaṃ dadhātu punaḥ pūṣā pathyāṃ yā svastiḥ || kaṣkiṣā kaṣpiṣā yevāṣā eṣā | iṣṭargava iṣayantaḥ saikatāḥ pāṃsavāḥ || adṛṣṭān na dṛṣṭān | dṛṣṭām̐ adṛṣṭān dhanapate jahīndrasya vadhena || etāś ca viśvarūpāś ca gṛdhrāḥ kokāś ca te hatāḥ || kāme kāmayasva mā pratīcī prati mā bhava | mām anu pra te mano vatsā pākeva dhāvatu || abhīle abhimādany asau mām abhi mādyatu | vidma patatriṇyā vayam iṣuke nāmakaṃ tava || ahaṃ te mana ā dade mano manomuṣir yathā | mayi te mana āhitaṃ ratha iva rathavāhane || ud asau sūryo agān mahyam avatunā saha | ahaṃ viśāṃ purohito madhuhasto madhujihvo mayi vāg astu dharṇasī || ahaṃ viśyena ketunā samakṣye mānuṣeṣv ā | asmākam astu kevalaṃ bṛhad diśo adhi viśveṣu rājasu || svādoś cin mā svādīyāṃsaṃ madhoś cin madhumattaram | priyāś cit sakhyur antaram ādityāsaḥ kṛṇota mā || agne brahma tvaṃ brahmāsi viddhi tvaṃ prāsmabhyaṃ brūhi | yadīdaṃ tathā bhaviṣyasi yadi vā nāthaitasya haviṣo vīha svāhā || vi pṛcche dyāvāpṛthivī vīndraṃ vi bṛhaspatim | vi devān yajñiyān pṛcche vy asaṃ jīvanāya kam || Bhatt. (⟨ vy asuṃ?) vijñānāyodyatā prastutā srug iyaṃ yama rājan havir idaṃ juṣasva | agatāsor haviṣo mādayasva nirṛtiṃ gacchatu yad gatāsoḥ ||
yat tvā māṃse apavavau yan manthe yad odane | agniṣ ṭvā viśvabheṣajas tasmāt pātv aṃhasaḥ || yas tvā vāta āvāty adharād uttarād uta | āpo yā viśvaśaṃbhuvas tās tvā pātv aṃhasaḥ || read pāntv apa tvan mṛtyuṃ nirṛtim apa yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi | yathā tvam arapā asa udojā uttaro bhuvaḥ || vaiśvānaro raśmibhir naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇeneṣiro nabhobhiḥ | dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye mā punītām || prajāpatir ṛtubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ saṃvatsaro dhāmabhiḥ pātu viśvaiḥ | ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu tam ātmani punar ā veśayāmi || vaiśvadevīṃ sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvaṃ śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ | tayā gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām || vaiśvānarīṃ varcasa ā rabhadhvaṃ yasyā āśās tanvo vītapṛṣṭhāḥ | īḍayeha sadhamādaṃ madanto jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam || avatkaṃ mama bheṣajam avatkaṃ parivācanam | narācy asi mā tudo vanvānā rogabheṣajam || śambhuleham ihā hara tam u kṣīrā ud asyati | tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat || nadīṣu naḍvalāsu kumbheṣu kalaśeṣu ca pratīṣecanabheṣajam | tat te kṛṇomi bheṣajam Bhatt. tate addhi māṃsaṃ pibodakaṃ paṭpaṭiṅgaṃ vipaścalaṃ vi paśya || avidāma yad aicchāma piśācakṣayaṇaṃ haviḥ | tena kravyādo hanmaḥ sarvāś ca yātudhānyāḥ || icchanti tvā padātaya icchanti rathinas tvā | krīṇanti gobhir aśvair amṛtasyeva vā asi || amamri nāma bheṣajaṃ pṛthivyā adhy udbhṛtam | vaktā tan mahyam abravīd idaṃ ha pārayād iti || cakṣur asi puruṣasya cakṣur goś cakṣur arvataḥ | cakṣur bhūtasya bhavyasya cakṣur apsarasām asi || cakṣur asi suparṇasya cakṣur aher atho śunaḥ | cakṣuḥ sarvasya paśyato 'tho yad viśvam ejati || ādadānaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ pratispāśanam abruvam | darśaya mā yātudhānān darśaya yātudhānyāḥ ||
atīmām akhyaṃ pṛthivīm ati dyām ati sūryam | ati viśvam idaṃ bhūtam aty akhyaṃ yātudhānyaḥ || darśaya mā yātudhānān darśaya yātudhānyaḥ | aghāyūn sarvān darśaya- -iti tvauṣadha ā rabhe || evā sahasracakṣo tvaṃ prati paśyāsy āyataḥ | saho 'si yātudhānajambhanam || imāḥ pāre pṛdākvas triṣaptā nirjarāyavaḥ | tāsāṃ jarāyuṇā vayam akṣyāv api vyayāmasy aghāyoḥ paripanthinaḥ || viṣūcy etu kṛntatī pinākam iva bibhratī | viṣvak punarbhuvā mano 'samṛddhā aghāyavaḥ || apetaḥ paripanthino +'po aghāyur arṣatu | na bahavaḥ saṃ śaknavan nārbhakā abhi dhṛṣṇavan || pretaṃ pādau pra sphurataṃ vahataṃ pṛṇato gṛham | indrāṇy etu prathamā- -ajītāmuṣitā pathā || āyam agan phālgumaṇir balena baladāḥ saha | yenendro dasyūnāṃ vīrām̐ asurāṇām avātirat || varcasā māṃ payasokṣantu devā varcasā dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | varco me devaḥ savitā dadhātu varco vipraḥ kaśyapo me dadhātu || varco ma āpo dadhatu varco me vīrudho dadhan | bhūtāni sarvāḥ saṅgatya varca ā dhur mukhe mama || yāḥ purastād vitiṣṭhante gāvaḥ pravrājinīr iva | vātīkṛtasya bheṣajīḥ pippalīḥ pārayiṣṇavaḥ || rudrasya mūtram asy amṛtasya nābhiḥ | pṛthivyāṃ mūlaṃ niṣṭhitam asi viṣāṇā nāma vātīkṛtabheṣajī || śaṃ te astu matasnābhyāṃ śaṃ yakne śaṃ talīdyai | śaṃ te pṛṣṭibhyo majjabhyaḥ śam astu tanve tava || na hi te agne tanvaḥ krūram ānaṃśa martyam | kapir babhastu tejanaṃ svaṃ jarāyu gaur iva || tveṣa iva saṃ ca vi ca roruvaṇyate yad uttaradrā uparasya khādati | śīrṣṇā śiro apsasāpso ardayann aṃśūn babhastu haritebhir āśubhiḥ || suparṇā vācam akratopa dyavy ākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirā anartiṣuḥ | ni yan niyanty uparasya niṣkṛtiṃ purū reto dadhire sūryasyutaḥ || Bhatt. (⟨ śvi/syū?)
bhagena mā śāṃśapena Bhatt. sāṃśaphena sākam indreṇa medinā | kṛṇomi bhaginaṃ mā- -apa drāntv arātayaḥ || yo andho yaḥ punaḥsaro bhago vṛkṣeṣv ārpitaḥ | bhago me astu śāṃśapo 'pa drāntv arātayaḥ || yathā vṛkṣām̐ abhyabhavaḥ Bhatt. vṛkṣāṃ sākam indreṇa medinā | evā mā bhaginaṃ kṛṇv apa drāntv arātayaḥ || apeto nīlalohitaṃ jātaṃ himavatas pari | kīśmīlam urvarābhyo divo jātam anīnaśam || abhrāj jātaṃ varṣāj jātam atho jātaṃ divas pari | atho samudrād jātaṃ kīśmīlaṃ nāśayāmasi || yo nīhārād yaḥ pruṣvā yo adbhyas pari jāyase | garbho yo vidyutām asi sa naḥ kīśmīla mṛḍaya || nodeyīḥ sikatā imāḥ sindhutas paryābhṛtāḥ | tābhir yamasya kīśmīlaṃ saṃbhṛtābhir anīnaśam || tvayā pūrvaṃ vibhīdaka saṃjitā asurā hatāḥ | tvaṃ sapatnacātano bhrātṛvyām̐ ava dhūnuṣva || Bhatt. bhrātṛvyāṃ vi bhinattu vibhīdakas tīkṣṇaśṛṅga iva ṛṣabhaḥ | atho sapatnān ā dattām atho hantu durasyataḥ || vyavadhīt sahamānaḥ sapatnān Bhatt. sapatnāṃ dviṣato me 'dharām̐ akaḥ | abhy abhūd bhūtyobhayām || ya āskandaḥ parāskanda ākhuḥ kakubha āt krimiḥ | upajīkām̐ upakvasān Bhatt. upakvasāṃ tān sarvān jambhayāmasi || api nahyāmy ākhor muñjena mukham āsyam | anadaṃ yathā carād apaitum urvarābhyaḥ || apinahyamukha ākhuḥ paroktaḥ prāṭparāṇutaḥ | śṛṇāmy asya dantān nir akṣau pādayāmasi || aśvinā sāraghena mā madhunāṅkta śubhaspatī | yathā varcasvatīṃ vācam āvadāni janām̐ anu || yaśā ahaṃ nimiṣate pratikhyātre yaśā aham | atraimi tad yaśā aham uta tatra yaśā aham || asmai ca sarvasmai bhūtāya sarvasmai ca vipaśyate | sarvasmā id ahaṃ yaśāḥ || apottudāporṇuhi Bhatt. apottuda* (a)porṇuhi* yadīdam asti vā na vā | vyandhyaṃ vyalguṇaṃ cakṣur akṣībhyāṃ kṛdhi || aṅgaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ kṛtvā laṅgalāṣam armaṃ ca | tad devā apa lumpata || cakṣuṣman me mano astu cakṣuṣmad dhṛdayaṃ mama | cakṣuṣmac cittam astu me cakṣuś cakṣuṣmad astu me cakṣur ā dhehi me 'kṣyoḥ ||
anuvāka 8 ||
somo rājā savitā ca rājā bhavo rājā bhuvanaṃ ca rājā | śarvo rājā śarma ca rājā ta u naḥ śarma yacchantu devāḥ || ādityair no bṛhaspatir bhagaḥ somena naḥ saha | viśve devā urv antarikṣaṃ ta u naḥ śarma yacchantu devāḥ || utāviddhāṃ niṣkhidata- -atho śrathnīthāyatām | mā no viśve devā maruto hetim asthata || apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ samudrasya niveśanam | madhye hradasya no gṛhāḥ parācīnā mukhā kṛdhi || āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvā rohatu puṣpiṇī | utso vātra jāyatāṃ hrado vā puṇḍarīkavān || himasya tvā jarāyuṇā śāle pari vyayāmasi | śītahradāya no bhuvo 'gnir dadātu bheṣajam || ayaṃ darbho vimanyukaḥ svāya cāraṇāya ca | manyor vimanyuko manyuśamano astu te || ayaṃ yo bhūrimūlaḥ samudram avagacchati | darbhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ niṣṭhitaḥ sa te astu vimanyukaḥ || vi te hanavyāṃ śaraṇiṃ vi te mukhyāṃ nayāmasi | yathāvaśo na vādiṣo mama cittam upāsāsai || yebhiḥ pāśaiḥ parivitto vibaddhaḥ parauparāv ārpito aṅgeaṅge | vi te cṛtyantāṃ vicṛto hi santi bhrūṇaghni pūsan duritāni mṛṣṭām || read mṛṣṭā || (?) trite devā amṛjataina etat trita enan manuṣyeṣv amṛṣṭa | tato yadi tvā madhye na ārat tad ahaṃ tvad brahmaṇāpā karomi || Bhatt. tad (⟨ tvad) marīcīr dhūmaṃ pra viśānu vātam udārān gacchota vā nīhāram | nadīnāṃ phenam anu tad vi naśyatu bhrūṇaghni pūṣan duritāni mṛṣṭām || Bhatt. (⟨ ṣṭā) agne rakṣaḥ prati daha yat kumbhyābhir ābhṛtam | anādhṛṣyaḥ sa yāsyaty abhūj jīvātave ayam || yan nakhavad yac chaphavat prasūmat kiṃ ca puṣpavat | urvā matsyo madhūlakaṃ tasya pāsyaty ayam anāsrāvam arogaṇam || yāḥ samudrāt prasravanti devīr himavatas pari | āpo yā viśvaśambhuvas tā ihā yantu bheṣajīḥ ||
tvacāpidhāne subhage datparistaraṇe kave | ekām iva vraje gāṃ pari tvā varcasāsicam || agreṇīr iva haṃsānāṃ prapaśyantī puras patham | jihve mā vivyatho mā yathāpūrvaṃ tvaṃ vada || varcasvad aham udyāsaṃ brahmarājanyābhyāṃ śudrāya cāryāya ca | yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate || arvāñcau pādau pra hara- -arvācīnaṃ manas tava | arvācīnasya te ataḥ parāṅ manyuṃ ni vartatām || Bhatt. manyuṃ(⟨ nyuḥ chāgalāde bhagavo 'rvāg jyote parastamaḥ | ā tvā khalajñakād asmāt punar ā vartayāmasi || yathā vrīhīn vrīhikhale samākurvanti tūlibhiḥ | evā te viṣṭhitaṃ manaḥ sam ā karomi mām abhi || tvam uttamaṃ surabhiṣāṃ mādhyamaṃ vahator asi | tvayā vadhūr vi jaṅgahe taṃ tvā varcasa ā dade || mūrdhnas te mūrdhanyebhyo 'gruvaḥ pativittyāḥ | Bhatt. pativityāḥ (⟨ ttyāḥ) aukṣaṃ śīrṣata ā dade || yaś ca svādmā te aṅgeṣu yaḥ premā hṛdaye ca te | taṃ tvad ā veśayāmahe mayi bhrājāti dīdyat || vātaraṃhā vājin bhava yujyamāna indrasya yāhi prasave manojavāḥ | yuñjantu tvā maruto daivyāsa ā te tvaṣṭā patsu javaṃ dadhātu || javas te arvan nihito guhā yaḥ śyene carati yaś ca vāte | tena tvaṃ vājin balavān balena- -ājiñ jaya samane pārayiṣṇuḥ || āsīyāne 'dhi manasa Bhatt. sī(⟨ śī) āsīyāne 'dhi cakṣuṣaḥ | Bhatt. sī(⟨ śī) āsīyānasya vātād bhūtvā- Bhatt. sī(⟨ śī) -ājiñ jaya samane pārayiṣṇuḥ || tanūs te vājin tanvaṃ vahantī vāmam asmabhyaṃ dhātu śarma tubhyam | ahruto maho dharuṇāya devā divyam iva jyotiḥ svar ānamīyāḥ || indro mā vakṣad akṣataṃ vṛtrahā yo vṛtañjayaḥ | sa me rathaṃ sa sārathiṃ so aśvān sādhu me nayāt || indro mā tena nayatu panthā yo abhayaḥ sugaḥ | dakṣiṇā pārayāti mā mā riṣaṃ samare yudhām || hṛtsuke pari ṇo nama Bhatt. (⟨ ṛcchuke?) pārigaṃ tanve kṛdhi | yuyuta parṇinaṃ śaram see 2.70.5c; Bhatt. yuyut (⟨ yūyuvat) utāparṇaṃ riśād iti ||
viśve devā idaṃ havir ādityāsaḥ saparyata | asmin yajñe mā vyathiṣy amṛtāya haviṣ kṛtam || avyasaś ca vyacasaś ca bilaṃ vi ṣyāmi māyayā | tābhyām udbhṛtya vedam atha karmāṇi kṛṇmahe || yasmāt kośād udabharāma vedaṃ tasminn antar ava dadhma enam | kṛtam iṣṭaṃ brahmaṇo vīryeṇa tena mā devās tapasāvateha || vaiśvānaro ajījanad agnir no navyāṃ sumatim | kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasā || sa naḥ pāvaka dīhihy agne vaiśvānara dyumat | jamadagnibhir āhutaḥ || divas pṛṣṭho arocathā agnir vaiśvānaro bṛhan | jyotiṣā bādhate tamaḥ || hariṇasya patatriṇaḥ śīrṣṇo bheṣajam ābhṛtam | tan nīlavad vi lokavat Bhatt. vi(⟨ dyu?) tad u kṣetriyanāśanam || anvamaṃstānumatir anvaṃaṃsta vṛṣāyavaḥ | kīnāśā anvamaṃsata- -anu gāvo amaṃsata || namo astv āyāmibhyo nīvibhyo hṛdayāya ca | namaḥ kṣetrasya pataye namaḥ kṣetrasya patnyai || ut te hārdiṃ śocayāmi hastenābhimarīmṛśat | keśin vṛṣaṇyayā tava Bhatt. (⟨ vṛṣṇyā?) muṣkau mūrdhā na śuṣyatām || agniṣ ṭvā tapatu sūryas tvā tapatu vātas tvā yuṅktāṃ marutaś ca yuñjatām | mṛgān marīcīr apy etu te manaḥ || ut tvā hanmi nipadanād ut tvā hanmi gṛhebhyaḥ | mā spṛkṣathā niṣadanāya sādhava ut tiṣṭha prehi sabhām || ut tuda śimidāvaty atho ulkāvatīṃ kuru | patye ca śvaśurāya ca || vibarhaṃ harāṃsayo rasaṃ jñānam ati bhruvoḥ | sākam ṛṣe vi nāśaya || sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ | sākaṃ sūryeṇodyatā sapatnīṃ nāśayāmasi ||
dīrghajihvā bṛhadvāco yābhir ārdrāṇi vāsāṃsi | gāvo ghṛtasya mātaro divi bheṣajam akrata || arjunīnām apacitāṃ kṛṣṇā māteti susrava | Bhatt. (⟨ śuśrava) muner devasya mūlena sarvāś chinadmi tā aham || chinadmy āsāṃ prathamāṃ chinadmy uta madhyamām | atho jaghanyām āsām ā chinadmi stukām iva || apehi manasas pate kim aśastāni śaṃsasi | parehi na tvā kāmaye vṛkṣān vanāni saṃ cara || avaśasā niḥśasā yat parāśasā- -upārima yaj jāgrato yat svapantaḥ | agnir viśvāny apa duṣkṛtāny ajuṣṭāny āre asmad dadhātu || yad indra brahmaṇaspata uta mṛṣā carāmasi | pracetā na āṅgiraso dviṣatas pātu tebhyaḥ || eha mām uttaraṃ kṛdhi sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ | vy asmat kṛtyā vy asmac chapathām̐ aja || yo no dudhūrṣān manasā yaś ca pāpena nobhyamāt | ākūtiṃ tasya devā hṛdaś cittāni vi ṣyata || aśva iva dhuri duryogaḥ pratīhāya vahe daśa | kṛtvānaṃ brahmaṇaspate daṃṣṭrābhyām abhi saṃ jahi || yo 'nyā adhi prājāyathā mūrdhno 'dhy ud avardhatāḥ | tvaṃ sapatnacātano bhrātṛvyām̐ ava dhūnuṣva || Bhatt. bhrātṛvyāṃ bahur ayaṃ saṃgaruṣṭo Bhatt. (⟨ san gariṣṭho) nyakto bhūmyām adhi | tenāham asya kartsyāmi yathā sthāmā gamiṣyati || sthāmāgan bṛhad akṣatraḥ Bhatt. akṣatra(ḥ) sthāmantākṣṇiṇo 'va syati | Bhatt. (⟨ *-ntākṣṇo ava) antaṣṭhānasya yo rājā Bhatt. (⟨ anuṣṭhv asya) sa utthāma gamiṣyati || agamad rājā sadanam agamat sūryo divam | udayan vṛtrahan plīhā aṅgarājo avīrahā || yathā panthāṃ kavāpatho apyeti mahāpatham | evā tvaṃ plīhan naḥ plīhi Bhatt. na(ḥ) yato 'sy abhyāgataḥ || indreṇa dattaṃ balam āsurābhyāṃ śitaṅgaitac chālvatāyai ca tubhyam | tau nudethāṃ kaṇvā aśivā ajuṣṭā adhā gṛhāṇāṃ gṛhapā tvam eṣām || tvam agne gṛhapatir gṛhāṇāṃ tvaṃ prajānāṃ janitāsi dātā | tvaṃ nudasva kaṇvā aśivā ajuṣṭā sadānvā nirataḥ seda pāpīḥ || Bhatt. (⟨ sedha) carmābhyaḥ krūram ānahya hariṇasya bhiyaṃ kṛdhi | mṛgām̐ anu pra pātaya Bhatt. mṛgāṃ marīcīr anu nāśaya || yady asy apsarāvīr yadi tvā rakṣo agrabhīt | tasmā apaplavaṃ havir manasā juhomi te ||
anuvāka 9 ||
abhi tvā śatapāśayā- -atho sahasrapāśayā | dāśo matsyam iva tīdena mayi badhnāmi te manaḥ || ā hi te dakṣiṇaṃ padaṃ hṛdayyaṃ dade | upasthe padamopi ni tvām akri sve vaśe || pari tvā gām ivāsaraṃ mama patto nipattave | tan mārutaṃ ha vairudham āvataṃkaraṇaṃ kṛtam || ā nayāmi te mano aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā | upa te muñce manaḥ pador upānahau yathā || yathā surā yathā madhu yathākṣā adhidevane | yathā ha gavyato mana evā mām abhi te manaḥ || evā kṛṇuṣva mā priyām antaḥ kṛṇuṣva mā hṛdi | yathā mannāpacetayā nānyāsāṃ kīrtayāś cana || yasyedaṃ vaiṣṭapaṃ havir bhagasya hastayor hitam | tenā tvābhi mṛśāmasi saubhāgyāya svastaye || bhaga memāṃ saṃ baṭ karo mā paścān mā paro daghaḥ | adhā bhagasya yo bhagas tenemāṃ saṃ sṛjā bhaga || bhagena tvā saṃ sṛjāmi māsureṇa surām iva | yathāsasi priyā patyur devṛbhyaḥ subhagāsasi || ud ito daivyaṃ vaca iṣum iva tunnaḥ khide | tenā sapatnān māmakān sāsahāni jahāni ca || agnir mā pātu vasubhiḥ purastāt savitādityair abhi pātu dakṣiṇāt | indro marudbhir abhi pātu paścād viśve devā abhi rakṣantu mottarāt || devarakṣasān mā pāhi manuṣyarakṣasān mā pāhi | viśvasmān mā rakṣasas pāhi || asau yas trikakud giriḥ śṛṅgābhyām abhitiṣṭhati | sa saṃpatatram udyugaṃ balāsam iva tiṣṭhatu || divyaḥ suparṇa ā patad ayodaṃṣṭro ayomukhaḥ | sa saṃpatatram udyugam ito yakṣmaṃ parā bhavat || sākaṃ balāsa pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvyā | sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā saha naśya nihākayā || Bhatt. nasya(⟨ naśya)
mābhi gāyaḥ śābaleyaṃ śauṇeyaṃ sādhuvāhinam | namas te bhadrayā kṛṇmo 'vihvṛtā cakṣuṣā tvaṃ śamakā śamayāti tvā || tṛndhi vi kṣiṇīhi peśaḥ kurvāṇikā tvam | jāreṇa patyā jakṣatī gṛhān gopāyamānikā śamakā śamayāti tvā || āṅkṣvābhyaṅkṣva- -abhyaktā śamanaṃ gamaḥ | atho pitṛbhyo gā iccha vijñānena bhagena ca śamakā śamayāti tvā || apehi manasas pāpa- -apa krāma parastaram | paro nirṛtyā ā cakṣur bahutrā jīvato manaḥ || bhadraṃ vai varaṃ vṛṇate bhadraṃ yuñjanti dakṣiṇam | bhadraṃ vaivasvataṃ cakṣur bahutrā jīvato manaḥ || yan me chidraṃ manaso yac ca vācaḥ sarasvatīṃ manyucittaṃ jagāma | viśvais tad devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ saṃ dadhātu bṛhaspatiḥ || sphirā sphirataraṃ sphirā āttāraḥ | śatahasta samāhara sahasrahasta saṃ kira || ihaivā kira saṃ kira- -ihaiva sphātim asphiram | sphireyam astv oṣadhiḥ samudrasyeva saṃsravaḥ || ut tirā ā gamann upa- -ut tirāṇyāgaman | Bhatt. (maṃ ⟨ man) vṛṣṭe śāpaṃ nadīr iva- -iha sphātiṃ samāvahān || vi mayūkhā ā yacchantu gardabhā iva duryujaḥ | muhyantu sarve tantavo vṛtā nāḍī vitantrike || pra vām īṣve patatāṃ pra taṭā pra niveṣṭanam | muhyantu sarve tantavo andhe vitatavāyyau || āyavanī niveṣṭanaṃ vratā tasaram īṣve | muhyantu sarve tantavo andhe vitata vāyyau || mayārakārī prathamā- -ūrṇavābhir atho śakā | devānāṃ patnīḥ kṛttikā imaṃ tantum amūmuhan || Bhatt. amūmuhaṃ (⟨ han) agnir na etu prathamaḥ puraetā bṛhaspatiḥ | adhā bhaga pra ṇo yaccha tvaṃ hi dhanadā asi || pra ṇaḥ śūdra utāryaḥ pra ṇo rājota vṛtrahā | atho yat sarvam ātmanvat pra ṇo yacchatu dakṣiṇām || kavir yajñasya vi tanoṣi panthām ṛtasya pṛṣṭhe adhi dīdhyānaḥ | yena havyaṃ vahasi deva dūta itaḥ pracetā amuto vanīyān || madhuhasto madhujihvo madhuvarṇo madhuvrataḥ | atho madhupraśāsano bhago mā varcasāvatu ||
yā triṣaptaiḥ punar eti nānā rūpāṇi bibhratī | vācaspatir balā tasyā āre hetiṃ dadhātu mat || vācā nuttā kṛtyād indravatī Bhatt. (⟨ diddravantī) jāgratā svapatī kṛtā | nuttā pākasya śaṃsena pratyak kartāram ṛcchatu || yad etad bhūri spardhase kṛtyāsmīti manyase | pratīcīnā paretya viṣād iva viṣamad dhataḥ || pareṇaitv aghaśaṃso mainena sam arāmahi | dyauś cāsmān pṛthivī ca- -ubhe pātām aṃhasaḥ || yava yāvayāsmad dveṣāṃsi yavamayena haviṣā | durhārde cakruṣe kṛtyāṃ grīvāsu prati muñcatam || Bhatt. muñca ta(m) anyā vo anyām avatv anyānyasyā upāvata | aśvā iva pravalgantīḥ kṛtyāṃ hatauṣadhayo 'rātiṃ hatauṣadhayaḥ || mehopa gā mopa raṃsthāḥ pathāṃ durgāṇy anv ihi | sapatni naśyatād ito dūraṃ gacchādhy okasaḥ || yasyās te nāma gṛhnāmi yasminn āramasecane | ā parasyāḥ parāvataḥ sapatnīṃ nāśayāmasi || triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca parvatāṃś caturaś ca girīn ati | sapatnīṃ brahmaṇaspate paro bhrūṇāny arpayā || un mādayata marutaḥ samudriyā ud dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | ut tvā samudra ṛṣantu- -ut tvām agnir ayaṃ dahāt || Bhatt. ṛṣantu(⟨ tū)ttvā- yat sapatnī sapatnyā amuṣyā varca ādade | adhastād upavādiny asau syād aham uttarāt || ā te badhnāmy oṣadhiṃ sapatnībhyaḥ pracātanīm | yathā te 'sad ayaṃ patiḥ putrāṇāṃ te bhavat pitā || yāny ṛṇāny anuvartāny asmin yamasya yena balinā carāmi | idaṃ tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi- -idaṃ tad agne avadānam astu || yās te sapta pravato yā u tisro yās te santi nivato yā abhīvataḥ | Bhatt. santu(⟨ nti?) arvāvato aṣṭadhā trīṇi rocanā tās te agne saṃmanaso bhavantu jānan yamāya ni vahā kusīdam || yās ta ūrdhvās tanvo jātavedo yās tiraścīr uta yā anūcīḥ | tābhiṣ ṭvam agne sayujā gṛṇāno Bhatt. tābhiṣ ṭa(⟨ ṣṭva)m jānan yamāya ni vahā kusīdam ||
nāśaya palitaṃ śīrṣṇo yaḥ kṛṣṇas tan na ā bhara | tam oṣadhe tvaṃ vardhaya keśaṃ kṛṣṇataraṃ kṛdhi || yathāñjanaṃ tathāsasi yathā traikakudaṃ tathā | tat saṃbhavāt tat sabhas te Bhatt. (⟨ tastabhus te) vyucchantīr anūṣasaḥ || yatrāsti yatra tiṣṭhati yato naśyatvāsinam | Bhatt. naśyatvā(⟨ tyā)sina(⟨ ta)m divyaḥ suparṇo abravīd etat palitabheṣajam || divo nu mā bṛhato antarikṣād apāṃ stoko abhy apaptad rasāya | sam indriyeṇa payasāham agne Bhatt. agni(⟨ gne) ṛṣīṇāṃ yajñaiḥ sukṛtāṃ kṛtena || yadi vṛkṣād abhy apaptat phalaṃ tad yady antarikṣāt tad u vāyur eva | yatrāspṛṣṭa tanvo yatra vāsaso na tat prāpnoti nirṛtiḥ parastāt || abhyañjanaṃ surabhyād u vāsaś candraṃ hiraṇyam adhi pūtrimaṃ yat | sarvā pavitrā vitatādhy asmiṃc chataṃ jīvāti śaradas tavāyam || yaḥ kīkasāḥ praśṛṇāti Bhatt. kīkasā(ḥ) talīḍyam upatiṣṭhati | parāsthaṃ sarvaṃ jāyānyaṃ yaḥ kaś ca kakubhi śritaḥ || pakṣī jāyānyaḥ patati ya āviśati pūruṣam | tasyāhaṃ veda te nāma Bhatt. vaida (misprint) yato jāyānya jāyase || veda vai te nāma yato jāyānya jāyase | kathaṃ hi tatra tvaṃ hanyā yat kuryām ahaṃ haviḥ || ya āsyaṃ praviśati karoty udaraṃ mahat | yakṣmo yo atra jāyase taṃ jāyānyam anīnaśam || ārohān me mukhaṃ jātam ārohāj jaghanaṃ mama | ārohāt sarvā jātāsmy Bhatt. jātāsmi(nn) ṛṣabhasyopayodhanāt || svādīyasī surāyā lavaṇāc cārumattarā | gobhyo vanīyasīd aham || yāṃ tvā vāto 'vārayad ārdranābhā maharṣabhaḥ | tasyās te devi pṛthivyā ahaṃ saṃvananaṃ dada ā te śauṣkāsyaṃ dade || yuktau manasā saṃ suretasā devebhyo havyaṃ kṛṇavāva sādhu | yeṣāṃ bhāgas ta idaṃ juṣantām avikṣubdhāv udayāva bhadrayā || yena devā jyotiṣā dyām udāyan yenādityā vasavo yena rudrāḥ | yenāṅgirasaḥ svar āruruhus tenod ayāva yajamānau svasti || yaṃ papācāditiḥ putrakāmā yena prajāḥ kaśyapaḥ paryagṛhnāt | ya odanaḥ pacyate vaiśvadevaḥ sa no yame akṣito bhāgo astu ||
anuvāka 10 ||
somasya prāṇaḥ pavate purastād dakṣiṇata aindra ā vātu vātaḥ | asya diśo māturo yā pratīcī sa no devāḥ śivo astv iha vātaḥ || mitrasya prāṇaḥ pavate ya uttarād bṛhaspater ūrdhva ud vātu vātaḥ | yo antarikṣam anu vāti vidvān sa no devaḥ śivo astv iha vātaḥ || ya uttarāt pavate yaḥ purastād yo dakṣiṇāt pavate yaś ca paścāt | ūrdhvām̐ uddeśām̐ anu yaḥ pravāti sa no devaḥ śivo astv iha vātaḥ || trīṇy antarikṣāṇy anu vāsi vāta tisro vāsi parāvataḥ | sahasrākṣau vṛtrahā pāhy arvāṅ vinudaṃ kṣetriyaṃ rapaḥ || na tatra dāraḥ kṛpaṇaṃ sasāra na pratighnānā rudatī na bibhratī | indro no yatrorukṛd vicakṣaṇaḥ sa no *'jyāni mahatīṃ ni yacchāt || indraḥ senāṃ mohayatu maruto ghnantv ojasā | agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya || na dyaur eṣāṃ na pṛthivī nāditir na dhanaṃjayā | Bhatt. ni(⟨ na) cakṣūṃṣy agnir ā dhattāṃ punar yantu parājitāḥ || amitrāṇāṃ daraya grāmam indra yo naḥ śatrur abhyeti jighāṃsan | yathaiṣām indranuttānām agninā veśo anu vartayāni me || Bhatt. (⟨ viśo?) jihmaṃ yugaṃ kṛṇvatām indranuttāḥ parācīnaiḥ pathibhir yantu riṣyantaḥ | Bhatt. yanta(⟨ ntu) tañ jayanto anv āsadema- -agninā veśo anu vartayantaḥ || amitrāṇāṃ grāmam upayuktam indreṇa nuttaṃ vi radāty agniḥ | satvānaḥ santv anumādyā ime yebhyaś carāmi haviṣā ghṛtena || aryamaṇaṃ hi devaṃ bhadraṃ kanyā yam ayakṣata | sa enā vṛtrahā deva ito muñcātu māmutaḥ || iyaṃ te rājan varuṇa jāmikā kṛṇute haviḥ | tasyai patiṃ ny ā vaha subhadraṃ pratikāmyam || ā krandaya dhanapate varam āmanasaṃ kṛṇu | sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛdhi patim asyai pratikāmyam || ā paścād ā purastād ottarād adharād uta | pūrṇā bhagasya vartanis tenemām abhi vartayāmasi varcasā ca bhagena ca || nāsṛg asti pataṅgasya tardasya maśakadyāḥ | na saṃpatatram udyugo Bhatt. om. na nyag glaur atra bhaviṣyati || K nyaṃ glau tatra; Bhatt. na glaur atra apadasvad apādasat tuṇḍivyadhmāpādasat | apāpacid ito 'dasad apeto glaur naśiṣyaty apivyadhman naśiṣyati || yathā sūryaś candramasam udyann evāpagūhati | evā tvam ugra oṣadha imāṃ glāvam apagūhatād itaḥ ||
apadasvad apādasat tuṇḍivyadhmāpādasat | apāpacid ito 'dasad apeto glaur naśiṣyaty apivyadhman naśiṣyati || mā śile mā śilāvati mā te śeṣi śilaṃ cana | yāvac chilasya te śilaṃ tāvac cheṣaḥ śilaṃ tava || Bhatt. tāvacchṣa(⟨ ṣaṃ) yathā yūpāgrād udakaṃ viniṣṭaṃ bhūmim aśnute | evā tvam arase śile viniṣṭā bhūmim aśnuhi || vajro 'si sapatnahā tvayādya vṛtraṃ sākṣīya | tvām adya vanaspate vṛkṣāṇām ud ayuṣmahi || sa na indra purohito viśvatas pāhi rakṣasaḥ | abhi gāvo anūṣata- -abhi dyumnaṃ bṛhaspate || prāṇa prāṇaṃ trāyasva- -aso asave mṛḍa | nirṛte nirṛtyā naḥ pāśebhyo muñca || hatsuke pari ṇo nama Bhatt. ⟨ ṛcchuke? pārigaṃ tanve kṛdhi | yuyuta parṇinaṃ śaram see 2.70.5c; Bhatt. yuyut (⟨ yūyuvat) utāparṇaṃ riśād iti || prajāpatiṣ ṭvā prajayā saṃ putreṇa sṛjatu saṃ bhagena | diṣṭaṃ deṣṭīha kāmo brāhmaṇasya pumāṃsaṃ dhatsva savituḥ savena || pra tvā sarpatv aṅkataḥ kumāraḥ puruṣād adhi | ṛtor yam ṛtviyād adhi yaṃ te dhātā acīkl̥pat || yaṃ te dhātā yaṃ te tvaṣṭā yaṃ te brahmācīkl̥pat | taṃ tvaṃ putraṃ vindasva tasmai tvaṃ jīva jīvase || dhvasrās tiṣṭhanti rajasā samaktā yajñasya hotrāḥ pruśitāso aśnāḥ | āsāṃ somasya yad ihāvayanti tad amūtra yajamānasya rūpam || ye brāhmaṇaṃ varco hitvāya malvā reṇo varṇena paridhāpayanti | Bhatt. (ā)reṇo; read reṇor? āsāṃ somasya yad ihāvayanti tad amūtra yajamānasya rūpam || asārathiḥ sumanaso yathā ratho hitvā savyaṣṭhāṃ rakṣaso yāti yāmam | evā yajño yajamānaṃ jahāti yatra somyaṃ somapīthān nayanti || chandāṃsi tad yajamānasya yanti yatra somyaṃ somapīthān nayanti | abrāhmaṇo yat pibati somam asya tad vai chidraṃ dakṣiṇayāpidheyam || 'bradhno 'si vājī paripānī prathamā devebhyas paryābhṛtā | mā te riṣaṃ khanitā yasmai ca tvā khanāmasi || mā devāḥ pāpam ārāma mā karta pāpayāmuyā | Bhatt. (⟨ kartaṃ?) māhaṃ pariṣyajo hastam ā rapsi dhanakāmyā || mā mā devāḥ parā dāta mā mā karta vyādhyam | māhaṃ pariṣvajaḥ śira ā rapsi mo ahaṃ mṛṣi ||
pratīkaṃ me vicakṣaṇam akṣau me madhukāśinī | karṇābhyāṃ bhūrisusravaḥ || jihvā me madhusaṃsrāvā jihvā me madhuvādinī | tayāham adya jihvayā- -udyāsaṃ madhumad vacaḥ || yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhāv adhi | evāham adya chandobhir udyāsaṃ madhumad vacaḥ || vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyak somo adhiśritaḥ | indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā || yat kiñ cedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane abhidrohaṃ manuṣyāś caranti | ati cet tava dharmā yuyopima mā nas tasmād enaso deva rīriṣaḥ || āpo asmān mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapavaḥ punantu | Bhatt. pava (⟨ puvaḥ) viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi || mitraś ca samrāḍ varuṇaś ca rājā tau te bhakṣaṃ kṛṇutāṃ prātar agne | tayor aham anu bhakṣaṃ kṛṇomi sūryavarcā bhaga bhakto na ā viśa || sūryavarcā na ā viśa viśvavin manasas patiḥ | anehā soma jāgṛvir indraḥ prīta stuto nṛbhiḥ || indra prītasya te vayaṃ śukrasya rocanāvataḥ | bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣaṃ sāhasrasya yaśasvinaḥ || agniḥ prātaḥsavane pātv asmān vaiśvānaraḥ pathikṛd viśvakṛṣṭiḥ | sa naḥ pāvako draviṇe dadhāty āyuṣmantaḥ sahabhakṣāḥ syāma || viśve devā maruta indro asmān asmin dvitīye savane na jahyuḥ | āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣāṃ vadanto vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma || idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ kavīnām ṛtena yac camasaṃ samairayan | saudhanvanā amṛtam ānaśānāḥ sviṣṭin no abhi vasyo nayātha || saṃ saṃ sravantu nadyaḥ saṃ vātāḥ saṃ patatriṇaḥ | yajñam imaṃ vardhayatā giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi || imaṃ homā yajñam avata- -imaṃ saṃsrāvaṇā uta | yajñam imaṃ vardhayatā giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi || rūpaṃrūpaṃ vayovayaḥ saṃrabhyainaṃ pari ṣvaje | yajñam imaṃ catasraḥ pradiśo vardhayantu saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi ||
syūtā devebhir amṛtair na āgann ukhā svasāram adhi me dimasthāt | Bhatt. me (⟨ ve) satyaṃ pūrvā ṛṣayaś cākṛpānā Bhatt. pūrvaṃ yajñapateḥ su pra tirantv āyuḥ || ukhāṃ sravantīm agadām akarma tvaṣṭā vāyuḥ pṛthivy antarikṣam | yata ścutad dhutam agnau tad astu na tat prāpnoti nirṛtiḥ parastāt || antar agnāv aścutat stoka eṣa Bhatt. aścuta(t) nainaṃ suvātai nirṛtiḥ parastāt | viśvāvasor haviṣo vāvṛdhāno 'yaṃ yajñaḥ sukṛtām etu lokam || śyeno 'si gāyatracchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pāraya || samrāḍ asi triṣṭupchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pāraya || svaro 'si gayo 'si jagacchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃpāraya || trāyamāṇe sarvavide mā pari dehi | sarvavid dvipāc ca sarvaṃ rakṣa catuṣpād yac ca naḥ svam || sarvavid viśvavide mā pari dehi | viśvavid dvipāc ca sarvaṃ rakṣa catuṣpād yac ca naḥ svam || viśvavit kalyāṇyai mā pari dehi | kalyāṇi dvipāc ca sarvaṃ rakṣa catuṣpād yac ca naḥ svam || kalyāṇi trāyaṃāṇāyai mā pari dehi | trāyamāṇe dvipāc ca sarvaṃ rakṣa catuṣpād yac ca naḥ svam || vi khana vi ruja vi jahy atraivānākṛtaś cara | sam aham āyuṣā saṃ mayāyuḥ || vi khana vi ruja vi jahy atraivānākṛtaś cara | sam ahaṃ varcasā saṃ mayā varcaḥ || vi khana vi ruja vi jahy atraivānākṛtaś cara | sam ahaṃ tejasā saṃ mayā tejaḥ || vi khana vi ruja vi jahy atraivānākṛtaś cara | sam ahaṃ prajayā saṃ mayā prajā || vi khana vi ruja vi jahy atraivānākṛtaś cara | sam ahaṃ paśubhiḥ saṃ mayā paśavaḥ || divo reto 'si pṛthivyā nabhyam | nabhyam asi nabhyaṃ mā kṛṇu || divo reto 'si pṛthivyāḥ śaktiḥ | śaktir asi śaktaye te vidheyam || divo reto 'si pṛthivyā vittiḥ | vittir asi vittaye te vidheyam || divo reto 'si pṛthivyāḥ puṣṭiḥ | puṣṭir asi puṣṭaye te vidheyam || divo reto 'si pṛthivyā bhūtiḥ | bhūtir asi bhūtaye te vidheyaṃ bhūtir asi bhūtāsi bhūyāsam || śukro 'si bhrājo 'si | sa yathā tvaṃ bhrājato bhrājo 'sy evāhaṃ bhrājato bhrājyāsam || sāyaṃsāyaṃ gṛhapatir no agniḥ prātaḥprātaḥ saumanasasya dātā | vasorvasor vasudhāna edhi vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvaṃ puṣema || prātaḥprātar gṛhapatir no agniḥ sāyaṃsāyaṃ saumanasasya dātā | vasorvasor vasudhāna edhi- -indhānās tvā śataṃ himā ṛdhema || yo na āviḥ śapati yaś ca stāyad yadi cittyā manyunā yat sapatnaḥ | Bhatt. stāyadicityo (⟨ dyadacittyā) agniṣ ṭān pāśān pra mumoktu devo yāvayatu śapathām̐ varuṇo dhṛtavrataḥ ||
anuvāka 11 ||
prāgnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām | sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ || yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvatas tiro viśvābhirocate | sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ || yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvaty agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā | sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ || yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati | sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ || madhu vātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ | mādhvīr gāvo bhavantu naḥ || madhu naktam utoṣaso madhumat pārthivaṃ rajaḥ | Bhatt. om. | mādhvīr naḥ santv oṣadhīḥ || madhumān no vanaspatir madhumām̐ astu sūryaḥ | madhu dyaur astu naḥ pitā || āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana | mahe raṇāya cakṣase || yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ | uśatīr iva mātaraḥ || tasmā araṅgamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha | āpo janayathā ca naḥ || āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnir akramīd asadan mātaraṃ punaḥ | pitaraṃ ca prayaṃtsvaḥ || asya prāṇād apānaty antaś carati rocanā | vy akhyan mahiṣo divam || triṃśad dhāma vi rājati vāk pataṅgāya śiśriyat | prati vastor aha dyubhiḥ || yac chakrā vācam āruhann antarikṣaṃ siṣāsantaḥ | saṃ devā amadan vṛṣā || Bhatt. amadaṃ (⟨ dan) śakro vācam adhiṣṭhāya- -uruvāco asṛṣṭa hi | mahiṣā amadan divi || Bhatt. amadaṃ (⟨ dan) śakro vācam asṛṣṭa hi dhāmadharman vi rājati | vimadaṃ barhir ā sarat || Bhatt. vimadaṃ (⟨ dan)
dhruvo 'si dharuṇo 'stṛto viśvakarmaṇā sudhṛtaḥ | mā tvā samudra ud vadhīn mā suparṇo 'vyathamāna imaṃ dṛṃha || āṣāḍho 'si sahamānaḥ sahasva- -ārātiṃ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ | sahasravīryo 'si sa imaṃ jinva || adbhyaḥ saṃbhūto 'si pṛthivyā rasāc ca viśvakarmaṇaḥ samavartathā adhi | tasya tvaṣṭā vidadhad eti rūpaṃ vidvān tat te devam ājānam agre || Bhatt. om. vidvān ṣaṣṭiś cādhvaryo navatiś ca pāśā hotāram agnim antarā vicṛttāḥ | sinanti pākam ati dhīra ety ṛtasya panthām anv eti vidvān || yo adhvaryuḥ sapta hotrāṇi vidvān pūrvo hotur yajata ājigharti | ūrdhvaṃ sa yajñam adhvaraṃ kṛṇoti ya īṃ ciketa haviṣo vibhāge || atro vibhaktari haviṣo vibhāge mā nir bhākṣīd bhāginaṃ mopahaty | mo abhāgo vidita yo mumoha || vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ śambhu mayobhu no hṛde | pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat || uta vāta pitāsi na uta bhrātota naḥ sakhā | sa no jīvātave kṛdhi || yad ado vāta te gṛhe nihitaṃ bheṣajaṃ guhā | tasya no dehi jīvase || yo na jīvo 'si na mṛto devānām amṛtagarbho 'si svapna | varuṇaṇī te mātā yamaḥ pitā || yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatha rṇaṃ saṃnayanti | evāha duṣvapnyaṃ sarvam Bhatt. duḥsvapnyaṃ apriye saṃ nayāmasi || ararur nāmāsi taṃ tvā svapna tathā vidma sa naḥ svapna susvapnyatāṃ dhehi || naitasyāgre havir adanti devā nirbhakta eṣa sukṛtasya lokāt | pāpīṃ dhiyaṃ jujuṣa ātmanaiṣa sa hi duṣkṛn manuṣyeṣv antaḥ || yo mātṛhā pitṛhā svasṛhā ye ca duṣkṛtaḥ | vidhiṣau te amṛkṣata malaṃ manuṣyā iva || etad evaitaṃ nirarṣur devā bhrūṇaghnyā lokam apy ety eṣaḥ | na te cṛtye haviṣā nāthitasya rāṣṭram ete śakrā vi cṛtanti pāśam ||
ya ākho yo vyukho vīṇavām̐ iha sarpati | taṃ pari paribheṣajaṃ vṛścikajambhanam asi || mayūro atti vṛścikaṃ mayūraṃ vayam admasi | taṃ pari paribheṣajaṃ vṛścikajambhanam asi || āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ | āpo viśvasya bheṣajīr āpo vṛścikajambhanīḥ || tvam agne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣv ā | tvaṃ yajñeṣv īḍyaḥ || yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratāni viduṣāṃ devā aviduṣṭarāsaḥ | agniṣ ṭad viśvād ā pṛṇātu vidvān somasya yo brāhmaṇām̐ āviveśa || ā devānām api panthām aganma yac chaknavāma tad anu pravodhum | agnir vidvān sa yajāt sa id dhotā so adhvaraṃ sa ṛtūn kalpayāti || ut tudā i śimidvatīṃ vi duryoṇā iva dupadā i | ud asyāḥ pātayā manaḥ śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ || pakvaṃ māṃsam ivāsinā śakuniprapatanāṃ kṛdhi | mṛgām̐ anu pra pātaya marīcīr anu nāśaya || viṣvañcau gāvāv ā kuru viṣvañcau yugyā uta | utāsau sūrya ūrdhvaṃ viṣvañcau vāṃ vy ā karat || viṣam ugraṃ viṣaṃ sthiraṃ viṣasya mahimā mahān | viṣaṃ parasvataḥ śiraḥ śatadhā vy apātayat || saṃ daha vrajaṃ yathā vasudhā vasu vartayat | yaṃ viṣa prasarpasi sam agnir iva taṃ daha || gṛhāṇa māṃsāny ava lomāni pātaya | pāṃśūn kṛkāṭa ā vāpāc chindhy uttānapādam ardaya || madhor ahaṃ madhutaro madhughān madhumattaraḥ | Bhatt. -mattarā(⟨ raḥ) āsani kila me madhu mukhe nimandanaṃ kṛtam || mām it tvam abhi cākaśo mṛgas tṛṣyann ivodakam | adhaspadān ma ud vadān maṇḍūko gośaphād iva || ud vadā me adhaspadān maṇḍūko gośaphād iva | atho 'pa cakrā āsāsai śvā bandha ivāhataḥ ||
ā vada bahulaṃ goṣṭhaṃ suvīraṃ bahupūruṣam | yatheto na pramīyātā evā me goṣṭham ā vada || ā vada duhituṣ pate bhrātur jāmātar ā vada | paścā ta udbhūtaḥ sphigaḥ kiṣkindhānām avīr jahi || yad ulūko vadati mogham etad yat kapotaḥ padam agnau kṛṇoti | śrutakarṇāya kavaye stomyāya tasmai yamāya namo astv adya || ya aindrāḥ pāśā ye ca vāruṇā āre asmat tān devī nirṛtir dadhātu || ye vaiśvānarāḥ pāśā ye ca mārutā āre asmat tān devī nirṛtir dadhātu || ye vaiśvadevāḥ pāśā ye ca vaiśvakarmaṇā āre asmat tān devī nirṛtir dadhātu || nārade kitave varuṇe soma aicchan mahimānaṃ mahāntam | avindat taṃ viśvakarmā samudre akṣāṇāṃ klandam ainam asmin dadhāmi || yad dhastayor yac cakṣuṣor mano yat praviveśa te | skandān asya praskandena klandena klandayāmi tat || tisro devīr apsarasa ākaikā sākaikā pretaprayām ety ekasyā nāma | juṣāṇā apsarasa ājyasya sahaso vyantu svāhā || atyākṣaṃ tvā manasā- Bhatt. manasā atyak- -atyākṣaṃ hṛdayena tvā | atyākṣaṃ sarvair aṅgais tvā tathā hi tyajanaṃ kṛtam || imā yāḥ prati nandatha striyaḥ pumāṃsam anvitam | sarvāḥ saṃgatya brūta tejane tyajanaṃ kṛtam || tyajanaṃ me dyāvāpṛthivī adhātāṃ tyajanaṃ devaḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ | agniś ca tubhyaṃ sūryaś ca tejane tyajanaṃ kṛtam || saṃ divaḥ saṃ pṛthivyāḥ saṃ vātāt saṃ nadībhyaḥ | saṃskandam indra ābharat sa āgāt so 'gād idam || saṃskandam oja ojasā devebhir nāma te hitam | hiraṇyanāma nāma te Bhatt. iraṇyaṃ nāma saṃskandāsy oṣadhe || saṃ samudro nadībhiḥ saṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe | saṃ jāyā patyā yonyāṃ saṃskandāsy oṣadhe || saṃ te śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni saṃ yoniṃ saṃgavīnyau | saṃ te sarvāṇy aṅgāni saṃ skandenābhi dadhmasi || śriyaṃ dhātur mayi dhehi Bhatt. dhātar śriyā mādhipatiṃ kṛṇu | viśām īśāno maghavān indro mā yaśasā nayat || mayi tyad indriyaṃ bṛhan mayi dakṣa uta kratuḥ | gharmas triś cid vi bhātu mā gāyatrīcchandasā virāḍjyotiṣā tasya doham aśīya || Bhatt. tasyād, cf. VSM 38.28b tásya dóham aśīmahi arkāsadhasthau kavimātariśvānau yamāṅgirasaḥ | yaśasvinaṃ mā devā yaśasaḥ kṛṇuta svāhā ||
anuvāka 12 ||
indraṃ vayaṃ vaṇijo havāmahe sa nas trātā pura etu prajānan | ghnann arātiṃ paripanthinaṃ mṛgaṃ sa īśāno dhanadā astu mahyam || paṇo no astu prapaṇo vikrayaś ca pratipaṇo no dhaninaḥ kṛṇotu | saṃrarāṇā āhutiṃ juṣantāṃ śunaṃ no astu caritam utthitaṃ ca || yat paṇena pratipaṇaṃ carāmi svena devā dhanam icchamānaḥ | indro me tasmin rucam ā dadhātu bṛhaspatiḥ savitā somo agniḥ || ye vaḥ panthā bahavo devayānā anu dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti | teṣām ahaṃ māṃ varcasyā dadhāmi yathā krītvā dhanam ā vahāni || viddhavāsase nirṛter Bhatt. nirṛti(te?)r ye ca pāśā apaśritāḥ | tebhyaḥ pra mucyate varmī viṣkandham upa sādayan || na vai tad vāso bhavati yasmin vidhyanti pūruṣam | asnā samajyate rūpaṃ tasmāt tad apalopyam || uttiṣṭhann apriyāyata- -avidvān bahubhājyam | na panthāṃ bhadram aśnute ya enena carāt saha || brahmaṇaitat pratigṛhyaṃ tena tat kṛṇute śivam | ārkāt pramucyate pāśāt tena dātā vi paśyati || yau vyāghrāv avarūḍhāv avāñcau jighatsataḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca | tau dantau brahmaṇā brahmaṇaspate śivau kṛṇu tvam iha jātavedaḥ || vrīhim attaṃ yavam attaṃ māṣam attam atho tilam | sa vāṃ bhāgo nihito ratnadheyaṃ mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca || aghorau sayujā saṃvidānau syonau dantau sumaṅgalau | mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca- -anyatra vāṃ tanvo ghoram astu || enā yutām indrāgnī rājñā somena medinā | indro marutvān ādānam amitrebhyaḥ kṛṇotu me || idam ādānam akaraṃ tapasendreṇa saṃśitam | amitrā yatra santi me Bhatt. yatra (⟨ ye 'tra) tān ādāṃ dviṣato mama || ādānena saṃdānena- -amitrān saṃ dyāmasi | apānā ye caiṣāṃ prāṇā asunāsūn sam acchidam || pratūrtāya marutvate svāhā || jayadvīrāyābhiṣatvane svāhā || bṛhaspataye viśvadevāvate svāhā ||
pra dyauḥ pra pṛthivī prāntarikṣaṃ svam arhat | pretaḥ samudriyā āpaḥ śalyam acucyavuḥ || pra tvā vātaś cyāvayatu pra bhūmiḥ sahasā saha | pretaḥ samudriyā āpaḥ śalyam acucyavuḥ || pra tvā sūryaś cyāvayatu nakṣatraiḥ saha medibhiḥ | pretaḥ samudriyā āpaḥ śalyam acucyavuḥ || yo mā pautudruvo maṇir Bhatt. om. yo mā viśvabheṣaja āgamat | so asmat sarvaṃ duṣvapnyam apa hantu tamaś ca yat || apāsmat sarvaṃ duṣvapnyam apa pāpīṃ ca lakṣmyam | adhā hiraṇyavarcasaṃ sarvadā mā maṇe kṛdhi || sarvadaivāhaṃ bhagavān indriyāvān viṣāsahiḥ | yo mā pautudruvo maṇir draviṇena sahāruhad indreṇa sahāruhat || pumān aśvo dhanaṃ vittiṃ pumān niṣko hiraṇyayaḥ | pumāṃsaṃ putram oṣadhe 'syā ā dhehi nāryai || yathānandāḥ puṃsi jāte na vravastīti kaś cana | evā tvaṃ putram oṣadhe 'syā ā dhehi nāryai || aśvena riṣyena gavā Bhatt. riṣyena (⟨ ṛṣyena) krītāsy oṣadhe | Bhatt. om. | (found in K) aśvaḥ śveto dhanaṃ tava hiraṇyaṃ haritaṃ tava | dattā somena rājñeha puṃsavanaṃ bhava || yan me nṛmṇaṃ draviṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ca yac ca śrutaṃ yac ca ratnaṃ bibharmi | etan no atra nidhipānu pātu yāvad aimi strīyaṇamajmā vyajya || yan me nṛmṇaṃ draviṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ca ye agnayo dhṛṣṇiyāso mayīme | hariścandro rakṣatu tan no atra yāvad aimi paro grāmaṃ caritvā || eṣa aimi paro grāmaṃ caritvā- -accha nṛmṇaṃ draviṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ca | yad atrāpi tve śuci- -idaṃ tad aham ā dade || ā sūryo hi prathamaṃ dasyuhatyāya śakra hārī yuñjāno maghavan sahasram | dāsaṃ varṇaṃ randhayann āryāya yuñjāno bāhū puruhūta vajram || āhṛḍate dasyuhatyāya tūrṇa dṛḍhāni parvā śṛṇīhīndra | tīvrāśraddho bahulāny eṣām ayujvano arpaya saṃ vadhena || darśan nu citrapāvānam indraṃ bahu sākaṃ śarām̐ iva patyamānān | ye no ghṛṣviṃ maghavānaṃ pṛtanyān abhīru teṣu kavayo vavṛtyuḥ ||
idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya prati vedayāma etat | yad vrateṣu duritaṃ nijagmima durhārdaṃ tena śamalenāñjmaḥ || Bhatt. śamalenājmaḥ yan me vrataṃ vratapate lulobha- -ahorātre sam adhātāṃ ma etat | udyan purastād bhiṣag astu candramāḥ sūryo raśmibhir abhi gṛṇātv etat || yad vratam atipede cittyā manasā hṛdā | ādityā rudrās tan mayi vasavaś ca sam indhatām || vratāni vratapataya upā karomy agnaye | sa me dyumnaṃ bṛhad yaśo dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇotu me || mayobhūr vāto abhi vātūsrā ūrjasvatīr oṣadhīr ā riśantām | medasvatīr jīvadhanyā mayobhuvaḥ padvate 'vasāya rudra mṛḍa || yā ekarūpā viśvarūpāḥ sarūpā yāsām agnir ūdho vo janma veda | yā aṅgirasas tapaseha cakrus tābhyaḥ parjanya mahi śarma yacchāt || yā deveṣu tanva airayanta yāsāṃ somo rūpadheyāni veda | tā asmabhyaṃ bahulāḥ pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīr indra goṣṭhe didiśyāḥ || prajāpatir mahyam etā rarāṇo bahvīḥ satīr upa me goṣṭha ākaḥ | tāsāṃ vayaṃ prajayā saṃ sadema jyog jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīḥ || abhiṣṭhitā carkardīti piśaṅgī bahukardinī | kardo ha jajñe hālīkṣṇād vrīher māṣād atho yavāt || yathā bhasad dhālīkṣṇasya na saṃbhavati kardave | evā halagna kardaya nir grāmān nir diśo jahi || yathā parasvāṃ chardhate gardabhaḥ kṛdhusandṛśaḥ | evā te śardhatāṃ bhasad dhālīkṣṇaparṇa śardhaya vṛtrahā śākī śardhaya || pavīraval lāṅgalaṃ suśevaṃ somapitsaram | tad ut kṛṣati gām aviṃ prapharvyaṃ ca pīvarīṃ prastāvaṃ rathavāhanam || śunaṃ varatrām ā yaccha śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya | śunaṃ vāhasya yuktasya- -aṣṭrayā jahi dakṣiṇam || madhumantaṃ ni gṛhāṇa phālaṃ kṣetreṣu sarvadā | tat parjanyo 'bhi varṣatu bhūmne dhānyāya kartave || etā u tyā adṛkṣata- -āyatīr vedyām adhi | Bhatt. adṛ(⟨ nṛ)kṣarā (ā) yatīr prāhāgnir havyaṃ devebhyo mantro hotā haviṣpatiḥ || Bhatt. mandro emā agur mayobhuvo madhor ūdhāṃsi bibhratīḥ | tā upa pra śikṣata duhānā akṣitaṃ payaḥ || iḍā stha madhupṛco viśvarūpās tā mā viśata | saha prāṇena tejasā harasā balena ||
divo nabhaḥ śukraṃ payo duhānā- -rtasya nābhir amṛtaṃ vi caṣṭe || ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītām ūrjaṃ duhānā anapasphurantīm | upāsatāṃ sukṛtaḥ svadhābhiḥ || ghṛtam iccha pinvamānām Bhatt. (⟨ ghṛtam utsaṃ) imāṃ yonim upādhvam | svadhā yāś cakṛṣe jīvan Bhatt. jīvaṃ (⟨ n) tās te santu madhuścutaḥ || saṃ rasā oṣadhīnāṃ sam ākūtīr namantu me | ūrjasvantaṃ payasvantaṃ pṛthivyā hastam anv agām || pariṇītir asi hastasya pathaḥ pariṇītir asi | evā ha duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ stambe pari ṇayāmasi || payasvan me kṣetram astu payasvad uta dhānyam | kṛṣiḥ payasvatī mama- -ahaṃ payasvān bhūyāsam || vṛṣṇe bṛhate svarvide 'gnaye śuklaṃ harāmi tviṣīmate | sa na sthirān balavataḥ kṛṇotu Bhatt. sa naḥ jyok ca no jīvātave dadhātu || veda vai te 'gne nāma- -adbhir nāmāsi trivarūthaḥ | trayaḥ poṣās trivṛd asmān yajñaḥ sacatām || prajāpateḥ payasā vāvṛdhānā Bhatt. vāvṛdhānāv (⟨ ā) āyuṣmanto varcasvinaḥ | jyog jīvanta upa tvā sadema || urūṇasāv asutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janām̐ anu | vedāhaṃ veda sūryaḥ kim etau kiṃ kariṣyataḥ || na mā dadambha dabhasādabhīyaṃ na pāko asmi januṣā na śiṣyaḥ | abhīṣāḍ asmi viśvāṣāṭ pṛtanāṣāṭ svarvid yad idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ so asmi || āsthād ud asthād ajaniṣṭa vipro 'mimīta varimāṇaṃ pṛthivyāḥ | āsīdat saṃrāḍ bhuvanāni viśvā sa icchā veda varuṇasya vratāni || Bhatt. (icchā ⟨ itthād) prajāpatiḥ prajāvān sa mā prajāvān prajāvantaṃ kṛṇotu || sūryo varcasvān sa mā varcasvān varcasvantaṃ kṛṇotu || somaḥ payasvān sa mā payasvān payasvantaṃ kṛṇotu || triṃśan muṣkāḥ kābavasya daśa muṣkā ulūkyāḥ | catvāras tava kardama || tāṃs tvam ugrakāśini mūle api kṛntatāt | āsuro 'si janmanā taṃ tveto nāśayāmasi || indrajā asi somajās taṃ tveto niṣ pra hiṇmasi | Bhatt. tan urvā matsyo madhūdakaṃ tasya pāsy atyayam anāsrāvam arogaṇam ||
anuvāka 13 ||
iṣirā cāsy ajirā cāsi | prajāpateḥ samid asi saṃsitir nāma lomaśā | prajāpatiṣ ṭvayā pratiṣṭhākāmo 'ruruta sa praty atiṣṭhat | sa yathā tvayā prajāpatiḥ pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ pratyatiṣṭhad evāhaṃ tvayā pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ prati tiṣṭheṣam | ā mā varo gamed ā mā brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || bhūtiś cāsi pratiṣṭhā cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef asvapnā cāsy anilayā cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef ruciś cāsi yakṣaṃ cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef kīrtiś cāsi yaśaś cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef ambhaś cāsi mahaś cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef annaṃ cāsy annādyaṃ cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef prayacchantī cāsi pradadatī cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef anukāmā cāsi kāmadughā cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef āharantī cāsi samāharantī cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef diśantī cāsi pradiśantī cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef anumatiś cāsy anumanyamānā cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef jitiś cāsi vijitiś cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef sañjitiś cāsi sandhanājitaṃ cāsi | prajāpateḥ (…) brahmacāriṇo gameyuḥ svāhā || see 1bcdef agniḥ pṛthivyā adhipatiḥ somas tvāvatu vidma tvā viddhi mā | adhipatir asy adhipatiṃ mā kṛṇu gavām aśvānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ bhūtyā annādyasya || vāyur antarikṣasyādhipatiḥ somas (…) annādyasya || see 15bcd sūryo divo adhipatiḥ somas tvāvatu vidma tvā viddhi mā | adhipatir asy adhipatiṃ mā kṛṇu gavām aśvānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ bhūtyā annādyasya || vindad vasavo vindantu me gṛhān prajāṃ paśūn vittiṃ bhūtiṃ pratiṣṭhām || āyadvasava ā yantu me gṛhāḥ prajāḥ paśavo vittir bhūtiḥ pratiṣṭhā || saṃyad vasavaḥ saṃ yantu me gṛhāḥ | Bhatt. vasavo; K vasavas prajāḥ paśavo vittir bhūtiḥ pratiṣṭhā || jitir asi jīyāsaṃ pārthvīḥ pṛtanā jīyāsam || vijitir asi vi jeṣīya mānuṣīḥ pṛtanā jīyāsam || saṃjitir asi saṃ jīyāsaṃ sarvāḥ pṛtanā jīyāsam ||
