bodhayainaṃ pra bodhaya svaptave mānu manyathāḥ | ūrdhvas tiṣṭhān mamādhyā nānyāsāṃ kīrtayāś cana || ā vartaya ni vartaya- -abhy ā vartayā kuru | idam asya sarvā cittāni smareṇa pra jayāmasi || smaraṃ tapanti marutaḥ samiddhe jātavedasi | ud asya patatāṃ manas tad asya ramatāṃ mayi || gaṇapate gaṇapatiṃ mā kṛṇu tasmān mā yavam || apigaṇāpigaṇaṃ mā kṛṇu tasmān mā chitsi || sagaṇa sagaṇaṃ mā kṛṇu tasmān mā naśam || gaṇavardhana gaṇaṃ me vardhaya gavām aśvānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ bhūtyā annādyasya || gaṇābhivardhana gaṇaṃ me 'bhi vardhaya gavām (…) annādyasya || see 7b gaṇapravardhana gaṇaṃ me pra vardhaya gavām aśvānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ brahmacāriṇām bhūtyā annādyasya || yac ca khātaṃ yac cākhātaṃ sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ viṣam || yac ca piṣṭaṃ yac cāpiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ viṣam || yac ca digdhaṃ yac cādigdhaṃ sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ viṣam || yathā vṛkī jagdhaputrā vyāghrī vālalā bhavet | evā tvam alalā bhava- -ādhībhiḥ preṣito mama || yathā dīptaṃ śaratūlam agninālalā bhavet | evā tvam alalā bhava- -ādhībhiḥ preṣito mama || ā krandayālalā bhava Bhatt. krandaya lalā dasya kāmena śuṣya ca | Bhatt. hasya ādhībhiḥ preṣito mama ||
yayoḥ sarvam idam ārpitaṃ vaśe bhūtaṃ ca nimiṣac ca ceṣṭat | Bhatt. ceṣṭata(⟨ ceṣṭat) tau mā vadantaṃ gṛhṇītām upadraṣṭāram atra māsyoc cheṣy ayathāvat prajāpate || yo mā vadantaṃ hṛdayena vācā vācā śrotreṇa manasā jihṛkṣāt | tam indro devo varuṇo bṛhaspatir īśāno devo abhi yātu mṛtyur yathā na jīvād uṣasaṃ tṛtīyām || Bhatt. tṛtīyān (⟨ -yām) yo mā jihṛkṣād brahmīyān manyamāna itthaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ pramatir matīnām | tam indro devo varuṇo bṛhaspatir īśāno devo abhi yātu mṛtyur yathā na jīvād uṣasaṃ tṛtīyām || pratyagvadhenāsyāpi dadhāmi prāṇaṃ mo dānaṃ vidata yo mā jihṛkṣāt | so asyāyur ā chinattu kuliśeneva vṛkṣaṃ yathā na jīvād uṣasaṃ tṛtīyām || yasyā akṣaram ekam eva paraḥ sahasrā ayutaṃ ca śākhāḥ | tasyā vāco vidathāvadantaṃ yo mā jihṛkṣāt sa nv etv ārtim || uṣā vā ādityam aindha sa uṣaseddha ud ait sa udyan prajābhya ātapat Bhatt. uṣasedya so 'pa tamo 'hata so 'nnādyam avārundha | apa tamo hate 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda || vāto vā agnim aindha sa vāteneddho 'jvalat so 'dīpyata so 'pa tamo 'hata so 'nnādyam avārundha | apa tamo hate 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda || manomayī brāhmaṇam aindha Bhatt. (⟨ mano vai) sa brahmacaryam avasat sa vedam anv abrūta so 'pa tamo 'hata so 'nnādyam avārundha | apa tamo hate 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda || homena pratiran prajāpate dampatī pari dadhāmi puṣṭyā | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ni yaccha jarāmṛtyū kṛṇuhi sarvavīrau || ayaṃ homo vardhayann etu dampatī prajāvantau paśuvantau suvīrau | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ni yaccha jarāmṛtyū kṛṇuhi sarvavīrau || gomantaṃ paśumantam aśvamantaṃ homaṃ dampatībhyāṃ juhomi | rāyaspoṣaṃ savitar ni yaccha jarāmṛtyū kṛṇuhi sarvavīrau || jīvā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam || upajīvā sthopa jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam || saṃjīvā stha saṃ jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam || jīvalā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam || prajāpater ākūtir asi sāhasrī puṣṭiḥ | prajāpater ākūtyāhaṃ sāhasryā puṣṭyā sāhasrān paśūn puṣeyam || bṛhaspater ākūtiḥ (…) | bṛhaspater ākūtyā (…) || brahmaṇa ākūtir asi sāhasrī puṣṭiḥ | brahmaṇa ākūtyāhaṃ sāhasryā puṣṭyā sāhasrān paśūn puṣeyam ||
virāḍ asi virājaṃ mā kṛṇu tasyās te yaśo bhakṣīya || svarāḍ asi svarājaṃ mā kṛṇu tasyās te madhu bhakṣīya || samrāḍ asi samrājaṃ mā kṛṇu tasyās te annaṃ bhakṣīya || vīryāvatā te haviṣā juhomi jīvātave na martave | dakṣaṃ te bhadram āhārṣaṃ parā suvāmy āmayat || abhivīreṇa te (…) || see 4abcd suvīreṇa te (…) || see 4abcd sarvavīreṇa te haviṣā juhomi jīvātave na martave | dakṣaṃ te bhadram āhārṣaṃ parā suvāmy āmayat || prajāvatā te haviṣā juhomi garbham ā dhatsva yonyām | Bhatt. garmam sa kāle jāyatāṃ punar daśame māsi sūtave || suprajasā te (…) || see 8abcd suputreṇa te haviṣā juhomi garbham ā dhatsva yonyām | sa kāle jāyatāṃ punar daśame māsi sūtave || bhūtaye te haviṣā juhomi- -imaṃ devāso abhi hiṅ karātha | asminn eva paśavaḥ saṃ viśantu catuṣpāda uta vā ye dvipādaḥ || vittaye te (…) || see 11abcd svṛddhena te (…) || see 11abcd samṛddhena te haviṣā juhomi- -imaṃ devāso abhi hiṅ karātha | asminn eva paśavaḥ saṃ viśantu catuṣpāda uta vā ye dvipādaḥ || kṣemyeṇa te haviṣā juhomi kṣemyo bhavāsi paśubhiś ca vīraiḥ | indrāgnī tvā sayujā sakhāyau viśvebhir devair anu saṃ dadetām || pratiṣṭhitena te haviṣā juhomi prati tiṣṭhāsi paśubhiḥ (…) || see 15bcd sambhūtena te haviṣā juhomi saṃ bhavāsi paśubhiḥ (…) || see 15bcd prabhūtena te haviṣā juhomi pra bhavāsi paśubhiś ca vīraiḥ | indrāgnī tvā sayujā sakhāyau viśvebhir devair anu saṃ dadetām ||
anuvāka 14 ||
Kāṇḍa 20
PSK 20.1.1 dhītī vā ye anayan vāco agraṃ manasā vā ye avadann ṛtāni | tṛtīyena brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānās turīyeṇa manvata nāma dhenoḥ || PSK 20.1.2 sa veda putraḥ pitaraṃ sa mātaraṃ sa sūnur bhavat sa bhavat punarmaghaḥ | sa dyām aurṇod antarikṣaṃ sa svar viśvā bhuvo abhavat sa ābhavat || PSK 20.1.3 atharvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ viśvadevaṃ mātur garbhaṃ pitaraṃ saṃyuvānam | ya īṃ ciketāmṛtasya dhāman nityasya rāyaḥ paridhīṃr apaśyat || PSK 20.1.4 śivās ta ekā aśivās ta ekāḥ sarvā bibharṣy ahṛṇīyamānaḥ | guhā vāco nihitās tisra etā eked idaṃ vi babhūvānu sarvam || PSK 20.1.5 aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam aditir mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ | viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam || PSK 20.1.6 diteḥ putrāṇām aditer akāriṣaṃ mahāśarmaṇāṃ mahatām anarmaṇām | teṣāṃ hi dhāma gabhiṣak samudryaṃ naiṣāṃ vepasaḥ paro asti kiṃ cana || PSK 20.1.7 vājasya nu prasave mātaraṃ mahīm aditir nāma vacasā karāmahe | yasyām idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam āviveśa sā no devī suhavā śarma yacchatu || PSK 20.1.8 mahīm ū ṣu mātaraṃ suvratānām ṛtasya patnīm avase huvema | tuvikṣatrām ajarantīm urūcīṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim || PSK 20.1.9 sutrāmāṇaṃ pṛthivīṃ dyām anehasaṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim | daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrām anāgaso asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye || PSK 20.1.10 ekayā ca daśabhiś cā suhūte dvābhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatyā ca | tisṛbhiś ca vahase triṃśatā ca viyugbhir vāyav iha tā vi muñca ||
PSK 20.2.1 ayā viṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇi sa hi ghṛṇir urur varāya gātuḥ | sa praty ud aid varuṇo madhvo agraṃ svāṃ yat tanūṃ tanvām airayata || PSK 20.2.2 yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan | te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacante yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ || PSK 20.2.3 yajño babhūva sa ā babhūva sa pṛthivyā adhipatir babhūva | sa pra jajñe sa u vāvṛdhe punaḥ so asmāsu draviṇam ā dadhātu || not found in PSK devā yad devān haviṣāyajant- -āyajanta -āmartiyān manasāmartyena | bravāma tatra parame vyoman vadema tad uditau sūryasya || not found in PSK mugdhā devā uta śunāyajant- -āyajanta -ota gor aṅgair bahudhāyajanta | ya imaṃ yajñaṃ manasānvavindat pra ṇo vocat tam iheha bravāma || not found in PSK yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata | kva svit tad adya no brūyād yadi havyenejire || not found in PSK indraḥ sutrāmā svavām̐ avobhiḥ sumṛḍīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ | bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma || not found in PSK sa sutrāmā svavām̐ indro asmad ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyota | tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasy- yajñiyasya -āpi bhadre saumanase syāma || not found in PSK yas te pṛthu stanayitnur ya ṛṣvo yo daivaḥ ketur viśvam ābhūṣatīdam | mṛḍayā no vidyutā deva sasyāya mota vadhī raśmibhiḥ sūryasya || not found in PSK yas te stanaḥ śasayur yo mayobhūr yaḥ sumnayuḥ suhavo yaḥ sudakṣaḥ | yena viśvā vanasi vāryāṇi sarasvatī tam iha dhātave kaḥ ||
not found in PSK idaṃ te havyaṃ ghṛtavat sarasvat- sarasvati -īdaṃ pitṝṇāṃ havirāsyaṃ yat | imāni ta uditā śaṃtamāni tebhir vayaṃ maghavānaḥ syāma || not found in PSK prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ | ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan || not found in PSK pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmām̐ abhayatamena neṣat | svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro +'prayucchan pura etu prajānan || not found in PSK pūṣā gā anv etu naḥ pūṣā rakṣatv arvataḥ | pūṣā vājaṃ sanotu naḥ || not found in PSK pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana | stotāras ta iha smasi || not found in PSK śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaur ivāsi | viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣann iha rātir astu || ab: not found in PSK; cd= PSK 20.2.4cd dhātā dadhātu dāśuṣe prāñcaṃ jīvātum akṣitam | vayaṃ devasya dhīmahi sumatiṃ satyadharmaṇaḥ || PSK 20.2.5 dhātā viśvāni dāśuṣe dadhātu prajākāmāya dāśuṣe duroṇe | tasya prajā amṛtāḥ saṃ vyayantu viśve devāso aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ || PSK 20.2.6 dhātā rātiḥ savitedaṃ juṣantāṃ prajāpatir nidhipatir no agniḥ | tvaṣṭā pūṣā prajayā saṃrarāṇo yajamānāya draviṇaṃ dadhātu || PSK 20.2.7 dhātā prajānām uta rāya īśe dhātedaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna | saṃ dāśuṣe vahatu bhūri puṣṭā tasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema ||
PSK 20.3.1 sāvīr hi deva prathamāya pitre varṣmāṇam asmai varimāṇam asmai | athāsmabhyaṃ savitar vāryāṇi dvedve ā suvā bhūri paśvaḥ || PSK 20.3.2 bhadrād adhi śreyaḥ prehi bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu | athemam asyā vara ā pṛthivyā āreśatruṃ kṛṇuhi sarvavīram || PSK 20.3.3 damūnā devaḥ savitā vareṇyo dadhad ratnaṃ dakṣaṃ pitṛbhya āyūṃṣi | pibāt somaṃ mamadad enam iṣṭe parijmā cid ramate asya dharmaṇi || PSK 20.3.4 tāṃ savituḥ satyasavasya citrāṃ vayaṃ devasya prasave vanāmahe | yām asya kaṇvo aduhat prapīnāṃ sahasradhārāṃ mahiṣo bharāya || PSK 20.3.5 ko no asyā druho 'vadyavatyā un neṣati kṣatriyo vasya icchan | kaḥ pūrtikāmaḥ ka u yajñakāmaḥ ko deveṣu vanute dīrgham āyuḥ || PSK 20.3.6 kaḥ pṛśniṃ dhenuṃ varuṇena dattām atharvaṇe sudughāṃ nityavatsām | tāṃ bṛhaspatyā sakhyā duhāno yathāvaśaṃ tanvaḥ kalpayāti || PSK 20.3.7 na ghraṃs tatāpa na himo jaghāna pra sarsṛte pṛthivī jīradānuḥ | āpaś cid asmai sadam it kṣaranti yatra somaḥ sadam it tatra bhadram || PSK 20.3.8 yasyā idaṃ pradiśi yad virocate anumatiṃ prati bhūṣanty āyavaḥ | yasyā upastha urv antarikṣaṃ sā naḥ śarma bahulaṃ ni yacchāt || PSK 20.3.9 anv adya no anumatir yajñaṃ deveṣu yacchatām | agniś ca havyavāhano bhavatāṃ dāśuṣe mayaḥ || PSK 20.3.10 anv id anumate tvaṃ maṃsase śaṃ ca nas kṛdhi | iṣaṃ tokāya no dadhaḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣaḥ ||
PSK 20.4.1 anu manyatām anumanyamānā prajāvatīṣam akṣīyamāṇam | tasyā vayaṃ heḍasi mā vi bhūma sā no devī suhavā śarma yacchatu || PSK 20.4.2 anumate anu manyasva tā no yā te vayaṃ cakṛmā yā tanūbhiḥ | yā tokeṣu tanuṣu yā prajāyāṃ yā goṣv oṣadhīṣv apsv antaḥ || PSK 20.4.3 ā no devy anumatir jagamyāt sukṣatratāvīratā yā sujātā | bhadrā hy asyāḥ pramatir babhūva semaṃ yajñam avatu devajuṣṭam || PSK 20.4.4 anumatir viśvam idaṃ jajāna yad ejati carati yac ca tiṣṭhati | tasyās te devi sumatau syām- syāma -ānumate anu hi maṃsase naḥ || PSK 20.4.5 yat te nāma suhavaṃ supraṇīte anumate anumataṃ sudānu | tena tvaṃ sumatiṃ devy asmā iṣaṃ pinva viśvavāraṃ suvīram || PSK 20.4.6 prajābhyas tvā prajās tvānu prāṇantu prajā anu prāṇihi | śukraṃ te śukreṇa candraṃ candreṇāmṛtam amṛtena krīṇāmi || PSK 20.4.7 tapasas tanūr asi prajāpater varṇaḥ | parameṇa paśunā krīyase || PSK 20.4.8 abhi tyaṃ devaṃ savitāram oṇyoḥ kavikratum | arcāmi satyasavaṃ ratnadhām abhi priyaṃ matim || PSK 20.4.9 ūrdhvā yasyāmatir bhā adidyutat savīmani | hiraṇyapāṇir amimīta sukratuḥ kṛpā svaḥ || PSK 20.4.10 ayaṃ sahasramānṛṣiḥ kavīnāṃ matir jyotir vidharmaṇi | bradhnaḥ samīcīr uṣasaḥ sam īrayāt ||
PSK 20.5.1 arepasaḥ sacetasaḥ svasare manyumattamāḥ | cite goḥ || PSK 20.5.2 sam eta viśvā ojasā patiṃ divo ya eka id bhūr atithir janānām | sa pūrvyo nūtanam āvivāsan taṃ vartanir anu vavṛta ekam it puru || PSK 20.5.3 kuhūṃ devīm amṛtāṃ vidmanāpasam asmin yajñe suhavāṃ johavīmi | yā no dadāti śravaṇaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tasyai te devi haviṣā vidhema || PSK 20.5.4 kuhūr devānām amṛtasya patnī havyā no asya haviṣaḥ śṛṇotu | saṃ dāśuṣe kiratu bhūri puṣṭā rāyaspoṣaṃ cikituṣe dadhātu || PSK 20.5.5 saṃ jānīdhvaṃ saṃ pṛcyadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām | mitro vaḥ sarvāḥ saṃ sṛjān mayi saṃjñānam astu vaḥ ||
anuvāka 1 ||
PSK 20.6.1 yan no agnir asanad yan na indro viśve yad devā marutaḥ svarkāḥ | tad asmabhyaṃ savitā satyadharmā sarasvaty anumatir ni yacchāt || PSK 20.6.2 yūyaṃ no devā ubhayāya vedase śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade | adat pibad ūrjayamānam āśitaṃ tad asmabhyaṃ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta || PSK 20.6.3 bṛhaspate savitar bodhayainaṃ saṃśitaṃ cit saṃtaraṃ saṃ śiśādhi | vardhayainaṃ mahate saubhagāya viśva enam anu madanti devāḥ || PSK 20.6.4 amutrabhūyād adhi yad yamasya bṛhaspatir abhiśastyā amuñcata | prati mṛtyum auhatām aśvinā te devānām agne bhiṣajā śacībhiḥ || PSK 20.6.5 indrāvaruṇā sutapāv imaṃ sutaṃ madyaṃ somaṃ pibataṃ dhṛtavratā | yuvo ratho adhvaraṃ devavītaye prati svasaram upa yāti pītaye || PSK 20.6.6 indrāvaruṇā madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām | idaṃ vām asme pariṣiktam andha āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayethām || PSK 20.6.7 uru viṣṇo vi kramasv- kramasva -oru kṣayāya niṣ kṛdhi | ghṛtaṃ ghṛtayone piba pra pra yajñapatiṃ tira || PSK 20.6.8 divo viṣṇa uta vā pṛthivyā uror vā viṣṇo maho antarikṣāt | ubhā hi hastau madhunā pṛṇasv- pṛṇasva -āprayaccha dakṣiṇād ota savyāt || PSK 20.6.9 viṣṇor nū kaṃ pra vocaṃ vīryāṇi yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṃsi | yo askabhāyad uttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ vicakramāṇas tredhorugāyaḥ || PSK 20.6.10 pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryāṇi mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ | yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣv adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā ||
PSK 20.7.1 agnāviṣṇū mahi dhāma priyaṃ vāṃ pātaṃ ghṛtasya guhyāni nāma | damedame sapta ratnā dadhān- dadhānā -opa vāṃ jihvā ghṛtam ā caraṇyāt || PSK 20.7.2 agnāviṣṇū mahi tad vāṃ mahitvaṃ vītaṃ ghṛtasya guhyā juṣāṇā | damedame suṣṭutyā vāvṛdhānā prati vāṃ jihvā ghṛtam uc caraṇyāt || PSK 20.7.3 un nambhaya pṛthivīṃ bhindhīdaṃ divyaṃ nabhaḥ | ūdhno divyasya no dhātar īśāno vi ṣyā bilam || PSK 20.7.4 apakrāman pauruṣeyād gṛṇāno daivyaṃ sahaḥ | praṇītīr abhyāvartasva devo devānāṃ sakhyā juṣāṇaḥ || PSK 20.7.5 pitor ahaṃ pitupatiṃ tad īḍe dhātā vidhartā bhuvaneṣv eṣu | nemena mahyaṃ madhumām̐ ihaidhi nemenāmuṣmai viṣuvān nv edhi || PSK 20.7.6; the refrain (= pādas cd) is not written ayaṃ pitoḥ pitumān ābhṛtas par- pari -īdaṃ śṛṇotu yad ahaṃ bravīmi | nemena mahyaṃ madhumām̐ ihaidhi nemenāmuṣmai viṣuvān nv edhi || PSK 20.7.7 atraivainaṃ nirṛta ā rabhasv- rabhasva -ātraivainaṃ nirṛte pra kṣiṇīhy atraivainaṃ sarva vi vṛśca | nemena mahyaṃ madhumām̐ ihaidhi nemenāmuṣmai viṣuvān nv edhi || PSK 20.7.8 yat tvā pita upabruve tan ma ā śṛṇv asmin me have havyo yathāsaḥ | amuṃ devair nirṛtiḥ saṃvidān- saṃvidānā -āmuṃ chinatti varuṇasya pāśāt || PSK 20.7.9 yad asmṛti cakṛmā kiṃ cid ena upārima caraṇair jātavedaḥ | tasmāt pāhi tvaṃ naḥ pracetaḥ śubhe sakhibhyo amṛtatvam asmān || PSK 20.7.10 agne 'dhyakṣo na ehi pāhi no duritāt pāhi duṣvapnyāt | āsanyād anyād yakṣmān naḥ pāhi ||
PSK 20.8.1 tviṣir asi tviṣivanto bhūyāsma | cakṣuṣmanto gomantaḥ prajāvanto varcasvinaḥ || PSK 20.8.2 yad ahnā saṃcinutha kṣīraṃ bharathodhabhiḥ | idaṃ tad viśvarūpā vaḥ payo harāmi vīrudhā || PSK 20.8.3 yad aghnyā oṣadhībhyo 'dbhyaḥ saṃbharathā madhu | idaṃ tad viśvarūpā vaḥ kṣīraṃ harāmy oṣadhyā || PSK 20.8.4 yo abhyavabhṛṇāyasi svapantam iccha pūruṣaṃ śayānam akasvalam | ayasmayena varmaṇ- varmaṇā -āśmamayena varmaṇā pary asmān varuṇo dadhat || PSK 20.8.5 ye no gṛhe brāhmaṇā manyamānā ghorāṃ vācaṃ mithuyānubruvanti | enohṛto malahṛto bhavantu duryoṇam asmat pari te harantu || PSK 20.8.6 ayam agniḥ satpatir vṛddhavṛṣṇiyo rathīva patyai na janayat purohitaḥ | nābhā pṛthivyā nihito davidyutad adhaspadaṃ kṛṇutāṃ ye pṛtanyavaḥ || PSK 20.8.7 agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu | saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi || not found in PSK dṛṣṭo damūnā atithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upa yāhi vidvān | viśvā hy agne abhiyujo vihatya śatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni || PSK 20.8.8 agne sapatnān pra ṇudasva jātān praty ajātāñ jātavedo nudasva | adhi no brūhi sumanasyamānaḥ śarma no yaccha trivarūtham udbhit || PSK 20.8.9 prānyān sapatnān sahasā sahasva praty ajātāñ jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi | idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pipṛhi saubhagāy- saubhagāya -ānu tvā devā vasavo madantām ||
PSK 20.9.1 yo no mitrāvaruṇābhidāsāt sapatno votpipāno bṛhaspate | sarvaṃ tam agne adharaṃ pātayāsmad yathendrāham uttamaś cetayāni || PSK 20.9.2 aham eṣām uttamaś cetayāni mama vaśam upa tiṣṭhantu sarve | ājuhvāno ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ suvarcā vasor madhye dīdihi jātavedaḥ || PSK 20.9.3 amum agne adharaṃ pātayāsmaj jāsayotpipānaṃ sapatnam | ye no dhūrvān adhare te bhavantu viśvā dveṣāṃsy abhito ni mṛḍḍhi || PSK 20.9.4 mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyā viśas tvā sarvā balihṛta upāsatām | tāsām ugro madhyameṣṭheyam asyā sve kṣetre saviteva vi rāja || PSK 20.9.5 ā pratyañcaṃ dāśuṣe dāśvāṃsaṃ sarasvantaṃ puṣṭipatiṃ rayīṇām | rāyaspoṣaṃ śravasyaṃ vasānam iha huvema sadanaṃ rayīṇām || PSK 20.9.6 yasya vrate paśavo yanti sarve yasya vrata upatiṣṭhanta āpaḥ | yasya vrate puṣṭipatir niviṣṭas taṃ sarasvantam avase huvema || PSK 20.9.7 ye te sarasvann ūrmayo madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ | tebhir no 'vitā bhuvaḥ || PSK 20.9.8 divyaṃ samudraṃ payasaṃ bṛhantam apāṃ garbhaṃ vṛṣabham oṣadhīnām | abhīpato rayyā tarpayantaṃ sarasvantaṃ rayiṣṭhāṃ sādayeha || PSK 20.9.9 indrasya kukṣir asi somadhāna ātmā devānām uta viśvarūpaḥ | iha prajā janaya yās ta āsu yā anyatreha tās te svadhito gṛṇantu || PSK 20.9.10 śyenaḥ suparṇo divyo nṛcakṣāḥ sahasrapāc chatayonir vayodhāḥ | sa no ni yacchād vasu yat parābhṛtam asmākam astu pitṛṣu svadhāvat ||
PSK 20.10.1 ati dhanvāny aty apas tatarda śyeno nṛcakṣā avasānadarśaḥ | taran viśvāvarā rajāṃs- rajāṃsi -īndreṇa sakhyā śiva ā jagāma || PSK 20.10.2 āgan devaḥ savitā sarvadhāyā urujyotir avidāmā namobhiḥ | mahīṃ nāvam aditer ā ruhema yatra somaḥ sadam it tatra bhadram || PSK 20.10.3; PS 5.6.9 is repeated ud vayam ity ekā || PSK 20.10.4 patir divaḥ patir agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ patir viśvasya bhuvanasya rājati | patir viśvā oṣadhīr ā viveśa patnīvān agna iha yāhi somam || PSK 20.10.5 saṃ krāmataṃ mā jahītaṃ śarīraṃ prāṇāpānau sayujeha stam | saptaṛṣibhyaḥ pari dadma etaṃ Bhatt. dadhma ta enaṃ svasti jarase nayantu || PSK 20.10.6 yat ta āyur atihitaṃ parācair apānaḥ prāṇo ya u te paretaḥ | agniṣ ṭad āhār nirṛter upasthāt tad ātmani punar ā veśayāmi || PSK 20.10.7 mā tvā prāṇo hāsīd yas tve praviṣṭo mā tvāpāno 'vahāya parā gāt | saṃrabhya jīva śaradaḥ suvarcā agniṣ ṭe gopā adhipā vasiṣṭhaḥ || PSK 20.10.8 rākām ahaṃ suhavāṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā | sīvyatv apaḥ sūcyācchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ śatadāyam ukthyam || PSK 20.10.9 yās te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhir dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni | tābhir no adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrapoṣaṃ subhage rarāṇā || PSK 20.10.10 yā rākā yā sinīvālī yā guṅgūr yā sarasvatī | indrāṇīm ahva ūtaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye || PSK 20.10.11 yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ suṣumā bahusūvarī | tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana || PSK 20.10.12 sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā | juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ || PSK 20.10.13 yā viśvata indram asi pratīcī sahasrastutām abhi yantu devīḥ | viṣṇupatni tubhyaṃ rātā havīṃṣi patiṃ devi rādhasā codayasva ||
anuvāka 2 ||
PSK 20.11.1-3; PS 16.68.4-6 are repeated upa hvaya iti tisraḥ || PSK 20.11.2 (…) || PS 16.68.5 is repeated PSK 20.11.3 (…) || PS 16.68.6 is repeated PSK 20.11.4; PS 16.69.10 is repeated sūyavasād bhagavatīty ekā || PSK 20.11.5 saṃjānānā upa sīdān abhijñu patnīvanto namasyaṃ namasyān | ririkvāṃsas tanvā sumnam āyuḥ sakhet sakhyur nimiṣi rakṣamāṇāḥ || PSK 20.11.6 samiddho agnir aśvinā tapto vāṃ gharma ā gatam | duhyante nūnaṃ vṛṣaṇeha dhenavo dasrā vadanti kāravaḥ || PSK 20.11.7 samiddho agnir aśvinā rathī divas tapto gharmo duhyate vām iṣe madhu | vayaṃ hi vāṃ purutamāso aśvinā havāmahe sadhamādeṣu kāravaḥ || PSK 20.11.8 yad usriyāsv āhutaṃ ghṛtaṃ payo 'yaṃ so aśvinā vāṃ bhāga ā gatam | mādhvī dhartārā vidathasya satpatī taptaṃ gharmaṃ pibataṃ rocane divaḥ || PSK 20.11.9 tapto vāṃ gharmo nakṣati suhotā pra vām adhvaryuś carati payasvān | madhor dugdhasyāśvinā tanāyā vītaṃ pātaṃ payasa usriyāyāḥ || PSK 20.11.10 upa drava payasā godhug oṣum ā gharme siñca paya usriyāyāḥ | vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyo 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī supraṇītiḥ ||
PSK 20.12.1 svāhākṛtaḥ śucir deveṣu gharmo yo aśvinoś camaso devapānaḥ | tam u viśve amṛtāso juṣāṇā gandharvasya praty āsnā rihanti || PSK 20.12.2 sugā vo devāḥ sadanā kṛṇomi ya ātasthedaṃ savanaṃ juṣāṇāḥ | vahamānā bharamāṇā abhrā astaṃ gharmaṃ tam udātiṣṭhatānu || PSK 20.12.3 śivā naḥ śaṃtamā bhava sumṛḍīkā sarasvati | mā te yuyoma saṃdṛśaḥ || ab = PSK 20.12.4ab; cd are not found in PSK, which repeats PS 19.8.6cd instead upainaṃ devo agrabhīc camasena bṛhaspatiḥ | yajamānāya śundhata indra gīrbhir na ā bhara || PSK 20.12.5; PS 6.18.1 is repeated saṃ mā siñcantu maruta ity ekā || PSK 20.12.6 iḍaivāsmām̐ anu vastāṃ vratena yasyāḥ pade punate devayantaḥ | ghṛtapadī śakvarī somapṛṣṭh- somapṛṣṭhā -opa yajñam asthita vaiśvadevī || PSK 20.12.7; PS 18.78.7 is repeated drapsaś caskandety ekā || PSK 20.12.8 yas te drapsa skandati yas te aṃśur bāhucyuto dhiṣaṇāyā upasthāt | adhvaryor vā pari yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam || PSK 20.12.9 drapsaḥ patito viśvayaḥ pariśrutaḥ | ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase || PSK 20.12.10 yas te drapsaḥ patitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ dhānāsomaḥ parivāpaḥ karambhaḥ | ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu varcase ||
PSK 20.13.1; PS 5.30.1 is repeated payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vaca ity ekā || PSK 20.13.2 ayam agnir vareṇya āyuṣ ṭe viśvato dadhat | punas tvā prāṇa āyati parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te || PSK 20.13.3 janād viśvajanīnaṃ viśām urukṣitīnām | dūrāt tvā manya ābhṛtam īrṣyāyā nāma bheṣajam || ab: not found in PSK, cd = PSK 20.13.4ab dūrād etat saṃ bharant- bharanti -īrṣyāyā nāma bheṣajam | tat saṃvegasya bheṣajaṃ tad aśnā saṃgṛbhāyikam || PSK 20.13.4cd5 agner iva dahato dāvasya dahato yathā | etām etasyerṣyāṃ hṛda udnāgnim iva vāraye || PSK 20.13.6 apa mārjmy apanayan manyuṃ te hṛdayād adhi | amuṣminn īrṣyām ā dadhmas tatro enāṃ ni dadhmasi || Kubisch tato (sandhi?) PSK 20.13.7 tiraścirājer asitāt pṛdākor adhi saṃbhṛtam | tat kaṅkaparvaṇo viṣam iyaṃ vīrud adūduṣat || PSK 20.13.8 iyaṃ vīrun madhujātā madhuścun madhulā madhu sā vihrutasya bheṣajy atho maśakajambhanī || PSK 20.13.9 yato daṣṭaṃ yataḥ pītaṃ tatas tvā nir ṇayāmasi | abhryasya tṛpradaṃśino maśakasyārasaṃ viṣam || PSK 20.13.10 ayaṃ yo vikhyo vikaṭo viparvā mukhāny eṣāṃ vṛjinā kṛṇoṣi | tāni tvaṃ deva savitar iṣīkām iva saṃ namaḥ ||
PSK 20.14.1 yad annam admi bahudhā virūpaṃ hiraṇyam aśvam uta gām ajām avim | yad eva kiṃ ca pratijagrahāham agniṣ ṭad viśvād agadaṃ kṛṇotu || PSK 20.14.2 yad āśasā me carato janām̐ anu yācamānasya vadato vicukṣubhe | yan me tanvo manaso viriṣṭaṃ sarasvatī tad ā pṛṇād ghṛtena || PSK 20.14.3 yad ārima pratigṛhṇanta enaḥ siṣāsanto balim agne carantaḥ | tvaṃ nas tasmād enaso mumugdhi vaiśvānaraḥ prati havyā gṛbhāya || PSK 20.14.4 cakṣuṣaḥ pāśān manasaś ca pāśād vīkṣāyāḥ pāśād uta śakvarīṇām | tasmān mumugdhi viśvāvaso tvaṃ no dātṝṇāṃ dānaṃ bhunajāmahai vayam || PSK 20.14.5 adur me viśve devā adāt savitedam | adān me brahmaṇaspatiḥ priyo mitro adād idam || PSK 20.14.6 indreṇa medinā yuj- yujā -āpa bādhe pṛtanyataḥ | adhare santu śatravaḥ || PSK 20.14.7 agnir indraś ca yad yuvaṃ hato vṛtrāṇy aprati | ugrā hi vṛtrahantamā || PSK 20.14.8 agnim indraṃ ca yad vayaṃ purodhāyai havāmahe | tau no mṛḍāta īdṛśe || PSK 20.14.9 yābhyāṃ svar ajayann agre yāv ātasthatur bhuvanā juṣāṇā | pracarṣaṇī vṛṣaṇā vajrabāhū agnim indraṃ vṛtrahaṇā huvema || PSK 20.14.10 yayor ojasā stabhitā rajāṃsi yau vīryair vīratamā śacībhiḥ | yau patyete apratītau sahobhir viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ ||
PSK 20.15.1 yayor apsu na mahimā nadīṣu praririce pradivi rocanāyām | yayor asty anumatir bhūyiṣṭhā viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ || PSK 20.15.2 yayor idaṃ pradiśi yad virocate prajām ati vi ca caṣṭe śacībhiḥ | mahaṛtasya dharmāṇā yuvānā viṣṇum agan varuṇaṃ pūrvahūtiḥ || PSK 20.15.3 ubhā jigyathur na parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraś canaiva vām | indraś ca viṣṇo yad apaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vi tad airayethām || PSK 20.15.4 yad aśuddhaṃ yad anṛtaṃ yac carāmasi pāpayā | āpo mā tasmād enaso duritāt pāntu viśvataḥ || PSK 20.15.5; PS 5.23.7 is repeated duṣvapnyaṃ durjīvitam ity ekā || PSK 20.15.6 yad avāmṛkṣata kṛṣṇaśakunir mukhena nirṛte tava | agniṣ ṭat sarvaṃ śundhatu havyavāḍ ghṛtasūdanaḥ || PSK 20.15.7 yad asmān kṛṣṇaśakuner niṣpatya tata ānaśe | āpo mā tasmād enaso duritāt pāntu viśvataḥ || PSK 20.15.8 agnir mā pātu prathamo durarmaṇo nirṛtyāṃ viśvā duritāni mṛjmahe | viśve mā devā marutaḥ punantu varuṇo rājā savitā pavitraiḥ || PSK 20.15.9 antarikṣeṇa patati yātudhānanibādhitaḥ | stokaṃ yam abhyacuścutat tam u syonaṃ kṛṇomi te || PSK 20.15.10 yat tvā kṛṣṇo abhyamṛkṣad devebhyas pari nirhataḥ | śivaṃ te tanve tat kṛṇmo vi te pāśāṃś cṛtāmasi ||
PSK 20.16.1 tṛṣṭike tṛṣṭivandana ud amuṃ chindhi tṛṣṭike | yathā kṛtadviṣṭe daśat sarvasmai śepyāvate || PSK 20.16.2 tṛṣṭāsi tṛṣṭikāsi viṣā viṣātaky asi | parivṛttā yathāsasy ṛṣabheṇa vaśeva || PSK 20.16.3 ā te dade vakṣaṇābhya ā dade hṛdayād adhi | ā te mukhasya yad varca ā puṃso yat titṛpsasi || PSK 20.16.4 mayi varco mayi śravo mayi dyumnaṃ mayi tviṣiḥ | ahaṃ te varca ā dade ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ||
anuvāka 3 ||
PSK 20.17.1 abhi prāgāt sahasrākṣo yuktvā śapatho ratham | śaptāram anvicchan yātu vṛka ivāvimato gṛham || PSK 20.17.2 pari ṇo vṛṅdhi śapatha hradam agnir iva dahan | śaptāram atra tvaṃ jahi divyā vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ || PSK 20.17.3 yo naḥ śapād aśapataḥ śapato yaś ca naḥ śapāt | vṛkṣa iva vidyutā hata ā mūlād anu śuṣyatu || PSK 20.17.4 śaptāraṃ yantu śapathā yaḥ suhārt tena naḥ saha | jihvāślakṣṇasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīr api śṛṇīmasi || PSK 20.17.5 yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭy aghāyur yaś ca naḥ śapāt | śune peṣṭram ivāvakṣāmaṃ taṃ praty asyāmi mṛtyave || PSK 20.17.6 preto yantu vyādhyaḥ prānudhyāḥ pro aśastayaḥ | agnī rakṣasvinīr hantu somo hantu durasyatīḥ || PSK 20.17.7 pra catetaḥ pāpi lakṣmi naśyetaḥ prāmutaḥ pata | ayasmayenāṅkena yaṃ dviṣmas tasmin tvā sṛjāmaḥ || PSK 20.17.8 yā tvā lakṣmīḥ patayālūr ajuṣṭ- ajuṣṭā -ādhicaskanda vandaneva vṛkṣam | anyatrāsmat savitas tām ito dhā hiraṇyahasto vasu no rarāṇaḥ || PSK 20.17.9 nir araṇīṃ savitā sāviṣat pador nir hastayor varuṇo mitro aryamā | nir ādityā anumatī rarāṇāḥ pra ṇaḥ suvāt savitā saubhagāya || PSK 20.17.10 ekaśataṃ lakṣmyaḥ sākaṃ martyasya januṣeha jātāḥ | tāsāṃ pāpiṣṭhā nir ataḥ pra hiṇmaḥ śivāsmabhyaṃ jātavedo ni yaccha ||
PSK 20.18.1 yat ta ātman tanvāṃ ghoram asti yad vā keśeṣu praticakṣaṇe vā | tat te vidvān apa bādhe ahaṃ pra tvā suvāt savitā saubhagāya || PSK 20.18.2 nir lakṣmyaṃ lalāmyaṃ nir arātiṃ suvāmasi | yathā no vasyasīd aso rāyaspoṣam ihā suva || PSK 20.18.3 agnim accha devayatāṃ manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣīva sūryaṃ saṃ caranti | yadī suvāte uṣasā virūpe śveto vājī jāyate agre ahnām || PSK 20.18.4 indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti | tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk || PSK 20.18.5 śakunir bhūtvā pra babhasti pippalaṃ patyāṃ niviṣṭā yadi vā gha patnyām | bhīmā ghorā lakṣmyaḥ sahabhavyās tā ito haviṣā nir yajāmaḥ || PSK 20.18.6 yā te gṛheṣūta vā dhaneṣu prajāṃ lakṣmīr yadi vā te babhasti | tāṃ bṛhaspatir haviṣā bādhamāno nirhūya pra dadhmāv adhi dūram asmat || PSK 20.18.7 riśyapadīṃ riśadvatīṃ goṣedhāṃ vidhamām uta | vilīḍhyaṃ vyādhyaṃ brahmaṇā tā anīnaśam || PSK 20.18.8 pratyoṣantīm utsaṅginīm uta cchidrām utāraṇīm | siṃhīṃ jyeṣṭhalakṣmīṃ vyāghrīṃ nāśayāmasi || PSK 20.18.9 anudhyāyinīṃ paricarāṃ vibādhām uta hiṃsatīm | rodasya patnīṃ rodhanāṃ pra tā dhamāmi lakṣmyaḥ || PSK 20.18.10 vāmaspṛhāṃ pitṛṣadaṃ yeṣantīṃ tapanīm uta | asidhyantīṃ pradhvaṃsinīm aṣṭrāvadhāṃ ca lakṣmyaṃ brahmaṇā tā anīnaśam ||
PSK 20.19.1 āsanmantryāṃ vacasyāṃ saṃpibantīṃ nyakvarīm | uttarāṃ janaṃgamāṃ pra tā dhamāmi lakṣmyaḥ || PSK 20.19.2 yā te ghorā tanvam āviveśa yā te lakṣmīḥ sarvā samaktā | agniṣ ṭe tāsv adatta saubhagāy- saubhagāya -āpaḥ śundhantu bṛhate raṇāya || PSK 20.19.3 adevṛghnīṃ varuṇ- varuṇa -āpatighnīṃ bṛhaspate | indrāputraghnīṃ lakṣmyam asyai tāḥ savitaḥ suva || PSK 20.19.4 yā te lakṣmīś cakṣuṣi yota datsu yā hastayo stanayor yopapakṣayoḥ | śroṇyor bhaṃsasi yā padoṣ ṭe sarvās tā ati krāma ghorāḥ || PSK 20.19.5 ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām | lakṣmīḥ śroṇibhyām aṅgebhyo yāḥ pāpīs tā anīnaśan || PSK 20.19.6 apāślīlaṃ pṛthivī hantu yat pador apa hastayor varuṇo mitro aryamā | apādityā anumatī rarāṇāḥ pra ṇaḥ suvāt savitā saubhagāya || PSK 20.19.7 etā enā vyākaran khile gā aditīr iva | ramantāṃ bhadrā lakṣmyo yāḥ pāpīs tā anīnaśan || PSK 20.19.8 sāhuṣī nāma vā asi sahamānā sahasvatī | gṛhaguptim anuvartiṃ kulāyinīṃ tā ihā veśayāmasi || PSK 20.19.9 ?saṃcāriṇy ubhair yā babhūv- babhūva -ānyā anyāṃ jinvati bhadrapāpīḥ | tāṃ lakṣmīṃ nihavā nayāmo bhadrā subhadrām api saubhagāya? || PSK 20.19.10 ekaśataṃ lakṣmyas tāsāṃ rājñī babhūvitha | bhadrābhir bhadre saṃbhūya bhadreṇābhi sacasva naḥ ||
PSK 20.20.1 divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣād vātāt paśubhyo adhy oṣadhībhyaḥ | yato lakṣmīr vṛjinā saṃbabhūva sā brahmaṇā pracyutā dūram etu || PSK 20.20.2 vālkutsasya ca gandhena hiraṇyavarcasena ca | āt puṣkariṇyā yo gandho bhago mā tena jinvatu || PSK 20.20.3 yad indro agre asurāñ jaghāna tato lakṣmīr ny adadhur martyeṣu | tāsāṃ pāpiṣṭhā nir ataḥ suvāmaḥ śivā asyai jātavedo ni yaccha || PSK 20.20.4 yā tvā lakṣmīr devṛghnī yā patighnī gṛhebhyas tvā nudate yā vyāḍā | atas tvam enaso mucyamān- mucyamānā -ot taremāḥ srotyāḥ sapta sākam || PSK 20.20.5 nipiṃśantīṃ nitudantīṃ saṃpibantīṃ nyakvarīm | prabhaṅgāṃ bhrūṇaghnīṃ lakṣmīṃ brahmaṇā tā anīnaśam || PSK 20.20.6 udojiṣṭhāṃ sahasyāṃ jayantīm aparājitām | lakṣmīr yāḥ puṇyāḥ kalyāṇīs tā asyai savitaḥ suva || PSK 20.20.7 lakṣmyaḥ sam alapsata sam alapsata lakṣmyaḥ | ajaiṣur bhadrā lakṣmyaḥ parā pāpīr ajeṣata || PSK 20.20.8 lakṣmīṇāṃ lakṣmītame lakṣmīṇām adhipā asi | tāṃ tvāhaṃ śuddho gopsyāmi devajā hi babhūvitha || PSK 20.20.9 sabhā ca mā samitiś cāvatāṃ prajāpater duhitarau sacetasau | yena saṃgacchā upa mā sa tiṣṭhād antar vadāni hṛdaye janānām || PSK 20.20.10 sabhā senā samitis tvām avantu prajāpater duhitaraḥ pracetasaḥ | yena vadāny upa mā sa śikṣād antar vadāni hṛdaye janānām ||
PSK 20.21.1 māṃ vadantam anu sarve vadantu māṃ prāṇantam anu prāṇantu sarve | māṃ viśantam anu sarve viśantu mayi devā ekavṛto bhavantu || PSK 20.21.2 sūryo mā cakṣuṣaḥ pātu bṛhaspatir vācaḥ somo rājā sabhāyāḥ | indro vo dṛśe bhavāmi || PSK 20.21.3 veda vai te sabhe nāma subhadrāsi sarasvati | atho ye te sabhāsadas te me santu suvācasaḥ || PSK 20.21.4 imā yā brahmaṇaspate viṣūcīr vāca īrate | sadhrīcīr indra tāḥ kṛtvā mahyaṃ śivatamāḥ kṛdhi || PSK 20.21.5 aham eṣāṃ hastarasam ahaṃ vijñānam ā dade | sarvasyā asyāḥ saṃsado 'haṃ bhūyāsam uttama indro yo gāyatām iva || PSK 20.21.6 uttamaṃ mottame kṛdhy uttamā hi babhūvitha | yāṃ tvā bhuraṇyur anvaicchad gandharvaḥ śaradaḥ śatam || PSK 20.21.7 abhibhūr aham āgamam ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ | idaṃ pratipravādinaṃ dviṣantam ava dhūnve || PSK 20.21.8 uruṣ ṭe vastir bhavatu samudrasya bilaṃ yathā | parodakam iva sicyatāṃ mūtraṃ te tanvas pari || PSK 20.21.9 yathā vāto yathodakaṃ yathā samudra ejati | evā te garbha ejatu niraitu daśamāsyo bahir jarāyuṇā saha || PSK 20.21.10 idam u śreyo 'vasānam āgāṃ śive me dyāvāpṛthivī abhūtām | asapatnāḥ pradiśo me bhavantu na vai tvā dviṣmo abhayaṃ no astu ||
PSK 20.22.1 vāstoṣpata iha naḥ śarma yaccha bhadrāc chreyo abhi no neṣa vasyaḥ | ariṣṭā vīrā iha me bhavantu dvipāc catuṣpān mayy astu puṣṭam || PSK 20.22.2 anamīvo vāstoṣpate viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan | sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ || PSK 20.22.3 ṛtena sthūṇā adhi roha vaṃś- vaṃśa -ogro virājann apa vṛṅkṣva śatrūn | mā te riṣann upasattāro atra virājāṃ jīvāc charadaḥ śatāni || PSK 20.22.4 ā rohataṃ pakṣāv amṛtaṃ vasānau dampatyoḥ kṛṇutaṃ dīrgham āyuḥ | tatra nārī putriṇī jīvapatn- jīvapatnī -īdaṃ kulāyam upasaṃviśāti || PSK 20.22.5 agnir mā viśvād duritāt punātu mātariśvā pavamānaḥ purastāt somo mā pātu maruto bṛhaspatir vāyuś ca mā pavamānaḥ punītām || PSK 20.22.6 tvayā satyaṃ vi jayante tava satyaṃ vivācanam | agre vṛkṣasya jāyase semaṃ janaya pūruṣam || PSK 20.22.7 vṛkṣasya śataśākhasya mādhuntasya nikṛtvanaḥ | vibhīdakasya yat phalaṃ tena tvon mādayāmasi || PSK 20.22.8 pūrve vātāt pra patataṃ pūrve patatam aśvibhyām | ime nyarvaṇī aham udnevāgnim avīvare || PSK 20.22.9 mā yakṣmam iha hāsiṣṭa mā riphanto vi gātana | subhūtam asmabhyaṃ dhatta yuṣmān anv etu kilbiṣam || PSK 20.22.10 iha varca iha paya iha cakṣur upa hvaye | ihendriyaṃ dadhātana ||
PSK 20.23.1 ā hi harī apaptatām imaṃ vatsaṃ vanād iyam | apakāmaṃ hy aghnye vatso devi mamāra te || PSK 20.23.2-3 ye tvopavidur vidur nijavatseva dohasva | ahaṃ te veda saṃmanaḥ saṃvananasya veda te || PSK 20.23.4 eṣa te aghnye vatsas taṃ vāñcha | tāṃ satyoktiṃ brūmaḥ || PSK 20.23.5 yā sarasvatī govananī sā vāmenāṅkasā nyetya | imāṃ gāṃ vānayatu svāhā ||
anuvāka 4 ||
PSK 20.24.1 dūrād bheṣajam ābhṛtaṃ bahūny ati yojanā | apaśyam asyantaṃ rudraṃ na dṛṣṭo duṣkṛtaṃ karat || PSK 20.24.2 bhinadmi te parāvato vatsasya śepyām iva | vṛṣed aso yathā mayi kṛṣṇo viṣāṇavām̐ iva || PSK 20.24.3 sarvā gāvaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sacchavayaḥ sanābhayaḥ | samānaṃ bibhratīr nāma vatsā ud rihatāṃ mithaḥ || PSK 20.24.4 indras tvāgre avānayat savitā tvotāparaḥ | tṛtīyam aśvinā tvāghnye vāñcha || PSK 20.24.5 ā te nayatu savit- savitā -ā nayatu bṛhaspatiḥ | patir yaḥ pratikāmyas tam asyai dhehy oṣadhe || PSK 20.24.6; PS 3.35.2 is repeated indraṃ vayam anurādham ity ekā || PSK 20.24.7 bhaga prehi prathamo 'nu tvā vayam emasi | indrāgnī brahmaṇāsmān svasti nayatāṃ pathā || PSK 20.24.8 aditiḥ praitu prathamā bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu | indro bhayaṃ vy asyatu śūdrāc ca na āryāc ca || PSK 20.24.9 ime ye anasi yuktā uṣṭārā uta pīlvā | teṣāṃ sam agrabhaṃ padaḥ sam īrmān sam u sakthyaḥ || PSK 20.24.10 vi madhyamā aproṣata gardabhā kṣipitā iva | athāsurasya māyayā mayīdaṃ sthāpayāmasi ||
PSK 20.25.1 saṃ mā bhagena dviguṇena varcasā saṃ mā pṛthivyā saṃ mauṣadhībhiḥ | saṃ māpo mayobhuvo bhagena varcasā sican || PSK 20.25.2; PS 19.24.14 is repeated varco me mitrāvaruṇety ekā || PSK 20.25.3 ṛcaṃ sāma yajāmahe yābhyāṃ karmāṇi kṛṇvate | vi te sadasi rājato yajñaṃ deveṣu yacchatām || PSK 20.25.4 aṅgamaṅgaṃ saṃ cinomi cakṣuḥ prāṇam atho balam | priyāḥ śrutasya bhūyāsm- bhūyāsma -āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ || PSK 20.25.5 etan no deva savitar jagaddhātrī ca rakṣatam | pūṣainat punar ājatv avinaṣṭam avihrutam || PSK 20.25.6 yāvanty eva palitāni sākaṃ jajñire agraśaḥ | tebhyaḥ pari bravīmi tvā kṛṣṇāḥ keśā bhavantu me || PSK 20.25.7 kṛṣṇān keśān sinīvāli kṛṣṇān keśān sarasvati | kṛṣṇān me aśvinā keśān kṛṇutaṃ puṣkarasrajā || PSK 20.25.8 ado yad agre devānāṃ purastād avatiṣṭhati | tan me +'bravīt tvaṣṭā viriṣṭabheṣajam || PSK 20.25.9 śvā viśvadhāyasā viśvabheṣajyā kṛtam | yad āmayati niṣ kṛdhi niṣkṛtir nāma vā asi || PSK 20.25.10 saṃ te cṛtāmi takariṃ saṃ yoniṃ saṃ gavīnyau | saṃ mātaraṃ ca putraṃ ca saṃ garbhaṃ ca jarāyu ca ||
PSK 20.26.1 tiryaṅ te garbho bhavatu hṛdayasthaṃ jarāyu te | ād oṣam agnim ā roh- roha -ād gaccha yamasādanam || PSK 20.26.2 vi te cṛtāmi takariṃ vi yoniṃ vi gavīnyau | vi mātaraṃ ca putraṃ ca vi garbhaṃ ca jarāyu ca || PSK 20.26.3 anvaṅ te garbho bhavatv anusota jarāyu te | yathā tvaṃ putraṃ vindāsai yathā jīvāsi bhadrayā || PSK 20.26.4 pra pṛṣṭhe garbham ardaya vi yona āsyaṃ sṛja | nir aitu daśamāsyo garbho gavīnyor adhi || PSK 20.26.5 viṣkambheṇa vi ṣkabhāya tau viṣvañcau vyākuru | eṣa vām agnir antarā sa viṣvañcau vy asyatu || PSK 20.26.6 viṣkambho vi ṣkabhāyatu manaś ca hṛdayaṃ ca vām | vivartana vartaya śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ || PSK 20.26.7 samudraṃ tvā pra hiṇomi svāṃ yonim apīhi | acchidras tanvā bhūyāsaṃ mā parā seci me payaḥ || PSK 20.26.8 yad atrāpi rasasya me parāpapātāsmṛtam | tad ihopa hvayāmahe tan mā pyāyatāṃ punaḥ || PSK 20.26.9 kavir agre pra lilekha dhartā keśām̐ adhārayat | ihaiva viśvato dadhad dhātā tvaṣṭā tvaci keśām̐ acīkl̥pat || PSK 20.26.10 sarasvati vrateṣu te divyeṣu devi dhāmasu | mandre hiraṇyavartane pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣaḥ ||
PSK 20.27.1 yad apsu te sarasvati goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu | tena no vājinīvati mukham aṅdhi sarasvati varcasā || PSK 20.27.2 yo adya deva sūrya tvāṃ ca māṃ cāntarāyati | tasmin duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ duritāni ca mṛjmahe || PSK 20.27.3 yo no +'bhicchāyaṃ martyeṣv agniṃ tiṣṭhasy antarā | tasya vṛścāmi te mūlaṃ na cchāyāṃ karavo 'param || PSK 20.27.4 ghnantv enaṃ deveṣavo brahmāṇo ghnantu menyā | yo asmākaṃ prajāpate agniṃ tiṣṭhaty antarā || PSK 20.27.5 prajāpate yo 'smām̐ ādṛś- ādṛśā -āgniṃ tiṣṭhaty antarā | taṃ mṛtyave pra yacchāmi sa rudrasyāstv ākhaṇaḥ || PSK 20.27.6 pra suvainaṃ devavajrebhyo mṛtyur vi kramatām adhi | sinātv enān nirṛtir mṛtyoḥ pāśair bandhair avimokyaiḥ || PSK 20.27.7 sumaṅgalena vacasā keśin grāmaṃ na ā vada | brahmaṇābrahmaṇā tv- tvā -olūkācchā vadāmasi || PSK 20.27.8 parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu saṃvatam | yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe 'rasaṃ praticākaśaṃ niyastaṃ praticākaśam || PSK 20.27.9 śunam ulūka no vada yaṃ dviṣmas tam ito naya | rājño yamasya te gṛhe sikatābhir videvyam ākhus te mūṣiked bhāgaḥ || PSK 20.27.10 ā vada bahulaṃ goṣṭhaṃ dhītavatsam anaṣṭagum | dhvāṅkṣāya dvipadāṃ vada śune catuṣpadāṃ vada ||
PSK 20.28.1 punar me rājā varuṇaḥ punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ | punar me viśve devā āyur jīvitavā aduḥ || PSK 20.28.2 ut tiṣṭhātaḥ pra dravārvāṅ mātra tiṣṭho 'bhicākaśat | sapatnyā varca ādāy- ādāya -āthāsmābhiḥ sahāsasi || PSK 20.28.3 ut tiṣṭhata nir dravata na va ihāsti nyañcanam | amuṣya vittam abhi vaḥ suvāmi tad anuvadhvaṃ sudatīr ahinas tat || PSK 20.28.4 ye asmākaṃ sabandhavo viṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu | teṣām indra iva devānām ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ || PSK 20.28.5 ye agnayaḥ pārthivā āhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu | teṣām asi tvaṃ saṃgathe sa no jīvātave kṛdhi || PSK 20.28.6 cita stha paricita sth- stha -āgnayaś ca nihavā nāma | te no mā ni hvadhvaṃ tebhyo vo namo na vo havam emi | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ sa vo havam etu || PSK 20.28.7 indrāgnī punar ā kṛtaṃ na etā sthiravīrāv aparāvītagū | asmākaṃ sarvā nihave santv eṣāṃ vayaṃ vidyāma guhyaṃ nāma gavām || PSK 20.28.8 prajāpate anunikrandaya viśve devāḥ padavāyāḥ santv āsām | ādityā anusaṃgatya śūrā indrajyeṣṭhāḥ punar ā vartayantu || PSK 20.28.9 indra praṇetar vardhaya m- mā -āśvinā māṃ vahatam āśvaśvā | aindrāgnaṃ varma pratimuñcamāno yathobhayebhyaś cāru samitim ā vadāni || PSK 20.28.10 cāruvāk cāruvadanaś cāru saṃ kāśa no nṛbhiḥ | adveṣyapratīkāśo jigīvām̐ aparājitaḥ ||
PSK 20.29.12ab api vṛśca purāṇavad vratater iva guṣpitam | ojo dāsasya jambhaya yad etad asya saṃbhṛtaṃ madhu tad indrasya vibhajāvahai || PSK 20.29.2cd3ab mlāpayāmi vrajaḥ śubhraṃ varuṇasya vratena te | yathā śepoapāyy asa strīṣu cāso anāvayāḥ || PSK 20.29.3cdef avasthasya kladīvato bhaṅgurasya nitodinaḥ | yad uttatam ava tat tanu yad ātataṃ ni tat tanu || PSK 20.29.4 amimlapaṃ te tanvaṃ klībaṃ tvā vīrudhākaram | antaḥkośa iva kośeṣu strīṣv apyākṛtaś cara || PSK 20.29.5 ā no medaṃ gṛhapatir dadhātv indreṇa medinā | ā no medaṃ sarasvaty ā no vahantu sindhavaḥ || PSK 20.29.6 medaṃ dhātā medaṃ pūṣā medam indro dadhātu me | medaṃ me aśvinobh- aśvinobhā -ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā || PSK 20.29.7 ūrū medaya me bāhū aṣṭhīvantā uraś ca me | vapāṃ pary asya udare medam indro dadhātu me || PSK 20.29.8 carmaṇa ivopanītasya sarvān keśān vṛhāmi te | ayaspātram iva te śiro yathāsat samaraṃ samam ||
anuvāka 5 ||
PSK 20.30.1 divi tārā udabhi śryan sapta sūryasya raśmayaḥ | dhārāḥ samudriyā apas tās te śalyam acucyavuḥ || PSK 20.30.2 īḍe agniṃ svāvasuṃ namobhir iha prasakto vi cayat kṛtaṃ naḥ | rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām || PSK 20.30.3 sapta sravanti śiśave marutvate pitā putrebhyo apy avīvatad v ṛtā | ubhe pipṛta ubhe asya rājata ubhe yatete ubhe asya puṣyataḥ || PSK 20.30.4 vedaḥ svastir druhaṇaḥ svastiḥ parśur vediḥ paraśur naḥ svastiḥ | haviṣkṛto yajñiyā yajñakāmās te devāso havir idaṃ juṣadhvam || PSK 20.30.5 upa priyaṃ panipnataṃ yuvānam āhutīvṛdham | aganma bibhrato namaḥ || PSK 20.30.6 imā yās te śataṃ hirāḥ sahasraṃ dhamanīr uta | tāsāṃ te sarvāsāṃ sākam aśmanā bilam apy adhām || PSK 20.30.7 idaṃ khanāmi bheṣajaṃ māṃpaśyam abhirorudam | yenā nicakra āsur- āsurī -īndrāṇī kevalaṃ patim || a = PSK 20.30.8; bcd: not found in PSK akṣyau nau madhusaṃkāśe anīkaṃ nau samañjanam | antaḥ kṛṇuṣva mā hṛdi mana in nau sahāsati || not found in PSK tvāṣṭreṇāhaṃ vacas- vacasā -erṣyāṃ vy amīmadam | atho yo manyus te pate tam u te śamayāmasi || not found in PSK vratena tvaṃ vratapate samakto 'hā viśvā sumanā dīdhyo naḥ | taṃ tvā vayaṃ jātavedaḥ samiddhaṃ prajāvanta upa sadema sarve ||
not found in PSK prajāvatīḥ sūyavase riśantīr mā vo vidyut taran mota senā | suge tīrthe suprapāṇe pibantīḥ parivṛjya vadhaṃ gohanaṃ carantu || not found in PSK padajñā sta ramatayaḥ saṃhitā viśvarūpā upa no devīr devebhir eta | imaṃ goṣṭham idaṃ sado ghṛtenā naḥ sam ukṣata || not found in PSK yā graivyā apacito atho yā upapakṣiyāḥ | vijāman yā apacitaḥ svayaṃsrasas tā ito nāśayāmasi || not found in PSK sāṃtapanā idaṃ havir marutas taj jujuṣṭana | yuṣmākotī riśādasaḥ || PSK 20.31.5 yo no marto maruto durhaṇāyus tiraś cittāni vasavo jighāṃsāt | tasmin tān pāśān prati muñcatā yūyaṃ tapiṣṭhena tapasā hantanā tam || PSK 20.31.6 saṃvatsarīṇā marutaḥ svarkā urukṣayāḥ sagaṇā mānuṣebhyaḥ | te asmat pāśān pra muñcantu sarvān sāṃtapanā matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ || PSK 20.31.7 dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām | mādhyaṃdine savana ā juṣasva rayiṣṭhāno rayim asmāsu dhehi || PSK 20.31.8 yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyen- daivyena -āsmai kṣatrāṇi dhārayantam agne | didiḍḍhy asmabhyaṃ draviṇeha bhadrā premaṃ voco havirdāṃ devatāsu || PSK 20.31.9 vi te muñcāmi raśanāṃ vi yoktraṃ vi niyojanam | ihaiva tvam ajasra edhy agne || PSK 20.31.10 prajāpate na hi tvad anyo viśvā rūpāṇi mahinā jajāna | yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
PSK 20.32.1 yat te devā akṛṇvan bhāgadheyam amāvāsye saṃvasanto mahitvā | semaṃ yajñaṃ pipṛhi viśvavāre rayiṃ no dhehi subhage suvīram || PSK 20.32.2 ghṛtaṃ te agne divye sadhasthe ghṛtena tvā manur adyā sam īdhe | ghṛtaṃ te devā āpyā vahanti ghṛtaṃ tubhyaṃ duhrate gāvo agre || PSK 20.32.3 mayy agre agniṃ gṛhṇāmi saha kṣatreṇa varcasā balena | mayi prajāṃ mayy āyur dadhāmi svāhā mayy agniḥ || PSK 20.32.4 apsu te rājan varuṇa gṛho mito hiraṇyayaḥ | tato dhṛtavrato rājā sarvā dhāmāni no muceḥ || PSK 20.32.5ab dhāmnodhāmno rājann ito varuṇa no muceḥ || PSK 20.32.5cde yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti yad ūcima | tato varuṇa no muceḥ || PSK 20.32.6 yo rudro agnau yo apsv antar ya oṣadhīr vīrudha āviveśa | ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni cākl̥pe tasmai rudrāya namo astv adya || PSK 20.32.7 apehy arir asy arir vā asi | viṣe viṣam apṛkthā ahim evābhy apehi taṃ jahi || PSK 20.32.8 pṛtanājitaṃ sahamānam agnim ugraṃ huvema paramāt sadhasthāt | sa naḥ parṣad ati durgāṇi viśvahā kṣāsad devo 'ti duritāny agniḥ || PSK 20.32.9 yady antarikṣe yadi vāta āsa yadi vṛkṣeṣu yadi volapeṣu yad aśravan paśava udyamānaṃ tad brāhmaṇaṃ punar asmān upaitu ||
PSK 20.33.1 śaṃ mā vāto abhi vātu śaṃ me tapatu sūryaḥ | ahāni śaṃ bhavantu me śaṃ rātrī prati dhīyatāṃ śam uṣā me vy ucchatu || PSK 20.33.2 ut tiṣṭhata pitaro ye purāsthan yamaṃ rājānam avasānam arcata | ayaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛtamaḥ śreṣṭha āgan tasmai lokaṃ kṛṇuta yāvatsabandhu || PSK 20.33.3 yasyedaṃ śastaṃ pratimākṛtaṃ devair dattam asūriyaṃ ca saṃbhṛtam | triḥ sapta kṛtva ṛṣayaḥ paretā mṛtyuṃ praty auhan padayopanena || PSK 20.33.4 agaman gāvaḥ sadanam agamad vasatiṃ vayaḥ | āsthāne parvatā asthuḥ sthāman vṛkkāv arīramam || PSK 20.33.5 ā gāvo goṣṭham agamann āgnidhānāny agnayaḥ | ā vṛkkau sam avitsātām utsaktabheṣajam asi || ad = PSK 20.33.6ab; bc: not found in PSK yathā dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ c- ca -āntas tiṣṭhati tejanam | evā rogaṃ cāsrāvaṃ ca muñjas tiṣṭhatiy antarā || PSK 20.33.6cd7ab asthād idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam asthād vāto vanacyavaḥ | asthur vṛkṣā ūrdhvasvapnās tiṣṭhād rogo ayaṃ tava || PSK 20.33.7cd8 śataṃ yad bheṣajāni te sahasraṃ saṃbhṛtāni ca | teṣām asi tvam uttamaṃ śreṣṭham āsrāvabheṣajaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ roganāśanam || PSK 20.33.9 yad adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotaś cikitvann avṛṇīmahīha | dhruvam ayo dhruvam utā śamiṣṭha prajānan vidvān upa yāhi somam || PSK 20.33.10 sam indra no manasā neṣa gobhiḥ saṃ sūribhir harivan saṃ svastyā | saṃ brahmaṇā devakṛtaṃ yad asti ||
PSK 20.34.1; PS 19.8.3 is repeated saṃ varcasety ekā || PSK 20.34.2 saṃsrāvabhāgās taviṣā bṛhantaḥ prastareṣṭhā barhiṣadaś ca devāḥ | imaṃ yajñam abhi viśve gṛṇantaḥ svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām || PSK 20.34.3 yān āvaha uśato deva devāṃs tān preraya punar agne sve sadhasthe | jakṣivāṃsaḥ papivāṃso madhūny asmai dhatta vasavo vasūni || PSK 20.34.4 ayaṃ no yajño apy etu devān uttarāṃ vedim apy etu vediḥ | vi muñcāmy ṛtvijo dakṣiṇābhir devā yakṣīṣṭa punar uttarāvat || PSK 20.34.5 yajña yajñaṃ gaccha yajñapatiṃ gaccha | svāṃ yoniṃ gaccha svāhā || PSK 20.34.6 eṣa te yajño yajamāna sahasūktanamovākaḥ | suvīraḥ svāhā || PSK 20.34.7 manasaspata imaṃ deva yajñam | svāhā vāci svāhā vāte dhāḥ svāhā || PSK 20.34.8 svāhā hutebhyo vaṣaḍ ḍhutebhyaḥ | devā gātuvido gātuṃ vittvā gātum ita svāhā || PSK 20.34.9 saṃ barhir aktaṃ haviṣā ghṛtena sam indreṇa vasubhiḥ saṃ marudbhiḥ | saṃ devebhir viśvadevebhir aktam indraṃ gacchatu yat svāhā || PSK 20.34.10 āśāsānā saumanasaṃ prajāṃ cakṣur atho balam | indrāṇyā anuvrataṃ saṃ nahye amṛtāya kam ||
PSK 20.35.1 indrāṇī nārī subhagā supatny ud aṃśena patividye bibheda | triṃśad yasyā jaghanaṃ yojanāny upastha indraṃ sthaviraṃ pipartu || PSK 20.35.2 senāsi pṛthivī dhanaṃjay- dhanaṃjayā -āditir viśvarūpā sūryatvak | indrāṇī prāṣāṭ saṃjayantī tasyai ta enā haviṣā vidhema || PSK 20.35.3 ajirottiṣṭhanty utthitāgre tvarī prāṣāṭ tūrtam upacarantīm | prāṣāṭ kas tvariṣā tvāgre tvarikas tvayiṣamesa tvā bhadre || PSK 20.35.4 paryāvarte duṣvapnyāt pāpāt svapnād abhūtyāḥ | brahmāham antaraṃ kṛṇve parā svapnamukhāḥ śucaḥ || PSK 20.35.5 yat svapne annam aśnāmi na prātar adhigamyate | sarvaṃ tad astu naḥ śivaṃ nahi tad dṛśyate divā ||
anuvāka 6 ||
PSK 20.36.1 viśvaṃ vivyajmi pṛthivīva puṣṭam āyadāyat prati gṛhṇāmy annam | vaiśvānarasya mahato mahimnā syonam asmabhyaṃ madhumat kṛṇotu || PSK 20.36.2abc triśṛṅgam asi durabhidharṣam indrāya dhriyase | pūṣā te prāśitā || PSK 20.36.2defg pāhi no agne tanvaṃ pāhi gāḥ pāhi yat tanūkṛtam | ahutādāv amartyau tāv asmān pāto aṃhasaḥ || PSK 20.36.3 yau devānām ahutādāv amartyau svarbhānuś ca svarjyotiś ca | tayos tvāsyena prāśnāmy agneṣ ṭvā vaiśvānarasya tvāsyena prāśnāmi || PSK 20.36.45ab dakṣaś ca tvā mānasaḥ prāśnītāṃ svarbhānuś ca mārutaḥ | mā pṛṇan pūrtyā vi rādhi mo vayaṃ prajayā dhanena || PSK 20.36.5cd6ab anādhṛṣyasya te pito anādhṛṣyaśavasaḥ | sarvavīrāḥ sarvātmāno bhakṣaṃ kriyāsma || PSK 20.36.6cd7 kāmo me rājñi pra viveśa tvāṃ tam ahaṃ nir hvaye punaḥ | gṛheṣu goṣu me mano akṣyor astu me bhago jihvāyām astu me raso bāhvor astu me balam ūrvor astu me javaḥ || PSK 20.36.8 divo 'si nirmathitaṃ pṛthivyā adhy udbhṛtam | samudrād ucyase jātam akṣyāmayabheṣajam asy ātharvaṇam || PSK 20.36.9 pūṣā parastād ā vartayatu catasro bhūmyā diśaḥ | sagalika puṣalika punar no naṣṭam āyati jīvena bhunajāmahai || PSK 20.36.10 yad ābharac chṛtad agnis tejane naṣṭavedanam | khargaleva punar dattaṃ punar asmā aśvinā naṣṭam ājatam ||
PSK 20.37.1 yady asy apriyajā yadi vānyata ābhṛtaḥ | visalpakasya bheṣajīr devīr āpa imā mama || PSK 20.37.2 yavasya pūtikasya dṛśāmbasyota garmutaḥ | teṣāṃ sam agrabhaṃ śuṣmam āśūnāṃ dhāvatām iva || PSK 20.37.3 yas tanuḥ praturvaṇī vadha iva prasarpati | mayūraḥ kila te viṣaṃ kṛkavākuś ca jakṣatu || PSK 20.37.4 udīcīnaḥ pra tanoti nitatnir bhūmyām adhi | ojmānaṃ paśya vīrudho mithunā sam avīvanat || PSK 20.37.5 ni tvātanaṃ nitatninā pari tvāgāṃ sahīyasā | śyenād abhidravīyasā suparṇān nikarīyasā || PSK 20.37.6 yad atrāpi madhor ahaṃ niraṣṭhaviṣam asmṛtam | agniś ca tat savitā ca punar me jaṭhare dhattām || PSK 20.37.78a agne rudrasya jāyāsi duhitāsi prajāpateḥ | uccaiḥśloke dānapatni haviḥśrava upa tvā hvaya upa mā hvayasva | nariṣṭā nāma vā asi || PSK 20.37.8bcd9a yathāsau hariṇo vṛṣā kūlād adhi praskandati | evā ni ṣkanda pitryād bhagaṃ jayantī dhanaṃ jayantī || PSK 20.37.9bcd ṛjiśvā mahyam abravīd gandharvasyānuśāsanam | etat te pativedanam || PSK 20.37.10 pāṭā bhinattu kumbhaṃ pāṭā kumbhīṃ gadohanīm | pāṭā sarvasya pātrasya vadhūṃ kṛṇotu viśvataḥ ||
PSK 20.38.1 apehi takmaṃś cara paro anyam asmad iccha puruṣaṃ kaṃ cid eva | veda te takman pitaraṃ veda mātaram || PSK 20.38.2 śamīvān asi śāmīvataḥ śamīvān ābhiśokiḥ | abhiśoko hārṣaṇir harṣaṇo jāñjabhiḥ || PSK 20.38.3 yaḥ paśūnāṃ mārjanīyo yaṃ tvam aṃśena bhejiṣe | abhīhi takman gardabhaṃ na mām abhyetum arhasi || omitted in PSK (apart from visrasā) visrasā nāma te mātā kiḥkiśo (⟨ kiṣkiṣo?) nāma te pitā | śimidā nāma te svasā || a(b): omitted in PSK, (b)cd = PSK 20.38.4(b)cd giriṃ gaccha girijā asi girau te māhiṣo gṛhaḥ | dāsī cakram āsthāya nāmlāte ni krandayiṣyati || PSK 20.38.5 ā vāto vātv anaghaḥ sarvasya dūto abhiśastipāḥ | jalāṣam it pra siñcati tad viṣasyāpa siñcatu || PSK 20.38.6 yām asyati pṛśnibāhur iṣṭaṃ haridruparṇyam | tām asya niṣ khidāmasi yathā jīvāsi bhadrayā || PSK 20.38.7 aśrāntasya tvā manasā yunajmi prathamasya ca | utkūlam udvaho bhav- bhava -oduhya prati dhāvatāt || PSK 20.38.8 etaṃ dantaṃ nirṛtyā ghoram āhur yasta āsann avarūḍha eṣaḥ | taṃ durhārde pra hiṇomi ghoraṃ sa no mā hiṃsīj jyāyaso mā kanīyasaḥ || PSK 20.38.9 śivaḥ śagmo bhavatu danta eṣa mā no hiṃsīj jyāyaso mā kanīyasaḥ | aghamāram aghaśaṃsaṃ nirṛthaṃ taṃ te dantaḥ sacatāṃ ghora eṣaḥ ||
not found in PSK (apart form pāda a) aghamāram aghaśaṃsaṃ nirṛthaṃ durhārde dantaṃ pra hiṇomi ghoram | so asyāttu dvipadaś catuṣpadaḥ śivo asmabhyaṃ sumanā astv eṣaḥ || not found in PSK śivaṃ te dantaṃ haviṣā kṛṇomi śivo mahyaṃ kurvate danto astu | śivāni te trīṇi trikadrukāṇi santu śivo mahyaṃ nabhasī rodasī stām || not found in PSK pururūpā pṛthupeśā araṃkṛd vahator asi | pratiṣṭhāsi catuṣpadāṃ yas ta eṣa pañcamaḥ pādas taṃ tena prati gṛhṇāmi || not found in PSK sasarparīr amatiṃ bādhamānā bṛhan mimāya jamadagnidattā | ā sūryasya duhitā tatāna śravo deveṣv amṛtam ajuryam || not found in PSK sasarparīr abharat tūyam ebhyo 'dhi śravaḥ pāñcajanyāsu kṛṣṭiṣu | sā pakṣyā navyamāyur dadhānā yāṃ me pulasti jamadagnayo daduḥ || not found in PSK aghnye dūramūt kanda ni padaś caturo jahi | adhā goduhaḥ śīrṣaṇi śaphām̐ urasi vādaya || not found in PSK śṛṅgābhyām upa sraṣṭāraṃ padāvartaya goduham | atho ye anye tiṣṭhanti tān viṣūco vi nāśaya || not found in PSK yathā nartā sakṣikājiṃ ni kulpham abhinṛtyati | evā tvam aghnye padaḥ sarvān sākam ud ardaya || not found in PSK ud u kṣīram uttabhitaṃ syandantām asya dhenavaḥ | asṛk tasya gāvo duhrāṃ yo asmān nāpacāyati || not found in PSK ṛkṣīkāyā yathā mano vyāghrasya yathā manaḥ | evā tasya gavāṃ mano yo asmān nāpacāyati ||
ab = PSK 20.39.1ab, cd: not found in PSK uttamosy oṣadhīnāṃ vīrudhāṃ balavattamaḥ | sasyandana tvam oṣadhe sarvāḥ syandaya gā imāḥ || PSK 20.39.1cd aranturathantu | vaneṣu śuṣmo astu te pṛthivyām astu yad dharaḥ || PSK 20.39.2abcd akṛd aśvo akṛt kharo akṛd aśvataro hariḥ | evāsi bahvaghe tava bhasan nadatv āsicā || PSK 20.39.2ef3ab yathā nadati gardabha evā nadati te bhasat | vrīher yavasya māṣasy- māṣasya -aitat paśyābhidarśanam || PSK 20.39.3cde ud bhare dyāvāpṛthivī ud āpa ud agnim ud indram ut sūryam ud rātrim ud ahaḥ || PSK 20.39.4 namaskṛtya dyāvāpṛthivībhyām antarikṣāya mṛtyave | mekṣyāmy ūrdhvas tiṣṭhan mā mā hiṃsiṣur īśvarāḥ || not found in PSK yan meḍhvā yad apsarasaḥ payo devīr ahṛṣata | tad ihopa hṛyāmahe cakṣuṣe ca balāya ca | devānāṃ devahūtyā mayi tyā devatāḥ punaḥ || not found in PSK yāsya doṣā rasasya me tvaṃ devi tatarpitha | nārāśaṃsena stomen- stomena -āhaṃ tvat punar ā dade yuṣmad apsarasas pari || not found in PSK yan me tanvo rasaṃ vayam ud apsarasas pari | nārāśaṃsena stomena prajām ā pyāyāmahe || not found in PSK yan me payo viṣiṣice jāgrataḥ svapataś ca yat | punas tad adya me devā ā siñcantu tanū adhi ||
PSK 20.40.1 yad adya dugdhaṃ pṛthivīm asakta yad oṣadhīr vyasarad yad āpaḥ | vatse payo gavi payo yad asyām asmāṃs tat sacatāṃ payaḥ || PSK 20.40.2 parā patanty āśavo 'śvā adhodhuraṃ yathā | evā mūtra pra bhidyasva vi vaster āsyaṃ sṛja || PSK 20.40.3; PS 19.20.13 is repeated viṣitaṃ te vastibilam ity ekā || PSK 20.40.4 asya pāre samudrasya śukraṃ jyotir amartyam | tan naḥ pātv aṃhasas tan naḥ pātu viśvataḥ || PSK 20.40.5 ā no medhā sumatir viśvarūpā hiraṇyavarṇā jagatī jagamyāt | sā no agne medhā juṣatām iha pracetāḥ || PSK 20.40.6 niṣ krāmatv iṣiryo atra praviṣṭo vayāṣṭhaś ca sayujā yāv iha staḥ | sapta ṛṣīṇāṃ syūmaraśmiḥ pathaitu svān mṛgān punar apy etu kṛṣṇaḥ || PSK 20.40.7 sapta ṛṣīn gaccha syūmaraśmaye mṛgān kṛṣṇaḥ sacatāṃ vājo aśvam | īḍo asmān suprajasaḥ suvīrān saha yajñena payasā sacātai || not found in PSK; PSK 20.4.8 is = PS 18.65.1 ∼ ŚS 18.2.17 namo astv ṛṣaye syūmaraśmaye namaḥ kṛṣṇāyota yo vājo asya | namo devāyārvateṣu jiṣṇave 'yaṃ no vājī pra tirāty āyuḥ || not found in PSK ati yanty ahāny ati rātrīr aty uṣasaḥ | āpo antardhāvarīs tābhir antar dadhe tvā || PSK 20.40.9 yathā naidāghye māsi bahvīḥ śuṣyanty oṣadhīḥ | evā pra śuṣya mām anu yac ca paśyāmi yac ca na || PSK 20.40.10 pāṭā bibharty aṅkuśaṃ hiraṇyavantam aṅkinam | tenāham anyeṣāṃ striya Bhatt. striya (⟨ śriyaḥ) ā lumpāmi mamed asan ||
anuvāka 7 ||
PSK 20.41.1, pāda a(b) are omitted in PSK indra jīva sūrya jīva devā jīvā jīvyāsam aham | sarvam āyur jīvyāsam || PSK 20.41.23a anābhūr asmi naitave tantyāṃ baddho divi śritaḥ | āhā tvā nirṛtaye || PSK 20.41.3bcd rantir asi ramatir asi | saṃ śrutena rādhiṣīya mā śrutena vi rādhiṣi || PSK 20.41.4abc darśo 'si darśato 'si viśvataḥ saṃdṛṣṭaḥ | somo asi rudro asi || PSK 20.41.4de5a taṃ tvā yaṃ devā aṃśum āpyāyanti taṃ tvā yam ādityā aṃśum āpyāyanti | taṃ tvā yam akṣitam akṣitaye pibanti sa naḥ somaḥ pra tirad dīrgham āyuḥ || PSK 20.41.5bc6ab anyeṣāṃ prāṇenā pyāyasva māsmākaṃ prāṇena | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇenā pyāyasva || PSK 20.41.6c7a, pāda c not found in PSK; PSK 20.41.7cde is: … anudaṃ kṣetriyaṃ rapaḥ | ā mā gacchantu brahmacāriṇaḥ prāta evevarāradā || (see Barret 1940, 134; Kajihara 2011, 43-44; Witzel 1980 (WZKS 24), 52, note 96) cid asi samudrayoniḥ śyena ṛtāvān | somapīthopa na ehy arvāṅ rāyaspoṣeṇa prajayā dhanena || not found in PSK; PSK 20.41.8 is: prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī nārado nāma vā asi | bṛhaspatiḥ prajāpatir nārado brahmacāriṇaḥ || (see Barret 1940, 134) svarava stha namo vo mahatām ūrjāyai | parṇāṃ māva gām || PSK 20.41.9 apaścāddaghvānnasya bhūyāsam | annādāyānnapataye rudrāya namo agnaye || PSK 20.41.10 yā te vaso vāta iṣuḥ sā ta eṣā | tayā no mṛḍa ||
PSK 20.42.1 agnis takmānam apa bādhatām ito varuṇo grāvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣāḥ | barhiṣadaḥ samidhaḥ śośucānās takmanaḥ śocām apa nir nudantu || PSK 20.42.2 yo abhyavabhṛṇāyasi svapantam iccha puruṣaṃ śayānam akovidam | sa naḥ sahasravīry- sahasravīrya -ānuṣṭhātā śivo bhava || PSK 20.42.3 devayātur asi mṛḍo 'si | mṛḍāsmākaṃ dvipade catuṣpade mā tasya mīmṛḍo dvipade catuṣpade yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ || PSK 20.42.5; pādas bcd not written brahmayātur asi mṛḍo 'si | mṛḍāsmākaṃ dvipade catuṣpade mā tasya mīmṛḍo dvipade catuṣpade yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ || PSK 20.42.4; pādas bcd not written annayātur asi mṛḍo 'si | mṛḍāsmākaṃ dvipade catuṣpade mā tasya mīmṛḍo dvipade catuṣpade yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ || not found in PSK; PSK 20.42.6 is: paretyayātur asi … manuṣyayātur asi mṛḍo 'si | mṛḍāsmākaṃ dvipade catuṣpade mā tasya mīmṛḍo dvipade catuṣpade yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ || a = PSK 20.42.7a avabharaṇo nāmāsi devatrā ṇo akṣamāpaḥ | yo asmān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ ta āsann api daghmaḥ || PSK 20.42.7cd8 yad adosnātā āsuro dīkṣito 'carat | tasya yan malam avāsravat sa hi nāsi tāvad anuṣṭhyā tvā vidma- -arasaṃ vṛścika te viṣam || PSK 20.42.9 ketuluṅgā nāma te mātā karkaṭaḥ pitā | tat satyam arasam abhaga te viṣam || PSK 20.42.10 dve viṣasya dhāre striyā anyā puṃso anyā | te ubhe arase ||
PSK 20.43.1 viśvavit taṃ naṣṭam anu paśyasi | ado me naṣṭaṃ tan me punar dehi || PSK 20.43.2 viśvakarman tat tvam upa gacchasi | ado me naṣṭaṃ tan me punar dehi || not found in PSK viśvavyacas tat tvayy adhy āhitam | ado me naṣṭaṃ tan me punar dehi || PSK 20.43.3 pari pūṣā purastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam | punar no naṣṭam āyati jīvena bhunajāmahai || PSK 20.43.4 indras tvābhy ait sarpat tat tvā goṣṭha ādadhāt | tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat || not found in PSK viṣṇor manasā pūte sthaḥ | devo vāṃ savitot punātu || PSK 20.43.5 viṣṇor manasā pūtam asi devas tvā savitot punātu | acchidreṇa pavitreṇa sahasradhāreṇa supvā || PSK 20.43.6 hṛdā pūtaṃ manasā jātavedo viśvāni devo vayunāni vidvān | saptāsyāni tava yāny agne tebhyo juhomi sa juṣasva havyam || PSK 20.43.7; PS 12.18.1 is repeated agnāv agnir ity ekā || PSK 20.43.8 yas te keśām̐ avācīnān krimir vṛhati mūrdhataḥ | prāṇaṃ tasyopa dāśayād vīrut khanati bheṣajī || PSK 20.43.910; see Kajihara 2011, 48-49 veda vai te bhaga nāma bhūrir nāmāsi rayir nāma | taṃ tvā bhaga pra viśāmi sa mā bhaga pra viśa | Bhatt. || tasmin sahasrakāṇḍena mṛje bhaga tvayi ||
PSK 20.44.1a; see Kajihara 2011, 44, 47 ā mā gacchantu brahmacāriṇaḥ svāhā || PSK 20.44.1b carāṇi svāhā || not found in PSK vi rājāni svāhā || not found in PSK; see Kajihara 2011, 48 asāni bhadrebhyaḥ śreyān svāhā || not found in PSK; see Kajihara 2011, 48 yaśasvī janutām anu carāṇi svāhā || a = PSK 20.44.2a, b: not found in PSK devānāṃ mā manuṣyāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ brahmacāriṇām || PSK 20.44.2b priyaṃ prajāpateḥ kṛṇu svāhā || PSK 20.44.2c hā amba panecari || PSK 20.44.3ab ayaṃ me hasto akṣito rudati tam u me agadaṃ kṛdhi || PSK 20.44.3cd; kṣitsya] K, kṣatasya Ja Ma JM Pa tvaṃ kṣitsya bheṣajy ubhayor akṣitasya ca || PSK 20.44.4a udelaḍi || PSK 20.44.4a asur asi svāhā || PSK 20.44.4b kratur asi svāhā ||
PSK 20.45.1a puruṣo 'si svāhā || PSK 20.45.1b vijātir asi svāhā || not found in PSK prajātir asi svāhā || not found in PSK svajātir asi svāhā || not found in PSK svajātir nāmāsi svāhā || PSK 20.45.2 veda vai te nārada nāma vāg nāmāsi tasya te yaśo bhakṣīya || PSK 20.45.3 veda vai te sanāt kumāra nāma cakṣur nāmāsi tasya te madhu bhakṣīya ||
not found in PSK snuṣāsau senāsyāḥ senāyā ihāsyāḥ śvaśuroyam asyāḥ śvaśuraḥ | sā yathā snuṣā śvaśurād adhaspadyate adharā padyate nīcī padyate || not found in PSK evāsau senāsyāḥ senāyā adhas padyatām adharā padyatāṃ nīcī padyatām | sendrāgnibhyāṃ hatavīrāṃ hatapūruṣāṃ parājitāṃ praṇuttaitu paramāṃ parāvatam || not found in PSK tām indrāgnī hatavīrāṃ hatapūruṣāṃ parājitāṃ praṇuttāṃ yatīm anvākśītām | parājita etv asāv āmuṣyāyaṇo amuṣyāḥ putraḥ || not found in PSK asnā vyakta etu | aghaṃ hi raṇyetv asāv āmuṣyāyaṇo amuṣyāḥ putraḥ || not found in PSK aghapratīko aghenainaṃ vidhyāmaḥ | abhūtyā enaṃ pāśe sitvā duṣvapnyena saṃ sṛjya mṛtyor vyātta āsann api dadhāmi ||
a = PSK 20.46.1c; bcd: not found in PSK sṛjāmy āpa uśatīr upemāḥ saṃrarāṇāḥ payasā saṃ babhūvuḥ | datto asmabhyaṃ draviṇeha bhadrā apāṃ prati prati gṛhṇātv enāḥ || not found in PSK uc chrayasva bahur bhava svena mahasā yava | pṛṇīhi sarvā pātrāṇi mā tvā divyāśanir vadhīt || not found in PSK āśṛṇvantaṃ yavaṃ devaṃ yatra tvācchāvadāmasi | tad uc chrayasva dyaur iva samudra ivaidhy akṣitaḥ || not found in PSK akṣitās ta upasado akṣitāḥ santu rāśayaḥ | pṛṇanto akṣitāḥ santv attāraḥ santv akṣitāḥ || not found in PSK sakṛd yad dyaur ajāyata sakṛd bhūmir ajāyata | sakṛd yaḥ pṛśniyā dugdhaṃ tad anyo nānu jāyate mā tvānu jani kaś cana || not found in PSK iṣvagram iṣuyāvanaṃ maṇiṃ kṛṇve sumaṅgalam | sa mā śaravyābhyaḥ pātu divānaktaṃ ca jīvase || not found in PSK pratiṣṭhito 'si brahmaṇā jambhayāmasi tvā vayam | apāmārgeṇa vidvalā idaṃ tvāpa mṛjmahe yuvantaṃ kṣipantaṃ jahi || not found in PSK śīrṇaṃ ta etan na kṣutaṃ ta etat saṃkṣutaṃ duḥkṣutaṃ tubhyam astu | rudrāśaniṣ ṭe jaghanena grīvā indra iva vṛtraṃ vajreṇa hantu || PSK 20.46.1bcde anuhavaṃ parihavaṃ parivādaṃ parikṣavam | savyermaṃ riktakumbhāṃ parā tāṃ savitaḥ suva || PSK 20.46.2 apapāpaṃ parikṣavaṃ puṇyaṃ bhakṣīmahi kṣavam | śivā te pāpanāsikāṃ parṇakaś cābhi mehatām ||
PSK 20.46.3 abhi tvā pañcaśākhena hastenādhāṃ sahīyasā | yathā na vidviṣāvahai na vibhavāva kadā cana || PSK 20.46.4 cākravākaṃ saṃvananam asyasya svaṃkaram | amuṃ svaṃ kṛṇotu me yam ahaṃ kāmaye priyam || PSK 20.46.5 yat kakṣīvāṃ saṃvananaṃ cyavanaś cakra āsuraḥ | tad vāṃ kṛṇomi dampatī saṃ priyau bhavataṃ yuvam || PSK 20.46.6 yathā saṃyuktau pakṣiṇau saṃpriyau carato mṛgau | evā saṃyuktau brahmaṇā saṃpriyau bhavataṃ yuvam || PSK 20.46.7 prehi pra hara pādāv ā gṛhebhyaḥ svastaye | kapiñjala pradakṣiṇaṃ śatapatrābhi no vada || PSK 20.46.8 bhadraṃ vada dakṣiṇato bhadram uttarato vada | bhadraṃ purastān no vada bhadraṃ paścāt kapiñjala || PSK 20.46.9 śunaṃ vada dakṣiṇataḥ śunam uttarato vada | śunaṃ purastān no vada śunaṃ paścāt kapiñjala || PSK 20.46.10 yauvanāni mahayasi jigyuṣām iva dundubhiḥ | kapiñjala pradakṣiṇaṃ śatapatrābhi no vada ||
anuvāka 8 ||
PSK 20.47.1 ut tabhnāmi gavāṃ kṣīram ud rathaṃ rathavāhanam | ut tabdhā asmākaṃ vīrā mayi gāvaś ca gopatau || PSK 20.47.2 ut tvā stabhnātu savitā devo agnir un mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinobhā | sarvān sapatnān avadhīr yugena viśāṃ patir upasattaidhy atra || PSK 20.47.3 tvaṃ hi rudra vaśinī nirniṣe tvaṃ deveṣūta mānuṣeṣu | yad īśāno nayasi yac ca haṃsy asmākam astu pitṛṣu svadhāvat || PSK 20.47.4; see KauśS 127.5 vāyav ā rundhi no mṛgān asmabhyaṃ mṛgayadbhyaḥ | sa no nediṣṭham ā kṛdhi vāto hi raśanākṛtaḥ || PSK 20.47.5 ud asurya ud u yakṛt Bhatt. asū(⟨ su)rya sthāma gacchatu te punaḥ | yato nilayate yakṛt tat prastambham ājatu | memaṃ pṛthupravartane jaghanastambhinaṃ karaḥ || PSK 20.47.6 yā pārśve saṃtanoti hṛdayaṃ jihvayā saha | tāṃ tvaṃ devi pṛthivi hikkām arasāṃ kṛdhi || PSK 20.47.7; PS 8.16.5 is repeated anusṛptām ity ekā || PSK 20.47.8; PS 8.16.7-8 are repeated pra patāta iti dve || PSK 20.47.9 PS 8.16.8 is repeated PSK 20.47.10 aharahar balim itye haranto 'śvāyeva tiṣṭhate ghāsam agne | rāyaṣpoṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto 'gne mā te prativeśā riṣāma ||
PSK 20.48.1 rātriṃrātrim aprayāmaṃ bharanto 'śvāyeva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai | rāyaspoṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto mā te agne prativeśā riṣāma || PSK 20.48.2 āgna āyūṃṣi pavasvā suvorjam iṣaṃ ca naḥ | āre bādhasva ducchunām || PSK 20.48.3 trīṇy āyūṃṣi tava jātavedas tisro vyuṣṭīr uṣasas te agne | tisras te tanvo devasaṃśitās tābhir naḥ pāhi sadam apramādam || PSK 20.48.4; see KauśS 108.2 pāhi no agna ekayā pāhi na uta dvitīyayā | pāhi gīrbhis tisṛbhir ūrjāṃpate pāhi catasṛbhir vaso || PSK 20.48.5 samīcī māhanī pātām āyuṣmatyā ṛco mā chitsi | tanūpāt sāmno vasuvidaṃ lokam anu carāṇi || PSK 20.48.6; PS 18.11.7 is repeated ya ṛte cid ity ekā || PSK 20.48.7 bhagehy arvāṅ upa mām iha tvaṃ mado nāmāsi mayi mādayāmum | surā ta ekam abhavaj janitram agner adhi jāto 'si brahmaṇā tejasā ca || abcd: = PSK 20.48.8, e: not found in PSK (= PS 20.38.7f ∼ PSK 20.37.8a) sahānayā praviśehāntarā mām | viśanty ehi praviśanty ehy ā mā viśa pra mā viś- viśa -opa tvā hvaya upa mā hvayasva | nariṣṭā nāma vā asi || PSK 20.48.9; see Kajihara 2011, 44, 49 yathāpaḥ pravatā yanti yathā māsā aharjaram | evā mā brahmacāriṇo dhātar ā yantu sarvadā || PSK 20.48.10 ā ganta mā riṣaṇyata prastotāro māpa sthāta sumanyavaḥ | dṛḍhāso amariṣṇavo māvapiṣyavaḥ ||
see Kajihara 2011, 41-42; PSK 20.49.1 dhātā te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt | mitras tvam asi dharmaṇ- dharmaṇā -agnir ācāryas tava || see Kajihara 2011, 42; PSK 20.49.2ab3cde agner brahmacāry asi mama brahmacāry asi | prajāpatiṣ ṭvā gopāyatu devāya tvā savitre pari dadāmi svasti caratād ihāsau || see Kajihara 2011, 42; PSK 20.49.3ab2cd viśvam asi viśvapate sarvam asi sarvapate | taṃ tvāsau devāya tvā savitre pari dadāmi svasti caratān mayi || PSK 20.49.4 samāvavartti viṣṭhito jigīṣur viśveṣāṃ kāmaś caratām ihāstu | viśvā dveṣāṃsi duritā hitv- hitvā -ā yantv anuvratā savitur daivyasya || PSK 20.49.5 ā no hasto akṛtāgāt svargaḥ punar aitu tanvā saṃvidānaḥ | prāṇena tejasā harasā balena mitro asmān varuṇa ubhayatas pātu || PSK 20.49.6 yat kāma kāmayamānā idaṃ kṛṇmasi te haviḥ | tan naḥ sarvaṃ sam ṛdhyatām athaitasya haviṣo vīhi svāhā || PSK 20.49.7 yad varco dyāvāpṛthivyor atho yad āñjana tvayi | tena sucakṣā varcasy ahaṃ bhūyāsam āñjana || PSK 20.49.8 yady aspṛṣi śliṣṭaṃ yadi vā svapnayānuśliṣṭam | āśliṣṭāvacchedanam asy abhidṛṣṭavīryam || PSK 20.49.9 ava vār iva vārivā ava varṣaṃ girer iva | ava jyām iva dhanvano hṛdi śliṣṭaṃ chinadmi te || PSK 20.49.10 yat te hṛdi śliṣṭaṃ yac ca śliṣṭaṃ purītati | madhye pṛṣṭīnāṃ yac chliṣṭaṃ tat pārṣṇyāva chinadmi te ||
PSK 20.50.1 yat te śliṣṭaṃ kloma karṇeṣu yac ca śiśne sanābhyām | indras tad abravīd bhiṣak pārṣṇir āśliṣṭāvacchedanī || PSK 20.50.2 eṣā vai duḥsahā nāma pārṣṇir āśliṣṭāvacchedanī | idam aham amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyāmuṣyāḥ putrasyāśliṣṭāṃ pra cchinadmi || PSK 20.50.3 vipaścit puccham ābharat tad viṣṇuḥ punar ābharat | tad agninā manasā saṃvidānaṃ pumāṃsam asyai putraṃ dhehi svāhā || PSK 20.50.4 vipaścit puccham ā bhara yarjjarahastā cittyā | yathāsyāḥ putro jāyatā abhibhūr ṇo vipaścitā || PSK 20.50.5 apehīto vipaścit tvaṃ pumān ayaṃ janiṣyate | pumān puṃso adhi saṃbhūtaḥ sa pumān eva jāyatām || PSK 20.50.6 bhadrāya karṇaḥ krośatu bhadrāyākṣi vi vepatām | parā duṣvapnyaṃ suva yad bhadraṃ tan na ā suva || PSK 20.50.7 akṣivepaṃ duṣvapnyam ārtiṃ puruṣareṣiṇīm | tad asmad aśvinā yuvam apriye prati muñcatam || PSK 20.50.8 yat pārśvād uraso me aṅgādaṅgād avavepate | aśvinā puṣkarasrajā tasmān naḥ pātam aṃhasaḥ || not found in PSK; in its place PS 3.4.3 is repeated: PSK 20.50.9a apakāmety ekā yadīd amṛtakāmyāghaṃ (· ·) ripram upeyima | · · = two illegible akṣaras in V/122, omitted in JM andhaśroṇa iva hīyatāṃ mā no nv āgād aghaṃ yataḥ || not found PSK ariprā āpo apa ripram asmat | yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasmin duṣvapnyam ā sṛjāmi || in place of PS (Orissa) 20.54.10 PSK has the following (b = PS 2.76.1b) payo me kloma karṇeṣu payo me vīrudho dadhan | payo me sṛṣṭā deveṣu payo me dadhat ||
PSK 20.51.1 adarśi gātuvittamo yasmin vratāny ādadhuḥ | upo ṣu jātam āryasya vardhanaṃ somaṃ gacchantu no giraḥ || PSK 20.51.2 pra daivodāso agnir devām̐ acchā na majmanā | anu mātaraṃ pṛthivīṃ vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi || PSK 20.51.3 yasmād rejanti kṛṣṭayaś carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ | sahasrasā medhasātāv iva tman- tmanā -āgniṃ dhībhir duvasyata || PSK 20.51.4 ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam | bhavā vājasya saṃgathe || PSK 20.51.5 ā pyāyasva madintama soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ | bhavā naḥ sumnayuḥ sakhā vṛdhe || ab = PSK 20.51.6ab(c); (c)d: not found in PSK, PSK 20.51.6cd is = PS 18.70.5cd: āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhā bhavantu śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ || saṃ te payāṃsi sam u yantu vajāḥ saṃ vṛṣṇyāny abhimātiṣāhaḥ | āpyāyamāno amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsy uttamāni dhiṣva || not found in PSK; PSK 20.51.7 is = RV 5.13.4 vidma tvā vayaṃ somaṃ rājānaṃ ye tvā na viduḥ | teṣāṃ cakṣuṣā śrotreṇa prāṇena prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanenā pyāyasva | eṣā ta oṣadhīs tayā tvam ā pyāyasva || not found in PSK; PSK 20.51.8 is = PS (Orissa) 20.61.8 āpīno asmān āpyāyac cakṣuṣā śrotreṇa prāṇena prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena || PSK 20.51.9 yad veda rājā varuṇo veda devo bṛhaspatiḥ | indro yad vṛtrahā veda tat satyaṃ cittamohanam || PSK 20.51.10 śarveṇa nīlaśikhaṇḍena bhavena marutāṃ pitrā | virūpākṣeṇa babhruṇā vācaṃ vadiṣyato hatāḥ ||
PSK 20.52.1 etad yad anyatra jigāṃsatha yad anyatra vivīṣatha | tad vaś cittam amūmuhaṃ tad vaś cittam anīnaśam || PSK 20.52.3 asti vai pathāṃ niṣkuṭaṃ nadīnāṃ ca niraṅkaśam | tena vaś cittam amūmuhaṃ tena vaś cittam anīnaśam || PSK 20.52.2 yāni vaḥ sapta cetāṃsy aṣṭau yāni manāṃsi ca | tad vaś cittam amūmuhaṃ tad vaś cittam anīnaśam || PSK 20.52.4 indreṇa medinā yuj- yujā -āgninā jātavedasā | tena vaś cittam amūmuhaṃ tena vaś cittam anīnaśam || PSK 20.52.5 pratīcīnāṃ vo abhy adhām aśvam ivāśvābhidhānyā | kṛṇve vo māmake vaśe pador upānahau yathā || PSK 20.52.6 devānāṃ saṃsad asi devānāṃ yātur asi | yayā tanvā brahma jinvasi tayā mā jinva || PSK 20.52.7 roce mā prakāśe mā kaṇvā vidan mā gamaya | anu mā budhyantām || PSK 20.52.8 vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedur indraṃ priyamedhā ṛṣayo nādhamānāḥ | apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣur mumugdhy asmān nidhayeva baddhān || PSK 20.52.9 apsu jātasya mahatas pary aśmanaḥ | svayaṃjātasya śociṣo 'dbhiḥ parvata nāśaya || PSK 20.52.10 uttodinīṃ śimidvatī durgayonir vyadvarām | mṛgām̐ anu pra pātaya marīcīr anu nāśaya || PSK 20.52.11 aśvasyāsnaḥ saṃpatitā aśvaḥsyāstnaḥ V/122 parṇe te vasatiṣ kṛtā | asṛk patatriṇām asi jahi vāmūn pra bādhama || PSK 20.52.12 asṛkto adhi jāto 'si parṇe te sadanaṃ kṛtam | āṇḍaṃ patatriṇām asi jahi vāmūn pra bādhama || PSK 20.52.13 yathā gardabho vivartanād vidhūya vipalāyate | evāsau palāyatām amuṣmād adhy āyataḥ ||
PSK 20.53.1 sanir asi sanitāsi saneyam || PSK 20.53.2 kṛtir asi kartāsi kriyāsam || PSK 20.53.3 vittir asi vettāsi videyam || PSK 20.53.4 bhūtir asi bhūtāsi bhūyāsam || PSK 20.53.5 bhūr asi subhūr asi subhūr nāmāsi || PSK 20.53.6a prajāpater madhyamaḥ śreṣṭho raśmir asi || PSK 20.53.6b bhūtaye tvā vittaye tvā paśūnāṃ tvā vittaya ā dadhāmi || PSK 20.53.7a agnir vahnir vahnir agniḥ || PSK 20.53.7bc; PSK 20.53.7d: agneṣṭha syona indra āroddhā prajāpatiḥ pradātā || PSK 20.53.8bc; PSK 20.53.8a: bhakṣayāmi bṛhaspater mukhena bṛhaspates tvā mukhena yācāmi sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣā pratīkṣe adabdhena tvā cakṣuṣāvekṣe || PSK 20.53.9 ayuto 'ham ayuto ma ātmā ayutaṃ me cakṣur ayutaṃ me śrotram ayuto me prāṇo ayuto me 'pāno ayuto 'haṃ sarvaḥ || PSK 20.53.10a devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūta ā rabhe || not found in PSK agneṣ ṭvāsyena prāśnāmi bṛhaspater mukhena || PSK 20.53.10b indrasya tvā jaṭhare sādayāmi varuṇasyodare || PSK 20.53.11a yo agnir nṛmaṇā nāma brāhmaṇeṣu praviṣṭaḥ || PSK 20.53.11bc tasminn etat suhutam astu prāśitaṃ tan mā mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyoman ||
anuvāka 9 ||
PSK 20.54.1 veda vai te takman nāma viśvaso nāma vā asi | asamaratho nāma te pitā hārṣī nāma takman te mātā śimidā nāma te svasā || PSK 20.54.2a; PS 4.24.7cd are repeated (sāptamikī- ‘the seventh ṛc- [of PS 4.24]’) giriṃ gaccheti sāptamikī || PSK 20.54.2bc3ab asurās tvod ava bharan samudrād adhi māyayā | tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat || PSK 20.54.3cdef rogasthānam asṛksthānam atho āsrāvabheṣajam | babhror aśvasya vāreṇ- vāreṇa -āpi nahyāmi tā aham || PSK 20.54.45ab yan me daṇḍo vāpāti dīkṣayā tapasā saha | tam ahaṃ punar ā dade punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ | punar me brahmaṇaspatir brahma jīvitavā adāt || PSK 20.54.6 itthād ulūkāpa tanvan uttānapādam arbhakaḥ | sa me premāṇam ā vahad apa dveṣaḥ parā vahat || ab = PSK 20.54.7ab; cd: not found in PSK; PSK 20.54.7cd repeats PS 19.23.12c and PS 11.2.13c instead yathā bāṇaḥ susaṃśitaḥ parāpataty āśumat | evā mūtrasya te dhārā parā patati ketumat || PSK 20.54.8 yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhāv adhi | evā me madhumad vaco deveṣu puruṣeṣu ca || PSK 20.54.9 dīrghāyutvāya tapase mahyā ariṣṭatātaye | suparṇo mahyam abravīd etad utsaktabheṣajam etat puliśabheṣajam || PSK 20.54.10, PS 16.8.4 is repeated agnī rakṣāṃsīty ekā ||
PSK 20.55.1 paiśir mātā peśiḥ pitā paiśeyaḥ peśyā hataḥ | addhā kṛtasya brahmaṇā vṛścikasyārasaṃ viṣam || PSK 20.55.2 nir hvayāmi parṇasādān nir ut pucchād u te viṣam | bhūmis ta ucyate mātā tasyai te nama it sṛja || PSK 20.55.3 kim u danta āmayati kim abhūd upaveśanam | āpo nir asyatā krimim agade kṛṇutā hanū || PSK 20.55.4; see Kajihara 2011, 53-54 yatra bhūmyā anāmṛtaṃ divi candramasi śritam | vidvām̐ ahaṃ tatra manye māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām || PSK 20.55.6; see Kajihara 2011, 54 yat te susīme hṛdayam ado vai tat prajāpatau | vedāma tasya te vayaṃ (māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām) || PSK 20.55.5 yat suvarṇāyā hṛdayaṃ pṛthivyām adhi niṣṭhitam | vedāhaṃ tasyās tan nāma (māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām) || PSK 20.55.7 agner hṛdayam asi vidyut tat tvā tathā veda | māhaṃ pautram aghaṃ ni gām || PSK 20.55.8 prajā ime prajāpata indrāgnī śarma yacchatam | yathāhaṃ jyog ihāsāni prajānām adhipā vaśī || not found in PSK; PSK 20.55.9 is = PS 19.28.5 yāṃ prajām avidām ady- adya -ātmanaḥ parinirmitām | āyuṣmatīṃ tanūkṛtāṃ tām̐ agne jarase naya || PSK 20.56.10; PSK 20.55.10 is = PS (Orissa) 20.61.10 indra ivāsāni sāsahir agnir iva jyotiṣā bṛhan | sūrya iva viśvataḥ pratyak samudra iva duṣṭaraḥ ||
PSK 20.57.1; hiṃsīd following ŚS 7.54.2, mss. hiṃsīr ṛcaṃ sāma yad aprākṣaṃ havir ojo yajur balam | etaṃ mā tasmān mā hiṃsīd vedaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śacīpate || PSK 20.57.2 ud bhare dyāvāpṛthivī sahauṣadhībhiḥ | gṛhṇāmi prajāṃ nir apaḥ sṛjāmi || PSK 20.57.3 mā na āpo medhāṃ mā brahma pra mathiṣṭana | suṣyadā yūyaṃ syandadhvam upahūto 'haṃ sumedhā varcasvī || PSK 20.57.4 mā no medhāṃ mā no dīkṣāṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭa yat tapaḥ | śivā naḥ sarva āyuṣa Bhatt. āyuṣe āpo bhavantu mātaraḥ || PSK 20.57.5 iha prajā viśvarūpā ramantām asmin goṣṭhe viśvabhṛto janitrīḥ | agniṃ kulāyam upa saṃviśantīr jānantu naḥ payasā ghṛtena || PSK 20.57.6 rantaya stha ramataya stha mayi śrita stha mayi śrayadhvam | manotā nāma stha grāmyā apsaraso veda vo vittam ā mā viśata || PSK 20.57.7 śarva nīlaśikhaṇḍa vīra karmaṇikarmaṇi | imām asya prāśaṃ jahi yenedaṃ vivadāmahe || PSK 20.57.89ab tṛtīyakaṃ vitṛtīyaṃ sadandiṃ takmānam uta rājayakṣmam | yathā śakra unmumoca tṛtīyakam evāhaṃ tad un muñcāmi tṛtīyakaṃ tam asyām oṣadhyāṃ badhnāmi || PSK 20.57.9cd ādhvastapakṣṇe bṛhate pathe 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ || PSK 20.57.10 indrāya tviṣīmate pathe 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ ||
PSK 20.58.1ab vyāghrāyobhayādate pathe 'ham akaraṃ namaḥ || PSK 20.58.1cd2abc namas te pathye revati svasti mā parā ṇaya svasti punar ā naya | atho svasti nas kṛdhi jīvā jyotir aśīmahi || PSK 20.58.2de3ab āmanasaṃ yajāmahe satyaprāśaṃ purohitam | taṃ devaṃ prathamaṃ yaje yo 'mum āmanasaṃ karat || PSK 20.58.3cd4ab; PSK 20.58.4cdef is = PS 16.105.6a āmanaska devak- devaka -āroruvatka devaka | arvāg avastaraṃ kṛdhi yam ahaṃ kāmaye priyam || PSK 20.56.7 ayaṃ no agnir adhyakṣo ayaṃ no vasuvittamaḥ | asyopasadye mā riṣām- riṣāma -āyaṃ rakṣatu naḥ prajām || PSK 20.56.8; see Kajihara 2011, 55 asmin sahasraṃ puṣyāsm- puṣyāsma -aidhamānāḥ sve gṛhe | imaṃ sam indhiṣīmahy āyuṣmantaḥ suvarcasaḥ || see Griffiths 2004–2005, 251; = PSK 20.56.9 śuddhavālā kṛṣṇaphalā kabrūr balāsabheṣajī | śuktivalgasya nāśanī devī dadātu bheṣajam || see Griffiths 2004–2005, 251; = PSK 20.51.8 aśvattho devasadanas tṛtīyasyām ito divi | tatra lohitavṛkṣo jātaḥ śigruḥ kṣiptabheṣajaḥ || see Griffiths 2004–2005, 252; not found in PSK na tatra bhavo hanti na śarva iṣum asyati | yatra tvaṃ deva tumburo parvateṣu virohasi || see Griffiths 2004–2005, 252; = PSK 20.55.10 kṛṣyām anyo vi rohati girer anyo 'dhi pakṣasi | trātārau śaśvatām imāv ā gantāṃ śigrutumburū ||
see Griffiths 2004–2005, 252; = PSK 20.56.1 yāvat parṇaṃ yāvat phalaṃ yāvanto adhyṛkṣarāḥ | tāvantaḥ śuṣmās tumburos tad u te viṣadūṣaṇam || see Griffiths 2004–2005, 252; = PSK 20.56.2; pāda c: restore jalāṣam iti as a reference to 20.39.6cd? rudra jalāṣabheṣaj- jalāṣabheṣaja -emaṃ rogam aśīsamo jalāṇiti || PSK 20.56.3 asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād idam urv antarikṣam | ṛṣabhasyeva kanikladato hṛdayaṃ śamayāmi te || PSK 20.56.4 saṃ mā siñcantu marutaḥ saṃ māsau rohiṇī divaḥ | saṃ māyam agniḥ siñcatu prajayā ca dhanena ca dīrgham āyuṣ kṛṇotu me || PSK 20.56.5 naktaṃ harī mṛgayete divā suparṇarohitau | bhavāya ca śarvāya c- ca -obhābhyām akaraṃ namaḥ || PSK 20.58.5 namo bhavāya namaḥ śarvāya namaḥ kumāraśatrave | namo nīlaśikhaṇḍāya namaḥ sabhāprapādine || ab: not found in PSK, cd: refrain yasya harī aśvatarau gardabhāv abhitaḥsarau | tasmai nīlaśikhaṇḍāya namaḥ sabhāprapādine || PSK 20.58.6 asāv eti śiśumāro asāv eti pulīkayā | kumāraśatro va roh- roha -odakaṃ parivācanam || see Knobl 2007, 56; = PSK 20.58.7 yathedam abhram arbhakaṃ parjanyād apa śīyate | evā me aśvinā mukhād abhīly apa śīyatām || see Knobl 2007, 56; = PSK 20.58.8 abhīli naśyetaḥ paras tvacaṃ me mābhi mimlapaḥ | agastyasya brahmaṇ- brahmaṇā -ābhīlīṃ nāśayāmasi ||
see Knobl 2007, 56; = PSK 20.59.1ab sesicām upatvacāṃ nāśay- nāśaya -ā pururūpād abhīlyaṃ mukhāt || see Knobl 2007, 57; = PSK 20.59.1cd2ab yan me kṛtād apriyād āruroha malaṃ mukham | apāṃ vāta iva śīpālaṃ sūryas tad apa lumpatu || see Knobl 2007, 57-58; = PSK 20.59.2cd3ab apa me 'bhīlī patatv abhraṃ vātahṛtaṃ yathā | ā mā suvarṇaṃ gacchatu subhāgam astu me mukham || see Knobl 2007, 58; not found in PSK yathā sūryasyopodaye hiraṇyaṃ pratirocate | evā me aśvinā mukhaṃ suvarṇaṃ prati rocatām || see Knobl 2007, 58; = PSK 20.59.3cd4ab; PSK 20.59.4cd repeats PS 1.97.4ab pra yad gāvo na bhūrṇayas tveṣā vayāṃsy akraman | ghnantu kṛṣṇām apa tvacaṃ subhāgam astu me mukham || PSK 20.59.5cd indreṇa preṣita ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.59.7cd somena preṣita ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.59.6cd sūryeṇa preṣita ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.8cd bṛhaspatinā preṣita ulūkāsaṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.9cd prajāpatinā preṣita ulūkāsaṃ pacāmi te ||
PSK 20.60.1 grāhyā dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.60.2 nirṛtyā dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.60.3 varuṇasya dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.60.5 mṛtyor dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.60.4] yamasya dūto 'sy ulūkā saṃ pacāmi te || PSK 20.60.6 rājā tvā varuṇo 'khanad dattāṃ somena babhruṇā | tāṃ tvā vidma pratāpikāṃ prāmuṣya hṛdayaṃ tapa || PSK 20.60.78abc śocayainaṃ pratapainaṃ sam enaṃ takmanā sṛja | yathāsya dahyamānasy- dahyamānasya -āgniḥ parvāṇy anv ayad | hṛdayaṃ prevalijjayād akṣyau kāmena śocayān muhūrtaṃ mām apaśyataḥ || PSK 20.60.8d9 ayam it tvāgnir ā nayād vātas tvāta ud yamāt | yaṃ tvam enaṃ ni vartay- vartaya -āsau hā iha te manaḥ || PSK 20.60.10 agniṣ ṭvā tapatu sūryas tvā tapatu vātas tvā yuṅktāṃ marutaś ca yuñjatām | arvāṅ ehi samaṭamāno marīcibhiḥ || PSK 20.60.11 vṛhāmi te lomāny aṅgebhyaḥ pacāmi māṃsaṃ jvalayāmy asthi | iha te ramatāṃ mano mayi te ramatāṃ manaḥ ||
PSK 20.61.1 ayaṃ piṇḍaḥ karkarapiṇḍaḥ smaraḥ pāñcalaḥ saṃtapanaḥ karaṃkaraḥ | amuṣya hṛdayaṃ tapo yam ahaṃ kāmaye priyam || PSK 20.61.2 yathāyam agnis tapati yathā tapati sūryaḥ | evā te tapyatāṃ mano hṛdayam aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparur māṃ kāmena na ramāsā atra || PSK 20.61.34; pāda f not written yathā tapati paraśuṃ yathā vāsinakhādanam | yathā sūrya udyan sarvaṃ saṃtapati | evā te tapyatāṃ mano hṛdayam aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparur māṃ kāmena na ramāsā atra || PSK 20.61.5 saṃ tvā dyauś ca pṛthivī ca tapatāṃ māṃ kāmena na ramāsā atra || PSK 20.61.6 smara hai smaratād amum aṅgajvareṇocchocanīnām | takmanainaṃ saṃ sṛja viśvaśāradena mama kāmena || PSK 20.61.7abcd aṣṭāśītiṃ sahasrāṇy aty avādīd vaco mama | ihāre 'ham avādiṣam atrāre prāyasy astam || PSK 20.61.7ef8 yaṃ sumitraḥ sumitrāyai cakre 'vāsā smaram | yathā sā tasya kāmena na suṣvāpa kadā cana | evāsau mama kāmena māva svāpsīt kadā cana || PSK 20.61.9 pary agnir āpas tapati pari dyām eti sūryaḥ | pari tvām indro vṛtrahā mahyaṃ tapatu sarvataḥ || PSK 20.61.10 yathā vāto nyāvāti yathā tapati sūryaḥ | evā tvam indra vṛtrahann amuṃ mahyam ihā naya || PSK 20.61.11 śālālavaṃ saṃvananaṃ vanād vananam ābhṛtam | yena gayo gandharvo apsarasāṃ samavānayat | tenāham amuṃ mayi vānayāmy ā mṛtyor ā parāvataḥ ||
anuvāka 10 ||
